40001001	Yesu Kristo mmbo akee wa ufyari lwa Davidi, akee wa ufyari lwa Abrahamu. Yelu ni uramba lwa ufyari lwakwe.
40001002	Abrahamu kaira Isaki, Isaki kaira Yakobo, Yakobo kaira Yuda na vanavamaye.
40001003	Yuda kaira Faresi na Zara na mayaawo ni Tamari; Faresi kaira Esrom, Esrom kaira Aramu.
40001004	Aramu kaira Aminadabu, Aminadabu kaira Naasoni; Naasoni kaira Salmoni.
40001005	Salmoni kaira Boas, nawe maye ni Rahabu, Boas kaira Obedi nawe maye ni Ruti. Obedi kaira Isai.
40001006	Isai kaira mangyi Davidi, Davidi kaira Solomon. Nawe maye ni nka ulya wa Uria.
40001007	Solomon kaira Rehoboamu; Rehoboamu kaira Abia, Abia kaira Asafu.
40001008	Asafu kaira Yosafati, Yosafati kaira Yoramu. Yoramu kaira Usia.
40001009	Usia kaira Yotamu, Yotamu kaira Ahasi, Ahasi kaira Hesekia.
40001010	Hesekia kaira Manase, Manase kaira Amosi, Amosi kaira Yosia;
40001011	Yosia kaira Yekonia na vanavamaye meendi vandu veefo veesamirywa kulya Babeli.
40001012	Na meendi vandu vansamirywa kulya Babeli Yekonia kaira Saltieli, Saltieli kaira Serubabeli.
40001013	Serubabeli kaira Abiudi, Abiudi kaira Eliakimu. Eliakimu kaira Asori;
40001014	Asori kaira Sadoki, Sadoki kaira Akimu, Akimu kaira Eliudi;
40001015	Eliudi kaira Eleasari, Eleasari kaira Matani; Matani kaira Yakobo.
40001016	Yakobo kaira Yosefu we mmi wa Maria. Mmbwe aleira Yesu yeto avaangwa Kristo.
40001017	Naasa kupookya Abrahamu fika Davidi marika akava ikumi na aana. Na kupookya Davidi fika meendi alya vandu valesamiryo kulya Babeli marika akaveva ikumi na aana. Na kupookya meendi vandu valesamirywa kulya Babeli fika Kristo marika akaveva ikumi na aana.
40001018	Naasa yoo maonikyony a Kristo kileenda u-le, “Maye ulya wakwe we Maria, eefinngywa ni Yosefu valandesanga ando amwi sha nndu na nka kamanyika mmbo akufingye kyuuka na Mumuyo Mweele.
40001019	Na mmi ulya wakwe we Yosefu akee nndu nsumanu nalakunde insuta karummbwa nanreu kirika.
40001020	Eefo akusaraa indo nsu wa Iruva kansheya efo yooryeny kaamba, ‘Yewe Yosefu kukee mwana wa Davidi! Nta kulairyee irwaa tindi wafo Maria, mashika elyi akufingye mmbo kyuukye na Mumuyo Mweele.’
40001021	Mmbo ashiira mwana wa womi na yewe kumfishye irina ni Yesu. ‘Mashika mmbwe akiraa vandu vakwe ngyulyamari tawo.’ “
40001022	Na kimaruma kikaenda indo, ni kirero kilya Nndumi alerera na kana ka nkisuku naambo kikooye iinukya kyeamba,
40001023	“Lla-te mwana wa kyeny akaa naire mwana wa womi, na irina lyakwe vammbaange ni ‘Emanueli’ (Kwaallwa kyaamba; Iruva asasangyi neese).”
40001024	Naasa Yosefu kakwiipoo rony, kandetana kilya nsu ulya wa Nndumi ammbia karwaa tindi ulya wakwe.
40001025	Nta nalasange nawe kutani afika kyeeri kya iira mwana nawe kammbaanga irina lyakwe ni Yesu.
40002001	Llya meendi Yesu alewonika kulya Betilehemu ya Yuda fyeeri filya Herode etiri umangyi vakasha vandu vauka na taari ya ngama vakafika Yerusalemu.
40002002	Vakaamba, “A mangyi yeyo ya Vayuda aleirwa akee kwi? Shamashika mmbo lulelollya nyinyiri yakwe kulya taari ya ngama neese mmbo lwasha lushemfirya-ndi.”
40002003	Naasa mangyi Herode ekiita indo kasavaa kimwi na vandu woose va kulya Yerusalemu.
40002004	Kasanyiria vakohani vaniini woose na velosha mavavaso evasunundaa mbony ta Kristo kundo ashewonikyaa.
40002005	“Vakaamba ni kulya Betilehemu ya Yudaya. Shamashika ni kindo kikee kireiye ni ulya mwauya fisuku kaamba,
40002006	‘Na yewe Betilehemu ya Uruka lwa Yuda nshi kukee nndu kwanyiiya vashilyi va Yuda-fo. Shamashika efo kwafo kwiikaa kuuke-fo mangyi ashiisaa vandu vakwe va Israeli.’ “
40002007	Nalyo mangyi ilya Herode kavaanga vaanga valya kirisi. Kavasununda vammbye kyeeri valelollya nyinyiri ilya.
40002008	Kavaruma veende kulya Betilehemu kavavia, “Kweenngye mundevesa waarya kya mwana yeto. Mukankooya sheenngyeny mbony, na yeny shiveenda indemfiirya-ndi.”
40002009	Naasa, vekiita kilya kya mangyi vakakweengya. Nalyo pariparii nyinyiri ilya valelollya kulya taari ya ngama ikasha ivasongoya shia. Ikaenda ikatana yairisha efo uwe usumanu na ando mwana ulya akai.
40002010	Naasa elyi valollya nyinyiri ilya vakatirwa ni nsia nniini nnu.
40002011	Vakaanga na efo mmba vakakooya kimwana kilya ando amwi na maye; vakamfiiryandi vakamwoolokyasi vakawuya vakaporomwa findo fyawo vasurummye fya usuri. Vakansimba findo fyawo fya pya fya wuuru uniini, ni saabu na ubani na manemane.
40002012	Vakoorwa ni Iruva efo yooryeny valaviire kyaaro na kulya kwa Herode, kya indi vawuye na kulya urukeny lwawo veshiiraa shia ingyi.
40002013	Naasa elyi vaanga valya varie shia yeewuya, nsu wa Nndumi kasha ikoora na Yosefu efo yooryeny; kammbia, “Wara shia kweenda kwirye kimwana ekyo na maye kunderishia kulya Misri kundekaa-fo; shitani shakuvia-se shamashika Herode arie iruuya kimwana yekyo nakirumate.”
40002014	Nalyo kawara shia yeenda arie kimwana kilya na maye elyi kio. Karishya kulya Misri kandekaa-fo. Herode katana afwa.
40002015	Na kilya kikee kirere ni Nndumi na kana ka ulya Mwauya fisuku naambo kikooye iinukya; kyeamba, “Ni kulya Misri mfo shilevaangya mwana wakwa.”
40002016	Nalyo Herode ankooya allembwa ni vaanga valya karooywa n'ngoo nnu. Karuma vana va kyuumi kulya Betilehemu na va kulya minyanuny koose vawaawa. Kupookya valya va myaaka ivii na valya vawuya-wuya numa; kyuuka na kyeeri kilya alesununda vaanga valya.
40002017	Nalyo kilya kikee kirere ni ulya mwauya fisuku Yeremia kiveinukya indo elyi aleamba:
40002018	“Ni unyanga luleitiwa kulya Rama, ni kiiyo na ikwaalala kyuumu. Ni Raheli akee iiya vana vakwe, nta naleve iviirya muu nyelyi valakiiyo-se.”
40002019	Naasa Herode ekimaa ifwa, nsu wa Nndumi kasha ikoora na Yosefu efo yooryeny kulya Misri.
40002020	Kammbia wara shia kweenda kurie kimwana na maye kundefika kulya urukeny lwa Israeli, kimmba valya valesia muu wa kimwana yekyo valemfwa.
40002021	Nawe kawara shia keenda arie kimwana kilya na maye kandefika kulya urukeny lwa Israeli.
40002022	Naasa ekivywa ni Arikelao atiri umangyi ando a ndeye Herode, kairyaa yeenda-fo, koorwa ni Iruva yooryeny kawara-se shia kandefika kulya myuungony ya Galilaya.
40002023	Kashesamya muri uvaangwaa Nasareti, na kilya kikee kirere nivaauya fisuku naambo kikooye iinukya elyi vaambaye, “Ashevaangwa Nndu wa Nasareti.”
40003001	Naasa fyeeri fikee filya-da nalyo Yohane Mmbatisi kafummya vandu akapaa weele kulya kasa ka Yuda kaamba,
40003002	“Kuryeny ngyulyamari tany, kimmba umangyi lwa Iruva lwammaafukya.”
40003003	Shamashika mmbwe eambaywa na kana ka nkisuku ulya Isaya eeshaambaa, “Akalu unyanga lwa nndu akapaa weele efo kasa eeshaambaa, ‘Songosyeny shia ya Nndumi!’ Sumaniseny miko yakwe.”
40003004	Nawe Yohane muni eraa soori tikee shooke; ta mafwaa a ngamula, kakufinga na ukova lwa shony efo mwiniiny. Na shoonga takwe ni nrie na ukyi wa mbakony.
40003005	Nalyo vandu vakamweengya va kulya Yerusalemu na kulya Yudaya koose na va muungo wa Yordani woose.
40003006	Vakandebatiswa mmbwe efo mureny wa Yordani veparaa ngyulyamari tawo.
40003007	Kyasia kalollya Vafarisayo veengyi na Vasadukayo vensheyaa naambo vabatiswa mmbwe, “Nawe kavavia yeni ufyari lwa shoka, a ni vi alemwiikimba shaasa musheturuunyaa unyafi lwa Iruva yelo lukaa luwoye ulana?
40003008	Oreny kyuuka na mashora any mwalashike mirima!
40003009	Nta mulakusare mwaambe, Nde weeru luntiri ni Abrahamu! Mmbo shamuvia, Iruva ashiidimaa iparya Abrahamu vana navaute naakwa kunu maweny.
40003010	Na kyaara mmbo kyammaa ivikwa sindeny ya miri. Naasa wo nri wiiyo ulavikaa ndunda shisha mmbo umanywaa undeerwa murony.
40003011	Kyakwa yeny shamubatisa na mura mukooye yaalashika efo nriminy. Indi yeto ashaa numa yakwa mmbo atiri finya kashiilanya. Na yeny nshimaa nta shintare fyaaru fyakwe-fo. Mmbwe ashemubatisaa na Mumuyo Mweele na muro.
40003012	Nawe arie nndeeva na woko lwakwe na efo muunguny wakwe asheaiyaa-fo kwiile peru. Na nganu yeto nataallye efo mbesheny yakwe na muulu yeto nandeuvivya murony ularumikaa.”
40003013	Nalyo Yesu kasha auka Galilaya kafika kulya Yordani kwa Yohane nandebatiswa mmbwe.
40003014	Nawe kakunda imwiima kammbia, “Yeny mmbo shisumani ibatiso ni yewe, na yewe kwasha na kwakwa?”
40003015	Yesu kammbia, “Ra! Ulaalu kikuviiyeny indo! Mashika ni indo kilusumanyi; naambo lwiinutye efyo Iruva akundye fyoose.”
40003016	Naasa elyi Yesu ammebatiswa kauka efo mureny. Nalyo efo iruveeu kukanraukya kalollya Mumuyo wa Iruva ashoolokaa akee sha mbeta kasha inkaya.
40003017	Nalyo akakalu unyanga lureraa luuka iruveeu lukaamba, “Yeu mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde, mmbwe shilensauwa.”
40004001	Nalyo Yesu kaorwa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva neende kulya kasa, nandeeswa-fo ni mmbishwa.
40004002	Kamaa-fo mikonu makumi aana kio na nsanyiny nalakomba nta shoonga, elyi numa katirwa nshaa.
40004003	Naasa mmbishwa kansheya kammbia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva ambaany mawe yaa nawe mikate.”
40004004	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Kindo nndu akirya-u nakyo muu nshi shoonga tupu-fo, ni wo kirero kyauka efo kaniny ka Iruva.”
40004005	Nalyo mmbishwa kamwiipoo kamfita kulya muriny mweele kanseleesa alya urorony lwa mmba ya Iruva.
40004006	Kammbia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee Mwana wa Iruva killyany si, shamashika kikee kireiye kikaambawa, ‘Ashevavasya vasu vakwe va iruveeu mashika afo yewe, vashekukamaraa na mai, kulasheekapa nta urende lwafo iweny.’ “
40004007	Yesu kamwaallwa kammbia, “Nta kulaese Nndumi Iruva wafo!”
40004008	Naasa mmbishwa kamwiipoo lyingyi, kamfita ando a ifumbuny yaasha kamoora ngyumangyi ta ulana toose na usuri lwa vayo.
40004009	Kammbia, “Akati shikuniinga toose, kwakooya kwakutuula si neshoolokya ng'undeny.”
40004010	Nalyo Yesu Kammbia, “Shuuka satana! Mmbo kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Ni Nndumi Iruva wafo mmbwe kushemoolokya nawe mmbwe muni kushemwiindyaa.’ “ "
40004011	Nalyo satana kanra-u, na vasu va Iruva vakansheya vakamfurukannya.
40004012	Naasa ekiita mbony ta Yohane sheelyi amfingwa, kookau keenda kulya Galilaya;
40004013	Kasama kulya Nasareti kandekaa kulya Kapernaumu mbaambaa ya yeeve kulya myuungony ya Sabuloni na Naftali.
40004014	Naambo kilya kikee kirere na kana ka nkisuku ulya Yesaya kikooye iinukya llya aleamba,
40004015	" “Yewe uruka lwa Sabuloni na Naftali kundo kwiirye shia yeefika yeveny kulya kwa kulya ya Yordani, efo Galilaya ya vandu va masanga.
40004016	Wo ni vandu vakee ireeminy vakawuya ilollya sa niini. Ni vandu vakee urukeny lwa vafu vakawuya ifummywa ni sa.”
40004017	Naasa fyeeri filya llyo meendi Yesu alepooka ikapa weele na irera, “Kuryeny ngyulyamari tany, kimmba umangyi lwa Iruva lwammaafukya.”
40004018	Naasa eefo arua-ruaa kulya mbaambaa ya yeewe ilya ya Galilaya kalollya vana va nka vavii, ni Simion ulya avangwaa Petro, na mwanamaye we Andrea. Nawo veefo vashoolotaa mireiyo yaawo yeereiya makunga mashika vekee veereiya makunga.
40004019	Nawe kavavia, “Ndifony mushilatye! Na yeny nshemwaallwa veereiya vandu.”
40004020	Nawo lyo yeni vakatiiya-u mireiyo ilya yaawo vakallatya.
40004021	Naasa alla na mbee kalollya vanavanka vengyi vavii ni Yakobo akee mwana wa Sebedayo na Yohane akee ni mwanamaye. Nawo vakee efo ngalaveny na nde-yaawo, we Sebedayo veefo vasongosya mireiyo ilya yaawo. Nawe kavavaanga.
40004022	Nawo lyo yeni vakatiiya-u ngalava ilya na nde-yaawo, vakallatya.
40004023	Nalyo kava mwisengetya kulya Galilaya koose eeloshaa efo mmba tawo teeterevya, na yoongoya vandu nrumi ya nsia, yeyo ya umangyi lwa Iruva. Kaveshiisa na wo ndwari na wo unana lwa efo vanduny.
40004024	Nalyo nnduma wakwe ukaenda ikwaana kulya Siria koose. Na vandu vakamweengya yewo woose velwee ndwari shive na shive na yewo velyilyiswa kyuumu, na yewo vatirwa ni mimuyo mikasha, vasukwa na fitongororo malungo. Nawe kavakira.
40004025	Vandu vakallatya matorito meengyi vauka kulya Galilaya na kulya muungo wa miri ikumi; na Yerusalemu na Yudaya, na kulya kwakulya ya Yordani.
40005001	Naasa elyi alollya vashe ikuumbya-fo nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu, kandesaama kulya ifumbuny kakaa-fo rembo. Na valya vakiloshyony vakakaa yoo kufii nawe.
40005002	Nawe kapooka ivalosha eshaambaa.
40005003	“Ngoma yewo va mirima mikiva, mashika mmbo umangyi lwa iruveeu lwava lwavo.
40005004	Ngoma yewo vatirwa mfyoova, mashika mmbo vakaa vaviirywa muu.
40005005	Ngoma yewo vafoo, mashika mmbo vakaa vatire uruka luwe ding'u yaawo.
40005006	Ngoma yewo vatirwa nshaa na nyura ya usumanu mashika mmbo vakaa vawuutiswa.
40005007	Ngoma yewo velyillya vandu mashika mmbo vakaa valyillywa.
40005008	Ngoma yewo vatiri nrima mwaa mashika mmbo vakaa valollye Iruva.
40005009	Ngoma yewo veende ufoo mashika mmbo vakaa vavaangwa vana va Iruva.
40005010	Ngoma yewo varishiswa kimaruma kya usumanu mashika mmbo umangyi lwa Iruva lwava lwavo
40005011	Ngoma yeni kwakooya vandu vamwaarara na imurishisa na imufinngya wo kindo kikasha kyoose kikee kya wongo elyi mukee vakwa.
40005012	Fureny-dwa muvelooka mashika iviiri lyany mutiri efo iruveeu lyava iniini. Mashika ni indo verishisa vakisuku valya vamusongoye.”
40005013	“Yeni mmbo mukee mmbala wa ulana yelu. Indi kwakooya mmbala wammba iturya, a kindo ushewuyaa iroliswa nakyo nkyo ki? Mmbukivaa-se-fo, kulaore ni indeerwa efo poo uvavarwa mmbandu.
40005014	Yeni mmbo mukee sa ya ulana. Muri ukee mmbike ando a ifumbuu-ny mmbushiidimaa ikusuruma-fo.
40005015	Nta nkwiifoo nndu ashataa taa efo mmba kawuya iisikya-fo. Mmbo aivika ando a uwe ikamikya yewo woose vakee efo mmba.
40005016	Veny sa efo usanguny lwa vandu woose, nawo vakooye ilollya efyo fya usha mutanaa, vaute-u ing'anisa Nde waany wa efo iruveeu.”
40005017	“Nta mulakusare kindo kilesheende ni ishefullwa mavavaso ao vakisuku-fo. Nshisheeye ifullwa-fo ni iinutya.
40005018	Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Iruveu na ulana fishiraa indi efyo fikee fireiye nfishiraa-fo, na ikava mbekye imwi nsi, nkuti fiinutyo fyoose.’
40005019	Naasa nndu akara ifullwa mavavaso yoo naakwa ni elyo lyikee idu ya engyi, kalosha vandu indo, mmbo akaa navaangwa n-du-wa-woose efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu. Indi yeto atana na yaafunda mmbo akaa navaangwa nniini efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.
40005020	Mashika shamuvia kwakooya kulaore usumanu yelo lwany lwiilannyi yelo lwa velosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mmukooyaa yaanga efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu-fo.”
40005021	“Mmbo mwiitye valya va mbee valevio, ‘Kulawae!’ Na nndu mwiwaa ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo efo kwa veerumbwa mwaandu.”
40005022	Na yeny shamuvia, “Nndu katirya mwanamaye unyafi ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo lwakwe efo kwa veerumbwa mwaandu. Na nndu kavia mwanamaye, ‘Yewe ni mbafu, ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo efo ikwaanuny lya masiingo. Na nndu kavia mwanamaye Iruva akusuuye ammba nndu mwiutywa uvingo lweenda yeerwa murony wa Gehena.’ “
40005023	Naasany kwafika yeende kiraso kyeeniinga Iruva, kwakyeende na alya ando eerasya, kwamfikau kwakumbwa mwanamau atiri mwaandu neewe,
40005024	rau kyaanu kilya kyeeningya Iruva kupooke mbele inderera na mwanamau kusange nawe. Naasa kusheny kusheningya Iruva kyaanu kyafo.
40005025	Va nndu mwaanguya yeto atiri mwaandu neewe kyeeri muriani nawe shia. Na nkiduva nalandeekurambikya efo maakony a nniini yeto wa mwaandu, na yeto nniini wa mwaandu nandekurambikya efo maakony a nsero yeto wa poo, kundeerwa kifingyony.
40005026	Ni kya dede shakuvia, “Nta nkushuukaafo-fo kutani kwataa na senti ya kiparwe.”
40005027	“Mmbo mwiitye valya va mbee valevio, ‘Kulatuuse nta kulashetuuswa.’
40005028	Na yeny shamuvia, wo nndu allola nndu nka kya illanga mmbo ammaa ituusa efo nriminy.
40005029	Na kwakooya iriso lyafo lyishekweengyee nsindara lyiillwe kulyeere efo! Mmbo kyakuviiya kisha mmwasi ilungo lyafo lyimwi lyikakurekya, na mwiili wafo moose ukyie yeerwa murony wa Gehena.
40005030	Na kwakooya woko lwafo usha lushekweengye nsindara lurummbwe kulweere efo lukuuke. Mmbo kyakuviiya kisha ilungo lyafo lyimwi lyikakurekya na mwiili wafo moose ukie yeerwa murony wa Gehena.”
40005031	“Mmbo kilererwa-se kyeamba, ‘Nndu kalakana na nka wakwe kuti nanniinge barua ya ilakana.’
40005032	Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Wo nndu alakana na nka wakwe kwakooya kulaore ni kimaruma kya utuusi, mmbo amwaallwa nave mwituuswa.’ Na nndu arwaa nka mmi allakana nawe mmbo amwaallwa nka ntuusi.”
40005033	“Na kingyi-se valya va mbee valevywa, ‘Nta kulalye mboo, mmbo kushefityaa Nndumi ekyo kuteerye kullye mboo.’
40005034	Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Nta mulakulyise mboo’ mwaambe, ‘Swa iruveeu, mashika nng'u kirembo kya Iruva;’
40005035	Nta mulalye mboo mwaambe, ‘Swa uruka! Mashika nng'u aekyerya marende akwe. Nta mulaambe swa Yerusalemu! Mashika muni muri ni mangyi nniini.’
40005036	Nta kulalye mboo kwaambe, ‘Swa nrwe wakwa! Mashika elyi kulashiidimaa yaalwa nta ufii lumwi luve waa ao uu.’
40005037	Naasany kirero kyany kive, ‘Ee!’ Ao ‘Ode!’ Kyairya efyo ni efo kwa yeto nkasha kyuukye.”
40005038	“Mmbo mwiitye kilya kileambawa, ‘Iriso lyitawa ni iriso, na iyoo lyitawa ni iyoo.’
40005039	Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Nta mulasalale na nndu nkasha. Indi nndu kakukapa woi lwa yuundu lya woko usha mwaluye na yelyo lyingi.’
40005040	Na nndu kakuvaanga mwaanduny nandekusoka soori yafo ya mwiiliny, neewe nreeye na yeyo ya yeerya.
40005041	Na nndu kakwiitikya kweende nawe kyenga kya shia neewe enda nawe ando a fyenga fivii.
40005042	Nndu kakutereva kindo nniinge. Na nndu kasha ikwaakwa nta kulamwiimi.”
40005043	“Mmbo mwiitye kilya kileambawa, ‘Kunda nndu uroo na nkiduva wafo kunsue.’
40005044	Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Kundeny vakiduva vany, na yewo vemurishisa muvevaterevya efo kwa Iruva.’
40005045	Naambo mukooye imanyika mmbo mukee vana va nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu; mashika we ava mwiirosa mwi wakwe ukavaiya yewo varavi na yewo vesha. Kaveva mweende mmbwa yakwe ikakapa kwa yewo va usumanu na kwa yewo va kiila.
40005046	Mashika kwakooya mwakunda yewo vemukunda veni, a isina musheonisaa llyo kyi? A vadedemi nshi indo-da vatanaa?
40005047	Na kwakooya mushiidikiraa vanavamaye vany tupu, a kindo mwatana kya mmwasi nkyo kyi? A vandu va masanga nshi indo-da vatanaa?
40005048	Naasany veny vandu vasongovisi shaasa Nde yeto waany wa efo iruvee-u akee nsongovisi.”
40006001	“Kwiiseny efyo fya usumanu mutanaa mulasheefitana efo fisanguny fya vandu mukooye ilollyo mmbo. Kwakooya kulaore ni indo, nkukiiyo-se isina mutiri efo kwa Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu-fo.
40006002	Naasa elyi kwiifo kuniingya kyaanu kya vakiva nta kulakunde ikapywa wombe lukwiirye mbee shaasa vakunang'ari vatana efo mmba teeterevya neefo shia tikwaannyi naambo vakooye irumishwa. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Isina lyawo alyo vammeelyiwarya.’
40006003	Indi elyi kwiifo kuniingya kyaanu kya vakiva, kulare woko lwafo umuso lumanyi ekyo woko usha lwiifo lutanaa.
40006004	Na kyaanu kyafo kyeeninga vakiva kive ni kirika na ndoo yeto alollye fya kirika akaa nakutae.”
40006005	“Na elyi kwatereva Iruva nta kulave sha vakunang'ari. Wo mmbo vakunndye itereva vasalali efo mmba teeterevya na efo shia tikwaannyi ta efo muriny naambo vakooye ilollywa mmbandu. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Isina lyawo alyo vammeelyiwarya.’
40006006	Indi kyafo yewe elyi kwatereva Iruva ira na efo kirieny kya mmba yafo kya nnang'ani kuveraya na mwaango, kutereveny Ndoo efo kyaminy kukai. Na Ndoo yeto alollye fya kyama akaa nakutae.”
40006007	“Na elyi mwatereva Iruva, nta mularere ura-ura sha vandu va masanga; mashika wo mmbo vaishi kindo vashiirikywa ni elyi marero awo ava meengyi.
40006008	Naasa yeni mulave shawo; mashika Nde yeto waany aishi yekyo mwatura kulaore mwammutereva.
40006009	Naasany yeni tereveny indi, ‘Nde weeru kukee efo iruveeu; irina lyafo lyivikwa yeele, umangyi lwafo lushe.
40006010	Kindo kyafo kukundye shaasa kyatanyika efo iruveeu na kunu urukeny kivetanyika indo.
40006011	Luniinge inu shoonga teru tilufye.
40006012	Kulusarye ngyulyamari teru shaasa na yese lwasarya valya valulyamarya.
40006013	Kulalurwaa efo kyeesyony, indi kulukire ekyo kivishwa. [Shamashika umangyi ni lwafo, na finya, na usuri, meeri moose allung'ani. Amen.]’
40006014	Shamashika kwakooya yeni mushefwaayaa vandu kya efyo vamulyamarye, na Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu ashemufwayaa.
40006015	Indi kwakooya yeni mulafwaaya vandu na Nde yeto waany nta nnashemufwaayaa kya efyo mullyamarye-fo.
40006016	Na elyi mushekootoyaa nta mulave sha vakunang'ari. Mashika wo mmbo vakusha fisangu naambo vamanyike efo vanduny mmbo veefo vakootoyaa. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Isina lyawo alyo vammeelyiwarya.’
40006017	Indi kyafo yewe elyi kukekootoya amba nrwe wafo mafura kuvesangya kisangu.
40006018	Naambo kulamanyike efo vanduny mmbo kwiifo kukootoyaa. Mmbo kumanyikaa yefo kwa Ndoo yeto akee efo kyaminy. Na Ndoo yeto alolye fya kyama akaa nakutaa.”
40006019	“Nta mulave vekusanyirya masaa kunu urukeny. Mfo kurukuru ilyaa na kurere na manyinyi akasuma mmba akaiva.
40006020	Indi kusanyiryeny masaa efo iruveeu kundo kulaifo kurukuru ilyaa nta kurere, nta manyinyi nalaifo asumaa mmba akaiva.
40006021	Shamashika ando kusurumyi umasi lwafo na ngoo yafo nng'u ando ikai.”
40006022	“Naasa kwakooya iriso lyafo lyikee isha na mwiili yeto wafo mmbo ukaa na sa.
40006023	Indi kwakooya iriso lyafo lyankashaa, na mwiili wafo mmbo ukaa na ireema moose deny. Naasa sa yeyo ikee nnang'ani yafo kwakooya yammba ireema, a paa ireema lying'ani.”
40006024	“Nkwiiyo nndu ashiidimaa irundya vanndumi vavii-fo. Mashika ndesa ashesua yeto umwi na ikunda yeto wa kavii. Ao ndesa ashetiraa yeto umwi namini yeto ungyi. Nta mmushiidimaa irundya Iruva musande na irundya masaa a ulana elu-fo.”
40006025	“Kimmba ni indo, neeny shamuvia nta mulasaukwa kya muu yeu kindo mulyaa ao ina, nta kya mwiili kindo muraa. A muu nshi kindo kiniini kikailanya shoonga, na mwiili wany nshi kindo kiniini kikailanya masara eeraa?
40006026	Loleny ndeye ta efo nginiiu-te nteera nta mbeu nta yuulula-fo, nta yaalya mbesheny-fo. Lyo Nde yeto wa iruveu eefo atilelaa. A yeni nshi mutiilanyi kya mmwasi?
40006027	A mmbo kwiifo nndu kunu kwany ashiidimaa yeengerya waasha lwakwe naakwa ni ando a irambo lyimwi nsi na kasaukwa inda?
40006028	Na kya masara yoo nkikyi elyi musawukwaa nng'u? Kufundeny na fivaro fya efo mbuven-te shaasa fimmyaa filavinaa filashooka nta soori.
40006029	Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Nta Solomon na utore lwakwe loose, nneeree nisha sha kimwi kya vayo-fo.’
40006030	Naasany, mare a efo mbuveny aiyo inu na ndesi akandeerwa iyeny, kimmba Iruva amfyaambika indo afikaany yeni mukee va kikusiryo kidu nshi ashemweengeryaa?
40006031	Naasany nta mulasaukwa mwaambe, ‘A lukalya-kyi ao lukana-kyi ao lukaraa-kyi?’
40006032	Shamashika fya ngata yeyo ni vandu va masanga vafilalakyaa. Shamashika Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu we eeshi mmbo mutinnyo mfindo efyo.
40006033	Pookeny mbele iruuya umangyi lwa Iruva na usumanu lwa vayo, na efyo fingyi fyoose musheerywaa-u fya ngyeerya.
40006034	Naasany nta mulasaukwa kya ndesi, Shamashika nkonu wa ndesi usawukwaa nkya vayo. Wo nkonu utiri ngatara ya vayo iwumaa.”
40007001	“Nta mulautye vengyi uvingo, naambo mulashyeyuutywa muveni.
40007002	Shamashika mirumbuye yaany mwanrumbuya vandu, nnyo musherumbuywaa. Na myeesye yaany mwameesya vengyi, nnyo musheesyoo.
40007003	A yewe nkyikyi elyi kwalola kinaana kikee irisony lya mwanamau na ikongo lyikee irisony lyafo yewe kulalyimanyi?
40007004	A ni inda kushevia mwanamau, ‘Ra nkweekye yuuta kinaana yekyo kikee efo irisony lyafo, na efo irisony lyafo kumuni ni ikongo lyiifo?’
40007005	Yewe nkunang'ari pooka mbele yuuta ikongo yelyo efo irisony lyafo, llyo kushelolya nisha kwiidimi yuuta kinaana ekyo kikee efo irisony lya mwanamau.
40007006	Nta mulasheeniinga fite ekyo kikee kyeele, nta samana tany mulateerye nguvefo, naambo tilasheeitivavara na imwiindukya timuratwe.”
40007007	“Tereveny, neeni musheniingwa, syeny neeni musheonaa, kakapeny mwaango neeni musheruywaa.
40007008	Shamashika wo nndu atereva mmbo aniingwa, na yeto mwisia asheonaa na yeto mwikakapa mwaango mmbo asheruywaa.
40007009	A ni vi nndu wa kunu kwany mwana wakwe akooya intereva nkate nawe nanniinge iwe?
40007010	Ao katereva ikunga nawe nanniinge shoka?
40007011	Naasany yeni mukee varavi kwakooya mwaidima iniinga vana vany simbo shisha, a Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu nshi asheengeraa isimba yewo vatereva mesha?
40007012	Naasa findo fyoose shaasa mukunndye itanywa mmbandu neeni veny vetana indo kimwi shawo, mashika ni indo ivavaso lyikai amwi na veawuya fisuku.”
40007013	“Angeny ngiriny mwilatya shia yeyo shisiise, kimmba ngiri nshilandari na shia iifo itiri mwaanya nniini ni yeyo ishemufitaa uretiny na yewo vailatya vakava veengyi.
40007014	Mashika ngiri ii-fo ikee shisiise na shia iifo nshisiise yeyo imufitaa muuny, na yewo vailatya vakava vaangu.”
40007015	“Kwiiseny na veawuya fisuku va wongo, mashika wo mmbo vafika kwany varee masara a moonri na efo kimmba vakava mafite eerutwarutwa.
40007016	Ndunda tawo vavikaa nto tishevaparaa sengye muvamanyi nato. A ndesa vandu vayaya ndunda ta misabibu efo miingeny ao marwaa efo nrwen?
40007017	Niindi kikai; wo nri nsha mmbo uvikaa ndunda shisha na nri nkasha ukavika ndunda shikasha.
40007018	Nta nkwiifo nri nsha ushiidimaa ivika ndunda shikasha-fo, nta nri nkasha ushiidimaa ivika ndunda shisha-fo.
40007019	Na wo nri ulavikaa ndunda shisha mmbo ushemanywaa na yeerwa murony.
40007020	Naasany ni ndunda tawo vavikaany nto tishevaparaa sengye muvamanyi nato.”
40007021	“Nshi wo nndu ashivia, ‘Woi Nndumi, Woi Nndumi!’ Ashekooya yaanga yefo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu-fo, kulaore ni yeto atannyi efyo fikundyo ni Nde yeto wakwa wa efo iruveeu.”
40007022	Nkonu yeto ukamfika, vengyi vasheshiviaa, “Woi Nndumi! Woi Nndumi! A nshi lweefo lweshaauyaa fisuku na irina lyafo? A nshi lweefo lweshaanta mimuyo mikasha na irina lyafo? A nshi lweefo lwetanaa fya wiidimi fiingyi na irina lyafo?”
40007023	Llyo nshevaviaa paa, “Yeni nshimwiishi-fo. Kwiipony yaa shikai yeni vetana fya kiila!”
40007024	“Kyasiany wo nndu mwiirannya marero yoo akwa na yaatana kaatana mmbo ashevaa sha nndu nnrango aletana mmba yakwe kaiveiya ando a iweny.
40007025	Nalyo mmbwa ikakapa na mifu ikasoka na ngyuraato tikadina, tikakapa mmba ilya, nayo ilawunduke. Mashika uvasha lwavayo lukee uveiye iweny.
40007026	Na wo nndu mwiirannya marero yoo akwa kara nalaatana mmbo ashevaa sha nndu itondo aletana mmba yakwe, kaiveiya nsangeny.
40007027	Nalyo mmbwa ikakapa, na mifu ikasoka, na ngyuraato tikadina tikakapa mmba ilya, nayo ikawunduka. Na mmbundukye wa vayo ikawa pu.”
40007028	Naasa kikava elyi Yesu ammanda irera marero yoo, nkuka ulya wa vandu vekuumbye-u vakeesing'ang'a kya ufundo lwakwe.
40007029	Nyeelyi aleva mwiifunda sha nndu atiri ushilyi nalaloshe sha velosha valya vawo va mavavaso.
40008001	Naasa elyi eefo asholookaa auka kulya ifumbu-u vandu vakallatya matorito meengyi.
40008002	Nalyo kasha nang'u nndu alwee ivave kamoolokya ng'undeny kaamba, “Woi Nndumi kwankunda kushiidimaa isheeremuta.”
40008003	Yesu kaorwa woko kampaana kaamba, “Shankunda, eremukany.” Nalyo yeni keeremuka ivave lyilya lyentiri.
40008004	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Nta kulavie nndu! Mmbo kusheenda kundekoora efo kwa nkohani, kundevika kyaanu kwa Iruva kilya Mose avavasye, kive nkyo ukureeki kwawo.”
40008005	Kikasia, elyi afika kulya Kapernaumu, kasheywa ni nshilyi wa vasikari iyana, kamooshora,
40008006	kammbia, “Woi Nndumi shitiri ishinga lyakwa lyilele kyeny lyikee yuumu malungo, lyiifo lyivavywaa kyuumu.”
40008007	Nawe kammbia, “Nsheendaa shindenkira.”
40008008	Nshilyi ulya wa vasikari iyana kaallwa kammbia, “Woi Nndumi yeny nshimaa kutani kwafika efo si ya kai ka mmba-kwa-fo. Ammba irero lyimwi nsi na ishinga lyakwa lyisheshiaa.
40008009	Shamashika neeny mmbo shikee kwasi ya ushilyi lwa vengyi shivetiri na vasikari vakwa, neeny ni nniini waawo; naasa shavia eto umwi, ‘Enda’, mmbo asheenda, shavia eto ungyi, ‘Osho’ nawe mmbo aveshaa. Shavia ishinga elyo lyakwa, ‘Tana kindo kive! Lyikavekitana.’ “
40008010	Naasa Yesu ekiita indo kikantamba kavia valya veeiyo vevandami nawe, “Ni kya dede shamuvia, nta kunu Israeli nshindelollye kikusiryo king'ani indo-fo.”
40008011	Na yeny shamuvia, “Kusheshaa vandu vengyi wooka taari ya ngama na ya nkwaany vashelya shoonga vasasangyi na Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo efo umangyi ny lwa Iruva.
40008012	Na veni umangyi wo vandeerwa poo efo kuwoye ireema na ikwaalala na irafunnya mayoo.”
40008013	Naasa Yesu kavia nshilyi ulya wa vasikari iyana, “Kweenngye! Kivekuviiya indo shaasa kukusirye-u!” " Nalyo ishinga lilya lyakwe lyikashia kyeeri kilya kyeni.
40008014	Nalyo Yesu kandefika kulya kyeny kwa Petro kalollya maye-a-nka alele kitareny elwee iseng'u.
40008015	Nawe kampaana woko, iseng'u lyilya lyikammbuka. Kakwiipoo kapooka infurukannya.
40008016	Na elyi kwammiila vakamweenngye vandu vengyi vellyiswa ukiva mmimuyo mikasha. Nawe kaanta mimuyo ilya mikasha eshaambaa kirero kyeni. Na valya veeiyo valwee kavakira woose;
40008017	Naambo kirero kilya kindekooya iinukya shaasa kilererwa ni nkisuku ulya Isaya kikaamba, " “Mmbwe aleipoo ngyunana teru neekurika ndwari teru.”
40008018	Naasa Yesu ekilollya nsemu wa vandu vansha ikummbya-fo vakanndingitya nawe kavavasya vanderuuka mbai ilya ingyi.
40008019	Nalyo mwaarya wa fitabu umwi kamweengya kammbia, “Llori shikundye ikulatya wo ando koose kusheenda.”
40008020	Na Yesu kammbia, “Maparwe mmbo atiri mbanga ta vayo na ndeye ta nginiiu tikavetira fifuri fya vayo. Indi mwana yeto wa nndu nnatiri ando asheekeryaa nrwe wakwe-fo.”
40008021	Na ungyi akee nnang'ani ya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe kasha kammbia, “Nndumi shiniinga mumu mbele shikweengye inderika nde wakwa.”
40008022	Indi Yesu kammbia, “Shilatya, kureeye vafu varike vafo vawo.”
40008023	Naasa Yesu kasaama ngalaveny valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakasaamafo nawe.
40008024	Naasa elyi veefo kukasha uraato uniini. Ngalava ilya ikatana yasikywa ni matundulu. Nawe eelele rony.
40008025	Vakanserikya vakamwaanta vakammbia, “Woi Nndumi lwaauwe lwiifo lusiaa.”
40008026	Nawe kavavia, “A nkikyi elyi mweereiye indo? Mmbo mukee va kikusiryo kyaangu nnu.” Nalyo kasalala kakyeemmya uraato lulya na yeeve ilya kukava kimammya sau.
40008027	Naasa vandu valya vakatambiswa vakaamba, “A nndu yeu ni wa kwi, kutani uraato lwamwiirikya na yeeve yeyo!”
40008028	Naasa ekifika kwakulya ya uruka lwa Vagerasi kakwaanannya-fo na vandu vavii vatirwa mmimuyo mikasha vauka fifuny vakee vanyaasi nnu, nta nndu nalaidimi iira shia ilya.
40008029	Nawo akakawo vakoongora vakaamba, “Yewe mwana wa Iruva nkyikyi lutiri na yewe? A mmbo kulesha kunu kushelusisya kulaore kyeeri kyeru kyamfika?”
40008030	Naasa kwaasha na yoo ando vekai kweifo ironda lya nguve lyishiiswa-fo.
40008031	Nalyo mimuyo ilya mikasha ikantereva ikaamba, “Kwakooya kwalwaanta lurumi lundeanga irondeny lya nguve yeto.”
40008032	Nawe kaivia, “Kweenngye!” Nato akakato tikapufuka-fo tikandekweera efo waangeu. Tikasiiya efo yeeveny tikafiiya efo mureny.
40008033	Naasa veesi valya vakarisha vakatana vafika kulya muriny. Vakandeongoya-fo mbony tilya toose na ta vandu valya vatirwa mmimuyo mikasha.
40008034	Nalyo akakava vandu va kulya muriny vakakuruka-fo woose vakasha ikwaananya na Yesu. Vekillolya vakantereva naambo nauke efo myuungony yaawo.
40009001	Nalyo kasaama neefo ngalaveny karuuka yeeve ilya katana afika kulya muriny kwakwe muni.
40009002	Nalyo akakau nndu akee kitongororo malungo vakamweende eeriwa na kitara. Na Yesu kalollya kikusiryo kyawo, kavia nndu ulya muumu malungo, “Wuiyo mmuu mwana-kwa, kwambutwa ulyamari lwafo!”
40009003	Nalyo akakava velosha mavavaso vaiyoo maata verera efo nriminy wawo veshaambaa, “Yeu mmbo anruma Iruva.”
40009004	Yesu kamanya makusaro awo kaamba, “Naambo ki elyi mwakusara ukasha efo miriminy yaany?
40009005	A kyaangu yaamba-u nkingakyi? Ndesa ni yaamba, ‘Kwambutwa ulyamari lwafo ao ni yaamba, kwiipo kweenda?’
40009006	Manyiny-te Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo atiri ushilyi kunu urukeny lwa yuuta vandu ulyamari, naasa kavia kitongororo kilya, ‘Salala ipoo kitara kyafo kukweengye kyeny.’ “ "
40009007	Nawe kakwiipo kakweengya kyeny.
40009008	Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu vekilollya kive indo, vakatirwa mbwerei, vakaitikisa Iruva elyi aniinga vandu ushilyi uniini indo.
40009009	Nalyo Yesu eshiraa kulya kalollya nndu akee rembo efo mmba yeededemya avaangwa ni Matayo, kammbia, " “Shilatya!” " Nawe kakwiipoo kallatya.
40009010	Kikava elyi eefoo alyaa shoonga efo mmba kwa Matayo vakasha vadedemi vengyi na valyamari vakasha nau vakalya shoonga ando amwi na Yesu na yewo vakiloshyony kyakwe.
40009011	Na Vafarisayo vekilolya indo vakavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe, " “A kyavaany inda elyi llosha waany alya shoonga ando amwi na vadedemi na valyamari?”
40009012	Nawe ekiita indo kavavia, “Nshi yewo vakee vesha vatiri isiiyo mwaanga-fo; indi ni yewo valwee.
40009013	Kweenngye mukandekulosha kilya kikee kirere kyeyaamba, ‘Kishisenyi ni ilyillya vandu nta nshi irasyo-fo.’ Shamashika vandu shisheye ivavaanga nshi yewo va usumanu-fo ni yewo valyamari.”
40009014	Nalyo valya vakiloshyony kya Yohane vakansheya vakaamba, “Yese lwava vekootoya na Mafarisayo kiwo, na yewo vakiloshyony kyafo valakootoye. A kimaruma nkyoki ndesa?”
40009015	Na Yesu kavavia, “A vandu va walyi vashidimaa inda ikapa kiiyo meendi muni walyi asindi nawo? Indi ikaa ishe mikonu vashesokwa muni walyi; llyony vashekootoyaa.
40009016	Nta nkwiifoo nndu afumyaa soori shikuu kirami kiiya-fo, mashika yekyo kiveiyo-u mmbo kyawuya yuuka-u na yoo kurandukye kwengere ing'ana.
40009017	Nta mmbasurumaa mfinyo mwiiya efo mbolokony shikuu-fo, Kwakooya mmbo kyava indo mboloko yeto mmbo tiriikaa, na mfinyo upusuke. Indi mfinyo yeto mwiiya mmbo wasurumwa mbolokony shiiya nafyo fi fivii fikaa nisha.”
40009018	Naasa eefo ereraa indo nndu nshilyi umwi kasha nau kamoolokya ng'undeny eshaambaa, “Shitiri mwana wakwa wa kyeny amfwa ulaalu indi. Indi woi mbee osho kundemwekerya woko llyo ashewuiyoo m muu.”
40009019	Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo kaenda aryani nawe na vakiloshyony kyakwe.
40009020	Nalyo nndu nka alwee ndwari ya kyika ando a myaaka ikumi na ivii kasha numa yakwe kapaana ikedu lya soori yakwe ya uwe.
40009021	Nawe mmbo arera efo nriminy wakwe, “Naakwa shapaana soori yakwe sheni nshekushiiyaa.”
40009022	Nalyo Yesu kainduka kallollya kammbia, “Wuiyo mmuu mwana-kwa, kwammekusirya-u indo, nkyo kyakukira.” Nka ulya kashia llya yeni.
40009023	Naasa kafika kulya kyeny kwa nshilyi ulya. Kakooya-fo vekapa fivale na vandu vengyi nkuka vakuumbye-fo vekapaa kyoorongye.
40009024	Nawe kavavia, “Kwiipony-fo mwana yeto nshi afwa-fo mmbo alele rony.” " Vakanseka.
40009025	Naasa vandu valya vekuumbye-fo vekimaa yaantwa-fo, nawe kaanga neefo mmba kantira woko; kimwana kilya kikakwiipoo.
40009026	Naasa mbony tilya tikakwaana kulya urukeny koose.
40009027	Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo keenda na mbee. Naasa vandu vafu miso vavii vakallatya numa vakaonisa unyanga veshaambaa, " “Woi mwana wa Davidi lusarye ukiva lweru!”
40009028	Naasa elyi ammaa ifika-u kaira na efo mmba. Na vafu miso vakansheya; nalyo Yesu kavavia, “A mukusirye-u sheelyi nshiidimaa itana kindo ekyi?” Vakammbia; “Ee-da Nndumi.”
40009029	Nalyo kavapaana miso alya awo eshaambaa, “Kivemuviiyany indo, shaasa mukusirye-u.”
40009030	Naasa miso alya awo akatarambuka. Nalyo Yesu kavavia na finya kaamba, “Manyiny kulave nndu akimanya.” "
40009031	Nawo vakakwiipoo-fo vakandekwaanisa mbony yeto efo urukeny koose.
40009032	Naasa elyi wo veefo vesheendaa vakasha vandu vakamweenngye nndu akee mbimbi atirwa mmumuyo nkasha.
40009033	Mumuyo ulya nkasha ukaantwa nalyo mbimbi ilya ikawuya irera na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakasongololo vakaamba, " “Nkundeonike nndu kunu Israeli akee shawe-fo.”
40009034	Naasa Vafarisayo vakaamba, “Ni ngaya ya yeto nniini wa mimuyo mikasha nnyo aanta nayo mimuyo mikasha-te.”
40009035	Na Yesu kasengetya miri yeyo miniini na yeyo midu myoose eeloshaa efo mmba tawo teeterevya na yoongoya vandu nrumi ya nsia yeyo ya umangyi na ishiisa vandu ndwari ya wo ngata na unana lwa wo ngata.
40009036	Na elyi alollye ironda iniini lya vandu vakuumbye-fo kavavyo mmuu kyawo mashika vakee vakapekape mariinga vakee veere efo vavakye mburu tilatiri mwiisi.
40009037	Nalyo kavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe. “Fya yuulula mfiingyi fiifo, lyo veerundya-u vakaangwa.
40009038	Naasa tereveny yeto muni irema narumi varundi efo mailullyony akwe.”
40010001	Nalyo kavaanga vakyiloshony kyakwe ikumi na vavii, kavaniinga ushilyi lwayiitorya mimuyo mikasha naambo vayaante, na ishiisa ndwari ta wo ngata na unana lwa wo ngata.
40010002	Na marina a vakyiloshony kyakwe ikumi na vavii akee ule, Wa mbee ni Simion avaangwa Petro, na Andrea akee mwanamaye. Yakobo akee mwana wa Sebedayo, na Yohane akee mwanamaye,
40010003	Filipo, Bartolomayo, Toma na Matayo yeto akee nndedemi, Yakobo akee mwana wa Alfayo na Tadayo,
40010004	Simion akee wa yewo vakaari iringa ngata ya Kiyuda, na Yuda Iskariote yeto alenndiingya.
40010005	Yewo ikumi na vavii Yesu mmbo alevaruma kavavavasa ashaambaa, “Nta mulaire shia ya vandu va masanga. Nta muri wa Vasamaria mulaange nafo-fo.
40010006	Enderuuyeny vandu va Israeli yewo varekye sha moonri.
40010007	Na elyi murie shia endeny mwiikapaa weele mwaambe, ‘Umangyi lwa iruveeu lwamaafukya.’
40010008	Yewo valwee vashiiseny yewo vafu varuteny, yewo va ivave veremuteny, mimuyo yeyo mikasha yaanteny; mwankiniingwa kya ruu, kevekiniingyeny-fo ruu.
40010009	Muleepoo saabu nta fesa nta ukova lwa iiniva kisiny;
40010010	nta mulakamare mboloko ya shia nta soori ivii, nta nsengye. Nndu nndundi mmbo asumani iniingwa shoonga yakwe.
40010011	Na kwakooya mushaangaa muriny wa vandu ukava nniini ao ni n-du lolen-fo warya nndu eefo asumani mfo kundo mushekaa kutani mwakwiipoo-fo.
40010012	Na elyi mushaangaa efo mmba iidikireny.
40010013	Kwakooya ni mmba isumannyi kiidikiro ekyo kyany nakyo mmbo kisheikayaa, na kwakooya kulaore isumannyi kiidikiro ekyo kyany, mmbo kishemuwuiyaa.
40010014	Na kwakooya nndu ara nalamuwarya, nta yaaranya marero any, somukeny efo mmba yeyo, naakwa ni efo muriny yeto mwiikakapaa kiluulyi efo marendeny.
40010015	Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Ekyo kya uruka lwa Sodoma na Gomora kishangwaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu ngota kya muri yeto.’ “
40010016	“Llen-te mmbo shamuruma mukee sha moonri akee nnang'ani ya fite fya ngoroshony. Veny sha shoka tikee shirango, muveva sha mbeta tilashevikaa ntambo.
40010017	Na yeni kwiiseny na vandu. Mmbo vashemurambikyaa efo ikwaanuny lya masiingo, na efo mmba tawo teeterevya vavemukapa na ngova.
40010018	Naakwa ni efo usanguny lwa vashilyi vaniini na vamangyi musherawaa-fo kimaruma kyakwa kive nkyo ukureeki lwa efo kwawo na kwa vandu va masanga.
40010019	Na kyeeri vamurambikya-fo nta mulasaukwa kindo mushaambaau. Mashika kyeeri ekyo kyeni mmbo musheniingwaa kya yaamba-u.
40010020	Mashika veerera-u nshi yeni-fo ni Mumuyo wa Nde waany, mmbwe areraa-u akee efo miriminy yaany.
40010021	Kya indi mwanamaye wa nndu akaa nanderambikya-fo mwanamaye nandewaawa, na ndeye wa nndu nanderambikya-fo mwana. Na vana wa nndu vakwiipoo kya isua vamiku vawo vandevarambikya-fo vandewaawa.
40010022	Na yeni mushevaa veesuwa mmbandu woose kimaruma kya irina lyakwa. Indi yeto asisirya-u kafika mafurummyony, mmbwe akirwaa.
40010023	Naasa kwakooya vashemurishisaa vamwaante muriny mmbe, enderishyeny ungyi. Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Nta mmushekwanisaa miri yeyo ya kunu Israeli-fo, kulaore Mwana yeto wa nndu ansha.’
40010024	Na nndu wa kiloshyony nta nnairye llosha wakwe-fo, nta nndu kishinga nnairye nndumi wakwe-fo.
40010025	Mmbo kimaa nndu wakiloshyony kwakooya ava sha llosha wakwe; na nndu kishinga kaveva sha nndumi wakwe. Vantana vambaanga yeto muni kyeny Belsebuli afikaany kya va kyeny kwakwe nshi kishiiryaa kilanya?”
40010026	“Naasa nta mulavairyae-fo shamashika nkwiifo kindo kikee kisikye kire kilalollyo-fo. Nta kindo kiifo kisurumi kire kilamanyika-fo.
40010027	Ekyo shamuviiya ireemeny endekyaambeny efo seny. Na ekyo mwamiita muvereryo kuriny endekyaambeny musaamye mmbeeu.
40010028	Na yewo vewaa mwiili yeto wa nndu nta valashiidimaa iwaa nrima yeto nta mulavairyae! Kilanya mmbo mushiiryaa yeto aidima ireta nrima na mwiili fi fivii firekye yefo murony wa Gehena.
40010029	A ngyuruu ivii nshi tikumbwaa senti imwi? Nta lumwi lwa vayo lluwaa si kulaore Nde yeto waany aishi-fo.
40010030	Na yeni naakwa ni fii ta efo nrweny wany mmbo tikee sheekeni toose.
40010031	Naasany nta mulairyee! Mmbo mwiirye ngyuruu na tikava shiingyi.”
40010032	“Naasa wo nndu ankureekaa-u kyakwa efo fisanguny fya vandu, neeny nshevekureekaa-u kyakwe efo kisanguny kya Nde wakwa wa efo iruveeu.
40010033	Na wo nndu ashikana efo fisanguny fya vandu neeny nshevenkanaa efo kisanguny kya Nde wakwa wa efo iruveeu.”
40010034	“Nta mulakusare mmbo shisheye yeende ufoo kunu urukeny. Kindo shisheye yeende nshi ufoo-fo ni usu.
40010035	Mmbo shisheye ilakanisa nndu na mwana na mwana wa kyika na maye, na mwalyi na mammi wakwe.
40010036	Na yewo va kyeny kwa nndu vaveva mmbo vakiduva vakwe.
40010037	Na yeto mwiikunda ndeye ao maye ngota yen, we nshi nndu ashisumannyi-fo. Na yeto mwiikunda mwana wakwe wa womi ao wa kyika ngota yeny, we nshi nndu ashisumannyi-fo.
40010038	Na yeto nalakurika nsalaba wakwe neeshilatya, we nshi nndu ashisumannyi-fo.
40010039	Yeto mwiikuwonisya muu wakwe mmbo asheuretaa. Na yeto mwiikuretya muu wakwe kikava ni kimaruma kyakwa mmbo asheuonisaa.”
40010040	“Na yeto amuwarya efo kyeny kwakwe ni yeny ashiwarya. Na yeto ashiwarya yeny mmbo awarya yeto aleshiruma.
40010041	Na yeto awarya nndu nkisuku aishi ni nndu nkisuku, mmbo aniingwaa waavi lwa nndu nkisuku. Na yeto awarya nndu nsumanu aishi ni nndu nsumanu mmbo aniingwaa waavi lwa nndu nsumanu.
40010042	Na vandu yewo vafwafwa naakwa ni yeto umwi nsi nndu kanrita mura mweni na aishi mmbo akee wakiloshyony kyakwa, shamuvia kya dede waavi lwakwe llukaa lureke-fo.”
40011001	Naasa Yesu ekimaa ivavasya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe ikumi na vavii, kakwiipoo kulya vakai nandelosha vandu na iwoongoya mbony efo miriny yaawo.
40011002	Naasa elyi Yohane akee kulya kifinngyony kashevio mbony ta mashora Kristo aifo arundaa, naasa kanrummya nrumi karika vakiloshyony kyakwe vavii.
40011003	Kandemmbia, “A yewe mmbwe ulya avereyo nashe ao lukavereya ungyi ndesa?”
40011004	Na Yesu karouwa kavavia, “Kweenngye mundevia Yohane kindo mwamiita na ikilolya.
40011005	Vandu vafu miso veefo valolaa, na vandu vakee miketekete veefo vasheendaa, na va ivave veefo vasheeremukaa, na vandu vafu maarwi veefo vashiitaa; na vandu vafu veefo varutwaa, na vandu vakiva veefo vashoongoywaa nrumi ya Iruva ya nsia.
40011006	Na ngoma nndu nalautau nsindara yaa kwakwa.”
40011007	Naasa elyi vandu valya varie shia yeewuya, Yesu kapooka irera na vandu valya vakuummbye-u kavavia kya Yohane kaamba, “A kimaruma mukakwiipoo kyeny mukandefika kulya kasa nkyoki? A ndesa ni indelola ikongye lyivivitwa-vivitwaa ni uraato?
40011008	A kindo kilemuuta kikammufita-fo nkyokyi? A ndesa ni indelola nndu aree soori shisha! Vandu varee findo fisha ekawo vakee efo mmba ta kimangyi.
40011009	A kilemuuta kulya kyeny kikammufita-fo nkyokyi? A ndesa ni indelola nndu mwaauya fisuku? Ee-da na yeny shamuvia mmbo aveng'ani kailanya nndu nkisuku.
40011010	We mmbwe ulya akee mwaambe efo mareiyony meele kaambawa, ‘Akau nrumi wakwa shanruma nakwiirye mbee, nandekusongoya shia yafo.’
40011011	Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Nnang'ani ya vandu woose valembonika kulandekwiipoo-fo nndu ang'annyi Yohane Mbatisi-fo. Indi efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu, nndu aifo akee n-du ya vengyi mmbo amwiirye.
40011012	Na kipookya fyeeri efyo fya Yohane Mmbatisi fika ulaalu, umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lwatirwa na finya, na vandu vaafinya vakava velurakwa-u.
40011013	Kimmba veawuya fisuku woose sanda na uvavaso, mmbo valeva veamba fisuku kumande Yohane.
40011014	Na mukakunda iirikya we mmbwe Elia ulya akee nteerye nashe.
40011015	Nndu atiri maarwi a yaaranya navearannya!’
40011016	A irika elyi lya vandu yeva shilyiinanise neekyi? Mmbo lyifwanani na vana vadu vakaa ando a singira vakavaangana na wooroyaawo.
40011017	Vakaamba, ‘A elyi lwamukapya fivale neeni mulafini? A elyi lwakapa kiiyo neeni mulakape mbafu?’
40011018	Yohane mmbo alesha nafo nalakee nndu mwiilyaa nta mwiina, nawo vakaamba, ‘Mmbo atirwa mmumuyo nkasha.’
40011019	Mwana yeto wa nndu kasha nafo akee mwiilyaa na mwiina vakauya yaamba, ‘Akakau makilya na makina mfinyo, kaveva na mbuya ya vadedemi na valyamari,’ kikava waarya lwa Iruva mmbo lukooya ivinga, kyuuka na efo mashoreny a vayo.”
40011020	Naasa kapooka isakira miri ilya kundo kuleutikya mashora akwe a wiidimi meengyi, na vandu nta valaute-u yaalashika efo miriminy.
40011021	Kaamba, “Oshiny lwafo yewe Betisaida! Mashika kulya Tiro na Sidoni, kwee mmbo kuleutikya mashora a wiidimi sha alya aleutikya efo kwany, kwee valemaalashika efo miriminy kasha na iraa masara a ukiva na ikoollya ifu,
40011022	Indi shamuvia, ‘Ekyo kya Tiro na Sidoni mmbo kishangwaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu ngota yekyo kyany.’
40011023	Na yewe Kapernaumu kuleroswa kwatana kwakooya iruveeu, mmbo kushoolotwaa kufike ando a vafu! Mashika kulya Sodoma kukooye mmbo kuleutika-fo mashora a wiidimi sha alya aleutika kwafo, mmbo verewaa-u vafike nkonu wa inu.
40011024	Indi shamuvia, ‘Nalyo ekyo kya Sodoma mmbo kishangwaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu ngota ekyo kyafo.’ “
40011025	Naasa kyeeri yekyo kyeni Yesu kaalwa kaamba, “Shakwaarafuma paa woi Nde kukee Nndumi wa efo iruveeu na wa masanga, kimmba mbony yeti kwatisuruma vandu vaarya-reu, na yewo varango, kwawuya itirambuya vakoku.
40011026	Ee-da Nde, ni indo kilevekusenya.
40011027	Mmbo shilerambikywa findo fyoose ni Nde-yaakwa. Nta nkwiifo nndu aishi Mwana-fo kulaore ni Nde. Nta nndu aishi nde-fo, kulaore ni Mwana, na nndu yeto Mwana ankunda inrambuya.
40011028	Kusheyeny na kwakwa yeni moose mwivinaa, mukee varovye mmario, na yeny nshemwiimurisaa!
40011029	Endeny raare neeny mukufunde kwakwa, shamashika shikee mfoo shavekunyiisa na nrima, llyoo-ny musheonisyaa mirima yaanga kiimuyo.
40011030	Mashika raare yakwa ikee shisha na irio lyakwa likava yaangu.”
40012001	Kyeeri kilya Yesu kaira mareminy a nganu elyi lya nkonu wa Sabato. Valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakalyiwa nshaa, vakapooka yuurushwa fyaa fya nganu vakasisasisa vakalya.
40012002	Naasa Vafarisayo vekilolya vakaamba, “Lla-te vakiloshyony kyafo mmbo vatana kindo kilatiri mumu weetana nkonu wa Sabato.”
40012003	Nawe kavavia, “A mmbo mulandesomi shaasa Davidi aletana kyeeri eetirwa nshaa we na valya eeryani nawo?
40012004	Shaasa aleanga na efo mmba ya Iruva vakalya mikate ilya ya kideesyo, nayo nta we nta wooroye valeetiri mumu weelya, kulaore ni Vakohani veni?
40012005	A ndesa mmbo mulandesomi efo mavavasony kya vakohani yewo elyi nkonu wa Sabato mmbo vaimbwa Sabato nta valatiri uvingo.
40012006	Na yeny shamuvia, ‘Ekyi kyikee yaa mmbo king'annyi mmba ya Iruva!’
40012007	Na kilya kikee kirere kyeamba, ‘Kishisenyi ni ilyillya vandu, nshi irasyo-fo, kwee mwenkimanya shaasa kikai, nta mmweekundaa idenga vandu yeva valatiri uvingo-fo.’
40012008	Shamashika Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo akee Nndumi wa Sabato.”
40012009	Nalyo kakwiipoo alya vakai kafika efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya.
40012010	Nalyo akakau nndu aifo atiri woko lukee kitongororo. Nawe vakammbesa vakaamba, “Kwiifo mumu-ro weeshiisa nndu nkonu wa Sabato?” Nyeeli vasia kyeenkumba.
40012011	Nawe kavavia, “A mmbo kwiifo nndu kunu kwany atiri mburu yakwe imwi nsi kakooya yamooloka kiroriny elyi nkonu wa Sabato, kara nalayuuta-fo?
40012012	A nndu nshi we ailannyi mburu deny? Naasa mmbo kuveefo mumu-da weetanya vandu mesha nkonu wa Sabato.”
40012013	Nalyo kavia nndu ulya, “Orwa woko lwafo!” Nawe kaorwa. Lukawuya iva usha sha yelo lungyi.
40012014	Na Vafarisayo vakasomuka vakandenruvya shila vasie mwaanya wa immamita.
40012015	Naasa Yesu kamanya kakwiipo-fo.
40012016	Vandu vakallatya veengyi nawe kavashiisa woose kavavia nta mulasheevia nndu.
40012017	Na kimaruma kikeenda indo ni kilya kilererwa ni nkisuku ulya Yesaya kyeamba,
40012018	“Akakau nndundi wakwa shilensauwa, mmbwe nkunde wakwa ashisetye nriminy, neeny nshemmbikya Mumuyo wakwa nankaye. Nawe ashoongoyaa vandu va masanga ngaa ya songosiny.
40012019	Nawe nta nalashaandwa myaandu nta nalashekoomaa. Na unyanga lwakwe nta lulashiitiwa efo shia.
40012020	Na irere lyikee ibobore nta nnyashelyifishaa-fo, na uruu lufumbyaa nsu nta nnyashelurumyaa-fo. Mmbo ashekapannyaa efyo fya usumanu fivinge.
40012021	Na irina lyakwe llyo vandu va masanga vashelyivikaa nsia.”
40012022	Nalyo keengyo nndu atirwa mmumuyo nkasha, avekee mfu miso, kaveva mbimbi. Nawe kankira. Nndu ulya mbimbi kawuya irera na ilola.
40012023	Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-u mamwiingyi vakaising'ang'a. “A ndesa yeu mmbwe mwana ulya wa Davidi?”
40012024	Na Vafarisayo vekiita kiirerwa indo vakaamba, “Yeto nta nnyaanta mimuyo mikasha kulaore ni elyi aekywa ni Belsebuli yeto akee nniini wa mimuyo mikasha-fo.”
40012025	Nawe kamanya makusaro alya awo kavavia, “Wo umangyi lwiifo lukaraukana lukakukapa weni mmbo luwaa. Na wo muri wa vandu wiiyo naakwa ni mmba ikaraukana ikakukapa sheni nnyikaaufo.
40012026	Na kwakooya satana ashaantaa satana urooye, mmbo araukana kakukapa muni. Naasa umangyi lwakwe mmbo lushidimaa ikaa-u inda?
40012027	Na kwakooya yeny mmbo shaanta mimuyo mikasha sheekywa ni Belsebuli, a vana yewo vany wo mmbo vaanta vaekywa mmbiny? Kimmba ni indo mmbo vashemuutyaa uvingo.
40012028	Indi kwakooya shaanta mimuyo mikasha sheekywa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva, akakakyo mwammaafukywa ni umangyi lwa Iruva-te!”
40012029	“Ao ni inda nndu ashiidimaa yaanga efo mmba kwa mwaafinya nandekamara-fo fiiya fyakwe, kwakooya kulaore ampooka ifinga mbele mwaafinya ulya? Llyony ashekamaraa fya efo mmba kakwe nafimaa-fo.
40012030	Nndu nalakee wa kyaalu kyakwa mmbo akee nkiduva wakwa. Na yeto nalasheekyaa isanyirya mmbo anyanyataa.
40012031	Kimmba ni indo shamuvia, ‘Kya wo ulyamari lwa nndu na kya wo kyaararo kya nndu mmbo asheonaa ifwaaywa. Indi kya kyaararo kya yaarara Mumuyo Mweele, kyeekyo nnaonaa ifwaayo-fo.’
40012032	Kwakooya nndu arera kya imina Mwana yeto wa Nndu asheona ifwaaywa. Indi kwakooya nndu arera kya imina Mumuyo Mweele, ekyo kyo nnaonaa ifwaayo-fo, nta meendi a ulana yelu nta yelo lwiishaa-fo.”
40012033	“Allweny nri uve nsha na ndunda ta vayo tiveshia. Ao allweny nri uve nkasha na ndunda ta vayo shikasha.
40012034	Yeni ufyari lwa shoka a ni inda mushiidimaa irera kisha mummbe vakasha? Mashika efyo fiishwe efo nriminy mfyo kana kafirera.
40012035	Na nndu yeto nsha efyo fisha asurumyi kaveva mwiiutya vandu fisha.
40012036	Indi shamuviany Wo kirero kya ngula vandu varera mmbo vashekireellywaa nkonu yeto wa mwaandu.
40012037	Shamashika marero afo nng'u kusherumbuywaa nang'u kwiivingaa, na marero afo-se kusherumbuywaa nang'u kwiivingwaa.”
40012038	Nalyo velosha va mavavaso vaiyo maata na Vafarisayo vakaallwa vakaamba, “Llosha, mmbo lukunndye lulollye wende kwafo!”
40012039	Nawe kavavia, “Irika elyi yeesi llyiraiye utuusi mmbo lyilanngye lyoorwa wende. Nta llyikaa lyiniingwa wende-fo, kuuta ni wende lwa nkisuku Yona.
40012040	Mashika shaasa Yona alekaa efo ndewuny ya ikunga lyilya iniini kamaa-fo mikonu iraru kio na nsanyiny Mwana yeto wa nndu ni kiwo-da ashevekaa efo si namae-fo mikonu iraru kio na nsanyiny.
40012041	Vasero va kulya Ninive mmbo vashekwiipoo vasalale-u nkonu yeto wa mwaandu amwi na irika elyi valyuutye uvingo, mashika wo valekurya llya valeongoywa mbony ni Yona.
40012042	Mangyi ilya ya kyika ya kulya taari ya sinde mmbo ashekwiipoo nkonu yeto wa mwaandu nasalale amwi na irika elyi nalyuutye uvingo. Shamashika, we alesha auka kishingony kya masanga nandearanya ufundo lwa Solomoni. Na ekyi kyikee yaa akakyi nkiniini kikailanya Solomoni.”
40012043	“Na Mumuyo yeto nkasha kwakooya vansomuka nnduny, mmbo uraaraa kundo kulatiri mura wiisyaa ando a iimuya ulaoni.
40012044	Nalyo ukaamba, ‘A shindewuya na mmba ilya kundo shilesomuka.’ Ukasha nang'u ukakooya ilelwa ikee shaaiye na ishopwa.
40012045	Nalyo ukaenda ukandeende mimuyo ingyi mikasha mfungare ikee myeesi ngota to mweni. Ukasha uryani nayo, nayo ikaanga nafo ikaallwafo kwekaa na mbony teefurumya ta nndu ulya tikakashaa ngota tilya ta mbee. Na kya irika elyi yeesi ni indo-da ekyo kya vayo ni indo kisheendaa.”
40012046	Naasa eefo areraa indo na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo nkuka, akakava maye na vanavamaye vansha nau vasalali yoo poo vakunndye irera nawe.
40012047	Naasa nndu umwi kammbia, “Akakawo mau na vanavamau vasalali yoo poo vakunndye irera neewe.”
40012048	Nawe kaalwa kavia ulya ammbia, “A ma ni vi? Na vanavama?”
40012049	Kooroya vakiloshyony kyakwe woko, kaamba, “Yeva mmbo ma na vanavama.
40012050	Mashika wo nndu atana efyo fisennyi Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu, yeto mmbwe ava mwanama na mfwama na ma.”
40013001	Naasa nkonu ulya mweni Yesu kasomuka efo mmba kandekaa rembo alya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya.
40013002	Na alya akai nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu ukandekuumbya-u. Nawe katana asaama na efo, ngalaveny kandekaa-fo rembo. Na nsemu ulya wa vandu ukuumbye-u ukasalala yoo waambeu.
40013003	Nawe kavavia mbony shiingyi asheera fyaaso kaamba, “Akau nndu mweera mbeu alekwiipoo kandeera mbeu takwe.
40013004	Nalyo eefo asheeraa tilya maata tikooloka yoo mbai ya shia. Na ndeye tikasha tikalya tikamaa.
40013005	Na tilya tingyi; tikooloka ando iwe lyikwaalye si, alatiri uteri wiingyi. Tikamya na kyaangu, neelyi tilatiri uteri lufikye si.
40013006	Indi elyi mwi ulevaa tikaya tikanaa, neelyi tilasotye miraarii si tikauma.
40013007	Na tilya tingyi tikooloka ando a miingeny. Miinga ilya ikarwa, ikatisisira,
40013008	tingyi tikooloka ando a uteri usha, tikaraaka fimu. Kimwi kikavika iyana, na tingyi makumi arindaru, na kingyi makumi araru.
40013009	Na nndu atiri maarwi earannya navearanya!”
40013010	Naasa valya va kiloshyony kyakwe vakasha na yoo akai vakammbia, “A kimaruma kwarera nawo kusheraa fyaaso nkyokyi?”
40013011	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Yeni mmbo mwaniingwa imanya mbony tikee shirike ta umangyi lwa iruveeu. Indi kya yewo wo valaniingwa.
40013012	Kimmba nndu atiri kindo mmbo aniingwaa fiingyi katana afumbukywa. Indi yeto nalatiri kindo, mmbo asokwaa na kilya akooya atiri.
40013013	Nkyo kimaruma sharera nawo shisheraa fyaaso, mashika ilola valolaa valalollyaa, na yaaranya vaarannyi nta valaite nta iitumuso.
40013014	Na kisuku kilya kya Yesaya nng'u kyainukya kyeamba, ‘Yaaranya mushearannyaa mulamanyaa na ilola mulole mulalollyaa.
40013015	Mashika vandu yeva ngoo tawo tammba shuumu. Nawo vakava varoo yaaranya. Na miso awo vakasingira, naambo valakooye ilollya, nta iipuye kindo na maarwi awo, nta iipuye kindo na ngoo tawo wooke efo shieny tawo na yeny shivakire.’
40013016	Indi yeni miso any ava a ngoma mashika alollye kindo, na maarwi any, mashika aitye kindo.
40013017	Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Vakisuku veefo veengyi na vandu va usumanu velangye ilollya yekyo mulollye yeni, valalollye, na iita yekyo mwiitye yeni valaite.’ “
40013018	“Naasa yeni arannyiny-te kyaaso ekyo kya mweera mbeu shaasa kyikai.
40013019	Wo nndu aifo ashearannyaa kirero ekyo kya mbony ta umangyi lwa Iruva nalaitumuso mmbo asheywa ni yeto nkasha. Kasherakwa-u mbeu yeyo sheere efo nriminy wakwe. Nto mbeu tilya tilewa efo shia.
40013020	Na kya yeto tileerwa ando iwe lyikwaalye si. We mmbwe nndu mwaarannya kirero ekyo. Nalyo yeni kakyiwarya na nsia nriminy.
40013021	Na kindo atura ni miraarii. Mmbo akee nndu wa veru-veru. Kwakooya ashaatarwaa ao irishiswa kimaruma kya ndera yeyo, nalyo yeni kauta-u nsindara.
40013022	Na kya yeto tileerwa efo miingeny, we mmbwe mwiirannya ndera yeyo kandetirwa ni ngyusau ta muu yeu na ilembwa ni masaa, nafyo fikansisira na ndera yeyo ikakaa indo ilavika kimu.
40013023	Na kya yeto tileerwa ando a uteri usha, we mmbwe nndu mwiirannya ndera yeyo kaitumuso. Naasany kandevika fimu. Umwi kavika iyana, ungyi makumi arindaru, ungyi makumi araru.”
40013024	Na kyaaso kyingyi kaveera kaamba, “Umangyi lwa iruveeu lulesha ifwanana na nndu aleenda yeera mbeu shisha efo ireminy lyakwe.
40013025	Naasa elyi vandu valele rony nkiduva wakwe kasha nau. Kaera mbeu ta mamburu nnang'ani ya nganu tilya, kakweengya.
40013026	Kyasia, elyi mbeu tilya tamya tikava mooro na iraaka, nalyo mamburu alya akavelollywa paa.
40013027	Naasa mashinga a nndu ulya muni irema akansheya akammbia, ‘Ale Nndumi! Yewe kuleera mbeu shisha efo ireminy lyafo-ndi? A kundo lyoota mamburu alya nkwi?’
40013028	Nawe kavavia: Ni nkiduva alekitana. Mashinga alya akammbia, ‘A ndesa kwakunda lundesanyirya?’
40013029	Nawe kaamba, ‘Ode, elyi musanyiryaa mamburu yoo, naambo mulaillwe nganu mutisande nang'u.
40013030	Reny fing'ani fii-fivii ando amwi fifike yoo maveiyony. Na elyi kwamfika maveiyony, neeny mmbo nsheviaa yewo veevyaa Pookeny isanyirya mamburu alya mufinge fikonde fikonde andevivyo murony. Na nganu to tivikwa efo mbesheny yakwa.’ “
40013031	Na kyaaso kingyi kaveera kaamba, “Umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na mbekye imwi ya haradali. Nndu mmbo aleiipoo kandeyeera efo ireminy lyakwe.
40013032	Nayo mmbo ikee shinnywa ngota mbeu toose. Indi kwakooya yang'ana ikava niini, ikailanya mare alya akee maronge-fo eelonga shoonga, ikava nri mweni. Na ndeye ta efo nginiiu tikatana tasha ishevika fifuri fyavayo marambeny a vayo.”
40013033	Na kyaaso kingyi kaveera, “Umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na kinruwo kitarang'aa kyeefumbisa nswa. Nndu nka kakiipoo kakisanda na nswa fideeva firaru. Nato ukatana wakwaana itarang'a deny.”
40013034	Naasa mbony yeto toose Yesu alevia vandu valya vakuummbye-u aveeraa fyaaso. Nta nalavavie kindo kulaore aveera fyaaso-fo.
40013035	Na kimaruma kikaenda indo, ni kilya kilererwa na kana ka nkisuku ulya Yesaya naambo kikooye iinukya-u kyeamba, “Nshetarammbwaa kana kakwa sheere fyaaso shipare mbony yeto tekee shirike uka mapookyony a ulana yelu.”
40013036	Nalyo Yesu kasama vandu valya vakuummbye-u nkuka, kaenda efo mmba. Valya vakiloshyony vakasha ikuumbya yoo akai, vakaamba, “Lukapye nsuka wa kyaaso yekyo kya mamburu a efo ireminy, mbee!”
40013037	Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Yeto mweera mbeu yeto shisha ni Mwana yeto wa Nndu.
40013038	Na irema elyo ni ulana yelu. Na mbeu yeto shisha ni vana va efo umangyi ny. Na mamburu yoo ni vana va yeto nkasha.
40013039	Na nkiduva yeto aleera ni mmbishwa. Na mailullyony ni yoo masiiyony a ulana yelu. Na veelula ni vasu va Iruva.
40013040	Nasaany shaasa mamburu asanyirywa akandevivywa murony, na yoo masiiyony a ulana yelu ni indo-da kishevaa.
40013041	Ni Mwana yeto wa nndu asherumaa vasu vakwe, vandesanyirya yewo veende misindara woose yuutwa efo umangyi ny lwakwe, na yewo vetana fya kiila.
40013042	Nawo vavaere efo irininy lya muro. Nafo kushekaa-fo kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.
40013043	Llyo yewo va usumanu vashevaa paa sha mwi mweni; vekee efo umangyi ny lwa Nde-yaawo. Yeto atiri maarwi earannya navearannya.”
40013044	“Lyingyi umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na masaa akee masurumyi ando a ireminy. Nndu kaakooya, kawuya yaalyikya. Na elyi atirwa indo ni nsia kandekumba fyoose atiri kandeura irema lyilya.”
40013045	“Na lyingyi-se umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na nndu mwiikapa mbusha aruuyaa samana ta ngata shisha.
40013046	Naasa kakooya samana imwi ya uuru uniini. Kaenda kandekumba fyoose atiri kasha iyuura.”
40013047	“Na lyingyi-se umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo lufwanani na nreiyo wa makunga uleolotwa efo yeeveny ukaummbya wo ngata iifo.
40013048	Ukaishwa vakawoomuya na efo waambeu. Vakakaa-fo rembo. Alya mesha vakasanyirya efo fiiyeny fyawo. Na alya maporu vakaeera efo.
40013049	Na yoo masiiyony a ulana yelu ni indo-da kyishevaa. Ni vasu va Iruva vashekwiipoo vanderauwa-fo yewo veesi vavaute efo nnang'ani ya va usumanu.
40013050	Nawo vasheveeraa efo irininy lya muro. Nafo kukaa-fo kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.”
40013051	“A ndesa mwaitumuso efo fyoose?” Vakaamba, “Ee-da mbee.”
40013052	Nawe kavavia, “Kimmba ni indo, naasa wo mwiilosha mavavaso aloshywa kya umangyi lwa iruveeu, mmbo avakye nndu muni kyeny asurumyi masaa akwe, kava muuta-fo fyeesimba fiiya na fikuu.”
40013053	Kyikava elyi Yesu ammanda yeera fyaaso efyo kakwiipoo efo akai.
40013054	Kandefika kulya muriny wakwe kundo alelelyo. Kavaloshya efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya. Nawo vakaising'ang'a vakaamba, “A nyira nndu yeu nkwi autye urango yelo na fya wiidimi efi atanaa?
40013055	Yeu nshi we mwana wa mwiipasha firi? Na maye nshi we Maria? Na vanavamaye nshi wo Yakobo na Yosefu na Simion na Yuda?
40013056	Na vamfwamaye nshi wo yewo vakee kunu kweru woose? Naasany nkwi nndu yeu autye findo efyo fyoose?”
40013057	Naasa vakatirwa nnyinyira nawe. Na Yesu kavavia, “Nndu nkisuku nnaminwa kulaore ni efo muriny wakwe muni na efo kyeny kwakwe kweni-fo.”
40013058	Naasa nafo nta nalatani-fo fya wiidimi mashika elyi valera valekusirya nawe.
40014001	Fyeeri efi fyeni mangyi ilya Herode kaita kilya kishaambawaa kya Yesu.
40014002	Naasa kavia vasero va efo poo kwakwe, “Ate yeto mmbwe Yohane mmbatisi? Mmbwe muni aleruka auka kwa vafu. Nkyo kimaruma findo efyo fya wiidimi fikatanyika efo kwakwe.”
40014003	Nyeelyi Herode entira Yohane, kamfinga kandemweera efo mmba ya vafinge kimaruma kya Herodia ekee nka wa mwana-maye, we Filipo.
40014004	Mashika Yohane emmbya, “Nkutiri mumu weenrwaa-fo.”
40014005	Nawe kaamba nammbwae, kawuya iiryaa vandu vashekuumbaa, neelyi vaishi Yohane ni nndu nkisuku.
40014006	Naasa elyi kwanfika nkonu weekummbwa llya Herode alewonika mwana ulya wa kyeny wa Herodia kafina yoo nnang'ani yaawo, kasennya Herode.
40014007	Nalyo kanteerya kyaasa elyaa mboo nanniinge kindo ankitereva na kyikava-kyi.
40014008	Nawe kasha nau akee mwaaye mmaye kaamba, “Shiniinga nrwe wa Yohane mmbatisi wekerwa yaa ndeeveny.”
40014009	Na mangyi ilya kating'wa. Indi kimaruma kya valya akee nawo rembo alya shoongeny, naasa kavavasya nandeniingwa.
40014010	Karuma Yohane nanderumbuwa nrwe kulya kifinngyony.
40014011	Naasa nrwe wakwe ukeendwa ukee nndeeveny ukaniinngyo mwana ulya wa kyeny. Nawe keenda ariiye maye.
40014012	Nalyo valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakasha nang'u vakaipoo nnying'a ulya vakandeurika. Vakaenda vakafitya Yesu mbony tilya.
40014013	Na Yesu ekiita kakwiipoo-fo kirisi kaenda na ngalava. Kafika kundo kulalelwa ekee kyaanya kyakwe muni. Na vandu valya vakuummbye-fo mamwiingyi vakakiita, vakansora-fo vesheendaa na marende vauka kulya miriny yaawo.
40014014	Naasa eekifika mbai ya nruva, kooka ngalaveny, kalollya vandu vasheye ikuumbya-u nkuka. Kavavyo m muu, kashiisa vandu yewo vawo valwee.
40014015	Naasa elyi kwamiila valya vakiloshyony vakasha na yoo akai vakaamba, “Kunu lukai ni kasa koomu, nalyo kwammiila. Naasany tauwany mamwiingyi yeu wa vandu vakweengye efo miriny yaawo; vandekuurya-fo fyeelya.”
40014016	Nawe kavavia, “Mmbatiri kimaruma kya yeenda-fo, yeni vaniingeny fyeelya.”
40014017	Nawo vakaamba, “Nta llutiri kindo yaa-fo kulaore ni mikate iraanu na makunga avii nsi.”
40014018	Nawe kavavia, “Sheengyeny findo efyo na yaa!”
40014019	Naasa, kavavasya vandu valya vakuummbye-u vavikwa rembo yoo mareny. Kawarya mikate ilya iraanu, na makunga alya avii. Kalla efo iruveeu kaana Iruva. Kaifisha-fisha fyenga. Kaniingya vakiloshyony kyakwe mikate ilya. Na vakiloshyony vakandeavya vandu.
40014020	Vakalya woose vakawuura. Vakaveipoo fipereshu filya fyasaa, ikaishwa mikusha ikumi na ivii.
40014021	Na valya valelya ni womi vafye sha fiku firaanu kuuta-fo vaka na vana.
40014022	Naasa karika valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vandesaama neefo ngalaveny vandesongwa iruuka vafike kulya kwa kulya, nawe natani asamana na vandu valya vakuummbye-u.
40014023	Na elyi ansama mamwiingyi ulya kandesaama na kulya ifumbuny, nandeterevya-fo Iruva ekee kyaanya kyakwe muni. Kukafika kweela ekee-fo we muni.
40014024	Naasa na ngalava ilya yamfika efo nnang'ani ya yeeve ilya, yeefo ishaatarwaa m matundulu mashika uraato lweesumani nawo.
40014025	Naasa elyi kukee kufii ikya, kasha na alya vakai asheendaa yoo uwe ya yeeve ilya.
40014026	Vekilolya ashendaa indo uwe ya yeeve vakasavaa. Vakaamba, “Ni nndu wa kwa vafu.” Vakairyaa vakafua uwui-uwui.
40014027	Nalyo yeni karera nawo, kaamba, “Wuiyony muu, ni yeny, nta mulairyae-fo.”
40014028	Naasa Petro karouwa kaamba, “Nndumi kwakooya ni yewe shivavasyaany shishe na yefo kukai shisheendaa yo uwe ya mura.”
40014029	Nawe kammbia, “Kusheye!” Petro kooloka efo ngalaveny kaenda efo uwe ya mura, kasha na alya Yesu akai.
40014030	Naasa elyi alollya uraato lwaira-u na finya kawuya iryaa. Kapooka irekya kafua, kaamba, “Nndumi shaauwa!”
40014031	Nalyo yeni Yesu kaorwa woko kantira kammbia, “Kukee nndu wa kikusiryo kidu! A nkikyi elyi kwatirwa nnyiinyira?”
40014032	Vakasaama na efo ngalaveny uraato lukamalallya.
40014033	Na valya va efo ngalaveny vakasha na yoo akai; vakamoolokya si. Vakaamba, “Ni kya dede yewe ni Mwana wa Iruva.”
40014034	Naasa elyi valemaa iruuka kwa kulya vakafika uruka lulya lwa Genesareti.
40014035	Naasa vasero va ando alya vekimanya mmbwe, vakaruma kulya kundevaangwa vandu va muungony kwawo woose. Vandu vakasha nang'u ishemweengye vandu valwee woose.
40014036	Vakamooshora nta vakupaanyi naakwa ni nse wa soori yakwe ya yeerya. Na valya vaiyo vapaana woose vakaveshia.
40015001	Nalyo Yesu kasheywa ni Vafarisayo na velosha va mavavaso vauka kulya Yerusalemu. Vakaamba,
40015002	A nkikyi elyi vakiloshyony kyafo vava veimmbwa ngyufundo ta vakuu? Mashika vara valasangya maako elyi valya shoonga.
40015003	Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Nkyiki elyi yeni mwava veimmbwa ivavaso lya Iruva kimaruma kya ngyufundo yeto tany?
40015004	Shamashika Iruva mmbo avavasye kaamba, ‘Indya ndoo na mau. Na yeto aruma ndeye ao maye iwaawa nawaawa.’
40015005	Na yeni mukaamba-le, ‘Kwakooya nndu amina ndeye ao maye, Kavavia efyo mweewarya kwakwa fyeemulela, akakafyo shammefivika five waavi lwa mmba ya Iruva! Naasa, nndu yeto nalakiindye-se nta ndeye nta maye-fo.’
40015006	Na yeni mukaniinga ivavaso elyo lya Iruva lyikarewa mutewa ni ngyufundo yeto tany.
40015007	Mmbo mukee vakunang'ari, Yesaya kamuronga ninsha elyi aleawuya kisuku kilya kaamba,
40015008	‘Vandu yeva ni firomu fyawo vashiinndya nafyo, indi ngoo tawo tikakaa kwaasha neeny.
40015009	Mmbo vashiinndya kikee kya ruu deny, mashika miloshye yaawo valosha ni mavavaso a kivandu.’ “
40015010	Naasa kavaanga mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu naambo vashekuummbya yoo akai. Kavavia, “Aranyiny mwiitumuso!
40015011	Kindo kireveesa nndu nshi yekyo kishangaa na kaniny-fo, ni yekyo kishuukaa kaniny, nkyo kindo kireveesa nndu.”
40015012	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakasha na yoo akai, vakaamba, “A ndesa kwamanya Vafarisayo vamiita kirero ekyo vakauta-u nsindara?”
40015013	Nawe kavavia, “Wo kindo kivaakye kiiyo kulaore kyammbaaywa ni Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu mmbo kishiiluwaa.
40015014	Vakureeyeny-te! Mmbo vasongoye vafu miso shia vavekee vafu miso wo veni. Na kwakooya mfu miso asongoya mfu miso uroye shia, mmbo vashoolokaa irininy vee vavii.”
40015015	Naasa Petro kaallwa kammbia, “Lukapye nsuka wa kyaaso ekyo, mbee!”
40015016	Nawe kaamba, “Na yeni-da fika ulaalu nta mulandeipuye kindo?
40015017	A mmbo mulandeitumuso sheelyi wo kindo kishangaa na efo kaniny, mmbo kishoolokaa na ndewuny kikauka-fo kikaenda irininy?
40015018	Indi efyo fishuukaa efo kaniny mmbo fisomukaa fyuuka efo nriminy. Nafyo mfyo fireveesaa nndu.
40015019	Shamashika efo ngoony mfo kundo kushuukaa makusaro meesi, na fya uwai, na fya utuusi, na wiivi, na fya urui, na fya ukureekyi lwa wongo, na fyaararo.
40015020	Mfyo efyo fireveesaa nndu. Indi nndu kalya shoonga na maako alakee masangye nshikyo kireveesaa nndu-fo.”
40015021	Naasa Yesu kakwiipoo warya kooka-u, kafika kulya myuungony ya Tiro na Sidoni.
40015022	Nalyo akau nndu nka wa Kikanaani ansha nau, auka urukeny lwa kufii-fii. Kaonisa unyanga, kaamba, “Woi Nndumi kukee mwana wa Davidi, shisarya ukiva lwakwa! Mmbo shitiri mwana wa kyeny atirwa mmumuyo nkasha ukamwaaruva kyuumu.”
40015023	Nawe nalanndouwe nta kirero. Naasa, vakiloshyony kyakwe vakanserikya, vakantereva, vakaamba, “Ntauwe mbee, mmbo afua nnu yoo numa yeeru.”
40015024	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nshilerumwa kundo-fo, kulaore ni kwa vandu va Israeli varekye sha moonri.”
40015025	Nawe kasha nau kamoolokya si, kaamba, “Woi Nndumi sheekya kima kyakwa-te!”
40015026	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nshi kisha nndu nasoke fivana shoonga yaawo neerye fite-fo.”
40015027	Nawe kaamba, “Ee-da Nndumi. Indi naakwa ni fite fikulyiiyaa fipereshu fishaangaraa fyuuka efo meseny a vanndumi va vayo.”
40015028	Nalyo Yesu kaallwa, “Ee nka, kwankusirya-u kiniini-dwa. Kivekuviiyany indo shaasa kwakukunndya!” " Nalyo mwana ulya wakwe kashia kyeeri kilya kyeni.
40015029	Naasa Yesu kakwiipoo-fo kandefika kulya waambeu lwa yeeve ilya ya Galilaya. Kasaama na kulya ifumbuny kakaa-fo rembo.
40015030	Naasa vandu vakamweengya matorito meengyi varie yewo vakee miketekete, na vafu miso, na mbimbi, na fitongororo, na va ngata ingyi veengyi, vakaveera yoo marendeny akwe. Nawe kavakira.
40015031	Vandu valya vakuummbye-u vakasongololo elyi valollya valya fitongororo veshiaa, na valya vakee miketekete vesheendaa, na valya vafu miso velolaa. Nawo vakauta-u ing'anisa Iruva wa Israeli.
40015032	Naasa Yesu kavaanga valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakuummbye yoo akai, kaamba, " “Mmbo shavavyo mmuu kya nsemu yeu wa vandu. Mashika kwammiira-u mikonu iraru sele vesisirye yaa kwakwa, nta valatiri kindo kyeelya. Nta nshikunndye ivasama indo valakomba kindo-fo, mmbo valemmywaa efo shia.”
40015033	Valya vakiloshyony vakammbia, “A yaa kasa lukai, nkwi lushuutaa mikate miingyi indo yeewuutisa vandu yeva vamiingifwa indo?”
40015034	Na Yesu kavavia, “Mikate mutiri ni iinga?” Vakammbia, “Ni mfungare, na fikunga fiifo fyaangu.”
40015035	Naasa kavavasya vandu valya vakuummbye-fo mamwiingyi vakee rembo.
40015036	Naasa kawarya mikate ilya mfungare na makunga alya. Kaarafuma Iruva kafisha-fisha fyenga, kaniingya vakiloshyony. Valya vakiloshyony vakandeavya mamwiingyi ulya.
40015037	Vakalya woose vakawuura vakaveipoo na fipereshu filya fyasaa, mikusha ikaishwa mfungare.
40015038	Na vandu valelya vafye womi fiku fiina kwauta-fo vaka na vana.
40015039	Naasa kasama mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu. Kandesaama na efo ngalaveny. Kandefika kulya myuungony ya kulya Magadani.
40016001	Naasa Vafarisayo vakansheya na Vasadukayo vakasha imweesa. Vakantereva nawoore wende luuka iruveeu.
40016002	Nawe kaamba, “Nkwaany mmbo mwaamba, ‘Kwiifo kwiishaa ngesa, mashika efo iruveeu kufwani nsoru.’
40016003	Na elyi ngama mukaamba, ‘Inu kwiikapaa mmbwa ya maruruma.’ Mmbo kufwani samu efo iruveeu kukafumba-fumba. Kikavaany fwana ya efo iruveeu, yo mwaidima iimanya indi ngyende ta meendi yaa to mulatimanyi,
40016004	Irika yelyi yeesi lyiraiye utuusi lyisyaa wende. Nalyo nta llyisheniingwaa wende-fo, kulaore ni wende yelo lwa Yona. " Naasa kavara-u kakweengyany.”
40016005	Naasa elyi valya vakiloshyony varuuka vakafika kulya kwakulya, vakakooya vanrekyo iipoo mikate ya kishau.
40016006	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, " “Manyiny mukwiise na kinruwo kitarang'aa ekyo kya Vafarisayo na Vasadukayo!”
40016007	Nawo vakaumburana wo veni na veni. Vakaamba, “Ni elyi lwarekyo iipoo mikate.”
40016008	Nalyo Yesu kamanya kaamba, “Nyira vandu va kikusiryo kyaangu a ekyo mwaumburana kya mikate ilya mwarekyo iipoo nkyokyi?
40016009	A mmbo mulandeipuye nta kindo, nta ikummbwa mikate ilya na vasero valya fiku firaanu na mikusha ilya muleishura fipereshu mmbo yekee iinga?
40016010	Nta mikate ilya na fiku filya fiina na mikusha muleipoo shaasa yeefye?
40016011	A mmbo kyava-se inda elyi mwarekyo iipuye kindo sharerya nshi kya mikate ilya-fo! Naasa kevekwiiseny na kinruwo ekyo kitarang'aa ekyo kya Vafarisayo na Vasadukayo.” "
40016012	Nawo vakaitumuso, ate nshi akundye ivavia vakwiise na kinruwo ekyo kitarang'ashaa mikate-fo, mmbo akunndye ivavia vakwiise na ufundo lwa Vafarisayo na Vasadukayo.
40016013	Naasa elyi Yesu afika kulya Kaisaria ya Filipo Kavesa yewo vakiloshyony kyakwe, kaamba, " “A vandu varera inda kya Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo akee vi?”
40016014	Nawo vakaamba, “Kwiifo vaamba ni Yohane Mwiibatisa. Vengyi vakaamba ni Elia. Vengyi vakaamba ni Yeremia ao ni nndu wa vakisuku umwi.”
40016015	Kavavesa, “A yeni mmbo mwaamba yeny ni vi?”
40016016	Simon Petro kaallwa kaamba, “Yewe ni yewe Kristo kukee Mwana wa Iruva yeto muni muu!”
40016017	Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Ngoma yewe Simion wa Yona! Mashika kyakurambuya ekyo nshi nndu wa vandu-fo Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu.”
40016018	Naasa neeny shakuvia-le, “Yewe ni yewe Petro, na yaa iweu elyi ntannyau mmba nnyo siri yakwa. Nalyo nta finya ta ufu ntilyiidimaa-fo.
40016019	Mmbo nkuniinngyaa ngyufunguo ta efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu. Na kindo kwankifinga kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kifinge. Na kindo kwankiporommwa kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kiporommwi.” "
40016020	Nalyo kavavasa yewo vakiloshyony nta valandevie vandu vaambe we mmbwe Kristo.
40016021	Naasa fyeeri filya fyeni Yesu kapooka yoora valya vakiloshyony kyakwe mmbo kikee kirummbwe, nandefika kulya Yerusalemu nandelyisyo-fo ukiva wiingyi mmasiingo a uruka na Vakohani yewo vaniini, na vaarya va fitabu. Na iwaawa navewaawa, na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu narukeny.
40016022	Nalyo Petro kanrwaa na mbai. Kapooka inkeemmya kaamba, " “Ekyo Iruva nakiite kwaasha nakamwi! Kindo sha ekyo kilakuwonise-fo!”
40016023	Nawe kainduka kavia Petro, “Kwiipoo wuya numa yakwa Satana! Mmbo kwava nsindara-akwa! Mashika ekyo kikee nrweny kwafo nshi ekyo kya Iruva-fo, ni ekyo kya kivandu.”
40016024	Nalyo Yesu kavia yewo vakiloshyony vakwe, “Kwakooya nndu akunda ishilatya kuti nasue mwiili wakwe muni, nakurike nsalaba wakwe, nashilatyeeny!”
40016025	Mashika nndu yeto akundaa ikira muu wakwe mmbo asheuretaa. Na nndu asheeraa muu wakwe sakyeny kwakooya ni kimaruma kyakwa, mmbo ashuuwonisaa.
40016026	Mashika iviiri nndu ashuutaa-u nkyokyi kwakooya asheonisaa ulana loose luve mbusha yakwe, karetya-fo muu wakwe? Ao kindo nndu avikaa kyeewouwa muu wakwe nkyokyi?
40016027	Mashika mwana yeto wa nndu isha asheshaa aree usuri lwa Ndeye aryani na vasu vakwe va efo iruveeu, nalyo nandetaa wo nndu kiinani na mashora akwe.
40016028	Ni kya dede shamuvia, “Vandu vasalali yaa indi kwiifo valashoshaa ufu kulaore valollya Mwana yeto wa nndu ashe akee na umangyi lwakwe.”
40017001	Nalyo kukaira-u mikonu irindaru, Yesu kaipoo Petro na Yakobo na Yohane we mwanamaye wa Yakobo, kavasaamisa kundo kwa ifumbuny yaasha vakee kyaanya kyawo veni.
40017002	Nalyo kaalashika fwana yakwe valollye. Kisangu kyakwe kikamika sha mwi mweni. Na soori takwe tikava shaa pyai sha sa sheni.
40017003	Nalyo akakava Mose na Elia vansha nau ikoora nawo, vakarera nawe.
40017004	Naasa Petro karouwa kavia Yesu, “Nndumi nkisha elyi yese lukee kunu! Kwakunda ntanaa matengo araru, lyimwi lyafo, na lya Mose lyimwi, na lya Elia lyimwi.”
40017005	Arera indo nalandesyado akalyi ifishi lyitiri sa lyikavavikya kirishe. Akalu na unyanga luvaangaa luuka efo ifishiny lukaamba, “Akakau Mwana wakwa nkunde, yeto shilensauwa, mmbwe mushemwaarannyaa!”
40017006	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vaita kiireraa indo vakawa si na fisangu vakairyaa nnu.
40017007	Yesu kaserikya nau kavapaana, kaamba, “Kwiipony-te! Nta mulairyae-fo!”
40017008	Vakainuya miso na uwe valakilollye-se nndu, kuuta Yesu muni.
40017009	Naasa elyi veefo vashoolokaa kulya ifumbuny, Yesu kavavavasa kaamba, “Kindo ekyo mwamoorwa nta mulandeekivia nndu, na mutani mwafika kyeeri ekyo Mwana yeto wa nndu annduka auka kwa vafu.”
40017010	Naasa yewo vakiloshyony vakammbesa, vakaamba, “Mmbo kyikee inda elyi vaarya va fitabu vaammbaye, ‘Elia kuti napooke isha mbele.’ “
40017011	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Elia isha ashaa-da navauwe findo fyoose fishie sha elyo mbee.”
40017012	Indi yeny shamuvia, “Elia alemmeesha nta valammanyi. Vakantannya shaasa vekundye. Na Mwana yeto wa nndu ni kiwo-da, we kuti navelyiswa ukiva mmbo.” "
40017013	Nalyo vakiloshyony vakamanya mmbo arera nawo kya Yohane Mmbatisi.
40017014	Na elyi vansha na efo kundo vandu vakuumbye-fo nkuka kasheyo ni nndu kashemoolokya ng'undeny.
40017015	Kaamba, " “Woi Nndumi! Sarya mwana yeu wakwa ukiva. Mmbo atirwa ni usukwa, kava mwiivavyo kyuumu. Mashika keengyi awa murony na keengyi kavewa efo mureny.
40017016	Na yeny shamweengye yewo vakiloshyony kyafo, nta valaidimi inshiisa.”
40017017	Na Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Apaa irika lyilemmyi ikusirya-u lyikaenda mbai. A shikae neeni shifike kwi? Mweende na yaa shikai-te!”
40017018	Naasa Yesu kankeemmya, nalyo mumuyo ulya nkasha ukamuuka. Na mwana ulya kashia kipookya sa ilya sheni.
40017019	Nalyo vakiloshyony vakakuumbya yoo Yesu akai vekee kyaanya kyawo, vakaamba, “A elyi yese kulaore luleidima iwaanta nkikyi?”
40017020	Nawe kavavia, “Neelyi kikusiryo kyany kyava kyaangu! Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Kwakooya mwatira kikusiryo na kikava kyaangu sha mbekye imwi ya karadali, mmbo musheviaa ifumbu yelyi, kwiipoo yaa kuteshuke-u, nalyo lyiteshukaa-da.’ Nta nkwiifo kindo kilashiidimikaa kwany-fo. [
40017021	Ngata yei nnyishuukaa kulaore ni elyi kwatereva Iruva ando amwi na ikootoya-fo.]”
40017022	Naasa elyi veefo vashiira-iraa kulya Galilaya, nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Mwana yeto wa Nndu eefo anderambikyoo maakony a vandu.
40017023	Nawo vashemmbwaa. Na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu asherukaa. " Nawo vakasokywa mfyoova nnu.”
40017024	Naasa elyi vamfika kulya Kapernaumu, valya veesana ukamba lwa mmba ya Iruva vakasheya Petro, vakaamba, " “A llori yeto waany aniingyaa fesa ya mmba ya Iruva? Petro kavavia, ‘Avikaa-da!’ “
40017025	Naasa kaanga na efo mmba. Yesu kalava irera nawe, kaamba, “A mmbo kukusarye inda Simion? Vamangyi va masanga mmbo vashuutaa udedemi na ukamba kwa vandu vangava? Ndesa ni efo kwa vana vawo, ao ni efo kwa yewo vengyi?”
40017026	Nawe kaamba, “Ni efo kwa vengyi-te!” Yesu kammbia, “Naasany vana yewo mmbo vakee vaute-fo-sho.
40017027	Indi yese nta lulavateve vaute nsindara kweru. Naasa enda efo yeeveny kundeolota kiminya ekyo kya ngorori kyeereiya makunga. Na ikunga yelyo kulavaa ilyuuta-fo mmbo kushelyiipoo kulyitarammbwe kana. Llyo kushekooyaa-fo fesa imwi. Yuute-fo kundevaniinga ando akwa na afo.”
40018001	Naasa sa ilya sheni valya vakiloshyony vakasha ikuummbya yoo Yesu akai, vakaamba, “A yeto akee nniini wa wooroye efo umangyiny lwa iruveeu ni viiny?”
40018002	Nalyo kavaanga kimwana na yoo vakai. Kakivika nnang'ani yaawo.
40018003	Kaamba, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Kwakooya kulaore mwaaluka mukava va ngata ya fivana, efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu mmukooyaa yaanga-fo nta-fo!’
40018004	Naasany nndu kakwaalwa n-du we muni, kava wa ngata ya kimwana yekyi, yeto mmbwe nniini wa wooroye efo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.
40018005	Na wo nndu aiyo moose awarya kimwana kya ngata yeyo kimaruma kya irina lyakwa, mmbo ashiwarya yeny.”
40018006	“Na yeto ammba nsindara weetuula yewo vafwafwa vakusirye neeny, naakwa ni yeto umwi tupu, kya nndu yeto kyava kisha kilanya nafinngyo isewe lyirungutwaa ni nshungu efo singony yakwe, nandeolotwa efo uroony lwa yeeve.
40018007	Oshiny lwa ulana yelu kimaruma kya misindara iifo. Kya misindara isha kuti ishe. Indi oshiny lwa nndu yeto nsindara ushaa weendwa mmbwe.
40018008	Na kwakooya woko lwafo ao urende lwafo lushekweenngyee nsindara, lurummbwe kwalweera efo! Mmbo kyava kisha kilanya kwakooya kwaanga na efo muuny kukee kisaya ao kitongororo, ngota elyi kwatira maako ai avii na marende ai avii kwandeerwa efo murony ularumikaa.
40018009	Na kwakooya iriso lyafo lyishekweengyee nsindara, lyiillwe kwalyeera efo! Mmbo kyava kisha kilanya ikwiirya na efo muuny kukee nndu wa iriso lyimwi, ngota elyi kwatira miso ai avii, kwandeerwa efo Gehena ya muro.”
40018010	Manyiny mure mulamina yewo vafwafwa nta umwi! Mmbo shamuvia, vasu vawo efo iruveeu mmbo valollye kisangu kya Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu kyeeri kyoose. [
40018011	Kimmba Mwana yeto wa nndu kindo asheye yuuta ni ishekira ekyo kirekye.]
40018012	A mmbo mukusarye inda? Kwakooya kwiifo nndu atiri moonri iyana kakooya lyimwi lyanreka-u nawe nare nalatiiya-u alya makumi kyeenda na kyeenda nandepara na efo mafumbuny asyaa lilya lyirekye.
40018013	Ikava pule yakwe kalyilollya, nkya dede shamuvia, mmbo afuraa nalyo kilanya ngota kya alya makumi kyeenda na kyeenda alarekye.
40018014	Na efo kisanguny kya Nde yaakwa wa efo iruveeu nawe-da nnakunndye yewo vafwafwa vareke-u nta umwi-fo.
40018015	“Na mwanamau kammeelyamara enda kumoore ulyamari lwakwe mwiiyo muveni. Kammekwiirikya mmbo kyava iviiri lyafo, kwankooya mwanama-u.
40018016	Kanra nalakwiirikya enda kundeende nndu umwi ao vavii-se, kushe nawo wo kindo kirumbuke kisunundwa nkana ka vakureekyi vavii ao vararu.
40018017	Kallema ivairikya wo enda kundekyoongoya siri. Kallema iirikya siri, naasany nakuviiyeeny sha nndu wa masanga na n-dedemi.”
40018018	“Ni kya dede shamuvia, wo kindo mwankifinga kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kifinge. Na kindo mwankiporommwa kunu urukeny, na efo iruveeu ni kiwo-da kyaveva kiporommwi.
40018019	Na kingyi-se shamuvia, ‘Vandu vany vavii ao vararu vakandeeryana kya wo kindo vakitereve efo kwa Iruva, mmbo vashewonisaa kyuuka na Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu.’
