40018020	Mashika ando kwankuumbya vavii ao vararu kikee kya ikummbwa irina lyakwa, na yeny mmbu ando nkaa nnang'ani yaawo.”
40018021	Nalyo Petro kaserikya yoo kufii, kaamba, “Ale Nndumi! Mwanama mmbo ashirenngyaa keenga na yeny shive mwiimfwaaya! A ndesa shifike matorito mfungare, naasany?”
40018022	Yesu kammbia, “Shakuvia, nshi matorito mfungare-da-fo. Mmbo kufikaa matorito makumi mfungare ka mfungare.”
40018023	Nkyo kimaruma umangyi lwa iruveeu lukashefwanana na nndu mangyi akundye yeekena siye takwe na mashinga akwe.
40018024	Apooka yeekena kaengywa nndu wa sye atiri sye yakwe ya talanta 10,000.
40018025	Kakooya nalatiri fyeetaa, naasa nndumi ulya wakwe kavavasya nandekumbwa nasandwa na nka na vana, na findo fyakwe fyoose atiri, sye ilya indetawa.
40018026	Naasa ishinga llya lyikakweera si, lyikamweererya, lyikammbia, “Woi Nndumi, shisisirya, shikaa shikutaa-da.”
40018027	Naasa nndumi ulya kalyillya ishinga llya kalyilekeya. Na sye ilya katana alyireeya shoose.
40018028	Naasa ishinga llya kasomuka na efo poo. Kakooya mashinga wooroye, ulya umwi, atiri sye yakwe ya dinari 100. Kantira isanga, kammbia, “Shitaa sye yakwa kutiri!”
40018029	Ishinga llya uroye lyikammbia, “Shisisirya shikaa shikutaa-da!”
40018030	Nawe kalema fushu kandenrwaa kifingyony natani ataa sye ilya yakwe atiri.
40018031	Elyi mashinga wooroye valollya kive indo, vakasukywa nnu, vakanderuuya nndumi ulya wakwe mbony tilya tatanyika toose.
40018032	Nalyo nndumi ulya wakwe kammbaanga, kammbia, “Kukee ishinga yeesi! Sye ilya yakwa mmbo shilekureeya shoose llya kuleshyeererya.
40018033	Afikaany yewe nshi indo kivekusumanyi isarya ishinga uroo, shaasa yeny shavekusarya yewe?”
40018034	Nndumi ulya wakwe karooywa nngoo. Kanrambikya efo maakony a vetuurwa vandu, na natani ataa siye yakwe atiri namae piny.
40018035	Na Nde-yaakwa wa efo iruveeu ni indo-da ashemutanyaa yeni, kwakooya kulaore mwasaryana wo nndu na uroye efo miriminy yaany.
40019001	Kikavaany elyi ammarisya irera marero yoo moose, nawe kawara shia, kauka kulya Galilaya. Kaenda kyaaro kya uruka lwa Yudaya ashiiraa shia ya kwakulya ya Yordani.
40019002	Vandu vakallatya matorito meengyi, nawe kava mwiivakirya-fo.
40019003	Naasa Vafarisayo vakansheya vakamweesa vakaamba, “A ndesa nndu nndumi atiri muumu weelakana na nka wakwe kwakooya kwawonika kiteve kya ngata shoose?”
40019004	Nawe kaallwa, “A mmbo mulasommyi kya yeto aleumba vandu mmbo alevaumba vakee nndu nndumi na nndu nka uka elyo mapookyony?”
40019005	Kaamba, “Kimmba ni indo nndu nndumi ashuukaa kwa ndeye na maye nandekutira na nka wakwe, nawo vee vavii vashevaa mwiili umwi nsi.
40019006	Kikavaany nshi vakee-se vavii-fo, mmbo vava mwiili umwi nsi. Naasany kindo Iruva allunga we muni, na nndu nta nalakirauwe-fo.”
40019007	Nawo vakammbia, “A kyavaany inda, elyi Mose avavasye nndu naniinge nka barua ya llakanu nalakaniny nawe?”
40019008	Nawe kavavia, “Ni kimaruma kya mirima yaany ikee myuumu indo nkyo kileniinga Mose kaniingya muumu weelakana na vaka vany. Uka elyo mapookyony nshi indo kyeekai-fo.”
40019009	Neeny shamuvia, “ ‘Nndu kalakana na nka wakwe kwakooya kulaore ni kimaruma kya utuusi kaora ungyi mmbo atuusa.’
40019010	Naasa valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakammbia, ‘Kwankooya ekyo kya mmi na nka kikae indo, mmbo kyevaa kisha kilanya kwakooya nndu ara nalaalyika nka.’
40019011	Nawe kavavia, “Nshi woose vamanya itira kirero ekyi-fo, kulaore ni yewo vakee vaniinge.
40019012	Mmbo kwiifo valashiidimaa yoora uka elyo veerwaa, kukavekaa-fo vakee vaallwe indo mmbandu, kukavekaa-fo vakwaaluye indo wo veni kimaruma kya umangyi lwa iruveeu. Mwiidima itira kirero ekyo nakitire.”
40019013	Nalyo keengywa fivana nafyeekerye maako navefiterevya efo kwa Iruva. Na valya vakiloshyony vakavakeemmya.
40019014	Na Yesu kavavia, “Reny fivana efi fikusheye na kwakwa, nta mulafiimi! Mashika vakee va ngata yaawo mmbo umangyi lwa iruveeu lwava lwawo.” "
40019015	Naasa kafyeekerya maako. Kawuya kakwiipoo keenda.
40019016	Nalyo akakau nndu ansha nau kammbia, " “Llori, a fisha ntanaa mfyokyi shikooye muu wa llung'anu?”
40019017	Nawe kammbia, “Nkyiki elyi kwashivesya kya efyo fisha? Yeto aifo akee nsha ni umwi-da! Indi kwakooya kukundye yaanga na muuny wa llung'anu va mwiiringa mavavaso!”
40019018	Kaamba, “Nng'u angaa?” Na Yesu kammbia, “Kulawae, nta kulatuuse, nta kulaive, nta kulavike ukureekyi lwa wongo.
40019019	Indya ndoo na mau. Na nndu uroo kuvenkunda ndesa kukukunndye kumuni.”
40019020	Naasa nndu ulya, kammbia, “Efyo fyoose mmbo shileva mwiifiringa-da-te. A kindo kyashyaanguya-u nkyokyi?”
40019021	Yesu kammbia, “Kwakooya kukundye iva nndu nsongovisi deny, enda kundekumba efyo kutiri, kufyaavye vakiva. Llyo kushetiraa masaa efo iruveeu. Kwammaa oshoony kusheshilatya.”
40019022	Naasa nndu ulya eeta indo kasokywa mfyoova, mashika elyi ekee nndu atiri findo fiingyi.
40019023	Naasa Yesu kavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Nndu isimba atiri ngatara nnu yaanga umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.’
40019024	Na lyingyi-se shamuvia, ‘Nkyaangu kilanya ngamula iire na mmbweny ya sindanu,’ ngota nndu isimba ashaangaa neefo umangyi ny lwa iruveeu.”
40019025	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vekiita indo, vakamatuka nnu, vakaamba, “Kwakooya ni indo, a nndu ashiidimaa ikirwa ni vi?”
40019026	Naasa Yesu kavalola karii, kavavia, “Kunu vanduny ekyo nkishiidimikaa-fo, indi efo kwa Iruva mmbo fishiidimikaa fyoose.”
40019027	Nalyo Petro kaallwa, kammbia, “Lla-te mbee! Yese mmbo lwiisityo-u findo fyeru fyoose, lukakulatya. A ekyo lusheonisaa-u nkyokyi?”
40019028	Na Yesu kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Yeni mushilatye mmbo mukooyaa elyi kwamfika meendi findo fyuumbe fisheviirwaa wiiya, elyi Mwana yeto wa nndu ashekaa rembo yoo kitiminy kyakwe kya itumbe, neeni mmbo mushekaa rembo fitimeny ikumi na fivii mushillye ngyufyari ikumi na ivii yeto ta Israeli.’
40019029	Na wo nndu aiyo areeye vanavamaye ao vamfwamaye ao ndeye ao maye ao vana ao marema ao mmba kwakooya ni kimaruma kya irina lyakwa, we mmbo awaryaa ando a kimwi naniingwa ka iyana, navewarya na muu wa llung'anu uve ding'u yakwe.
40019030	Indi yewo vesonngwa veengyi vakaa vaaluke va numa, na yewo va numa vaaluke va mbee.”
40020001	“Umangyi lwa iruveeu mmbo luvakye nndu muni kyeny alekwiipoo ngama nraasi nanderuuya varundi va efo nndeny wakwe wa misabibu.
40020002	Kadeeryana na varundi valya kya urundi, nkonu umwi navaniinge weesi lwa nkonu, kavarika efo nndeny ulya wakwe wa misabibu.
40020003	Kawuya kakwiipoo lyingyi elyi kwamfika sa isaru, kakooya vengyi vasalali kulya singireny valarunda mashora.
40020004	Nawo kavevavia, ‘Na yeni keveendeny efo nndeny wakwa wa misabibu. Mmbo nshemuniingaa ekyo kisumani.’
40020005	Vakaenda. Kakwiipoo lyingyi elyi kwamfika sa irindaru, na sa keenda, kavetana indo,
40020006	Na elyi kwamfika sa ikumi na imwi kavekwiipoo kakooya vengyi vasalali indo, kavavia, ‘N kikyi elyi musalali indo nkonu piti mularunda mashora?’ Vakaamba,
40020007	‘Llwaona nndu aluvika varundi-fo.’ Nawe kavavia, ‘Na yeni keveendeny kulya nndeny wa misabibu.’
40020008	Naasa elyi kwamiila nndu ulya muni kyeny kavia ulya amweekya ikallya findo fyakwe, ‘Vaanga varundi valya kuvaniinge weesi lwawo, kupooke valya vafurummya isha, kufike valya valava isha.’
40020009	Valya va sa ikumi na imwi vakasha. Vakawarya wo nndu weesi lwa nkonu.
40020010	Valya va mbee vakasha, vakakusara kulakooye wo vashewaryaa kilanya. Nawo-da vakavewarya indo, wo nndu weesi lwa nkonu.
40020011	Vekiwarya vakakunung'unnya ulya muni kyeny.
40020012	Vakaamba, ‘Nkyelola yewo vafurummyi ni sa imwi nsi varunda-u, na yewe kwawuya ivainanisa neese. Neese mmbo lwansisirya mavina a nkonu piti, na ikorwa mmwi.’ “
40020013	“Nawe karouwa, kavia ulya umwi, ‘Mbuya yakwa nshi shakutannya kindo kilasumani-fo. A mmbo kulaore kwairikya ludeeryanaa kyaasa kya weesi lwa nkonu?
40020014	Kamarany ekyo kyafo kwakweenngya! Mmbo shikunndye indo iniinga yeto afurummyi kiinani na ekyo kyafo.
40020015	A findo efyo fyakwa mmbo shilatiri mumu wa itana nafyo ndesa shankunda? A mmbo kwanying'a elyi yeny shitiri maako?’
40020016	Naasa ni indo kivaa, yewo vafurummyi vaaluke va mbee, na yewo va mbee vaaluke vefurummya.”
40020017	Na elyi Yesu eefo arie shia yeenda irwa na kulya Yerusalemu, karwaa valya ikumi na vavii mbai, llya vekee kyaarony, kavavia,
40020018	“Llen-te lwiifo lwiirwaa na kulya Yerusalemu, na Mwana yeto wa nndu asherambikywaa maakony a vakohani vaniini na velosha mavavaso, nawo vashemmbutyaa uvingo nandewaawa.
40020019	Mmbo vashenrambikyaa maakony a vandu va masanga, nandeteendwa na ikapwa na ngova na ikapyo nsalabeny, na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu asherukaany.”
40020020	Nalyo maye wa vana va Sebedayo kasha na yoo akai, aryani na vana valya vakwe vavii, kamoolokya si akundye intereva kindo.
40020021	Nawe kammbia, “A ekyo kwakunda nkyokyi?” Kammbia, “Ammba vana yeva vakwa vee vavii vavandami neewe efo umangyi ny lwafo, umwi nakae uvari lwafo usha, na ungyi uvari lwafo umuso.”
40020022	Na Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Mmwiishi nta ekyo mwatereva shaasa kyikai-fo! A ndesa mushiidimaa ina upata lwakwa shiifo shinaa?” Vakammbia, “Lukwiidimmya-da!”
40020023	Nawe kavavia, “Ina upata lwakwa mushenaa-da. Indi iniinga vandu ando eekaa yoo uvari lwakwa usha ao umuso, ekyo nshi kindo kyakwa yeny-fo.” Vandu vaniingwa-u ni yewo valemmeekideesyo ni Nde-yaakwa.
40020024	Naasa valya ikumi elyi vaita indo, vakasua vana yewo va nka vee vavii.
40020025	Na Yesu kavavaanga na yoo akai, kaamba, “Mwiishi yewo veshillya vandu mmbo vavaafinya. Na yewo vaniini vawo vakavalammya.
40020026	Indi kunu nnang'ani yaany nshi indo kivaa-fo. Indi nndu kakunda ing'ana kunu nnang'ani yaany, we kuti nave nndundi waany.
40020027	Na nndu kakunda iva wa nrwe kunu nnang'ani yaany, we kuti nave ishinga lyany.
40020028	Niindo-da kivekai, Mwana yeto wa nndu nshi asheye irunndyo-fo, mmbo asheye we nave nndundi navevika na muu wakwe uve kiraso kyeewouwa veengyi.”
40020029	Na elyi veefo vashuukaa kulya Yeriko vandu vakallatya nsemu mwiingyi.
40020030	Nalyo akakava vandu vafu miso vavii vakee rembo yoo mbaambaa ya shia. Vakaita Yesu mmbo eefo eshiiraa-u vakaonisa ngyunyanga vakaamba, “Woi Nndumi lusarye! Yewe kukee mwana wa Davidi!”
40020031	Na vandu valya veefo mamwiingyi vakavakeemmya vamalallye. Nawo vakaengera ifua, vakaamba, “Woi Nndumi, Mwana wa Davidi lusarye.”
40020032	Na Yesu kairisha, kavavaanga kaamba, “A mmbo mukunndye shimutannyi inda?”
40020033	Vakaamba, “Woi mbee, ni miso yaa eru naambo alole!”
40020034	Naasa Yesu kavalyilya, kapaana miso alya awo, nalyo yeni vakalola. Vakallatya.
40021001	Naasa elyi Yesu na vakiloshyony kyakwe veefo vashaafukyaa Yerusalemu vamfika kulya Betifage, alya ifumbuny lya miri itiri ndunda tikamwaa mafura, nalyo Yesu karuma-u vakiloshyony vavii.
40021002	Kavavia, “Endeny efo muriny usumani na yaa mukai. Mukamfika-fo llyo yeni mushekooyaa-fo nshungu wa kyika ukee mfingye ando uryani na ngashe ya vayo. Endeny muuporommwi, musheenngye.
40021003	Na kwakooya nndu amuvesa, mmbieny, ‘Ni Nndumi aukunndye, nalyo asheweekeyaa.’
40021004	Na kimaruma kikaenda indo ni kilya kikee kirere na kana ka nndu ulya mwaauya kisuku naambo kikooye iinukya-u kyeamba,
40021005	‘Endevieny muri wa Sion, akakato mangyi yafo eefo ashaa na kwafo akee mfoo, asaammyi mungo wa nshungu na ngashe ya vayo, ikee mwana wa kindo kyeenga mario.’ “
40021006	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakakweengya vakavetana indo, shaasa Yesu avavavasya.
40021007	Vakeende nshungu ulya na ngashe ya vayo. Vakawuya vakaala soori tawo ta uwe efo mungony wa vayo. Vakansaamisa-u.
40021008	Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-u vaifo mamwiingyi, veengyi vakakuuta soori tawo ta uwe. Vakaala efo shia. Na valya maata vakandemanya maramba a miriny, vakaveala efo shia.
40021009	Na valya vaifo mamwiingyi, valya vaira mbee vakasanga na valya valatya efo numa, vekapa ukoru veshaambaa, “Hosiana yewe kukee mwana wa Davidi! Kundearafumwa yeu asha arumwa ni Nndumi! Hosiana efo kukee uwe ya findo fyoose!”
40021010	Na elyi amaanga na kulya Yerusalemu vandu va muri woose vakasavaa, vakaamba, “A nndu yeu ni vi?”
40021011	Na mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukaallwa, “Mmbwe Yesu, we nkisuku wa Nasareti ya kulya Galilaya.”
40021012	Naasa Yesu kaanga neefo mmba ya Iruva, kaanta-fo woose valya vekummbyaa-fo na yuurya-fo findo. Kafullwa mesa ta valya veshaalashaa fesa na fitima fya valya veekumbaa mbeta.
40021013	Kavavia, “Mmbo kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Mmba yakwa mmbo ivaangwaa mmba yeeterevya,’ lyo yeni mukayaallwa mbanga ya veala shia.”
40021014	Nalyo kasheywa ni vandu vafu miso na yewo vakee miketekete ekee alya poo ya mmba ya Iruva, nawe kavakira woose.
40021015	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini na vaarya va fitabu elyi valollya efyo atana filandelollyo lyingyi, na vana vekapaa ukoru efo mmba ya Iruva vashaambaa, “Hosiana yewe mwana wa Davidi, nalyo vakasswa.”
40021016	Vakammbia, “Kwiitye-ndi ndesa vakeamba? Indi Yesu kavavia, ‘Ee-da!’ A mmbo mulasommyi kilya kikee kyaambe, ‘Ni efo kaniny ka vakoku, na yewo vashoonga nng'u kukudeesye nnduma wafo?’ “ "
40021017	Nalyo kavara-u kaenda kipoo auka kulya muriny. Kafika kulya Betania, kandelala-fo.
40021018	Na elyi lya ndesi ngama arie shia yeewuya na kulya muriny katirwa nshaa.
40021019	Kalollya nkuu umwi yoo mbai ya shia. Kandeulola, nalakooye-u nta kindo kuuta maru meni. Nawe kauvia, " “Yewe kulakivike-se ndunda-fo na kufike llung'anu.” Na nkuu ulya nalyo yeni ukariika.
40021020	Naasa yewo vakiloshyony valollya kive indo, vakasongololo. A kyava inda elyi nkuu yeu wariika indo na lyimwi nsi?
40021021	Na Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Kwakooya mutiri kikusiryo, nta mulatirwa nnyinyira, nshi ekyo kya nkuu mushekitanaa-da-fo.’ Naakwa mwavia ifumbu yelyi, ‘Iluka yaa kukai kundekweera efo yeeveny, mmbo kisheutikaa-da.’
40021022	Na wo findo mwamfifuuya Iruva yoo ando mwaterevya mukusirye nawe mmbo mushefiwaryaa.”
40021023	Naasa elyi vamfika efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, eefo aloshaa, kasheywa ni Vakohani vaniini na masiingo a vandu, vakaamba, “A mmbo kutiri mumu wa ngata ingai elyi kwatana findo sha efyo? Na yeto akuniinga mumu yeto ni vi?”
40021024	Na Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “A neeny shimuvese mbony imwi, mukanshivia neeny shimuvie kya mumu yeto shatana nato findo efyo mmbwa ngata ingai.”
40021025	“A ubatiso lulya lwa Yohane luukye kwi ndesa? Ni efo iruveeu ao ni kunu vanduny? Naasa vakarera-rera kikwawo veni.” Vakaamba,
40021026	“Kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa efo iruveeu, mmbo asheluviaa, kikavakyi-se mulakunde ikusirya na Yohane?’ Indi kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa kunu vanduny, ekakato nkuka yeto wa vandu mmbo walweerese mashika mmbo valollye Yohane ni nkisuku.’ “
40021027	Naasa vakaallwa Yesu vakammbia, “Yese llwiishi-fo.” Nawe kavavia, “Nta yeny nshikimuviaa kya mumu yeto ntanaa nato efyo mmbwa ngata ingai-fo.”
40021028	“Mwakusara inda?” Kweefo nndu etiri vana vavii. Kaenda kwa ulya wa mbee kaamba, “Mwana-akwa, inu enda kunderunda efo nndeny wa misabibu.”
40021029	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nshikunndye-fo. Elyi numa kakuria, keenda.”
40021030	Naasa keenda kwa ulya wa kavii, kavemmbia kiwo-da. Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Nkisha mbee! Lyo nalaende.
40021031	A vandu yewo vavii nndu aletana ekyo kisenyi ndeye ni ungau ndesa?” Vakaamba, “Ni ulya wa mbee-te!” Yesu kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Vandu vadedemi na vaka va shia mmbo vakeemusongoya yaanga efo umangyi ny lwa Iruva.’
40021032	Mashika llya Yohane Mwiibatisa alesha na kunu kwany aira shia ya usumanu, neeni nta mulakunde inkusirya. Indi vadedemi wo sanda na vaka va shia mmbo valekunda inkusirya. Na yeni mukalollya kive indo, nta elyi numa mulakurie mukunde inkusirya.”
40021033	Kyevearannyiny kyaaso kingyi, “Kweefo nndu muni kyeny aleronga nnda wakwe wa misabibu. Kauringitya na uvare. Kasuma-u ando eekammya misabibu. Katannya-fo nnara weeringa. Kaara-fo varemi. Kaenda kyaaro.
40021034	Naasa elyi kwamfika kyeeri kya yaaya ndunda karuma mashinga akwe kulya kwa varemi valya vandewarya waavi yelo lwakwe lwa ndunda.
40021035	Naasa varemi valya vakatira mashinga akwe. Ulya umwi vakambondora, ulya ungyi vakammbwaa, ulya ungyi vakankapa na mawe.
40021036	Kawuya karuma mashinga engyi meengyi mmwasi ya valya va mbee, nawo vakavevatannya indo-da.
40021037	Elyi lyefurummya kavarumya mwana wakwe, kaamba, ‘Ni mwana wakwa muni, mmbwe vashenreremyaa!’
40021038	Naasa elyi varemi valya valollya mwana ulya ashe vakarera kikwawo, vakaamba, ‘Akakau muya ding'u! Ndifony-te lummbwae, yese luve veni ding'u!’
40021039	Vakantira vakansomuta kipoo ya nnda ulya vakambwaa.
40021040	A mwaambany inda? Elyi muni nnda ulya wa misabibu ashaa, mmbo ashetanaa inda na varemi valya ndesa?
40021041	Vakammbia, ‘Vammba indo vakasha mmbo ashevarumataa, na nnda yeto wa misabibu naare-fo varemi vengyi, yewo vashenrwaayaa waavi lwakwe lwa ndunda elyi fyeeri fya vayo fyamfika.’ “
40021042	Yesu kavavia, “A mmbo mulandesomi kindo kikee kirere efo mareiyony kyeamba, ‘Iwe yelyo vetana mmba valelyimina, llyo lyilewuya iva iwe lya ndumbeny. Mmbo kileva indo kyuuka kwa Nndumi muni, kikava kindo kyeesongololo elyi lukilollye na miso eru.’
40021043	Elyi kikeeny indo neeny shamuvia, ‘Mmbo mwiikaa musokwa umangyi lwa Iruva lumuuke lundeniingwa vandu va uruka yelo luvikaa ndunda tikwaani nalo.’ [
40021044	Na wo nndu awa iweny yelyo mmbo afika-fikaa. Na nndu kalyiwoya mmbo lyishensaa-saa.]”
40021045	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini veefo na Vafarisayo elyi vamiita fyaaso efyo, vakamanya mmbo arera kikee nkyawo veni.
40021046	Vakasia mwaanya weentira, lyo vakairyaa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu, mashika to nyelyi wiirikye sheelyi Yesu ni nndu nkisuku.
40022001	Nalyo Yesu karera lyingyi esheraa fyaaso kavavia,
40022002	“Umangyi lwa Iruva mmbo lufwanani na nndu alealyikya mwana wakwe nka.
40022003	Naasa kanderuma mashinga akwe andevaanga valya vakee vaarye nrumi vakavaangyo walyi lulya. Nawo valakunde isha.
40022004	Kawuya karuma mashinga engyi, kavavia, ‘Endevieny valya vakee vaarye nrumi, shoonga takwa akati shantideesya. Shau takwa tanshishwa na nrasa takwa. Na findo fyoose fyandeesyo. Kusheyeny na walyiny.’
40022005	Vakamina vakakweengya kyawo, ulya umwi efo ireminy lyakwe, na ulya ungyi efo mbusheny yakwe.
40022006	Na valya vengyi vasaa-u, vakatira mashinga alya akwe, vakavaila, vakavawaa.
40022007	Nalyo mangyi ilya karooywa nngoo, karika vasikari vakwe, vakamamita vawai valya neekora muri ulya wawo.
40022008	Nalyo kavia mashinga alya akwe, ‘Kya walyi lwemmba, lyo valya vekee vaarye nrumi mbalekisumanya-u-fo.
40022009	Naasa kwiipoony mundefika efo shieny eto niini, na wo vandu mwambakooya-fo muvavaange vashe walyiny!’
40022010	Nalyo mashinga alya akakwiipoo, vakafika efo shieny eto. Na wo vandu valevakooya, vakavasanda woose, na ulya nkasha, na ulya nsha. Na efo walyiny kukaishwa vandu veny.”
40022011	“Naasa mangyi kasha nau ishesengera veny valya. Kakooya-fo umwi nalaree soori ya walyiny.
40022012	Kammbia, ‘Mbuya-akwa, a niinda kwasha na kunu, kularee nta soori ya walyiny?’ Nawe kafulukywa deny.
40022013	Nalyo mangyi kavia valya vefurukannya-u, ‘Mfingeny marende na maako, mundemweera efo ireeminy lyiwoye efo poo. Mfo kundo kushekaa kiiyo na irafunya mayoo.’ “
40022014	Kimmba veevaangwa mmbeengyi na valya vasauwe vakaangwa.
40022015	Nalyo Vafarisayo vakanderuvya shila, vandereiya Yesu na marero.
40022016	Vakanrummya vakiloshyony kyawo varyani na vandu vatiri mbuya na Herode, vakaamba, “Ale llori! Lwiishi mmbo kukee nndu mwiirera fya dede na shia ya Iruva kwaveifunda kya dede, kulalolaa nta fisangu fya vandu.
40022017	Naasany luvie mmbo kukusarye inda? A ndesa yuutya Kaisari usanu ni kindo kisumani ao ode?”
40022018	Na Yesu kamanya uravi lwawo, kaamba, “A kimaruma mukasha isheesa nkyokyi yeni vandu vakunang'ari?
40022019	Keshooreny fesa ya usanu-te!” Vakamweenngye.
40022020	Nawe kavavesa, “A ufwanu elo lwiiyo llwa vi na kireiyo ekyo?”
40022021	Vakarouwa, “Ni fya Kaisari.” Nawe kavavia, “Naasa, niingyeny Kaisari efyo fikwaani na Kaisari. Na efyo fikwaani na Iruva muvefiniinga Iruva.” "
40022022	Naasa vekiita indo, vakasongololo, vakanra-u vakakweengya kyawo.
40022023	Naasa nkonu ulya mweni, kasheywa Vasadukayo, mmbo vandu veshaambaa nkwiifo iruka lya vafu-fo. Vakammbesa,
40022024	" “Ale llori, Mose mmbo aambaye, ‘Nndu kafwa nalareeye-u mwana, naasa nka yeto wakwe, noorwa-se mmwanamaye nave nka wakwe, nawonisye mwanamaye ngyeeri.
40022025	Naasa kunu kweru kweefo vanavanka mfungare. Ulya wa mbee kaalyika kafwa, nalareeye-u mwana. Kareeya mwanamaye nka ulya wakwe.
40022026	Na ulya wa kavii kiwo, na ulya wa kararu kiwo-da, tana vasia woose mfungare.
40022027	Na elyi lya numa ya woose nka ulya nawe kafwa.
40022028	A elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony a vafu, nka yeto ashevaany wa ungau ndesa? Kimmba vemmoora woose?’ “
40022029	Naasa Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Mmbo mwarekwa deny, mashika elyi mulaishi nta mareiyo nta finya ya Iruva.
40022030	Mashika elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony a vafu, mmbakyaalyika-se-fo nta yaalyikwa-fo. Mmbo vashevaa sha vasu va iruveeu.
40022031	Na kya iruka lya vafu a mmbo mulandesomi ekyo Iruva amuviiye kaamba,
40022032	‘Yeny ni Iruva, wa Abrahamu na Iruva wa Isaki na Iruva wa Yakobo. Naasany, Iruva nshi akee wa vafu-fo, mmbo akee wa vamuu.’ “ "
40022033	Kyasia vandu valya vakuummbye-u elyi vamiita indo vakaising'ang'a kya kiloshyo kyakwe.
40022034	Naasa elyi Vafarisayo vamiita amfindikira kana ka Vasadukayo, nawo vakandekuummbya ando amwi.
40022035	Na umwi waawo akufundye mavavaso kasha immbesa amweesaa,
40022036	kaamba, " “Ale llori! A efo mavavasony ivavaso lyiifo lyikee iniini lyikailanya engyi llyingalyi?”
40022037	Nawe kammbia, “Mmbo kushekundaa Nndumi Iruva wafo kunkunde na ngoo imwi nsi, na nrima umwi nsi, na makusaro amwi nsi.
40022038	Llyo ivavaso iniini lyisongoye engyi.
40022039	Lya kavii lyiifo lyifwanani nalyo, ‘Mmbo kushekundaa nndu uroo shaasa kukukunndye kumuni.’
40022040	Na mavavaso yoo avii nng'u arie mavavaso engyi moose na vakisuku.”
40022041	Naasa elyi Vafarisayo vakuummbye-fo indo, Yesu kavavesa,
40022042	Kaamba, “A ni inda mukusarye kya Kristo? Akee mwana wa vi?” Vakaamba, “Ni wa Davidi-te!”
40022043	Nawe kavavia, “A kikavaany inda elyi Davidi ammbaanga ni Nndumi?” Mmbo aambaye afundwa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva kaamba,
40022044	“Nndumi alevia Nndumi wakwa, ‘Kaa rembo yoo woko lwakwa usha, shitani shaara vakiduva vafo si, kuvaekerye marende afo.’ “
40022045	“Naasa elyi Davidi ammbaanngye ni Nndumi, ni inda ava mwana wakwe?”
40022046	Nalyo kulawonike-fo nndu aidima imwaallwa, nta nndu nalakarye immbesa kindo uka nkonu ulya.
40023001	Nalyo Yesu karera na ironda lilya lya vandu na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe, kaamba,
40023002	“Velosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mmbo velosha mavavaso a Mose.
40023003	Naasa fyoose vamuvia mufitire muvefiringa. Indi kya mashora awo nta mulatani shawo. Mmbo varera valatani.
40023004	Nawo vakava vefinga mario maroo, vakaekerya vandu meeveny awo. Indi wo veni nta valakunde yaasembera na nni.
40023005	Na mashora awo moose vakaatana vakooye ilolwa mmbandu. Mashika fingova fyawo varee elyi vatereva vakafilambara, na mise ya soori tawo ta uwe vakaing'anisa.
40023006	Nawo vakasia marembo a mbee ando a shoongeny, na fitima fisongoru efo mmba teeterevya.
40023007	Na fiidikiro fya vandu efo singireny, na ivaangwa valori mmbandu.
40023008	Indi yeni nta mulavaangwa valori mashika llori yeto waany aifo ni umwi, neeni moose mukainana.
40023009	Nta mulavaange nndu ni Nde waany, kunu urukeny, Mashika Nde waany aifo ni umwi, ni yeto wa efo iruveeu.
40023010	Nta mulavaangwa vasongoru, mashika nsongoru waany aifo ni umwi-da, we Kristo.
40023011	Indi yeto akee nniini waany, we kuti nave nndundi waany.
40023012	Indi yeto mwiikung'anisa we muni mmbo akaa nanyiiswa. Na yeto mwiikunyiisa we muni akaa nang'aniswa.”
40023013	“Indi yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwaraya mwaango wa iruveeu mukeema vandu yaanga-fo. Shamashika nta yeni muveni mmushaangaa-fo-fo, nta yewo vakunndye yaanga mulavalekeye vakaanga-fo.” [
40023014	“Nyira veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Shamashika elyi mwava veemira mmba ta vaka va ding'u mukawuya itereva Iruva na marero maasha kikee kya ukunang'ari. Kimmba ni indo mmbo musheonisaa uvingo uniini nnu.”]
40023015	“Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwasengetya yeeve yeyo niini na uruka uumu naambo mukooye-fo nndu amulatyaa umwi. Na kwakooya ammba nndu amulatye mukawuya imwaallwa nndu wa gehena ngota yeni kavii.”
40023016	“Yeni vasongoru vafu miso, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwaambaye, ‘Nndu kalya mboo na mmba ya Iruva, nkitiri mwaandu-fo. Indi nndu kalya mboo na saabu yeyo ya efo mmba ya Iruva, we allyamara.’
40023017	Mmbo mukee vakunang'ari mukaveva vafu miso. A kiniini ni kingakyi? Ni saabu yeyo ao ni mmba yeyo ya Iruva iniinngye saabu yeyo ikava kindo kyeele?
40023018	Mukaveamba-se, ‘Nndu kalya mboo na ando eekorya firaso nkitiri mwaandu-fo. Indi nndu kalya mboo na kiraso ekyo kikee kyeekere-u, we allyamara.’
40023019	Mmbo mwava vandu vafu miso. A kiniini ya kingyi n kingakyi? Ni kiraso ekyo ao ni ando eekerya firaso anniinngye kiraso ekyo kikava kindo kyeele?
40023020	Naasany, yeto alya mboo na ando eekorya firaso, mmbo alya mmbo nang'u kasanda na fyoose fikee fyeekere-u.
40023021	Na yeto alya mboo na mmba ya Iruva, mmbo alya nayo mboo kasanda na yeto akaa-fo.
40023022	Na yeto alya mboo na iruveeu, mmbo alya mboo na kitima kya Iruva kasanda na yeto akeeu rembo.”
40023023	“Yeni veelosha mavavasyo na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwavika firaso fya findo efyo fyeefwamisa na fyeerolisa na fyeelonga shoonga. Indi efo mavavasony findo fiiyo finiini fyo mukawuya ifira, ni irummbwa fya songosiny na ilyillya vandu na kikusiryo, efyo mfyo fyeetana, nta efyo fingyi mulafire-fo.
40023024	Mukee vasongoru vafu miso! Mmbo mufifinaa mbu, mukawuya imira ngamula.
40023025	Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari, oshiny lwany! Mmbo mwasangya kikombe na kideeva kunu kipoo, na efo mmba fikaishwa fya usoki na uraami.
40023026	Yewe Mfarisayo mfu miso! Lava mbele isangya kikombe efo kimmba-te, na kunu kipoo kuveva kwaa.
40023027	Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari oshiny lwaanyi! Mmbo mufwanani na mbanga ta vafu tikee shaambe yeela, kunu kipoo tikalollyo mmbo tikee shisha, na efo kimmba tikaishwa maffwa a vafu na uravi lwa wo ngata.
40023028	Na yeni ni kiwo-da, kunu kipoo mmbo mulolywaa mukee va usumanu, indi efo kimmba mukava vandu vaishwe ukunang'ari na kiila.”
40023029	“Yeni veelosha mavavaso na Vafarisayo mukee vakunang'ari oshiny lwany! Mbanga yeto kundo vakisuku vakee varike mmbo mwatannya-u mmba, na efo kundo valya va usumanu vakee vaare mukaatokopa.
40023030	Mukaamba, ‘Kwee ni yese lweefo meendi alya a vakuu veru, yese llweeshaakanaa nawo iirita samu ya vakisuku valya-fo.’
40023031	Kikavaany mwavika ukureeki lweekuvinga muveni, mukamanyika mmbo mukee vana va valya valewaa vakisuku valya.
40023032	Naasa neeni keveishuryeny-fo ekyo kilerewa kyenga ni vakuu valya vany!
40023033	Yeni shoka mukee fivana fya mashoka, a ni inda mushaashukaa uvingo lwa Gehena?
40023034	Kimmba ni indo, lleny-te, shiifo shimurummyaa veawuya fisuku na vandu vaishi reu na veelosha mavavaso. Na yeni yewo maata mushevawaa, neevakapya nsalabeny, na yewo maata mushevakapaa na ngova efo mmba tany teeterevya, muvevarishisa muri ku muri.
40023035	Naambo mukooye isheywa ni samu ya vandu va usumanu shoose ipookya samu ya nndu ulya wa usumanu Abeli, fika samu ya Sakaria we mwana wa Barakia, yeto mulemmbwaiya efo nnang'ani kavii ya mmba ya Iruva na ando eekorya firaso.
40023036	Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Efyo fyoose mmbo fishewoyaa irika elyi lyiiyo.’ “
40023037	“Woi Yerusalemu! Woi Yerusalemu! Mwiiwaa veawuya fisuku, na yewo kwarummywa kwaveveera mawe. Ni keengyi na keengyi sheekunndye yuummbya fivana fyafo, sheelyi nguku yawummbya fivana fya vayo ikasikya na maaru. Na yeni mulakunde!
40023038	Llen-te mwiikaa mureeywa mmba yei yeanga ive irama.
40023039	Mmbo shamuviany, ‘Mmukaa mushilollye-se kipookya ulaalu-fo,’ na kutani mwaamba, ‘Kundearafumwa yeu asha na irina lya Nndumi!’ “
40024001	Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo auka efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, arie shia, valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakakuumbya yoo akai vamoore mmba ta mwiindye.
40024002	Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Mulollye yoo moose-ndi? Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Kunu nkwiikaa kurewa-u iwe lyakweekerya iwe uroye lyire lyilasambuwa-fo.’ “
40024003	Naasa elyi ameenda ikaa rembo alya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura, valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakashekuummbya yoo akai, vakee kyaanya kyawo, vakaamba, “Luvie-te meendi kwiikaa kuutike indo, na wende lweemanya yoo masheyony afo na masiiyony a ulana yelu.”
40024004	Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Kwiiseny nndu nalamulembe!
40024005	Mashika veengyi vakaa vashe varee irina lyakwa veshaambaa, ‘Yeny mmbwe Kristo!’ Nawo vaevete veengyi.
40024006	Na kingyi-se mushekooyaa iita kya fira na fyuulaalu fya fira. Manyiny mure mulaereve! Mashika mmbo kikee kirummbwe kyeende indo. Indi yoo masiiyony a ulana nnyandefika-fo.
40024007	Mashika uruka lumwi lushekwiipoo lukape yelo lungyi, na umangyi lukape yelo lungyi. Kuvekaa-fo na shaa shiniini, na fidinasi kundo na kwiingyi.
40024008	Na efyo fyoose mfyo mapookyony a fyuure efyo fyeefurumya.
40024009	Nalyo llyo vashemurambikyaa-fo mulyisywaa ukiva na iwaawa. Na yeni mushevaa veesuwa mmbandu woose va masanga kimaruma kya irina lyakwa.
40024010	Nalyo veengyi vashewonisaa nsindara na iriinngyana na isuvana wo veni na veni.
40024011	Na veawuya fisuku veengyi va wongo vavekwiipoo-fo vasheevetaa vengi.
40024012	Na elyi fya uravi fisheengerekaa indo nkyo kisheniingaa ukundi lwa veengyi lusheangwa.
40024013	Naasa yeto asisirya-u nafike yoo mafurummyony mmbwe ashekirwaa.
40024014	Na nrumi yeyo ya nsia ya mbony ta umangyi yo isheendaa yongoywa kunu ulaniny koose, vandu va masanga vawonise ukureekyi woose. Kikamfika yoo llyony kwamfika yoo masiiyony.”
40024015	“Naasa elyi meendi mushelollyaa uravi lwiilannyi kyeeso usutu lulya lweeallwa ando kweele irama lwansha nang'u lulya lukee waambe ni nkisuku ulya Danieli (na mwiisoma-u nakummbwe!)”
40024016	“Llyo yewo valele kunu Yudaya vanderishya mafumbu-u.
40024017	Na nndu akoyaa akee mmbeeu, nalaoloke-fo nandeipoo fya efo mmba kwakwe.
40024018	Na nndu akooyaa akee efo ireminy, nta nalainduke nawuye na numa nandeipoo soori yakwe ya yeerya.
40024019	Indi vaka yewo vakooyaa vakufingye fyeeri efyo na yewo vashootaa vana, oshiny lwawo!
40024020	Indi tereveny Iruva, kyeeri ekyo kyeerisha kilave ni kyeeri kya mbeo, nta nkonu wa Sabato!
40024021	Shamashika meendi yoo kushekaa-fo fyuure finiini. Nta uka elyo mapookyony a ulana fika ulaalu kulandekae-fo fing'ani indo-fo. Nta meendi a numa mfishekaa-fo finiini indo-fo.
40024022	Na fyeeri efyo kukooye kulaore fyeefiiswaa, nkweekiaa-fo nta nndu-fo. Indi kimaruma kya yewo vasauwe nkyo kisheniingaa fyeeri efyo fifiiswa.”
40024023	Na fyeeri efyo fikamfika, kwakooya nndu amuvia Kristo akakau yaa, ao, “Akakato efo, nta mulairikye-fo.
40024024	Shamashika kushekwiipoo Vakristo va wongo na veawuya fisuku va wongo, nawo vandeora vandu ngyende shiniini na findo filandelollyo lyingyi, na kukooye kyeevaa naakwa na yewo vasauwe verekaa.
40024025	Akakyo shalava imuvia.
40024026	Naasany, kwakooya vashemuviaa, ‘A ulya kulya kasa! Nta mulaende isaiya-fo! Akakato aovye efo firyeny nnang'ani ya mmba! Na yeni nta mulairikye!’
40024027	Mashika shaasa kimwii kimikaa kyuuka taari ya ngama kikatana kyafika taari ya nkwaany, na yoo masheyony a Mwana yeto wa nndu ni indo kisheendaa.
40024028	Na kundo kukee nnying'a na mamutony mfo kundo ashekuumbyaa.”
40024029	“Naasa fyuure efyo fikamiira llyo yeni mwi yeu ushaalukaa ireema, na mwiiri mmbusheendee-se sa yavayo-fo. Na nyinyiri tishoolokaa tyuuka efo iruveeu. Na finya yeto ta efo iruveeu tiverinyiswa.
40024030	Nalyo llyo wende lwa Mwana yeto wa nndu lusheonikaa efo iruveeu, na ngyufyari toose ta vandu va ulana tishekapaa kiiyo. Nato tishelollyaa Mwana yeto wa nndu ashaa ariwa mmafishi a nginiiu akee na wiitori uniini na itumbe.
40024031	Nawe asherumaa vasu vakwe, na mbembe tikapwa na finya. Nawo vandeummbya-u yewo vasauwe vakwe vavaute efo ndumbeny tilya iinya vepookaa marayony yoo a ngina vafite marayony yoo engyi.”
40024032	“Naasa efo nriny wa nkuu uten-fo wende lwekulosha. Iramba lya vayo lyikamfumbisa lyikaora maru, neeni mukamanya meelulyony amfika kufii.
40024033	Na kya findo efyo na kiwo-da. Mukammeefilollya fyoose, kevemanyiny, mmbo ansha kufii na yoo mwaangony.
40024034	Ni kya dede shamuvia, ‘Irika elyi nta llyishiraa kulaore findo efyo fyainukya fyoose-fo.
40024035	Efo iruveeu kwiikaa kurumake, na kunu ulaniny, kilarumakaa ni marero akwa.’ “
40024036	“Indi kya nkonu yeto mweni, na saa yeyo sheni, nkwiifo nndu aishi-fo, nta vasu va efo iruveeu, nta we Mwana-fo, kulaore ni Nde we muni.
40024037	Indi shaasa kyeekee fyeeri filya fya Noe, ni indo-da kisheendaa elyi kwamfika yoo masheyony a Mwana yeto wa nndu.
40024038	Mashika vandu valya veefo meendi alya kulaore yeeve ilya niini yansha, shaasa valeva veelya na ina na yaalyika, na yaalyikwa, vakatana vafika nkonu ulya Noe aleanga na efo isandukuny.
40024039	Nta valaipuye kindo, yeeve ilya niini ikatana yasha ikavakomba kombi. Na yoo masheyony a Mwana yeto wa nndu ni indo-da kisheendaa.
40024040	Nalyo llyo vandu vavii vakooyaa vakee ireminy, yeto umwi awarywaa na yeto ungyi narewa-u.
40024041	Vaka vavii vakooya veesaa iseweeny, yeto umwi ashewarywaa, na yeto ungyi narewa-u.”
40024042	“Naasany veny velala shoovi, kimmba mulaishi nkonu yeto Nndumi waany ashaa nato ni ungau.
40024043	Indi kindo kimwi mwiishi, ‘Kya muni kyeny kukooye mmbo eeishi ni ikamba lya kio lyeeringa lyingalyi inyinyi lyishaa, mmbo elalaa shoovi, nnyeraa mmba yakwe isumwa-fo.’
40024044	Kimmba ni indo neeni veny vandu vakudeesye, mashika Mwana yeto wa nndu asheshaa kyeeri mulakumbuye.”
40024045	“Naasany ishinga lyiiyo lyitiri usaari na urango usha llyingalyiny? Nndumi wakwe kammbika nniini wa mmba yakwe nandeavya mashinga wooroye shoonga kyeeri kisumani.
40024046	Na ishinga elyo elyi nndumi wakwe ashaa, nakooye eetanaa indo, ngoma lyo.
40024047	Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Mmbo ashemmbikaa nniini wa findo fyakwe fyoose.’
40024048	Indi ishinga elyo ikasha, kwakooya lyaamba efo nriminy: Nndumi wakwa nnashaa uviny-fo.
40024049	Nalyo lyikapooka ikapa mashinga wooroye nawe kasanga na veenangwa kalya na ina nawo.
40024050	Naasa nndumi ulya wa ishinga elyo mmbo asheshaa kyeeri lyilaifo lyimmbereyaa na saa lyilaishi.
40024051	Nawe ashelyirummbwaa tapa nandelyisanda ando amwi na yewo vakunang'ari, kive nkyo waavi lwakwe. Nalyo kukae-fo ikapa kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.”
40025001	“Nalyo llyo umangyi lwa iruveeu lushekaa-fo lufwanani na vana va kyeny ikumi valeipoo taa tawo, vakauka kyeny, vandeammbya muni walyi.
40025002	Nawo valya varaanu varung'ani, na valya varaanu varango.
40025003	Naasa valya varung'ani vakaipoo taa tawo valakiipoo mafura.
40025004	Na valya varango vakaipoo mafura na fiiya fyawo ando amwi na taa tawo.
40025005	Naasa muni walyi kakyeeywa. Vakarengeya woose vakalala rony.
40025006	Naasa elyi kio nnang'ani kavii kukaitiwa kyoorongye, ‘Akakato muni walyi! Kwiipoony-te mundemwaammbya!’
40025007	Naasa vana valya va kyeny vakakwiipoo woose vakasongosia taa tilya tawo.
40025008	Valya varung'ani vakavia valya varango, ‘Mafura yoo any lwaavyeny-ng'u kidu! Mashika taa teru tiifo tirumikaa.’
40025009	Valya varango vakarouwa vakaamba, ‘Ode, nnyalumaa yese neeni-fo. Nkisha mweende kwa yewo veekumba, mundekuurya-fo any muveni!’
40025010	Naasa varie shia yeenda, muni walyi kasha. Na valya vakooya vekudeesye vakaenda nawe efo walyiny. Mwaango ukaraywa.
40025011	Elyi numa vana valya va kyeny vengyi vakasha nau, vakaamba, ‘Woi Nndumi! Woi Nndumi! Luruye mmba!’
40025012	Nawe kaamba, ‘Nkya dede shamuvia, nshimwiishi yeni-fo.’
40025013	Kimmba ni indo, veny velala shoovi shamashika elyi mulaishi nta nkonu yeto na saa yeyo.”
40025014	“Mmbo kyava sheelyi nndu eekunndye yeenda kyaaro, kapooka ivaanga mashinga akwe muni. Kavaarya masaa akwe.
40025015	Ulya umwi kaniinngya talanta isaanu, na ungyi ivii, na ungyi imwi. Wo nndu kanniinngya kisumani na mwiina wa wiidimi lwakwe. Naasany kaipoo kyaaro.
40025016	Ameenda, nalyo yeni ulya wa talanta isaanu katiipoo, kandekapa nato mbusha. Kalyima-u talanta tingyi isaanu.
40025017	Na ulya wa talanta ivii kavetana kiwo. Kauta-u mbusha ya tingyi ivii.
40025018	Naasa ulya wa talanta imwi kaiipoo. Kandeisummya si. Kasuruma-fo talanta ilya ya nndumi wakwe.
40025019	Naasa kwamiira-u kyeeri kyaasha, nalyo nndumi ulya wa mashinga alya kasha. Kakundany vamweekennyi.
40025020	Ulya alewarya talanta tilya isaanu, kasha nau, kaende talanta isaanu tingyi. Kaamba, ‘Nndumi talanta kuleshyaarya ni isaanu. Akati talanta isaanu tingyi shilelyima-u.’
40025021	Nndumi ulya wakwe kammbia, ‘Aika ishinga isha kwaveva nsaari. Kwekee mwiikallya findo fyaangu kikee kya usaari. Nkuvikaany mwiikallya findo fiingyi. Anga na efo nsieny wa nndumi wafo!’ “
40025022	Na ulya alewarya talanta tilya ivii kavesha nau. Kaamba, “Nndumi talanta kuleshyaarya ni ivii. Akati talanta tingyi ivii shilelyima-u.”
40025023	Nndumi ulya wakwe kammbia, “Aika ishinga isha kwaveva nsaari! Kwekee mwiikallya findo fyaangu kikee kya usaari. Nkuvikaany mwiikallya findo fiingyi. Anga na efo nsieny wa nndumi wafo.”
40025024	Naasa ulya alewarya talanta ilya imwi kavesha nau. Kaamba, “Nndumi shilekumanya mmbo kukee nndu muumu, mmbo kwailula ando kulasuye mbeu, kwavesanyirya ando kulanyanyatye.
40025025	Neeny shairyaa, shandesummya talanta ilya yafo efo si.”
40025026	Naasa nndumi ulya wakwe kaallwa kammbia, “Yewe ishinga yeesi kwaveva mpeere!
40025027	Kuleshimanya-sho, mmbo shailula ando shilasuye mbeu, shavesanyirya ando shilanyanyatye? Kyasiany yewe nshi kyeekusumannyi indeera talanta ilya yakwa efo kwa vandu vekapa mbusha va fesa. Na yeny kwakooya shasha nsheviirywany efyo fyakwa ando amwi na ulyimi lwa vayo.
40025028	Naasa nsokeny talanta yeyo mundeniinngya yeto atiri talanta yeto ikumi.
40025029	Mashika wo nndu atiri findo mmbo asheengerywaa fiingyi katana aingifywa. Indi yeto nalatiri kindo, naakwa na kilya atiri mmbo akisokwaa.
40025030	Na ishinga elyo lya mweelu endelyeereny efo poo. Mfo kuvaa ikapa kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo.
40025031	Naasa elyi Mwana yeto wa nndu ashaa akee na itumbe lyakwe, aryani na vasu va Iruva woose, llyo ashekaa rembo yoo kitiminy kyakwe kya itumbe.
40025032	Nalyo efo kisanguny kyakwe kushesanyiryou vandu va masanga moose. Nawe ashevarauwaa navaave kavii, shaasa nndu mwiisi arauwa moonri na mburu.
40025033	Na moonri asheavikaa yoo woko lwakwe usha, na mburu yeto tivikwaa yoo woko lwakwe umuso.
40025034	Nalyo mangyi asheviaa valya va efo wokony lwakwe usha, ‘Kusheyeny na yaa shikai, mukee vandu va Nde-yaakwa avakunndye mbora! Endekeeny efo umangyi ny, mfo ding'uny yeanga, mulesurummywa uka mapookyony a ulana.
40025035	Shamashika shetirwa nshaa mukashiniinga shoonga. Shetirwa nnyura mukashirita. Shekee muny mukashiwarya efo kyeny kwany.
40025036	Shekuuywa mukashivika soori. Shelwee mukashisengera. Shekee kifingyony mukasha ishisaiya.’
40025037	Nalyo vandu yewo va usumanu vashemwaallwa, ‘Nndumi a niindii lulelollya kutirwa nshaa lukakuniinga shoonga? Ao kutirwa nnyura neese lukakurita?
40025038	A ni indii lulekulollya kukee muny, neese lukakuwarya efo kyeny kweru? Ao kukuuywa neese lukakuvika soori?
40025039	Ao ni indii lulekulollya kulwee ao kukee mfinge, neese lukasha ikusaiya?’
40025040	Nalyo mangyi ashevarouwaa, ‘Nkya dede shamuvia, wo kindo muletannya vanavama wakwa yewo vafwafwa ya woose, naakwa ni ulya umwi nsi, ni yeny muleshitannya.’
40025041	Nalyo asheviaa na yewo va wokony lwakwe umuso naambe, ‘Ukeny yaa shikai mukee vandu vakee vadenge, mundefika efo murony ularumikaa, ulesurummyo Satana na vasu vakwe.
40025042	Shamashika shetirwa nshaa, nta mulashiniinge shoonga. Shetirwa nnyura, nta mulashirite.
40025043	Shekee muny nta mulashiwarye efo kyeny kwany. Shekuuywa nta mulashivike soori. Shelwee, shekee mfinge, nta mulashe ishisaiya.’
40025044	Nawo vasheverouwaa kiwo, ‘Nndumi, a niindii lulekulollya kutirwa nshaa, ao nyura, ao kukee muny, ao kukuuywa, ao kulwee, ao kukee kifingyony, neese lukara lulakufurukannya?’
40025045	Nalyo ashevarouwaa, ‘Nkya dede shamuvia, Wo kindo mulera mulatannya yewo vafwafwa ya woose, naakwa ni ulya umwi tupu, mmbwe yeny mulera mulashitannya.’
40025046	Nawo vasheendaa vandelyiswa ukiva llung'anu, na yewo va usumanu wo vandekaa na muu wa llung'anu.”
40026001	Kyikava elyi Yesu ammarisya marero alya moose, nalyo kavia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe,
40026002	“Mwamanya mmbo kushiraa-u mikonu ivii, kufike yeto wa Pasaka. Llyo Mwana yeto wa nndu ashendaa irambikyo-fo nandekapyo nsalabeny.”
40026003	Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vakakuumbya ando amwi na masiingo a vandu kulya mmba ikee shaakare ya nkohani ulya nniini avaangwaa ni Kayafa.
40026004	Vakafisha shila shaasa vashetiraa Yesu na ntambo vammbwae.
40026005	Naasa vakaamba, “Nkyivaa elyi lya nkonu yeto nniini-fo. Mmbo kusheshaa mwaaluko-luko wa vandu.”
40026006	Naasa Yesu akee kulya Betania, kulya mmba kwa Simon, yeto etirwa ni ivave,
40026007	kasheywa ni nndu nka arie kipete kitiri mafura eekwaamba a wuuru uniini. Kalletya efo nrueny akee rembo eelyaa shoonga.
40026008	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakalolya, vakasswa. Vakaamba, “Nkyiki elyi kindo ekyo kyareka indo?
40026009	Kindo ekyi mmbo kyeevaa ikumba wuuru uniini kindeavyo vakyiva.”
40026010	Naasa Yesu kamanya kavavia, “A ekyo mwaatarya nka yeu nkyoki? Mmbo ashitannya ekyo kisha!
40026011	Shamashika vandu vakyiva mmbo mukee nawo kyeeri kyoose. Indi yeny mmukee neeny kyeeri kyoose-fo!
40026012	Nawe elyi aletya mwiili wakwa mafura yoo, mmbo atana indo kya yuudesya underikwa.
40026013	Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Kundo kwamoongoywa nrumi yeyo ya nsia kunu ulaniny koose, na ekyo kyakwe atana mmbo kishekumbuwaa.’ “
40026014	Nalyo ulya umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii avaangwaa ni Yuda Iskariote, kandefika kulya kwa vakohani vaniini.
40026015	Kaamba, “Kindo musheshiniingaa nkyokyi neeny shindenrambikya maakony any?” " Nawo vakamweesya misasarwe ya fesa makumi araru.
40026016	Nalyo nng'u alepookya isia mwaanya nsha weenrambikya efo maakony awo.
40026017	Naasa elyi lya nkonu wa mbee weelyiwa mikate ilatiri ntarang'o, valya vakiloshyony vakakuumbya yoo Yesu akai, vakaamba, " “A kundo kukundye lundesongosya eelyiya Pasaka nkwi?”
40026018	Nawe kaamba, “Endeny efo muriny kwa ng'anya mundemmbia, ‘Llori akuvia-le vai, Kyeeri kyakwa kyamfika kufii. Ni efo kwafo shikundye yuutya-fo nndumwa yeu wa Pasaka, amwi na vakiloshyony kyakwa.’ “
40026019	Na valya vakiloshyony vakandetana indo-da, shaasa Yesu avavasya. Vakandesongosya Pasaka ilya.
40026020	Naasa elyi kwamfika nkwaany, kasha nau ishekaa-fo rembo nalye shoonga aryani na valya vakiloshyony ikumi na vavii.
40026021	Veefo valyaa kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Nnang'ani yaany umwi waany asheshiriingyaa.’
40026022	Nawo vakasokywa mfyoova finiini. Vakapooka immbia kwi umwi umwi, ‘A ndesa ni yeny Nndumi?’
40026023	Nawe kavavia, ‘Yeto loolota nawe maako marama efo kideeveny mmbwe asheshiriingyaa.
40026024	Kya Mwana yeto wa nndu yeenda mmbo asheendaa shaasa kyikee kireiye kyakwe. Indi nndu yeto Mwana wa nndu asheriinngyaa mmbwe, oshiny lwakwe!’ Nndu yeto kyakwe mmbo kyekee kisha kwee eraa nalairwa!
40026025	Naasa Yuda yeto mwiinndiinngya kaamba, ‘A ndesa ni yeny-ro llori?’ Nawe kammbia, ‘Kwankyaamba kumuni!’ “
40026026	Naasa elyi veefo valyaa Yesu kaipoo nkate. Kaarafuma Iruva. Kaufisha-fisha fyenga. Kaavya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe kaamba, “Nngeny, lyeny! Yeu ni mwiili wakwa.”
40026027	Kaveipoo na upata kaana Iruva. Kavaniingya kaamba, “Niny-fo moose!”
40026028	Yei ni samu yakwa yeevika nkundanu, iifoo ishiiritwaa kimaruma kya vandu veengyi vakooye ifwaayo ngyulyamari.
40026029	Indi yeny shamuviany, “Kyipookya ulaalu nshishekinaa-se ekyo kyavikwa ni nsabibu-fo, na shifike nkonu yeto shana lya wuiya ando amwi neeni efo umangyi ny lwa Nde-yaakwa.”
40026030	Naasa elyi vamiimba fiimbo vakakwiipoo. Vakaenda kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura.
40026031	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Kio yekyi kyeni moose mushesukyoo ni yeny! Kimmba kyikee kyireiye kyeamba, ‘Nshekapaa mwiisi na ironda lya mburu lyindenyanyaka.’
40026032	Indi elyi numa shammaa iruka nshemusongoyaa indefika kulya Galilaya.
40026033	Petro kaallwa kaamba, ‘Naakwa woose vasukyo ni yewe, yeny nta nshishesukyoo-fo.’
40026034	Yesu kammbia, ‘Nkya dede shakuvia, kio yekyi kyeni kulaore nguku yankapa kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu.’
40026035	Petro kammbia, ‘Naakwa shalollya kuti shifwe shisandwa neewe, nshishekukanaa-fo. Na valya vakiloshyony vengyi vakaveamba indo woose.’ “
40026036	Nalyo Yesu keenda aryani nawo. Kafika ando ukee nnda uvaangwaa Getsemane. Kavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Kaeny yaa sheende alya indeterevyau Iruva.”
40026037	Kakamara Petro na vana valya va Sebedayo vavii. Kapooka isokyo mfyoova na yeereve.
40026038	Nalyo kavavia, “Nrima wakwa wiifo usokywaa mfyoova deny, wafika kufii na ifwa. Kaeny yaa mulale shoovi neeny.”
40026039	Kaenda mbee kinnywa. Kawa si na kisangu katereva Iruva kaamba, “Woi Nde, kwakooya kikuviiyaa, upata yelu lushiire shire shilaluna! Indi kilave shaasa shikundye yeny-fo, kiveva shaasa kukunndye yewe!”
40026040	Naasa kasha na alya vakiloshyony vakai, kakooya valele rony. Kavia Petro, “A niinda, nta mulashiidimaa ilala shoovi neeny ando a saa imwi nsi?
40026041	Kyelaleny shoovi mwiterevaa mulakooye iira kyeesyony! Nrima to ulangye indi mwiili ukava mfwafwa.”
40026042	Kaenda lyingyi lya kavii, kandetereva. Kaamba, “Woi Nde-yaakwa, kwakooya kivaa upata yelu lushiire shire shilaluna, lyo kikuviiyeny shaasa kwankunda!”
40026043	Kasha nang'u lyingyi, kakooya velele rony. Mashika miso awo akee marovye nrwe.
40026044	Naasa kavara-u, keenda lyingyi katereva lya kararu. Kaamba marero alya meni.
40026045	Nalyo kasha na yoo vakiloshyony vakwe vakai, kavavia, “A niindo mwalunga ilala na iimuya! Llen-te kyeeri kyamfika, na Mwana yeto wa nndu eefo anderambikywaa maakony a vandu valyamari.
40026046	Kwiipony-te, lweende. Akakato yeto mwiishiriingyaa amaafukya!”
40026047	Na elyi eefo areraa indo, Yuda kasha nang'u, akee umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii, aryani na nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu varie ngyusu na mariinga vauka kwa vakohani vaniini na masiingo a vandu.
40026048	Na nndiingyi yeu eevavikye kiring'isyo kavavia, “Nndu yeto nshemmimindaa mmbwe mushentiraa!”
40026049	Nalyo yeni kafika yoo Yesu akai, kaamba, “Shakwiidikira llori! Kammiminda.”
40026050	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Mbuya yakwa kyakweende na yaa nkyokyi?” Nalyo vakaserikya na yoo akai, vakaleesya Yesu maako vakantira.
40026051	Nalyo akakau umwi wa valya vavandami na Yesu kaorwa woko, kasommwa usu lwakwe, kamanya nalo ishinga lilya lya nkohani ulya nniini, kammaswa kuri.
40026052	Nalyo Yesu kammbia, “Viira usu efo kipony kya vayo. Kimmba yewo vamiipoo usu, ni usu lushevaretaa.
40026053	A mmbo shilashiidimaa ifuuya Nde-yaakwa, nawe nashirikye vasu va efo iruveeu maronda ikumi na avii na kilanya?”
40026054	A efyo fikee fireiye fyeamba, “Mmbo kyikee kirummbwe kyeende indo, mmbo fyeeshiinukyaa indaany?”
40026055	Naasa kyeeri kilya kyeni Yesu kavia nsemu ulya wa vandu, “Mmbo mwooka kyeny mukasheshisheya sheelyi nkee mwaala shia, murie ngyusu, na mariinga musheshitira. A kyera shekee rembo ando amwi neeni mikonu myoose shiloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva, neeni mulashitire!
40026056	Indi kimaruma kyikaenda indo, ni kilya kyikee kyireiye ni veawuya fisuku, naambo kyikooye iinukya-u.” " Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakanreeya vakarisha.
40026057	Naasa valya vatira Yesu vakandenrwaa kulya kwa nkohani ulya nniini we Kayafa. Nafo mfo kweekuumbye-fo veelosha mavavaso na masiingo a uruka.
40026058	Naasa Petro eefo allatyaa yoo numa akee kyikwaasha. Kalava ifika mmba ilya shaakare ya nkohani ulya nniini kaanga nafo, kakaa-fo rembo kasanga na vasero valya va poo nakooye ilola shaasa kivaa. "
40026059	Naasa, vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na ikwaanu lilya iniini lya masiingo a uruka, vakava varuuyaa ukureekyi lwa wongo naambo vakooye iwaa Yesu,
40026060	nta valaonise, lla ndesa vakureekyi va wongo valesha nang'u veengyi. Elyi lyeefurummya vakasha nang'u vavii.
40026061	Vakaamba, “Nndu yeu aleamba vai, ‘Nshiidimaa isammbwa mmba ya Iruva ando a mikonu iraru shiitani lyingyi shimaa.’
40026062	Kyasia nkohani ulya nniini kasalala-u kammbia, ‘A nkushaambaa nta kindo kyeerouwa ukureekyi lwa yewo vavika lweekukumba?’ “
40026063	Indi Yesu kamalallya sau. Nkohani ulya nniini kaallwa kammbia, “Nkulyisaany mboo, ‘Swa Iruva muni muu kuluvie kwakooya yewe ni Kristo kukee Mwana wa Iruva.’ “
40026064	Yesu kammbia, “Kwankyaamba kumuni. Indi shamuvia, ‘Kupookya ulaalu mushelollyaa Mwana yeto wa nndu akee rembo yoo woko usha lwa Muni itumbe na isha navesha ariwa mmafishi a efo nginiiu.’
40026065	Nalyo nkohani ulya nniini karanndwa soori takwe ta yeerya. Kaamba, ‘Akakyo anruma Iruva nyira!’ A ekyo lusiiyaa vakureekyi vengyi nkyeekyi-se? Mmbo mwiitye ulaalu aruma Iruva.”
40026066	A mwarummbwa inda? Nawo vakaallwa vakaamba, “Kindo kinsumanyi ni iwaawa.”
40026067	Nalyo vakamwiisellye minyiiri efo kisanguny. Vakankapa na ng'unde. Vengyi vakankapa na mbiiri.
40026068	Vakaamba, “Lwaauye kisuku-te Kristo, yeto akukapa mmbi?”
40026069	Naasa Petro ekee rembo efo poo ya mmba ilya shaakare, nka kishinga kasha na yoo akai, kaamba, “Na yewe-da kweekee na Yesu yeto wa kulya Galilaya!
40026070	Nawe kalema-fushu mbee yaawo woose, kaamba, ‘Nshamanya ekyo kwaamba-fo.’ “
40026071	Kakwiipoo-fo kafika yoo ngiriny. Nka kyishinga ungyi kallollya kavia valya, “Yeu avekee nndu umwi na Yesu yeto wa kulya Nasareti.
40026072	Nawe kalema-fushu lyingyi eelyaa mboo kaamba, ‘Nshiishi nndu yeu-fo.’ “
40026073	Kairisha kinnywa, valya vasalali-fo vakasha na kufii. Vakavia Petro, “N-dede-da naakwa nnyewe kukee nndu waawo, ni mirerye yafo yakwaamba.”
40026074	Nalyo Petro kakudenga we muni na ilya mboo eshaambaa, “Nshiishi nndu yeu-fo!” Nalyo nguku ikakapa.
40026075	Naasa Petro kakummbwa kirero kilya Yesu alemmbia, “Kulaore nguku yankapa kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu.” Kasomuka na mbengyeny kaiya kyuumu nnu.
40027001	Naasa elyi kwamfika ikya Vakohani vaniini woose vasasangyi na masingo a vandu vakafisha kyama kikee kya kisuuya naambo vakooye iwaa Yesu.
40027002	Vakankamara vandenrambikya kwa nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari, we Pilato.
40027003	Nalyo Yuda ulya alenndiingya elyi allolya Yesu ameekerywa uvingo lweewaawa nawe kakuria. Kaipoo misasarwe ilya ya fesa makumi araru kandeiviirya Vakohani valya vaniini na masiingo a vandu.
40027004	Kaamba, “Mmbo shiletana ukasha elyi shariinngya samu ilatiri kiteve.” Nawo vakaamba, “A mmbo kiluwore-kyi yese? Lola kyafo kumuni!”
40027005	Nawe kandeera misasarwe ilya ya fesa kulya mmba ya Iruva. Kawara shia, kandekuvanika.
40027006	Naasa vakohani vaniini vakaipoo misasarwe ilya ya fesa, vakaamba, “Nkwiifo mumu wa iivika efo mbolokony ya mmba ya Iruva-fo, kimmba ni wuuru lwa samu.”
40027007	Naasa vakafisha shila vakaura nayo irema lya uteri lwa muumba nungu lyive ando eerika veny.
40027008	Nkyo kimaruma irema lilya lyikavaangwa ni irema lya samu kufike inu.
40027009	Nalyo kilya kyikee kirere na kana ka nkisuku ulya Yeremia kikakooya iinukya-u kyeamba, “Na yeny shileipoo misasarwe ilya makumi araru ya fesa, ni wuuru lwa nndu alererywa wuuru, yeto vana va Israeli valenrerya wuuru.
40027010	Shaivika yeeura irema lilya lya uteeri lwa muumba nungu, shatana shaasa Nndumi avavasye.”
40027011	Naasa Yesu kandeseleeswa mbee ya nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari. Nshilyi wa Kaisari kammbesa kaamba, “Yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda?” Na Yesu kaamba, “Kwankyaamba kumuni.”
40027012	Na elyi eefo akumbwaa ni Vakohani vaniini na masiingo a vandu, nta nalarouwe kindo.
40027013	Nalyo Pilato kammbia, “A mmbo kulaitye efyo vakureeka-u fyeekuutya uvingo shaasa fifye?”
40027014	Nawe nta nalarouwe nta kyimwi ammbesa. Nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari katana afulukywa deny.
40027015	Naasa elyi lya nkonu nniini nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari eishivie iporomuya vandu nndu mfinge umwi ulya vankunda.
40027016	Naasa meendi alya alekooya atiri nndu mfinge umwi aenngye usutu avaangwaa Baraba.
40027017	Naasa elyi vakuummbye-u indo nkuka Pilato kavavia, “A nndu mwankunda shimuporomuye ni ungau ndesa, ni Baraba ao ni Yesu yeto avaangwa ni Kristo?”
40027018	Nyelyi aishi kyavaniinga vakankumba ni kyinying'u.
40027019	Naasa elyi akee rembo yoo kitiminy kya ushilyi, nalyo nka wakwe kanrummya nrumi. Kammbia, “Kulasange mbony ta nndu yeu wa usumanu! Mmbo shilelya ukiva wiingyi kimaruma kyakwe nshooryaa kyio kya inu.”
40027020	Naasa Vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na masiingo a uruka vakaaya vandu valya vakuummbye-u nkuka, naambo vakunde Baraba, na Yesu nawaawa.
40027021	Naasa nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari kaallwa kavavia, “A yeva vavii ni ungau mukunndye shimuporomuye-u ndesa? Nawo vakaamba, N Baraba.”
40027022	Pilato kavavia, “A shatana inda na Yesu yeu avaangwa ni Kristo?” Woose vakaamba, “Nandekapywa nsalabeny!”
40027023	Naasa kaamba, A ukasha alelutana llo kyi-ro? Nawo vakakapa kisengelele na kamwi, vakaamba, “Nandekapywa nsalabeny!”
40027024	Naasa Pilato kalollya kulaifo kindo kyikyivaa, kyoorongye kyilya kyikaenda kyiing'anaa tupu. Kawarya mura kasangya maako yoo kisanguny kya vandu valya vakuummbye-u mamwiingyi. Kaamba, “Loleny yeny nshitiri ukasha na samu ya nndu yeu-fo. Loleny yeni muveni!”
40027025	Na vandu vakaallwa woose vakaamba, “Samu yakwe iluwuiye yese na vana veru!” "
40027026	Nalyo kavaporomuya Baraba. Na Yesu kanrambikya-u nandekapo na ngova numa nandekapyony nsalabeny.
40027027	Nalyo vasikari va nshilyi ulya wa Kaisari vakakamara Yesu. Vakanrwaa mmba ya ushilyi. Vakaende nang'u siri shoose ya vasikari. Ikasha inkuummbya.
40027028	Vakamuuta soori takwe muni vakammbika soori ifwani nsoru.
40027029	Vakaoka ureto lwa miinga vakammbika nrueny. Vakanniinngya irere efo wokony lwakwe usha. Vakafiiryandi vakanteenda, vakaamba, " “Lwakwiidikira mangyi ya Vayuda!”
40027030	Vakamwiisellye minyiiri. Vakawarya irere lilya vakankapa nalyo nrwe. "
40027031	Na elyi vammaa inteenda indo vakamuuta soori ilya vakawuya immbika soori tilya takwe muni, vakankamara nandekapyo nsalabeu.
40027032	Naasa elyi vankwiipoo veefo vasheendaa, vakakooya nndu wa Krene avaangwaa Simion, vakamwiitikya nantare nsalaba ulya wakwe.
40027033	Vakafika ando avaangwaa ni Golgota, kyikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Nkisharongony.”
40027034	Vakanniinga mfinyo ukee nsande na nri weenangisa. Ashosha nalakunde ina."
40027035	Naasa vakankapya nsalabeu. Vakaavana soori takwe veetikapyaa kura.
40027036	Vakakaa-fo rembo vakanringa.
40027037	Na yoo nrweny wakwe vakavika ngumbwa ikee shireiye ule, “YEU MMBWE YESU MANGYI YA VAYUDA.”
40027038	Nalyo veala shia vavii vakakapyo nsalabeny vakasandwa nawe. Umwi kavikwa woko usha na ungyi woko umuso.
40027039	Naasa valya vairau vakanruma, vesisikaa mirwe,
40027040	vakaamba, “Yewe mwiwundwa mmba ya Iruva ando a mikonu iraru kuwuye iitana lyingyi, nkyekukyireeny kumuni, kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva! Kuveolokany nsalabeny!”
40027041	Na Vakohani valya vaniini vakaventeenda kiwo vasasangyi na veelosha mavavaso na masiingo a vandu.
40027042	Vakaamba, “A elyi alekyira vengyi, nalaidimi ikukyira we muni! Mmbo akee mangyi ya Israeli, noolokeny nsalabeny ulaalu indi, neese lumwiirikye!
40027043	Mmbo akusirye na Iruva, naasa we namwaauweeny kwakooya ankunndye. Kyimmba aleamba mmbo akee mwana wa Iruva.” "
40027044	Naasa na valya veala shia vakapyo nsalabeny ando amwi nawe, nawo-da vakavemmina.
40027045	Naasa uruka loose lukawoywa ni ireema kupookya saa irindaru kukafika saa keenda.
40027046	Naasa elyi kwamfika saa keenda Yesu koonisa unyanga waasha kaamba, " “Eli, Eli lama sabaktani.” Nakyo kyikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Woi Iruva wakwa, Woi Iruva wakwa, nkyikyi elyi kwashira?”
40027047	Naasa vandu vasalali-u maata vaita indo vakaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbo avaanga Elia.”
40027048	Nalyo yeni umwi waawo kanderisha, kandeende kivikaa mura, kakyiishura mfinyo utarang'aa. Kavika irereeny, kanrita.
40027049	Naasa valya vengyi vakaamba, “Ra lulole kwakooya Elia ashaa imwaauwa-u.”
40027050	Naasa Yesu kafua lyingyi na unyanga uniini kakumba muu.
40027051	Nalyo akakalyo isullya lyilya lyaavanisye mmba ya Iruva lyikavambuka nnang'ani kavii lyipookya yo si lyikavambukya uwe. Na uruka lukarerema. Na ngereko ta mawe tikaparika-parika.
40027052	Na mbanga ta vafu tikarwika, minying'a miingyi ikaruka ya vandu veele.
40027053	Vakaruka vauka efo mbangeny, na elyi numa we ammaa iruka vakafika kulya muriny mweele, vakakoora na vandu veengyi.
40027054	Naasa nshilyi ulya wa vasikari na valya akee nawo veeringaa Yesu, elyi valollya kidinasi kilya na filya fyautika fyoose vakatirwa mmbweerei wiingyi. Vakaamba, “Nkya dede yeu mmbo ekee mwana wa Iruva.”
40027055	Naasa kweefo na vaka veengyi velolaa vekee kikwaasha. Nawo mmbo valya valelatya Yesu vauka kulya Galilaya vemfurukanyaa.
40027056	Na efo nnang'ani yaawo kusangyi-fo Maria Magdala na Maria ulya akee maye wa Yakobo na Yosefu, na maye wa vana valya va Sebedayo.
40027057	Naasa elyi kwiifo kushiilaa kukasha nafo nndu isimba wa kulya Arimataya, avaangwaa Yosefu. Nawe muni avealukye Yesu kava nndu wa kiloshyony kyakwe.
40027058	We kafika kulya kwa Pilato kantereva nnying'a ulya wa Yesu. Nalyo Pilato kavavasya nandeniingywa.
40027059	Na Yosefu kaipoo nnying'a ulya kawoososya sooriny shaa pyai.
40027060	Kandewaara mbangeny yakwe shiiya adoshye efo iweny. Kapirimitya iwe iniini yoo mwaangony wa mbanga ilya, kakweengya.
40027061	Naasa na Maria Magdala mfo kundo eekai, na Maria ulya ungyi vakakaa rembo yoo usumanu na mbanga ilya.
40027062	Naasa elyi lya ndesi ukee nkonu ulatye nkonu weekudeesya llyo Vakohani valya vaniini vakandekuummbya kulya kwa Pilato varyani na Vafarisayo.
40027063	Vakaamba, “Ale Nndumi! Lwawuya ikummbwa kyilya llembi ulya alerera ekee na muu eeshaambaa, kushiiraa-u mikonu iraru shirukeny.”
40027064	Naasa vavasyany mbanga yeyo indevikywa kiringisyo kufike nkonu yeto wa kararu naambo yewo vakiloshyony kyakwe valashe nau vamwiive-fo, vandeviany vandu, “Annduka auka kwa vafu, na ulembi yelo lweefurummya luilanyi lulya lwa mbee.”
40027065	Pilato kavavia, “Varingyi vawonikaa. Kweengyeny munderinga shaasa mwaidima.”
40027066	Naasa vakakweengya vakandevikya mbanga ilya uringyi vevikaa iwe lilya kiring'isyo kyawo na varingyi valya vakakaa-u.
40028001	Naasa elyi nkonu ulya wa Sabato wamiira kwiifo kwikyaa elyi lya nkonu yeto wa mbee wa mfungare, llyo Maria wa kulya Magdala kaenda aryani na Maria ulya ungyi, vandelola mbanga ilya.
40028002	Nalyo akakakyo kidinasi kikaira kiniini. Nyeeli nsu ulya wa Nndumi aoloka auka iruveeu. Kasha nang'u, kakunnya iwe lilya mbai kalyikaya.
40028003	Na fwana yakwe ikee shaa pyai sha kimwii kya iruveeu na soori yakwe ikamika paa sha laura ya kulya kyaamwi.
40028004	Na kimaruma kya imwiiryaa varingyi valya vakava sheelyi vamfwa.
40028005	Naasa nsu ulya wa Iruva kaallwa kavia vaka valya, “Nta mulairyee yeni-fo! Mmbo shammanya mmbo mwiifo musiaa Yesu yeto alekapyo nsalabeny.”
40028006	Nnakyikee-se yaa-fo, mashika annduka, shaasa aleamba. Oshony na yaa-te, mushelola ando ekee mwaare.
40028007	Na yeni endeny na ngeta, mundevia valya vakyiloshyony vakwe, mmbo annduka. Nawe llen-te ashemwiiryaa mbee indefika kulya Galilaya, mfo kundo mushellollyaa. Akakakyo shamuvia.
40028008	Nawo kyaangu naakyo vakakwiipoo vauka alya mbangeny vatirwa mmbweerei vakasanda na nsia. Vakarisha pyany vandekyoongoya valya vakiloshyony vakwe.
40028009	Nalyo akakau Yesu ansha ikwaananya nawo efo shia. Kaamba, “Kaeny na ufoo vama mmbee!” Naasa vakaenda na yoo akai, vakallyingillya marende vakamoolokya na fisangu.
40028010	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nta mulairyae-fo! Endevieny vanavama wakwa vafike kulya Galilaya. Mfo kundo vasheshilollyaa.”
40028011	Naasa elyi varie shia yeenda, akakawo varingyi valya maata vankwiipoo, vakaenda kulya muriny. Vakandevia vakohani valya vaniini mbony tilya tautika toose.
40028012	Nawo vakakuumbya ando amwi na masiingo alya a uruka. Vakafisha kyama vakaniinngya vasikari valya fesa shiingyi,
40028013	vakaamba, “Ambeny, ‘Valya vakiloshyony vakwe mmbo valesha kyio, vakamwiiva-fo lwiilele rony.’
40028014	Na kwakooya kindo ekyi kyandeitiwa kwa nshilyi wa Kaisari, neese lushemfweera-fweeraa lumuute mwaandu.” "
40028015	Naasa vakawarya fesa tilya. Vakatana shaasa valefundwa. Na kirero ekyo kyikakwaana kulya kwa Vayuda kyikafika inu.
40028016	Naasa valya vakiloshyony ikumi na umwi vakaenda kulya Galilaya vakafika alya ifumbu-u kundo Yesu evavavasya.
40028017	Vakallolya vakamoolokya na fisangu. Indi kukavekaa-fo na vetirwa nnyinyira.
40028018	Na Yesu kasha na yoo vakai, karera nawo. Kavavia, " “Shanniinngyo ushilyi loose lwa efo iruveeu na lwa kunu urukeny.
40028019	Kyasia endeny mundeallwa vandu va masanga moose vave vakiloshyony vakwa mwiivabatisyaa irina lya Nde na lya Mwana na lya Mumuyo Mweele. Muvevalosha varinge efyo shilemuvavasya fyoose.
40028020	Na yeni manyiny-te, nkaa neeni mikonu myoose kufike yoo masiiyony a ulana.”
41001001	Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia ileendwa ni Yesu Kristo, mmbo ilepooka indo,
41001002	shaasa kikee kyireiye efo kitabuny kya nkisuku ulya Yesaya kyeamba, “Akakau shiifo nrumaa nsu wakwa nakusongoye yoo mbee yafo, mmbwe ashekusongosyaa shia yafo.”
41001003	Kwaitiwa unyanga luvaanga kulya kasa lushaambaa, “Deesyeny shia ya Nndumi! Sumaniseny miko yakwe!”
41001004	Ni indo Yohane alefummya vandu ashevabatisaa kulya kasa. Kava mwiikapa weele lwa ubatiso lwa yaalashika efo nriminy vakooye ifwaaywa ngyulyamari tawo.
41001005	Keengywaany ni uruka loose lwa Yudaya na Vayerusalemu woose. Vakandebatisywany kulya mureny wa Yordani veparya Iruva ngyulyamari tawo.
41001006	Nawe Yohane aree soori ta mafwaa a ngamula kakufinga na ukova lwa shony efo kisiny. Kalya nrie na ukyi wa mbakony.
41001007	Kakapa weele ashaambaa, “Yoo numa yakwa kwiifo kwiishaa yeto atiri finya ngota yeny. Nawe nta nshimaa shikwiinyike shiporommwi ukova lwa fyaaru fyakwe-fo.
41001008	Kyakwa yeny ni mura shava mwiibatisa nato. Indi we ni Mumuyo Mweele ashemubatisaa nato.”
41001009	Nalyo fyeeri fyekee filya fyeni Yesu alesha nafo auka kulya Galilaya, kabatiswa ni Yohane kulya Yordani.
41001010	Na llya alesaama auka efo mureny, llyo yeni kalollya efo iruveeu kukarauka na Mumuyo wa Iruva kamoolokya akee sha mbeta.
41001011	Na unyanga lukaitiwa luuka efo iruveeu lushaambaa, “Yewe mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde, ni yewe shilekusauwa.” "
41001012	Nalyo yeni Mumuyo wa Iruva kanrwaa nafike kulya kasa.
41001013	Kakaa-fo ando a mikonu makumi aana asheeswaa ni Satana. Kakaa-fo amwi na mafisi, na vasu va Iruva vakamfurukannya.
41001014	Naasa elyi numa elyi Yohane ammeerambikywa-fo Yesu kafika kulya Galilaya ashekapaa weele lwa yoongoya vandu Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia.
41001015	Kaamba, " “Alashikeny efo nriminy muvekusirya na Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia.”
41001016	Nalyo kaira efo mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya ya Galilaya. Kalollya Simion na Andrea akee mwanamaye wa Simion veefo vashoolotaa nreiyo weereiya makunga efo yeeveny mashika vekee veereiya makunga.
41001017	Na Yesu kavavia, “Oshony, mushilatye, na yeny nshemwaallwa muve veereiya vandu.”
41001018	Nalyo yeni vakara u mireiyo ilya yaawo, vakallatya.
41001019	Keenda na kwambee kinnywa, kalollya Yakobo akee mwana wa Sebedayo, na Yohane we mwanamaye nawo vakee ngalaveny veefo vasongosya mireiyo yaawo.
41001020	Nalyo Yesu kavavaanga. Vakara-u nde-yaawo, we Sebedayo efo ngalaveny ando amwi na varundi valya vakwe. Vakaenda vakallatya.
41001021	Nalyo vakafika kulya Kapernaumu. Nalyo yeni elyi Sabato yansha kaenda efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya, kava eloshaa.
41001022	Na vandu vakaising'ang'a kya miloshye ilya yakwe. Mashika elyi ava mwiilosha sha nndu atiri ushilyi, nalakee wa ngata ya veelosha mavavaso.
41001023	Nalyo yeni efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya kweifo nndu eetirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu.
41001024	Kakooma kaamba, “Nkyiki kyeru na yewe Yesu wa kulya Nasareti? Mmbo kusheye ilurumata! Lukwiishi yewe ni vi! Yewe ni yeto Mweele wa Iruva.”
41001025	Na Yesu kankyeemya eshaambaa, “Malallya sau kwammbuka!”
41001026	Nalyo mumuyo ulya wa utefusu ukamweera efo na efo; ukafua na unyanga waasha ukammbuka.
41001027	Vakauma mwaangaya woose. Vakatana vaumburana vakaamba, “ A kindo ekyi mmbo kyikee inda? Akakakyi kiloshyo kyiiya kitiri ulyimbi! Na mimuyo yeyo ya utefusu kaivavasa, nayo ikamwiirikya.” "
41001028	Nalyo yeni mbony takwe tikakwaana kulya urukeny lufitani na Galilaya loose.
41001029	Na elyi vansomuka efo mmba yeeterevya nalyo vakafika kulya kyeny kwa Simion na Andrea, varyani na Yakobo na Yohane.
41001030	Naasa mayaanka wa Simion eefo atirwa nkitara etirwa mmuro. Nalyo yeni vakamoongoya mbony takwe.
41001031	Nawe kasha nau, kantira woko, kanseleesa. Na muro ulya ukammbuka. Nawe kavafurukannya. "
41001032	Naasa elyi kwamiila mwi wamoolokya, vakamweenngye vandu valya veeiyo valwee woose na yewo vatirwa mmimuyo mikasha.
41001033	Na muri moose ukava mmbo ukuummbye yoo mwaangony kwakwe.
41001034	Nawe kakira vandu veengyi valwee ndwari shive na shive. Kaanta mimuyo mikasha miingyi, nta nalalekeye mimuyo ilya mikasha ikarera-fo, mashika yemwiishi.
41001035	Naasa elyi lya ngama nraasi na ivishivishi kakwiipoo. Kasomuka efo mmba kaenda kundo kulakee vandu, kava mfo aterevya.
41001036	Na Simion kasanga na wooroye, vakammbingya.
41001037	Vakankooya vakammbia, “Woose veefo vakuruyaa.”
41001038	Nawe kavavia, “Ndifony lweende kundo kungyi, miriny yeyo ya minyanuny. Nafo-da shiveenda shindekapa-fo weele. Mashika nkyo kileshiniinga shasha shyuuka kyeny.”
41001039	Kawara shia kava mwiira-ira kulya Galilaya koose eshangaa na efo mmba tawo teeterevya na ikapa-fo weele na yaanta mimuyo yeyo mikasha.
41001040	Nalyo kasheywa ni nndu atirwa ni ivave. Kantereva, kamfiirya-ndi, kammbia, “Kwankunda mmbo kushiidimaa isheeremuta!”
41001041	Nawe kantinnywa kaorwa woko kampaana. Kaamba, “Shankunda, eremukany!”
41001042	Nalyo yeni ivave lilya lyikammbuka kaeremuka.
41001043	Nalyo kantauwa kamwiima deny,
41001044	kammbia, “Manya kulavie nndu kindo! Mmbo kusheendaa ikoora efo kwa nkohani. Na elyi kwameeremuka indo kundevika na kindo kyeeninga Iruva kilya Mose avavasye, kive nkyo ukureekyi lwa efo kwawo.”
41001045	Naasa kauka-fo kapooka indekyoongoya vandu na ifura deny, na ivambisa mbony yeto. Nawe Yesu nalakiidimi-se ikyaanga muriny wa vandu paa. Naasa kandekaa kundo kulalelwa, vandu vakansheya vauka wo ando.
41002001	Naasa mikonu ikaira mive na mive kavefika-se kulya Kapernaumu. Kyikaitiwa we ni efo mmba akai.
41002002	Nalyo vandu vakasha ikuumbyau veengyi. Yoo mwaangony kulaidimi ivatira-se. Nawe kavaviany irero lya Iruva.
41002003	Nalyo vakasha imweengye nndu muumu malungo ariwa mmbandu vaana.
41002004	Nawo valaidimi imfita yoo akai kyimaruma kya mamwiingyi ulya. Vakasammbwa alya mmbeeu kusumani na yoo Yesu akai. Vakarua-u vakaolota nang'u kitara kilya kileeywa ni ulya muumu malungo.
41002005	Na Yesu alolya kikusiryo kyawo kavia ulya muumu malungo, “Mwana-akwa kwammeutwa ngyulyamari tafo!”
41002006	Naasa veelosha mavavaso maata veefo rembo vakarera efo miriminy yaawo,
41002007	Vakaamba, “Nkyiki elyi nndu yeu arera indo? Mmbo aruma Iruva! Mmbi ashiidimaa yuuta nndu ngyulyamari kulaore ni umwi nsi, mmbwe Iruva?”
41002008	Nalyo yeni Yesu kamanya na ngoo yakwe mmbo varera indo efo miriminy, kavavia, “A kimaruma mukarera indo efo miriminy yaany nkikyi?
41002009	A kyaangu nkyokyi? Ndesa ni ivia yeu muumu malungo, ‘Kwammeutwa ngyulyamari tafo, ao ni yaamba, kwiipoo, kwakurika kitara kyafo, kwende kyeny?’
41002010	Indi manyiny-te Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo atiri ushilyi lweeuta vandu ngyulyamari tawo kunu urukeny. Naasa kavia ulya muumu malungo,
41002011	Shakuviany, ‘Kwiipoo kukurike kitara kyafo; kweende kyeny kwafo.’ “
41002012	Nawe kakwiipoo, nalyo yeni kavekurika kitara kyakwe, kasomuka-fo velollye woose. Nawo woose vakatana vafulukywa deny vakaarafuma Iruva veshaambaa, “Llulendelollye kindo sha ekyi-fo!”
41002013	Nawe kawuya ikwiipoo-fo, kaenda kulya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya. Mamwiingyi ulya moose wa vandu ukasha na alya akai. Nawe kavalosha-ny.
41002014	Kaira na mbee kalollya Levi ulya wa Alfayo akee rembo efo mmba yeededemmya, kammbia, “Shilatya!” Nawe kakawiipoo kallatya.
41002015	Naasa kyikava elyi Yesu akee rembo efo mmba kwa nndu yeto naambo nalye shoonga nafo kweefo vadedemi veengyi na vandu valyamari. Vakasasanga na Yesu na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe veelya nawo shoonga. Mashika nyelyi veefo veengyi, nawo ni vandu valellatya.
41002016	Naasa vaarya va fitabu va ngata ya Vafarisayo vakusheye nafo vakalolya eelyaa shoonga na vadedemi valya na vandu valyamari, vakavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Mmbo alya na ina asasangyi na vadedemi yewo na vandu valyamari!”
41002017	Na Yesu kakyiita kavavia, “Nshi yewo vakee na finya vakundye ishiiswa-fo, indi ni yewo valwee. Nta nshisheye nafo ishevaanga yewo va usumanu-fo, ni yewo valyamari.”
41002018	Naasa valya vakiloshyony va Yohane na Vafarisayo veefo vakootoyaa. Vakasha vakammbia, “A kyimaruma nkikyi, elyi vakiloshyony kya Yohane vakootoyaa na vakiloshyony kya Vafarisayo-da, indi yewo vakiloshyony kyafo valakootoye?”
41002019	Na Yesu kavavia, “A vandu va walyi vaidimi inda ikootoya elyi muni walyi asindi nawo? Kyeeri kyoose vakee na muni walyi, mmbashiidimaa ikootoya-fo.
41002020	Indi kukaa kushe mikonu vasokwaa muni walyi, llyoony vashekootoyaa nkonu yeto.
41002021	Nta nkwiiyo nndu afummya kirami kya soori shiiya efo sooriny shikuu-fo. Kwakooya ni indo, ekyo kyiveiywaa-u mmbo kyawuya irannduwa-u, yoo kwiiya kukalakana na yoo kukuu.
41002022	Nta nkwiiyo nndu asuruma mfinyo mwiiya efo mbolokony ta masara makuu-fo. Kwakooya ni indo, mfinyo yeto mmbo uriitaa mboloko yeto, na mfinyo ufwe mwasi sanda na mboloko yeto. Mfinyo mwiiya mmbwa ivika efo mbolokony shiiya.”
41002023	Nalyo kikava elyi akee efo shia, keera efo mareminy a nganu elyi lya nkonu wa Sabato. Na valya vakiloshyony vakwe elyi vekeenda na shia vakapooka yuurushwa fyaa.
41002024	Nalyo vafarisayo vakammbia, “Lla-te, nkikyi elyi vatana kindo ekyi kilatiri mumu nkonu yeu wa Sabato?”
41002025	Nawe kavavia, “A mmbo mulandesomi shaasa Davidi aletana llya alekooya atura kyeelya, katirwa nshaa we na valya aryani nawo?
41002026	Shaasa aleanga na efo mmba ya Iruva, meendi a nkohani ulya niini Abyatari, kalya mikate ilya ya kideesyo. Nayo ilatiri mumu weelyiwa ni nndu, kulaore ni Vakohani veni, kaavya na valya aryani nawo.”
41002027	Nawe kavavia, “Nkonu wa Sabato mmbo ulevikwa kimaruma kya nndu, nshi nndu alevikwa kyimaruma kya Sabato-fo.
41002028	Kimmba ni indo, Mwana yeto wa Nndu mmbo aveva nniini wa Sabato.”
41003001	Nalyo kaanga lyingyi efo mmba yeeterevya. Nafo kwiifo nndu atiri woko lufirikye.
41003002	Nawo vakava vallaayany, valole kwakooya ankiraa elyi lya Sabato, naambo vakooye kyeenkumba nakyo.
41003003	Nawe kavia nndu ulya atiri woko lufirikye, “Kwiipoo, kushesalala yoo nnang'ani.”
41003004	Nalyo kavavia, “A ndesa kwiifo mumu weetana mesha nkonu yeu wa Sabato ao ni itana makasha, ikira muu wa nndu ao ni yuureta?” Nawo vakamalallya sau.
41003005	Naasa kavaringitya miso ivalola arooywaa nngoo na isokywa ni fyoova deny kimaruma kya ngoo tilya tawo tammba indo shuumu. Kavia nndu ulya, “Orwa woko yelo lwafo!” " Kaorwa, woko lulya lwakwe lukawuya iva usha.
41003006	Nalyo yeni Vafarisayo vakasomuka-fo, vakandesasanga na Herode. Vakaruvya shila kyikee kya insua, vaoni shia yeenreta.
41003007	Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo-fo waarya aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe. Kaenda kulya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya. Vandu vakansora mamwiingyi nniini vakauka kulya Galilaya na kulya Yudaya,
41003008	na kulya Yerusalemu na Idumaya na kulya kwa kulya ya Yordani na kulya myuungony ya Tiro na Sidoni, ni mamwiingyi nniini deny wa vandu, nawo vaitye filya aletana fyoose, vakafika kulya akai."
41003009	Nawe kavia valya va kiloshyony vakwe vairikise ngalava ilya shidu immbere kimaruma kya mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu, naambo valashe insisira.
41003010	Mashika elyi alekira veengyi na valya vatiri fivalyilyisaa vakeeuwa vandu naambo vakooye ifika alya akai, vampaani.
41003011	Na mimuyo ilya ya utefusu elyi ilellollya, ikamwoolokya si, ikafua ishaambaa, “Yewe mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva!”
41003012	Nawe kaveema deny valeshemwaamba.
41003013	Nalyo kasaama alya ifumbu-u. Kavaanga valya ambakunda muni. Vakasha na yoo akai.
41003014	Kavika vandu ikumi na vavii, vave vekaa nawe, navevaruma vandekapa weele.
41003015	Vavetira na ushilyi lwa yaanta mimuyo mikasha.
41003016	Kavika valya ikumi na vavii. Kafishya Simion irina lyakwe ni Petro.
41003017	Na Yakobo ulya wa Sebedayo na Yohane we mwanamaye wa Yakobo, we kavafishya irina ni Boanerge, nakyo ni kyimwi na vana va maruruma.
41003018	Na valya vengyi ni Andrea, na Filipo, na Bartolomayo, na Matayo, na Toma, na Yakobo ulya wa Alfayo, na Tadayo na Simon akee wa yewo vakaari iringa ngata ya Kiyuda.
41003019	Na Yuda Iskariote mmbwe yeto alenndiingya.
41003020	Nalyo kaenda kaanga efo mmba, vandu vakasha ikuummbya-u lyingyi-se mwamwiingyi. Nta valaidimi iwonisa mwaanya weelya shoonga.
41003021	Na valya va kulya kwakwe, elyi vamiita mbony takwe teenda indo, vakawara shia vandentira. Vakaamba, “Ansukwa.”
41003022	Na veelosha mavavaso valya valesoka wooka kulya Yerusalemu, wo vakaamba, “Mmbo atirwa ni Belsebuli, na elyi aanta mimuyo mikasha mmbo aekywa ni yeto nniini wa mimuyo mikasha.”
41003023	Nawe kavavaanga na yoo akai, karera nawo aveera fyaaso kaamba, “A ni inda Satana ashiidimaa yaanta Satana uroye?
41003024	Na kwakooya umangyi lusheraukanaa lukakukapa weni, umangyi yelo nta llushiidimaa ikaa-u-fo.
41003025	Na kwakooya mmba ya nndu isheraukanaa ikakukapa sheni, mmba yeyo nta nnyishiidimaa ikaa-u-fo.
41003026	Na kwakooya Satana akwiipoo kakukapa muni mmbo araukana, nta nnashiidimaa ikaa-u-fo, mmbo ashekombika kombi.
41003027	Indi nta nkwiifo nndu ashiidimaa yaanga kwa nndu mwaafinya nandekamara fiiya filya fyakwe nafimaa-fo, kwankooya kulaore ampooka ifinga mwaafinya yeto llyo-ny ashekamaraa fya efo mmba kwakwe nafimaa.”
41003028	Ni kya dede shamuvia, “Vana va vandu mmbo vashewonaa ifwaaywa kya findo fya ulyamari fyoose, na fyaararo fyoose vamaarara shaasa fifye.
41003029	Indi kwakooya nndu amaarara kya imina Mumuyo Mweele, we nnaonaa ifwaaywa-fo, mmbo akaa na uvingo lwa llung'anu lwa ulyamari lwakwe.”
41003030	Mashika llya valeamba, “Mmbo atirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu.”
41003031	Nalyo maye vakasha nang'u na vanavamaye, vakasha iirisha yoo poo. Vakanrummya nrumi yeembaanga.
41003032	Naasa na mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukee rembo unndingitye riti, vandu vakammbia, “Akakawo mau na vanavamau na vamfwamau vakee yoo poo vakuruuyaa.”
41003033	Nawe karouwa kaamba, “A ma na vanavama ni vakyi?”
41003034	Naasa kalola valya vakee rembo vansengetye kavaringitya miso. Kaamba, “Akakava ma na vanavama vakwa.
41003035	Wo nndu aiyo moose atana efyo fisennyi Iruva mmbwe ava mwanama wakwa na mfwama wakwa na ma wakwa.”
41004001	Nalyo Yesu kapooka lyingyi ilosha akee alya waameu lwa yeeve ilya. Kulya akai vandu vakasha ikuumbya-fo mamwiingyi nniini na kamwi ukee yoo kwaarutu. Nawe katana asaama na efo ngalaveny, kakaa rembo efo yeeveny.
41004002	Nawe kava avaloshany kwa fyaaso. Na elyi eefo aloshaa kaamba ule,
41004003	“Aranyiny! Akakato nndu mweera mbeu ankwiipoo nandeera mbeu takwe.
41004004	Kikavaany elyi eefo asheeraa, maata tikolooka yoo mbai ya shia, na ndeye tikasha tikalya tikamaa.
41004005	Na tingyi tikooloka ando iwe lyikwaallye efo si kulatiri uteri wiingyi. Nalyo yeni tikamia neelyi uteri lulaanngye si.
41004006	Na elyi mwi wavaa tikaya. Kimmba tilasotye mirarii si, tikauma.
41004007	Na tingyi tikooloka ando a miingeny. Miinga ilya ikarwa ikatisisira tilavike nta kimu.
41004008	Na tingyi tikaoloka ando a uteri usha, tikarwa, tikawongya, tikavika kimu. Yeyo imwi ikavika makumi araru, na ingyi makumi arindaru, na ingyi iyana.”
41004009	Nalyo kaamba, “Nndu atiri maarwi earanya navearannya!”
41004010	Na elyi akee kyaanya kyakwe muni, valya vanndingitya vakasanga na valya ikumi na vavii vakammbesa kya fyaaso filya.
41004011	Nawe kavavia, “Yeni mmbo mwaniingwa imanya mbony yeto shirike ta umangyi lwa Iruva. Indi yewo va poo kyawo kyoose mmbo vakyikooya veevywaa fyaaso.”
41004012	Naambo, “Ilola valole, valalollyaa. Na yaaranya, vaarannyi valamanyaa. Valasheyaalukya Iruva, vakooye ifwaaywa.”
41004013	Nalyo kavavia, “A elyi mwanra mulamanya kyaaso ekyo, ni inda mumanyaa fyaaso efyo fingyi?
41004014	Yeto mweera mbeu ni irero lya Iruva eera.
41004015	Na yewo va efo mbai ya shia, ni efo kundo asheraa irero lya Iruva. Nawo wakammaa iita nalyo yeni Satana kasha nau, karakwa-u irero llya lyikee yeere efo miriminy yaawo.
41004016	Na kya yewo vakee veere ando iwe lyikwaallye si, kyawo ni kiwo: Vakammaa iita irero lya Iruva, nalyo yeni vakalyilumba na nsia.
41004017	Nawo nta valasotye miraari efo miriminy yaawo, mmbo vakee vandu va veru-veru. Elyi numa vakalolya kushe fyuure ao irishiswa kimaruma kya irero lya Iruva. Nalyo yeni vakawonisa nsindara.
41004018	Na vengyi ni yewo veere ando a miingeny. Yewo mmbo vandu valearannya irero lya Iruva.
41004019	Nalyo ngyusau ta ulana yelu tikaanga-fo na ulembi lweelembwa ni masaa na lango yeto ta findo efyo fiingyi. Nafyo fikasisira irero llya lyilakivike-se kimu.
41004020	Na yewo veere ando a uteri usha mmbo yewo vashaaranyaa irero lya Iruva vakalyilumba, vakeenda vevikaa fimu, umwi kavika makumi araru, na ungyi makumi arindaru, na ungyi iyana.”
41004021	Kawuya kavavia, “A taa mmbo yeendwa indesikywa na nakori ao kitara? Nshi isheendwaa indevikwa ando a yeekyerya taa?
41004022	Mashika nkwiifo kindo kisurumwaa kire kilamanyika-fo. Nta kulaifo kindo kisurumi kire kilamanyika paa-fo.
41004023	Kwakooya nndu atiri maarwi earannya navearannya!”
41004024	Kawuya kavavia, “Manyiny ekyo mwiifo mushiita-te! Myeesye yaany mwameesya nayo vandu, nnyo musheesywaa muviirywaa na yeengerywa muveengerywa-u.
41004025	Mashika nndu atiri kindo mmbo aningwaa fingyi. Na nndu nalatiri kindo, na kilya akooya atiri mmbo avekisokwaa.”
41004026	Kawuya kaamba, “Umangyi lwa Iruva shaasa lukai mmbo lwava sha nndu aleenda yeera mbeu efo uteriny.
41004027	Kava mwiilala na ikwiipoo kio na nsanyiny na mbeu ilya ikamia, ikang'ana, na yeto muni nalamanyi.
41004028	Uteri yelo lukarosa fimu lo weni. Mmbo lulepooka yeende mikongo, numa fyaa, numa nganu tiinukye efo fyaany.
41004029	Na kwakooya kimu yekyo kyankwaamba ivira, nalyo yeni karika finndo kimmba kwamfika yoo maveiyony.”
41004030	Kawuya kavavia, “A nkyokyi umangyi yelo lwa Iruva lushevakaniswaa nakyo ao lulwaallwe kyaaso kyeekyi?
41004031	Mmbo lukee sha mbekye ya Haradali, nndu aleyeera efo sumbai, nayo ikee shidu ikairya mbeu toose teerwa sumbai.
41004032	Nayo ikamaa yeerwa ikarwa, ikang'annya miri ingyi myoose. Ikaende maramba maniini, ndeye ta efo nginiiu tikatana taidima yookya-fo fifuri fisikywa nkirishe kya vayo.” "
41004033	Kawoongoya kirero kya Iruva avaviaa fyaaso fiingyi fya ngata yeyo shaasa vaidima yaaranya.
41004034	Nta nalarere nawo kindo kulaore aveera fyaaso-fo. Lyo valya vakiloshyony veni kavatambashuya fyoose vakee kyaanya kyawo.
41004035	Nalyo nkonu ulya mweni elyi kwamiila kavavia, " “Ndifony, luruuke na kwakulya.”
41004036	Nalyo vakasamana na mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu. Vakankamara shaasa eefo efo ngalaveny. Naasa na ngalava tingyi tikavekaa-fo teemwiimmya!
41004037	Nalyo kukakwiipoo uraato lwa finya lurie mmbwa. Ngalava ilya ikatana yaishwa mura.
41004038	Nawe muni akee efo taari ya ngalava yoo kwa numa eelele rony aekyerye mboloko yeelaaya nrwe. Nalyo vakamwaanta vakammbia, “Llosha, a mmbo kulasarye elyi lwiifo lusiaa?”
41004039	Nawe kakwiipoo kakyeemmya uraato lulya kavia yeeve ilya, “Malallya sau!” Nalyo uraato lukasyado, kukava kimammya sau.
41004040	Nalyo kavavia, “A kikyi elyi mukee veerei indo? Kyavaany inda elyi mwatura kyikusiryo?”
41004041	Vakatirwa mmbweerei wiingyi, vakaviana, “A nndu yeu mmbwa kwi elyi na uraato lwamwiirikya na yeeve yei?”
41005001	Nalyo vakafika kulya kwa kulya ya yeeve ilya kulya urukeny lwa Vagerasi.
41005002	Na elyi amooloka efo ngalaveny nalyo yeni nndu kasha ikwaannya nawe atirwa mumuyo nkasha, auka kulya mbangeny ta vafu.
41005003	Nawe efo mbangeny tilya ta vafu nng'u aaluye kyeny kwakwe, nta kulaiyo nndu aidima imfinga na nse.
41005004	Mashika mmbo enkapywa minya keengyi na ifingwa na mise. Nawe karummbwa mise ilya na minya tilya katifisha-fisha. Nta kulakae-fo nndu aleidima imbinga.
