41005005	Nawe kyeeri kilya kyoose mmbo eekaa efo mbangeny ta vafu na efo mafumbuny. Kava moongora-fo kio na nsanyiny na ikumanya-manya na mawe.
41005006	Naasa kalollya Yesu aifo ashaa akee kwaasha. Nawe kanrishya kandemoolokya si.
41005007	Kafua na unyanga waasha kaamba, “A nkyoki kukundye neeny, yewe Yesu, kukee Mwana wa Iruva yeto akee uwe ya findo fyoose? Shilyiiyaany mboo-te, swa Iruva, kwakooya kulasheshiturwa!”
41005008	Nyeeli we arie immbya, “Yewe mumuyo nkasha uka nndu yeu.”
41005009	Nalyo kammbesa, “A irina lyafo ni yewe vi?” Nawe kammbia, “Irina lyakwa ni itorito. Mashika elyi lukee veengyi.”
41005010	Naasa kamfuuya kyuumu nalasheevarika kwaasha valakani na uruka lulya.
41005011	Naasa nang'u kwiifo kushiiswaa ironda iniini lya nguve alya usambalo lwa ifumbu lilya.
41005012	Vakantereva vakaamba, “Lurike lundeanga nguve yeto.”
41005013	Nawe kavaninga mumu. Nalyo mimuyo ilya mikasha ikasomuka-fo, ikaanga nguveny tilya. Naasa ironda lilya lyikooloka lyirishaa na efo waangeu, lyikandesiiya efo yeeveny ilya. Nalyo lyefikye fiku fivii. Tikafumbwa mmura efo yeeveny.
41005014	Nalyo valya vetiisaa vakarisha vakandevia vandu va efo muriny na va efo mareminy, mbony tilya vandu vakeenda vandelola kindo kilya kyatanyika vamanyi mmbo kikee inda.
41005015	Vakafika alya Yesu akai. Na ulya etirwa mmumuyo nkasha vakallollya akee rembo, ammeeraa soori, mmbwe ulya eetirwa mmatorito alya. Nawo vakairyaa.
41005016	Na valya valollya nndu ulya wa mimuyo mikasha shaasa atannywa, na kilya kya nguve tilya vakawoongoya mbony eto.
41005017	Vakapooka imooshora nakwiipoo nooke efo myuungony yaawo.
41005018	Nalyo elyi eefo asaamaa na efo ngalaveny, nndu ulya etirwa mmimuyo mikasha kasha intereva nakukaye nawe.
41005019	Nawe nalamwiirikye, kammbia, “Enda kulya kyeny kwafo kwa vandu vafo kundewoongoya ekyo kiniini kyoose shaasa Nndumi akutannya na ikulillya ukiva lwafo.” "
41005020	Nalyo kaenda kapooka indekapa weele efo kwa vandu va uruka llwa lwa miri ikumi (Dekapoli) evaviaa kilya kiniini Yesu alentannya kyoose. Vakasongololo woose.
41005021	Nalyo Yesu kawuya karuuka lyingyi na kulya kwakulya eeriwa nngalava. Vandu vakasha ikuumbya alya akai mamwiingyi ung'ani. Nawe akee efo mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya.
41005022	Kukasha nau nndu akee umwi wa yewo vekallya mmba ya iterevya. Na irina lyakwe ni Yairo. Allolya kooloka si yoo marendeny akwe.
41005023	Kamooshora kyuumu, kaamba, " “Kimwana kyakwa kya kyeny kiifo kifwaa mbee. Neewe kundany mbee indemweekyerya maako, nakooye ikirwa na iwona muu.”
41005024	Kaenda nawe na vandu vakallatya mamwiingyi ung'ani, vakansisira.
41005025	Nalyo kweifo nka elwee ndwari ya kyika ando a myaaka ikumi na ivii.
41005026	Elyiswaa ukiva wiingyi ni vaanga veengyi, emmaya-fo na findo etiri fyoose, nta kilammbukye-fo kindo, kaveenda asheengeraa iva nnana tupu.
41005027	Naasa elyi amiita mbony ta Yesu kasha numa akusurummyi efo mamwiinginy ulya, kapaana soori yakwe ya yeerya.
41005028	Nawe kaamba, “Kwakooya shapaana naakwa ni soori ta yeerya, mmbo nsheshiaa tupu.”
41005029	Nalyo yeni kishoru kya ndwari ilya yakwe ya kyika kikamanda. Kaita efo mwiiliny wakwe mmbo ankyia kilya kyeeke ntuurwa.
41005030	Nalyo yeni Yesu kamanya efo nriminy mmbo ambukwa mfinya. Kainduka akee efo mamwiinginy wa vandu, kaamba, “Ni vi apaana soori takwa-ro?”
41005031	Valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakammbia, “Kulollye mamwiingyi yeu wiikusisira-sisiraa Neewe kwawuya yaamba, mmbi ashipaana?”
41005032	Kavavikya miso nakooye ilollya ulya ampaana.
41005033	Naasa nka ulya kasha nau atirwa mmbweerei na irerema ameemanya na kilya kyammbutikya, kakweera si yoo akai kamoongoya kya dede kilya kyoose shaasa kyeenda.
41005034	Nawe kammbia, “Mwana-kwa elyi kwankusirya-u indo nkyo kyakukyira. Kweengye na ufoo, kuveva nndu ammeeshia ekyo kyeekulyisaa ukiva.”
41005035	Naasa elyi eefo areraa indo kukasha nau vandu wooka kulya kyeny kwa ulya mwiikallya mmba yeeterevya. Vakaamba, “Mwana yeto wafo amfwa. Nkikyi elyi kwaatara-se llosha yeu?”
41005036	Naasa Yesu kaita kirero kilya kyaambawa, kavia ulya mwiikallya mmba yeeterevya, “Nta kulairyee! Kusirye-u tupu!”
41005037	Nalyo nta nalalekeye nndu nallatye neende nawe-fo kulaore ni Petro na Yakobo na Yohane we mwanamaye wa Yakobo.
41005038	Vakafika kulya kyeny kwa ulya mwiikallya mmba yeeterevya. Kalollya-fo vandu vekapaa ufullwe na kiiyo na irorongya kyuumu.
41005039	Nawe kavavia, “Nkyiki elyi mwakapa indo ufullwe na iiya? Kimwana yekyo nshi kifiiye-fo, mmbo kilele rony.”
41005040	Nawo vakanseka. Naasa we muni kaanta-u woose. Kakamara ndeye wa kimwana kilya na maye na valya aryani nawo. Kaira na efo kundo kimwana kilya kikai.
41005041	Katira kimwana kilya woko kakyivia, “Talita kumi!” Nakyo kwaallwa kyikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Mwana shakuvia kwiipoo!”
41005042	Nalyo yeni kimwana kilya kya kyika kyikakwiipoo, kyikapooka irua-rua, nawe emaye myaaka ikumi na ivii. Nalyo yeni vakauma mwangaya.
41005043	Nawe kavavavasa kyuumu kindo ekyo nndu nalakooye ikimanya. Kaamba kimwana kilya kiniingwa shoonga.
41006001	Nalyo kawara shia kooka kulya akai, kandefika kulya muriny kundo alelelyo. Na valya vakiloshyony vakeenda varyani nawe.
41006002	Naasa elyi kwamfika nkonu wa Sabato kapooka ilosha efo mmba yeeterevya. Na valya vearanya veefo veengyi. Nawo vakaising'ang'a, vakaamba, “A nyira nndu nkwi yeu autye mbony yeto na urango yelo? Na mitannyi yeyo ya wiidimi ya ngata yeyo ikavetanyika na maako akwe!
41006003	A nndu yeu nshi ulya eepashaa firi, akee mwana wa Maria na mwanamaye wa Yakobo na Yose na Yuda na Simion? Na vamfwamaye nshi vavekee kunu kweru?” Naasa vakava mmbo vawonisaa nsindara efo kwakwe.
41006004	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nndu nkisuku nkwii-fo kundo aminwa, kulaore ni efo muriny kundo alelelyo na efo kwa vandu va ufyari lwakwe na efo kyeny kwakwe-fo.” "
41006005	Nawe nta nalaidimi itana-fo kindo kya wiidimi-fo, kulaore ni vandu vanana vaangu alevaekerya maako kavashiisa.
41006006	Nawe katambiswa elyi valema indo ikusirya-u. Nalyo kava mweenda iira-ira efo miriny midu isengetye-u na ilosha-fo. "
41006007	Nalyo kavaanga valya ikumi na vavii vashekuummbya yoo akai. Kavaruma vavii vavii. Kavaniinga ushilyi lwa iitorya mimuyo ya utefusu.
41006008	Kavavavasa valakamare kishau kulaore ni nsengye mweni, nta kishau-fo, nta mboloko-fo, nta pesa ta efo ukoveny lwa kisiny-fo.
41006009	Kavavia, “Mmbo musheendaa muree fyaaru fya kisima. Nta muleende muree soori ivii-fo.”
41006010	Kawuya kavavia, “Wo kundo mwamaanga mmba ya nndu, kaeny-fo mutani mwauka kundo eko.
41006011	Na wo ando mwanra mulawarywa nta yaaranywa, ukeny-fo mwiikakapaa kilulyi kya marende any, kive ukureeki kwawo.”
41006012	Nalyo vakawara shia vakandekapa weele lwa ivia vandu vaalashike efo nriminy.
41006013	Nawo vakaanta mimuyo mikasha miingyi. Na vandu valwee veengyi vakavaamba mafura vakavashiisa.
41006014	Nalyo mangyi ilya Herode kaita mbony ta Yesu, neelyi irina lyakwe lyeenngye nnduma nawe kaamba, “Ate ni Yohane Mmbatisi, annduka ooka kwa vafu. Nkyo kimaruma finya yeto teetana fya wiidimi tikarunda kwakwe.”
41006015	Naasa vengyi vakaamba, “Ni Elia.” Vengyi vakaamba, “Ni nndu mwauya fisuku akee wa ngata imwi na vakisuku valya va mbee.”
41006016	Naasa elyi Herode aita kirerwaa indo, kaamba, “Ni Yohane ulya shilenrummbwa nrwe, mmbwe alewuya iruka.”
41006017	Nyelyi we Herode muni enruma vandu vaende itira Yohane, kamweera efo mmba ya vafingwa kimaruma kya Herodia ulya ekee nka wa mwanamaye we Filipo, emmurwaa.
41006018	Mashika Yohane evia Herode, “Nkutiri mumu weerwaa nka wa mwanamau-fo.”
41006019	Naasa Herodia kakaa ellyie iyoo. Kavekunda na imbwaa; nalaidimi.
41006020	Neelyi Herode eereiye Yohane eeishi ni nndu nsumanu kaveva mweele. Kakaa anringaa. Kava mumwiirannya kavefulukywa keengyi. Kawuya kavekunda imwaarannya-da.
41006021	Nalyo kukawonika nkonu utiri mwaanya nsha, nyelyi kwamfika nkonu weekummbwa Herode alewonika. Kaniinga ngyama takwe shoonga na vashilyi vakwe va fira valya vaniini, na vandu va nrwe va kulya Galilaya.
41006022	Nalyo mwana ulya wa kyeny we Herodia kaanga nafo kashefina, kasennya Herode na valya akee nawo efo shoongeny. Naasa mangyi kavia mwana ulya wa kyeny, Shitereva kindo kwankunda, na yeny nkuniingaa!
41006023	Kavellyiiya mboo eshaambaa, “Kindo kwankuterevya nkuniinga-da, na kikava kyenga kya umangyi lwakwa.”
41006024	Nawe kasomuka-fo kandevia maye, “A shatereva ki ndesa?” Nawe kaamba, “Ni nrwe wa Yohane Mmbatisi.”
41006025	Nalyo yeni kaanga na efo mangyi akai ashaangusyaa, katereva kaamba, “Mmbo shakunda kushiniinge nrwe wa Yohane Mmbatisi ulaalu indi, ushe uriwa ni nndeeva.” "
41006026	Nalyo mangyi kasokywa m fyoova deny, indi kimaruma kya veny valya na valya akee nawo alya shoongeny nalakunde imwiima.
41006027	Nalyo mangyi karuma umwi wa vasikari vakwe venringa, kammbavasya nandeende nrwe wa Yohane.
41006028	Nawe keenda kandenrummbwa nrwe efo mmba ya vafinge, kasha aurie na nndeeva, Kasheniingya mwana ulya wa kyeny. Na mwana ulya wa kyeny kandeurwaaya maye.
41006029	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakaita mbony tilya, vakasha nafo vakaipoo nnying'a ulya wakwe vakawaara mbangeny yeerika.
41006030	Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakasha ikuummbya alya Yesu akai, vakamoongoya filya valetana na ilosha.
41006031	Nawe kavavia, " “Oshony yeni muveni mweende kyaanya kyany mukooye iimuya-u kyaangu!” Mashika mmbo neelyi vandu vee-fo veengyi veshaa na yeenda nawo nta valaoni mwaanya weelya shoonga.
41006032	Vakakwiipoo-fo vakeenda ando kulalelwa, variwa nngalava, vakaefo kyaanya kyawo.
41006033	Nalyo vandu valya veefo veengyi vakavalollya vesheendaa, vakamanya mmbo. Nawo vakeenda na marende veerisha wooka miriny myoose vandekuummbya kulya arie yeenda. Vakasonngwa ifika-fo ngota wo.
41006034	Naasa elyi aoloka ngalaveny kalollya kwankuummbya-u mamwiingyi wa vandu. Nawe kavatinywa nyelyi vakee sha mburu tilatiri mwiisi. Kapooka ivalosha mbony shiingyi.
41006035	Naasa elyi nkonu wameenda nnu valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakasha na yoo akai, vakaamba, “Yaa lukai ni kasa, na nkonu wameenda nnu.
41006036	Vasami veende kulya mareminy na miriny ilya iringitye na kulya fimuriny vandekuurya-fo fyeelya.”
41006037	Nawe karouwa kavavia, “Vaniingeny yeni kyeelya!” Vakammbia, “A mmbo kwakunda lundeura mikate ya fesa mayana avii, lushevaniinga valye!”
41006038	Naasa kavavia, “A mikate mutiri ni yiinga?” “Endeloleny-te.” “Ni iraanu iifo, na makunda avii.”
41006039	Nawe kavavavasya vakwaale si woose efo mareny vakae mboto-mboto.
41006040	Vakakaa rembo makumi araanu araanu.
41006041	Nalyo kawarya mikate ilya iraanu na makunga alya avii, kalola efo iruveeu kaarafuma Iruva. Kafisha-fisha mikate ilya fyenga fyenga, kaniingyany valya vakiloshyony vandeavya vandu wo nndu kyakwe. Na makunga alya avii kavaavya woose.
41006042	Vakalya woose, vakauura.
41006043	Vakaveipoo na fipereshu mikusha ikumi na ivii,
41006044	Na valya valelya mikate ilya vafye sha womi fiku firaanu.
41006045	Nalyo yeni kaitika vakiloshyony vakwe vaange na efo ngalaveny vasongwe yeenda vanderuuka na kwakulya ya Betisaida, nawe nasami mbele vandu valya.
41006046	Nalyo elyi ansamana nawo kakwiipoo kaenda ando a ifumbuny nandeterevya-fo.
41006047	Naasa na elyi kwamiila ngalava ilya yamfika efo yeeveny nnang'ani, nawe akee kulya kwaarutu we muni.
41006048	Nalyo alollya vaona ngatara yeerwaa ngalava na mbee, mashika uraato lwesumani nawo. Naasa elyi kwafika ikamba lyeeringa kio lya kaana, nawe kafika yoo vakai ashiiraa yoo uuwe ya yeeve ilya, kakunda ivaira na mbee.
41006049	Naasa vekillollya ashiiraa efo uuwe ya mura, vakakusara kulakooye nkirishe, vakafua wui.
41006050	Neelyi vallollye woose vakaising'ang'a. Naasa nalyo yeni karera nawo, kavavia, “Wuiyony mmuu, ni yen-te! Nta mulairyae!”
41006051	Nalyo kasaama na efo ngalaveny kundo vakai. Uraato lulya lukamalallya sau. Nawo vakoomany mwaangaya efo miriminy yaawo.
41006052	Mashika kya mikate ilya walandekiitumuso-fo na ngoo tawo tilakummbwe.
41006053	Nalyo vakaruuka na kulya kwakulya kwaarutu, kulya Genesareti, vakanangyi sya-u ngalava ilya.
41006054	Nalyo yeni elyi vamooloka wooka efo ngalaveny, vandu vakammanya mmbwe,
41006055	vakaenda na ngeta, vakanderingitya uruka lulya loose. Vakapooka indeipoo valya valwee variwa mfitara, vakasengetya-sengetya nawo wo ando vamiita akai.
41006056	Na wo ando amaanga nafo a efo fimiriny, ao miriny, ao efo mmba, vakashevika yewo valwee efo singireny vakanterevany vapaani naakwa ni ikyedu lya soori yakwe ya yeerya. Na yewo vampaana vakaveshia woose.
41007001	Nalyo Vafarisayo vakashekuumbya yoo akai vasangyi na veelosha mavavaso valya maata vauka kulya Yerusalemu.
41007002	Vakalolya vakiloshyony vakwe maata velyaa shoonga na maako arindye, maako nalakee masangye.
41007003	Mashika Vafarisayo naakwa na Vayuda woose mmbeelyaa shoonga, kulaore vasangya maako keengyi-fo. Vakava veeringa indo ngyufundo tilya valereeywa ni vakuu vawo.
41007004	Na elyi vashuukaa singireny kulaore vapooka ikusangya mmbeelyaa shoonga-fo. Kukavekaa-fo na findo fingyi-se fiingyi valereeywa fyeeringa, sha mirumwa yeefwallya ngyupata mura na ndima na nungu.
41007005	Naasa, Vafarisayo valya vasangyi na vaarya valya va fitabu vakasha immbesa, “A nkikyi elyi vakiloshyony vafo valaendaa kisumani na ngyufundo ta vakuu veru? Na ilya vakaveelya shoonga na maako arindye?”
41007006	Nawe kavavia, “Yesaya mmbo alemuronga yeni vakunang'ari ashaauyaa kisuku kyeamba, ‘Vandu yeva ni kana kawo vashiindyaa nako, indi ngoo tawo tikakaa kwaasha na yeny.
41007007	Mmbo vashireremmya kikee kyaruu parany, kimmba mavavaso yoo a kivandu, mmbo ava mbony tawo teelosha.’ “
41007008	“Yeni mmbo mureeye ivavaso lya Iruva mukawuya ikushya ngyufundo yeto ta kivandu.”
41007009	Kawuya kavavia, “Ni indo kyikai: Ivavaso lya Iruva llyo mwalyifullwa naambo mwiidimi iringa ngyufundo yeto tany.
41007010	Mashika Mose mmbo avavasye kyeamba, ‘Indya ndoo na mau. Na yeto aruma ndeye na maye ifwa nafwe.’
41007011	Neeni mukawuya yaamba, ‘Nndu kavia ndeye ao maye ni Korbani,’ kikee sheelyi kyaambawa, ‘Efyo mweewaryaa kwakwa fyeemulela akakafyo shammeefivika waavi lwa mmba ya Iruva.
41007012	Mmukillekeyaa-se katannya ndeye ao maye kindo-fo.’
41007013	Kikavaany mmbo mwamina kirero kya Iruva kimaruma kya ngyufundo yeto tany mulereeywa mukatifitya vandu. Na findo fifwanani na fya ngata yeyo mukatana fiingyi.”
41007014	Nalyo kavaanga-se lyingyi mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu vashekuummbya yoo akai. Kavavia, “Shaaranyiny moose mwiitumuso!
41007015	Nkwiifo kindo kyikee kipoo ya nndu kyikamwiira na efo nnang'ani kishiidimaa imwaalwa ntefusu-fo. Kya indi yekyo kishuuka efo nnang'ani yakwe nkyo kishaallwaa nndu kava ntefusu. [
41007016	Naasa yeto atiri maarwi earannya navearannya!]”
41007017	Naasa elyi vamaanga na efo mmba anrau mamwiingyi ulya, valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakashembesa kya kyaaso kilya.
41007018	Nalyo kavavia, “Na yeni da mmbo mukee vandu valamanyaa kindo? A mmbo mulaishi wo kindo kya kipoo kyoose kishangaa nnduny, nshikyo kishiidimaa imwaallwa ntefusu-fo.
41007019	Mashika kundo kishangaa nafo nshi efo ngoony-fo, ni efo ndewuny. Kikawuya yuuka-fo kikaenda irininy.” Nawe elyi arera indo, kikava nkyo aallwa nakyo shoonga toose tikava shivaramu.
41007020	Naasa kaamba, “Ekyo kishuukaa efo nnduny, nkyo kindo kyamwaallwa kava ntefusu.
41007021	Kimmba efo ngoony ta vandu mfo kundo kuukye makusaro yoo meesi, na fya urui, na fya wiivi, na fya uwai,
41007022	na fya utuusi, na fya unying'u, na fya ngoo-shuu, na ntambo, na ngata ya ngula, na iriso yeesi, na kyaararo na ngata ya kinyala, na ngata ya nria.
41007023	Naasa findo efyo fyeesi fyoose, mmbo fyuukye efo kimmba, nafyo mfyo fyaallwa nndu kava ntefusu.”
41007024	Naasa kakwiipoo-fo kandefika kulya myuungony ya Tiro na Sidoni. Kaira na efo mmba ya nndu nalakunndye kimanyike. Nawe nalaidimi ikusuruma.
41007025	Indi nndu nka eefo akooya atiri mwana wa kyeny atirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu. Kaita mbony tilya takwe. Nalyo yeni kaanga nafo kamoolokya si yoo marendeny akwe.
41007026	Nawe akee nka aishi irera Kigriki aukye Foinike ya kulya Siria. Nawe kamooshora-dwa naante mumuyo ulya nkasha uuke mwana ulya wakwe wa kyeny.
41007027	Nawe kammbia, “Ra fivana fiwuure mbele! Nshi kisha iipoo shoonga ya fivana na indeerya fite-fo!”
41007028	Nawe karouwa kammbia, “Ee-da Nndumi! Naakwa ni fite mmbo fishekulyiiyaa misaaro yeyo ya vana.”
41007029	Nalyo kammbia, “Kimmba kwamaamba indo, kweengyeeny! Mwana yeto wafo ammbukwa ni mumuyo yeto nkasha.” "
41007030	Nalyo kakwiipoo, keenda kyeny kwakwe. Kakooya kimwana kilya kyakwe kilele rony efo kitareny na mumuyo ulya nkasha wammeemmbuka.
41007031	Nalyo kawara shia kooka kulya taari ya kulya Tiro, karummbwa na shia ya kulya Sidoni. Katana afika kulya kwiiduvani na yeeve ilya ya Genesareti kulya muungony wa miri ikumi.
41007032	Naasa, vandu vakamweenngye nndu akee mfu maarwi na ulumi lwakwe lukava utambasi. Vakashemooshora namweekerye maako.
41007033	Nawe kallakanisa efo vanduny vakuummbye-u nkuka, kandenrwaa kyaanya. Kaita nni efo maarwiny akwe, kawuya kafisha maare, kapaana ulumi lulya lwakwe.
41007034	Kainuya miso efo uwe iruveeu. Kadia kaamba, " “Efata!” Nakyo kikee sheelyi kyaambawa, “Tarambuka!”
41007035	Nalyo yeni maarwi alya akwe akawuya itarambuka na kitambisa kya ulumi lwakwe kikatambashuka, kawuya irera nisha.
41007036	Nawe kavavavasa valandeekivia nta nndu. Indi we asheengeraa ivavavasa nawo vakeengera ivambisa.
41007037	Vandu vakaising'ang'a nnu. Vakaamba, “Ate efyo atannyi fyaveshia fyoose! Valya vafiiye maarwi kaveekya vakaita, na valya vakee mbimbi kaveekya vakarera.”
41008001	Naasa mikonu ilya kweekuumbye-fo lyingyi nsemu nniini wa vandu, nawo valatiri kindo kyeelya. Nawe kavaanga valya vakiloshyony kyakwe. Kavavia,
41008002	“Shatinnywa vandu yewo vakuummbye-fo nkuka, mashika vansisirya kunu kwakwa ando a mikonu iraru sele, valatiri kindo kyeelya.
41008003	Na kwakooya shavatauwa indi veende kyeny valakomba kindo mmbo vasherovywaa efo shia. Na yewo maata ni kwaasha vaukye.”
41008004	Na valya vakiloshyony vakanndouwa, “A ni inda nndu ashiidimaa iwuutisa vandu yeva kunu kasa?”
41008005	Nawe kavavesa, “Ni mikate iinga mutiri?” Vakammbia, “Ni mfungare.”
41008006	Nawe kavia mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu vakee rembo. Kawarya mikate ilya mfungare, kaana Iruva. Kafisha fyenga fyenga. Kaniingya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vandeavya vandu. Vakandeavya vandu vakuummbye-fo.
41008007	Vavetiri na fikunga fyaangu. Kafivikya mbora kaamba, nafyo-da vandefyaava.
41008008	Vakalya vakauura. Vakaveipoo na nsaaro wa fipereshu, mikusha mfungare.
41008009	Na vandu veeiyo vafye sha fiku fiina. Naasa, kavatauwa.
41008010	Nalyo yeni kasaama na efo ngalaveny aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe, Kafika kulya myuungony ya Dalmanuta.
41008011	Naasa Vafarisayo vakansheya vakapooka illya nawe ulai, Vakammbia nawoore wende luuka iruveeu vemweesaa.
41008012	Nawe katirwa ni unyafi kaamba, “Naambo-kyi irika elyi lyasia wende?” Nkya dede shamuvia, “Irika elyi llyisheniingwaa wende nta-fo!”
41008013	Nalyo kavara-u, kawuya kasaama na efo ngalaveny, kawara shia, kafika kulya kwakulya.
41008014	Naasa vakakooya vanrekywa ikamara mikate ya kishau. Na efo ngalaveny nta valarye-fo kindo kulaore ni nkate umwi nsi.
41008015	Nawe kavavavasany ashaambaa, “Manyiny mukwiise ntarang'o wa Vafarisayo na wa Herode.”
41008016	Naasa, vakaumburanaany wo veni na veni, “Ni elyi lulariye mikate ya kishau.”
41008017	Nawe kamanya kavavia, “A kimaruma nkikyi mukaumburana elyi mulariye mikate? A mmbo mulandeipuye nta kindo nta iranngwa. Na mirima yaany ikava ishi?
41008018	Mmbo mutiri miso mulalollye. Mukavetira maarwi mulaitye, nta mulakummbwa kindo!
41008019	Llya shileavya vandu valya fiku firaanu mikate ilya iraanu, a mikusha iishwe fipereshu ni iinga muleipoo-ro? Vakammbia, ‘Ni ikumi na ivii.’
41008020	A llya shileavya valya fiku fiina mikate ilya mfungare ni mikusha iinga iishwe fipereshu muleipoo? Vakaamba, ‘Ni mfungare.’
41008021	Nawe kavavia, ‘A mmbo mulandeitumuso?’ “
41008022	Naasa vakafika kulya Betisaida. Vandu vakamweenngye nndu mfu miso. Vakamooshora nampaani.
41008023	Nawe katira nndu ulya mfu miso woko. Kanrwaa kulya poo ya muri. Kafishya miso alya akwe maare. Kamweekerya maako, kammbesa, kwakooya alollye kindo.
41008024	Nndu ulya katarammbwa miso kaamba, “Shilollye vandu-da, lyo mmbo vakee sha miri isheendaa.”
41008025	Nalyo kamweekerya maako lyingyi efo misony, kaambuka miso, kashia kapooka ilollya findo fyoose fikamanyika paa.
41008026	Nawe kansama neende kyeny kwakwe, kammbia, “Nta kulaire neefo muriny-fo.”
41008027	Nalyo Yesu kakwiipoo-fo kawara shia aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe. Vakafika kulya fimiriny fikee kufii na kulya Kaisaria ya Filipo. Na elyi varie indo shia kavesa valya vakiloshyony vakwe, kaamba, “A vandu vaamba kyakwa, yeny mmbo shikee viiny?”
41008028	Nawo vakamoongoya vakaamba, “Kwiifo vaamba yewe ni Yohane Mmbatisi, na vengyi ni Elia. Na vengyi vakaamba, yewe ni umwi wa vakisuku.”
41008029	Nawe kavavesa, “A yeni mwaamba inda kyakwa, yeny mmbo shikee viiny?” Petro karouwa kammbia, “Yewe ni Kristo!”
41008030	Nawe kavaima valasheerera na nndu ekyo kyakwe.
41008031	Nalyo kapooka ivalosha mmbo kikee kideerye kya Mwana yeto wa Nndu nandeliswa ukiva wiingyi mmbandu na indeminwa mmasiingo a vandu na veelosha mavavaso, na iwaawa nawaawa, na mikonu ikamiira-u iraru nawuye iruka-ny.
41008032	Kavavia kirero ekyo areraa paa. Nalyo Petro kanrwaa na mbai. Kapooka inkeemmya.
41008033	Nawe kainduka kalola valya vakiloshyony vakwe. Kakeemmya Petro, kaamba, “Kwiipoo wuya numa yakwa Satana! Ekyo kukusarye nshi kya Iruva-fo, nkya kivandu!”
41008034	Nalyo kavaanga valya vakuummbye-fo sanda na vakiloshyony vakwe vashesangya yoo akai. Kavavia, “Nndu akunda ishilatya kuti nasue mwili vakwe muni avekurika nsalaba wakwe, naveshilatya-ny.
41008035	Mashika wo nndu ankunda ikira muu wakwe akaa naurete. Na wo nndu areta muu wakwe kwakooya ni kimaruma kyakwa na Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia, we akaa naukire.
41008036	Mashika iviri nndu ashuutaa-u llyo kyi kwakooya ashewonisaa ulana loose luve mbusha yakwe, kawuya iretya-u muu wakwe?
41008037	A kindo nndu avikaa kyeewouwa muu wakwe nkyo kyi?
41008038	Na kunu nnang'ani ya irika elyi lyiraiye utuusi na ulyamari wo nndu aifo amiira sony kyakwa na kya marero akwa, na Mwana yeto wa Nndu asheveiraa sony kyakwe-da elyi meendi ashaa aree itumbe lya Ndeye aryani na vasu yewo veele va Iruva.”
41009001	Nawe kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, vandu vasalali yaa indi kwiifo valasheshosha ufu kulaore vallollya umangyi lwa Iruva lushe na finya.”
41009002	Nalyo mikonu ikaira-u irindaru Yesu kaipoo Petro na Yakobo na Yohane. Kavasaamisa ifumbuny yaasha vakee kyaanya kyawo wo veni. Nalyo kaalashika fwana yakwe valollye.
41009003	Na soori takwe tikamika tikava shaa pyai. Na kunu urukeny nta kulaifo mwiisangya soori ashiidimaa itiilisa indo-fo.
41009004	Nalyo Elia kasha na Mose ishekoora nawe. Vakarera nawe.
41009005	Naasa Petro karouwa kavia Yesu, “Llosha, ni kisha elyi yese lukee ya neese lukunndye itana matengo araru, lyafo lyimwi, na lya Mose lyimwi na lya Elia.”
41009006	Mashika nalaishi kindo arera kyeerouwa, Nyelyi vatirwa mmbweerei.
41009007	Nalyo ifishi lyikasha lyikavavikya nruve. Na unyanga lukarera luuka efo ifishiny lushaambaa, “Yeu mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde, mwaaranyiny-te!”
41009008	Nalyo yeni elyi velolaa valalollye nndu, kulaore ni Yesu muni-da, eekee nawo.
41009009	Na elyi vee-fo vashoolokaa efo ifumbuny kavavavasa valendeeongoya nndu kilya valollya na kutani elyi Mwana yeto wa Nndu arukaa ooka kwa vafu.
41009010	Naasa kirero ekyo vakakiwarya, vakavesana-vesana wo veni na veni, a iruka elyo na yuuka kwa vafu mmbo lyikee inda ndesa?
41009011	Vakammbesa vakaamba, “A elyi veelosha mavavaso vaambaye mmbo kyikee kideerye Elia nasonngwe isha mbele?”
41009012	Nawe kavavia, “Ee-da ni indo vaambaye Elia asheshaa navauwe findo fyoose fishie sha elyo mbee. Indi kwakooya ni indo, a kyavaany inda elyi kikee kireiye kya Mwana yeto wa nndu nandeliswa ukiva wiingyi na iminwa?
41009013	Kya indi yeny shamuvia, Elia isha alemeesha, nawo vakantannya shaasa vakukunndya, shaasa kyekee kireiye kyakwe.”
41009014	Naasa vakafika kulya vakiloshyony vakwe vakai. Vakalolya vandu mamwiingyi nniini varingitye riti ma vaarya, va fitabu vellyaa nawo ulai.
41009015	Nalyo yeni elyi mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu moose wallollya Yesu, nawo vakamatuka deny. Vakandenrishya, vakamwiidikira.
41009016	Nawe Yesu kavavesa, “A kindo mwiifo mwiilyaa nawo ulai nkyokyi?”
41009017	Nalyo nndu wa efo mamwiinginy ulya kamwaallwa, “Llosha mmbo shemeende mwana wakwa na kunu kwafo atirwa mumuyo mbimbi.
41009018	Nato wo kyeeri wammeentafukya ukamwaaruva. Nawe kava mweende mavia na irafunnya mayoo. Kaenda anaa-naa. Na yeny shavia vakiloshyony yewo vafo vawaante, valaidimi.”
41009019	Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “Eele mukee irika liturye kikusiryo! A shikee neeni shifike indii? A shimusisirye mfike kwi? Kyemweendeny na yaa shikai!”
41009020	Vakamweende na alya akai. Naasa mumuyo ulya elyi walyollya ukansisika. Kawa yoo si kakwaalala-alala-u arosaa mavia.
41009021	Nawe kavesa ndeye, “A mfyeeri fifye inda uka kindo ekyo kimmusheya?” Nawe kaamba, “Uka elyo akee n-du.
41009022	Nato keengyi ukava umweeraa efo murony na mureny kufii umbwaa. Indi kwakooya yewe kushiidimaa kindo, lweekye kwiilusaryaa ukiva!”
41009023	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Elyi kwaamba, ‘Kwakooya kushiidima!’ Findo fyoose mmbo fishiidimikaa-da efo kwa yeto akusirye-u!”
41009024	Nalyo yeni ndeye wa mwana ulya kaonisa unyanga, kaamba, “Shikusirye-u-da. Na yoo shalemmywa ikusirya-u kuveshitarama, mbee!”
41009025	Naasa Yesu kalollya vandu nkuka veefo vasheengeraa irishya-u, nawe kakeemmya mumuyo ulya wa utefusu kauvia, “Yewe mumuyo wa mbimbi kwaveva na mfu maarwi, yeny mmbo shakuvavasaany uka nndu yeu, nta kulakimwaange-se!”
41009026	Nato ukansisika kyuumu, ukammbuka. Nawe kava sheelyi amfwa. Valya vaiyo vakaamba, “Ankumba muu.”
41009027	Naasa Yesu kantira woko, kamwiinwa. Nalyo kasalala.
41009028	Kyasia, na elyi amaanga na efo mmba, valya vakiloshyony vakammbesa kyama, “A kimaruma yese lulaidimi yuuta nkikyi?”
41009029	Nawe kavavia, “Ngata yeyo nkwiifo kindo uvaa yaanta nakyo kulaore ni kiterewo-fo.”
41009030	Nalyo vakakwiipoo-fo, vakeenda, vakarumbwa na kulya Galilaya. Nawe nalakunde nndu nammanyi.
41009031	Neelyi eefo alosha vakiloshyony vakwe, kavavia, “Mwana yeto wa nndu eefo arambikywaa efo maakony a vandu, na immbwaa vammbwae. Nawe kammewaawa namae mikonu iraru, naruke-ny.”
41009032	Nawo valaitumuso elyi aamba indo, vakairyaa immbesa.
41009033	Naasa vakafika kulya Kapernaumu na elyi ammaanga efo mmba kavavesa, “A kindo mweefo mweereraa muveni na muveni efo shia nkyokyi?”
41009034	Vakamalallya mashika kindo valerera wo veni na veni vakee efo shia ni yeto akee nniini wa wooroye ni vi?
41009035	Nalyo kakaa rembo kavaanga valya ikumi na vavii na yoo akai, kavavia, “Kwakooya nndu akunda iva wa mbee, we kuti naaluke nave wa numa ya woose na mwiifurukannya woose.”
41009036	Nalyo keende kimwana kakyiseleesa yoo nnang'ani yaawo kakyikushya maakony kavavia,
41009037	“Wo nndu ammbwarya fivana efi kimwi kyawo kyikee kya ishikummbwa yeny, mmbo ashiwarya yeny. Na nndu ashiwarya yeny, nshi yeny ashiwarya-fo, mmbo awarya yeu aleshiruma.”
41009038	Naasa Yohane kaamba, “Llosha lulelollya nndu asendaa irina lyafo ashaantaa nalyo mimuyo mikasha, nawe nta nalakee nndu alulatye. Neese lukamwiima kimmba nalakee nndu alulatye.”
41009039	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Nta mulamwiimi-fo, mashika nkwiifoo nndu asendaa irina lyakwa katana nalyo kindo kya wiidimi, nalyo yeni kamanya ishirera ukasha-fo.
41009040	Nndu nalalusuuye mmbo ava wa kyaalu kyeru.
41009041	Mashika wo nndu amurita mura na upata kyikee kya ishikummbwa yeny elyi mukee vandu va Kristo, ndede shamuvia, isina lyakwe llyikaa lyireke-se-fo, na lyikafika kwi!”
41009042	Na yewo vafwafwa vakusirye neeny naakwa ni yeto umwi-da, wo nndu ammbiiya nsindara weentuula si, kya nndu yeto mmbo kyava kisha kilanya nafinngywa isewe lyirungutwaa ni nshungu efo singony yakwe, nandeolotwa efo yeeveny.
41009043	Na kwakooya woko lwafo lushekweenngyee nsindara, lurummbwe! Mmbo kikee kisha kilanya kukooye ikwiirya neefo muuny kukee kisaya, ngeta elyi kwatira maako ai avii kweenda ifika efo Gehena, efo murony ularumikaa. [
41009044	Nafo sava ya vayo ilashefwaa na muro wa vayo ulasherumikaa.]
41009045	Na kwakooya urende lwafo lushekweenngyee nsindara, lurummbwe! Mmbo kyikee kisha kilanya kukooye ikwiirya na efo muuny kukee kitongororo, ngeta elyi kwatira marende yoo ai avii kweenda yeerwa efo gehena. [
41009046	Nafo sava ya vayo ilashefwaa na muro yeto wa vayo ulasherumikaa.]
41009047	Na kwakooya iriso lyafo lyishekweenngyee nsindara, lyiillwe! Mmbo kyikee kisha kilanya kukooye ikwiirya na efo umanginy lwa Iruva, kukee wa iriso lyimwi, ngeta elyi kwatira miso yoo ai avii kweenda yeerwa yefo Gehena.
41009048	Nafo sava ya wayo ilashefwaa na muro yeto wa vayo ulasherumikaa.
41009049	Mashika wo nndu kindo asheroliswaa nakyo ni muro.
41009050	Mmbala ni kindo kisha, kwakooya wanreta nrolo wa vayo, a nkyokyi musheurolisaa nakyo? Kevekeeny mutiri mmbala efo nnang'ani yaany, muvekaa na ufoo mu veni na veni.
41010001	Nalyo kakwiipoo-fo kafika kulya myuungony ya Yudaya na kulya kwakulya ya Yordani. Vandu vakasha-se ikuummbya kulya akai nseemu mwiingyi. Nawe kava mwiivalosha shaasa eishivie.
41010002	Nalyo Vafarisayo vakansheya, vakammbesa vemweesaa, “A ndesa nndu nndumi atiri mumu weelakana na nka wakwe?”
41010003	Nawe kaallwa kavavia, “A Mose amuvavasye inda?”
41010004	Nawo vakaamba, “Mose mmbo aluvikye mumu nndu nareiye barua ya ilakana nakulakannyiiny nawe.”
41010005	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Ni kimaruma kya mirima yaany ikee myuumu indo, nkyo kilenniinga kamureiya ivavaso elyo.
41010006	Kya indi uka elyo mapookyony a findo fyuumbe, mmbo alevaumba vakee nndu nndumi na nndu nka.
41010007	Kimmba ni indo, nndu mmbo asheraa ndeye na maye nandekutira na nka wakwe.
41010008	Nawo vee vavii vandeva mwiili umwi nsi. Kikavaany nshi vakee-se vavii-fo, mmbo vava mwiili umwi nsi.
41010009	Naasany kindo Iruva we muni allunga nndu nalakirauwe-fo.”
41010010	Naasa elyi vakee efo mmba valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakammbesa lya kavii kya mbony yeto.
41010011	Nawe kaamba, “Wo nndu allakana na nka wakwe kaalyika ungyi, mmbo atana kindo kya utuusi.
41010012	Nawe nka yeto alakana na mmi, kandealyikwa ni ungyi, mmbo avetana kindo kya utuusi.”
41010013	Nalyo vakamweenngye fivana naambo nafipaani, na valya vakiloshyony vakakeemmya valya vafyeende.
41010014	Naasa Yesu alollya indo kasua, kavavia, “Reny fivana efyo fikusheye na kwakwa, nta mulafiimi. Mashika umangyi lwa Iruva lwava lwa yewo vafwanani nawo.
41010015	Ni kya dede shamuvia, nndu ara nalawarya umangyi lwa Iruva eetiri ngata ya kimwana, nnaonaa yaanga-fo-fo.” "
41010016	Nalyo kafishukura kafivikya mbora afyeekerye maako.
41010017	Naasa elyi ansomuka na poo neende, nndu umwi kasha nau eerishaa, kamfiirya-ndi kammbesa, " “Yewe Llosha nsha, a shitani inda shiwonise muu wa llung'anu uwe nto ding'u yakwa?”
41010018	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “A nkyokyi kwashivaangya nsha? Nkwiifo akee nsha-fo kulaore ni umwi tupu, mmbwe Iruva.
41010019	Mmbo kwiishi mavavaso yoo, ‘Kulawae, kulatuuse nta ituuswa, kulaive, kulavike ukureekyi lwa wongo. Kulasoke nndu kindo. Indya ndoo na mau.’ “
41010020	Nawe kammbia, “Efo fyoose mmbo shileva mwiivallya nafyo uka elyo shikee mwana n-du.”
41010021	Naasa Yesu kammbikya miso, kankunda, kammbia, “Kindo kwasaara-u ni kimwi, enda kundekumba fyoose kutiri kwaavye vakiva, llyony kushekuwonisyaa masaa efo iruveeu. Kwammaa oshoony, kusheshilatya!”
41010022	Nawe kakusha maviri kya ekyo avio. Keenda eesuuye mashika akee nndu atiri findo fiingyi.
41010023	Nalyo Yesu kalola taari toose ellaa vakiloshyony vakwe, kavavia, “A paa ngatara iifo ya yewo veni masaa vakooye yaanga umanginy lwa Iruva!”
41010024	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakaising'ang'a elyi arera indo. Naasa Yesu kaallwa lyingyi kavavia, “Nyira fivana! A paa ngatara iifo ya vandu vakooye yaanga na efo umanginy lwa Iruva!
41010025	Mmbo kyava kyaangu ngamula iire efo mmbweny ya sindanu ngeta nndu muni masaa nakooye yaanga efo umanginy lwa Iruva.”
41010026	Naasa vakeengera ising'ang'a. Vakarera wo veni na veni. A nndu akooya ikirwa ni viiny?
41010027	Yesu kavalola swaa kaamba, “Kunu vanduny ekyo nkishiidimikaa-fo, kulaore ni efo kwa Iruva. Mashika efo kwa Iruva fyoose mmbo fishiidimikaa.”
41010028	Nalyo Petro kammbia, “Lla-te, mbee, yeese lureeye findo fyoose lukakulatya.”
41010029	Yesu kaamba, “Nkwiifo nndu areeye mmba ao mwanamaye, ao vamfwamaye, ao maye, ao ndeye, ao fivana, ao minda, kwakooya ni kimaruma kyakwa na Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia,
41010030	nare nalawarya ka iyana, meendi a muu yeu nawarye mmba na vanavamaye, na fivana, na minda, naakwa ni elyi aifo arishiswaa, na efo ulaniny yelo lwiishaa, nawarye muu wa llung'anu.
41010031	Indi yewo vakee va mbee veengyi vakaa vave va numa, na yewo wa numa vakaa vave va mbee.”
41010032	Naasa elyi varie shia yeenda irwa na kulya Yerusalemu, na Yesu eefo avasongoyaa, nawo vakasavaa. Na vandu yewo vallatye vakatirwa mmbweerei. Nalyo kaummbya-se valya ikumi na vavii yoo akai kapooka iwoongoya efyo fikaa finsheye.
41010033	Kaamba, “Llen-te lwiifo lurwaa na kulya Yerusalemu na Mwana yeto wa nndu nanderambikywa efo maakony a vakohani vaniini na vaarya va fitabu, nawo vamweekerye uvingo lweewaawa, vandenrambinkya efo maakony a vandu va masanga.
41010034	Nawo vashentatalaa na imweesellya minyiri na inkapa na ngova na immbwaa vavemmbwaa, nawe namae mikonu iraru narukeny.”
41010035	Nalyo Yakobo na Yohane vakanserikya, wo vana va Sebedayo, vakammbia, “Llosha mmbo lutiri kindo lukunndye ikutereva kulutannyi!”
41010036	Nawe kavavia, “A kindo ekyo mwakunda shimutannyi nkyokyi ndesa?”
41010037	Nawo vakammbia, “Luniinge ando eekaa rembo umwi yoo wokony lwafo usha, na ungyi yoo woko lwafo umuso elyi kukee usuriny lwafo.”
41010038	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Mmwiishi nta kindo mwatereva-fo. A ndesa mushiidimaa ina upata yelo shinaa, ao ibatiswa ubatiso yelo yeny shibatiswaa?”
41010039	Nawo vakammbia, “Lushidimaa-da!” Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Upata yelu yeny shinaa muvelunaa, na ubatiso yeny shabatiswa muvebatiswa.
41010040	Kya indi iniinga nndu eekaa rembo yoo woko lwakwa usha na umuso, ekyo nshi kindo kyakwa yeny-fo, mmbo akee a yewo vandeesywa.”
41010041	Naasa valya ikumi vekiita indo, vakaswa na Yakobo na Yohane.
41010042	Nalyo Yesu kavavaanga na yoo akai. Kavavia, “Mmbo mwiishi yewo valollywa ni veshilya vandu va masanga, mmbo vavaafinyi. Na yewo vaniini vawo vakavalammya.
41010043	Indi kunu nnang'ani yaany nshi indo kivaa-fo. Indi kunu kwany, wo nndu aiyo akunda iva nniini waany, we kuti nave nndundi waany.
41010044	Na wo nndu akunda iva wa mbee, we kuti nave kishinga kya woose.
41010045	Mashika naakwa na Mwana yeto wa Nndu nshi asheye ishefurukannywa-fo, ni ishefurukannya-u, na ivika-u muu wakwe uve kiraso yeewouwa veengyi.”
41010046	Nalyo vakafika kulya Yeriko. Na elyi eefo akapaa muri ulya wa Yeriko mungo aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe na vandu mamwiingyi nkuka, nalyo vakakooya mwana ulya wa Timayo, we Bartimayo, akee mfu miso akee rembo yoo mbaambaa ya shia asheereryaa vandu kyeelya.
41010047	Kaita mmbwe Yesu wa kulya Nasareti akeeiira. Nalyo kapooka ifua na yaamba, “Woi Yesu kukee mwana wa Davidi shisarya ukiva lwakwa!”
41010048	Vandu veengyi vakankeemmya namalallye. Nawe keengera ifua kilanya, “Woi Yesu mwana wa Davidi, shisarya ukiva lwakwa-te!”
41010049	Nalyo Yesu kairisha kaamba, “Mmbaangeny!” Vakambaanga vakambia, “Wuiyo mmuu! Mmbo akuvaanga!”
41010050	Nawe keera soori takwe mbai, tilya ta yeerya. Karumbuka kasalala, kasha na yoo Yesu akai.
41010051	Nalyo Yesu kammbia, “A nkyokyi kukundye shikutannyi?” Mfu miso kammbia, “Llosha, ni ishaallwa shive nndu alollye!”
41010052	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Kweenngye, kwankusirya-u indo, nkyo kyakukyira!” Nalyo yeni kava nndu alollye, keenda ellatyaa efo shia.
41011001	Na elyi veefo vaparikyaa kulya Yerusalemu vamfika kulya Betifage na Betania nng'u ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura, nalyo karuma vakiloshyony vakwe vavii.
41011002	Kavavia, “Endeny efo kimuriny ekyo kisumani na yaa mukai. Mukamfika-fo nalyo yeni mushekooya ngashe ya nshungu ikee shaavike. Yaauweny musheenngye!
41011003	Na kwakooya nndu amuvia, a nkikyi elyi mwatana indo? Mbieny ni Nndumi atiri kindo aikunndye! Nawe asheirikaa-se na kyaangu iwuye na yaa.”
41011004	Vakeenda vakavekooya ngashe ilya ya nshungu ikee shaavikye yoo mwaangony wa mmba yoo kipoo yoo ilemmyony lya shia.
41011005	Na vandu vasalali-u maata vakavavia, “A nkikyi elyi mwauwa ngashe yeyo?”
41011006	Nawo vakavavia indo-da shaasa Yesu aamba. Vakavara.
41011007	Vakarwaa ngashe ilya na kulya Yesu akai. Vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo mungony wa vayo. Nawe kasaama-u, kakaa-u rembo.
41011008	Na vandu veefo vengyi vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo shia. Veengyi-se vakaala-u maramba vamanya efo miriny.
41011009	Nalyo valya vasongwa vakasanga na valya vasha numa, vakaonisa ngyunyanga vashaambaa, “Kundearafumwa yeto asha arumwa ni Nndumi!
41011010	Kundearafumwa umangyi lwa nde weeru Davidi lwiifo lushaa! Hosiana efo uuwe iruveeu!” "
41011011	Nalyo kafika kulya Yerusalemu alya poo ya mmba ya Iruva. Kalola-fo findo fiiyo fyoose, kakwaanisa kakooya kwameenda nnu kwishiilaa. Kakwiipoo-fo keenda kulya Betania aryani na valya ikumi na vavii.
41011012	Na elyi lya ndesi ngama, elyi veefo vashuukaa kulya Betania katirwa nshaa.
41011013	Nalyo kalollya nkuu wa nndeny ukee kwaasha wamoora maru. Kasha nau kaamba kulakooye alollya-u kindo. Ashe na yoo ukai, nta nalakooye-u kindo kulaore ni maru meni. Mashika kulandefika kyeeri kya ndunda-fo.
41011014	Nawe kauvia, " “Kulakikae-se nndu alya ndunda kunu kwafo na kufike llung'anu-fo.” " Na valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakakiita.
41011015	Naasa vakafika kulya Yerusalemu. Nawe kaira na efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva. Kapooka yaanta-fo valya veefo veekumbaa na yuura findo efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva. Kavefullwa na mesa ya valya vealasha fesa na firi fyeekaya fya valya veekumba mbeta.
41011016	Nta nalalekeye nndu kaira na efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva arie kindo.
41011017	Kavalosha kavavia, " “A mmbo kilakee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Mmba yakwa mmbo ivaangwaa mmba yeeterevya ya vandu va masanga moose?’ Neeni mukawuya iyaallwa mbanga ya veala shia.” "
41011018	Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini na veelosha mavavaso vakeeta. Vakasia mwaanya shaasa vemmbwaa. Nyelyi vamweereiye, mashika vandu valya vakuummbye-u mamwiingyi woose vatirwa nntamba kya kiloshyo kilya kyakwe.
41011019	Na wo nkonu elyi kwafika iila kaveuka kulya muriny.
41011020	Naasa elyi lya ndesi ngama vashiiraa efo shia vakakooya nkuu ulya wamuuma upookya miraariiny.
41011021	Na Petro kakummbwa kammbia, " “Llosha llate nkuu yeto kuleudenga, ekakato wamuuma.”
41011022	Na Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Veny vekusirya Iruva!
41011023	Nkya dede shamuvia, wo nndu avia ifumbu yelyi, ‘Ipowa yaa kukai kundeerwa efo yeeveny,’ kara nalatirwa nnyimyira efo nriminy, kakusirya-u deny, mmbo kishevaa indo-da shaasa amaamba, naasa ni indo ashewonisaa.”
41011024	Kimmba niindo, neeny shamuvia, “Findo fyoose muterevaa efo kwa Iruva na ifyooshora, kevekusiryeny-ng'u mmbo mwammeefiwarya, nalyo mushefiwonisaa tupu.
41011025	Na kyeeri musalalyi-u mwiiterevaa, kwakooya mutiri mwaandu na nndu, mfwaayeny, naambo na Nde waany wa efo iruveeu navemufwaaya yeni kya efyo mulyamarye. [
41011026	Indi kwakooya kulaore yeni mwafwaaya vandu, nta Nde yeto waany wa efo iruveeu nnashemufwaayaa yeni kya ngyulyamari tany-fo.]”
41011027	Nalyo vakafika lyingyi kulya Yerusalemu. Naasa elyi eefo arua-ruaa efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, kasheywa ni vakohani vaniini na vaarya va fitabu na masiingo a vandu.
41011028	Vakashemmbia, “A ni wiidimi lwa ngata-kyi kwatana nalo findo efi?”
41011029	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Reny shimuvese kindo kimwi, neeny mushaallwe, llyo na yeny nshemuviaa kya mumu yeto shitiri shatana nato indo mmbwa ngata ingai.
41011030	A ubatiso lulya lwa Yohane kundo luukye nkwi, ni efo iruveeu, ao ni kunu vanduny ndesa? Shirouweny ekyo.”
41011031	Nawo vakaumburana wo veni na veni, vakaamba, “Kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa efo iruveeu’, mmbo asheluviaa, ‘Naambo kyi mulamwiirikyeeny?’
41011032	Na kwakooya lwaamba, ‘Ni lwa kunu vanduny’, nkivaa-fo, mashika vandu woose veeshi Yohane mmbo akee nndu nkisuku dede.”
41011033	Naasa vakarouwa Yesu vakaambia, “Llwiishi-fo.” Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nta yeny nshimuviaa kya mumu shitiri shatana nato indo mmbwa ngata ingai-fo.”
41012001	Nalyo kapooka irera nawo eveeraa fyaaso, kaamba, “Kweefo nndu aleronga nnda wakwe wa misabibu. Kauringitya na uvare. Kasuma-fo ando eekammya sabibu. Katannya-fo na nganga yeeringa. Kawaarya varemi, numa kaipoo kyaaro.
41012002	Naasa elyi kyeeri kyamfika karuma kishinga kulya kwa varemi valya nandewarya waavi lwa ndunda ta nnda ulya.
41012003	Nawo vakantira, vakankapa nnu. Vakansama wa ruu parany.
41012004	Nalyo kawuya karuma-se ishinga lyingyi kulya kwawo. Nawe-da vakavenkapa mariinga a nrwe, vakamwiinyala.
41012005	Kawuya kaveruma-se ungyi. Nawe vakammbwaa. Na vengyi-se veengyi, maata vakavakapa na maata vakavawaa.
41012006	Naasa kakooya atiri-se umwi, mmbwe mwana wakwe nkunde. Mmbwe alefurummya inruma kakusara, ‘Ammba mwana wakwa mmbo vashenreremyaa.’
41012007	Naasa varemi valya vakaviana, ‘Akakato muya ding'u! Ndifony lundemmbwaa, na ding'u yeyo ive yeeru luveni.’
41012008	Vakantira vakammbwaa. Vakandemweera efo poo ya nnda ulya.”
41012009	A muni nnda yeto mmbo ashetanaa inda ndesa? Mmbo ashekwiipoo nanderumata varemi valya. Na nnda ulya naare-fo vengyi.
41012010	A mmbo mulandesomi kilya kyikee kireiye kyeamba, “Iwe yelyo vetana mmba valelyiinyika, llyo elyo lyilewuya iva iwe lya ndumbeny.
41012011	Mmbo kileva indo kyuuka efo kwa Nndumi. Kikava kindo kyeesongololo lulollye na miso eru.” "
41012012	Nalyo vakasia mwaanya weentira, vakawuya iiryaa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu. Mashika elyi vaishi kyaaso kilya aamba nkyeevaronga wo. Vakanra-u vakeenda.
41012013	Nalyo vakanrummya Vafarisayo vaangu variani na ngyama ta Herode vashenreiya na marero.
41012014	Vakasha nang'u vakammbia, " “Ale llosha lwiishi mmbo kukee nndu wa dede kulasarye nta nndu. Nyelyi kulakee nndu mwilola fisangu fya vandu. Mmbo kuloshye shia ya Iruva kya songosiny. A ndesa kwiifo mumu weevikya Kaisari ukamba ao oode? A lukanninga aa lukara?”
41012015	Nawe kamanya ukunang'ari lwawo kavavia, “A ekyo mwasha isheesya nkyokyi? Sheengye dinari shiilole.”
41012016	Nawo vakamweenngye. Nalyo kavavia, “A ufwanu yelu lwiiyoo ni lwa vi na kireiyo ekyo?” Nawo vakammbia, “Llwa Kaisari-te!”
41012017	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Kyasia, efyo fikwaani na Kaisari finiingeny Kaisari. Na efyo fikwaani na Iruva muvefiniinga Iruva.” " Nalyo vakauma ng'any.
41012018	Naasa kasheywa ni Vasadukayo, mmbo vandu veshaambaa, nkwiifo iruka lya vafu-fo. Vakammbesa vakaamba, "
41012019	“Ale Llosha! Mose mmbo areiye kyeeluvia, ‘Kwakooya mwanamaye wa nndu afwa karau nka nalare-u mwana, naasa mwanamaye kuti naalyike nka ulya wakwe, naambo nalunngye-u mwanamaye ufyari.’
41012020	Naasa, kweefo vasero mfungare vekee vana va nka. Ulya wa mbee karwaa nka. Kafwa nalare-u mwana.
41012021	Nalyo ulya wa kavii kanrwaa. Kavefwa nalare-u mwana. Na ulya wa kararu ni kiwo-da.
41012022	Nalyo woose mfungare nkuiyo alera-u mwana-fo. Lyeefurummya nka ulya nawe kavefwa numa ya woose.
41012023	A elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony elyi vandu vafu vasherukaa, nka yeto ashevaany wa ungau wa yewo woose? Mashika woose mfungare vemunrwaa.”
41012024	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “A kindo kyamuniinga mukarekwa shia nshi elyi mulamanyaa efyo fikee fireiye nta finya ya Iruva?
41012025	Mashika elyi vandu vafu varukaa mmbashealyikaa-se-fo, nta yaalyikwa-fo. Mmbo vashevaa sha vasu va efo iruveeu.
41012026	Indi ekyo kya vafu shaasa vakaa varuke, a mmbo mulandesomi mbony tikee efo kitabuny kya Mose ta ngorosho ilya, ndesa Iruva alemmbia kaamba, Yeny ni Iruva wa Abrahamu, na Iruva wa Isaki, na Iruva wa Yakobo.
41012027	Naasa Iruva nshi akee wa vafu-fo, mmbo akee wa vakee na muu. Mmbo mwarekywa mukaangya mbai deny.”
41012028	Nalyo kukasha nau nndu wa efo kwa veelosha mavavaso, kaita verouwana indo. Kalollya eevarouwaa shaasa avaronga nisha, kammbesa, “A ivavaso elyo lyisongoye engyi moose llyingalyi?”
41012029	Yesu kaallwa, “Elyo lya mbee lyikee ule, ‘Yewe Israeli arannya-dwa! Nndumi weeru Iruva ni Nndumi umwi.
41012030	Neewe kunda Nndumi wafo Iruva kunkunde na ngoo imwi nsi, na nrima umwi nsi, na nrwe umwi nsi, na finya imwi nsi.’
41012031	Na lya kavii lyikee ule, ‘Kunda nndu uroo shaasa kukukunndye ku muni.’ Nta nkwiiyo ivavaso lyikee iniini ya yoo-fo.”
41012032	Nalyo mwaarya ulya wa fitabu kammbia, “Mmbo kwarera nisha, kwaamba dede. We mmbwe yeto umwi nsi aiyo nta nkwiiyo ungyi kulaore mmbwe-fo.
41012033	Na kya inkunda na ngoo imwi nsi na urango lumwi nsi, na finya imwi nsi, na kya ikunda uroye weeru shaasa nndu akukundye we muni, ekyo kyava kiniini-da, kikairya firaso fyoose fyeevivya murony.”
41012034	Nalyo Yesu alollya amwaallwa nisha indo kammbia, “Yewe nkukee kwaasha na umangyi lwa Iruva-fo.” Nalyo kulakee-fo nndu akara immbesa-se kindo.
41012035	Nalyo Yesu karouwa aloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva kaamba, “A kyava inda elyi veelosha mavavaso vaambaye Kristo ni Mwana wa Davidi?
41012036	Davidi we muni mmbo alekaywa Mmumuyo Mweele karera kaamba, We Nndumi alevia Nndumi wakwa, ‘Kaa rembo yoo woko lwakwa usha, shitani shaara vakiduva vafo si, vave kitima kyafo kyeekerya marende afo.’
41012037	Kikavaany Davidi we muni mmbo ambaanngye ni Nndumi. A naidimi-se inda iva mwana wakwe?” Nalyo vandu valya vakuummbye-u nkuka vefurye nnu imwaarannya.
41012038	Na elyi eefo aloshaa kaveamba, Kwiiseny na vaarya va fitabu, yewo vakunndye irua-rua varee soori shaasha na iidikirwa mmbandu ando a singira,
41012039	na ikaa rembo fitiminy fya mbee efo mmba teeterevya, na ikaa marembo asongoye elyi vakee kilyiiyony kya shoonga.
41012040	Nawo vakava vandu veemira mmba ta vaka va ding'u, na itereva Iruva fiterewo fyaasha kyikee kya ikoora efo vanduny tupu. Mmbo vashewonisaa uvingo uniini kilanya.
41012041	Nalyo kandekaa rembo alya asumani na isanduku lyeesanyirya fesa ta mmba ya Iruva. Kalola vandu vakuummbye-fo shaasa vavika fesa tawo efo isandukuny. Masimba akasha meengyi, akavika findo fiingi.
41012042	Naasa nka wa ding'u nkiva kasha nau. Kavika fiparwe fivii, nafyo fiinani na senti imwi.
41012043	Nawe kavaanga valya vakiloshyony vakwe na yoo akai kavavia, Nkya dede shamuvia, “Nka yeto wa ding'u avekee indo nkiva mmbo avika kiniini kairya yewo vavika kindo efo isandukuny woose.
41012044	Mashika woose mmbo vavika-fo vautye efo findony fyawo vatiri fya mmwasi, indi we kavika-fo auta efo findony fyakwe fyeerorwa kalekeya fyoose atiri, mfyo fyoose akee nafyo fyeelela muu wakwe.”
41013001	Na elyi asomuka efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva, nalyo umwi wa vakiloshyony kyakwe kammbia, “Llori lla-te mawe yoo shaasa asenyi, na mmba yeto shaasa titiri usuri.”
41013002	Na Yesu kamwallwa kammbia, “Kulollye mmba yeto shiniini indo-ro? Nkwiifo iwe lyisaa uwe ya lyingyi lyilasambuwaa-fo.”
41013003	Naasa nawe kandekaa rembo alya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura alya asumani na mmba ya Iruva. Na Petro kasanga na Yakobo na Yohane na Andrea vakammbesa kyaanya kyawo.
41013004	“Luvie-te mbee, meendi kindo ekyo kikaa kyuutike! Na wende lweemanya meendi yoo elyi findo efyo fyoose fishiinukya ni indii ndesa?”
41013005	Naasa Yesu kapooka ivavia, “Kwiiseny nndu nalakooye imureta shia.
41013006	Kukaa kushe vandu veengyi varie irina lyakwa vashaambaa mmbwe yeny. Nawo varete vandu veengyi.
41013007	Na elyi meendi mushiitaa fira na fyuulaalu fya fira, nta muleereve, mmbo kikee kirummbwe kyeende indo-da. Indi yoo masiiyony nalandefike-fo.
41013008	Mashika uruka lushekwiipoo lundekapa lungyi, na umangyi lundekapa umangyi yelo lungyi, na kuveira-fo na fidinasi kundo kungyi na kungyi, kuvesha na shaa. Nalyo llyo fipooka fyuure efyo fyeefurumya.
41013009	Kya indi kwiiseny mu veni! Mmbo vashemurambikyaa efo maakony a masiingo awe eerummbwa myaandu, neeni mundekapwa na mbiiri efo mmba teeterevya, na indeseleswa efo fisanguny fya vashilyi vaniini na vamangyi kimaruma kyakwa, kive nkyo ukureekyi lwa efo kwawo.
41013010	Na vandu va masanga moose kuti valave mbele indeongoywa nrumi ya Iruva ya nsia.
41013011	Na elyi meendi vemurwaa vandemurambikya efo maakony a vandu valya, nta mulapooke isaukwa kya kindo mundeambaa-fo. Indi kindo mushaambaa-fo ni ekyo mukooyaa mwankiniingwa kyeeri ekyo kyeni. Mashika veerera-u nshi yeni-fo, ni Mumuyo yeto Mweele.
41013012	Na mwanamaye wa nndu anderambikya-fo mwanamaye nandewaawa, na ndeye wa nndu nanderambikya-fo mwana. Na fivana fya nndu fishekwiipoo kya isua vamiku vawo vandewaawa.”
41013013	“Neeni muve veesuwa mmbandu woose kimaruma kya irina lyakwa. Indi yeto asisirya-u nafike yoo mafurumyony, mmbwe akooya ikirwa.”
41013014	Indi usutu lyulya lwa yaallwa-u irama elyi meendi mushelollyaa lwamfika alya lulasumani ifika-u na yeto mwiisoma-u nakummbwe llyo yewo vakooyaa valele kunu Yudaya vanderisha vapare mafumbu-u.
41013015	Na yeto akooyaa akee efo mmbee-u nalaoloke nandeanga nefo nandeipoo kindo kya efo mmba kwakwe-fo.
41013016	Na yeto akooyaa akee ireminy nalawuye na numa nandeipoo soori yakwe ya yeerya.
41013017	Indi yewo vakooyaa vakufinngye na yoota vana fyeeri efyo, oshiny lwawo!
41013018	Kyaindi mmbo musheterevaa Iruva efyo filasheshaa kyeeri kya mbeo.
41013019	Shamashika fyeeri efyo kushekaa-fo fyuure, nafyo shaasa fikai, filandelollyo fing'ani indo-fo kupookya mapookyony a findo fyuumbe efyo Iruva alefitana kufike ulaalu, nta meendi a numa mfishevaa-se indo-fo.
41013020	Na kwee fyeeri efyo kulaore fyeefiiswaa nkweekaa-fo nndu ekooya ikya-fo. Indi kimaruma kya yewo vasauwe nkyo kimaruma fyeeri efyo fishefiiswaa.
41013021	Nalyo kwakooya nndu ashemuviaa, “Kristo akakau yaa ao akakato efo nta mulairikye-fo!
41013022	Indi kukaa kukwiipoo Makristo wongo, na veauya fisuku va wongo. Nawo vatani fyeora wende na filandelollyo lyingyi, vakooye ireta naakwa ni yewo vasauwe, kukooye kyeevaa.
41013023	Kevekwiiseny muveni! Akakafyo, shalava imuvia fyoose.”
41013024	“Indi fyuure efyo fya fyeeri efyo fikamiira-u, llyo mwi ushaalukaa ireema na mwiiri mbusheendee-se sa ya vayo-fo.
41013025	Na nyinyiri yeto tikooywa tishoolokaa tyuuka efo iruveeu, na finya yeto ta efo iruveeu tiverinyiswa-rinyiswaa.
41013026	Nalyo llyo vashelolyaa Mwana yeto wa Nndu ashaa ariwa mmafishi akee na finya niini na itumbe.
41013027	Nalyo llyo asherumaa vasu va iruveeu vandeumbya yewo vasauwe ando amwi vavaute taari yeto iinya kundo ngyuraato tauka nafo vapooke masiiyony a ulana vafike masiiyony a ngina.”
41013028	“Naasa efo nriny wa nkuu uteny-fo ufundo lweekulosha! Iramba lya vayo lyikammaa ifumbisa na yoora maru neeni mukamanya iilula lyamfika kufii.
41013029	Na yeni ni kiwo-da. Elyi mushelollyaa findo efyo fyutika kevemanyiny, mmbo Nndumi amfika kufii, ni yoo mwaangony akai.
41013030	Nkya dede shamuvia, irika elyi lyishiiraa kulaore findo efyo fyainukya indo fyoose-fo.
41013031	Kya efo iruveeu kukaa kurumake na ulana, indi kilarumakaa ni marero yoo akwa.”
41013032	“Kya indi kya nkonu yeto mweni na kya saa yeyo sheni, nkwiifoo nndu afiishi-fo, nta vasu va efo iruveeu, nta Mwana-fo, kulaore ni Nde muni.
41013033	Naasa kwiiseny muvelala shoovi! Mashika mulaishi kyeeri ekyo meendi kifikaa.
41013034	Mmbo kyikee sheelyi nndu eenda kyaaro, kara mmba yakwe, kavikya mashinga alya akwe mumu wekallya findo fyakwe wo nndu kamwaavya ishora lyakwe. Na nringyi yeto wa poo kammbavasa nalale shoovi.
41013035	Naasa neeni kevelaleny shoovi, kimmba mulaishi kyeeri muni kyeny ashaa, kwakooya ni nkwaany, ao ni kio nnang'ani kavii, ao ni kyeeri nguku yakapa, ao ni ngama.
41013036	Kilave asha tiny nakooye mulele rony.
41013037	Indi kindo shamuvia yeni, nakyo shakyivia woose, Laleny shoovi!”
41014001	Naasa mikonu yeiyo ivii kufike Pasaka na kyeeri kya mikate ilatiri ntarang'u. Nalyo Vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na veelosha mavavaso vakasia mwaanya wa itira Yesu na ntambo vambwae.
41014002	Mashika nyelyi vaamba, “Nta lulakitani kwiikee nkonu nniini-fo vandu valakooye yaanta kituuru.”
41014003	Naasa, Yesu akee kulya Betania, efo mmba kwa Simion ulya eelwee ivave elyaa-fo shoonga. Kukasha nau nndu nka arie kishupa kya iwe yaa kitiri mafura eekwaamba afwaamaa nisha nnu, akee maa akava a uuru uniini. Kafisha kishupa kilya kaletya Yesu nrweny.
41014004	Naasa kukakaa-fo vandu vasua vakarera wo veni na veni, “A kimaruma mafura yaa akatavanywa indo nkikyi?
41014005	Mafura yaa mmbo eevaa ikumba dinari mayana araru na mmwasi na indeavya vakiva.” Vakasakira nka ulya.
41014006	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Kunreeyeny-te! A ekyo mwamwaatarya mmbo ashitannya ishora isha!
41014007	Kya vandu vakiva mmbo mukee nawo nkonu simu, na wo kyeeri mwankunda mushiidimaa ivatannya mesha. Indi yeny mmukee neeny kyeeri kyoose-fo.
41014008	Ekyo aidima nkyo atana. Mmbo alava yaamba mwiili wakwa mafura elyi wiifo urikwaa.
41014009	Nkya dede shamuvia, wo kundo kushoongoywaa Nrumi ya Nsia kunu ulaniny, na ekyo kyakwe atana kiveva nng'u kyaambaywa kya inkummbwa.” "
41014010	Nalyo Yuda Iskariote umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii kakwiipoo, keenda kwa vakohani valya vaniini akundye irambikya Yesu efo maakony awo.
41014011	Nawo elyi vaita indo vakafura. Vakandeerya kyaasa vanniinge fesa. Nalyo kava mwikusara shaasa asheonisaa mwaanya weendenrambikya-fo.
41014012	Naasa kwiikee nkonu wa mbee weelyiwa mikate ilatiri ntarang'o, kyeeri vashishaa ngurana ya Pasaka nalyo vakiloshyon vakwe vakashemmbia, " A kundo kukundye lweende indedeesya-fo Pasaka nkwi?
41014013	Nalyo karuma vakiloshyony vakwe vavii kavavia, “Endeny kulya muriny nafo mushekwaanannyaa na nndu arie mura na nungu. Mmbwe mushellatyaa numa.
41014014	Na efo kundo ashangaa nafo, vyieny yeto muni kyeny, ‘Llosha akuvia-le vai, ando a imuuya nkwi, kundo alyiiyaa Pasaka na vakiloshyony vakwe?’
41014015	Nawe muni ashemooraa kirya kya mmba ya uwe. Nafo kukee kwaale kukakwaana piti mfo kundo musheludeesyaa.” "
41014016	Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakakwiipoo vakafika kulya muriny, vakavekooya indo-da shaasa Yesu avavia. Vakadeesya-fo Pasaka.
41014017	Nalyo elyo kwamfika nkwaany kasha nang'u aryani na valya ikumi na vavii.
41014018	Na elyi vefo velyaa shoonga Yesu kaamba, " “Nkya dede shamuvia, umwi waany nawe shikeelya nawe shoonga mmbo asheshiriingyaa.”
41014019	Vakapooka isokywa mfyoova na immbia ku umwi umwi, “A ni yeny mbee?”
41014020	Nawe kavavia, “Ni umwi waany yeni ikumi na vavii, we nndu loolota nawe maako marama efo kideeveny.
41014021	Lyo Mwana yeto wa nndu yeenda mmbo asheendaa shaasa kikee kyireiye kyakwe. Indi oshiny nndu yeto Mwana yeto wa Nndu asheriingywaa mmbwe. Nndu yeto kyakwe mmbo kyekee kisha kwee era nalairwa.”
41014022	Nalyo elyi veefo valyaa shoonga, kaipoo nkate; kaana Iruva, kaufisha-fisha kavaavya kaamba, “Waryeny yeu nto mwiili wakwa.”
41014023	Kawuya kaipoo upata kaarafuma Iruva, kavaniingya, vakana woose.
41014024	Nalyo kavavia, “Yei nnyo samu yakwa yeevika nkundanu, iifo ishiiritwaa kimaruma kya vandu veengyi.
41014025	Nkya dede shamuvia, nshikikaa-se shini ekyo kyivikwaa ni nsabibu-fo, na shitani shafika nkonu yeto shikinaa lya wiiya efo umanginy lwa Iruva.”
41014026	Nalyo vakaimba fiimbo, vakakwiipoo-fo, vakafika alya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura.
41014027	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Mmbo musheonisaa nsindara moose, kimmba kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Nshekapaa mwiisi yeto, na mburu tindenyanyaka.’ “
41014028	Indi elyi numa shammaa iruka llyo nshemusongoyaa ifika kulya Galilaya
41014029	Naasa Petro kammbia, “Naakwa vashewonisa nsindara woose, yeny nshi indo-fo.”
41014030	Nalyo Yesu kammbia, “Nkya dede shakuvia, kio ekyi kya inu kulaore nguku yankapa kavii mmbo kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu!”
41014031	Nawe kakaarya irera deny kaamba, “Na shalollya kuti shiwaawa shisandwa neewe, nshishekukanaa nta-fo.” " Nawo woose vakaverera indo.
41014032	Nalyo vakafika ando a nnda uvaangwaa ni Getsemane. Nawe kavia vakiloshyony vakwe, " “Kaeny rembo yaa shindetereva alya.”
41014033	Nalyo kaipoo Petro na Yakobo na Yohane vakeenda veryani nawe. Nawe kapooka isavaa na yeerera.
41014034	Kavavia, “Nrima wakwa mmbo usokywa mfyoova deny shafika kufii neefwa. Kaeny yaa mulale shoovi!”
41014035	Keenda mbee kinnywa, kaoloka si na itereva Iruva ashambaa, “Kwakooya kivaa, saa yeyo ishiire.”
41014036	Kaamba, “Aba, Nde efo kwafo findo fyoose mmbo fyaidimika. Naasa ita-ny upata yelu mbai lushuuke, indi nta kilaende shaasa shakunda yeny-fo, ni shaasa kwakunda yewe.”
41014037	Nalyo kasha kakooya valele rony, kavia Petro, “Simion, a mmbo kulele-da, nta kulaidimi ilala shoovi neeny ando a saa imwi nsi?”
41014038	Kyelaleny shoovi-te musande na itereva mulakooye yaanga kyeesyony. Nrima to ulangye indi mwili ukava nnana.
41014039	Nalyo keenda lyingyi kandetereva Iruva arera marero alya meni.
41014040	Nalyo kawuya nang'u kakooya valele rony. Neelyi miso awo eefummbye rwe. Nawo valamanyi nta kindo varouwa.
41014041	Nalyo kasha nau lya kararu, kavavia, “A ni indo mwalunga ilala tupu na iimuya na kyeeri ekyi kyoose! Kikufiiyeny! Kyeeri kyamfika. Mwana yeto wa Nndu akakau eefo arambikywaa maakony a vandu valyamari.
41014042	Kwiipoony-te lweende! Akakau, yeto mwiishiriingya ansha kufii.”
41014043	Nalyo yeni elyi eefo areraa indo Yuda Iskariote akee umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii, kasha nang'u aryani na vandu nkuka varie ngyusu na mariinga, varumwa ni vakohani na veelosha mavavaso na vamiku va vandu.
41014044	Na ulya anrambikya-fo emmbadeerya wende kaamba, “Nndu yeto shimmimindaa mmbwe mushentiraa mweende munrie.”
41014045	Naasa elyi asha nau nalyo yeni kafika yoo akai kaamba, “Shakwiidikira llori wakwa.” Kammiminda.
41014046	Vakamoroya maako vakantira.
41014047	Naasa ulya umwi wa valya vasalali-u kasommwa usu lwakwe kakapa nalo ishinga lya nkohani ulya nniini, kammaswa kuri.
41014048	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Mmbo mwakwiipoo kyeny murie ngyusu na mariinga sheelyi mwaenngya nndu mwaala shia musheshitira.
41014049	Na nkonu simu mmbo shekee neeni shiloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva, nta mulashitire. Indi kimaruma kikaenda indo ni filya fikee fireiye naambo fikooye iinukya-u fyoose.” "
41014050	Nalyo woose vakanreeya vakarisha.
41014051	Nalyo kweeyo mwana nkoo wa womi eefo ellatyaa eree soori ya yeerya ya lasi, nawo vakakunda intira.
41014052	Kavareeya soori ilya ya lasi, karisha eefo mbereto.
41014053	Nalyo vakaenda varie Yesu, vakamfita kulya kwa nkohani nniini. Nafo kwenkuummbya-fo vakohani valya vaniini woose na masiingo na veelosha mavavaso."
41014054	Na Petro kaengya kwaasha ellatyaa, katana afika efo poo kwa nkohani ulya nniini. Kakooya vasero va efo poo vakee-fo rembo kasanga nawo ashoraa muro.
41014055	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na ngyama toose vakasia ukureeki lweevinga Yesu naambo vambwaa, lyo valaonise.
41014056	Nyelyi veengyi veefo vavikaa ukureekyi lwa wongo vammbinge, na efyo fya ukureekyi lwawo filave fimwi.
41014057	Nalyo vandu vaangu vakasalala-u vakavika ukureekyi lwa wongo vammbinge, vakaamba,
41014058	Yese mmbo luleita ashambaa, “Yeny mmbo nshewundwaa mmba yei ya Iruva ikee shitani na maako, shitani ingyi ilakee shitani na maako ando a mikonu iraru shimaa.”
41014059	Nta elyi varera indo ukureekyi lwawo lulave lumwi.
41014060	Nalyo nkohani ulya nniini kakwiipoo, kashesalala yoo nnang'ani. Kavesa Yesu, kaamba, “A mmbo kulashaambaa kyafo kyeerouwa efyo vakureekyi yeva vaamba-u fyeekukumba?”
41014061	Nawe kamalallya-sau, nta nalarouwe kindo. Nkohani nniini kammbesa lya kavii, “A nnyewe Kristo we Mwana wa yeto Mwiirumishwa?”
41014062	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Yeny mmbwe. Neeni mushelollyaa Mwana yeto wa Nndu akee rembo yoo taari ya woko usha lwa Mwaafinya, nashe eeriwa mmafishi a efo nginiiu.”
41014063	Naasa nkohani ulya nniini karanndwa soori takwe ta yeerya kaamba, “A ekyo luruuyaa-se vakureekyi vengyi nkyo-kyi-se nyira?
41014064	Akakakyo mwamiita aruma Iruva-te! A mwarummbwa inda?” Nawo woose vakamweekerya uvingo veshambaa kindo kinsumanyi ni indewaawa.
41014065	Nalyo maata vakapooka imweeselya minyiiri na insikya kisangu na inkapa na ng'unde na immbia, “Kyeluvie kisuku-te!” " Na vasero va efo poo vakankamara venkapaa ngyoyi.
41014066	Nalyo Petro akee rembo kulya poo alya si. Kukasha nau mwana wa kyika umwi akee umwi wa fishinga fya nkohani ulya nniini.
41014067	Kalollya Petro ashooraa muro. Kammbikya miso swaa kaamba, " “Na yewe-da kweeriani na nndu yeto wa Nasareti, we Yesu.”
41014068	Nawe kalema-fushu kaamba, “Kindo ekyo kwaamba nshakimanya-fo, nta shakiitumuso-fo.” Nalyo kakwiipoo alya poo kafika yoo ngiriny. Na nguku ikakapa.
41014069	Kishinga kilya kya kyika kyikallollya kyikapooka lyingyi-se ivia lyingyi valya woorokye yoo mbai, “Yeu mmbwa efo nnang'ani yaawo.”
41014070	Nawe kalemafushu lya kavii. Elyi numa kinnywa valya vasalalyi yoo kufii, vakawuya ivia-se Petro, “Nkya dede kukee wa efo nnang'ani yaawo mashika neewe-da ni wa kulya Galilaya.”
41014071	Nawe kapooka ikudenga we muni na ilya mboo, “Nshiishi nndu yeu mwamwaamba-fo.”
41014072	Nalyo yeni nguku ikakapa lya kavii. Petro kawuya ikummbwa kirero kilya Yesu emmbia, “Kulaore nguku yankapa kavii kukooyaa kwanshikana kararu. Nalyo akummbwa indo kaiya nnu deny.”
41015001	Na kyeeri kulekya vakohani vaniini vakasanga na vamiku va vandu na veelosha mavavaso, na ngyama toose vakafisha shila, vakafinga Yesu, vakankamara, vakandenrambikya kulya kwa Pontio Pilato.
41015002	Nalyo Pilato kammbesa, “Yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda-ro? Nawe kaallwa kammbia, ‘Ni yewe kwakyaamba.’ “
41015003	Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vakankumba kyuumu.
41015004	Nalyo Pilato kammbesa lya kavii, “A mmbo kulashirouwa kindo? Lla-te findo efyo fiingyi vakukumba nafyo. "
41015005	Na Yesu nta nalarouwe kindo, Pilato katana afulukywa deny.”
41015006	Naasa elyi lya nkonu ulya nniini evaporomuyaa nndu mfinge umwi, ulya vankukunndya.
41015007	Naasa kweefo nndu evaangwaa Baraba emfingwa ando amwi na vandu variingyi va uruka. Nawe Baraba efo kituuruny kilya vaanta vawaiye-fo vandu.
41015008	Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukanderwa nafo. Vakapooka intereva natani shaasa eevatannyaa.
41015009	Naasa Pilato kavavesa, " “Mukunndye shimuporomuye mangyi yeyo ya Vayuda-sho?”
41015010	Mashika elyi eishi kimaruma vakohani vakaaya vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakunde navaporomuye Baraba.
41015011	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vakaaya vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakunde navaporomuye Baraba.
41015012	Nalyo Pilato karouwa lyingyi kavavia, “A nkyokyi ntanyaa yeu mwaamba mmangyi ya Vayuda?”
41015013	Nalyo vakawuya ikooma, “Endenkapye nsalabeny!”
41015014	Naasa Pilato Kavavia, “A ukasha aletana llo-kyi?” Nawo vakeengera ikooma, “Endenkapye nsalabeeny!”
41015015	Naasa Pilato ekunndye itana kindo kyeekushiisa na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo, kavaporomuya Baraba. Na Yesu kanrambikya-fo nandekapyo nsalabeu.
41015016	Naasa vasikari valya vakankamara, vakanrwaa efo poo vakamfita kari. Nng'u mmba ya ushilyi ikai. Vakavaanga siri ya vasikari shoose, vakashekuummbya-u.
41015017	Vakammbika soori ya yeerya ifwani nsoru. Vakaoka ureto lwa miinga vakammbikya nrony.
41015018	Vakapooka imwiidikira kyeemwiinyala, “Lwakwiidikira yewe mangyi ya Vayuda!”
41015019	Vakankapa nrwe na irere na immishia minyiiri. Vakamfiirya-ndi, vakapaana si na kisangu.
41015020	Na elyi vammeentatala indo, vakawuya immbuta soori ilya ya king'ang'ari, vakammbika soori tilya takwe muni.
41015021	Nalyo vakamwiipoo vandenkapya nsalabeu. Vakakooya nndu shia auka ireminy, we Simon wa kulya Krene, nawe ni ndeye wa Iskanda na Rufo. Vakamwiitikya nantare nsalaba ulya wakwe.
41015022	Vakanrwaa Golgota, kwaallwa, ni “Kisharongony.”
41015023	Vakeesa iniinga mfinyo ukee nsasande na nri weenanga, lyo nalakunde iwarya.
41015024	Nalyo vakankapya nsalabeny. Vakaavana soori tilya takwe veetikapyaa kura, kimanyike wo nndu kindo ashiipoo.
41015025	Naasa kwemfika saa isaru nalyo vakankapya nsalabeny.
41015026	Na mwaandu wakwe ukee nreiye yoo uuwe indi, “YEU MMBWE MANGYI YA VAYUDA.”
41015027	Na veala shia vavii vakakapyo nsalabeny ando amwi nawe, umwi taari yei na ungyi taari yeyo. [
41015028	Vakatana indo naambo kilya kyikee kyireiye kyiinukye kyeyaamba, “Mmbo alesandwa na varavi.” ]
41015029	Na vandu vekee iira-u vakarinyisa-rinyisa mirwe, vakamwarara vakaamba, “Akwa, yewe mwiiwundwa mmba ya Iruva na iitana lyingyi ando a mikonu iraru!
41015030	Oloka nsalabeny-te kukukyire kumuni.”
41015031	Na vakohani vaniini na veelosha mavavaso vakavemwiinyala indo-da; veshaambaa, “A mmbo alekira vengyi kalemwa ikukyira we muni.
41015032	Kwakooya kukee Kristo mangyi ya Israeli, oloka nsalabeny ulaalu neese lukwiirikye.” " Na valya vekapyo nsalabeny ando amwi nawe vakavemwiinyala indo.
41015033	Na elyi kwamfika saa irindaru uruka loose lukawoywa ni ireema lukafika saa kyeenda.
41015034	Na saa kyeenda Yesu kafua na unyanga waasha kaamba, " “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani!” Nakyo kwakyaallwa mmbo kyaamba, “Woi Iruva wakwa, woi Iruva wakwa nkyikyi elyi kwashira?”
41015035	Nalyo vandu valya vasalalyi-u maata vaita indo, vakaamba, “Akakau avaanga Elia!”
41015036	Naasa nndu umwi keenda erishaa kandeende kyoonga mura kakyiishura mfinyo utarang'aa. Kavika irereny kakunda inrita ashaambaa, “Reny, lulole kwakooya Elia asheshaa nashemoolota-u.”
41015037	Naasa Yesu kafua lyimwi tupu na unyanga uniini, kakumba muu.
41015038	Nalyo isullya lilya lyaavanisye efo mmba ya Iruva lyikavambuka nnang'ani kavii lyipookya yoo uwe lyikafika si.
41015039	Naasa nshilyi ulya esalalyi yoo usumanu nawe alollya ni indo akumba muu, kaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbo ekee Mwana wa Iruva dede.”
41015040	Naasa kweefo na vaka velolaa vakee kyikwaasha. Na efo nnang'ani ya vaka valya kwiifo Maria wa kulya Magdala na Maria we maye wa Yakobo ulya n-du, na Yose, na Salome.
41015041	Nawo mmbo vellatyaa na imfurukannya meendi ekee kulya Galilaya. Nawo veryani na vaka vengyi-se veengyi valerwa nawe, vakafika Yerusalemu.
41015042	Nalyo elyi kwamfika kyeeri kya nkwaany, na nkonu wiifo ni nkonu weekudeesya, nto usongoye sabato.
41015043	Kukasha nau Yosefu wa kulya Arimataya akee nndu ngyama aishiwa, nawe ni nndu eevereyaa umangyi lwa Iruva. Naasa kakara yaanga na kulya kwa Pilato, kantereva nnying'a ulya wa Yesu.
41015044	Nalyo elyi Pilato aita Yesu amfwa, kasongololo, kanderummya nshilyi ulya wa vasikari nrumi kammbesa kwakooya mmbo afwa kirambo kyaasha.
41015045	Kasunundywa ni nshilyi ulya wa vasikari. Kaniingya Yosefu nnying'a ulya.
41015046	Nawe kandeura soori ya lasi, kandemoolota-fo kamoososya soori tilya ta lasi. Kandemwaara mbangeny ikee shidoshe iweny. Kakunnya-u iwe lyeeraya mwaango wa mbanga ilya.
41015047	Naasa Maria ulya wa Magdala aryani na Maria ulya maye wa Yose, wo veefo velolaa ando aarwa.
41016001	Naasa elyi nkonu ulya wa Sabato wamiira, nalyo Maria wa kulya Magdala vakasanga na Maria ulya ungyi akee maye wa Yakobo, na Salome vakandeura miri ifwaamaa vandemwaamba.
41016002	Naasa elyi ngama nraasi, nkonu wa mbee wa mfungare ulya, vakafika alya mbangeny elyi mwi wanrasa-rasa.
41016003	Vakaumburana wo veni na veni vakaamba, “A nndu alweekyaa iteswa-u iwe lilya lyiraye mwaango wa mbanga ilya lummbutaa kwi?”
41016004	Vainnwa indi miso vakakooya, ate iwe lilya lyantesuwa-u. Nalyo mmbo lyekee iniini nnu.
41016005	Vakaanga na efo mbangeny. Vakalolya mwana nkoo akee rembo yoo taari ya woko usha aree soori shaa pyai. Vakaawukwa mmuu.
41016006	Nawe kavavia, “Nta mulaawukwa mmuu-fo. Mmbo mwiifo musiaa Yesu wa kulya Nasareti, yeto alekapywa nsalabeny. Annduka, nnakyikee-se yaa-fo! Llen-te, akaa ando valemwaara!
41016007	Neeni endeny mundevia valya vakiloshyony vakwe na Petro, nawe mmbo ashemusongoyaa indefika kulya Galilaya. Mfo kundo mushellollyaa shaasa alevemuvia.” "
41016008	Naasa vakauka alya mmbangeny veerishaa mashika vekee irerema na yuuma mwaangaya, nta valavie nndu kindo mashika a elyi vairyaa nnu. [
41016009	Nawe elyi Yesu ammaa iruka elyi ngama nraasi elyi lya nkonu yeto waiduva Sabato kapooka ikoora na Maria wa kulya Magdala, ulya alemuuta mimuyo ilya mikasha mfungare.
41016010	Nawe kakwiipoo kanderuuya valya vekee nawe elyo mbee, nawo vakee vating'i na iiya.
41016011	Nawo elyi vaita indo mmbo eefo na muu alollywa mmbwe, valairikye. " "
41016012	Naasa numa ya vayo kakoora na vavii va efo nnang'ani yaawo etiri fwana ingyi nawo varie shia yeenda ireminy.
41016013	Nawo vakakwiipoo vakanderuuya valya vengyi mbony. Na yewo-da nta valairikye.
41016014	Elyi kyeeri kyeefurummya kakoora na valya ikumi na umwi vaiyo velyaa shoonga. Kavasakira llya valera valakusirya-u, vakaumisa ngoo tawo, nta valairikye valya vallollya annduka.
41016015	Nalyo kavavia, " “Waryeny shia yeenda mundefika masangeny moose dang'a. Na wo kindo kyuumbe kiiyo kyoongoyeny Nrumi yeyo ya Iruva ya Nsia.
41016016	Na nndu kakusirya-u na ibatiswa kavebatiswa, mmbo ashekooya ikirwa. Na nndu kalema ikusirya-u mmbo ashuutywaa uvingo.
41016017	Na ngyende mmbo tishiimmyaa yewo vakusirya-u, ni irina lyakwa vashaantaa nalyo mimuyo mikasha, vaveva vandu veerera na ngyulumi shiiya.
41016018	Mmbo vashetiraa shoka na maako. Na kwakooya vana kindo kiwaa, nkishevamanyaa furu-fo. Mmbo vasheekeryaa vandu valwee maako nawo vashie.”
41016019	Naasa elyi Nndumi Yesu ammaa irera nawo indo, karoswa na efo iruveeu. Kakaa rembo efo woko usha lwa Iruva.
41016020	Naasa vandu valya vakakwiipoo vakandeamba mbony ta Iruva kundo koose. Na Nndumi kavakaya efo kirundyony kyawo. Na ngyende tilya tikavangisa ndera ilya vashaambaa.]
42001001	Ni veengyi veefo valeipoo maako vandevika mbony ta Yesu ando amwi, tyeende ntere, yeto ta findo fileutika kunu kweru,
42001002	shaasa lulefityo ni vandu valya valellollya irero yelyo na miso awo wo veni kumya yoo mapookyony a vayo, na ilyirundya.
42001003	Kimmba ni indo, na yeny shavelollya ni kisha shiiduve mbele mbony yeto udongo kipookya yoo mapookyony a vayo shitisununde nisha, shikwekye-ny itireiya Teofilo wakwa nsuri.
42001004	Naambo kukooye imanya mbony yeto kuleloshwa mmbo titiri ukureekyi lwa vayo.
42001005	Naasa meendi alya Herode akee mangyi ya kulya Yudaya kweefo nndu nkohani evaangwa Sakaria akee wa ufyari lwa Abia. Erie nka wa efo vefuny va Aron, na irina lyakwe ni Elisabeti.
42001006	Nawo vee vavii vekee vandu va usumanu efo usanguny lwa Iruva; veevallya na mavavaso moose a Nndumi na ngyufundo takwe valatiri nta mbese.
42001007	Nawo mmbetiri mwana-fo mashika Elisabeti ekee nka kyuumba nawo vee vavii vemmikwa deny.
42001008	Naasa Sakaria eefo arundaa mashora akwe a ukohani efo kisanguny kya Iruva kikwaani na ikamba lyakwe lya irunda.
42001009	Naasa na vakohani veeshivye ikapa kura, nalyo kawuiyo ni kura nandeanga neefo mmba ya Nndumi nandekora ubani.
42001010	Na vandu vakuumbye-u mamwiingyi moose veefo vaterevaa efo poo kyeeri ekyo ubani lwakorwa.
42001011	Naasa nsu wa Nndumi kasha ikoora nawe asalalyi yoo woko usha lwa mesa eekorya ubani.
42001012	Sakaria kallollya kaising'ang'a kawoywa mmbwerei.
42001013	Naasa nsu ulya wa Iruva kammbia, “Nta kulairyee-fo Sakaria! Kimmba kiterewo kyafo kyammirikywa, na nka wafo Elisabeti akaa nakwiirye mwana wa womi. Neewe kushemfishya irina lyakwe ni Yohane.
42001014	Nawe ashekuniinga ifura na ikyesa, neelyi awonikaa veengyi vashuuta-u nsia.
42001015	Mashika akaa nave nniini yoo kisanguny kya Nndumi, nta nalashenaa mfinyo nta kindo kinangaa, na kipookyaa elyi awonikaa naveva nndu aishwe Mumuyo Mweele.
42001016	Na vana va Israeli veengyi ashevaviiraa vawuye yaalukya Nndumi Iruva waawo.
42001017	Nawe muni ashemwiiryaa mbee akee na Mumuyo wa Elia na finya yakwe nandealwa ngoo ta vandeye va vandu tiwuye yaalukya vana vawo, na yewo vatiri kiila navevaalwa vakooye itira makusaro a vandu va usumanu, naambo vakooye ideesya Nndumi vandu vakwe vakee vasongosye.”
42001018	Nalyo Sakaria kavia nsu ulya wa Iruva: “A kindo ekyo mmbo shikyimanyaa inda? Mashika yeny shammba mmiku, na nka wakwa ni nkyeku wa suku shiingi.”
42001019	Nalyo nsu ulya wa iruva kaallwa kammbia: “Yeny ni Gabrieli shisalalyi yoo kisanguny kya Iruva. Sharumwa shisherera neewe shivekufitya nrumi yeyo ya nsia.
42001020	Neewe llate kushevaa mbimbi kulashiidimaa irera kufike nkonu yeto elyi kisheutikaa indo. Kimmba kwanra kulakusirya na marero yoo akwa. Nang'u ashiinukyaa elyi kyeeri kya vayo kyamfika.”
42001021	Naasa na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vee-fo vavereyaa Sakaria. Vakatambiswa elyi akyeeywa indo efo mmba ya Iruva.
42001022	Naasa kasomuka na poo nta naleedimi irera nawo. Nawo vakamanya paa mmbo amwoorwa kindo efo mmba ya Iruva. Nawe kava avasinya-sinyaany. Kakaa akee mbimbi.
42001023	Kikava elyi mikonu ya mashora akwe yansia alya a ukohani lwakwe, kakwiipoo keenda kyeny kwakwe.
42001024	Naasa elyi numa ya mikonu ilya nka ulya wakwe, we Elisabeti kakufinga. Kandekusuruma efo kyeny ando a miiri iraanu.
42001025	Kaamba, “Ni indo Nndumi aleshitannya mikonu yei annyisauwa, nashyuute nayo usutu lwakwa kunu vanduny.”
42001026	Naasa elyi kwamfika mwiiri wa karindaru nsu ulya Gabrieli karumwa ni Iruva nandefika kulya muriny wa Galilaya uvangwaa Nasareti,
42001027	kulya kwa mwana wa kyeny umwi akee mfinge ni nsero umwi avangwaa Yosefu, akee wa mmba ya Davidi. Na irina lya mwana ulya wa kyeny ni Maria.
42001028	Nalyo nsu ulya wa Iruva kaanga na efo kwakwo kaamba, “Shakuidikira yewe kukee nkyiiye! Ni Nndumi akee neewe!”
42001029	Naasa elyi eeta avio indo, kaising'ang'a. Kava aswaangyany kya kyiidikiro kyilya nkya ngata-kyi?
42001030	Nalyo nsu ulya wa Iruva kammbia, “Nta kulairyee-fo Maria! Mmbo kwawona ikyiiyo efo kwa Iruva.
42001031	Neewe llate kushekufingaa kwiire mwana wa womi, na irina lyakwe kushemmbangaa Yesu.
42001032	Nawe akaa nave nniini navevaangwa ni Mwana wa yeto akee uve ya findo fyoose. Na Nndumi Iruva nanniinge kitima kya umangyi kya ndeye we Davidi.
42001033	Nawe asheshillya mmba ya Yakobo nafike llung'anu na umangyi lwakwe lulakooyaa nta ando lwamanda-fo.”
42001034	Naasa Maria kavia nsu ulya wa Iruva, “A kindo ekyo kyishutikaa inda elyi yeny shilaishi nta mmi?”
42001035	Nsu ulya wa Iruva kaallwa kambia, “Ni Mumuyo Mweele ashekusokyaa na finya ya yeto akee uwe ya findo fyoose ishekukayaa. Nkyo kyaniinga ekyo kyeele kyishirwaa kyivaangwa ni ‘Mwana wa Iruva.’
42001036	Neewe llate, mfyari ulya wafo Elisabeti nawe-da avekufingye lya mwana wa womi lla ndesa akee nkuu. Na mwiiri yeu wakwe mbwa karindaru. Nawe alevaangwa kyuumba.
42001037	Mashika efo kwa Iruva nkwiifo kindo kyilashiidimikaa-fo.”
42001038	Naasa Maria kaamba, “Akakau yeny shikee kyishinga kya Nndumi, ekyo kyakwa kyivekuviiyany indo shaasa kwaamba.” " Naasa nsu ulya wa Iruva kakwiipoo keenda.
42001039	Naasa Maria kawara shia mikonu ilya myeni. Kandefika kulya mafumbu-u na ngeta, kulya muri wa Yuda.
42001040	Kasha yaanga neefo mmba kwa Sakaria. Kaidikira Elisabeti.
42001041	Kyikavaany elyi Elisabeti aita kyiidikiro kilya kya Maria, nalyo kimwana kilya kyikashonga efo nsangeny wa maye. Na Elisabeti kaishwa Mumuyo Mweele.
42001042	Kaonisa unyanga uniini kaamba, " “Yewe kulelimyo mbora nnang'ani ya vaka! Na ekyo kyeendwa ni nsanga wafo kyivekee kyilimyi mbora!
42001043	Na kindo ekyo kyashukya na kwi, elyi shakusheyo ni maye wa Nndumi wakwa?
42001044	Mashika elyi mangelele a kiidikiro kyafo aanga maarwiny akwa, nalyo kyimwana ekyo kikashonga kunu nsangen mbwakwa kiitirwa ni nsia.
42001045	Na ngoma yewe kulekusirya-u, mashika ekyo kulevio kyuuka kwa Nndumi mmbo kyikaa kiutike indo.”
42001046	Nalyo Maria kaamba, “Nrima wakwa wang'anisa Nndumi
42001047	na ngoo yakwa ikakyesa kyimaruma kya Iruva akee nkira wakwa.
42001048	Mashika elyi alelola ufwafwa lwa kyishinga kyakwe. Mashika kipookya ulaalu Marika moose asheshivia, ‘Ngoma ni yewe!’
42001049	Kimmba yeto Mwaafinya anshitanya findo finiini. Na irina lyakwe lyikava yeele.
42001050	Kalunga isarya vandu marika na marika a yewo vamweereiye.
42001051	Kava mwiitana fya wiidimi na woko lwakwe Katarakanisa yewo vatiri kyiila efo makusarony a mirima yaawo.
42001052	Yewo valyimbye kavakuna efo fitiminy fyawo. Karosa yewo vafwafwa.
42001053	Yewo vatirwa nshaa kavawutisa findo fya muye na yewo masimba kavasama vakeenda ruu,
42001054	Kasheekya kyishinga kyakwe we Israeli. Nandekummbwa ivasarya.
42001055	Ndesa alevia vande valya veru we Abrahamu na ufyari lwakwe kufike llung'anu.” "
42001056	Naasa Maria kakaa na Elisabeti kafika ando a mikonu iraru. Kawuya na kulya kyeny kwakwe.
42001057	Naasa Elisabeti kafita kyeeri kyakwe kya iira mwana. Kaira mwana wa womi."
42001058	Nalyo vandu va nnyanu sanda na va ufyari lwakwe vakaita mmbo Nndumi allilya kyikang'ana. Vakasanga nawe vakafura.
42001059	Kyikavaany elyi kwamfika nkonu wa nyanya vakasha nafo vanderina kimwana kilya. Vakakunda ikyifishya irina lya ndeye Sakaria.
42001060	Nalyo maye karouwa kaamba, “Ode! Mmbo avaangwa Yohane!”
42001061	Nawo vakambia, “A elyi efo ufyariny lwafo kuleefo nndu avaangwaa irina elyi!”
42001062	Naasa vakasinnya ndeye kya immbesa irina akundye imfishya.
42001063	Nawe kakunda ipoo lya ireiya. Kareiya-u kyeamba Irina lyakwe ni Yohane. Vakasongololo woose.
42001064	Naasa kyaangu naakyo kana kakwe kakatambashuka kiwo na ulumi lwakwe. Karera ashaarafumaa Iruva.
42001065	Nalyo valya vafiiti nawo nnyanuny vakawoywa mbweerei woose. Na mbony tilya toose tikaenda ikwaana kulya mafumbuny a Yudaya tikakwaana koose.
42001066	Na valya vaita vakatisuruma efo ngoony tawo vakaamba, “A Mwana yeu mmbo akaa nave wa ngata ingai? Nyeli woko lwa Nndumi lunkaaye.”
42001067	Na ndeye, we Sakaria kaishwa Mumuyo Mweele kaawuya kisuku kaamba,
42001068	“Kundearafumwa Nndumi, we Iruva wa Israeli. Kimmba ansaiya vandu vakwe na ivawouwa.
42001069	Kaluseleesya ngo ya ukiro lwa efo mmba ya nsero wakwe, we Davidi.
42001070	Shaasa alerera na kana ka vakisuku valya vakwe veele kyipookya elyo mbee.
42001071	Kya iluniinga ikirwa misa eru na ilwauwa efo maakony a yewo valusuuye woose.
42001072	Natani indo kya isarya vande valya veru na ikummbwa nkundanu ulya wakwe mweele.
42001073	Mboo ilya alelyiiya nde ulya weeru, we Abrahamu naluniinge,
42001074	ando lushenndundyaa lulakitiri weerei lukee valete maakony a misa.
42001075	Lukooye ikaafo lukee na uvaramu na usumanu efo kisanguny kyakwe fyeeri fyeru fyoose.
42001076	Na yewe kyimwana kukaa kuvaangwa, ‘Nkisuku wa eto akee uwe ya findo fyoose,’ mashika kushiryaa Nndumi mbee efo kisanguny kyakwe kundesongosia shia takwe.
42001077	Kya iniinga vandu vakwe urango usha, lweemanya shaasa vakooyaa ikirwa kyikee kyeefwaayo ngyulyamari tawo.
42001078	Nnyelyi Iruva weeru avavyo mmuu kya ilulyilya. Nkyo kimaruma lukasheyo ni sa yuuka efo uuwe.
42001079	Naambo ishevaiya yewo valele ireeminy na nruveny wa ufu. Nakooye yoorisa marende eru na efo shieny ya ufoo.”
42001080	Naasa kimwana kyilya kyikaenda kyiing'ana-ng'anaa na yeengera itumaa efo nriminy. Nawe kandekaa kundo kwa kasa katana afika nkonu ulya alendekoora na Israeli paa.
42002001	Naasa kikava fyeeri efyo ivavaso lyikauka kwa Kaisari Augusto ulana loose lweende ireiyo kya usanu.
42002002	Na kireiyo kilya kyikava kya kyipooka llya meendi Kirenio aleshillya kulya Siria.
42002003	Nalyo vandu vakandereiyo woose, wo nndu na muriny kwakwe kundo aparikye.
42002004	Na Yosefu nawe kavekwiipoo auka kulya Galilaya kulya muriny wa Nasareti kaenda kulya Yudaya muriny wa Davidi uvaangwaa Betilehemu, nnyeli akee nndu wa efo ufyariny lwa Davidi, mfo ukuuny lwakwe.
42002005	Nandereiyo ando amwi na Maria tindi yakwe nawe akufingye.
42002006	Naasa kyikava elyi vakaa-fo kafika kyeeri kyakwe kya iira mwana.
42002007	Kaira mwana wakwe wa mbee kamfingya firami, kamwaara mundiny wa ng'umbe, nnyeli kulaore valeona mwaanya efo mmba ya veny.
42002008	Naasa kyuungony kilya kyeni kweefo veesi velele mbateny veshaala makamba a iringa ironda lyawo elyi kio.
42002009	Paripari vakasheyo ni nsu wa Nndumi na itumbe lya Nndumi lyikavamikya, vakaringityo ni sa riti. Vakairyaa nnu.
42002010	Nsu ulya wa Nndumi kavavia, “Nta mulairyaa-fo! Mashika akakau shiifo mmongoyaa Nrumi ya Nsia nayo ikaa ifike kwa vandu woose.
42002011	Mashika mwamiiryo NKIRA inu mmbwe Kristo akee Nndumi efo muriny wa Davidi.
42002012	Na wende shamoora; Mmbo mushekooya nkoku yeto akee mfingye firami akee mwaare mundiny wa ng'umbe.”
42002013	Nalyo pariparii kulya kwa nsu ulya wa Iruva kukasha ikuumbye-u nsemu mwiingyi nng'u matorito aefo iruveeu. Vakaarafuma Iruva vakaamba,
42002014	“Nnduma ulele Iruva efo kukee uuwe ya findo fyoose na kunu urukeny kukava na ufoo efo kwa vandu vakundikye.”
42002015	Nalyo kyikava elyi vasu valya va Iruva vankwiipoo kulya veesi valya vakai vaende Iruveu, nawo vakaumburana wo veni na veni, vakaamba, “Ndifony-te lweende lutani lwafika kulya Betilehemu, lundelola kindo ekyo kyatanyika ekyo Nndumi aloongoya.”
