42002016	Vakaenda veerishaa vakakooya-fo Maria na Yosefu na nkoku ulya akee mwaare efo mundiny wa ng'umbe.
42002017	Naasa elyi vallolya vakandevambisa mbony eto valevio kya mwana ulya.
42002018	Na vandu vaita vakasongololo woose kya mbony tilya vavio ni veesi valya.
42002019	Na Maria kavika marero alya moose efo nriminy eeswongyaa.
42002020	Na veesi valya vakawuya na kwawo veshiitikisaa Iruva na imwaarafuma kya findo fyoose valeeta vakavelolya indo-da shaasa valevio.
42002021	Na elyi mikonu yamfika nyanya llyo kyeeri kyakwe kyeenda irinwa, kafishywa irina lyakwe ni YESU, llyo alefishywa ni nsu ulya wa Iruva kyeeri kilya kulaore maye enkufinga.
42002022	Na elyi mikonu ya Yosefu na Maria yamiinana ya yeenda ikweeremuta kyikwaani na uvavaso lwa Mose vakandenrosa na kulya Yerusalemu, vandenserisya na efo kisanguny kya Nndumi.
42002023	Shaasa kikee kireiye efo uvavasony lwa Nndumi kyeamba, “Wo kindo kyuumi kiruaa nsanga wa maye kuti kyivaangwa ni kindo kyeele kya Nndumi.”
42002024	Vakatana na kyingi-se kyikee kyivavasye, ni indeniingya kiraso shaasa kyikee kirere efo uvavasony lwa Nndumi, nakyo ni mbeta ivii ao maana avii a mbeta ta mmba.
42002025	Nalyo akakau nndu akee kulya Yerusalemu na irina lyakwe ni Simion. Nawe ni nndu wa usumanu mwiindya Iruva. Kaveva nndu avereyaa kiviiryaa Israeli muu akee nkaye ni Mumuyo Mweele.
42002026	Nawe akee moore Mmumuyo Mweele kyembia nnashefwaa kulaore alolya mbele Kristo eto wa Nndumi-fo.
42002027	Nalyo kasha na efo mmba ya Iruva aitikwa ni Mumuyo Mweele. Na elyi vamiku va kimwana kyilya Yesu veefo vamweende na efo mmba ya Iruva vashemmbutya shaasa kyikee mbuka ya uvavaso,
42002028	kasha imbwarya na maako, kaarafuma Iruva kaamba,
42002029	“Ulaalu shisamaany yeny kishinga kyafo Nndumi shikweengye na ufoo shaasa kuleamba.
42002030	Kimmba miso akwa allolya ukiro lwafo,
42002031	yelo kudeesye usanguny lwa vandu va masanga moose.
42002032	Ukiro elu nsa iniingaa vandu va masanga vakooye irambuyo mbony tafo. Na vandu vafo va Israeli vavikwa itumbeny.”
42002033	Na ndeye na maye vakava mmbo vatirwa ntamba veshiitaa kyilya kyarerwa kya mwana ulya.
42002034	Na Simion kavavikya mbora kavia maye we Maria, “Yeu mmbo akee mmbike-u naambo va kunu Israeli veengyi vakooye iwa nawe na isalala nawe; naveva na wende lurerwa kya iipalwa.
42002035	Na yewe usu lukaa lukwiire efo ngoony na makusaro a vandu veengyi naambo akooye imanyika paa.”
42002036	Naasa kwiiyo na nndu nka mwauya kisuku we Anna akee mfu wa Fanueli wa efo ufyariny lwa Aseri. Nawe amaaye fyeeri fiingyi enkaa na mmi ando a myaaka mfungare uka ammalyikwa.
42002037	Nawe ni nka wa ding'u, na kya ukuu lwakwe amaaye myaaka makumi nyanya na iina. Nawe nnyelakana efo mmba ya Iruva-fo, kava mwiindya Iruva ekootoyaa na itereva Iruva kio na nsanyiny. "
42002038	Nalyo kyeeri kyilya kasha nang'u kaitikisa Iruva. Kandeongoya vandu mbony ta mwana ulya Yesu, valya veefo vaverayaa kufike elyi makiryony a Yerusalemu.
42002039	Naasa elyi vammaa iinutya filya fyoose fikee fivavasye ni Nndumi vakawuya na kulya muriny kwawo kulya Nasareti.
42002040	Na mwana ulya kaenda eng'anaa na itumaa eshishwaa urango usha, na iwona ikyiiyo efo kwa Iruva. "
42002041	Naasa vamiku vakwe veshendaa na kulya Yerusalemu wo mwaaka elyi kwamfika nkonu ulya nniini wa Pasaka.
42002042	Nawe ekifita myaaka ikumi na ivii, vakaveenda inderwa nafo, shaasa vandu vaishivye iindya nkonu ulya nniini.
42002043	Naasa elyi vammawutya mikonu ilya miniini, varie shia yewuya na kyeny, mwana ulya Yesu karewa kulya Yerusalemu vamiku vakwe valeeshi.
42002044	Vakakummbwa kulakooye akee na vandu va kyaaro. Vakaenda efo shia ando a nkonu umwi. Vakansia efo kwa vandu va ufyari, na efo kwa vandu vaishivani nawo.
42002045	Nta valallolye, vakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu, vandensia-fo.
42002046	Kukaira-u mikonu iraru, vakatana vankooya akee rembo efo nnang'ani ya velosha valya avaaranyaa na ivavesa mbony.
42002047	Na valya veiyo vemmwaranyaa vakauma ng'any kya urango lwakwe na mbony tilya arouwa.
42002048	Naasa elyi vallolya indo vakaising'ang'a. Na maye kammbia: Mwana-akwa nkyiki elyi kwalutannya indo? Lla-te ndoo na yeny lwakusia na ting'wa-dwa!
42002049	Nawe kavavia: “A ekyo mwashisiiya nkyokyi? A mmbo mulaishi kundo kushisumanyi isinda ni efo kutiri findo fya Nde?”
42002050	Nawo kyirero kyilya avavia nta valakimanyi.
42002051	Nawe kandeoloka nawo kasha na kulya Nasareti. Kava Mwana avatirye vio.
42002052	Na Yesu keengera irangwa na ing'ana na ikyiiyo efo kwa Iruva kasennya Iruva na vandu.
42003001	Naasa mwaaka wekee wa ikumi na karaanu kipookya Kaisari ulya Tiberio antira uruka na Pontio Pilato ekee nshilyi nniini wa kulya Yudaya na Herode akee mangyi wa kulya Galilaya na Filipo we mwanamaye ekee mangyi wa kulya Iturea na uruka lwa Trakoniti, na Lisania akee mangyi ya kulya Abilene,
42003002	meendi alya Anasi na Kayafa vekee Vakohani vaniini, llyo meendi kirero kya Iruva kilefika kulya kwa Yohane, we mwana wa Sakaria, ekee kulya kasa.
42003003	Nawe kandefika kulya urukeny lufiitani na Yordani loose, kava mwikapa-fo weele lwevia vandu kya ubatiso luryani na yaalashika efo nriminy, naambo vakooye ifwaaywa ngyulyamari tawo.
42003004	Kikaenda indo shaasa kikee kireiye efo kitabuny kitiri marero a nkisuku ulya Yesaya, nang'u akee ule, “Alu unyanga lwa nndu mwiikapa weele kundo kwa kasa ashaambaa, ‘Songosyeny shia ya Nndumi, muveorota na ngyushengye takwe.
42003005	Wo imungo lyiiyo lyishevovirwaa na wo ifumbu lyiiyo na wo kidooro fisholotwaa na si. Na efyo fikulemyi fiveva fyoorotu, na shia eto tikee malomi-lomi tiveva shirambalali.
42003006	Na woose vatiri mwiili valollye ukiro lwa Iruva.’ “
42003007	Nalyo vandu vakava vemweengya mamwiingyi vandebatiswa mmbwe. Nawe kavavia, “Yeni luva ya shoka a ni vi alemusununndya shaasa muturunyaa unyafi elo lwa Iruva lukaa lukape vandu?
42003008	Naasa vikeny ndunda tisumani na nrima waalashikye! Nta mulapooke irera efo nriminy mwaambe, ‘Nde weeru luntiri ni Abrahamu!’ Mmbo shamuvia, Iruva kakunda ashiidimaa iparya Abrahamu vana navaute naakwa ni efo maweny!
42003009	Na kyaara kyammaa ivikwa sindeny ya miri. Naasa wo nri wiiyo ulavikaa ndunda shisha umanywaa na indeerwa murony.”
42003010	Nalyo vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakammbesa vakaamba, A lukatanany inda?
42003011	Nawe kaalwa kavavia, “Yeto akoyaa atiri soori ivii naniinge yeto nalatiri. Na yeto akoyaa atiri shoonga navetana kiwo.”
42003012	Naasa vandu vadedemi vakasha nafo vashebatiswa. Vakammbia, “Llosha, a yese lukatana inda?”
42003013	Nawe kavavia, “Nta mulaengere isoka nndu kindo ngota ekyo kyikee kivavasye.”
42003014	Naasa vandu vasikari vakavemmbesa vakaamba, “A na yese lukatana inda?” Nawe kavavia, “Nta mulaafinyi nndu, nta mulakumbe nndu kya wongo. Mmbo mushekufuryaa na ekyo muniingwaa kya urundi lwany lwa kyaasikari.”
42003015	Naasa vandu va kulya urukeny woose veefo vavereyaa na ikusara-sara kya Yohane efo nriminy veshambaa kulakooye mmbwe muni akee Kristo.
42003016	Nalyo Yohane kaalwa kavavia, “Yeny ni mura shamubatisa nato. Indi kwiifo kushaa yeto mwaafinya ashiilannyi. Nawe nshammaa shiporomwi nta ukova lwa fyaaru fyakwe-fo. We mmbwe ashemubatisaa na Mumuyo Mweele na muro.
42003017	Nawe arie nndeeva na woko lwakwe nandeaiya efo muunguny wakwe kwiile peru. Na nganu eto natyaalye efo mbesheny yakwe, na muulu nandeuvivya murony ularumikaa.” "
42003018	Naasa kalungya-u na marero engyi-se meengyi eveetikaa ashoongoyaa vandu nrumi yeyo ya nsia.
42003019	Naasa mangyi ilya Herode kakooya areryo mmbwe kimaruma kya Herodia ekee nka wa mwanamaye na kimaruma kya makasha moose aletana.
42003020	Na findo filya fyoose fya ngata yeyo keengerya-fo kingyi kanderaya Yohane kifingyony.
42003021	Naasa kyikava elyi vandu va kulya urukeny vaenda ibatiswa ni Yohane na Yesu kaveenda indebatiswa. Eefo atereva Iruva, kulya iruveeu kukarauka.
42003022	Na Mumuyo Mweele kansokya kashenkaya. Na fwana yakwe alesha afwanani na kindo kyuumbe kyikee na mwiili kyikee sha mbeta. Na unyanga lukavaanga luuka efo iruveeu lwishambaa, " “Yeu mmbwe mwana wakwa nkunde shisenywa mmbwe.”
42003023	Na Yesu muni kava nndu wa myaaka makumi araru elyi alepooka ilosha vandu. Nawe aishiwa mmbo akee mwana wa Yosefu, we mwana wa Eli,
42003024	we mwana wa Matati, we mwana wa Levi, we mwana wa Maliki, we mwana wa Yanai, we mwana wa Yosefu,
42003025	we mwana wa Matatia, we mwana wa Amosi, we mwana wa Nahumu, we mwana wa Esili, we mwana wa Nagai,
42003026	we mwana wa Maati, we mwana wa Matatia, we mwana wa Semei, we mwana wa Yosefu, we mwana wa Yuda,
42003027	we mwana wa Yoana, we mwana wa Resa, we mwana wa Serubabeli, we mwana wa Salatieli, we mwana wa Neri,
42003028	we mwana wa Maliki, we mwana wa Adi, we mwana wa Kosamu, we mwana wa Elmadamu, we mwana wa Eri,
42003029	we mwana wa Yosua, we mwana wa Elieseri, we mwana wa Yorimu, we mwana wa Matati, we mwana wa Levi,
42003030	we mwana wa Simion, we mwana wa Yuda, we mwana wa Yosefu, we mwana wa Yonamu, we mwana wa Eliakimu,
42003031	we mwana wa Melea, we mwana wa Mena, we mwana wa Matata, we mwana wa Natani, we mwana wa Davidi,
42003032	we mwana wa Isai, we mwana wa Obedi, we mwana wa Boas, we mwana wa Salmoni, we mwana wa Naasoni,
42003033	we mwana wa Aminadabu, we mwana wa Aramu, we mwana wa Esrom, we mwana wa Faresi, we mwana wa Yuda,
42003034	we mwana wa Yakobo, we mwana wa Isaki, we mwana wa Abrahamu, we mwana wa Tera, we mwana wa Nahori,
42003035	we mwana wa Seruki, we mwana wa Ragau, we mwana wa Faleki, we mwana wa Eberi, we mwana wa Sala,
42003036	we mwana wa Kaini, we mwana wa Arafaksadi, we mwana wa Semu, we mwana wa Noe, we mwana wa Lameki,
42003037	we mwana wa Metusala, we mwana wa Enoki, we mwana wa Yaredi, we mwana wa Maleleeki, we mwana wa Kenani,
42003038	we mwana wa Enoki, we mwana wa Seti, we mwana wa Adamu we mwana wa Iruva.
42004001	Naasa Yesu kawuya yuuka kulya Yordani aishwe Mumuyo Mweele. Kanderawa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva neende kulya kasa.
42004002	Kakaa-fo ando a mikonu makumi aana asheswaa ni yeto Nkumbi. Nawe mikonu ilya kasinda nalalye shoonga. Nalyo elyi yansia, katirwa nshaa.
42004003	Naasa yeto Nkumbi kashembia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva, via iwe elyi lyaaluke nkate!”
42004004	Yesu kanndouwa, “Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Kindo nndu akirya-u nakyo muu nshi shoonga tupu-fo.’ “
42004005	Nalyo kandensaamisa ando a uuwe kamoora ngyumangyi ta ulana yelu toose sha ikafya lyimwi.
42004006	Nalyo yeto Nkumbi kambia, “Umangyi yelu sanda na usuri lwavayo nkuningaa yewe, mashika ni fyakwa shikee nniingye, neeny nshefikuniingyaa nndu shankunda.
42004007	Naasa neewe kwashoolokya sumbai yoo kisanguny kyakwa mmbo fishevaa fyafo fyoose.”
42004008	Na Yesu kaalwa kammbia, “Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Ni Nndumi wafo Iruva mmbwe kushemolokyaa si, nawe mmbwe muni kushemwindyaa.’ “
42004009	Naasa kawuya inrwaa kulya Yerusalemu kansaleesa alya urorony lwa mmba ya Iruva. Kammbia, “Kwakooya mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva, kilya si kwauka yaa kukai!”
42004010	Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, “Ashekuvavasyaa vasu vakwe va iruveeu mashika afo, vashekuringa kwaashuke.
42004011	Nawo vashekukamaraa na mai, neewe kulasheekapa nta urende iwe-u.”
42004012	Nalyo Yesu kaalwa kambia, “Mmbo kyikee kyaambe, ‘Nta kulaese Nndumi wafo Iruva!’ “ "
42004013	Nalyo yeto Nkumbi kakooya ammarisya fyeeso fyoose, Kammbuka, katevesa mbele.
42004014	Na Yesu kawuya na kulya Galilaya akee mmbikye finya ya Mumuyo wa Iruva. Na kyulaalu kyakwe kyikandekwaana na kulya urukeny lusengetye loose.
42004015	Nawe kava mwiilosha efo mmba tawo teterevya eerumishwaa mmbandu woose. "
42004016	Nalyo kasha na kulya Nasareti kundo alelelyo. Kandeanga na efo mmba yeeterevya elyi nkonu wa Sabato shaasa eshivye. Kasalala nandesomya vandu.
42004017	Kasheniingyo kitabu kya nkisuku ulya Yesaya. Kakyoororwa kakooya ando akee areiye u-le:
42004018	“Ni Mumuyo wa Nndumi ashikaye kimmba aleshaamba mafura shindeongoya vakiva nrumi ya Iruva ya nsia. Kashiruma shindekapya yewo vafinge weele lweelekeyo. Na yewo vafu miso vakooye ilola, indelotora yewo vaondore vave valeke,
42004019	indekapa weele lwa mwaaka wa Nndumi usennyi.”
42004020	Nalyo kaososa kitabu kilya kaviirya yeto mwiifurukanya-fo. Kakaa rembo. Na vandu vakee efo mmba yeeterevya woose vakammbikya miso swaa.
42004021	Naasa kapooka ivavia, “Ekyo kyikee kireiye kyaamba indo, ni inu kyammiinukya kyikamwaanga maarwiny any.”
42004022	Nalyo vakandumisha woose vakasongololo kya marero alya asennyi indo auka efo kaniny kakwe. Vakaamba, “A yeu nshiwe mwana wa Yosefu?”
42004023	Nawe kavavia, “Mmbo shiishi deny musheshiviaa, ‘Kukee mwaanga kukire kumuni! Findo lwiitye fyambutika kulya Kapernaumu kyevefitani na kunu kweru fyoose kunu muriny kwafo.’ “
42004024	Kawuya kaamba, “Ni kya dede shamuvia, nndu nkisuku mmbo ashiirikyoo koose kuutaa efo kundo alewonikya.
42004025	Nkya dede shamuvia, kweefo vaka va ding'u veengyi kulya Israeli fyeeri filya fya Elia llya meendi efo iruveeu kuleraya ando a myaaka iraru na miiri irindaru, uruka lukatana lwawoywa nshaa shiniini nnu.
42004026	Nta umwi waawo Elia alerumwa kwakwe-fo, kulaore ni kulya kwa nka ulya wa ding'u ekee kulya Sarepta kulya urukeny lwa Sidoni.
42004027	Kukavekaa-fo vandu va ivave veengyi kulya Israeli meendi alya a nkisuku ulya Elisa. Nawo nta umwi waawo alewona yeeremutwa-fo kulaore ni Naemani, nawe ni nndu wa kulya Siria.”
42004028	Nalyo valya vakee efo mmba yeeterevya elyi veeta arera indo vakatirwa ni unyafi woose.
42004029	Vakakwiipoo vakankilyisa vakanfita kulya kwakulya ya muri wawo. Vakanrwaa alya ifumbu-u masasa, kulya kundo muri ulya wawo ukee ntannyi naambo vakooye imwoolota nang'u.
42004030	Nawe kaira efo nnang'ani yaawo vyaa kakweengya.
42004031	Nalyo kandesoka na kulya Kapernaumu. Nato ni muri wa kulya Galilaya. Kava mwiivalosha elyi mikonu ya Sabato.
42004032	Nawo vakaising'ang'a kya miloshye yakwe, nyeli arera kyikee na ushilyi.
42004033	Nalyo efo mmba yeeterevya eefo nndu atirwa mmumuyo wa utefusu. Nawe kafua na unyanga lwa finya.
42004034	Kaamba, “Sha! Nkyiki kyeru na yewe Yesu wa Nasareti? Mmbo kusheye ilurumataro! Neeny shikwiishi yewe Yewe ni yeto Mweele wa Iruva!”
42004035	Nalyo Yesu kankyeemya kaamba, “Malallya sau kummbuke!” Nalyo mumuyo ulya nkasha ukantuula si yoo nnang'ani yaawo ukammbuka, nta ulammanyi furu-fo.
42004036	Vakatirwa ni mwising'ang'o woose, vakava vaumburanaany, vakaamba, “A kirero ekyo nkya ngata-kyi? Ate arera kikee na ushilyi na wiidimi kyevavasa mimuyo yeyo ya utefusu, nayo ikauka-fo.” "
42004037	Nalyo mbony takwe tikaenda ikwaana kundo koose kulya urukeny lwa kufii.
42004038	Naasa kasomuka efo mmba yeeterevya kandefika kulya mmba kwa Simion. Naasa mayaanka wa Simion etirwa mmuro mwiingi. Vakantereva naambo nanshiise.
42004039	Nalyo kasha nang'u kakwiinyika yoo akai kakyeemmya muro ulya. Nato ukammbuka. Naasa kyaangu nakyo kakwiipoo kavafurukannyany. "
42004040	Naasa elyi mwi wiifo ushoolokaa kakooya asheywa ni valya woose vatiri vandu valwee ndwari shive na shive, vakamweenngye. Nawe kaveekerya maako wo nndu umwi umwi shaasa veiyo kavakira.
42004041	Naasa veengyi vakookwa ni mimuyo mikasha, ikafua ishaambaa, “Yewe mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva!” Nawe kaikyeemya nta nalailekeye ikarera, kimmba imwiishi we mmbwe Kristo.
42004042	Naasa elyi kwankya kakwiipoo keenda kundo kulalelwa. Nalyo vandu valya vakuumbye-fo mamwiingyi vakava vannduya-ruyaany. Vakafika kulya akai. Vakakunda intira nalavauke-se.
42004043	Nawe kavavia, “Kuti shindefika na miriny yeyo ingyi shindeongoya vandu nrumi ya nsia yeyo ya umangyi lwa Iruva, mashika nkyo kindo shilerummyo.
42004044	Nalyo kava mwoongoya vandu mbony efo mmba tawo teeterevya ta kulya Galilaya.”
42005001	Kyikava elyi vandu valya vakuumbye-fo veefo vansisiraa veshaaranyaa ndera ya Iruva, nawe asalalyi yoo mbai ya yeeve ilya ya Genesareti.
42005002	Kalollya ngalava ivii tikee shiirikise yoo mbai ya yeeve ilya. Na valya veereiya makunga vambuka-fo veefo vasangyaa mireiyo yaawo ya nruu.
42005003	Naasa ngalava tilya kaalukya ilya imwi, nayo ikee ya Simion Petro. Kantereva naisembere yuuke yoo kwaarutu yeende neefo kimureny kinnywa. Kakaa-u rembo, kalosha.
42005004	Ammanda irera kavia Simion, “Enderwaa ngalava yeyo efo nnang'ani ya mura, moolote-fo mireiyo yaany mureiye makunga.”
42005005	Simion kaalwa kammbia, “Ale Ndumi! Lweelele rembo taa lwiivinaa, lulatire nta kindo. Indi kwammbika-u ulumi lwafo yewe, nsheendaa yoolota mireiyo yakwa efo mureny.”
42005006	Vakatana indo vakareiya kyilula kya makunga. Mireiyo ilya yaawo ikatana yasia iranduka.
42005007	Vakasinnya wooroye valya vawo vakee ngalaveny ilya ingyi, vashe ivatarama yaalutya wambeu. Vakavesha vakaishura ngalava tilya tiivii, tikatana takunda idovya na si.
42005008	Naasa Simion Petro alolya kive indo, kakutuula si yoo marendeny a Yesu, kaamba, “Nndumi uka yaa shikai, mashika shikee nndu llyamari.”
42005009	Nyeli asongololo na valya akee nawo woose kimaruma kya kilula kilya kya makunga vareiya.
42005010	Na vana valya va Sebedayo, we Yakobo na Yohane, wo ni kiwo da. Yesu kavia Simion, “Nta kulairyee! Uka ulaalu kushaalukaa mwireiya vandu.” "
42005011	Vakanderwaa ngalava tilya alya kwaarutu, vakaisityo-u findo fyoose vakallatya.
42005012	Nalyo kyikava elyi amfika muriny ilya umwi wa vayo, akakau nndu nsero asiiye ni ivave deny. Nawe alolya Yesu kamoolokya si kantereva kaamba, " “Woi Nndumi kwankunda kushiidimaa isheremuta.”
42005013	Nalyo kaorwa woko kampaana, kammbia, “Shankunda eremukany!” Nalyo yeni ivave llya lyikammbuka.
42005014	Nawe kammbavasa nalendekivya nndu. Kaamba, “Mmbo kusheendaa ikoora kulya kwa nkohani, kuvevika na kindo kyeniinga Iruva kya elyi kwammeeremuka, shaasa Mose avavasye kive nkyo ukureekyi lwa efo kwawo.” "
42005015	Naasa mbony yeto takwe tikeengera ikwaana. Na vandu vakava vekuumbya-u misemu miingyi vashe imwaaranya na ishiiswa ndwari tawo.
42005016	Nawe muni kandekoovisa kundo kulalelwa katerevya-fo Iruva.
42005017	Nalyo kyikava mikonu ilya elyi lyimwi eefo aloshaa, na Vafarisayo vakee-fo rembo vasangyi na veelosha mavavaso, nawo vasheye vauka wo kimuri kya kulya Galilaya na Yudaya na kulya Yerusalemu. Na wiidimi lwa Nndumi lwinkaye nakooye ishiisa vandu. "
42005018	Nalyo akakava vasoro vansha nang'u varie nndu na kitara akee muumu malungo. Vakasia mwaanya wemwiita na mmba na immbika yoo usumanu nawe.
42005019	Valaoni shia yemwiita nafo kimaruma kya nsemu ulya wa vandu vakuumbye-u. Vakasaama na efo mmbeeu. Matofari alya maale vakauta-fo maata, vakamwoolota nang'u ando amwi na kitara kyilya kafika si yoo Yesu akai.
42005020	Nawe elyi allolya shaasa vakusirya-u indo, kaamba, “Nndu wakwa kwammefwaaywa ngyulyamari tafo!”
42005021	Nalyo veelosha va mavavaso veefo na Vafarisayo vakapooka itirwa mmakusaro vakaamba, “Ni nndu kyi yeu arera indo kyikee kya iruma Iruva?” Mmbi ashiidimaa ifwaaya vandu kya ngyulyamari tawo kuloore ni Iruva muni?
42005022	Naasa Yesu kamanya makusaro alya awo kaalwa kavavia, “A ekyo mukusarye efo nriminy ni kya ngata ingai?
42005023	A kyaangu ni kyingakyi? Ndesa ni yaamba, ‘Kwammefwaaywa ngyulyamari tafo,’ ao ni yaamba, ‘Salala kurue-rue?’
42005024	Naasa manyin-te Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo atiri mumu-da kunu urukeny wefwaaya vandu kya ngyulyamari tawo.” Naasa kavia nndu ulya muumu malungo, “Salala, kwepoo kitara kyafo, kweende na kyeny kwafo.”
42005025	Na kyaangu naakyo kasalala velollye woose. Kakurika kitara, keenda kulya kyeny kwakwe esharafumaa Iruva.
42005026	Na vandu vaiyo vakaising'ang'a woose, vakava vaarafumany Iruva. Vakatirwa mmbwerei. Vakaamba, “Inu lwalolya findo fya wende.”
42005027	Nalyo ekyo kinsia kakwipoo-fo kalolya nndu n-dedemi, avaangwaa Levi, ekee rembo efo mmba yeededemya. Kammbia, “Shilatya!”
42005028	Nawe keesityo-u fyoose, kakwipoo, kallatya.
42005029	Nalyo Levi kavika suku-kuu niini, kukasha nafo nseemu mwiingyi wa vadedemi na vandu vengyi vasasangyi nawo. Vakakaa-fo rembo vakalya shoonga.
42005030	Nalyo Vafarisayo vasangyi na veelosha mavavaso vakakunung'una veereraa na valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakaamba, “A kimaruma nkyikyi elyi mwalya na ina indo amwi na vadedemi yewo valyamari?”
42005031	Na Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Nshi yewo vakee na finya vatinnyo mmwaanga-fo, ni yewo valwee.
42005032	Nta nshisheye ivaanga yewo va usumanu-fo, kulaore ni yewo valyamari naambo vakooye yaalashika efo nriminy.”
42005033	Nawo vakammbia, “A elyi vakiloshyony kya Yohane vakootoyaa keengyi na ivika fiterewo, na vakiloshyony kya Vafarisayo vakavetana kiwo, indi yewo vafo wo valya na ina.”
42005034	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “A mwaamba mushiidimaa iitikya vandu va walyi vakootoye elyi muni walyi akee nawo?
42005035	Indi kwikaa kushe mikonu elyi vasokwaa muni walyi. Llyo kyeeri vashekootoyaany.”
42005036	Naasa kaveera kyaaso ekyi. “Nkwiifo nndu asaara kirami efo sooriny shiiya kakifummya efo sooriny shikuu-fo. Kakyifummya-u mmbo asheniingaa na soori ilya shiiya iranduke. Na kirami ekyo kya efo sooriny shiiya nta nkyishiishivanaa na yeyo shikuu-fo.
42005037	Nta nkwiifo nndu asuruma mfinyo mwiiya efo mbolokony ta masara makuu-fo. Kasuruma-fo mfinyo yeto mwiiya mmbo uriita mboloko yeto. Nato mweni upusuke, na mboloko nato tikavelyamarika.
42005038	Indi mfinyo eto mwiiya kuti undesurumwa mbolokony shiiya.
42005039	Nta nkwiifoo nndu ammaa ina mfinyo nkuu kakunda yeto mwiiya-fo. Mmbo ashambaa, yeto nkuu nto utiri muye.”
42006001	Naasa kyikava elyi nkonu wa Sabato, eefo ashiraa mareminy a nganu, valya vakiloshyony vakaurushwa fyaa, vakasisa na maako vakalya.
42006002	Naasa Vafarisayo valya maata vakaamba, “A nkyikyi elyi mwatana kindo kilatiri mumu weetana elyi lya Sabato?”
42006003	Nalyo Yesu kaalwa kavavia, “A mmbo mulandesomi shaasa Davidi aletana, llya eetirwa nshaa na valya aryani nawo?
42006004	Shaasa aleanga na efo mmba ya Iruva kaipoo mikate ilya ya kideesyo? Kalya kaniingya na valya aryani nawo. Nayo nnyetiri mumu weelyiwa ni nndu-fo, kuuta Vakohani veni.”
42006005	Nalyo kavavia, “Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo akee Nndumi wa Sabato.”
42006006	Naasa kikaa elyi lya Sabato ingyi kaanga nee-fo mmba yaawo yeeterevya kaloshya-fo. Nafo kusheye nafo nndu, woko lwakwe usha lwekee ufiri.
42006007	Naasa vaarya valya va fitabu vasangyi na Vafarisayo veefo vallola kwakooya ashisaa nndu elyi lya Sabato, naambo vakooye inkumba.
42006008	Nawe eeshi makusaro awo, kavia nndu ulya wa woko ufiri, “Kwiipoo, kushe na yaa nnang'ani.” Kakwiipoo kashesalala-u.
42006009	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Shamuvesany indi, ‘A kwiifo mumu weetanya nndu mesha elyi nkonu wa Sabato, ao niitana ukasha, ni ikira muu wa nndu ao ni yuureta?’ “
42006010	Kavalola kavakwaanisa woose. Kavia nndu ulya. “Orwa woko lwafo!” Nawe katana indo, nalyo woko lwakwe lukawuya iva usha.
42006011	Naasa nawo vakarooyo nngoo, vakavaany varera wo veni na veni kindo vashiidimaa itannya Yesu.
42006012	Naasa kyikava mikonu ilya kakwiipoo-fo kandefika ando a ifumbu-u indeterevya-fo Iruva. Kalala rembo taa eterevaa Iruva.
42006013	Na elyi kwankya kavaanga valya vakiloshyony na ando akai. Efo nnang'ani yaawo kasauwa-fo ikumi na vavii. Nawo mmbo alevavaanga varumi.
42006014	Nawo ni Simion, yeto alemmbaanga ni Petro, na Andrea we mwanamaye, na Yakobo na Yohane, na Filipo, na Bartolomayo,
42006015	na Matayo, na Toma, na Yakobo ulya wa Alfayo, na Simion ulya avaangwa Selote;
42006016	na Yuda Iskariote, mmbwe yeto aleva ndiingyi wakwe.
42006017	Nalyo kooloka-fo aryani nawo. Kasheirisha efo kukee kurambalali. Na vandu vakuumbye-u veengyi vakee vakiloshyony kyakwe. Na ironda iniini lya vandu lyiifo vaukye kulya Yudaya koose na Yerusalemu, na uruka lufiitani na yeeve ilya niini, lulya lwa Tiro na Sidoni. Nawo vasheye ishemwaaranya naishiiswa ndwari tawo.
42006018	Na yewo valyise ukiva mmimuyo yeyo ya utefusu vakaveshiiswa.
42006019	Na vandu valya vakuumbye-fo woose vakakunda ishempaana. Nyeli akee na finya ishyukyaa vandu woose ishiiswa.
42006020	Nalyo kainwa miso kalola valya vakiloshyony kyakwe kaamba, Ngoma yeni mukee vakiva kimmba umangyi lwa Iruva lwava lwany.
42006021	Ngoma yeni mutirwa nshaa ulaalu, kimmba mukaa muwuutiswa. Ngoma yeni mwiifo mwiiyaa ulaalu, kimmba mukaa museke.
42006022	Ngoma yeni elyi vandu vamusua na imwaanta efo ikwaanuny lyawo, na imwaarara, na isuta irina lyany sheelyi ni kindo kyeesi, kwakooya ni kimaruma kya Mwana yeto wa nndu.
42006023	Fureny-dwa nkonu eto na ifina, mashika akakalyi isina lyany lyava iniini efo iruveeu. Mashika findo fya ngata yeyo mfyo vandeye vawo valevetannya vakisuku valya.
42006024	Indi yeni mukee vasuri, oshiny lwany, mashika fimuviryaa muu mulemmaa ifiwarya.
42006025	Na yeni muwuurye shapu ulaalu, oshiny lwany, mmbo mukaa mutirwa nshaa. Na yeni mwiifo musekaa ulaalu oshiny lwany, mmbo mukaa mukunarye na iiya.
42006026	Na yeni vandu vakamurera kya usha woose, oshiny lwany! Mashika niindo vandeyawo valeva vetanya vakisuku valya va wongo.
42006027	Indi kindo shamuvia yeni mwiifo musharanyaa, Kundeny vakiduva vany. Yewo vamusua vatanyiny fya usha.
42006028	Yewo vamudenga vakundyeny mbora. Yewo vamwiinyala vaterevyeny efo kwa Iruva.
42006029	Na nndu kakukapa woi lwa yuundu lyimwi, kyevemmberetye na yelyo lyingyi. Na nndu kakusoka soori yafo ya yeerya, na yeyo kuree nta kulamwiimi.
42006030	Wo nndu akutereva kindo nniinge. Na nndu kakusoka efyo fyafo nreeye.
42006031	Shaasa mukundye vamutannyi yeni, neeni kevevatanyiny indo-da.
42006032	Na kwakooya mwakunda yewo vemukunda yeni tupu, a kyaanu kyany mushutaa-u nkyoki? Naakwa na vandu valyamari mmbo vavekunda yewo veevakunda.
42006033	Mashika vandu muvatanyaa fya usha, kwakooya ni yewo vamutannyaa yeni fya usha, a kyaanu kyany mushuuta-u nkyoki? Naakwa na yevo valyamari ni indo-da vatanaa.
42006034	Na vandu muvaakuyaa kwakooya ni yewo muvikye nsia wewarya-fo kindo, a kyaanu kyany mushutaa-u nkyokyi? Na yewo valyamari mmbo vaveakuya valyamari vauroye vawo vakooye itawo ekyo kiinani.
42006035	Indi veny vekunda vakiduva vany, veny vetanya vandu fya usha na ivaakuya mulavereyaa kindo mutawaa. Llyo isina lyany lyisheng'anaa muveva na vana va eto akee uuwe ya findo fyoose. Kimmba we ava indo mwiisimba naakwa ni yewo valatiri kyaanu na yewo varavi.
42006036	Naasa veny veelyilya vandu, shaasa na Nde eto waany akee mwiilillya.
42006037	Nta mulakuvike veerumbwa kya vandu mukooye ekyo kyany kyarumbuwa indo. Nta mulave veutya vandu uvingo mukooye yuutyo uvingo yeni. Veny vereeya vandu siye tany, neeni mukooye ireeywa siye.
42006038	Simbeny vandu simbo, na yeni muvesimbwa. Ni kyeeso kisha kyikee kisirye, kikee kisisikye, kikee kya mwangara nkyo vashemuletyaa efo maakony. Nyeli kyeeso musheesaa nakyo nkyo musheesyoo yeni mwiviiryo.
42006039	Nawe kaveera kyaaso eki, “Ndesa nndu mfu miso ashiidimaa yoora nndu mfu miso uroye shia? Oode, wo vee vavii mmbo vashoolokaa irininy.
42006040	Nta nkwiiyo nndu wa kiloshyony eerye mwiillosha-fo. Indi kammaa isongosyo deny mmbo ashiinanaa na mwiillosha.
42006041	Neewe naambo-kyi kwalola kinaana kyikee irisony lya mwanamau, na ikongo lyikee irisony lyafo yewe kulalyilolye?
42006042	A ni inda kusheviaa mwanamau, ‘Sya-do mwanama, shikweekye yuuta kinaana kikee irisony lyafo,’ kulalolyaa ikongo lyikee irisony lyafo ku muni? Yewe nkunang'ari songwa yuuta ikongo lyikee irisony lyafo kumuni, llyo kushelolyaa warya kinaana kyikee irisony lya mwanamau kukiute.”
42006043	Mashika nkwiifo nri nsha uvikaa ndunda shikasha-fo. Nta nkwiifoo nri nkasha uvikaa ndunda shisha-fo.
42006044	Mashika wo nri mmbo umanyika na ndunda tavayo. Mashika ndunda ta marwaa nshi efo nrweny tayaywa-fo, nta ndunda ta nsabibu ntidowaa efo miingeny-fo.
42006045	Na nndu yeto nsha, efo findony fyakwe fisha asurumyi efo nriminy mmbo avaa mweende-fo ekyo kisha. Na nndu yeto nravi efo findony fyakwe fya uravi asurumyi nriminy kaveva mweende-fo ekyo kiravi. Mashika efyo fikee efo nriminy mfyo kana karera.
42006046	Neeni naambo ki mwashivanga, “Nndumi, Nndumi, na ekyo shaamba nta mulakitani?
42006047	Wo nndu asha na kwakwa kaaranya marero yoo akwa kaatana, nshemoraa mmbo avakye vi?
42006048	Mmbo avakye nndu aletana mmba yakwe kasuma uvasha kafika si. Kaiveiya uvasha ando iwe lyikwaalye si. Naasa mura ukasoka mwiingyi, mfu yeto ukashesindika mmba ilya, nta uleedimi isingisa, nyeli ikee shitani nisha.
42006049	Na yeto mwaaranya kara nalatana, mmbo avakye nndu aletana mmba kaisimbita si nalasumi uvasha. Ikasha isindikwa ni mfu wa mura. Nalyo yeni ikawunduka na miwoye yavayo ikawa pu!”
42007001	Naasa elyi ammaya marero alya moose efo maarwiny a vandu, kandefika kulya Kapernaumu.
42007002	Naasa kweefo kishinga kya nshilyi umwi wa vasikari iyana elwee nnu deny, nawe ni nndu akundikye efo kwakwe.
42007003	Naasa ammiita mbony ta Yesu kanrummya vamiku va Vayuda vandentereva neende nandeshiisa kishinga kilya kyakwe.
42007004	Nawo vakafika kulya kwa Yesu vakantereva nnu, vakaamba, “Mmbo asumani kumbutye kindo ekyo,
42007005	Kimmba akundye vandu va uruka lweru, katana alutanya na mmba yeyo ya iterevya.”
42007006	Naasa kawara shia yeenda nawo. Naasa elyi amfika ando nalakyikee-se kwaasha nafike efo kyeny kwa nshilyi ulya, karuma vambuya vakashembia, “Nndumi nta kulakwaarise! Mashika nshimaa yewe kufike kyeny kwakwa-fo.
42007007	Nkyo kimaruma na yeny shalolya nshimaa shifike kwafo shimuni-fo. Indi amba kirero kyimwi-da, nalyo kyishinga kyakwa kyishiaa.
42007008	Mashika na yeny mmbo shikee nndu mwiitorye mmbaniini vakwa. Shivetiri na vasikari shivaitorye. Naasa, shavia yeu, ‘Enda!’ Kaveenda. Shavia ungyi, ‘Osho!’ Kavesha. Shavia kishinga ekyo kyakwa, ‘Endetana ule!’ Kavetana.”
42007009	Naasa elyi Yesu aita indo kasongololo kyakwe, Kaindukya valya vasangi-fo vellatyaa, kavavia, “Shamuvia, nta kunu Israeli nshandelolya kyikusiryo king'ani indo-fo.” "
42007010	Nalyo valya varumwa vakawuya na kulya kyeny vakakooya kishinga kyilya kyammishia.
42007011	Naasa kyikava elyi kyeeri kya numa-numa kawara shia yeenda kafika muriny uvangwaa Naini. Na vakiloshyony vakwe varyani nawe na vandu nkuka.
42007012	Naasa elyi afika kufii na ngiri ya muri ulya, nalyo akakau nndu mfu ariwa eefo asomutwaa na kulya kipoo ya muri. Nawe ni mwana wa ngitany efo kwa maye akee nka wa ding'u, na vandu va kulya muriny veefo veengyi vemwimyaa.
42007013	Nndumi kallollya kavavyo mmuu kyakwe, kammbia, " “Kusyedo mai! Kulaiye!”
42007014	Kaserikya yoo kufii, kapaana kitara kilya kirye nnying'a ulya. Na valya vakurikye vakairisha. Nawe Yesu kaamba, “Mwana shakuvia, kwiipoo!”
42007015	Nndu ulya mfu kakwiipoo kakaa rembo, kapooka irera. Kaniingya maye.
42007016	Naasa valya vaiyo vakatirwa mmbwerei woose, vakang'anisa Iruva, vakaamba, “Ate nndu mwawuya kisuku nniini ankwiipoo kunu kweru, na Iruva ansha isaiya vandu vakwe.” "
42007017	Na mbony tilya tikeenda iidukana kulya Yudaya koose na masangeny alya a minyanuny moose.
42007018	Nalyo valya vakiloshyony kya Yohane vakandemwoongoya mbony yeto toose.
42007019	Nalyo Yohane kavaanga vavii va efo kiloshyony kyakwe na yoo akai, kavaruma kulya kwa Nndumi, kaamba, " “A yewe mmbwe ulya avereyoo nashe, ao lukavereya ungyi?”
42007020	Naasa vasoro valya vakafika kulya kwakwe vakaamba, “Ni Yohane Mmbatisi aluruma kunu kwafo kavesa kwakooya yewe mmbwe ulya avereywaa nashe, ao lukavera ungi?”
42007021	Nalyo kyeeri kilya kyeni Yesu eefo ashiisaa vandu veengyi ndwari na fivalyilyisaa na mimuyo mikasha. Na vandu vafumiso veengyi kavasimba simbo yeelola.
42007022	Nalyo kaalwa kavavia, “Endeny mundeongoya Yohane kindo mwalollya na iita, yewo vafu-miso veefo valolaa, yewo vakee miketekete veefo vashendaa, yewo va ivave veefo vasheeremukaa. Yewo vafu-maarwi vee-fo vashitaa. Yewo vafu veefo varukaa. Yewo vakiva veefo vashoongoywaa nrumi ya nsia.
42007023	Na ngoma nndu nalaonisa nsindara yaa kwakwa.”
42007024	Naasa vakiloshyony valya va Yohane vakakwiipoo vakeenda. Nawe kapooka irera na valya vakuumbye-fo kya Yohane kaamba, “A kimaruma mukakwipoo kyeny mukandefika kulya kasa a nkyikyi muleenda ilola-fo? Ndesa ni ikongye lyivivitwa-vivitwaa ni uraato?
42007025	A kimaruma mukakwipoo mukandefika-fo, a nkyikyi muleenda ilola-fo? Ndesa ni nndu aree masara mamamiri? Yewo varee masara a wiitori na ilya usuri akawo vakee efo mmba ta kimangyi.
42007026	A kimaruma mukakwipoo kyeny mukandefika-fo nkyikyi muleenda ilola-fo? Ni nndu mwaawuya fisuku ndesa? Ee-da, neeny shamuvia, Mmbo ang'annyi nndu nkisuku.
42007027	We mmbwe ulya akee ndeiye kyeyamba, ‘Akakau nsu wakwa shanruma nakwiirye mbee, mmbwe ashedeesyaa shia yafo nakusongoye.’ “
42007028	Naasa shamuviany, “Efo nnang'ani ya yewo vaire mmbaka nkwiifo nniini kairya Yohane-fo. Kya indi yeto akee n-du efo umanginy lwa Iruva mmbo ang'ani kamwiirya.”
42007029	Na vandu va uruka loose sanda na vadedemi mmbo valearannya vakairikya Iruva mmbwa usumanu elyi valeenda ibatiswa ubatiso lwa Yohane.
42007030	Indi Vafarisayo sanda na yewo vasunundye uvavaso mmbo valealwa makusaro a Iruva akusarye kyawo akafwa mmwasi elyi valelema indebatiswa mmbwe.
42007031	“Naasany vandu va irika elyi a shivaananise neekyi? Mmbo vafwanani navi?
42007032	Mmbo vafwanani na fivana fikee rembo ando a singira. Fikavaangana fikaamba, ‘A nkyikyi elyi lwamukapya fivale neeni mulafini? Lukaimba fiimbo fya kiiyo neeni mulaiye!’
42007033	Yohane Mmbatisi mmbo alesha ekee nndu nalalyaa nkate nta ina mfinyo. Mukaamba, ‘Mmbo atirwa mmumuyo nkasha.’
42007034	Kukasha nafo Mwana yeto wa Nndu akee mwiilya na ina mukawuya yaamba, ‘Akakau mwitalauwa ndeu na mwiina mfinyo, kavetira mbuya na vandu vadedemi na valyamari.’
42007035	Kyikavaany urango usha mmbo lulekooya ivinga mwaandu kyuuka na efo kwa yewo vakee vana va vayo woose.”
42007036	Naasa nndu wa efo kwa Vafarisayo kasha intereva nandelya nawe shoonga. Nalyo kandeanga na efo mmba kwa Mfarisayo ulya, kakaa-u rembo.
42007037	Nalyo akakau nndu nka ansha nang'u akee wa kulya muriny atannyi fya ulyamari. Nawe elyi ammanya Yesu mmbo akeelya shoonga efo mmba kwa Mfarisayo ulya, kasha arie kishupa kya iwe yaa kitiri mafura ekwaamba afwaamaa nisha.
42007038	Kashesalala yoo numa ando aoroye nang'u marende ashiiyaa kanshoshotya misoru alya marendeny. Kawuya kaangata-u na fii ta nrwe wakwe. Nawe kamiminda-miminda marende alya akwe kaamba mafura alya.
42007039	Naasa mfarisayo ulya ammbaanga elyi alolya kive indo, karera efo nriminy kaamba, “Kukooye nndu yeu ekee nkisuku mmbo emanyaa nka yeu mmbwe vi na ni wa ngata-kyi yeu ampaana ndesa akee llyamari.”
42007040	Nalyo Yesu kaalwa kammbia, “Simon-ro, mmbo ntiri kindo nkuviaa!” Nawe kaamba, “Llosha, kwaambaye mbee!”
42007041	Kammbia, “Kweefo nndu mwaakuya vandu etiri vaasile vavii. Yeto umwi etiri siye yakwe ya dinari mayana araanu, na yeto ungyi ni ya dinari makumi araanu.
42007042	Kakooya valatiri kyetaa. Kavareeya siye woose ve vavii. Naasany, vandu yewo ni ungau ashenkundaa kilanya?”
42007043	Simon kaalwa kammbia, “Shikusarye ni ulya alenreeya siye yeyo shiniini mmwasi.” Nawe kammbia, “Kwarumbwa kisumani.”
42007044	Llyo kaindukya nka ulya kavia Simion, “Kulollye nka yeu-ro? Mmbo shaanga na kunu mmba kwafo, nta kulashiniinge mura wa marende akwa. Nawe katana ashishoshotya misoru yakwe marendeny. Kawuya kaangata na fii takwe ta nrweny.
42007045	Nta nkwashimiminda na fyoomu-fo. Nawe kipookya shammaanga na kunu nalandederya ishimiminda-miminda marende-fo.
42007046	Nta nkwashaamba mafura nrwen-fo. Nawe katana aamba marende akwa mafura afwamaa.
42007047	Nkyo shakuviaany, mmbo amfwaaywa ngyulyamari takwe tikee shiingyi kimmba ankunda nnu. Indi yeto afwaaywa kyaangu, mmbo akunda kyaangu da.”
42007048	Naasa kammbia, “Kwamfwaaywa ngyulyamari tafo!”
42007049	Nalyo valya veefo vellyaa nawe shoonga vakapooka irera efo nriminy, “A nndu yeu ni vi katana afwaaya vandu kya ngyulyamari tawo?”
42007050	Naasa nawe kavia nka ulya, “Kwankusirya-u indo, nkyo kyakukyira! Enda na ufoo!”
42008001	Kyikava kyeeri kya elyi numa we muni ekee kyaaro kafika muriny ungyi na ungyi na kimuriny kingyi na kingyi akapaa weele na yoongoya vandu nrumi ya nsia ya umangyi lwa Iruva, na valya ikumi na vavii varyani nawe.
42008002	Na vaka vaangu vakee vashiise mimuyo mikasha na ndwari, mmbwe Maria wa kulya Magdala embukwa ni mimuyo mikasha mfungare;
42008003	na Yoane akee nka wa Kusa ulya mwiikalya findo fya Herode, na Susana na vengyi veengyi. Nawo vakava vemfurukannya na findo fyawo vatiri.
42008004	Naasa vandu vakasha ikuumbya-fo ironda iniini, vakakwiipoo vauka miri mive na mive vakavingya kulya akai. Nawe karera nawo avaviaa fyaaso.
42008005	“Kweefo nndu mweera mbeu, kakwipoo nandeera mbeu takwe. Eefo asheraa, tilya maata tikawa efo mbai ya shia. Tikavavarwa, na ndeye ta efo nginiiu tikalya tikamaa.
42008006	Na tingyi tikaoloka ando iwe lyikwaalye si. Tikamya tikawuya yuuma mashika tilatiri nsiny.
42008007	Tingyi tikawa ando a miingeny. Miinga ilya ikamia ando amwi nato, ikatifira.
42008008	Tingyi tikawa ando a uteri usha, tikamia tikaraaka, ilya imwi ikavika iyana.” Elyi arera indo kaonisa unyanga kaamba, “Nndu atiri maarwi earanya navearanya!”
42008009	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakwe vakammbesa, a kyaaso ekyo mmbo kyaambakyi?
42008010	Nawe kaamba, “Yeni mmbo muleniingwa imanya mbony eto ta umangyi lwa Iruva tikee shirike. Na valya vengyi wo vakavio fyaaso tupu, naambo ilola valole valalolye, na yaaranya vaaranyi valaipuye.”
42008011	Na kyaaso ekyo kyikee ule, “Mbeu tilya ni Irero lya Iruva.
42008012	Na valya va mbai ya shia wo ni vandu vearanya. Vekyaaranya, yeto mmbishwa kasha nang'u, kaipoo irero llya efo nriminy mmbwawo, valakooye ikusirya nalyo na ikirwa.
42008013	Na valya va efo iwe-u, mmbo vandu vearanya irero elyo, vakalyitira na nsia. Nawo kindo vauwa ni mirarii, mmbo vakusirye-u kivero tupu, na kyeeri kya yeeswa vakalakana-u.
42008014	Na tilya tawa ando a miingeny, mmbo vandu vearanya-da, vakeenda vakafirwa ni ngyusau ta findo fya muu yeu, na masaa avayo, na lango ta vayo valakyivike-se kimu.
42008015	Na tilya ta uteri usha, to ni vandu vearanya irero elyo vakalyitira na nrima usongovye ukee nsha, vakavika kimu kimaruma kya elyi vakee vandu vakusirye-u.”
42008016	Nkwiifo nndu ashataa taa ya mmba kaisikya na kiiya, ao kaivika kwasi ya kitara-fo. Mmbo aivikaa ando a yeekerya taa na vandu vaanga neefo mmba vakooye ilolya sa woose.
42008017	Mashika kuleefo kindo kyikee kyirike kyikara kyilaparikya paa-fo. Nta nkwiifo kindo kyikee kisurumi kyikara kyilamanyika kyikafumirwa paa-fo.
42008018	Naasany loleny waarya shaasa mushaaranyaa. Mashika wo nndu atiri kindo mmbo aniingwaa kingi, na yeto nalatiri kindo naakwa na ekyo atiri kavekisokwa.
42008019	Naasa kakooya maye na vanavamaye vafika kulya kwakwe. Nalyo valeedimi ifika yoo akai kimaruma kya vandu valya vakuumbye-fo.
42008020	Naasa kashevio sheelyi maye na vanavamaye vasalali yoo poo vakundye illolya.
42008021	Nawe kaalwa kavavia, “Ma na vanavama vakwa mmbo vandu yewo vaaranya ndera ya Iruva vakaveilatya.”
42008022	Naasa kyikava nkonu umwi kasaama na ngalaveny we na vakiloshyony vakwe, kavavia, “Ndifony-te, luruuke lufike kulya kwakulya ya iruva elyi!” Vakaporomwa ngalava ilya ikeenda iivarye.
42008023	Naasa elyi vee-fo vashendaa nayo we karengeya kalala. Nalyo uraato uniini lukaoloka efo iruveny. Ngalava ilya ikeenda ishishwaa mura, kikavany ni ando eeretya muu.
42008024	Nawo vakamweengya vakamwaanta vakaamba, “Woi Llosha, woi llosha, lwiifo lusyaa!” Nawe kakwiipoo kakyeemmya uraato llwa na mwaalukoluko ulya wa mura. Fikamalallya kukava kimammya sau.
42008025	Naasa kavavia, “Nkwi mweera kikusiryo kyany?” Naasa vakasongololo vatirwa mmbwerei. Vakaviana, “A nndu yeu mmbwa kwi katana arerya na ngyuraato na mura, nafyo fikamwiirikya?”
42008026	Nalyo vakaruuka na kulya kwa kulya vakafika kulya urukeny lwa Vagerasi nalo lusumani na lwa Galilaya.
42008027	Naasa elyi ammooloka na kulya kwaarutu auka efo ngalaveny nalyo kakwaannya na nndu umwi auka kulya muriny atirwa mmimuyo mikasha. Nawe kipookya kyeeri kyaasha nnyeraa soori-fo. Na ando akwe ekaa nshi efo mmba-fo, ni efo mmbangeny ta vafu.
42008028	Naasa kalollya Yesu kakooma. Kamwolokya-si karera na unyanga uniini, kaamba, “Nkyiki kyeru neewe Yesu kukee Mwana wa Iruva yeto akee uwe ya findo fyoose? Mmbo shakutereva kulashilyi-se ukiva-fo!”
42008029	Nyeli eekundye ivavasya mumuyo ulya nkasha wa utefusu uuke nndu ulya. Mashika uleva mwiintafukya fyeeri fiingyi. Nawe kava mwiifingwa na mise na ikapyo minya eeringwaa indo. Indi filya fyamfinga kava mwiififisha karumbutwa ni mumuyo ulya nkasha ukamfita kundo kulalelwa.
42008030	Naasa Yesu kauvesa kaamba, “A irina lyafo ni yewe vi?” Nato ukaamba, “Ni itorito,” mashika emmaangwa ni mimuyo mikasha miingyi.
42008031	Nayo ikamfuuya nalaivavasye yeende yooloka irininy.
42008032	Naasa kweifo ironda lya nguve shiingyi lyeshiiswaa yoo kipirimikony kya ifumbu. Nayo ikamwooshora naivikye mumu yeende itaanga. Nawe kaivikya mumu.
42008033	Naasa Mimuyo ilya mikasha ikauka nndu ulya ikandeanga nguve tilya. Nalyo ironda llya lyikapufuka-fo lyikaoloka neefo waangeu. Lyikasiiya kulya iruveny, lyikafumbwa mmura.
42008034	Nalyo veesi valya valolya indo vakarisha vakandevia vandu kulya muriny na kulya mareminy.
42008035	Na vandu vakakwiipoo-fo vandelola kilya kyatanyika. Vakafika kulya Yesu akai. Vakavekooya-fo nndu ulya ammbukwa mmimuyo ilya mikasha akee rembo yoo marendeny a Yesu aree soori ammbuiyo ni urango.
42008036	Naasa valya valolya nndu ulya eetirwa ni mimuyo mikasha shaasa ashiiswa, vakawoongoya.
42008037	Nalyo ikwaanu lyoose lya vandu va Gerasini vasangyi na valya va nnyanu vakantereva nakwipoo kulya kwawo nnyeli vatirwa mmbwerei wiingi. Naasa we muni kandesaama neefo ngalaven. Kawuya na kulya ooka nafo.
42008038	Naasa nndu ulya aukwa ni mimuyo ilya mikasha kantereva mumu wekaa nawe. Nawe kansama kaamba,
42008039	“Kuwuiye na kyeny kwafo kundeongoya-fo vengyi kyoose Iruva akutannya.” " Nalyo kakweengya kandeamba kyoose Yesu alentanya kakwaanisa kulya muriny koose.
42008040	Naasa kikava elyi Yesu awuya nafo mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukamwaambya na nsia, nyeli woose veefo vemmbereyaa.
42008041	Nalyo akakau nndu umwi ansha nang'u na irina lyakwe ni Yairo. Nawe ni nndu nsongoru wa efo mmba yeeterevya. Kasha ikweera si yoo marendeny a Yesu. Kantereva nandefika kulya kyeny kwakwe.
42008042	Mashika etiri mwana wa kyeny akee wa ngitany amaye irika lya myaaka ikumi na ivii, nawe eefo akumbaa muu. Naasa elyi eefo ashendaa vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakava vansisiraa deny."
42008043	Nalyo kweifo nndu nka alwee ndwari ya kyika ando a myaaka ikumi na ivii. Nawe ellyiwa nnu mmbaanga enretya-fo masaa akwe moose efo kwa vaanga nta kulakee-fo nndu eedima inshiisa.
42008044	Nawe kashesha na yoo numa ya Yesu nakooye ipaana nse wa soori yakwe ya yeerya, nalyo yeni kishoru kya ndwari ilya yakwe ya kyika kyikafikya.
42008045	Na Yesu kaamba, “Ni vi ashipaana?” Naasa vakakana woose. Na Petro asangyi na valya aryani nawe kambia, “Llosha, ni vandu vakekusisira-sisira.”
42008046	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Kwiifo nndu ashipaana-da! Mmbo shamanya shammbukwa ni finya.”
42008047	Naasa nka ulya kalollya nalakiidimi-se imalallya, kasha nang'u eereremaa. Kamwolokya si kaamba paa kimaruma kampaana, na shaasa akooya ishia na lyimwi.
42008048	Nawe kammbia, “Mwana-akwa kwankusirya-u indo nkyo kyakukira! Kweengye kukooyaa ufoo!”
42008049	Naasa eefo areraa indo nalandemanda kukasha nafo nndu auka kyeny kwa nndu ulya nsongoru wa mmba yeeterevya. Kaamba, “Mwana wafo ammaa ifwa, nta kulakivinise llosha yeu!”
42008050	Naasa elyi Yesu eeta kanndouwa, “Kulairyee-fo Kusirye-u tupu! Nawe ashekirwaa.”
42008051	Naasa elyi amfika kulya poo, nta nalalekeye nndu kaanga nawe mmba, kulaore ni Petro na Yohane na Yakobo na ndeye wa mwana ulya na maye.
42008052	Naasa kakooya valya vaiyo woose veshiyaa na ikapa kapa mbafu. Nawe kaamba, “Nta mulaiye-fo! Nshi afiiye-fo, mmbo alele rweny.”
42008053	Nawo vakanseka, nyeli veeshi amfwa.
42008054	Nawe Yesu kantira woko kambaanga kaamba, “Mwana kwiipoo!”
42008055	Nalyo kawuiyo ni muu wakwe kakwiipoo kyaangu naakyo. Nawe kavavasya vanniinge kyeelya.
42008056	Na vamiku vakwe vakeesing'ang'a. Nawe kaveekimba kindo kyilya kyautika valeshekyivia nndu-fo.
42009001	Naasa kavaanga valya ikumi na vavii vakuumbye ando amwi. Kavaniingya wiidimi na ushilyi lwa iitorya mimuyo mikasha myoose neeshisa vandu ndwari.
42009002	Nalyo kavaruma vandekapya vandu weele lwa umangyi lwa Iruva na indevashiisa.
42009003	Kavavia, “Mulakamare kindo kya efo shia, nta nsengye, nta mboloko, nta kishau, nta fesa, nta muleende mwiirye soori ivii ta mwiili-fo.”
42009004	Na efo kwa nndu mwammaanga nafo keeny-fo mutani mwakwiipoo-fo mweende kungyi.
42009005	Na wo kundo mwankooya vandu vara valamwaaranya, ukeny efo muriny eto na kiluulyi ekyo kya efo marendeny any muvekikakapa-fo, kive nkyo ukureekyi lwa efo kwawo lwa uvingo. "
42009006	Naasa vakawara shia vakava veira fimuriny fya vandu kwi kimwi kimwi vewoongoyaa nrumi ya Iruva ya nsia na ivakira ndwari kundo koose vafikaa.
42009007	Naasa mangyi ilya Herode keeta kilya kyoose shaasa kileenda. Nawe kava afulukywa-fulukywany mashika a kilya kyarerwa mmbandu maata veshambaa Yohane ammbuya iruka.
42009008	Na vengyi vakaamba, " “Ni Elia ansha ikoora na vandu.” Na vengyi vakaamba, “Ni umwi wa vakisuku va elyo mbee alewuya iruka.”
42009009	Naasa Herode kaamba, “Yohane ni yeny shilenrummbwa nrwe. Indi yeu shaita shivioo indo kyakwe mbwakwi-se?” " Naasa kasia mwaanya wellolya.
42009010	Nalyo vakiloshyony valya vakawuya nafo vakashemwoongoya fyoose valetana. Nawe kavakamara kawara shia waarya keenda kulya kya taari ya muri ulya uvaangwaa Betisaida, vakandekaa-fo kyaanya kyawo.
42009011	Naasa vandu valya vakuumbye-fo mamwiingyi vakawuya imanya vakandensora-fo. Nawe kavawarya. Kavany arera nawo kya umangyi lwa Iruva, na valya vakee vating'i ni ndwari tawo kavevashiisa.
42009012	Naasa nkonu ukapooka yeenda wisyaa. Valya ikumi na vavii vakasha na yoo akai, vakambia, " “Sama mamwiingyi yeu wa vandu, veende neefo fimuriny fisengetye neefo mareminy vanderuuya ando eelala na iwonisa shoonga, kimmba kundo lukai kwava kasa.”
42009013	Nawe kavavia, “Vaniingeny shoonga yeni te!” Nawo vakaamba, “Llutiri kilanya ya mikate iraanu na makunga avii-fo. Kulakooye ni yese lushendaa lundeura shoonga timaa vandu yeva vakuumbye-u woose.”
42009014	Na womi veefo sha fiku firaanu. Nawe kavia vakiloshyony vakwe, “Endevieny vandu yewo vakee rembo matorito-matorito, wo itorito vandu 50.”
42009015	Vakandetana indo, vakakaa rembo woose.
42009016	Nawe kawarya mikate ilya iraanu na makunga alya avii. Kalla efo iruveeu kaana Iruva kya ifivikya mbora, Kafisha-fisha, kaniingya valya vakiloshyony vandeavya vandu valya vakuumbye-fo.
42009017	Vakalya vakawuura woose. Na nsaaro ulya wa fipereshu ukarorowa, mikusha ikaishwa ikumi na ivii.
42009018	Nalyo kikava elyi eefo aterevaa Iruva akee kyaanya, amwi na vakiloshyony vakwe. Nawe kavavesa, " “A ironda elyo lya vandu ni inda lyaamba kyakwa mmbo shikee vi?”
42009019	Nawo vakaalwa vakaamba, “Ni Yohane Mmbatisi. Na vengyi vakaamba, “Yewe ni Elia. Vengyi vakaamba, Yewe ni umwi wa vakisuku valya va elyo mbee, alewuya iruka.”
42009020	Naasa kavavia, “A yeni mwaamba yeny mmbwe vi?” Naasa Petro kaalwa kaamba, “Yewe ni yewe Kristo wa Iruva!”
42009021	Nawe kavavavasa kindo ekyo valashekivia nndu.
42009022	Kaamba, “Mmbo kyikee kirummbwe, Mwana yeto wa Nndu nandeliswa ukiva wiingyi na indeinyikwa mmasiingo a vandu na vakohani vaniini na veelosha mavavaso, na iwaawa navewaawa na elyi kwamfika nkonu wa kararu naruke-ny!”
42009023	Naasa kavia vandu vaiyo woose, “Kwakooya nndu akunda ishilatya kuti nasue nyama takwe muni, nawe mwikurika nsalaba wakwe wo nkonu naveshilatya-ny.
42009024	Shamashika wo nndu akunda ikira muu wakwe akaa maure-te. Na wo nndu areta muu wakwe kwakooya ni kimaruma kyakwa yeto akoyaa yuukira.
42009025	Mashika iviiri nndu ashutaa-u nkyokyi kwakooya ashewonisaa ulana loose luve mbusha yakwe kakuretya-u we muni, ao muu wakwe ukafiiya-fo mmwasi?
42009026	Mashika wo nndu aira sony kyakwa na kya marero akwa, na Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo ashiraa sony kyakwe elyi ashaa akee na usuri lwakwe na lwa Ndeye na lwa vasu veele va efo iruve-u.
42009027	Na yeny ni kya dede shamuvia: Yewo vasalalyi yaa kwiifo valasheshosha ufu kulaore vallolya umangyi lwa Iruva.”
42009028	Naasa kikava elyi anrera indo mikonu ikaira-u sha nyanya, kakamara Petro na Yohane na Yakobo kandesaama na ando a ifumbu-u nandeterevya-fo.
42009029	Nalyo elyi eefo aterevaa, fwana ya kisangu kyakwe ikaalashika na soori takwe tikava shaa pyai timika-mikaa.
42009030	Nalyo akakava vandu vavii veefo vareraa nawe, nawo ni Mose na Elia.
42009031	Vakakoora vakee na usuri, vakarera nawe kya yoo mainukyony akwe ashendaa yafutya kulya Yerusalemu.
42009032	Naasa Petro vakee varovye ni rwe na valya aryani nawo. Naasa kyeeri vookya rony vakalolya usuri llwa lwakwe na vasero valya vavii vasalali-u ando amwi nawe.
42009033	Nalyo kikava elyi vallakana nawe, Petro kavia Yesu, “Nndumi nkisha elyi yese lukee yaa. Naasa lushevikaa matengo araru, lyafo lyimwi, na lya Mose lyimwi, na lya Elia lyimwi.” Nawe nta naleeshi kindo arera.
42009034	Naasa eefo areraa indo ifishi lyikasha lyikavavikya nruve. Naasa vakairyaa elyi vakooya ikaa efo nnang'ani ya ifishi llya.
42009035	Nalyo unyanga lukaitiwa luuka efo ifishiny lwishambaa, “Yeu mmbwe mwana wakwa yeto shilensauwa. Mwaaranyiny-te!” "
42009036	Nalyo elyi unyanga llwa lwammiitiwa vakakooya Yesu anrewa-u we muni. Nawo veni vakamalallya, mikonu ilya myeni nta valaongoye nndu mbony ta kilya valolya.
42009037	Nalyo kyikava elyi lya nkonu ulya waiduva vee-fo vashoolokaa kulya ifumbuny vakakwaananya na vandu mamwiingyi nniini.
42009038	Nalyo akakau nndu nsoro akee wa efo mamwiinginy kakapa ngaya kaamba, " “Woi Llosha! Lyilya mwana yeu wakwa wa womi kaveva ngitany.
42009039	Nawe lla-te mumuyo nkasha ava mwintafukya. Nalyo yeni kavefua. Nato ukamwaaruva keende mavia, na kweeta wanra ni kindo kyuumu, nato mmbo weenda vimfirisaa.”
42009040	Neeny shatereva vakiloshyony kyafo vamwaante valaidimi.
42009041	Nalyo Yesu kaalwa kaamba, “Oo yeni mukee irika lya vandu lyauwa kyikusiryo lyeevekye indo. A mmbo nkaa neeni shifike kwi? A shimusisirye shifike indii? Endeny mwana yeu na yaa-te!”
42009042	Naasa elyi mwana ulya eefoo ashaa nang'u, mumuyo ulya nkasha ukantafukya ukankusha-kusha. Naasa Yesu kakyeemmya mumuyo ulya. Kashiisa mwana ulya kammbiirya ndeye.
42009043	Naasa vandu valya vakaising'ang'a woose valolya ulyimbi lwa Iruva. Naasa elyi veefo vasongololo woose kya efyo aletana, nawe kavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe.
42009044	Marero shiifo nshambaa avikeny maarwiny any! Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo eefo anderambikyoo efo maakony a vandu. "
42009045	Nawo kirero ekyo valakyimanyi kyikavaviiya kindo kirike nta valakooye iitumuso. Na iryaa vakairyaa immbesa kya kirero ekyo.
42009046	Naasa efo nnang'ani yaawo kukakwiipoo marero a ikuvesa-vesa kya nniini nnang'ani yaawo ni ungau.
42009047	Naasa Yesu kamanya makusaro a mirima yaawo. Katira mwana n-du woko, kashemmbika yoo akai.
42009048	Nalyo kavavia, " “Wo nndu awarya kimwana ekyi ekumbwaa irina lyakwa, ni yeny ashiwarya.” “Wo nndu ashiwarya yeny mmbo awarya yeto aleshiruma. Kikavaany yeto akee n-du wa efo nnang'ani yaany moose, mmbo ava mmbwe nniini.”
42009049	Naasa Yohane kaallwa kaamba, “Lulelolya nndu ashantaa mimuyo mikasha asendaa irina lyafo.” Neese lukamwiima, kimmba nalakee nndu alulatye aryani neese.
42009050	Na Yesu kavavia, “Nta mulamwiimi-fo. Mashika nndu nalamuvikyaa kiduva mmbo akee kyaalu kyany.”
42009051	Naasa kikava elyi mikonu yammiinana nanderoswa na uuwe, nawe muni kaorisa kisangu kyakwe kikasumana na shia ya yeenda na kulya Yerusalemu.
42009052	Nalyo karuma varumi vamwiirye mbee. Vakeenda vakandefika muriny wa Vasamaria vakundye inteesya-fo ando a iimuya.
42009053	Nawo valammbwarye, elyi kisangu kyakwe kyammilla Yerusalemu.
42009054	Naasa elyi valya vakiloshyony valolya kive indo, we Yakobo na Yohane vakaambia, “Ale Nndumi! Kwakunda luvaange muro wooloke wuuka efo iruve-u weevarumata, shaasa Elia aletana.”
42009055	Nawe kaveendukya kavakyeemya kaamba, “A mmbo mulaishi mmbo mukee vandu va mumuyo wa ngata ingai?
42009056	Mashika Mwana yeto wa nndu nshi asheye ireta mirima ya vandu-fo, ni iikira! Nalyo vakeenda kimuriny kingyi.”
42009057	Neelyi varie shia yaawo ya yeenda kakooya nndu aamba, “Mmbo nkulatyaa wo kundo kusheendaa!”
42009058	Yesu kambia, “Maparwe atiri marina a vayo na ndeye ta efo nginiiu tikavetira fifuri fya vayo kya indi Mwana yeto wa nndu nnatiri ando a yeekyerya nrwe-fo.”
42009059	Naasa kakooya ungyi kambia, “Shilatya!” Nawe kambia, “Shivikya mbele muumu shinderika nde yaakwa.”
42009060	Nawe kammbia, “Ra vafu varike vafu vawo wo veni! Indi yewe wara shia kundeongoya vandu mbony ta umangyi lwa Iruva kwishiidukanisaa.”
42009061	Naasa kukavekaa-fo ungyi ammbia, “Nndumi shikundye ikulatya-da. Indi shivikya mbele mumu shindelakana na yewo va kyeny kwakwa.”
42009062	Naasa Yesu kambia, “Nndu kammipoo woko natire ikumbi lyeerema na ng'umbe kawuya illa numa we nnyavaa kwa umangyi lwa Iruva-fo.”
42010001	Naasa numa yavayo Nndumi kasauwa vandu vengyi-se makumi mfungare. Kavaruma vavii vavii vandensongoya vafike wo muri wa vandu na wo kundo arie yeenda.
42010002	Naasa kavavia, “Fya iilula fiifo fiingyi, lyo varundi vakaangwa. Kyetereveny Nndumi muni fimu narumi varundi efo mailullyony akwe.
42010003	Kweengyeny! Akakava shamuruma mukee sha ngurana ta moonri nnang'ani a mafite a ngoroshony.
42010004	Nta mulakamare mboloko yesuruma fesa, nta nkusha, nta fyaaru-fo. Nta mulaidikire nndu efo shia.”
42010005	Indi yefo mmba kwa nndu kundo mwaammiira nafo pookeny yaamba, “Keeny na ufoo kunu kyeny!
42010006	Na kwakooya mmbo kwiifo mwana wa ufoo, naasa ufoo elo lwany lushenkayaa. Kilave indo, ufoo lwany mmbo lushemuwuiyaa.
42010007	Indi efo mmba kwa nndu yeto amuwarya kaeny-fo mwilyaa na ina fya efo kwawo. Mashika nndu nndundi nkuti nawonise weesi lwakwe. Nta mulave veuka mmba yei mweende yeyo ingyi-fo.
42010008	Na wo muri wa vandu mwammaanga nafo vakamuwarya kulyiiyeny efyo vamweengye.
42010009	Na yewo mukoyaa-fo valwee vakireny muwoongoye, ‘Mwammaafukyo ni umangyi lwa Iruva kunu kwany!’
42010010	Na wo muri wa vandu mwammaanga nafo valamuwarye, ukeny-fo mufike efo mitaniny yavayo mwishambaa,
42010011	‘Na kiluulyi ekyi kya kunu muriny kwany ekyo kyakutira na marende eru akyo lwamukukutya kimuwuiye! Kyaidi manyiny umangyi lwa Iruva lwamaafukya!’
42010012	Na yeny shamuvia nkonu yeto ukamfika ekyo kya Sodoma kishangwaa ngota kya muri yeto.”
42010013	Oshiny lwafo yewe Korasini! Oshiny lwafo yewe Betisaida! Mashika efyo fya wiidimi filetanyikya kwany kukooye mmbo fileutikya kulya Tiro na Sidoni, kukooye valemaaluka efo nriminy kasha na iraa makunnya na ifu.
42010014	Indi ekyo kya Tiro na Sidoni mmbo kishangwaa ngota ekyo kyany elyi vandu vasherumbuywaa mwaandu.
42010015	Na yewe Kapernaumu nshi kwekee nrose kwafika ngini-u mmbo kushoolotwaa kufike kundo kwa vafu.
42010016	Nndu amwaaranya yeni ni yeny ashaaranya. Na nndu amumina yeny ashimina. Indi yeto ashimina yeny mmbo amina yeto aleshiruma.
42010017	Nalyo valya makumi mfungare vakawuya vefuraa vakaamba, “Nndumi na mimuyo yeyo mikasha mmbo ilevelwiirikya kimaruma kya irina lyafo.”
42010018	Nawe kavavia, “Mmbo shilelollya Satana ashoolokaa auka iruve-u sha kimwii.
42010019	Akakalo shamuniinga wiidimi lwevavara shoka na nguluva na iitorya finya toose ta yeto nkiduva. Nta kulaiyo kindo kishiidimaa imumanya furu-fo.
42010020	Indi kindo mushefuraa nakyo nshi elyi mimuyo yeyo mikasha imwiirikye-fo, mmbo mushefuraa elyi marina any akee mareiye efo iruveeu.”
42010021	Kyeeri kilya kyeni kalooka kyuuka na Mumuyo Mweele kaamba, “Woi Nde shakwaarafuma paa kukee Nndumi wa efo iruve-u na kunu urukeny, kimmba mbony yeti kwatirika vandu veeshi reu na yewo varango, kwawuya itirambuya vakoku. Ee-da Nde, ni indo kivekusenyi!”
42010022	Nalyo kaindukya valya vakiloshyony kaamba, “Mmbo shilerambikywa findo fyoose ni Nde wakwa. Nta nkwiiyo nndu eeshi Mwana kulaore ni Nde-fo, nta Nde mmbwe ungau kulaore ni Mwana-fo,na nndu yeto mwana ankunda inrambuya.”
42010023	Nalyo kaindukya valya vakiloshyony vakee kyaanya kyawo kaamba, “Ngoma vandu miso awo alolye kindo mulolye yeni!
42010024	Shamashika shamuvia, kweiifo veawuya fisuku veengyi naakwa ni vamangyi velangye ilola yefyo mulolye yeni, valalolye, na iita mbony mwaita yeni valaite.”
42010025	Nalyo akakau nndu akufundye mavavasyo ankwipoo kasha imweesa, kaamba, “Ale llosha! Shatana inda shikooye muu wa llung'anu uve ding'u yakwa?”
42010026	Nawe kammbia, “A efo kitabuny kya mavavaso mmbo kyikee kyireiye kwasoma-fo inda?”
42010027	Nawe kaamba, “Mmbo kushekundaa Nndumi Iruva wafo, kunkunde na ngoo yafo shoose, na nrima wafo moose, na finya yafo shoose, na makusaro afo moose. Kuvekunda na nndu uroo shaasa kukukundye kumuni.”
42010028	Nawe kambia, “Mmbo kwaveallwa nisha. Kevetana indo, kuwoniny-muu!”
42010029	Nawe akundye ikwallwa nndu wa usumanu we muni, kavia Yesu, “A uroye wakwa mmbi?”
42010030	Nalyo Yesu karouwa kaamba, “Kweefo nndu aleuka kulya Yerusalemu kandesoka na kulya Yeriko, kakooya veala shia. Nawo wakamuuta soori takwe, vakammbika fyaasha, vakanra-u akee kinanawo kya ifwa na ikya. Vakakweengya.
42010031	Naasa nndu Nkohani kasoka na shia ilya sheni nalamanyi kindo kiifo, kallollya, keera mbai.
42010032	Na nndu wa Valevi ni indo-da kasha nang'u, kallollya, keera mbai.
42010033	Naasa nndu wa Samaria arye kyaaro kafika alya ando akai, kallollya kavavyo mmuu kyakwe.
42010034	Keenda na yoo akai, na fyaasha filya fyakwe kafyaamba mafura na mfinyo. Kafinga-u na firami. Kansaamisa mungony wa nshungu wakwe, kandemfita mmba ya veny, kammbavarya-fo.
42010035	Na elyi lya ndesi kauta fesa kaniingya ulya muni mmba ya veny, kammbia, ‘Sheekya immbavara, na kwakooya kwalekyeya kya mmwasi nkutaa elyi shiwuyaa.’ “
42010036	A kwaambany inda kya vandu valya vararu, ulya akee uroye wa ulya alewoywa ni veala shia ni ungau ndesa?
42010037	Nawe Kaamba, “Ni ulya alensarya ukiva-te!” Yesu kammbia, “Kweengye kuvetana indo!”
42010038	Naasa veefo varie shia, nawe kaira neefo kimuriny kya vandu. Nafo kweifo nndu nka avaangwaa Marta. Kammbwarya efo kyeny kwakwe.
42010039	Nawe atiri mfwamaye avaangwaa Maria. We kashekaa rembo yoo marendeny a Nndumi kava amwaaranyaa marero alya akwe.
42010040	Naasa Marta eefo afurukanaa kya findo fiingyi fyeerunda. Kyasia kasha nang'u kaamba, “Nndumi, a mmbo kilakutinnyi elyi mfwama ashira sharunda shimuni? Mbieny nashyeekye-te!”
42010041	Naasa Nndumi kambia, “Marta, Yewe mmbo kwasaukwa na ikuvinisa na findo fiingyi.
42010042	Kindo kilavaa ira mmbo kyava kimwi nsi, na Maria kakusawuya waavi yelo usha, nalo nta nnashelusokwaa-se-fo.”
42011001	Naasa kafika ando katerevya-fo Iruva kamaa. Nndu wa efo kiloshyony kyakwe kammbia, “Nndumi lufunde shaasa luterevaa Iruva, shaasa na Yohane alevelosha vakiloshyony vakwe.”
42011002	Nawe kavavia, “Mukafika itereva ambeny indi, ‘Woi Nde irina lyafo lyitanwa yeele. Umangyi lwafo lushe. Kindo kukundye kitanyike yaa ulaniny sheefo iruveeu.
42011003	Luniinge wo nkonu shoonga teru tilufye.
42011004	Kulusarye ulyamari lweru, mashika neese lwasarya wo nndu alulyamarya. Nta kulalurwaa kyeesony.’ “
42011005	Nalyo kavavia, “A nndu wa kunu nnang'ani yaany ni vi akooya atiri mbuya yakwe, kamweengya kio nnang'ani kavii kammbia, mbuya-akwa shaakuya mikate iraanu,
42011006	mmbo shasheyo ni mbuya-akwa auka kyaaro, neeny shilatiri kindo kyemweengye kyeelya.
42011007	Na ulya akee efo mmba naalwe naambe, kulashaatare!” “Mmba yanraywa, na vana vakwa vallala. Nshishiidimaa-se ikwiipoo shindekuniingya-fo?”
42011008	Na yeny shamuvia, na kara nalakwiipoo, uviny nandenningya elyi akee mbuya yakwe, indi kimmba nalatiri sony yengeera intereva nkyo kimaruma kakwipoo, kandenniingya fyoose atura.
42011009	Na yeny shamuviany, tereveny, mmbo muniingwaa. Syeny, mmbo musheonaa. Kakapeny mwaango mmbo musheruyoo mmba!
42011010	Mashika wo nndu aterevaa mmbo avewarya. Na yeto mwiisia kavewona.
42011011	A mwana wa nndu wa kunu nnang'ani yaany ni ungau atereva ndeye nkate, nawe nanniinge iwe? Ao kantereva ikunga, nawe nanniinge shoka ando a ikunga?
42011012	Ao kantereva ipore nawe nanniinge nguluva?
42011013	Naasa yeni mukee varavi kwankooya mwammiidima iniinga fivana yefyo fyany findo fisha, aafikaany Nde waany wa efo iruveeu nshi asheengeraa iniinga vandu Mumuyo Mweele yewo vava ventereva?
42011014	Nalyo eefo ashantaa mumuyo nkasha, nato ukee mbimbi, na mumuyo ulya nkasha elyi wammbuka naasa nndu ulya kaidima irera. Vandu valya vakuumbye-u vakasongololo.
42011015	Na valya vaangu vawo vakaamba, “Ni yeto nniini wa mimuyo mikasha, we Belsebuli, mmbwe ammbikye ngarami, kaantany nayo mimuyo yeyo mikasha.”
42011016	Na vengyi vakakunda nawoore wende luuka efo iruve-u vemweesaa.
42011017	Nawe kamanya makusaro alya awo, kavavia, “Wo umangyi lukankwava-ava lukakukapa weni, mmbo lwava nrapu, na mmba iiyo ikankwaava mmbo iwundukaa.
42011018	Naakwa ni Satana kwakooya akwaava-ava kakukapa we muni, a umangyi lwakwe lushidimaa inda ikaa-u? Elyi mwaamba ni ngarami ya Belsebuli shaanta nayo mimuyo yeyo mikasha?
42011019	Na kwakooya ni ngarami ya Belsebuli shaanta nayo mimuyo yeyo mikasha, a vana yewo vany, wo nkyokyi vawaanta nakyo? Kikavaany mmbo vashemutyaa uvingo.
42011020	Indi kwakooya ni finya ya Iruva shaanta nayo mimuyo yeyo mikasha, naasany, umangyi lwa Iruva akakalu lwamfika kwany.
42011021	Elyi mwaafinya aree fisha fyakwe karinga indo poo yakwe, na findo fyakwe atiri mmbo fikaa kipwa.
42011022	Indi kasheywa ni mwaafinya ungyi amwiilanyi kammbinga, mmbo ashensokaa fisha filya fyakwe eefikusirye, na mifungwa ilya kandeyaava.
42011023	Nndu nalakee wa kyaalu kyakwa mmbo akee nkiduva wakwa. Na nndu nalashekyaa isanyirya mmbo anyanyataa.”
42011024	“Na mumuyo nkasha yeto kwankooya wammbuka nndu, mmbo usheiraa kundo kuumu wisyaa ando a iimuya-u ulaoni, ukaamba, ‘A shiwuye neefo mmba kundo shileuka.’
42011025	Ukasha nang'u ukakooya kwammaaiyo na ishopwa.
42011026	Nalyo ukeenda, ukasha uryani na mimuyo mikasha ingyi mfungare ikee mikasha ngota to mweni, ukeenda nafo, Na mbony teefurumya ta nndu yeto mmbo tivaa shikasha ngota tilya ta mbee.”
42011027	Naasa elyi arera indo, nndu nka wa efo vanduny vakuumbye-fo kaonisa unyanga kammbia, “Ngoma nsanga ulya ulekwiira na mavee alya kuloonga.”
42011028	Nawe kaamba, “Kilanya ngoma vandu vearanya irero lya Iruva vakalyiringa.”
42011029	Naasa elyi vandu veefo vasheengeraa isha ishekuumbya-u nkuka nawe kapooka irera ashambaa, “Irika elyi lya vandu lyava irika iravi. Mmbo lyasia yoorwa wende, na wende nta lyilasheniingwaa, kulaore ni wende yelo lwa Yona-fo.
42011030	Mashika Yona shaasa aleviiya vandu va kulya Ninive wende, na Mwana yeto wa nndu ni kiwo-da asheviiyaa irika elyi wende.
42011031	Mangyi ulya wa kyika wa sinde ashekaa-fo ando amwi na vasoro va irika elyi, elyi mwaandu yeto nniini ureraa, llyo ashekwipoo na ivautya uvingo. Mashika we alesha auka marayony a ulana yelu, nashe yaaranya marero alya a urango a Solomon. Neeni lleny-te, yeu akee yaa mmbo ang'annya Solomon.
42011032	Na vasoro va kulya Ninive vashekaa-fo ando amwi na vandu va irika elyi, elyi mwaandu yeto nniini ureraa, llyo vashekwiipoo na ivautya uvingo. Mashika wo valealashika efo nriminy elyi Yona alevakapya weele. Neeni llen-te ekyi kyikee yaa mmbo kyang'annya Yona.”
42011033	Nta nkwiifo nndu ashataa taa kaivika ando kukusurummyi ao kaisikya-fo! Mmbo asheivikaa yoo ando a yeekerya taa, naambo woose vaanga mmba vaoni sa.
42011034	Iriso llyo taa ya imikyaa mwiili, naasa kwakooya iriso lyafo niisha na mwiili yeto wafo mmbo utiraa sa moose. Indi kwakooya iriso ni ikasha na mwili wafo mmbo uvetiraa ireema.
42011035	Naasa sa yeyo ikee nnang'ani yafo ilole kulasheeva ireema!
42011036	Naasany kwakooya mwili yeto wafo ukee sa moose piny, kuleefo-se kyenga kitiri ireema, mmbo uvaa sa moose piny, kyikava sheelyi taa yakuvaiya ng'aa na sa yavayo.
42011037	Naasa eefo areraa indo, nndu Mfarisayo kashentereva nafike kwakwe, nandelya nawe shoonga. Nawe kaveanga nafo kakaa rembo yoo ando eelyiiya shoonga.
42011038	Naasa Mfarisayo ulya kasongololo elyi alepooka ilya kulore ansangya maako.
42011039	Naasa Nndumi kammbia, “A nyira yeni Vafarisayo mmbo musangyaa upata na kideeva efo kipoo, indi yefo nnang'ani yaany mukawuya iishwa usokyi na uravi.
42011040	Mmbo muring'ani-te! Yeto aletana fya kipoo a nshiwe alevetana na fya kimmba?
42011041	Indi yefyo fikee yefo nnang'ani mfyo mushevikaa fyeesarya vakiva llyo fyoose fishemuviyaa fyaa.”
42011042	“Indi oshiny lwany yeni Vafarisayo! Mmbo muvikaa kya ikumi ikumi kya findo fyefwaamisa na fyeerolisa na fyeelonga shoonga! Indi irummbwa fya usumanu na ikunda Iruva, fyo mukawuya ifira. Efyo mfyo fyeetana neefyo fingyi fivekukaya-u filarewa.
42011043	Neeni Vafarisayo oshiny lwany! Mmbo mukundye marembo a mbee efo mmba teererevya na iidikirwa mmbandu efo singireny.
42011044	Oshiny lwany! Mmbo mufwanani na fifu filalollyo na vandu yewo veirau yoo uwe valafimanyi.”
42011045	Naasa nndu wa efo nnang'ani ya valya vakufundye mavavasyo kaalwa, “Llosha elyi kwarera indo mmbo kwalwiinyala na yese!”
42011046	Nawe kaamba, “Na yeni mukufundye mavavasyo oshiny lwany, Mmbo murikaa vandu mario nalavaa ifita, na yeni muveni mario yoo mulaapanaa nta na nni.
42011047	Oshiny lwany mmbo mwatokopa ando valya vakisuku vakee varike, ate ni vandeye valya vany valevawaa.
42011048	Naasa kyikavany mmbo mwavika ukureekyi kya makasha a vandeye valya vany valetana, neeni mukasennywa nng'u, kimmba mmbo valevawaa neeni mukawuya itokopa ando vakee varike.
42011049	Nakyo nkyo kimaruma ufundo lulya lwa Iruva lukaamba, ‘Nshevarumyaa vakisuku na nrumi nawo maata vashevawaa na ivarishisa.’
42011050	Kyikaenda indo naambo irika elyi lyikooye ireelyo kya samu ya vakisuku valya woose ilya ileeritwa kipookya yuumbwa lya ulana yelu.
42011051	Kipookya samu ilya ya Abeli kufike samu ilya ya Sakaria ulya aleretya muu alya nnang'ani kavii ya ando eekorya firaso na mmba ya Iruva sheni. Ee-da, shamuvia, irika elyi lyikaa lyisheveswa kyavayo.”
42011052	“Yeni mukufundye mavavasyo oshiny lwany, mmbo muleuta-fo ufunguo lwa irua mmba yekooya urango usha, na yeni muveni nta mulaange nafo, na yewo varye yaanga nafo mukaveema.”
42011053	Nalyo elyi ansomuka-fo veelosha mavavaso vasasangyi na Vafarisayo vakapooka intirya ndooshuu nakamwi na isha insellwa kya findo fiingyi.
42011054	Vemwalaa vakooye irakwa-fo kirero kyimwi kyauka kaniny kakwe.
42012001	Naasa vandu veefo vashaa ishekuumbya-fo fiku na fiku vakatana vakuvavara. Nalyo kapooka ivia valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Manyiny mukwiise kinruwo ekyo kitarang'aa kya Vafarisayo, nakyo ni ngata yaawo yekunang'ara.
42012002	Indi nkwiifo kindo kyikee kyisikye kire kyilasukuka-fo, nta kindo kisurumi kire kyilamanyika-fo.
42012003	Kyimmba ni indo, naasa fyoose mwaambaye yefo ireeminy fikaa fiitiwa efo seny. Na kindo mwaambaye yoo kuriny ka nndu mukee efo firyeny fya mmba fikaa fyaambawa paa efo mmbee-u.”
42012004	“Nyeni mukee mbuya takwa shamuvia, nta mulairyae yewo vewaa mwiili yeto wa nndu, valeedimi itana-se kya mmwasi.
42012005	Indi nshemoraa yeto mushemwiiryaa. Ni yeto, atiri wiidimi lwewaa na numa ya iwaa keedima yeera nndu yefo murony wa Gehena! Ee-da shamuvia, mmbwe mushemwiryaa.
42012006	Ngyuruu isaanu takumbwa senti shaangu se? Nato nta lumwi lwavayo llurekekye efo kisanguny kwa Iruva-fo.
42012007	Indi naakwa mfii ta efo mirweny yaany mmbo tikee shyeekyeni toose. Nta mulairyee! Mmbo mwiirye ngyuruu na tikaingifwa.”
42012008	Neeny shamuvia, “Wo nndu ashekureeka-u kyakwa efo usanguny lwa vandu, na mwana wa nndu ashekureeka-u kyakwe efo usanguny lwa vasu va Iruva.
42012009	Indi yeto asheshikanaa efo usanguny lwa vandu mmbwe ashekanwaa efo usanguny lwa vasu va Iruva.
42012010	Na wo nndu ashambaa-u kindo kyeelema Mwana yeto wa nndu, mmbo ashekoyaa ifwaaywa. Indi yeto anruma Mumuyo Mweele, we nnyakoyaa-se ifwaaywa-fo.
42012011	Neeni elyi mukoyaa vemurwaa efo mmba tawo teeterevya na efo kwa vashilyi na kwa vandu vaitorye nta mulasavae mukusare ndesa murouwaa ao kindo mushambaa kyekuuta mwaandu, ao kindo mushambaa-u.
42012012	Mashika Mumuyo Mweele mmbwe ashemufundaa kyeeri ekyo kyeni mumanyi kindo kyisumani irera-u.”
42012013	Nalyo nndu wa efo nnang'ani ya vandu valya vakuumbye-fo kambia, “Llosha, via mwanamaye wakwa naavani ding'u neeny!”
42012014	Nawe kambia, “Yewe nndu wakwa, a ni vi ashivikye mwiirumbwa myaandu yaany ao mwaava ding'u tany?”
42012015	Nawe kavavia, “Manyiny mukwiise waafu lwa wo ngata. Mashika kishyukyaa nndu muu nshi masaa yoo atiri kaingyifyo-fo.”
42012016	Naasa kaveera kyaaso kaamba, “Kweefo nndu eetiri irema lyakwe kakooya lyivesye deny.”
42012017	Kava akusara-saraany efo nriminy kaamba, “A shitani inda? Mashika elyi shauwa ando nshesanyiryaa fimu fyakwa?”
42012018	Nalyo kaamba, “Akakyi kindo ntanaa. Mmbo nsammbwaa mbeshe yeti takwa, shyooke tingyi niini kilanya. Mfo nshesanyiryaa fimu fyakwa fyoose na umasi lwakwa loose.
42012019	Shivieny nrima wakwa, ‘Manya kutiriny findo fisha fingyi kwansurumyo fya myaaka miingyi. Naasany kukaye rembo, kuve mwiilyaa na ina na ifura.’
42012020	Naasa Iruva kashembia, ‘Kukee nrung'ani te! Ni kio eki kya inu muu wafo usheondowaa. A efyo kusurumyi fivaa fya viiny?’
42012021	Naasa kya nndu ashekusanyiryaa findo ni indo kishendaa kwakooya kulaore atiri umasi lwa efo kwa Iruva.”
42012022	Nalyo kavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Nkyo kyimaruma shamuvia, nta mulave vandu veesaukwa-saukwa kya muu yeu kindo mushelyaa, nta kya mwiili eto wany, kindo musheraa.
42012023	Muu nto nniini ngota shoonga na mwiili yeto wa nndu ukairya masara.
42012024	Endeloleny mangola-te! Nta nnyeraa mbeu-fo nta iilula-fo. Na Iruva kava mmbwe aalela. Aafikaany yeni nshi mwiilanyi ndeye kwaasha kyikang'ana deny?”
42012025	A nndu wa kunu kwany ni ungau ashiidimaa yeengerya waasha lwakwe ando a irambo lyimwi tupu na kasaukwa inda?
42012026	Naasany kwakooya mulashiidimaa efyo fidu nta kimwi, a nkyikyi elyi mwasaukwa?
42012027	Endeloleny fivaro efyo fya efo mbuveny-te. Nta mfyooka uruu-fo, nta yooka soori-fo. Neeny shamuvia, nta Solomon na usuri lwakwe loose nnyeree mesha sha kimwi kyavayo-fo.
42012028	Naasa mare yoo efo mbuveny aiyo inu na lya ndesi akandeerwa murony, Iruva antana amaambika indo, a yeni nshi ashemweengeryaa kilanya kyikairya? Mmbo mukee vandu vakusirye-u kyaangu-da!
42012029	Nta mulave vandu veevesa-vesa kindo mushelyaa na ina nta mulatafukwa-tafukwa kya findo efyo-fo.
42012030	Kyimmba vandu valalakyaa findo efyo fyoose ni vandu va masanga. Indi kyany yeni ni Nde eeshi mmumanyaa ikaa indo mulatiri findo efyo-fo.
42012031	Indi veny vandu veevalya na umangyi lwa Iruva na efyo fingyi musheengeryo-u fya mmwasi.
42012032	Nta kulairyee yewe ironda idu! Ni Nde yeto waany anrumbwa indo namuniinge umangyi.
42012033	Endekumbeny findo yefyo mutiri mukandevika fyeesarya vakiva! Kusongosyeny fikushu fyeesuruma fesa filakwaa ni masaa eekusurumya efo iruve-u nalafikyaa, kundo manyinyi nalakooyaa, nta kurukuru ilashiidimaa ilyamara-fo kindo.
42012034	Mashika kundo mwansuruma umasi lwany, na ngoo eto tany mfo kundo tikai. "
42012035	Veny vandu vakwiinivye fisiny, muveva na taa tany tikee shyaate.
42012036	Neeni muvefwanani na vandu veevereya Nndumi waawo kyeeri awuya auka waliny na elyi ashaa lyo yeni kakapa mwaango naambo mwiidimi induya.
42012037	Ngoma mashinga alya nndumi waawo akooya valele shoovi. Nkya dede shamuvia, ashekwiinivaa nashevavika rembo valye shoonga na isha navesha ivafurukanya.
42012038	Kasha ikamba lya kavii lyeringa kyio, naakwa ni lya kararu, kakooya veevereye indo, ngoma wo!
42012039	Indi manyiny, kwe yeto muni kyeny eeshi ni kyeeri kyi inyinyi lyisheshaa mmbo eelalaa rembo nta nneelekeyaa mmba yakwe ifishwa-fo.
42012040	Neeni kevekaeny-fo mwikudeesye mashika mwana yeto wa nndu asheshaa kyeeri mulakyiishi.
42012041	Nalyo Petro kammbia, “Nndumi a kyaaso ekyo mmbo kwalweera kyeeluronga yese ao na vengyi woose ndesa?”
42012042	Na Nndumi kaamba, “A ni nndu ungau avany mmbwe mwiikallya kyeny akee nsaari kaveva nndango, yeto nndumi wakwe ashemmbikaa nniini wa mashinga akwe, nawe mwiivaniinga shoonga kyeeri kisumani?
42012043	Ngoma ishinga elyo kwakooya nndumi wakwe asha kakooya etana indo.
42012044	Nkya dede shamuvia, mmbo ashemmbikaa nniini wa masaa akwe moose.
42012045	Indi kwakooya ishinga elyo lyikusaraa efo nriminy, nndumi wakwa mmbo akeekyeeywa isha, nalyo lyikapooka ikapa mashinga wooroye alya a kyuumi na a kyika, na ilya na ina na inangwa.
42012046	Nndumi wa ishinga elyo, isha asheshaa nkonu nalavereye na kyeeri naleeshi. Nawe ashemparaa fiparwe fivii, na imwaavya waavi lwakwe ando amwi na yewo vamini.
42012047	Indi ishinga elyo lyiishi efyo nndumi wakwe akundye kara nalakudeesya nta itana kisumani na yefyo akundye mmbo ashekapwaa ngapo shiingyi.
42012048	Indi yeto naleeshi katana fisumani ikapwa, we ashekapwaa ngapo shaangu-angu. Indi wo nndu aniingyo fiingyi mmbo asheveswaa fiingyi. Na yeto arambikyo fiingyi vandu mmbo vasheengeraa indesia fiingyi efo kwakwe.”
42012049	“Mmbo shisheye yeera muro kunu urukeny. Nato kwe wemmaaka nsheekundye kindo kingyi kilanya-fo.
42012050	Indi shitiri ubatiso nshebatiswaa nalo, neeny shiifo nshaakarwaa-da kutani lwainutyo.
42012051	Ndesa mukusarye kindo shisheye ni isheende ufoo na kunu ulaniny? Nshi indo-fo! Mmbo shamuvia, ni mirauko.
42012052	Mashika pookya ulaalu vashekaa-fo vandu varaanu valele mmba imwi, nawo varaukani, yewo vararu vasue yewo vavii, na yewo vavii vasue yewo vararu.
42012053	Na vandu vasheraukanaa ni ndeyaa-nndu na mwana wakwe, na mwana wa nndu na ndeye, na mayea-nndu na mfu wakwe, na mfu wa nndu na maye, na mammi wa nndu na mwalyi wakwe, na mwalyi wa nndu na mammi wakwe.”
42012054	Nalyo kavia valya vakuumbye-u mamwiingyi, “Kyeeri mwalollya mafishi akwiipoo taari ya nkwaany, nalyo yeni mukaamba, ‘Kwiifo kwishaa mbua! Nakyo kyikaveva indo.’
42012055	Na kyeeri mwalollya uraato lwiivivitaa luuka taari ya kasa mukaamba, ‘Kwiifo kushevaa mwi! Nalyo kyikaveva indo.’
42012056	Mukee vandu vakunang'ari! Mmbo mwiishi ilola ngata ya ulana yelu na ya efo nginiiu. Mmbo kyava inda elyi mulalolaa fyeeri efyo fiifo shaasa fikai?”
42012057	Nkyiki elyi mularumbwaa fya usumanu yeni muveni?
42012058	Mashika kikee sheelyi kukooyaa kutiri mwaandu na nndu, mwiifo mushendaa nawe kulya kwa mwiirumbwa myaandu, naasa efo shia kutakure kulakooye kwiishenkuutaa, nalashekurambikya efo kwa mwiirumbwa mwaandu. Na yeto mwiirumbwa mwaandu nandekurambikya efo maakony a mwituuro vandu. Na yeto mwituuro nandekweera kyifingyony.
42012059	Mmbo shakuvia, nta nkushukaa-fo fo, na kutani kwataa na senti ya kiparwe.
42013001	Naasa fyeeri filya kweesheye nafo vandu valemwoongoya mbony ta Vagalilaya valya Pilato alesasanda samu yaawo na firaso fyawo.
42013002	Nawe kaalwa kavavia, “A ndesa mmbo mukusarye Vagalilaya yewo mmbo vekee vandu valyamari vakeerya Vagalilaya vengyi woose elyi valeliswa indo ukiva?”
42013003	Nshi indo-fo! Mmbo shamuvia, “Kwakooya mulashaalashikaa nrima ni indo mushesarumyaa moose!
42013004	Naasa na vandu valya ikumi na nyanya valya valewoyo ni nnara kulya Siloamu, ukavawaa. A nyira mukusarye mmbo vekee varekwa vakairyaa vandu valele Yerusalemu woose?”
42013005	Nshi indo-fo! Mmbo shamuvia, “Kwakooya mulashaalashikaa nrima ni indo-da mushesarumyaa moose!”
42013006	Nawe kaveera kyaaso kyikee ule, “Kweefo nndu eetiri nkuu wakwe wa nndeny ukee nronge efo nndeny wakwe wa misabibu. Kasha isya-u ndunda nalaoni.
42013007	Nawe kavia ulya mwiiremmya misabibu, ‘Lla-te kwansia myaaka iraru uka elyo shilepooka isya ndunda kunu nkuuny yeu shilawonise. Umanyiny-te! Nkyiki elyi wakuvisa sumbai ruu?’
42013008	Nawe kaalwa kambia, ‘Nndumi kuureye-u mwaaka yeu umwi-da, neeny shiuremyi na iwaalya kirashi.
42013009	Kulakooye uvikaa ndunda kyeeri ekyi kishaa. Kilave indo llyo kusheumanyaany.’ “
42013010	Naasa eefo eloshaa efo mmba yaawo imwi yeeterevya elyi lya Sabato.
42013011	Nalyo akakau nndu nka eefo atirwa mmumuyo nkasha ullweesye ando a myaaka ikumi na nyanya. Nawe kakulema nta naleedimi yooroka shumu.
42013012	Naasa Yesu allolya kammbaanga na yoo akai, kammbia, “Nka kwameeyauwa unana yelo lwafo!”
42013013	Kamweekerya maako. Nalyo yeni kaoroka, kapookany iitikisa Iruva.
42013014	Nalyo ulya nniini wa mmba ilya yeeterevya kasukyo elyi Yesu akyira vandu nkonu wa Sabato. Kaallwa, kavia vandu valya vakuumbye-fo, “Mmbo kwiifo mikonu irindaru isumani irunda nayo. Naasa nnyo musheshaa nayo ishekirwa nta mulashe nkonu yeu wa Sabato.”
42013015	Nalyo Nndumi kanndouwa kaamba, “Mmbo mukee vakunang'ari-te! A kunu kwany nshi wo nndu ashauwaa shau yakwe ao nshungu wakwe efo nguvanuny, katiauwa kandetiniinga mura, nkonu na ukava wa Sabato?
42013016	Afikaany yeu akee wa ufyari lwa Abrahamu na satana kamfinga myaaka yei ikumi na nyanya myoose, a nshi kyeemaa naauwa elyi akee mwiinive indo, nkonu na ukava wa Sabato?
42013017	Nalyo elyi arera indo, vakatirwa nsony woose valya vantirye kiduva. Na valya vakuumbye-fo mamwiingyi vakafura woose kya findo fya wiitori fitanwaa mmbwe.”
42013018	Naasa kaamba, “A umangyi lwa Iruva mmbo lufwanani neekyi, nalo nkindo kyingakyi nshelwananisaa nalo?
42013019	Mmbo lufwanani na mbeu ya haradali, na Nndu kaiipoo, Kandeyeera efo nndeny wakwe. Nayo ikang'ana ikava nri nniini na ndeye ta nginiiu tikakaa efo marambeny avayo.”
42013020	Nalyo kawuya kaamba, “A nkyikyi nshiinanisaa nakyo umangyi lwa Iruva?
42013021	Mmbo lufwanani na kinruwo kitarang'aa kyifumbisaa nswa.”
42013022	Nalyo kawara shia karumbwa muriny kwi muri na fimuriny asheloshaa-fo. Kavaany arwaany na kulya Yerusalemu.
42013023	Nalyo kakooya nndu ambia, “Yewo vakoyaa ikirwa ni vaangu ndesa?” Nawe kavavia,
42013024	“Kapanyiny ngiri yeyo shisiise mukooye yaanga nafo! Mashika shamuvia, kwiifo veengyi vasiaa yaanga nafo valashiidimaa.”
42013025	Mukammbera muni kyeny kakwipoo na iraya mwaango, neeni kwakooya llyo mwapooka isalala yoo poo na ikakapa mwaango na yaamba, “Woi Nndumi luruye mmba, nalyo ashallwaa, ‘Nshimwiishi kundo muukye-fo!’
42013026	Llyo mushepookaa yaamba, ‘Mmbo lulelya shoonga na ina yoo usanguny lwafo-te, na efo minyanuny yeeru mfo kundo kulelosha.’
42013027	Nalyo asheambaa, ‘Mmbo shamuvia, nshimwiishi kundo muukye-fo. Shyuukeny yeni moose mutannyi fya kiila!’
42013028	Nafo kushekaa-fo ikapa kiiyo na irafunnya mayoo, elyi mushelolyaa Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo na vakisuku valya woose vakee efo umangyiny lwa Iruva, neeni muveni musheerwa efo poo.
42013029	Nalyo vasheshaa vandu vauka taari ya ngama na ya nkwaany na nturu na ya sinde vashekaa rembo valye shoonga efo umangyiny lwa Iruva.
42013030	Neeni manyiny, va numa vashevaa va mbee, na vambee vashevaa va numa.”
42013031	Nalyo saa ilya sheni kasheywa ni Vafarisayo vaangu. Vakammbia, “Kwipoo kuuke yaa kukai! Mashika Herode arie ikuwaa!”
42013032	Nawe kavavia, “Endevieny iparwe elyo, akakau shiifo nshantaa mimuyo mikasha na itana mashora eshiisa vandu inu na ndesi. Na nkonu yeto wa kararu nsheinutyony.
42013033	Indi kuti shilunge kyaaro kyakwa inu na ndesi na nrondo. Shamashika nkivaa nndu nkisuku narumatyo ando engyi kulaore ni kulya Yerusalemu-fo.”
42013034	“Yewe Yerusalemu! Yewe Yerusalemu! Kukee mwiwaa vakisuku na yewo varumwa kwafo kwaveera mawe! Ni keengyi sheekundye yuumbya vana vafo shaasa nguku ishyuumbya fivana ikasikya na maaru. Neeni mulakunde.
42013035	Llen-te mmba yeyo yaany mushereywaa ikee irama. Mmbo shamuvia, Mmushekishilolyaa-se-fo kutani kwafika kyeeri elyi musheambaa, ‘Kundearafumwa yeu asha arumwa ni Nndumi!’ “
42014001	Naasa kikava elyi aleanga na efo mmba kwa nsongoru wa Vafarisayo elyi nkonu wa Sabato nandelya-fo shoonga, nawo vakava vanreiyaany.
42014002	Nalyo akakau nndu alwee ndwari yeefumbisa malungo ansha nang'u asalalyi yoo usumanu nawe.
42014003	Yesu kapooka irera, kavia valya vakufunndye-mavavasyo veefo na Vafarisayo, kaamba, “A ndesa kwiiyo mumu weeshisa nndu nkonu yeu wa Sabato ao oode?”
42014004	Vakamalallya sau. Nawe kampaana kanshiisa kansama.
42014005	Kawuya kavavia, “A kunu kwany kwiifo nndu ndesa akooya nshungu wakwe au shau yakwe yammooloka irininy lya mura, nawe kara nalaangusya iyoomwa-fo swany, naakwa ni elyi lya nkonu wa Sabato?”
42014006	Nawo valeedimi irouwa kilya aamba.
42014007	Nawe keera valya vavaange kyaaso, elyi alolya shaasa vakusawuya marembo a mbee, kavavia,
42014008	“Kwavaangwa walyiny ni nndu nta kulakunde ikaa kirembo ekyo kya mbee-fo, kukooyaa kwiiyo nndu nniini akwiilanyi akee mmbaange.
42014009	Na ulya alemuvaanga nashekuvia, ‘Seiya yeu-te!’ Nalyo yewe kuti kukwiipoo kundekaa kirembo kya efo numa kwisukaa!
