42014010	Indi kwavaangwa enda kundekaa kirembo kya efo numa, na yeto akuvaanga kasha nang'u nakuvie, ‘Mbuya-akwa serikya efo kya mbee!’ Llyo kushewonisaa nnduma, na valya mukeelya nawo shoonga velollye woose.
42014011	Shamashika wo nndu akwaallwa nniini we muni akaa nanyiiswa neeto akwaalla n-du we muni akaa naroswa.”
42014012	Naasa kavevia na ulya ambaanga, “Kwafika ikora shoonga yevaangya vandu ya ngama ao ya nkwaany nta kulashevaanga mbuya yeto tafo-da-fo nta vanavamau-da-fo, nta vaufyari lwafo-da-fo, nta vandu va nnyanu vakee masimba-da-fo, naambo nawo vakuvaange ikamba lyawo kive ni kileko vakutaa.
42014013	Indi kwafika ikora shoonga yevaangya vandu, vaanga vakiva na fisaya na yewo vakee miketekete, na yewo vafu miso.
42014014	Neewe llyo kushevaa nndu wa ngoma, kyimmba valatiri kindo kyekutaa mmbo kushetawaa yoo marukyony a yewo wa usumanu.”
42014015	Naasa elyi veefo valyaa shoonga, ulya umwi ammiita Yesu arera indo kammbia, “Ngoma nndu ashelyaa shoonga efo umanginy lwa Iruva!”
42014016	Na Yesu kammbia, “Kweefo nndu alekora shoonga shiingi tevaangya vandu, kavaanga veengyi.
42014017	Naasa kyeeri shoonga tilya tileya, karuma ishinga llya lyakwe, lyindevia valya vakee vaarye nrumi, kusheyeny fyoose fyammaa ideesyo.
42014018	Naasa vakapooka na nrwe umwi nsi iviira nrumi ilya. Ulya wa mbee kammbia, ‘Shammuura irema, na shakyi kuti shyeende ilyisengera. Shakutereva manya mmbo shammbiira nrumi ilya.’
42014019	Na ulya ungyi kaamba, ‘Na yeny shammuura nguleta teengya mapaleny araanu, shiifo shindeteesaa. Shakutereva manya mmbo shammbiira nrumi ilya.’
42014020	Na ulya ungyi kaamba, ‘Na yeny shammaalyika nka, nkyo kindo kyashiima isha.’
42014021	Ishinga llya lyikafika kyeny, lyikanderuuya nndumi ulya wakwe mbony tilya. Nalyo ulya muni kyeny karooywa ni ngoo, kavia ishinga llya lyakwe, ‘Iluya kundefika shieny niini na shieny ta efo muriny, kundeende valya vakiva na fisaya na vafu miso, na fitongororo vashe na kunu.’
42014022	Ishinga llya lyikasha lyikaamba, ‘Kyammeeva indo-da shaasa kwavavasya, indi kwasaa-u mwaanya.’
42014023	Nndumi ulya kavia ishinga llya lyakwe, ‘Enda kufike efo shia, na efo minyanuny, kundevaitika vashe yaanga na kunu mmba, mmba yakwa iishwe.
42014024	Mashika shamuvia, valya vakee vaarye nrumi nta umwi nnashelongwaa shoonga yakwa-fo.’ “
42014025	Naasa vandu vakeenda varyani nawe nkuka. Nawe kavaindukya kavavia,
42014026	“Kwakooya nndu akusheya na kwakwa kara nalasua ndeye na maye na nka na vana na vanavamaye na vamfwamaye, navesanda-u na muu wakwe muni, we nnyashiidimaa iva nndu wa kiloshyony kyakwa-fo.
42014027	Nndu kara nalakurika nsalaba wakwe muni nashilatye yoo numa, we nnyashiidimaa iva nndu wa kiloshyony kyakwa-fo.
42014028	A mmbo kwiifo nndu wa kunu kwany akunda itana nnara kara nalakaa mbele rembo neekeni efyo ashelekeiyaa-u namanyi kwakooya atiri fya iinutya mashora yoo?
42014029	Naambo nalakooye ammbika mawe a uvasha nalemwa imarisya. Nalyo vandu vallollyaa vapooke inseka woose,
42014030	veshambaa, ate nndu yeu alepooka itana mmba naleedimi imarisya.
42014031	A mmbo kwiifo nndu mangyi ndesa akwiipoo nandekwaananya na mangyi ingyi kya ikapana, kara nalakaa mbele rembo navike shila namanyi kwakooya ashiidimaa indekapana na ulya arye fiku makumi avii nawe muni kakooya arie fiku ikumi tupu?
42014032	Kwakooya kilavaa mmbo ashutaa varumi veerumya ulya ekee kikwaasha, nandevesa kyindo kyeetana kuwonike ufoo.
42014033	Naasany neeni ni kiwo-da, Wo nndu wa kunu kwany ara nalalakana na findo efyo atiri fyoose nnyashiidimaa iva nndu wa kiloshyony kyakwa-fo.”
42014034	Naasany mmbala nkindo kisha. Indi mmbala kwakooya wammba iturya a kindo uwuyaa iroliswa nakyo nkyokyi?
42014035	Mmbukivaa-se nta ivika sumbai iwaallwa kirashi-fo. Mmbo vasheweeraa efo poo. Yeto atiri maarwi eyaaranya navearanya.
42015001	Naasa vadedemi veefo vensheyaa woose na valyamari vashemwaaranya.
42015002	Na Vafarisayo vasasangyi na veelosha mavavaso vakarininda vakaamba, “Yeu mmbo awarya valyamari kalya nawo shoonga.”
42015003	Nawe kaveera kyaaso kaamba,
42015004	“Ndesa kunu kwany ni nndu ungau akooya atiri moonri iyana, kareta-u lyimwi, nawe nare nalatiiya alya makumi keenda na keenda kulya kasa nandevingya llya lyirekye kutani alyikooya?
42015005	Kammelyikooya nalyivike mevee-u etirwa ni nsia.
42015006	Kamfika kyeny kwakwe kandevaanga mbuya takwe na vandu va nnyanu vakwe, navavie kesangeny neeny mwiifuraa, mashika yoonri llya lyakwa lyeerekye ekakalyi shallyikooya!”
42015007	Na yeny shamuvia, “Efo iruveeu ni indo-da kukaa-fo nsia kya nndu llyamari umwi elyi aaluka, ngota kya vandu va usumanu iyana valatiri kimaruma kya yaaluka.”
42015008	“Ao ni nndu nka ungau eefo atiri shilingyi ikumi, kareta-u imwi, nawe nare nalaata kimwii na yaaiya mmba na iruuya na sina kutani aikooya?
42015009	Kammeikooya mmbo andevangaa vaka vambuya na va nnyanu navavie kyesangeny neeny mwiifuraa mashika shilingyi ilya yakwa sheeretye akakai shammeeikooya.
42015010	Na yeny shamuvia, ni indo-da kukaa-fo nsia efo kwa vasu va iruveeu kya nndu llyamari umwi elyi aaluka.”
42015011	Kawuya kaamba, “Kweefo nndu etiri vana vakwe vavii va womi.
42015012	Na ulya mwanawo wa nndu kavia ndeye shiniinga kyenga kya masaa yoo eefo, ekyo kikwaani neeny. Nalyo kavaavya umasi llwa lwiiyo.
42015013	Nalyo mwana ulya mwanawo wa nndu kavera mikonu myaangu. Kaumbya findo filya fyoose ando amwi. Kasama naambo nandekaa uruka lwa kwaasha. Nafo kanyanyatya-fo masaa alya akwe esindi na vandu va ngula.
42015014	Naasa elyi ammaa findo fyoose, uruka llwa lukawoywa nshaa shiniini nnu. Nawe muni kapooka ifikyo mfindo.
42015015	Nalyo kawara shia kandekunanavya na muni kyeny umwi wa uruka llwa. Nawe kanruma efo mareminy akwe, nandeisa-fo nguve.
42015016	Nalyo kava alangany makanda alya alyiwaa nnguve tilya, kulakae-fo nta nndu anniinga kindo.
42015017	Naasa kakwiindukya we muni kaamba, ‘Varundi vakee efo veekya kwa nde-yaakwa vafye indo, mmbo vatiri fyeelya fiingyi filasiaa. Neeny shatana shafiiya nshaa kunu!’
42015018	A shikwipoo shindefika kwa nde-yaakwa shimmbie, ‘Woi nde, mmbo shilelyamara kya efo iruveeu na yoo usanguny lwafo!
42015019	Nshikisumani-se ivaangwa ni mwana wafo-fo. Shaallwa shive umwi wa varundi vafo.’
42015020	Nalyo kakwipoo keenda kulya kwa ndeye. Elyi akee kwaasha ndeye kallollya, kavavyo mmuu, keenda eerishaa, kallingilya singony kammiminda.”
42015021	“Naasa mwana ulya kammbia, ‘Woi nde mmbo shilelyamara kya efo iruveeu na yoo usanguny lwafo! Nshikisumani-se nta ivaangwa mwana wafo-fo!’
42015022	Naasa ndeye kavia mashinga alya akwe, ‘Angusyeny mundeende soori ya wuuru mumbike na nrashi efo wokony, na fyaaru.
42015023	Muvendeende na ngashe ya shau ikee shivanri mwiishishe. Neese ndifony lulye lukese!
42015024	Kimmba mwana yeu wakwa efiiye kawuya iruka. Erekye kawuya ilollyo.’ Nalyo vakapooka indekesa.”
42015025	Naasa mwana ulya vavaye wa nndu kakooya akee ireminy. Nalyo elyi eefo ashaafukyaa kyeny keeta kwiireraa finanda na ufina.
42015026	Nalyo kavaanga umwi wa mashinga alya kansununda nammbie kindo ekyo kiifo nkyokyi?
42015027	Nawe kammbia, “Ni mwanamau ansha. Na ndoo kanshishya ngashe ilya shivanri, kimmba awuya immbwarya akee na muu.
42015028	Naasa kafulukwa nta nalakunde yaanga na mmba. Naasa ndeye kasomuka na poo kandellelemba.”
42015029	Nawe kavia ndeye, “Lla-te yeny shileva mwikurundya myaaka miingyi indo nta ivavaso lyafo lyimwi shilalyiimbwe. Neewe nta kulakunde ishiniinga nta ngurana ya mburu shifure ando amwi na mbuya takwa.
42015030	Indi mwana yeto wafo alemaa masaa afo moose asangyi na vaka va shia, kwallollya ashe we kwanshishya ngashe shivanri.”
42015031	Nawe kammbia, “Mwana wakwa, mmbo kusindi neeny fyeeri fyoose, na fyoose fikee fyakwa fikaveva fyafo.
42015032	Kya indi yese mmbo lwalollya kuti lufure na ilooka kimmba mwanamau yeu mmbo efiiye kawuya iruka, mmbo eerekye kawuya ilollyo.”
42016001	Naasa kavevia-se valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Kweefo nndu nsuri eetiri nngari mwikallya findo fyakwe. Nawe kashekumbwa kwakwe mmbo ennyanyata findo filya fyakwe.
42016002	Kammbaanga kammbia, ‘Nto mbony kyi shaita tafo? Shekennya findo efyo kukalyaa-te! Mashika nkukyiidimaa-se iva nngari-fo!’
42016003	Nawe kakusara efo nriminy, ‘A mmbo ntanaa inda elyi nndumi wakwa ashuutaa kunu ungariny? Irema nshishiidimaa-fo, na yeererya vandu mmbo lyisheengye usutu.
42016004	Akakakyo shammanya ndesa shitanaa elyi nsheutwaa kunu ungariny, naambo vashiwarye efo kyeny kwawo.’
42016005	Naasa, kandevaanga vandu vatiri siye ta nndumi ulya wakwe kwi umwi umwi. Kavia ulya wa mbee, ‘A yewe siye ya nndumi wakwa kutiri ifye inda?’
42016006	Nawe kaamba, ‘Ni nakori iyana ta mafura.’ Kammbia, ‘Warya barua yafo ya siye kukee rembo kureiye na ngeta makumi nave araanu.’
42016007	Kawuya kavia ulya ungyi, ‘A yewe siye kutiri ifye inda?’ Nawe kaamba, ‘Ni mindi iyana ya nganu!’ Kammbia, ‘Warya barua yafo ya siye kureiye makumi nave nyanya.’ “
42016008	“Naasa nndumi ulya karumisha nngari ulya llembi. Shamashika elyi aletana kya urango. Kimmba vana va ulana yelu shaasa valyimyana na woofyari lwawo, mmbo vava varango-rango vakeerya vana va sa.”
42016009	Na yeny shamuvia, “Masaa yaa a ulembi kuwonyiny nang'u mbuya, na elyi mukooyaa asya naambo vamuwarye efo kwawo.
42016010	Nndu akee nsaari ikallya yekyo kidu deny, mmbo ashevaa nsaari ikallya na yekyo kyiniini. Na nndu aengye mbai kya ekyo kidu deny, mmbo ashendaa mbai na kya ekyo kiniini. Na nndu nalakee nsaari ikallya ekyo kidu deny, nta nnashevaa nsaari ikallya ekyo kiniini-fo.
42016011	Naasa kwakooya kulaore muleva vasaari ikallya masaa yaa a ulembi a mmbi ashemuningaa ekyo kyikee kyany muveni?
42016012	Na kwakooya kulaore muleva vasaari ikallya findo fya vengyi a mmbi ashemuniingaa ekyo kivaa kyany muveni?
42016013	Nta nkwiifo nsoro wa poo kwa nndu ashiidimaa irundya vanndumi vavii-fo. Kungyi ashesuaa yeto umwi nakunde yeto ungyi, ao kungyi ashekulumbaa yeto umwi namini yeto wa kavii. Nta mmushiidimaa irundya Iruva musande irundya na masaa-fo.”
42016014	Naasa Vafarisayo vakaita ekyo kyoose aamba, nawo ni vandu vaafu va fesa, nalyo vakamwiipoiyo mmbwa.
42016015	Nalyo kavavia, “Yeni mukee vandu vekwallwa va usumanu muveni efo fisanguny fya vandu. Indi Iruva mmbo amwiishi mirima yaany! Mashika yekyo kirose kunu vanduny mmbo kyava usutu efo usanguny lwa Iruva.
42016016	Uvavaso na vakisuku veifo veereraa kutani Yohane asha. Indi kipookya yoo ni Nrumi ya Nsia iifo ishaambawaa ya umangyi lwa Iruva, na wo nndu kapara nafo.
42016017	Indi ngina na ulana nkyaangu firumake ngota mbekye imwi ya uvavaso ishaalashikaa.
42016018	Na wo nndu allakana na nka wakwe kaalyika ungyi, mmbo atana kya utuusi. Na yeto aalyika nka wa nndu allakana nawe mmbo avetana kindo kya utuusi.”
42016019	“Naasa kweefo nndu isimba ekee mwiraa soori ta ki-mangyi ngata shimamiri. Kava mwiisinda alyaa usuri wo nkonu kikava kyeekoora.
42016020	Naasa kukavekaa-fo na nndu nkiva eevaangwaa Lasaro akee mmbike yoo mwaangony kwakwe atirwa mfishavere.
42016021	Nawe mmbo elangye iwuura fipereshu fya fyeelya fiwaa fyuuka efo meseny a nndu ulya nsuri. Na fite fikasha fikakomba fishavere filya fyakwe.
42016022	Naasa nndu ulya nkiva kafwa, kasha iipowa ni vasu va iruveeu, vakanrwaa ng'undeny ta Abrahamu. Na isimba llya lyikavefwa lyikanderikwa.
42016023	Naasa kulya kwa vafu kainwa miso ekee uvavyony kalollya Abrahamu ekee kwaasha na Lasaro ekee ng'undeny takwe.
42016024	Kaonisa unyanga kaamba, ‘Woi Nde Abrahamu shisarya ukiva lwakwa-dwa, kurumi Lasaro nandekapa kisangu kya nni wakwe mureny nashefweera ulumi elu lwakwa; shamashika shikeevavyo nnu kunu kipalapaleny kya muro yeu.’
42016025	Abrahamu kaamba, ‘Mwana-kwa kummbwa mmbo kulewarya mesha alya ekumaye llya meendi kweesindi na muu. Na Lasaro kyakwe kawonisa fya ukiva. Kya indi we ulaalu eefo aviiryoony muu yaa, na yewe kwaliliswany.
42016026	Na kyingyi ngota ekyo, mmbo kuraukye kukatira waanga uniini efo nnang'ani kavii yaany na yese, na yewo vakunndye yuuka kunu kweru vanderuuka vafike kwany, nta valashiidimaa, nta yuuka efo kwany vafike kweru.’
42016027	Naasa kammbia, ‘Kyimmba ni indo, nde, shakutereva kundenruma efo kyeny kwa nde wakwa.
42016028	Mashika shitiri-fo vanavama varaanu, nawe nandevasununndya, valashe ifika kunu uvavyony sheeny.’
42016029	Abrahamu kaamba, ‘Mmbo vatiri Mose na valya veauya fisuku kuti vavaaranyi wo.’
42016030	Nawe kaamba, ‘Ode nde Abrahamu. Indi kwakooya nndu auka kunu kwa vafu kandefika kwawo, llyo vashekuryaa.’
42016031	Nawe kammbia, ‘Vakanra valaaranya nta Mose nta valya veauya fisuku, naakwa nndu aruka auka kwa vafu mmbasheindutwaa-fo.’ “
42017001	Naasa kavevia-se valya vakiloshyony vakwe, “Nkivaa misindara ire ilasha-fo; indi nndu yeto misindara ishaa yeendwa mmbwe, oshiny lwakwe!
42017002	Mmbo kyeesumani nafingyo isewe efo singony nandeerwa efo yeeveny, ngota yeengye yewo vafwafwa nsindara naakwa ni yeto umwi waawo.
42017003	Kwiiseny muveni-te! Kwakooya mwanamau alyamara nrerye na kwakooya arumbuya mfwaaye!
42017004	Na kwakooya akulyamarya matorito mfungare nkonu umwi-da kakuwuiya kaamba, ‘Shanrumbuya!’ Neewe kyevemfwaaye-da!”
42017005	Nalyo varumi valya vakavia Nndumi, “Lweengerye kyikusiryo kyeru!”
42017006	Naasa Nndumi kaamba, “Kukooye mwetiri kyikusiryo kifye sha mbekye ya haradali, mmbo mweeviaa nri yeu wa nkuu iluka kweende efo yeeveny, nato wemwirikyaa.”
42017007	“A nndu wa kunu kwany ni ungau akoyaa atiri ishinga lyiremaa na ng'umbe, ao yiisa findo, kakooya lyasha na kyeny lyuuka ireminy, nawe nalyivie, ‘Angusya isha kukaa rembo, kulye shoonga!’
42017008	Nshi indo-fo! Mmbo alyiviaa, ‘Songosya shoonga nshelya nkwaany, kusheny kukwiinive kushifurukanyi shitani shalya na ina. Shammaa llyony neewe kushekulyiiyaa na ina.’
42017009	A mmbo mwaamba asheviaa ishinga elyo aika, elyi lyatana shaasa lyikee ivavasye?
42017010	Neeni ni kiwo-da, Kwakooya mwantana fyoose mukee vavavasye, ambeny lukee mashinga a mweelu! Mmbo lwatana efyo tupu lweevavasyo lufitani.”
42017011	Nalyo kikava elyi arie kyaaro kya yeenda Yerusalemu, nawe muni eefo erumbwaa kulya Samaria kufiitani na Galilaya.
42017012	Elyi afika yaafukya kundo kwa muri, kakwaanannya na vandu ikumi vatirwa ni ivave.
42017013	Vakoonisa ngyunyanga veshambaa, “Woi Yesu woi Nndumi weeru! Lulyillye ukiva lweru!”
42017014	Nawe kavavia, “Kweengyeny mundekoora efo kwa vakohani!” Naasa veefo vasheendaa vakeeremuka.
42017015	Naasa ulya umwi eekilolya ammishia, kawuya kwa Yesu eng'anisaa Iruva na unyanga uniini.
42017016	Kashekweera yoo marendeny a Yesu, kamwaana, nawe ni nndu wa kulya Samaria.
42017017	Nalyo Yesu karouwa kaamba, “A vandu veremuka nshi ikumi? A valya keenda valla kwi?
42017018	A ndesa nkwawonika-u awuya isheetikisa Iruva, kulaore ni nndu yeu nawe kaveva muny?”
42017019	Naasa kambia, “Kwankusirya-u indo nkyo kyakukira!”
42017020	Naasa Vafarisayo vakavesa Yesu, “A ni indii umangyi lwa Iruva lusheshaa?” Nawe karouwa, “Isha lya umangi lwa Iruva llyivaa isununda-fo!
42017021	Nta llushambawaa, akakalu kunu! Ao akakalo kulya-fo. Mashika lleny-te, umangyi lwa Iruva ni efo nnang'ani yaany lukai!”
42017022	Naasa kavia valya vakiloshyony, “Kukaa kushe fyeeri elyi mushelangaa ilollya mikonu yeyo ya Mwana yeto wa nndu, nta umwi tupu mulaulolyaa.
42017023	Nalyo vandu vashemuviaa, Ekakau kunu! Ekakato efo! Neeni nta muleende-fo nta mularishe nafo-fo!
42017024	Mashika shaasa ukova lushakaa paa luuka marayony a ngina taari yei lukafika marayony a ngina taari yei ingyi lwivevaa paa, na Mwana yeto wa nndu ni indo ashevaa elyi kufikaa nkonu yeto wakwe.
42017025	Indi kindo kyikee kirummbwe kishesongwaa immbonisa ni indeliswa ukiva wiingyi na iminwa ni vandu va irika elyi.
42017026	Na shaasa kileva fyeeri filya fya Noe ni indo kishendaa elyi kufikaa fyeeri efyo fya Mwana yeto wa nndu.
42017027	Mmbo valeva veelya na ina na yaalyika na yaalyikwa kutani kwafika nkonu ulya Noe aleanga na efo isandukuny llya iniini. Nalyo yeeve ilya ikasha ikavarumata woose.
42017028	Nakyo kyikafwanana na kyilya kileutika fyeeri filya fya Loti. Mmbo veefo vellyaa na ina na yuura na ikumba na ivaakya na itana mmba tawo.
42017029	Naasa nkonu ulya Loti alekwiipoo kulya Sodoma, kukooloka mbua ya muro na kibiriti yuuka na efo iruveeu ikavakomba kombi.
42017030	Na elyi kufikaa nkonu yeto Mwana yeto wa nndu ashefumaa nato paa, ni indo-da kishendaa.
42017031	Nkonu yeto nndu akooyaa akee efo mmbeu na fiiya fyakwe fikee efo mmba, nta nalaoloke-fo nandefipoo-fo. Na nndu akooyaa akee ireminy ni kiwo-da nalawuye na numa.
42017032	Kyekummbweny nka ulya wa Loti.
42017033	Nndu katambalya ikyira muu wakwe, mmbo asheuretaa. Na nndu kakuretya, mmbwe akooyaa ikaa nato.
42017034	Mmbo shamuvia, vandu vavii vakooyaa valele kitareny kimwi. Yeto umwi awarywaa, na yeto ungyi narewa-u.
42017035	Kuvekaa-fo na vaka vavii vakee ando amwi vesaa nswa. Yeto umwi awarywaa na yeto ungyi narewa-u. [
42017036	Vandu vavii vakooya vakee ireminy, nawo yeto umwi awarywaa na yeto ungyi narewa-u.]”
42017037	Nawo vakarouwa vakaamba, “A nkwi, Nndumi?” Nawe kaamba, “Kundo kuwoye nnying'a na mamutony mfo kundo ashekuumbyaa.”
42018001	Naasa Yesu kaveera kyaaso kyeevafunda kuti vave vetereva Iruva fyeeri fyoose nta valashelemwa.
42018002	Kaamba, “Kweefo nndu mwiirumbwa myaandu ekee muriny mmbe, kava nndu naleereiye Iruva nta nalasarye nndu.
42018003	Naasa efo muriny ulya kukavekaa-fo nka wa ding'u. Nawe kativa-tiva efo kwakwe kaamba, ‘Shirumbuya mwaandu wakwa nisha kwashiauwa nkiduva wakwa.’
42018004	Nawe kava mwiilema-da ando a mikonu myaashaa. Elyi lyeefurummya karera efo nriminy, ‘Na kyikava shileereiye Iruva na shilasarye nta nndu,
42018005	indi nka yeu wa ding'u elyi ashitivila indo, ra shinrumbuye mwaandu wakwe kya songosiny naambo nalashaatare nnu.’ “
42018006	Kyasia Nndumi kaamba, “Aranyiny-te kindo mwiirumbwa myaandu yeto wa kiila aleamba.
42018007	Iruva mmbo mwaamba we asheraa nalarumbuya yewo asawuye myaandu yaawo kya songosiny, nawo veefo vamfuyaa kio na nsanyiny, nawe navatevese tupu?
42018008	Shamuvia mmbo ashevarumbuyaa myaandu yaawo kya songosiny uviny. Indi Mwana yeto wa nndu elyi asheshaa a ndesa ashewonisaa vandu vakusirye-u kunu ulaniny?”
42018009	Kavavia kyaaso ekyi, “Kwiifo vandu vakusarye wo veni mmbo vakee va usumanu vakamina vengyi.
42018010	Mmbo kweifo vandu vavii valeenda na mmba ya Iruva. Ulya umwi ni mfarisayo, na ulya ungyi ni n-dedemi.
42018011	Naasa Mfarisayo ulya kasalala-u, karera efo nrimin eetereva Iruva, kaamba, ‘Woi Iruva shakwaana elyi yeny shilakee sha vandu vengyi shilakee sha vasoki ao valembi, ao sha vandu vetuusa, shilakee nta sha n-dedemi yeu.
42018012	Ando a mfungare umwi shava mwikootoya kavii, na findo shitiri fyoose kilya kya ikumi ikumi shakivika kya ukamba lwa Iruva.’
42018013	Na n-dedemi ulya kasalala kwaasha nalakare nta iinuya miso kya efo uuwe iruvee-u, kakukapa-kapa mbafu kaamba, ‘Woi Iruva shifwaaya yeny shikee nndu llyamari.’
42018014	Na yeny shamuvia, nndu yeto mmbo aleenda na kyeny eetiri usumanu ngota ulya. Mashika yeto akwaallwa nniini we muni mmbo akaa nanyiiswa, na yeto akunyiisa mmbo akaa nang'aniswa.”
42018015	Naasa vakamweenngye vana vadu naambo naveekerye maako. Valya vakiloshyony vakavakyeemya.
42018016	Naasa Yesu kavavaanga vakusheye na kwakwe. Kaamba, “Reny fivana efyo fikusheye na kwakwa, nta mulafiimi! Mashika yewo va ngata yaawo mmbo umangyi lwa Iruva lwava lwawo.
42018017	Nkya dede shamuvia, kwakooya kulaore nndu awarya umangyi lwa Iruva ekee wa ngata ya fivana yefi, nnyakooya yaanga-fo-fo.”
42018018	Nalyo nndu nsongoru umwi kammbesa, “Ale llosha nsha, a shatana inda shiwonise ding'u ya muu wa llung'anu?”
42018019	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Nkyiki kwashivaangya nsha? Nkwiifo akee nsha kuuta Iruva muni-fo.”
42018020	Mmbo kwiishi mavavasyo a Iruva, “Kulatuuse, nta kulawae, nta kulaive, nta kulafingye uroo kindo kya wongo. Indya ndoo na mau.”
42018021	Nawe kammbia, “Efyo mmbo shilevefiringa fyoose uka elyo shekee n-du.”
42018022	Naasa Nndumi ekiita indo kammbia, “Ni kimwi kiifo kuturye. Endekumba fyoose kutiri, kundeavya vakiva. Neewe llyo kushekuwonisyaa masaa efo iruveeu. Kwammaa kusheny kushilatye!”
42018023	Naasa ammiita indo kasokywa mfyoova deny, kimmba eetiri masaa meengyi nnu.
42018024	Naasa Yesu eekilolya indo, kaamba, “A paa ndesa kyava kyuumu-dwa kya vandu yewo vatiri masaa vakooye yaanga na efo umanginy lwa Iruva!
42018025	Mmbo kyava kyaangu ngamula iire neefo mmbweny ya sindano, ngota nndu isimba yaanga neefo umanginy lwa Iruva.”
42018026	Naasa valya veeta vakaamba, “Kwakooya ni indo, a nndu ashekooyaa ikirwa ni ungau?”
42018027	Nawe kaamba, “Ekyo kyara kilaidimika kwa vandu, mmbo kyaidimika efo kwa Iruva.”
42018028	Naasa Petro kaamba, “Lla-te yese mmbo lureeye findo fyeru lukasha ikulatya.”
42018029	Nawe kavavia, “Nkya dede shamuvia, nkwiifo nndu anra naakwa ni mmba, naakwa ni nka, naakwa ni vanavamaye, naakwa ni ndeye, na maye, naakwa ni vana, kwakooya ni kimaruma kya umangyi lwa Iruva,
42018030	nare nalaniingwa eviiryoo fingyi fiingyi ando a kilya kimwi na kya efi fya ulaalu; na efo ulaniny elo lwishaa nawarye muu wa llung'anu.”
42018031	Naasa kaumbya valya ikumi na vavii alya ando akai, vakee kyaanya kyawo. Kavavia, “Manyiny lwiifo lushendaa irwa na kulya Yerusalemu, na mbony tilya tikee shireiye ni valya veauya fisuku kya Mwana yeto wa nndu llyo tishiinukya-u indo toose.
42018032	Mashika asherambikywaa efo maakony a vandu va masanga, naveteendwa, naveinyalwa, navemishyo minyiiri.
42018033	Na elyi numa vapooke inkapa na ngova, vambwae-ny. Na elyi lya nkonu wa kararu asherukaany.” "
42018034	Nawo elyi avavia indo valamanyi nta kinnywa, kindo ekyo kikava sheelyi vankisurumwa, nta valamanyi kilya kyaambawa-u.
42018035	Kyasia kikava elyi ee-fo ashaafukyaa Yeriko kwee-fo nndu mfu miso akee rembo yoo mbai ya shia asheereryaa vandu.
42018036	Keeta vandu veshiraa-u nkuka, kavesa kindo kiifo.
42018037	Vakammbia, " “Ni Yesu wa kulya Nasareti ee-fo ashiiraa-u.”
42018038	Nawe kafua nnu kaamba, “Woi Yesu kukee mwana wa Davidi, shisarya ukiva lwakwa!”
42018039	Valya vasongoye vakankyeemya namalalye. Nawe keengera ifua kilanya, “Woi mwana wa Davidi, shisarya ukiva lwakwa!”
42018040	Naasa Yesu kairisha, kavavasya neendwa na alya akai. Afika kufii kammbesa,
42018041	A mmbo kwakunda shikutannyi inda? Nawe kammbia, “Nndumi naambo shimanyi ilola.”
42018042	Yesu kammbia, “Idima ilolany! Kwankusirya-u indo nkyo kyakushiisa.”
42018043	Nalyo yeni kaidima ilola. Kallatya eshaarafumaa Iruva. Na vandu valya vaiyo valolya indo, vakavikya Iruva nnduma.
42019001	Na elyi amfika kulya Yeriko eefo ashiraa-u,
42019002	nalyo akakau nndu avangwaa irina lyakwe ni Sakayo. Nawe ekee nniini wa vadedemi kaveva na nndu isimba.
42019003	Naasa karuuya mwaanya wa ilollya Yesu namanyi mmbwa ngata kyi nalaidimi mashika a mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu, kimmba akee nndu wa yuumba ifii.
42019004	Nalyo karisha na mbee, kasaama nriny wa nkuu, naambo nallolye. Mashika nnyo shia ashiraa.
42019005	Nalyo elyi Yesu afika-u kalola efo uuwe, kammbia, “Sakayo, oloka-fo uviny. Mashika yeny shalollya kuti shive muny wafo inu.”
42019006	Nawe kaangusya yooloka-fo, kammbwarya efo kyeny kwakwe efuraa.
42019007	Na llya vandu valelolya kive indo vakarininda woose, vakaamba, “Mmbo angaa neefo mmba kwa nndu llyamari nandekwiimurisa-fo.”
42019008	Naasa Sakayo kashesalala yoo mbee ya Nndumi kammbia, “Lla-te Nndumi findo shitiri nshaavaa kavii, kyenga shikininge vakiva. Na kwakooya shilensoka nndu kindo nshembiryaa kaana.”
42019009	Naasa Yesu kambia, “Kyeny eka kammbona ukiro inu, kimmba neewe-da ni mwana wa Abrahamu.
42019010	Mashika Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo asheye iruuya ekyo kirekye nakikire.”
42019011	Naasa veefo veshaaranyaa mbony yeto, nawe kalungya-u kaveera kyaaso. Nyelyi eefo ashaafukyaa Yerusalemu nawo veeshi kulakooye umangyi lwa Iruva lwiifo lufumaa paa na lyimwi.
42019012	Naasa kaamba, “Kweefo nndu wa mmba ya mangyi aleipoo kyaaro kya uruka lwa kwaasha, nandetira-fo umangyi nawuyeny.
42019013	Naasa kavaanga mashinga alya akwe ikumi, kavaniingya fesa ta ikapa mbusha. Kavavia, ‘Endekapeny nato mbusha shitani shawuya.’
42019014	Naasa vandu va uruka llwa lwakwe muni vensuuye. Vakaruma varumi veellatya numa vandeamba, ‘Llukundye kutire umangyi kulwiitorye yese-fo!’
42019015	Nalyo kikava elyi antira umangyi ammbuya na kyeny, kaamba kundevaangwa mashinga alya alevaniingya fesa tilya naambo namanyi wo nndu mbusha alewonisa.
42019016	Nalyo ulya wa mbee kasha nang'u, kaamba, ‘Nndumi iyana llya lyafo lya fesa lyileende mbusha ya mayana ikumi.’
42019017	Nawe kammbia, ‘Eeka ishinga isha, mmbo kweetiri fyaangu kwavefikallya na usaari. Tiraany ushilyi lwa iitorya miri ikumi!’
42019018	Nalyo ulya wa kavii kasha nang'u kaamba, ‘Nndumi iyana lyafo lya fesa lyileende mbusha ya mayana araanu.’
42019019	Naasa na yeu-da kavemmbia, ‘Neewe vaany mwiitori wa miri iraanu!’ “
42019020	“Nalyo ulya ungyi kasha kaamba, ‘Nndumi iyana llya lyafo lya fesa akakalyi shilelyifingya kiraminy shalyisuruma.
42019021	Mashika shilekwiryaa kimmba yewe ni nndu nnyuku. Mmbo koondwa kundo kulaarye. Kwaveilula kundo kulasuye mbeu.’
42019022	Nawe kammbia, ‘Yewe ishinga yeesi! Ekyo kyauka kaniny kafo nkyo nkutyaa nakyo uvingo lwafo. Elyi kweeshi yeny ni nndu nnyuku shoondwa kundo shilaarye, shaveilula kundo shilasuye mbeu.
42019023	A kimaruma kwara kulanderwaa fesa ilya yakwa efo kwa vandu vekapa mbusha na fesa ta vandu nkyikyi? Neeny elyi sheshaa llyo sheewaryaa kimwi na ulyimi lwa vayo?’
42019024	Nalyo kavia valya vasalali yoo kufii, ‘Nsokeny iyana elyo lyakwe lya fesa muniingye yeto atiri mayana ikumi.’
42019025	Nawo vakammbia, ‘Nndumi, mmbo atiri mayana ikumi-te!’
42019026	Neeny shamuvia, ‘Wo nndu atiri kindo mmbo aniingwaa na fingi. Na yeto nalatiri mmbo asokwaa na kilya atiri.
42019027	Indi vakiduva valya vakwa valya valakundye shivikwa mangyi mwivashilya, endeveendeny na yaa muvarengetye si shiilolye!’ “
42019028	Nalyo elyi ammaa irera indo keera na mbee asheendaa irwa na kulya Yerusalemu.
42019029	Nalyo kikava elyi aafukya kulya Betifage na Betania kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura, nalyo karuma vandu vakiloshyony vavii.
42019030	Kaamba, “Endeny efo muriny usumani na yaa lukai. Mukafika-fo mushekooyaa ngashe ya nshungu ikee shifingye ando nayo ilandesaamwa ni nndu. Iporomweny musheengye.
42019031	Na kwakooya nndu amuvesa, nnyeeki mwaiporomwa mmbo mushambaa ni Nndumi aikundye!”
42019032	Naasa valya varumwa vakakweengya vakavekooya indo-da shaasa avavia.
42019033	Naasa elyi veefo veporomwaa ngashe ilya veni valya va vayo vakavavia, “Nkyiki elyi mwaporomwa ngashe yei ya nshungu?”
42019034	Nawo vakaamba, “Ni Nndumi aikundye-te!”
42019035	Nalyo vakayeengye Yesu. Vakawuya vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo mungony wa vayo, vakasaamisa-u Yesu.
42019036	Naasa eefo ashendaa nawo vakaala soori tawo ta yeerya efo shia.
42019037	Naasa elyi amfika alya kufii na yoolokyony lya ifumbu llya lya miri ya mafura, nalyo mamwiingyia valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakapooka iitikisa Iruva na unyanga uniini velookaa, kimaruma kya findo filya fya wiidimi valolye fyoose.
42019038	Vakaamba, “Kundearafumwa yeu asha akee mangyi arumwa ni Nndumi! Efo iruvee-u kuvaa na ufoo na efo kukee uuwe ya findo fyoose kukatira tikisi!”
42019039	Nalyo Vafarisayo vaangu vakee efo nnang'ani ya mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu, vakambia, “Llosha kyeemya vandu yeva vakiloshyony kyafo-te!”
42019040	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “Kwakooya wo vamalalya ni mawe yaa ashekapaa kyoorongye.”
42019041	Na elyi eefo ashaafukyaa-fo kalola muri ulya kaudonisya misoru.
42019042	Kaamba, “A nkyema kuveishi na yewe kindo kyeekweengyee ufoo naakwa ni nkonu yeu wa inu! Indi kwankisurumwa kulashekilolyaa-se ulaalu-fo.
42019043	Mashika kukaa kushe kyeeri kikuwoyaa tiny elyi misa ashekuringityaa sha isimamba riti vakuraye deny vakushingilye taari toose.
42019044	Nawo vakuwunduye si vakusande na vana vafo va efo nnang'ani yafo, nta mmbasheraa-u iwe lyikweekyerye iwe uroye wa vayo-fo, kimmba kwanra kulamanya kyeeri kyafo kya isengerwa.”
42019045	Nawe keera neefo poo ya mmba ya Iruva kaanta-fo valya veefo veekumbaa findo.
42019046	Kavavia, “Mmbo kyikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Mmba yakwa kuti ive mmba yeeterevya.’ Lyo yeni mukawuya iyaallwa mbanga ya veala shia.”
42019047	Naasa kava mwiilosha efo mmba ya Iruva wo nkonu. Na vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na veelosha mavavaso vakasia mwaanya weemmamita, na vandu valya vasongoru va uruka ni kiwo-da.
42019048	Nawo nta valaoni kyeetana mashika mamwiingyi moose wa vandu mmbo weeriani nawe vemwaaranyaa.
42020001	Naasa nkonu umwi elyi eefo aloshaa vandu efo mmba ya Iruva na iwoongoya Nrumi ya Nsia, nalyo vakohani vaniini vakasha nang'u tiny na vaarya va fitabu vasasangyi na masiingo a vandu.
42020002	Vakarera nawe vakaamba, “Elyi kwatana indo mmbo kutiri muumu wa ngata ingai? Na nndu yeto akuvikye muumu yeto mmbi?”
42020003	Naasa kaalwa kavavia, “Ra neeny shimuvese neeni mushirouwe!
42020004	Ubatiso lwa Yohane luukye kwi? Ni efo iruveeu, ao ni kunu vanduny ndesa?”
42020005	Naasa vakakusara-sara kikwawo, vakaamba, “Kwakooya lwaamba ni iruveeu luukye, mmbo ashambaa kikavaany inda elyi mulamwiirikye?”
42020006	Indi kwakooya lwaamba nkunu vanduny luukye, ekakayo mburwa yei ya vandu shoose ishelweeraa mawe, mashika elyi veeshi na nshushwa Yohane mmbo akee nndu nkisuku.
42020007	Nalyo vakarouwa, “Llwamanya kundo luukye-fo.”
42020008	Na Yesu kavavia, “Nta yeny nshimuviaa mumu shatana nato indo mmbo ukee wa ngata ingai-fo.”
42020009	Naasa kapooka irera na vandu kaveera kyaaso ekyi, “Kweefo nndu aleronga nnda wakwe wa misabibu. Kauningya varemi wikee wa waara, keenda kyaaro kya kyeeri kyaasha.
42020010	Neelyi kyeeri kya vayo kyamfika karuma ishinga kulya kwa varemi valya vanniinge waavi lwakwe lwa fimu efyo fya misabibu. Naasa varemi valya vakamwiila vakammbiira ruu.
42020011	Nalyo keengera iruma ishinga lyingyi. Nalyo-da vakavelyiila na ilyipira. Vakalyiviira ruu.
42020012	Nalyo keengera iruma wa kararu. Nawe-da vakankapa mariinga vakampurusa neefo shia.
42020013	Naasa muni nnda ulya wa misabibu kaamba, ‘A mmbo shitanaa inda? Mmbo nshevarumyaa mwana nkunde wakwa. Kulakooye we vashenreremyaa.’
42020014	Naasa varemi valya veekilolya ashe vakaumburana wo veni na veni, vakaamba, ‘Akakato muni ding'u! Ndifonte lumbwae ding'u yeyo ive yeeru luveni!’
42020015	Nalyo vakankunnya neefo kipoo ya nnda ulya, vakambwaa, ‘A muni nnda ulya wa misabibu mmbo ashevatanyaa inda?
42020016	Mmbo asheshaa nasherumata varemi valya na nnda ulya wa misabibu asheningyaa vandu vengyi.’ Naasa elyi veeta indo vakaamba, ‘Nta kilave indo-fo!’ “
42020017	Naasa kavavikya miso swaa kavavia, “A kyavaany inda elyi kilereiyo kyeaamba, Iwe elyo vetana mmba valelyilema, llyo lyileva iwe lya ndumbeny.”
42020018	“Wo nndu awoya iwe elyo afika-fikaa. Na yeto lyammboya lyishensa-saa.” "
42020019	Nalyo veelosha mavavaso valya vakasanga na vakohani vaniini vakasia mwaanya weentira kyeeri kyilya kyeni, vakawuya iiryaa ironda llya lya vandu lyiiyo mashika elyi valemanya mmbo aleera kyaaso kyilya kyeevaronga wo.
42020020	Nalyo vakava vanreiyaa vakaruma vellaa vakunang'arye sheelyi vakee vandu vesha, vandenreiya na ekyo areraa, vawonise kindo naambo vedimi indenrambikya efo maakony a Serikali na mwiitori wa uruka, mmbwe nshilyi wa Kaisari.
42020021	Nawo vakashemmbesa vakaamba, " “Ale llosha! Lwiishi mmbo kukee nndu mwiirera na ilosha kisumani kulalolaa nta fisangu fya vandu. Mmbo kwafunda shia ya Iruva kyikee kya dede.
42020022	A lukataa usanu lwa Kaisari ni kindo kisumani ndesa ao ode?”
42020023	Nawe kaitumuso ntambo wawo, kavavia,
42020024	“Kyeshooreny fesa-te! A ufwanu yelo lwiiyo llwa-vi na kireiyo yekyo?” Nawo vakaamba, “Llwa Kaisari-te!”
42020025	Naasa kavavia, “Kyasiany Kaisari nningye findo fikwaani na Kaisari, na Iruva muvenniingya efyo fikwaani na Iruva.”
42020026	Nawo valeedimi inreiya neekyo areraa efo usanguny lwa vandu valya vakuumbye-fo. Vakatirwa ntamba kya kilya avarouwa. Vakamalallya sau.
42020027	Naasa Vasadukayo vaangu vakansheya nawo ni vandu valemmyi kya iruka lya vafu vakaamba llyiifo-fo, vakashemmbesa,
42020028	Vakaamba, “Ale llosha! Mose mmbo areiye kyeeluvia kwakooya mwanamaye wa nndu afwa nalatiri mwana, kuti mwanamaye narwaa nka yeto, naonisye mwanamaye muya ding'u.
42020029	Naasa kweefo vana va nka mfungare. Ulya wa mbee karwaa nka, kafwa nalare-u mwana.
42020030	Na ulya wa kavii-da.
42020031	Na ulya wa kararu kavenrwaa. Ni indo valya mfungare woose, valare-u nta mwana, vakasia ifwa.
42020032	Neelyi lya ifurummya nka ulya kavefwa.
42020033	Kyivaany inda elyi kufikaa yoo marukyony a vandu vafu kya nka yeto, mmbo ashevaa wa nndu ungau? Mashika woose mfungare veerie nka yeto.”
42020034	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Vana va ulana yelu vashalyikaa na yaalyikwa.
42020035	Kya indi yewo vasherumbuyoo mwaandu vandekooya ulana yelo lwishaa na iruka lya vafu, wo mmbashaalyikaa-se-fo, nta yaalyikwa-fo.
42020036	Nta ifwa mmbakiidimaa-se ifwa-fo, mmbo vavaa sha vasu va Iruva, vaveva na vana va Iruva elyi vannduka.
42020037	Na mbony ta vandu vafu shaasa varukaa dede, na Mose-da alevetironga alya akee areiye mbony ta ngorosho ilya yekee yaaka, avaangye-u Nndumi mmbwe Iruva wa Abrahamu, na Iruva wa Isaki, na Iruva wa Yakobo.
42020038	Kyasia, Iruva nshi akee wa vandu vafu-fo, mmbo akee wa valya vakee na muu. Mashika woose vakee vakwe mmbo vava vandu vakee na muu.”
42020039	Naasa veelosha mavavaso valya maata vakaamba, “Llosha mmbo kwarera kwaronga deny!”
42020040	Nawo valakare immbesa-se nta kindo.
42020041	Naasa, nawe kavavia, “Kyava inda elyi vandu vaambaye Kristo mmbo akee mwana wa Davidi?
42020042	Kimmba Davidi we muni arerye efo kitabuny kya Saburi kaamba, ‘Nndumi alevia Nndumi wakwa, kaa rembo yaa woko lwakwa usha,
42020043	shitani shaara vakiduva vafo si, shivaallwe kiri kyafo kya yeekyerya marende.’ “
42020044	“Naasany kimmba Davidi ammbaanga ni Nndumi, a ni inda ava-se mwana wakwe?”
42020045	Naasa elyi vandu valya vakuumbye-fo veefo vashaaranyaa, nawe kavia valya vakiloshyony vakwe,
42020046	“Kwiiseny na veelosha mavavaso vakundye iraa soori shaasha na ilanga iidikiryo efo singireny na indekaa marembo a mbee efo mmba teeterevya na marembo a mbee elyi vavaangwa ando a sukukuu.
42020047	Ate wo mmbo vandu veemira mmba ta vaka va ding'u. Vakava vetereva fiterewo fyaasha kyikee kya ikoora vanduny tupu. Mmbo vashewonisaa uvingo uniini nnu.”
42021001	Naasa Yesu kalolya vandu masimba shaasa vavika firaso fyawo efo isandukuny lyeesanyirya fesa ta mmba ya Iruva.
42021002	Naasa kalollya nka wa ding'u akee nkiva avika-fo senti ivii.
42021003	Nalyo kaamba, “Nkya dede shamuvia, ‘Nka yeu wa ding'u akee nkiva indo mmbo avika kiniini ngota woose.
42021004	Mashika yewo woose ni efo findony fyawo fya mmwasi vauta efyo vavika fya pya.’ Indi we ni efo findony fyakwe fyerorwa aleuta kavika kyoose atiri kyeelela muu wakwe.”
42021005	Nalyo kakooya vandu vereraa kya mmba ya Iruva elyi ikee shishope indo na mawe a utore na findo vandu vavikye fya iishopa, nawe kaamba,
42021006	“Kya efyo mulollye kukaa kushe fyeeri kulasherewaa-u iwe lyikweekyerye iwe lyingyi lyire lyilawunduyo si-fo.”
42021007	Naasa vakammbesa vakaamba, “Llosha a meendi kisheutikaa indo ni indii? Na elyi findo efyo fyamfika isha, wende lwavayo llokyi?”
42021008	Naasa kaamba, “Kwiiseny mulasheelembwa mashika veengi vasheshaa na irina lyakwa vashambaa, ‘Mmbwe yeu!’ vaveamba-se, kyeeri ekyo kyikee kufii kyifike. Neeni nta muleende ivalatya-fo.
42021009	Indi meendi mushitaa kwiikapaa fira na myaalukoluko ya vandu iifo, neeni nta mulairyee! Mmbo kyikee kirummbwe kisongwe yeenda indo, indi yoo masiiyony nshilyo yeni ammba isha-fo.”
42021010	Keengera ivavia, “Uruka lushekwiipoo lukape uruka lungyi, na umangyi luvekapa umangyi lungyi.
42021011	Kushiraa-u na fidinasi finiini, na shaa na ndwari wo ando, na ngyende teeresye tivelolyo tuuka neefo iruveeu.
42021012	Indi kindo kipokaa itanyika kulaore findo yefyo fyansha, mmbo veshemutiraa na imurishisa vandemurwaa efo mmba tawo teeterevya, na mmba ta vafinge, mundevefitwa na efo fisanguny fya vamangyi na vashilyi yewo va Kaisari kimaruma kya irina lyakwa.
42021013	Nakyo nkyo kishemwengyee mwaanya weevika ukureeki lwany.
42021014	Naasa nng'u mushefishyaa shila tapa efo nriminy mure mulakusara-saraa kindo musherouwaa ewo vamukumba.
42021015	Mashika ni yeny nshemuniingaa kana na urango usha, na vakiduva yewo vany woose nta valashiidimaa ifilyimba na ifyaallwa.
42021016	Indi naakwa ni vamiku vany, na vanavamaye vany, na woofyari vany, na vambuya vany, mmbo mushendaa irambikyo mmbo efo maakony a vakiduva, nawo vamwiite na ufuny yeni maata.
42021017	Muveva na veesuwa mmbandu woose kimaruma kya irina lyakwa.
42021018	Manyiny naakwa ni ufii lwa efo nrweny wany nta llusherekaa-u-fo.
42021019	Kwakooya mushesisirya-u llyo mushekirwaa.”
42021020	“Indi meendi mushelolyaa kunu Yerusalemu kushingilyo mmatorito a fira nalyo manyiny, mmbo kwamfika kyeeri kya vayo kyealuka irama.
42021021	Nalyo yewo vakooyaa vakee kunu Yudaya varishe vandepara na mafumbu-u. Na yewo vakooya vakee mareminy, wo valawuye na numa vandeanga nafo-fo.
42021022	Mashika fyeeri efyo mfyo fyeetaiya naambo efyo fikee fireiye fikooye indeinukya-u fyoose.
42021023	Indi yewo vakooyaa vakufingye na yoota vana fyeeri efyo, oshiny lwawo! Mashika llyo uruka lushewoywaa ni ngatara shiniini, na vandu va uruka yelu vakooye iwoywa ni ngapo shinyaasi.
42021024	Nalyo vashewawaa noosu na inderawa mifungwa efo vanduny va masanga na usu. Na kunu Yerusalemu kuve kundo vandu va masanga vavavara kutani fyeeri fyawo fyafika.”
42021025	“Nalyo kushelolyoo ngyende efo ngini-u na efo mwiiriny na efo nyinyiriny. Na kunu urukeny vandu va masanga vasheerevee vatambwa ni yeeve yeyo shiniini ishonaa na irosa matundulu maniini.
42021026	Na vandu vashumaa mwaangaya kimaruma kya weerei na ivereya kindo kikaa kiwoye ulana elu, mashika vekooyaa na finya yeto ta efo iruveeu tirinyiswaa-rinyiswaa.
42021027	Nalyo llyo vashelolyaa paa Mwana yeto wa nndu ashaa ariwa ni ifishi atiri finya shiniini na itumbe.
42021028	Na yeni meendi mukooyaa findo yefyo fipookaa itanyika, kwipoony shu muveinwa mirwe yaany, mashika kwamfika kufii na mawoweny any.”
42021029	Nawe kaveera kyaaso, “Loleny nkuu na miri ingyi myoose.
42021030	Kwakooya yamfumbisa mmbo mwamanya kwamfika kufii na iilula.
42021031	Na yeni ni kiwo-da, meendi mulolyaa findo efyo fiifo fishutikaa, kyevemanyiny ni umangyi lwa Iruva lwamfika kufii lulolyo paa.
42021032	Nkya dede shamuvia, irika elyi llyishesiaa kulaore findo efyo fyamiinukya indo fyoose-fo.
42021033	Ngina na ulana firumakaa, kilarumakaa ni marero akwa.”
42021034	“Kya indi kwiiseny muveni, mirima yaany ilakooye irovyo mwiitalauwaa ndeu na inangwa mmbwari na yaafuka kya findo fya muu yeu, na nkonu yeto umuwoye tiny sha nsoori.
42021035	Shamashika ushesheyaa vandu vakee yaa ulaniny ukooye vakweekye.
42021036	Naasany, laleny shoovi wo kyeeri mwiiterevaa Iruva mwiidimi ikyia findo efyo fyoose fikee fiteerye fishe, muverewa mwiisalalyi yoo mbee ya Mwana yeto wa Nndu.”
42021037	Naasa, fyeeri fya nsanyiny kava mwiilosha efo mmba ya Iruva, na kyio kandelala kulya ifumbuny lya Miri ya mafura.
42021038	Na ironda llya lya vandu lyoose lyikava lyilavaa insheya ngama efo mmba ya Iruva lyishemwaaranya.
42022001	Naasa nkonu nniini ukafika isha ulya wa sukukuu ya mikate ilatiri ntarang'u yeto uvaangwaa ni Pasaka.
42022002	Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na veelosha mavavaso vakaruuya mwaanya wa iwaa Yesu, mashika veereiye mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu.
42022003	Naasa Satana kaanga Yuda ulya avaangwa Iskariote, nawe akee umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii.
42022004	Nalyo kawara shia kandefisha shila na vakohani valya vaniini na vashilyi veshilya vasoro va efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva karera nawo shaasa ashenrambikyaa efo maakony awo.
42022005	Nawo vakafura vakateeryana nawe vanniinge fesa.
42022006	Nawe kairikya karuuyany mwaanya weenrambikya efo maakony awo kirika.
42022007	Naasa nkonu ulya wa mikate ilatiri ntarang'o ukafika yeto usumani ishisha ngurana ya Pasaka.
42022008	Nalyo karuma Petro na Yohane kaamba, “Yendeny, mundeludeesya Pasaka lushe ilya.”
42022009	Nawo vakambia, “A kundo kwakunda lundeideesya ni kwi, mbee?”
42022010	Nawe kavavia, “Llen-te, mukammaanga efo muriny, mwishekwaananyaa na nndu arie nungu ya mura, mmbwe mushellatyaa mufike nawe efo mmba kundo ashangaa.
42022011	Naasa muvieny yeto muni kyeny, Llosha akunndye ando a ishelyiiya Pasaka ando amwi na vakiloshyony vakwe.
42022012	Nalyo nndu yeto ashemwooraa kirya kiniini kya mmba ya uuwe kyikee kideesye, nng'u mushedeesyaa kilaayo yekyo.”
42022013	Naasa vakeenda vakavekooya indo-da shaasa avavia. Vakandedeesya-fo Pasaka.
42022014	Nalyo elyi kyeeri kyamfika kashekaa-fo rembo ilya shoonga na vakiloshyony vakwe.
42022015	Kavavia, “Sheetirwa mmasha deny shilye shoonga yei ya Pasaka neeni kulaore shammeenda indeliswa ukiva.
42022016	Mmbo shamuvia, ‘Nshisheilyaa-se-fo, na kutani yainutyo efo umanginy lwa Iruva.’ “
42022017	Nalyo kaipoo kikombe kaana Iruva kaamba, “Nngeny ekyi niny-fo moose.
42022018	Mashika shamuvia, kipookya ulaalu nshishekyinaa-se kya kimu ekyo kya nsabibu-fo kutani umangyi lwa Iruva lwasha.”
42022019	Nalyo kaipoo nkate kaana Iruva, kaufisha-fisha fyenga, kavaniingya kaamba, “Ekyi ni mwiili akwa [nato wiifo urambikyoo-u kimaruma kyany. Neeni kevetaniny indo kya ishikummbwa.”
42022020	Na upata lulya lweeniwaa elyi numa ya Kilaayo kilya, kavetana nalo indo-da, kaamba, “Upata yelu ni nkundanu mwiiya wavikwa na samu yakwa, nayo iifo ishiiritwaa kimaruma kyany.]
42022021	Indi loleny-te woko lwa yeto asheshiriingyaa mmbo lukee yaa meseny ando amwi neeny.
42022022	Kya Mwana yeto wa nndu mmbo ashendaa shia yakwe shaasa kikee kirummbwe indi oshiny lwa nndu eto ashendiingyaa!”
42022023	Nawo vakapooka ikuvesa wo veni na veni kya nndu wa efo kwawo ashetanaa indo mmbi?
42022024	Naasa kikava mmbo vallya ulai efo nnang'ani yaawo kya nndu akee nniini waawo.
42022025	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Vamangyi va vandu va masanga mmbo vavaafinyi, na yewo vavaitorye vakavaangwa, vambuya va uruka.
42022026	Indi kyany yeni nta kilave indo-fo! Kya indi yeto akee nniini wa vengyi kunu nnang'ani yaany naaluke nave n-du wa vengyi. Neeto eefo asongoye vengyi naaluke mwiifurukannya vengyi.
42022027	Mashika nniini wa vengyi ni ungau? Ndesa ni yeto akaa rembo keengyo shoonga ao ni yeto eefo amfurukanyaa-u? Nshi yeto akaa rembo keengyo shoonga? Kyasia, na yeny-da shavekaa kunu nnang'ani yaany shava mwiifurukannya vengyi.”
42022028	“Kya indi yeni mmbo yewo musisirye-u ando amwi neeny efo fyeesyony fyakwa.
42022029	Neeny shamuterevyany ding'u ya umangyi shaasa Nde aleshiterevya yeny,
42022030	neeni muvekooya ikaa efo umanginy lwakwa musasangyi neeny mwilyaa na ina efo meseny akwa. Nalyo mushekaa-fo rembo efo fitiminy fya umangyi mushilye ngyufyari yeto ikumi na ivii ta Israeli.”
42022031	“Yewe Simion, Simion-ro! Ekakato Satana akemuruuya kyuumu nakooye imweela sha nganu.
42022032	Kyaindi yeny mmbo shilekuterevya kwa Iruva naambo kyikusiryo kyafo kilasheangwa. Neewe elyi numa kwakooya kwashiwuiya-se kuvangise vanavamau.”
42022033	Nawe kammbia, “Nndumi shikee neewe mmbo nshidimaa naakwa ni inderawa kyifingyony naakwa ni indewaawa.”
42022034	Nawe kaamba, “Petro shakuvia, oro ya nguku, nnyishereraa kulaore kwanshikana kararu kwaambe nkushiishi-fo.”
42022035	Nalyo kavavia, “Llya shilemuruma mularie nta mboloko nta nkusha, nta fyaaru, a ndesa kwiiyo kindo muletura?” Nawo vakammbia, “Nta kyimwi-fo!”
42022036	“Kya indi ulaalu yeto akooyaa atiri mboloko neende arie, na yeto wa nkusha naa-kiwo-da. Na yeto akoyaa nalatiri nandekumba soori yakwe ya yeerya nandekuurya usu.
42022037	Mmbo shamuvia, ekyo kyikee kireiye mmbo kyanrumbuwa kyindeinukya yaa kwakwa, kyeamba, ‘Nawe mmbo aleekenwa ando amwi na varavi.’ Mashika ekyo kikee kirummbwe kyakwa mmbo kiifo kimarisyony.”
42022038	Naasa vakaamba, “Nndumi akakati ngyusu ivii tikee yaa.” Nawe kavavia, “Kifye.”
42022039	Nalyo kakwipoo-fo kaenda kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura shaasa eeshivye. Na valya vakiloshyony vakallatya.
42022040	Naasa eekyifika ando alya kavavia, “Ketereveny Iruva mulasheanga kyeesyony!”
42022041	Nalyo kooka yoo vakai, kafika sha ando a yeera iwe. Kafiirya ndi kapooka itereva,
42022042	kaamba, “Woi Nde kwakunda, ita upata yelo mbai lushiiyami. Indi kilaende shaasa shikundye yeny-fo.” [
42022043	Naasa nsu wa Iruva kasha ikoora nawe auka efo iruveeu kammbika finya.
42022044	Nalyo kava asavaany kapooka itereva kanangisa. Kasina nrike ukava sha marony a samu wishoshokya-si.]
42022045	Nalyo kakwipoo yoo kiterevyony kasha na alya vakiloshyony vakai, kakooya valele rony kimaruma kya fyoova fivatiri.
42022046	Nawe kavavia, “Naambo-kyi mulele rony? Kwipoon-te mutereve Iruva mulakooye yaanga fyeesyony!”
42022047	Eefo areraa indo akakau mamwiingyi wa vandu vansha nang'u. Na nndu avasongoye ni ulya avaangwa ni Yuda, akee wa valya ikumi na vavii, kasha na yoo kufii na Yesu kammiminda fyoomu.
42022048	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Yuda mmbo kwariingya Mwana yeto wa nndu na kimimindo?”
42022049	Naasa valya varyani nawe elyi valolya kishendaa indo vakaamba, “Nndumi a lukavamanya na ngyusu?”
42022050	Nalyo umwi wa efo nnang'ani yaawo kamanya kishinga kya nkohani nniini kammaswa kurwi ka woko usha.
42022051	Naasa Yesu karouwa kaamba, “Kureeyeny kimande yoo!” Nalyo kapaana kuri kalya kanshiisa.
42022052	Na Yesu kavia vakohani valya vaniini vansheya na vashilyi veshilya vasoro va efo poo ya mmba ya Iruva na masiingo alya a vandu, “Mmbo mwakwiipoo mukasha murie ngyusu na mbiiri sheelyi shikee mwaalashia?
42022053	A tepa shilesinda neeni mikonu simu efo mmba ya Iruva nta mulashitire Indi ekyi nkyo kyeeri kyany na kya finya ta ireema.”
42022054	Naasa vakantira vakeenda vanrie vakamfita efo mmba kwa nkohani ulya nniini. Na Petro kalatya yoo numa ashengyaa kwaasha.
42022055	Nawo vakaata muro alya poo vakakaa rembo vakauringitya, nawe Petro kakaa-u rembo nawo.
42022056	Naasa nka kishinga wa efo poo kallollya Petro ekee rembo emikyoo mmuro, Kaamba, “Na yeu-da ni nndu eeryani na Yesu!”
42022057	Nawe kanlema-fushu kaamba, “Nshimwiishi-fo-te!”
42022058	Numa kyinnywa nndu ungyi kallola kaamba, “Na yewe-da kukee umwi waawo!” Naasa Petro kaamba, “Ode nndu, nshiwe yeny-fo!”
42022059	Naasa kukaira kyeeri kyaangu, nndu ungyi kavika ukaari kaamba, “Ni dede, na yeu-da akee nndu eeryani na Yesu. Mashika nawe ni nndu wa Galilaya.”
42022060	Naasa Petro kaamba, “Nshiishi ekyo kwaamba-fo nndu!” Nalyo yeni eefo areraa indo oro ya nguku ikakapa.
42022061	Naasa Nndumi kainduka kalola Petro. Nalyo Petro kakummbwa kirero kya Nndumi kilya alemmbia, “Oro ya nguku nyishekapaa inu kulaore kwanshikana kararu-fo!” "
42022062	Nalyo kasomuka na mbengyeny kaiya kavavyo nnu nriminy.
42022063	Nalyo vasoro valya vannrie vakantatala vakankapa na mbiiri.
42022064	Nalyo vakansikya kisangu vakammbesa vakaamba, " “Kyeamba yeto akukapa mmbi?” "
42022065	Vakarera na marero engyi meengyi emwaarara.
42022066	Naasa elyi kwankya masiingo alya a vandu akashekuumbya-fo na vakohani vaniini na vaarya va fitabu, Vakanrwaa efo ikwaanuny lya vaniini.
42022067	Vakaambaya-u, " “Kwakooya yewe mmbwe Kristo luvieny!” Nawe kavavia, “Kwakooya shamuvia mmushiirikyaa-fo,
42022068	Lingyi-se kwakooya shamuvesa kindo mmusherouwaa-fo.
42022069	Indi kipookya ulaalu Mwana yeto wa nndu ashevaa mmbo akee rembo yoo woko usha lwa Iruva yeto Mwaafinya.”
42022070	Naasa vakaamba woose, “A yewe mmbo kukee mwana wa Iruva-ny?” Na Yesu kavavia, “Ni yeni mwakyaamba, yeny mmbwe.”
42022071	Naasa vakaamba, “Naambo-kyi-se lwakaa lwiruyaa ukureeki lungyi? Mmbo lweeta luveni kyuuka kaniny kakwe.”
42023001	Nalyo vakakwiipoo nseemu ulya wawo moose vakanrwaa kwa Pilato.
42023002	Naasa vakapooka inkumba vakaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbo lwankooya asheevetaa vandu va uruka lweru kavaima valaute kodi ya Kaisari, kaamba we muni mmbwe Kristo akee mangyi.”
42023003	Naasa Pilato kawesa Yesu, “A yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda ndesa?” Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Ni yewe kwakyaamba.”
42023004	Naasa Pilato kavia vakohani valya vaniini na nsemu ulya wa vandu, “Yeny nshilollye kindo kya uvingo kwa nndu yeu-fo.”
42023005	Nawo vakaitika vakaamba, “Mmbo ayaa vandu va uruka eeloshaa kakwaanisa kunu Yudaya koose apookya kulya Galilaya katana afika kunu.”
42023006	Naasa Pilato ekyiita indo kavesa kwakooya akee wa kulya Galilaya.
42023007	Ammanya nisha mmbwa efo ushilyiny lwa Herode, naasa kanrika kulya kwa Herode, nawe asheye na kulya Yerusalemu fyeeri filya-da.
42023008	Naasa llya Herode alelollya Yesu kafura kyuumu, kimmba eelangye illolya uka fyeeri fyaasha mashika elyi emmiita mbony takwe. Herode mmbo evikye nsia mmbo ashorwaa wende luuka kwa Yesu.
42023009	Naasa kammbesa mbony shiingyi, lyo we nalarouwe nta kindo. "
42023010	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vasasangyi na veelosha mavavaso vakasha isalala-fo, vakeengera inkumba.
42023011	Naasa Herode kamwiinyala ando amwi na vasikari vakwe vakantatala, vakavembika soori shisha, vakambiira-se kwa Pilato.
42023012	Naasa Herode katira mbuya na Pilato nkonu ulya mweni, mashika elyo mbee vesuvani.
42023013	Naasa Pilato kavaanga vakohani valya vaniini na vandu va nrwe na vandu va uruka vashekuummbya ando amwi,
42023014	Kavavia, " “Mmbo mulesheengye nndu yeu mukaamba mmbo akeeveta vandu. Neeny shammeembesa kya mwaandu wakwe mwiitye, llyo shilaoni kindo kya uvingo kya efyo mwankumba nafyo kyikee kwakwe.
42023015	Naakwa ni Herode, nawe nta-fo, llyoony kammbiira na kweru. Nawe akakau nkwiifo kindo kisumani na ufu kyikee kitani mmbwe-fo.
42023016	Naasany, shinkapaany nakweengye.” [
42023017	Nalyo kyikee miishivye yakwe navaporomuye nndu umwi wo kyeeri kya sukukuu.]
42023018	“Naasa vakaongora ando amwi nseemu ulya moose, utau nndu yeu nalakilolyo-fo, kuluporomuye Baraba!”
42023019	Nawe Baraba ni nndu emmeenda yeerwa kifingyony kimaruma kya uriingyi lweefo kulya muriny na vandu vakawaawa.
42023020	Naasa Pilato karera nawo lya kavii ni elyi eekundye ilekeya Yesu.
42023021	Nawo vakakapa ngaya vakaamba, “Nkapye nsalabeny.”
42023022	Naasa kavavia lya kararu, “A kindo kya ukasha nndu yeu aletana nkyokyi? Yeny nshilollye kindo kya uvingo kisumani na ufu kyikee efo kwakwe-fo. Naasany nshenkapaany shillekeye.”
42023023	Nawo vakaitikya vekapaa kisengelele vakundye nandekapyo nsalabeny! Ngyunyanga tawo tikalyimba.
42023024	Nalyo Pilato karumbwa kindetanwa ekyo vakunndye.
42023025	Nalyo kalekeya nndu ulya aleerwa kifingyony kimaruma kya yaanta uriingyi na iwaa, na Yesu kavaniingya vantannyi shaasa vakundye.
42023026	Naasa elyi veefo vasheendaa vanrie vakatira Simon wa Krene asha auka ireminy. Vakanrika nsalaba nashe yoo numa ya Yesu aurie.
42023027	Naasa vandu va uruka vakallatya nseemu mwiingyi na vaka vekukapa-kapaa mbafu na imwiiya.
42023028	Naasa Yesu kavaindukya kaamba, “Nyira vaka va Yerusalemu mulashiiye yeny-fo! Iiyeny kyany muveni na kya vana vany!”
42023029	Llen-te kwikaa kushe fyeeri elyi vandu vashambaa, “Ngoma vaka fyuumba na misanga ilandeire wana na mavee alandeote.
42023030	Llyo meendi vashepokaa ivia mafumbu, Luwoyeny! Na yeni fidooro lusikyeny!
42023031	Mashika kwakooya vatanya nri yeto nshu indo a kya yeto muumu kisheendaa inda?”
42023032	Naasa kweeifo na vasoro vavii vetana uravi veeriwa ando amwi nawe vandewaawa.
42023033	Nalyo vakafika ando avangwaa ni Kisharongony. Nafo vakankapya-fo nsalabeny vakansanda na valya vetana makasha. Ulya umwi kavikwa kwa yoo woko lwakwe usha na ungyi yoo woko umuso.
42023034	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Woi Nde vafwaaye kimmba valeeshi ekyo vatana.” Naasa vakaavana na soori takwe veetikapyaa kura.
42023035	Na vandu va uruka vasalali-fo velolaa. Na vandu valya va nrwe vakanteenda vakaamba, “Elyi nndu yeto alekira vengyi nalakukire we muni, kwakooya mmbwe Kristo nsauwe wa Iruva!”
42023036	Naasa na vasikari valya vaiyo vakafika yoo kufii vakantatala, Vakanserisya mfinyo utarang'aa.
42023037	Nalyo vakaamba, “Kwakooya yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda, Kukireeny kumuni-te!”
42023038	Naasa na ipoo lyiifo lyikee ivike yoo uuwe ya nrwe wakwe lyikee ireiye, “Yeu mmbwe mangyi ya Vayuda.”
42023039	Na valya veetana makasha valya vavambyo ando amwi nawe, ulya umwi kavemwaarara, “A yewe nshi Kristo? Naasany, kukyire kumuni kulusande-u neese.”
42023040	Indi ulya ungyi karouwa kikee kya insakira kammbia, “A mmbo kulaireiye nta Iruva! Neewe kwaveva nndu kwaona uvingo yelo-da.
42023041	Kyeru yese mmbo lwatannywa kisumani. Mashika kindo lwatawa ni ekyo kyikwaani na efo mitannyi yeeru. Indi yeu nnyatiri kindo atannyi kikasha-fo.”
42023042	Nalyo kaamba, “Woi Yesu shikummbwa elyi kwafika isha kukee na umangyi lwafo!”
42023043	Nawe kammbia, “Nkya dede shakuvia, ni inu-da kukooyaa kukee neeny efo Paradiso.”
42023044	Nalyo kumfika kyeeri kya saa irindaru uruka loose lukawoyo ni ireema kukafika saa kyeenda.
42023045	Na nkyeere ukareta sa ya vayo. Naasa isullya llya iniini lyaavanisye efo mmba ya Iruva lyikavambuka rany nnang'ani kavii.
42023046	Nalyo Yesu kaonisa unyanga waasha kaamba, “Woi Nde ni efo maakony afo shakurambikyaany nrima wakwa.” Ammaa yaamba indo kakumba muu.
42023047	Naasa nshilyi ulya wa vasikari iyana elyi allolya kiutika indo kaarafuma Iruva kaamba, “Ni kya dede nndu yeu ekee wa usumanu!”
42023048	Na vandu vakuumbye-fo nkuka vasheye nafo ishelola ekyo, nawo-da elyi vallolya kilya kyautika, vakawuya na kyeny vekukapa-kapaa mbafu.
42023049	Naasa kusalalye-fo na valya vaitani nawe woose sanda na vaka valya vavandami nawe vauka kulya Galilaya, nawo woose veefo-da velolaa efyo.
42023050	Nalyo akakau nndu nndumi ansha nafo avangwaa ni Yosefu, akee nndu nsongoru ni ntele kaveva wa usumanu.
42023051	Nawe shila ilya yaawo varummbwa nyeerikye kasanga nawo-fo. Na kundo aukye ni kulya Arimataya ukee muri wa Vayuda, nawe ni nndu avereye umangyi lwa Iruva.
42023052	Naasa nndu yeu kaengya Pilato kantereva mwiili ulya wa Yesu.
42023053	Kawoolota kawoososya sooriny sha pyai. Kandewaara kundo kwa mbangeny kukee kudoshe iweny kulandearwa nta nndu.
42023054	Na nkonu ulya ni nkonu wekudeesya na nkonu wa Sabato wiifo upokaany.
42023055	Naasa na vaka valya valesha varyani nawe vauka kulya Galilaya nawo vakasora yoo numa. Vakalolya mbanga ilya na nnying'a wakwe shaasa usharwaa.
42023056	Naasa vakawuya na kyeny. Vakandedeesya miri ifwamaa na mafura eyaamba. Na nkonu ulya wa Sabato mweni vakaimuya shaasa kyikee kivavasye.
42024001	Naasa nkonu ulya wepooka mfungare vakeenda alya mbangeny na ivishivishi lya ngama varie miri ilya ifwaamaa.
42024002	Naasa vakakooya iwe llya lyikee ikunnye mbai lyammbutwa yoo mbangeny.
42024003	Naasa vakaanga nafo valalollye-fo nnying'a ulya wa Nndumi Yesu.

42024005	Naasa vakatirwa mmbwerei vakafiikya fisangu si. Nawo vakavavia, “Yeu akee na muu nkyikyi elyi mwanduuya yaa ando a vafu?”
42024006	Nnyakyikee-se yaa-fo, mmbo annduka! Kummbweny kilya alemuvia kulya Galilaya,

42024008	Nalyo vakakummbwa marero alya akwe.
42024009	Nalyo vakawuya na kyeny vauka alya mbangeny. Vakandeongoya valya ikumi na umwi na valya vengyi mbony tilya toose.
42024010	Naasa kwiifo Maria wa kulya Magdala, na Yoana, na Maria we maye wa Yakobo, na valya vengyi veryani nawo, mmbo valendevia vakiloshyony vakwe mbony tilya,
42024011	nawo marero alya akavaviiya ni a urung'ani nta valaveerikye. [
42024012	Naasa Petro kakwiipoo keenda kulya mbangeny eerishaa, keemaiya-fo kalollya firami filya fyeni fyeerika, kawuya eetirwa ntamba kya kilya kyatanyika.]
42024013	Nalyo akakava vandu vavii va efo nnang'ani yaawo na nkonu ulya mweni veefo vasheenda kundo kwa muriny nafo kwauka kulya Yerusalemu kusheendaa ando a saa ivii kufike-fo, na irina lya vayo ni Emau.
42024014	Nawo vakava vareraany kya mbony tilya tiletanyika toose.
42024015	Naasa, veefo vekapaa indo sumu na yuumburana, nalyo Yesu muni kasha nang'u, keenda aryani nawo.
42024016	Na miso awo akasikywa nta valamanyi mmbwe.
42024017	Nawe kavavia, “A ni marero eekyi mwavesana indo elyi mwiifo mushendaa?” Vakairisha vekushye fisangu fyawo.
42024018	Na ulya umwi avangwaa irina lyakwe ni Kleopa kaalwa kambia, “A nnyewe kumuni kusheye na kunu Yerusalemu kukee muny, kwara kulamanya mbony yeto tiletanyika mikonu yei myaangu?”
42024019	Nawe kavavia, “A mbony yeekyi?” Vakammbia, “Ni ta Yesu wa kulya Nasareti-te ekee nndu mwauya fisuku kaveva mwiidimi itana findo finiini, fyeetana na fyeerera kikalollyo ni Iruva na vandu woose va kunu urukeny.
42024020	Na vakohani veru vaniini vakasanga na vandu veru va nrwe vakanrambikya-fo nandeutyo uvingo lweewaawa. Vakankapya nsalabeny.
42024021	Neese mmbo lweembikye nsia lukaamba, we mmbwe yeto eekaa nawouwe vandu va Israeli. Na findo efyo firyani indo nkonu wa inu mmbwa kararu uka fyantanyika indo.
42024022	Na kingyi-se ni vaka va kunu kweru vaangu valelwaawuta muu. Mmbo valefika kulya mbangeny elyi ngama nraasi.
42024023	Nta valakooye-fo mwiili wa Yesu. Vakasha veshambaa ni vasu va Iruva vavakooya-fo vekooraa nawo paa, vakaamba, ‘Eefo na muu.’
42024024	Na vandu va kweru maata vakandesaiya alya mmbangeny vakakooya ni indo kyikai shaasa vaka valya vaamba, indi we muni mmballolya-fo.”
42024025	Nawe kavavia, “Apaa vandu murung'ani, muvetiri na ngoo tikee shiroo ikusirya na filya fikee firere ni valya veawuya fisuku fyoose.
42024026	A nshi indo kivekee kirummbwe Kristo nasonngwe indeliswa ukyiva yelo loose, navekwiiryany neefo usuriny lwakwe?”
42024027	Nawe kapookya Mose na valya veawuya fisuku woose kavatambashuya mbony tikee shirere kyakwe ta efo mareiyony moose.
42024028	Naasa vakaparikya kulya muriny kundo veshendaa. Nawe kakwaalwa sheelyi akundye yeenda na mbee.
42024029	Vakamwiikyima vakaamba, “Kaa kweru mmbee, mashika kwiifo kushilaa.” Nawe kaanga neefo mmba kakaa nawo.
42024030	Naasa kyikava elyi akee nawo rembo vashelyaa shonga, nawe keepoo nkate kaana Iruva, kaufisha-fisha fyenga kavaavya.
42024031	Nalyo miso awo akaambuka vakamanya mmbwe. Veru, kavaverukya valakillolye-se.
42024032	Vakaumburana wo veni na veni vakaamba, “Ate ngoo teru nteekeyaaka-aka kunu nnang'ani yeeru elyi eefo eereraa neese efo shia elutambashuyaa mbony tilya tikee shireiye?”
42024033	Vakakwiipoo saa ilya sheni vakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu. Vakakooya valya ikumi na umwi, vakuumbye ando amwi, na valya vavandami nawo.
42024034	Vakakooya veshambaa, “Nkya dede Nndumi annduka kakoora na Simion!”
42024035	Nawo llyo valevaongoya mbony tilya ta efo shia na shaasa wo vammanya elyi afisha-fisha nkate ulya.
42024036	Naasa veefo vereraa indo we muni kashesalala yoo nnang'ani yaawo. Kavavia, “Kaeny na ufoo!”
42024037	Nawo vakamatuka vakatirwa mmbwerei, veeshi ni kirishe kya nndu mfu valolya.
42024038	Nalyo kavavia, “A kimaruma mukasavaa indo nkyokyi? Mukavetirwa mmakusaro a nyinyira naambo-kyi?”
42024039	Keloleny maako akwa na marende akwa mumanyi mmbwe yeny! Muveshilola mashika kirishe kya nndu mfu nkitiri mwiili nta mafua shaasa mushilollye yeny-fo.
42024040	Ekyaamba indo kawoora maako akwe na marende akwe.
42024041	Kakooya valandeedima iirikya deny kimaruma kya nsia uvatiri sanda na isongololo. Kavavia, “A ndesa mutiri kindo kyeelya yaa?”
42024042	Nalyo vakaniingya kiparwe kya ikunga yookye.
42024043	Kawarya kalya velollye.
42024044	Naasa kavavia, “Marero alya akwa shilemuvia llya shekee neeni ng'u yaa. Mmbo kyikee kirummbwe kundeinutyo mbony tilya toose tikee shireiye efo uvavasony lwa Mose na Vakisuku na Saburi.”
42024045	Nalyo kapooka ivasukuya kya mareiyo.
42024046	Kavavia, “Ni indo-da kyikee kireiye Kristo nandelyiswa ukiva na iruka narukeny auka kwa vafu elyi lya nkonu wa kararu.”
42024047	Nalyo kundekapwa weele kyikee kya irina lyakwe efo kwa vandu va masanga woose vaalashike efo nriminy vakooye ifwaaywa ulyamari lwawo, kipookya kunu Yerusalemu.
42024048	Neeni mukavaany mmbo vakureekyi va mbony eti toose.
42024049	Neeny shimurummyaa ekyo kyiledeeryo kyaasa ni Nde kishemoolokyaa kimukaye. Indi yeni kaeny kunu Yerusalemu kutani mwaningwa finya yuuka efo uwe.
42024050	Naasa kavauta kulya muriny kavafita kulya shia ya yeenda na Betania. Kaipoo maako akwe kavavikya mbora.
42024051	Kyikava elyi eefo avavikyaa mbora kavauka karoswa na efo iruveeu.
42024052	Nawo vakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu vatirwa ni nsia mwiingyi.
42024053	Vakava vesindaa efo mmba ya Iruva kyeeri kyoose veshaarafumaa Iruva.
43001001	Elyo mapookyony llyo Irero eefo. Nawe Irero ekee na Iruva. Nawe Irero ekee Iruva.
43001002	Mmbwe ekee na Iruva elyo mapookyony.
43001003	Findo fyoose fiifo mmbo filetanwa mmbwe. Nawe kulaore aiyo nkuletanwa kindo nta kimwi kya efyo fikee fitani-fo.
43001004	Nawe efo nnang'ani yakwe mfo muu weekai. Nato muu yeto ukava ni sa yeevaiya vandu.
43001005	Nayo sa yeyo iifo ivaa efo ireeminy. Na ireema nta lyilaiwarye.
43001006	Kweefo nndu alerumwa ni Iruva, na irina lyakwe ni Yohane.
43001007	Mmbwe alesha kikee kya ukureeki, navikye sa yeyo ukureeki, naambo vandu woose vakooye ikusirya-u kyeendwa mmbwe.
43001008	We muni nshiwe sa-fo, mmbo alesha navikye sa yeyo ukureeki.
43001009	Sa yeyo ya dede yeyo imikyaa wo nndu, yo yeefo yeeshaa na kunu ulaniny.
43001010	Mmbo alekaa kunu ulaniny, na ulana yelu mmbo luletanwa kyeendwa mmbwe, na ulana yelo nta lulammanyi.
43001011	Mmbo alesha na efo kukee kwakwe muni, na yewo va efo kwakwe nta valammbwarye.
43001012	Indi yewo vammeembwarya woose kavaniingya ulyimbi lwa yaaluka vana va Iruva, mmbo yewo vakusirye na irina lyakwe.
43001013	Mmbo yewo valeirwa kilauka na samu nta kikundyony kya mwiili wa nndu, nta kikundyony kya nndu-fo, mmbo vairwa kyuuka na Iruva.
43001014	Nawe Irero kaaluka nndu kakaa kunu kweru, araiye ikiiya vandu na iva wa dede. Neese lukalollya itumbe lyakwe. Nalyo lyikava ni itumbe lya Mwana wa Ngitany auka kwa Nde arye isarya iingyi na dede.
43001015	Mmbwe Yohane alemmbikya ukureeki kakapa weele kaamba, “Yeto mmbwe ulya shilemwaamba indi: Ni nndu ashaa yoo numa yakwa nawe ekee mbee yakwa kimmba ni nndu eshisongoye. "
43001016	Na elyi atiri fiingyi fikaingiki yese lukava velyimmywa, simbo ikasorywa ni simbo.
43001017	Mashika mavavaso nng'u vandu valeniinngywa aendwa ni Mose. Indi ikiiywa ni Iruva na immanya mmbwa dede efyo fikasha fyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo.
43001018	Nkwiifo nndu alellollya Iruva-fo. Ni Mwana yeto wa Ngitany, yeto akee ng'undeny ta Nde, mmbwe yeto aleloora Nde.”
43001019	Na elu llo ukureeki lwa Yohane, llya meendi Vayuda valeruma vandu vakohani na Valevi vauka kulya Yerusalemu vandemmbesa, " “A yewe ni yewe vi?”
43001020	Nawe kaamba paa, nta nalakani, kaamba paa, Yeny nshi we Kristo-fo.
43001021	Vakammbesa, “Kwakooya kulaore ni indo, a ndesa ni yewe Elia?” Nawe kaamba, “Yeny nshi we-fo.” “A yewe ni ulya mwaauya fisuku?” Nawe kaalwa, “Ode.”
43001022	Naasa vakammbia, “A yewe ni yewe viiny? Mmbo lukunndye luwoni kyeenda yaallwa valya valeluruma. A yewe kumuni mmbo kwaambaye inda kyafo?”
43001023	Nawe kaamba, “Yeny ni unyanga lwa nndu shakapa weele kundo kwa kasa shaamba, ‘Oroteny shia ya Nndumi, shaasa mwaauya fisuku ulya Yesaya aambaye.’ “
43001024	Na valya vakee varumi mmba efo kwa Vafarisayo.
43001025	Vakammbesa, “A nkikyi elyi kwava mwiibatisa vandu kwakooya kulaore kukee Kristo; nta Elia, nta umwi wa Veawuya fisuku?”
43001026	Yohane kaallwa kaamba, “Yeny ni mura shabatisa nato. Indi kwiifo mulamwiishi nawe ni efo nnang'ani yaany akai.
43001027	We mmbwe asheshaa yoo numa yakwa, na yeny nshimaa shiporomwi nta ngova ta fyaaru fyakwe-fo.” "
43001028	Na kundo mbony eti tileutikya ni kulya Betania kwakulya ya Yordani kundo Yohane eebatisyaa.
43001029	Na elyi lya ndesi kalollya Yesu eensheyaa kaamba, " “Akakai Ngurana ya Iruva ishiipoo ulyamari lwa ulana.
43001030	Yeu mmbwe yeto shilerera kyakwe shaamba, Yoo numa yakwa kwiifo kwiishaa nndu nawe ankooya ishiirya mbee kimmba ni nndu eeshisongoye.
43001031	Neeny nnshemwiishi-fo. Indi we naambo namanyike paa efo kwa vandu va Israeli, nkyo kindo shilesheya shibatise na mura.”
43001032	Na Yohane kavika ukureeki kaamba, “Mmbo shilollye Mumuyo wa Iruva eeshemoolokyaa akee sha mbeta auka efo iruveeu kasha inkaya.
43001033	Neeny nshemwiishi nta-fo. Indi yeto aleshiruma shishebatisa na mura mmbwe aleshivia, ‘Yeto kwallollya Mumuyo wa Iruva ashemoolokyaa nashe inkaya mmbwe yeto mwiibatisa na Mumuyo Mweele.’
43001034	Neeny shammellollya, shavikany ukureeki lwakwa shaamba, yeu mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva.”
43001035	Naasa elyi lya ndesi Yohane asalalyi-fo lyingyi aryani na vakiloshyony vakwe vavii.
43001036	Kavikya Yesu miso elyi eefo ashiraa-u kaamba, “Akakayo Ngurana ya Iruva.”
43001037	Naasa valya vakiloshyony valya vavii vamiita eeshaambaa indo vakandelatya Yesu.
43001038	Yesu kainduka kavalola elyi vallatya kavavia, “Ekyo mwasia nkyoki?” Nawo vakammbia, “Rabi! Nakyo kwaallwa ni kimwi na llosha. A nkwi kukaa?”
43001039	Kavavia, “Kusheyeny, mulole.” Naasa vakeenda vakalolya ando yoo akaa. Vakasinda nawe nkonu ulya piti. Nalyo kyeeri kya saa ikumi kyemfika.
43001040	Andrea we mwanamaye wa Simion Petro ni umwi wa valya vavii valeita kilya kyaambawa ni Yohane vakallatya.
43001041	Nawe kapooka ilollya mwanamaye muni, we Simion, kammbia, “Lwallollya Mesiya” nakyo kwaallwa ni kimwi na Kristo.
43001042	Kanrwaa kwa Yesu. Yesu kallola kaamba, “Yewe ni Simon kukee mwana wa Yohane. Mmbo kushevaangwaa ni Kefa.” " (Nakyo kwaallwa, ni iwe.)
43001043	Naasa elyi lya ndesi akunndye ikwiipoo nandefika kulya Galilaya, nalyo kalollya Filipo. Yesu kammbia, " “Shilatya.”
43001044	Na Filipo ni nndu wa kulya Betisaida, kulya muriny ulya wa Andrea na Petro.
43001045	Filipo kalollya Natanaeli kammbia, “Yeto Mose amwaambaye kanndeiya efo uvavasony na vakisuku vakavemwaamba na inndeiya, akakato lwammeellollya, mmbwe Yesu wa kulya Nasareti, we mwana wa Yosefu.”
43001046	Natanaeli kammbia, “A kulya Nasareti kushiidimaa yuuka-fo kindo kisha?” Filipo kammbia, “Oshony kulole!”
43001047	Naasa Yesu kalollya Natanaeli eefo ansheyaa, karera kyakwe kaamba, “Akakato nndu akee Mwiisraeli dede, nalalasye nta ntambo efo nriminy.”
43001048	Natanaeli kammbia, “A kwakooya inda ishimanya?” Yesu karouwa kammbia, “Kyeeri Filipo nalandekuvaanga kukee rembo alya sindeny ya nkuu ulya llyo shakulollya-te.”
43001049	Natanaeli kamwaallwa, “Rabi yewe mmbwe Mwana wa Iruva, yewe mmbwe mangyi ya Israeli.”
43001050	Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Elyi shakuvia mmbo shakulollya kukee rembo sindeny ya nkuu ulya nkyo kimaruma kwakusirya-u indo ndesa? Mmbo kukaa kulollye findo finiini ngeta efyo.”
43001051	Nalyo kammbia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, mmbo mushelollyaa efo iruveeu kurauka na Vasu va Iruva vasherwaa na yooloka vashekaya Mwana yeto wa nndu.”
43002001	Nalyo elyi lya nrondo kukaalyikwa walyi kulya Kana ya Galilaya. Na maye wa Yesu kasha nafo.
43002002	Na Yesu kavevaangwa-fo ando amwi na vakiloshyony kyakwe.
43002003	Naasa mfinyo ukafikya. Maye wa Yesu kammbia, “Mmbakitiri-se mfinyo-fo.”
43002004	Yesu kammbia, “Nkyiki kyeru lu vavii nka? Kyeeri kyakwa nkindefika-fo.”
43002005	Maye kavia vasero vefurukannya-fo, “Kindo amuvia na kikava-ki kevekitaniny tupu.”
43002006	Nafo kweiyo nungu irindaru ta mawe tikee shisimbite-u kisumani na mbuka ya Vayuda yeesamba. Nato wo imwi itiri sha lita iyana indi.
43002007	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Endeishureny nungu yeti mura!” Vakaishura shapu.
43002008	Kawuya kavavia, “Ulaalu raany-fo kinnywa mundekirwaaya nkara yeto wa shoonga.”
43002009	Naasa elyi nkara ulya wa shoonga afika ishosha mura ulya nato wammaluka mfinyo nalamanyi kundo wauka. Vandu vaishi ni valya venfurukanya-u valya varaa mura ulya. Kyasia nkara ulya wa shoonga kavaanga muni walyi.
43002010	Kammbia, “Wo nndu apooka yaava mfinnyo yeto nsha. Vandu vakammbuura llyo ashavaa-ny yeto mfwafwa. Ate yewe mmbo kwasuruma mfinyo yeto nsha fika ulaalu.”
43002011	Nkyo kindo kyeeora wende kya mbee Yesu aletana kulya Kana ya Galilaya, kaora usuri lwakwe paa na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakautau ikusirya nawe. "
43002012	Naasa kyeeri kilya kyaiduva kandesoka na kulya Kapernaumu we muni na maye na vanavamaye na vandu vakiloshyony kyakwe. Nafo vakakaa-fo mikonu myaangu.
43002013	Nalyo nkonu ulya nniini wa Vayuda, ulya wa Pasaka, ukee kufii Yesu kanderwa na kulya Yerusalemu."
43002014	Nafo efo mmba ya Iruva kakooya-fo valya veekumba ng'umbe na moonri na mbeta na valya vealasha fesa vakee-fo rembo.
43002015	Nawe kasongosia kyeelashwa aoka na fyoove. Kavaumbuta efo mmba ya Iruva ando amwi na moonri na ng'umbe tilya tawo. Na fesa ta valya vealasha katipusuya si, na ifullwa mesa tawo.
43002016	Kavia na valya veekumba mbeta, “Ipoony-fo findo efi muute yaa! Nta mulaallwe mmba ya Iruva ive mmba yekapya mbusha!”
43002017	Na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakakummbwa kilya kyikee kirere kyeyaamba, “Mmbo shavavyo nriminy kimaruma kya mmba yafo.”
43002018	Naasa Vayuda vakaallwa vakammbia, “A ni wende-ki kwiifo kulwoora elyi kwakara itana indo?”
43002019	Yesu karouwa kavavia, “Fisheny mmba yei ya Iruva, neeny shiiseleese lyingyi ando a mikonu iraru shimaa piny.”
43002020	Naasa Vayuda vakaamba, “A elyi kwammiira-u myaaka makumi aana na irindaru mmba yei ya Iruva ikatana yasia, na yewe kwiiseleese lyingyi ando a mikonu iraru kumaa?” "
43002021	Indi we mmbo alerera kya mwiili wakwe ukee mmba ya Iruva.
43002022	Naasa llya meendi aleruka auka kwa vafu llyo valya vakiloshyony vakwe valekummbwa kilya aleamba. Nalyo vakakooya ikusirya na efyo fikee fireiye na kirero kilya Yesu alevavia.
43002023	Naasa kyeeri kilya ekee kulya Yerusalemu nkonu ulya nniini wa Pasaka, veengyi vakapooka ikusirya na irina lyakwe valollye filya fya wende atana.
43002024	Indi Yesu we muni nalakunde ikoora kwawo, kimmba avaishi shore woose,
43002025	Nalatiri kisunundyo na nndu kyeemanya mbony ta vandu-fo, mashika we muni eeshi efyo fikee nnang'ani ya nndu. "
43003001	Nalyo kweefo nndu Mfarisayo eevangwaa Nikodemu akee nndu wa nrwe wa Vayuda.
43003002	Nawe kansheya elyi kio kammbia, “Llosha lwiishi mmbo kukee llosha kuukye kwa Iruva muni, mashika kulaiyo nndu ashiidimaa itana efyo fya wende kwatana yewe kwakooya kulaore Iruva akee nawe.”
43003003	Yesu kanndouwa kaamba, “Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, kwakooya kulaore nndu ammiirwa lya kavii, nnashewonaa umangi lwa Iruva-fo.”
43003004	Nikodemu kammbia, “A niinda nndu ashiirwaa akee mmiku? A ndesa ashiidimaa iwuya efo nsangeny wa maye naveiirwa lyingi?”
43003005	Yesu karouwa, “Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, kwakooya kulaore nndu amiirwa auka na mura na Mumuyo nnyashiidimaa yaanga efo umanginy lwa Iruva-fo.
43003006	Kindo kyamiirwa kyuuka na mwiili mmbo kyaveva mwiili tupu, na kindo kyamiirwa kyuuka na Mumuyo mmbo kyaveva kya ngata ya Mumuyo.”
43003007	Nta kulatambwa elyi shakuvia, Kuti mwiirwa lya kavii.
43003008	Uraato mmbo luvivitaa ando lwakukunndya, na unyanga lwa vayo kwavelwiita, kya indi kulaishi kundo lwauka nafo, nta kundo lusheendaa nafo. Naasa, na wo nndu amiirwa auka na Mumuyo akee indo-da.
43003009	Nikodemu karouwa kammbia, “A kindo ekyo kyautika inda?”
43003010	Yesu karouwa kammbia, “Yewe kukee llosha wa kunu Israeli nta kulaishi mbony yeto?”
43003011	Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, “Kindo lwammanya nkyo lwaamba-u paa, na kindo lwallollya nkyo lwakivikya ukureeki. Na ukureeki yelo lweru nta mulaluwarye.
43003012	Kwakooya kulaore mwairikya elyi shimuviaa fya urukeny, a ni inda mushiirikyaa shimuviaa fya iruveeu?
43003013	Nta nkwiiyo nndu alenrwa na efo iruveeu-fo, kulaore ni ulya aleoloka auka iruveeu, mmbwe Mwana yeto wa nndu.
43003014	Na shaasa Mose alerosa shoka ilya kulya kasa, na kya Mwana yeto wa Nndu mmbo kikee kirummbwe naveroswa indo-da,
43003015	na wo Nndu akusirye nawe nakooye iwarya muu wa llung'anu.”
43003016	Iruva mmbo eekunndye ulana karuma Mwana wakwe wa ngitany naambo wo nndu akusirye nawe nalakooye ireka kyeendi nawoni muu wa llung'anu.
43003017	Sha mashika kimaruma Iruva karuma mwana wakwe nashe na kunu ulaniny, nshi anruma nashe yuutya ulana yelu uvingo-fo. Nndu kalema ikusirya nawe, we ammaa iwona uvingo kimmba anra nalakusirya na irina lya mwana wa Iruva wa ngitany.
43003018	Nndu akusirye nawe nnasheonaa uvingo-fo. Nndu kalema ikusirya nawe, we ammaa iwona uvingo, kimmba anra nalakusirya na irina lya Mwana wa Iruva wa ngitany.
43003019	Na iwona uvingo lyikava indi, ni sa ilesha ulaniny, vandu vakakunda ireema ngota sa. Mashika filya vatanyi mmbo fyekee fikasha.
43003020	Mashika wo nndu atannyi fya uravi mmbo asuuye sa nta nnashaa na seny-fo, naambo filya atannyi filakooye iparwa paa.
43003021	Indi wo nndu atanyi fya dede mmbo asha na seny, naambo filya atannyi fimanyike paa, mmbo fyatanwa akutiri na Iruva.
43003022	Naasa Yesu kaenda kulya urukeny lwa Yudaya aryani na valya vakiloshony kyakwe. Kasinda-fo nawo. Kava mwiibatisa vandu.
43003023	Na Yohane nawe-da eefo eebatisaa vandu kulya Ainoni kufii na Salimu, kimmba kweefo mura mwiingi. Vandu vakasha nafo ishebatiswa.
43003024	Mashika Yohane nalandeerwa kifingyony-fo.
43003025	Nalyo kukakwiipoo ulai lwa vakiloshyony kya Yohane na nndu Myuda kimaruma kya mbony ta isamba.
43003026	Vakasha na kulya Yohane akai, vakammbia, “Ulya ekee neewe kulya kwa kulya ya Yordani ulya kulemmbikya ukureeki, akakato ee-fo abatisaa na vandu woose vakamweengya.”
43003027	Na Yohane kaallwa kaamba, “Nkwiifo nndu ashiidima itira kindo kulaore ankiniingwa kyuuka efo iruveeu-fo.
43003028	Neeni muveni mukavaany vakureeki mwiitye kilya shileamba, yeny nshiwe Kristo-fo, mmbo shikee nrumi shive nsongoru wakwe.
43003029	Yeto arie nka mwaalikwa mmbwe muni walyi. Indi mbuya yeyo ya muni walyi, yeto akee nawe mmbo afuraa ashiita unyanga lwakwe. Naasa nto nsia wakwa ushitiri, nato wamiishwa shapu.
43003030	We kuti neende ang'anaa neeny kuti sheende shiinnyaa.”
43003031	Yeto asheye auka uwe mmbwe akee uwe ya woose. Na yeto aparikye kunu ulaniny kaveva wa kunu ulana, kaverera fya kyuulana. Na yeto asheye auka efo iruveeu, mmbwe akee uwe ya woose.
43003032	Nawe mbony yeto alollye na itiita nto ativikya ukureeki, na ukureki lwakwe kulakae-fo nndu alwiirikya.
43003033	Yeto amiirikya ukureeki lwakwe mmbwe avikya Iruva ukureeki sheelyi mmbo akee wa dede.
43003034	Mashika yeto alerumwa ni Iruva mmbo areraa marero a Iruva. Mashika Iruva nnyaniingyaa Mumuyo esheesyaa-fo.
43003035	Nawe Nde mmbo akunndye Mwana, nawe mmbo anrambikye findo fyoose efo maakony akwe.
43003036	Na nndu akusirye na Mwana yeto, mmbwe awarya muu wa llung'anu. Na nndu anra nalairikya mwana yeto nnyasheonaa muu-fo, we ni unyafi lwa Iruva lunkaye.
43004001	Naasa Yesu eekimanya Vafarisayo vamiita we mmbwe akee iwonisa vakiloshyony veengyi na ibatisa vandu veengyi ngota Yohane.
43004002	(Kya indi lyo Yesu we muni nnyalebatisa vandu-fo, ni valya vakiloshony kyakwe).
43004003	Kooka kulya Yudaya kawara shia kaenda lyingyi kulya Galilaya.
43004004	Naasa kalollya kuti naire shia yeerummbwa kulya Samaria.
43004005	Naasa kafika muriny umwi wa kulya Samaria uvaangwaa ni Sikari ukee kufii na irema llya Yakobo aleniinga mwana ulya wakwe Yosefu.
43004006	Nafo kweifo usoka llwa lwa Yakobo. Naasa Yesu kakooya amaariswa nkyaaro kakaa-u rembo indo yoo usokeny, kyeeri mwi usimbiki.
43004007	Kukasha nafo nndu nka wa Kisamaria isheraa mura. Yesu kammbia, “Shirita mura shini.”
43004008	Mashika valya vakiloshyony kyakwe veengye kulya murin vanderuuya-fo shoonga.
43004009	Nka ulya wa Kisamaria kammbia, “Kyavaany inda yewe nndu wa Kiyuda kwashitereva mura neeny shikee nka wa Kisamaria? Nyeeli Vayuda kulaore veshiidikiranaa na Vasamaria.”
43004010	Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Kwee kweeshi simbo ya Iruva iifo, na nndu yeto akuvia, shirita mura shini, kukooye kweemwiishi mmbo kweenterevaa nawe eekuniingaa mura utiri muu.”
43004011	Nka ulya kammbia, “Nndumi, a elyi kulatiri nta kindo kyeeraa mura na kirori eki kya mura kyoolokye si, nkwi kwauta mura yeto utiri muu?
43004012	A mmbo kukee nniini kwairya nde ulya weeru Yakobo, yeto aleluniinga kirori eki kya mura? Nawe nng'u aleva mwiina mura we muni na vana vakwe na findo fyakwe amasye.”
43004013	Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Wo nndu ana mura yeu mmbo awuyaa yaakuka-se.
43004014	Indi nndu kana mura yeto shinningaa yeny nnyakyaakukaa-se-fo na kafika llung'anu. Indi mura yeto nshenniinga efo nnang'ani yakwe mmbo ushaalukaa usoka lwa mura wiishwe muu wa llung'anu.”
43004015	Nka ulya kammbia, “Woi Nndumi shiniingaany mura yeto, shilakooye itirwa nnyura nta ikwaarisa isha iraa mura kunu.”
43004016	Nawe kammbia, “Endevaanga mmi wafo kuwuye na yaa!”
43004017	Nka ulya kaallwa kaambia, “Nshitiri mmi-fo.” Yesu kammbia, “Mmbo kwaamba songosiny, elyi kwaamba, Nkutiri mmi-fo.
43004018	Mashika kweeriwa mmbomi varaanu na yeu akurie ulaalu nshiwe mmi wafo-fo. Elyi kwaamba indo ni kya dede.”
43004019	Nka ulya kammbia, “Nndumi shilollye mmbo kukee nndu nkisuku.
43004020	A vande valya veru mmbo valeindya Iruva kunu ifumbuny elyi. Neeni mukaamba, kulya Yerusalemu mfo kundo kusumani iindya Iruva.”
43004021	Yesu kammbia, “Nka shiirikya. Mmbo kukaa kushe kyeeri mulasheindyaa Nde kunu ifumbuny elyi ao nta kulya Yerusalemu.
43004022	Yeni mmbo mwiindyaa kindo mulakiishi, neese lukaindya kindo lukiishi. Kimmba efo kwa Vayuda mfo kundo kuukye ukiro lwa vandu.
43004023	Kya indi kukaa kushe kyeeri naakwa na ulaalu kiveefo-da, elyi veindya Nde va toki vashemwiindyaa kikee kya ngata ya Mumuyo kiveva kya dede. Mashika Nde mmbo akee iruuya vemwiindya va ngata yeyo.
43004024	Iruva mmbo akee wa ngata ya Mumuyo na yewo vamwiindyaa nkuti vamwiindye kikee kya Mumuyo kiveva kya dede.”
43004025	Naasa nka ulya kammbia, “Shiishi mmbo kusheshaa Mesiya yeto avaangwa ni Kristo. Nawe meendi asheshaa mmbo ashelwoongoyaa findo efyo fyoose shaasa fikai.”
43004026	Yesu kammbia, “Yeny sharera neewe mmbwe yeto.”
43004027	Naasa kikeeny yoo, nalyo valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakasha vakasongololo elyi vakooya ereraa na nndu nka. Indi kulakae-fo nndu ammbesa nkikyi kwasia kwakwe ao nkikyi kwarera nawe.
43004028	Naasa nka ulya katiiya-u nungu ilya yakwe. Kaenda kulya muriny, kandevia vandu,
43004029	“Oshony mushelola nndu ashoongoya findo shitannyi fyoose. Kulakooye mmbwe Kristo ndesa?”
43004030	Vakakwiipoo vauka kulya muriny vakamweengya.
43004031	Kikeeny yoo nnang'ani yeu, valya vakiloshyony vakantereva vakaamba, “Llosha lyaan-te!”
43004032	Nawe kavavia, “Yeny shitiri shoonga yeelya yeni mulaiishi.”
43004033	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakaviana, “A mmbo kwiifo nndu ammweenngye kindo kyeelya ndesa?”
43004034	Yesu kavavia, “Indetana kindo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma na indeinutya mashora akwe nkyo kyava shoonga yakwa.
43004035	A yeni nshi mwaamba kusaa-u miiri iina kufike yoo mailullyony? Manyiny kindo shamuvia, ‘Ipoony miso mulole, marema shaasa avereye yuululwa.’
43004036	Mwiilula ni ulaalu-da aifo awarya isina lyakwe na yuumbya fimu fyeendesanyirya efo muuny wa llung'anu. Na yeto mweera mbeu kusande na yeto mwiilula vafure kimwi.
43004037	Mashika kyaaso kilya ni yoo kyamanyikya mmbo kilererwa dede kyeamba, ‘Mweera mbeu ni ungyi na mwiilula kava ungi’.
43004038	Yeny mmbo shamuruma mundeilula kindo mulavinnyi. Ni vengyi vavinnyi-u neeni mukandesandwa neewo vavinnyi-u.”
43004039	Naasa vandu va Samaria veengyi vakapooka ikusirya nawe kimaruma kya marero a nka ulya elyi avika ukureeki ashaambaa, “Ashoongoya fyoose shaasa shiletana.”
43004040	Naasa elyi Vasamaria vafika kulya akai vakantereva nakae nawo. Kakaa-fo ando a mikonu ivii.
43004041	Nalyo veengyi kilanya vakapooka ikusirya nawe kimaruma kya ndera yakwe.
43004042	Vakavia nka ulya, “Kyaluniinga lukakusirya-u nshi kilya kwaambau yewe-fo. Mmbo lwamiita luveni lukamanya yeu mmbwe dede Nkira wa ulana.”
43004043	Naasany kwemiira-u mikonu ivii, kakwiipoo-fo kandefika kulya Galilaya.
43004044	Mashika Yesu muni alekureeka-u kyeamba, “Nndu nkisuku nshi efo urukeny lwakwe akooya iindywa-fo.”
43004045	Naasa elyi afika kulya Galilaya vandu va Galilaya vakammbwarya valollye fyoose shaasa aletana kulya Yerusalemu nkonu ulya nniini. Mashika nawo-da vesheye nafo kya nkonu ulya nniini.
43004046	Naasa kavefika-se kulya Kana ya Galilaya kulya aleallwa mura ulya ukava mfinyo. Naasa kweefo nndu umwi nshilyi eetiri mwana wakwe wa kyuumi elwee kulya Kapernaumu.
43004047	Nawe elyi amiita mbony ta Yesu ansha na kulya Galilaya auka kulya Yudaya, kawara shia yeenda kafika kulya akai. Kantereva nandesoka nafo, nakire mwana ulya wakwe; mashika ekee rengeny yefwa.
43004048	Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Kwakooya kulaore mwalollya ngyende na findo filandelollyo lyingi, mmushekusiryaa-u-fo?”
43004049	Nndu ulya nshilyi kammbia, “Woi Nndumi, soka-dwa, mwana ulya wakwa kulaore annutuka.”
43004050	Yesu kammbia, “Kweenngye-da, mwana wafo eefo na muu.” Naasa, nndu ulya kakusirya na kirero kilya Yesu ammbia, kavekweengya.
43004051	Arie shia yeenda na kyeny, mashinga akwe akasha imwaammbya, akaamba, “Mwana wafo eefo na muu.”
43004052	Naasa kavasununda kyeeri alepooka iva ng'waana. Vakammbia, “Ni ukwau kumfika saa mfungare, llyo muro ulya ulemmbuka.”
