43004053	Naasa nndu ulya kamanya ni sa ilya sheni llya Yesu alemmbia, “Mwana wafo eefo na muu.” Kava nndu akusirye-u, na va kyeny kwakwe woose.
43004054	Nakyo nkyo kindo kya wende kya kavii Yesu aleengera itana llya aleuka Yudaya kasha na kulya Galilaya.
43005001	Elyi numa kukafika nkonu ulya nniini wa Vayuda Yesu kanderwa na kulya Yerusalemu.
43005002	Naasa kulya Yerusalemu, yoo kufii na Ngiri ya Moonri kweifo iruva lyivaangwa irina lya vayo lya Kiebrania ni Betsata. Nalyo lyitiri matengo araanu a uraa.
43005003	Nafo mfo kundo kukee kwaare nsemu mwiingyi wa vandu valwee na vafu-miso, na miketekete, na fitongororo. [Nawo vakava veevereya mura ulya usarywa.
43005004	Mashika kwifo kyeeri nsu wa Iruva ashoolokaa efo iruveny kasarya mura ulya. Naasa nndu ansongwa yooloka-fo elyi mura wansarywa-sarywa, kaveshia, na ndwari yakwe intiri na ikava-ki.]
43005005	Naasa kweifo nndu emaye-fo myaaka makumi araru na nyanya eeserikaa na ndwari yakwe.
43005006	Nndu ulya Yesu kallollya elele-fo, kamanya emaye-fo fyeeri fyaasha. Kammbia, “Kukundye ishia?”
43005007	Nndu ulya alwee kamwaallwa, “Nndumi nshitiri nndu ashoolotaa efo iruveny elyi mura wasarywa-fo. Mashika elyi shiifo nshoolokaa, nndu ungyi kaveshiirya mbee yooloka-fo.”
43005008	Yesu kammbia, “Kwiipoo, kurike kitara kyafo kukweengye.”
43005009	Nalyo nndu ulya kava nsha deny, kaipoo kitara kyakwe, kakweengya. Naasa nkonu ulya wekee wa Sabato.
43005010	Naasa Vayuda vakavia nndu yeu amishia, “Inu ni Sabato-te, nkutiri muumu weekurika kitara-fo.”
43005011	Kavarouwa, “Ni nndu yeto ashishiisa mmbwe ashivia, kurike kitara kyafo kukweengye.”
43005012	Vakammbesa, “A ni vi nndu yeto akuvia kurike kitara kukweengye?” "
43005013	Naasa nndu ulya eelwee nalamanyi mmbwe-vi, kimmba Yesu enrekya efo vanduny valya vakuumbyeu nkuka.
43005014	Naasa elyi numa Yesu kankooya akee efo mmba ya Iruva kammbia, " “Lla-te, kwammishia-ny. Nta kulalyamare-se-fo kukooye iwoywa nkindo kikasha mmwasi yeekyo.”
43005015	Naasa nndu ulya kakweengya kandevia Vayuda ni Yesu anshiisa.
43005016	Nakyo kyikaniinga Vayuda vakatira kisuuya nawe mashika elyi aleva mwiitana indo nkonu wa Sabato.
43005017	Nawe kavaalwa, “Nde-yaakwa aifo arundaa kafika ulaalu, neeny shivee-fo shirundaa-da.”
43005018	Naasa nkyo kimaruma Vayuda vakaengera iruuya mwaanya weembwaa, nshi kimaruma kya iimmbwa Sabato-fo, ni elyi aamba Iruva ni ndeye muni kakwiinanisa na Iruva.
43005019	Naasa Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, We mwana nnyamanyaa itana kindo kikee kya shila yakwe muni, kulaore ni ekyo alollya Nde etanaa-fo. Mashika we kindo atana na mwana nakyo kavekitana indo-da.
43005020	Mashika Nde akunndye Mwana kamoora fyoose atana we muni. Nawe ashemooraa fyeetana finiini kilanya ya efyo, neeni mukooye itambwa.
43005021	Mashika Nde aruta vafu kavaallwa va muu.
43005022	Mashika Nde nta nnyarummbwaa mwaandu wa nndu-fo, mmbo aniinngye Mwana ushilyi loose lweerummbwa mwaandu wa vandu.
43005023	Naambo woose vainndye Mwana shaasa vashiindyaa Nde. Yeto ara nalainndya Mwana mmbo ara nalainndya Nde alenruma.”
43005024	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Nndu asharanyaa ndera yakwa kavekusirya na yeto aleshiruma, mmbwe ammbwarya muu wa llung'anu, nta nnashiitwaa mwaandun-fo. Mmbo ammbuka ufuny; kandeanga muuny.
43005025	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kukaa kushe kyeeri, naakwa ni ulaalu kiveefo-da elyi vafu vasheetaa unyanga lwa Mwana wa Iruva na yewo vamiita vawonise muu.
43005026	Mashika shaasa Nde atiri muu ummya efo kwakwe niindo-da aleniinga na Mwana itira muu ummya efo nnang'ani yakwe.
43005027	Kavenniinga na ushilyi lweerummbwa mwaandu kimmba akee Mwana wa Nndu.
43005028	Nta mulatambwa kya ekyo. Mashika kukaa kushe kyeeri elyi yewo valele efo fifuny vasheitaa unyanga lwakwe woose.
43005029	Nawo vashekwiipoo-fo, yewo vatanyi mesha varuke vawonise muu. Na yewo vatannyi makasha varuke vawonise mwaandu.”
43005030	“Yeny nshishiidimaa itana kindo kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbo sharummbwa kikwaani na ekyo shamiita, na ekyo sharummbwa kikava kya usumanu. Mashika kindo mmballyaa nakyo nshi yekyo kikundywa ni yeny-fo, ni ekyo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma.
43005031	Kwakooya shavika ukureeki kyakwa shimuni, ukureeki lwakwa nshi lwa dede-fo.
43005032	Indi yeto ashivikya ukureeki ni ungi. Neeny shiishi ukureeki yelu akureekye kyakwa ni lwa dede.
43005033	Mmbo muleruma vandu kulya kwa Yohane muveni. Nawe kakureekya dede yeyo.
43005034	Neeny nta nshiwaryaa ukureeki luuka kwa vandu-fo, mmbo shaamba-u ekyo naambo yeni mukooye ikirwa.
43005035	Ulya mmbo akee sha taa yaatwa ikamika, Neeni mukakyesa na sa yakwe ando a kivero.
43005036	Indi yeny ukureeki lwakwa shitiri ni uniini lukailanya lulya lwa Yohane, kimmba mashora Nde aleshiniinga naambo shaainutye nng'u yoo meni shiifo nndundaa. Nang'u akava nng'u ukureeki lwakwa kyeamba ni Nde aleshiruma.
43005037	Nawe Nde aleshiruma kaveshivikya ukureeki we muni. Neeni unyanga lwakwe nta mulandelwiite nta lyimwi-fo nta fwana yakwe mulandelollye-fo.
43005038	Na ndera yeyo yakwe nta mulandeitire mukakaa nayo efo nrimin-fo, mashika yeto alenruma mulakunde ikusirya nawe.
43005039	Mmbo mwava vesununda-sununda mareiyo kimmba mwiishi mmbo mushuutaa-u iwonisa-fo muu wa llung'anu nang'u ashivikye ukureeki.
43005040	Neeni nta mulakunde ikusheya na kwakwa naambo muwoni muu.”
43005041	“Nshiwaryaa nnduma wuuka na vandu-fo.
43005042	Indi yeni shammumanya nshi mukee na ukundi lwa Iruva efo nriminy-fo.
43005043	Yeny mmbo shisheye kyikee kya irina lya Nde-yaakwa, nta mulashiwarye, kyeendi kwakooya ungyi asha kyikee kya irina lyakwe muni, we mushemmbwaryaa.
43005044	A niinda mushewonisaa mwaanya weekusirya-u mummbe vandu vevikyana nnduma muveni na veni nta mulalalakyaa iwonisa nnduma wuuka kwa yeto akee Iruva muni?
43005045	Nta mulakusare mmbo shikunndye imukumba efo kwa Nde-fo, kwiifo yeto amukumba, mmbwe Mose yeto mummbikye nsia yeni.
43005046	Mashika kwee mweekusirye na Mose, mmbo mweevekusiryaa neeny kimmba we areiye kya ishyaambya.
43005047	Indi kwakooya kulaore mwakusirya na mareiyo yoo akwe, ni inda mushekusiryaa na marero akwa?”
43006001	Na elyi numa Yesu kakwiipoo-fo kafika kulya kwa kulya ya yeeve ilya ya Galilaya nayo nnyo Tiberia.
43006002	Na vandu vakansora nseemu mwiingyi mashika velollya filya fya wende atana fyeekira vandu valwee.
43006003	Naasa Yesu kasaama na efo ifumbuny, kakaa-fo rembo. Na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe varyani nawe.
43006004	Naasa na nkonu ulya nniini wa Vayuda, ulya wa pasaka, ukee kufii.
43006005	Yesu kainwa miso, kalollya vandu vansheya nseemu mwiingyi kavia Filipo, “A kundo lushuuraa mikate, vandu yeva vawoni kindo kyeelya nkwi?”
43006006	Karera indo kikee kya imweesa. Shamashika we muni eeshi ninsha kindo akunndye itana.
43006007	Filipo kamwaallwa, “Mikate ya dinari mayana avii nnyimaa wo nndu naoni kipereshu tupu-fo.”
43006008	Na umwi wa valya vakiloshyony kyakwe we Andrea ekee mwanamaye wa Simion Petro kammbia,
43006009	“Kwiiyo mwana wa womi yaa atiri mikate iraanu ya nganu shuu na makunga avii.”
43006010	Indi findo efi fifwanaa kwi vandu vammiingifwa indo? Yesu kaamba, “Vikeny vandu rembo.” Na alya vekai weekee mooro mwiingyi wa mare. Naasa womi valya vakakaa rembo vafikye fiku firaanu.
43006011	Naasa Yesu kawarya mikate ilya iraanu kaana Iruva. Kaavya vandu valya vakwaallye si. Na makunga alya kavevaavya shaasa vakunndye.
43006012	Naasa elyi vammbuura kavia valya va kiloshyony vakwe, “Enderorweny fipereshu efyo fisaa-u, mulare nta kindo kirekye-si.”
43006013	Vakanderorwa vakaishura mikusha ikumi na ivii, fipereshu fya mikate ilya iraanu, filya fyasaa elyi vammaa ilya.
43006014	Naasa vandu valya veekilolya ekyo kya wende atana, vakaamba, “Ate ni dede we mmbwe mwauya fisuku ulya akee nteerye nashe kunu ulaniny.”
43006015	Naasa Yesu kamanya vakundye isha imwipoo vamwallwe mangyi, nawe koovya kandesaama lyingyi neefo ifumbuny we muni.
43006016	Naasa elyi kwamfika iila, valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakandesoka na alya mbaambaa ya yeeve ilya.
43006017	Vakasaama neefo ngalaveny, varuuke veende na kulya Kapernaumu. Naasa ireema lyikooloka na Yesu nalandefika kundo vekai.
43006018	Na yeve ikaalukaluka kyeendwa ni uraato uniini.
43006019	Naasa elyi vanrwa ngalava ilya na mbee ando alyaa sha kilometa isaanu ao irindaru indi nalyo vakalollya Yesu asheendaa yoo uwe ya yeve amfika kufii na ngalava ilya. Nawo vakatirwa mmbweerei.
43006020	Naawe kavavia, “Ni yen-te, mulairyae-fo.”
43006021	Naasa vakakunda insaamisa efo ngalaveny. Vakakooya ngalava yamfika alya waambeu kulya vasheendaa nafo.
43006022	Naasa elyi lya ndesi nsemu ulya wa vandu valya valerewa vasalalyi kulya kwa kulya ya yeve ilya, vakalollya nkwiifo-se ngalava ingyi-fo kuuta ilya imwi yeefo, na Yesu nalandesanga na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe mmbo valeenda wo veni.
43006023	Naasa vakakooya kwansha nafo ngalava tingyi tuuka kulya Tiberia tikashefika kufii na alya valelyiiya mikate kyeeri Nndumi aleana Iruva.
43006024	Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu elyi valollya Yesu nalaiyo nta vakiloshyony kyakwe, vakasaama ngalaveny, vakafika kulya Kapernaumu vanderuuya-fo Yesu.
43006025	Vakakooya ammaa iruuka kafika taari ilya ingyi ya yeve, vakammbia, “Llosha a ni indii-da kwafika kunu.”
43006026	Yesu kaalwa kaamba, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kyaniinga mukasheshiruuya nshi mashika a ngyende tilya mulelollya-fo, ni kimaruma kya mikate ilya mulelya mukawuura.
43006027	Nta mulavinnyi shoonga yeyo ikaa ipwaa, vinnyiny shooka yeyo ya muu wa llung'anu. Nayo ni Mwana yeto wa nndu ashemuniingaa. Mmbwe Nde, we Iruva alemmbikya kiringisyo namanyike mmbwa dede.”
43006028	Naasa vakammbia, “A mmbo lutanaa inda lukooye itana mashora yoo a Iruva?”
43006029	Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Ishora elyo lya Iruva llyo elyi, ni ikusirya na yeto alenruma.”
43006030	Naasa vakammbia, “A nkyo kyi kutanaa kyeeloora wende neese lukilollye lukooye ikusirya neewe? A ni ishora-ki kwatana?
43006031	Vande valya veru mmbo valelya mana kulya kasa shaasa kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Alevaniinga nkate wuuka efo iruveeu.’ “
43006032	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, nshi Mose alemuniinga nkate yeto wuuka iruveeu-fo, mmbwe Nde-yaakwa amuniinga nkate yeto wuuka efo iruveeu ukee wa dede.
43006033	Mashika nkate wa Iruva nto yeto wooloka wuuka iruveeu ukaniinga ulana yelu muu.”
43006034	Naasa vakammbia, “Nndumi kyeluniinge nkate yeto kyeeri kyoose!”
43006035	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Yeny mmbwe nkate yeto wa muu! Nndu akusheya na kwakwa nnakitirwaa nshaa-se-fo. Na nndu kakusirya kwakwa nnatirwaa nyura-se-fo.”
43006036	Indi mmbo shamuvia, “Ilollya mwanshilollya nta mulaute-u ikusirya-fo.”
43006037	Ekyo Nde anshiniinga nkyo kikusheyaa na kwakwa, Na nndu ankusheya na kwakwa nshishemweeraa poo-fo.
43006038	Mashika kyashiniinga shooloka na kunu si, nshi ishetana kindo shikunndye shimuni-fo, ni kindo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma.
43006039	Na kindo kikundywa ni yeto aleshiruma nkyo ekyi, Woose Nde aleshiniinga naambo shilarete-u nta umwi, indi shinndute nkonu yeto weefurumya.
43006040	Mashika kindo kikunndywa ni Nde-yaakwa kikee indi, Wo nndu alola Mwana na ikusirya nawe, nawarye muu wa llung'anu na yeny nkaa shinndute nkonu yeto weefurumya.
43006041	Naasa Vayuda vakarininda kyakwe mashika elyi aamba, “Yeny mmbwe nkate yeto uleoloka wuuka iruveeu.”
43006042	Vakaamba, “A yeu nshi Yesu, we mwana wa Yosefu, a mmbo lulaishi ndeye na maye? Kyavaany inda elyi aamba mmbo aolokye auka iruveeu?”
43006043	Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Nta mulakae murinindaa muveni na veni.
43006044	Nkwiifo nndu aidima ifika kwakwa kulaore ni Nde yeto aleshiruma amwoommwa nafo-fo, neeny nkaa shinndute nkonu yeto wa ifurumya.”
43006045	Mmbo kikee kireiye efo fitabuny fya vakisuku kyeamba, nawo woose vakaa vave vafunde ni Iruva. Naasa, wo nndu amaarannya kyuuka na Nde na ikulosha mmbo ashaa na kwakwa-da.
43006046	Nshi kikee sheelyi kwiifo nndu alollye Nde-fo, kulaore ni yeto aparikye efo kwa Iruva, mmbwe alollye Nde.
43006047	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, Yeto akusirye-u mmbo ammbwarya muu wa llung'anu.
43006048	Yeny mmbwe nkate yeto wa muu.
43006049	Vandeye valya vany mmbo valelya manna kulya kasa vakavefwa.
43006050	Indi nkate yeto shaamba nto woolokye wuuka efo iruveeu, naambo vandu vaulye valakikooye-se ifwa.
43006051	Yeny mmbwe nkate wa muu yeto uleoloka wuuka iruveeu. Na nkate yeto kwakooya nndu aulya nnyashefwaa-fo. Na nkate yeto shinsimbaa ni mwiili wakwa shyoonisye nato ulana yelu muu.
43006052	Naasa Vayuda vakava vallyaa ulai wo veni na veni vakaamba, A ni inda ashiidimaa ilusimba mwiili wakwe luulye?
43006053	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kwakooya kulaore mwalya mwiili wa Mwana yeto wa nndu na ina samu yakwe nta mmukaa na muu efo nnang'ani yaany-fo.
43006054	Nndu kalya mwiili wakwa na ina samu yakwa mmbo awaryaa muu wa llung'anu, neeny nkaa shindute nkonu yeto weefurumya.
43006055	Mashika mwiili wakwa nto kyeelya kya dede, na samu yakwa nnyo kyeena kya dede.
43006056	Na nndu kalya mwiili wakwa kavena na samu yakwa mmbo akaa asangyi neeny, neeny nkaa nsangyi nawe.
43006057	Kikava shaasa Nde yeto aleshiruma akee muni muu, neen shakaa na muu kimaruma kya Nde, nakiwo-da yeto ashilya akaa na muu kimaruma kyakwa.
43006058	Eto nto nkate uleoloka uuka efo iruveeu, nta ulakee wa ngata imwi na ulya vande valya veru valelya vakavefwa. Indi nkate yeto, nndu kaulya mmbo alung'anaa ikaa na muu.
43006059	Na kundo aleamba marero yoo ni kulya mmba yeeterevya ya kulya Kapernaumu eeloshyaa-fo.”
43006060	Naasa vandu veengyi nnang'ani ya valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vekiita indo vakaamba, “Marero yoo mmoomu-te, A nndu ashiidimaa yaairanya mmbii?”
43006061	Naasa Yesu kamanya we muni efo nriminy valya vakiloshyony mmbo veefo varininda kya ekyo. Nalyo kavavia, “A ekyo mmbo kyamuviiya nsindara?
43006062	A kishevaany inda kwakooya mushelollya Mwana yeto wa nndu eesherwaa na uuwe efo ekee elyo mbee?”
43006063	Mumuyo nto uningaa muu. Mwiili mmbumaa kindo-fo. Na marero yoo yeny shammeemuvia, nng'u a ngata ya Mumuyo akaveva a muu.
43006064	Indi kunu nnang'ani yaany kwiifo maata valakusirye-u. Nyeli uka elyo mbee Yesu eeshi vandu valakusirye-u mmbo vangava, nndu ashenndiingyaa ni ungau.
43006065	Nalyo kaamba, “Nkyo kimaruma shamuvia, Nkwiifo nndu eedima ifika kwakwa kulaore ni yeto ammbonisywa mwaanya ni Nde wakwa-fo.”
43006066	Naasa llyo vandu va efo kiloshyony veengyi valepooka iwuya na numa valakivandami-se nawe.
43006067	Naasa Yesu kavia valya ikumi na vavii, “A mmbo mukunndye ikweengya na yeni-da?”
43006068	Naasa Simion Petro kamwaallwa, “Lweende kwa vi Nndumi? Mmbo kutiri marero aende muu wa llung'anu.
43006069	Neese lwankusirya neewe, lukamanya yewe mmbo kukee yeto Mweele wa Iruva.”
43006070	Yesu karouwa, “A nshi yeny shimuni shilemukusauya yeni ikumi na vavii? Na efo nnang'ani yaany umwi kawuya iva mmbishwa?”
43006071	Naasa karera indo kya Yuda Iskariote akee mwana wa Simion. Mashika mmbwe aleva nndu yeto alenndiingya nawe ni umwi wa valya ikumi na vavii.
43007001	Naasa numa ya vayo Yesu kava mwiireera kulya Galilaya, Nyeeli nalekunndye iireera kulya Yudaya mashika elyi Vayuda vesiaa immbwaa.
43007002	Na mikonu ilya miniini lya Vayuda ikee kufii, ilya yeemanya matengo.
43007003	Naasa vanavamaye vakammbia, “Wara shia kwakwiipoo kunu kundefika kulya Yerusalemu, na vakiloshyony vafo nawo-da vakooye ilola mashora yoo afo kwatana.
43007004	Mashika nkwiifo nndu atana kindo kirika kakunda nawe amanyike urukeny-fo. Kwakooya mmbo kwakunda itana mashora a ngata yeyo, enda kooreny na va ulana-te.”
43007005	Mashika naakwa ni vanavamaye mmbalemwiirikya-fo.
43007006	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Kyeeri kyakwa nkyalefika-fo. Indi yeni kyeeri kyany mmbo kiifo nkonu simu.
43007007	Nta ulana llushiidimaa imusua yeni-fo Mmbo lushisuuye yeny mashika a ukureeki lwakwa shivikye kimaruma kya vayo shaamba, mashora a vayo mmeesi.
43007008	Kweengyeny yeni mundelya suku-kuu. Yeny nshiderwaa nafo indelya suku-kuu-fo, kimmba kyeeri kyakwa kilandefika.”
43007009	Amaamba indo, kakukaya kulya Galilaya.
43007010	Naasa elyi vanavamaye vameenda irwa nafo kya mikonu ilya miniini iifo, nalyo we muni nawe-da kanderwa nafo kirika.
43007011	Naasa Vayuda vakava vannduuya elyi lya mikonu ilya miniini. Vakaamba, “A we nkwi akai?”
43007012	Nalyo efo vanduny valya vasasangi-fo nkuka kukakaa-fo kusu-kusu shiniini kimaruma kyakwe. Valya maata vakaamba, “Mmbo akee nndu nsha, maata vakaamba, Ode, mmbo aretaa vandu.”
43007013	Kikeeny indo lyo kulakae-fo nndu arera kyakwe paa-fo, kimaruma kyairyaa Vayuda.
43007014	Naasa mikonu ilya miniini yamfika yoo nnang'ani kavii, Yesu karwa na efo mmba ya Iruva kaloshya-fo.
43007015	Naasa Vayuda vakasongololo vakaamba, “A kyavaany inda elyi nndu yeu aishi indo nta nalakee lloshe?”
43007016	Naasa Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Kya ufundo kwakwa nshi lwakwa shimuni-fo ni lwa yeto aleshiruma.
43007017	Kwakooya nndu akunda itana ekyo kikundywa mmbwe, mmbo akooyaa imanya kya ufundo yelo lwakwa, kwakooya sharera kyuuka na shila yakwa shimuni.
43007018	Yeto mwiirera kyuuka na shila yakwe mmbo asia ando asheng'anisywa we muni. Indi nndu asiiya yeto aleshiruma ando asheng'anisywa mmbwe nndu wa toki, nalakee na findo fya mwiiri nta.
43007019	A nshi Mose ammuniingye mavavaso? Na kunu nnang'ani yaany nta umwi aifo atana fya uvavaso yelo-fo. A kimaruma nkikyi elyi mukunndye ishiwaa?”
43007020	Vandu valya vakuumbye-fo vakaallwa, “Ako! Kulwee nrwe? A ni vi akunndye ikuwaa?”
43007021	Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Mmbo shiletana ishora lyimwi neeni mukasongololo moose.
43007022	Mose mmbo amuniinngye nndumwa weerinwa. Nta kilakee ni kwakwe uukye-fo, ni kwa vakuu valya va mbee. Nalyo mukava veerina nndu naakwa ni elyi lya nkonu wa Sabato.
43007023	Naasa kwankooya nndu ashewonisaa irinwa elyi lya Sabato, na uvavaso lwa Mose lulakooye ifuluwa, a ni inda mwashitirya unyafi elyi shileallwa nndu moose kava nsha nkonu wa Sabato?
43007024	Nta mularummbwe mwaandu kya ilola fisangu. Rummbweny kya usumanu.”
43007025	Naasa vandu va kulya Yerusalemu veefo valya maata vakaamba, “Akwa: Nshi we yeto vansia vammbwae?
43007026	Nawe akakau aifo areraa paa, valammbie nta kindo. Kulakooye vandu yewo va nrwe ni dede valekooya imanya yeu mmbwe Kristo ndesa?
43007027	Kya indi nndu yeu lumwiishi kundo aukye, lyo kyeeri Kristo asheshaa nkushekaa-fo nndu amanyaa kundo ooka nafo-fo.”
43007028	Naasa Yesu kaonisa unyanga eeloshaa efo mmba ya Iruva kaamba, “Ee-da na muveshiishi na kundo shuukye nafo muveishi-da. Neeny nta nshisheye kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbo kwiifo wa dede aleshiruma, nawe nta mulamwiishi yeni.
43007029	Yeny mmbo shimwiishi kimmba ni efo kwakwe shyuukye. Nawe mmbwe ashirummyi.”
43007030	Naasa vakava vasiaany mwaanya weentira, nta kulakae-fo nndu amooroya woko; mashika kyeeri kyakwe nkyemfika-fo.
43007031	Naasa efo mamwiinginy wa vandu veengyi vakauta-u ikusirya nawe. Vakaamba, “Kyeeri Kristo asheshaa mmbo asheengeraa itana fya ngyende fiingyi ngota efyo nndu yeu aletana?”
43007032	Naasa Vafarisayo vakaita ironda lilya lya vandu lyiikunung'unaa indo kyakwe, nalyo vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na Vafarisayo, vakaruma vasoro va efo poo vandentira.
43007033	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Ni ando a kyeeri kidu nsindi neeni, shikweenngyeny kwa yeto aleshiruma.
43007034	Llyo musheshisiaa mulasheshikooyaa, na kundo nshekaa mulashiidimaa ifika-fo.”
43007035	Naasa Vayuda vakarera wo veni na veni, “A nndu yeto nkwi afikaa neese lure lulankooya-se? A mmbo afikaa kulya kwa valya vanyanyakye masangeny a Vagriki, nandeloshya-fo Vagriki yewo?
43007036	A kikeeny inda elyi arera indo kaamba, musheshisiaa mulasheshikooyaa na kundo nkaa yeny mulashiidimaa ifika-u yeni?”
43007037	Naasa elyi kwamfika nkonu yeto nniini weemarisya, nato ukee nniini kitoro ya ingyi, nalyo Yesu kashesalala-u kaonisa unyanga kaamba, “Kwakooya nndu aakuka nakusheye na kwakwa nashe ina!
43007038	Nndu akusirye neeny, kyakwe mmbo kivaa shaasa kikee kireiye kyeamba, ‘Nndu yeto efo nyaminy takwe kusherukaa-fo ngyusoka ta mura wa muu!’ “
43007039	Na elyi arera indo, ni mbony ta Mumuyo Mweele, mmbwe vandu vakusirye nawe vakaa vambwarye, mashika kyeeri kilya Mumuyo Mweele nalandeshe-fo, neelyi Yesu nalandeanga neefo itumbeny lyakwe.
43007040	Naasa efo mamwiinginy ulya wa vandu kukakaa-fo vandu vaita arera indo, vakaamba, “Yeu ni dede mmbwe nkisuku ulya akee nteerye nashe.
43007041	Vengyi vakaamba, mmbwe Kristo. Vengyi vakaamba, A mmbo Kristo asheshaa nauke kulya Galilaya?
43007042	A nshi kikee kireiye kyeamba, Kristo asheshaa aukye efo ukuuny lwa Davidi na efo Betilehemu efo muriny wa Davidi.”
43007043	Naasa mamwiingyi ulya wa vandu ukakumanya kavii kimaruma kyakwe.
43007044	Kukavekaa-fo na vaangu vakunndye intira, indi nndu alleesya woko nalawonike.
43007045	Naasa vasoro valya va efo poo vakawuya na kulya kwa vakohani vaniini na vafarisayo. Nawo vakavavia, “A nkiki kyaima mulamweende?”
43007046	Vasoro valya va efo poo vakaallwa, “Mmbo kulandewonike nndu arera shaasa nndu yeu arera-fo.”
43007047	Vafarisayo vakaallwa, “A mmbo neeni mwallembika?
43007048	A mmbo kwiifo nndu wa nrwe naakwa ni umwi tupu akusirye nawe, ao wa efo kwa Vafarisayo?
43007049	Lyo mburwa yei ya vandu ilaishi uvavaso mmbo vadenge.”
43007050	Nikodemu karera ulya emweengya kio, nawe ni wa efo nnang'ani yaawo, kaamba,
43007051	“A mavavaso a kikweru mmbo autye nndu uvingo kulaore amaarannywa mbele mbony tauka kwakwe kamanyika kindo aletana?”
43007052	Nawo vakaallwa vakammbia, “A mmbo neewe kuukye kulya Galilaya? Soma mbony ntere kumanyi, Kulya Galilaya nkushekwiipoo-fo nndu nkisuku-fo.” [
43007053	Vakawara shia wo nndu kaenda kyeny kwakwe.
43008001	Nawe Yesu kaenda kulya ifumbuny lya miri ya mafura.
43008002	Elyi lya ndesi ngama shuru kafika-se kulya mmba ya Iruva, kaengywa ni Vayuda valele-fo woose. Nawe kakaa rembo kava avaloshaany.
43008003	Naasa vaarya va fitabu vakasanga na Vafarisayo vakaende nang'u nka aaramwa atuuswaa. Vakanseleesa yoo nnang'ani.
43008004	Vakammbia, “Llosha! Nka yeu mmbo aaramwa eetuswaa.
43008005	Naasa Mose mmbo aluvavasye efo uvavasony kya vaka va ngata yeyo luvakape na mawe. A yewe kwaambaany inda ndesa?”
43008006	Naasa kyavaniinga vakarera indo nyeeli vekundye imweesa naambo vawonise kindo vankumba nakyo. Naasa Yesu kakwiinyika kareiya na nni yoo uteriny.
43008007	Naasa elyi vengera immbesa kakwiinwa kavavia, “Nndu wa kunu nnang'ani yaany nalatiri kindo alyamarye we nave wa mbee weenkapa na iwe.”
43008008	Nalyo kawuya kakwiinyika lyingyi na ireiya yoo uteriny.
43008009	Nawo vamiita indo vakapooka isuruka-u umwi umwi vapookya na vamiku vakatana vasia-u. Na Yesu karewa-u we muni na nka ulya asalalyi-u.
43008010	Naasa Yesu kawuya ikwiinnwa kammbia, “A valya vekukumba valla na kwi nka? A mmbo kulakaa-fo nta umwi akuutya uvingo?”
43008011	Nawe kaamba, “Nta umwi-fo Nndumi!” Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Nta yeny nshikuutyaa uvingo-fo. Kweenngye, kure deny kulalyamare-se-fo.” ]
43008012	Naasa Yesu kawuya irera nawo lyingyi kaamba, “Yeny ni sa ya ulana. Nndu kashilatya nnyakyendaa-se ireemin-fo. Mmbo akaa na sa ishendee muu.”
43008013	Naasa Vafarisayo vakammbia, “Mmbo kwakureeka-u kyafo ku muni! Ukureeki lwafo nshi lwa dede-fo.”
43008014	Yesu kaallwa kavavia, “Na kwakooya shakureeka-u kyakwa shimuni ukureekyi lwakwa mmbo lwava lwa dede-da, kimmba shiishi kundo shyuukye na kundo nsheendaa.
43008015	Neeni mmbo mwarummbwa mwiilolaa nyama yeto ta nndu, indi yeny nsharummbwa kya nndu nta-fo.
43008016	Naakwa kwakooya sharummbwa kya nndu, nrumbuye wakwa waveva wa dede-da, mashika nshakaa-fo shimuni-fo, mmbo shakaa-fo yeny na yeto aleshiruma.
43008017	Naakwa na efo uvavasony yelo lwany mmbo kikee kireiye kyeamba, Kindo kyammbikywa ukureeki ni vandu vavii mmbo kikee kya dede.
43008018	Yeny shimuni mmbo shikureekye-u kyakwa, na yeto aleshiruma we Nde, kavekureeka-u kyakwa-da.”
43008019	Naasa vakammbia, “A Nde yeto wafo akee kwi.” Yesu kaallwa, “Yeny mmushiishi-fo, nta Nde wakwa-fo. Kwee mmbo mweeshiishi yeny, mmbo mwemanyaa na Nde yeto wakwa.”
43008020	Nng'u marero alererya alya kufii na isanduku lyeesanyirya fesa efo mmba ya Iruva. Nta kulakae-fo nndu antira nnyelyi kyeeri kyakwe kilandefika.
43008021	Naasa kawuya kavavia lyingi, “Yeny shiifo nkweenngyaa, neeni musheshisiaa. Neefo ulyamariny lwan kundo mukai mfo mushefiiyaa. Kundo yeny nsheendaa nta mmushiidimaa ifika-fo yeni-fo.”
43008022	Nalyo Vayuda vakaamba, kulakooye mmbo akundye ikuwaa ndesa, elyi aamba, kundo yeny nsheenda nta mmushiidimaa ifikafo yeni-fo.
43008023	Nawe kavavia, “Yeni mmbo muparikye kunu si, na yeny ni efo uuwe shiparikye. Yeni mukavaany vandu muparikye kunu ulaniny, yeny shi nndu shiparikye kunu ulanin-fo.
43008024	Naasa neeny shamuviany, ni efo ulyamariny lwany kundo mukai mfo mushefiiyaa. Mashika kwakooya kulaore mukusirye-u yeny mmbwe, na efo ulyamariny lwany kundo mukai mfo mushefiiyaa.”
43008025	Naasa vakammbia, “A yewe ni viiny?” Yesu kavavia, “Ni indo kikai shaasa shilelava imuvia, na ulaalu shavemuvia indo-da.
43008026	Mmbo shetiri fiingyi fyeerera kyany na irummbwa kyany. Kyaindi yeto aleshiruma mmbwa dede. Neeny mbony shamiita shyuuta kwakwe nto nshambaa-u teevia ulana.”
43008027	Nawo nta valamanyi mmbo arera nawo kikee kya Nde.
43008028	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Mukamfika irosa mwana yeto wa nndu llyo mushemanyaa yeny mmbwe, nta shilatiri kindo shatana kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni. Ni ekyo Nde aleshoora nkyo shaamba.
43008029	Na yeto aleshiruma, mmbo ashikaye. Nta nnashireeye shimuni-fo. Kimmba yeny findo finsennyi we mfyo shava mwiifitana kyeeri kyoose.”
43008030	Naasa elyi arera indo veengyi vakauta-u ikusirya nawe.
43008031	Naasa karera na Vayuda valya vakusirye nawe kaamba, “Kwakooya mwakaa mukutiri na ndera yakwa llyo-ny mushevaa vakiloshyony vakwa dede deny.
43008032	Neeni mushemanyaa ekyo kikee dede, kishemuvikaa muve valeke.”
43008033	Nawo vakamwaallwa, “Mmbo lukee ufyari lwa Abrahamu, nta lyimwi lulandeve mashinga a nndu-fo. A kyavaany inda, elyi kwaamba, mmbo mushevaa vandu valeke?”
43008034	Yesu kavaalwa, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, wo nndu atana fya ulyamari mmbo aaluka ishinga lya ulyamari.
43008035	Indi ishinga lyo lyikaa efo kyeny kyeeri kyoose-fo. Nndu akaa kyeny kyeeri kyoose Mmwana.
43008036	Naasany kwakooya mwana ashemwaallwaa muve valeke, llyoony mushevaa valeke dede deny.
43008037	Shiveishi-da mmbo mukee va ufyari lwa Abrahamu. Indi yeni mukasia mwaanya weeshiwaa, kimmba ndera yakwa ilaonnyi kirembo efo nnang'ani yaany.
43008038	Yeny kindo shilollye efo kwa Nde nkyo nshaambaa. Naasany neeni kevetaniny ekyo mwamiita muuta efo kwa Nde.”
43008039	Vakaallwa vakammbia, “A Nde weeru nshiwe Abrahamu?” Yesu kavavia, “Kwee mwekee vana va Abrahamu mmbo mweetanaa mitannyi ya Abrahamu.
43008040	Kya indi ulaalu mukeruuya mwaanya weeshiwaa, neeny shikee nndu shamuvia ekyo kikee kya dede, ekyo shilekiita shyuuta efo kwa Nde. Nta Abrahamu nshi indo aletana-fo-te.
43008041	Yeni mmbo mwava veetana mitannyi ya nde yeto waany.” Vakammbia, “Yese lluwonikye kyuuka na utuusi-fo. Mmbo lutiri Nde umwi-da, ni Iruva.”
43008042	Yesu kavavia, “Kwee Iruva ekee Nde waany, mmbo mweeshikundaa yeny, kimmba yeny shilesha shyuuka kwa Iruva shasha yaa shikai. Nta nshisheye kikee kya shila yakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbwe aleshiruma.
43008043	A kimaruma nkikyi elyi mulakeemanya ekyo nkeemuvia? Mmashika elyi mulashiidimaa yaaranya Irero lyakwa.
43008044	Yeni mmbo mukee va nde yeto waany we mmbishwa. Na efyo fikunndyo mmbwe mfyo mukunndye itana. We ekee mwiiwaa vandu uka elyo mapoonkyony nta nalakee na dede-fo kimmba efo nriminy mmbwakwe kulaifo kya dede yeyo kyeeri arera wongo mmbo arera ekyo kikee kyakwe muni, mashika we akee muni wongo kaveva mmbwe ndeye wa vayo.
43008045	Kya indi yeny elyi sharera ekyo kyikee dede nkyo kyaima mulakusirye neeny.
43008046	A nndu wa kunu kwany ni ungau ashiidimaa ishikureekya sheelyi shikee llyamari? A kwakooya sharera kya dede naambo-ki-se elyi kulaore mwakusirya neeny?
43008047	Yeto aparikye efo kwa Iruva, mmbo ashiitaa marero a Iruva, nkyo kyaniinga yeni mulaite nnyeeli mulakee vandu vaparikye efo kwa Iruva.”
43008048	Naasa Vayuda valya vakarouwa vakammbia, “A nshi lwaronga ninsha elyi lwaamba yewe mmbo kukee Nsamaria, kwavetirwa ni Mumuyo nkasha?”
43008049	Yesu kaallwa, “Yeny nshitirwa nta ni Mumuyo nkasha-fo mmbo shainndyaa Nde wakwa neeni mukashimina.
43008050	Neeny nta nshiruyaa nnduma wakwa shimuni-fo. Mmbo kwiifo yeto ashiniinga nnduma na irummbwa kyakwa na kyany.
43008051	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kwakooya nndu aringa ndera yakwa nnasheshoshaa ufu-fo na kafika llung'anu.”
43008052	Vayuda valya vakammbia, “Akakyo ulaalu lwammanya mmbo kutirwa mmumuyo nkasha. Abrahamu mmbo alefwa na valya veauya fisuku vakavefwa, na yewe kwaamba, kwakooya nndu aringa ndera yakwa nnasheshoshaa ufu fika llung'anu-fo.
43008053	A mmbo kukee nniini kwailanya nde weeru Abrahamu, nawe alevefwa-da? Na vakisuku vakavefwa-da. A mmbo kwakwaallwa sha vi?”
43008054	Yesu kaallwa, “Kwakooya shakung'anisa shimuni nng'anu wakwa nshi kindo-fo. Mmbo kwakaa-fo Nde-yaakwa mmbwe yeto ashing'anisaa. Na yeni mukaamba mmbwe Iruva waany.
43008055	Nta mulamwiishi. Kya indi yeny shimwiishi. Na kwakooya shaamba, nshimwiishi mmbo shava mwoongo sheeni. Kya indi shimwiishi na kirero kyakwe shavekiringa.
43008056	Na nde ulya waany we Abrahamu alelooka eeishi mmbo akaa nalollye nkonu wakwe, nawe kaveulollya-da kafura.”
43008057	Naasa Vayuda vakammbia, “A yewe kulandefika irika lya mmyaaka makumi araanu-le, kwaamba inda kwallollya Abrahamu?”
43008058	Yesu kavavia, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, meendi Abrahamu nalandekaa-fo, yeny shiifo.”
43008059	Naasa Vayuda valya vakaipoo mawe vamweerye. Yesu kakusuruma kauka efo mmba ya Iruva.
43009001	Naasa eefo ashiiraa ando kalollya nndu akee mfu miso kipookya ammbonika.
43009002	Na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe vakammbesa, “Ale llosha! Nndu alelyamara mmbi, ni nndu yeu ndesa ao ni ndeye na maye kutani awonika indo akee mfu miso?”
43009003	Yesu kaallwa, “Nta nshi nndu yeu alelyamara-fo, nta nshi ndeye na maye-fo. Mmbo kileva indo naambo mashora a Iruva akooye imanyika efo kwakwe.
43009004	Yese kuti luve veetana mashora a yeto aleshiruma elyi kukee nsanyiny. Kio mmbo kiifo kishaa, llyo nndu nnakiidimaa-se irunda-fo.
43009005	Meendi shikee kunu ulaniny mmbo shava sa ya ulana.”
43009006	Amaamba indo kafishya maare si. Maare alya kaumba-umba nang'u mmbumba wa uteri. Mmbumba ulya wa uteri kawaamba yoo misony alya akwe.
43009007	Kammbia, “Enda kundesamba efo iruveny lya Siloamu.” Kwaallwa ni kimwi na nndu Nrumi. Naasa kakweengya kandesamba. Kawuya alolaa.
43009008	Naasa vandu valya va nnyanu na valya valellollya elyo mbee ekee nndu mweererya vandu, nalyo vakaamba, “Nyira, a yeu nshiwe ulya aleva mwiikaa-fo rembo asheereryaa vandu.”
43009009	Vengyi vakaamba, “Nshiwe-fo-te.” Vengyi vakaamba, “Ode, ni nndu afwanani nawe.” Nawe kaamba, “Ee, mmbwe yeny-da.”
43009010	Naasa vakammbia, “A mmbo kileva inda elyi miso afo akooya itarambuka.”
43009011	Nawe kaallwa, “Ni nndu ulya avaangwa ni Yesu, mmbo awumba mmbumba wa uteri kawaamba yoo misony akwa. Kashivia, Enda kulya Siloamu kundesamba-fo. Nalyo shaenda. Shimmeesamba shakooya ate shiifo llolaa.”
43009012	Vakammbia, “A nndu yeto nkwi akai.” Kaamba, “Nshukuny!”
43009013	Nalyo vakanderwaa nndu yeto ekee mfu miso na kulya kwa Vafarisayo.
43009014	Na nkonu ulya wekee wa Sabato llya Yesu aleumba mmbumba ulya wa uteri kawaamba yoo misony akwe.
43009015	Naasa Vafarisayo nawo-da vakammbesa-se shaasa alekooya ilola. Nawe kavavia, “Ni mmbumba wa uteri aleshaamba misony, shandesamba shakooya-ny ilola.”
43009016	Naasa Vafarisayo valya maata vakaamba, “Nndu yeu nshi nndu aukye kwa Iruva-fo, kimmba nalashiinndyaa Sabato.” Vengyi vakaamba, “Kukooye ni nndu llyamari a niinda eeshiidimaa itana fya wende fya ngata yeyo.” Nalyo vakaraukana.
43009017	Naasa vakawuya vakavia ulya ekee mfu miso, “A yewe kwaamba inda kyafo ku muni elyi alekutarammbwa miso?” Nawe Kaamba, “Mmbo akee nndu nkisuku.”
43009018	Naasa Vayuda nta valairikye kyakwe sheelyi mmbo ekee mfu miso kakooya ilola. Vakatana vavaanga ndeye na maye wa nndu ulya alekooya ilola.
43009019	Vakavavesa vakaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbwe mwana waany ulya eishiwa mmbo alewonika eekee mfu miso? A kilevaa-ny inda elyi ulaalu indi ankooya ilola?”
43009020	Naasa ndeye na maye vakaallwa vakaamba, “Kindo lwiishi nndu yeu ni mwana weeru nawe mmbo alewonika eekee mfu miso.
43009021	Kya indi shaasa kileva ulaalu kakooya ilola ekyo yese llukiishi-fo nta llwiishi nndu yeto alentarammbwa miso-fo. Kyemmbeseny-te, mmbo akee nndu nniini, ashaambaa ekyo kyakwe we muni-te!”
43009022	Na kyaninga ndeye na maye karera indo nyeeli veereiye Vayuda. Kimmba Vayuda venfisha kyama, kwakooya kwakaa-fo nndu ashemwamba paa mmbo akee Kristo, nawo vammbikye ishingo efo mmba yaawo yeeterevya.
43009023	Nkyo kimaruma ndeye na maye vakaamba, “Mmbo akee nndu nniini. Kyemmbeseny we muni-te!”
43009024	Naasa vakawuya ivaanga nndu ulya lya kavii, ulya ekee mfu-miso. Vakammbia, “Iruva mmbwe kumwiitikisaa! Kya nndu yeu lwammanya mmbo akee llyamari.”
43009025	Naasa nndu ulya kaallwa, “Kwakooya mmbo akee nndu llyamari ekyo nshiishi-fo. Ni kindo kimwi-nsi shiishi deny, mmbo shekee mfu miso na ulaalu shankooya ilola.”
43009026	Naasa vakammbia, “Mmbo alekutanya inda? Ni inda alekutarammbwa miso?”
43009027	Kavaalwa, “Mmbo shammeemuvia, neeni nta mulaite. Naambo ki-se mukunndye ikiita lya kavii? A mmbo neeni mwakunda iva vakiloshyony kyakwe ndesa?”
43009028	Vakasakya nawe vakammbia, “Nndu akee wa kiloshyony kyakwe ni yewe! Yese mmbo lukee vakiloshyony kya Mose-te
43009029	Kya Mose yese lwiishi, ni Iruva alerera nawe. Indi nndu yeto llwiishi nta kundo aukye-fo.”
43009030	Nndu ulya kaallwa kavavia, “Ate ando atiri tamba ni yoony, elyi mulaishi kundo aukye, nawe mmbwe aleshitarammbwany miso!
43009031	Mmbo luveishi Iruva nnarannyaa nndu llyamari-fo. Indi kwakooya kwakaa-fo nndu areremmya Iruva kavetana kindo kikundywa mmbwe, yeto mmbwe ashemwaarannyaa.
43009032	Kira ulana lwammbikwa kulandeitiwa nndu aletarammbwa miso a nndu alewonika akee mfu-miso.
43009033	Kwee nndu yeto nalaukye kwa Iruva nneemanyaa itana nta kindo-fo.”
43009034	Vakaallwa vakaamba, “Yewe nndu kulewonika kukee na ulyamari, kwatana kwalulosha yese!” Vakamweera neefo poo.
43009035	Naasa Yesu kaita vammweera na poo. Kakwaannya nawe kaamba, “A kukusirye na Mwana yeto wa Iruva ndesa?”
43009036	Nawe kaallwa kaamba, “A mmbo-vi Nndumi, neeny shikooye ikusirya nawe.”
43009037	Yesu kammbia, “Illollya kwammellollya, na yeto aifo areraa neewe mmbwe.”
43009038	Nawe kaamba, “Akau shankusirya-u Nndumi!” Nalyo kamoolokya si.
43009039	Na Yesu kaamba, “Yeny mmbo shisheye na kunu ulaniny naambo ekyo kya vandu kirumbuke, yewo valalollye naambo vakooye ilola, na yewo valollye naambo vakooye iva vafu miso.”
43009040	Naasa Vafarisayo maata varyani nawe vakaita indo vakammbia, “A mmbo lukee vafu miso na yese?”
43009041	Yesu kavavia, “Kwee mwekee vafu miso, mmweevaa valyamari-fo; indi ulaalu mmbo mwamaamba mulollye naasany ulyamari lwany mmbo lwamukaya.” YOHANE
43010001	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Nndu nalashaangaa mfiriny wa moonri aira yoo ngiriny, kasaama na ando engyi, yeto ni mwiivi na nsoki.
43010002	Indi yeto aanga nafo aira yoo ngiriny, we mmbwe mwiisi wa moonri.
43010003	Na yeto mwiiringa yoo ngiriny mmbo annduyaa. Na moonri alya akaaranya unyanga lwakwe. Na moonri alya akee akwe muni kaavaanga marina a vayo kaauwa na poo.
43010004	Na alya akee akwe moose elyi aasomuta na poo kaira mbee asongoye. Na moonri alya akallatya kimmba eeshi unyanga lwakwe.
43010005	Indi nndu muny nnyashellatyaa-fo. Mmbo arishaa kimmba alaishi unyanga yelo lwa nndu yeto munny.”
43010006	Naasa nkyo kyaaso Yesu aleveera. Nawo nta valamanyi ekyo akunndye ivavia nakyo nkyo ki.
43010007	Naasa Yesu kawuya ivavia lingi, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, Ngiri yeanga kundo mburu tikai nnyo yeny.
43010008	Yewo vasheye nafo vashisongoye mmbo vekee veevi na vasoki woose, indi moonri alavaaranyi.
43010009	Ngiri yeyo nnyo yeny. Kwakooya nndu aanga nafo ashyaaluye ngiri mmbwe akooya ikirwa, na yaanga nafo na isomuka nafo, navekooya na ura.
43010010	Indi yeto akee mwiivi nnashaa nafo, kulaore ni isha iiva na ishisha na ireta-fo. Yeny mmbo shilesha nafo moonri akooye itira muu na iuwona shapu.”
43010011	“Mwiisi nsha mmbwe yeny. Mwiisi nsha mmbo arekyaa moonri akwe muu.
43010012	Indi nndu mwiisia weesi nalakee mwiisi, nta nalakee muni moonri alya karisha. Naasa nyamandu ikasha ikatitafura neetinyanyata.
43010013	Mashika elyi we akee nndu weesia weesi nalasarye kya moonri.
43010014	Mwiisi nsha mmbwe yeny. Mmbo shiveishi yoo akwa, nang'u aveshiishi yeny.
43010015	Shaasa nde wakwa ashiishi yeny, na yeny shiveishi Nde wakwa. Na muu wakwa shaveureka kimaruma kya moonri akwa.
43010016	Shitiri na moonri engyi-se, alakee a mfiri yeu. Nang'u nkuti shiende nau. Nang'u ashiitaa unyanga lwakwa. Na ironda lyive lyimwi na mwiisi nave umwi.
43010017	Nkyo kyaniinga Nde kashikunda elyi shareka-u muu wakwa.
43010018	Nta nkwiifoo nndu ashiusokaa-fo. Mmbo shaulekeya shikunda shimuni. Mmbo shivetiri na finya ya yuulekeya. Shivetiri na finya ya yuuvira lyingi. Llyo ivavaso shilewarya lyuuka kwa Nde-akwa.”
43010019	Naasa Vayuda vakawuya ikumanya kavii lyingyi kimaruma kya elyi arera indo.
43010020	Naasa veengyi vakaamba, “Mmbo atirwa mmumuyo nkasha kasukwa. A naambo-ki-se elyi mwiifo mumwaarannyaa?”
43010021	Vengyi vakaamba, “Marero yoo arera nshi akee sha a nndu atirwa mmumuyo nkasha-fo. A mmbo kwiifo mumuyo nkasha ushiidimaa itarammbwa miso a vafu-miso?”
43010022	Naasa kukafika nkonu nniini kulya Yerusalemu weekummbwa mmba ya Iruva ilesammywa. Na kyeeri kilya kiifo kikee kya mbeo.
43010023	Na Yesu eefo arua-ruaa efo mmba ya Iruva, efo itengony lya uraa lya Solomon.
43010024	Nalyo Vayuda vakasha inndingitya vakaamba, “A mmbo kufikaa indii kwiisavesaa mirima yeeru? Kwakooya yewe ni Kristo ambaany paa-te!”
43010025	Yesu kaallwa, “Mmbo shilemuvia-da, neeni mulakusirye-u! Ni mashora yoo yeny shatana kikee kya irina lya Nde-akwa, nng'u ashivikye ukureeki.
43010026	Neeni nta mulakusirye-u mashika elyi mulakee ukambeny lwa moonri akwa.
43010027	Na moonri yoo akwa mmbo aishiitaa unyanga lwakwa. Neeny shivetiishi nato tikashilatya.
43010028	Neeny shaaniinga muu wa llung'anu. Nang'u nta nnakaa nareke na akafika llung'anu-fo. Nta nkwiifo nndu asheatafuraa kunu wokony lwakwa-fo.
43010029	Nde yeto wakwa ashiniinngye mmbo ang'annyi woose. Nta nkwiifo nndu ashiidimaa aatafura efo wokony lwa Nde-fo.
43010030	Neeny na Nde mmbo lukee vamwi.”
43010031	Nalyo Vayuda vakeepoo mawe lyingyi vankape nang'u.
43010032	Yesu kavaallwa, “Mmbo shilemoora mashora mesha meengyi auka kwa Nde. A ni kimaruma kya ishora lyingalyi mukunndye ishikapa na mawe?”
43010033	Nalyo Vayuda vakamwaallwa, “Nshi kimaruma kya ishora isha lukunndye ikukapa na mawe-fo. Ni kimaruma kya kirumu kyafo kyeeruma Iruva, na elyi yewe kukee nndu-da kwatana kwakwaalwa Iruva kumuni.”
43010034	Yesu kavaallwa, “Efo uvavaso lwany a mmbo nalakee areiye kyeamba, ‘Yeny shileamba, mmbo mukee maruva?’
43010035	Naasa valya valefitywa irero lya Iruva, kwankooya mmbo alevavaanga ni maruva na ekyo kikee kireiye nta kilave ifullwa.
43010036	Afikaany, yeny shilevikwa Mweele ni Nde kashiruma na kunu ulaniny ni inda mwashivia mmbo sharuma Iruva, elyi shaamba, ‘Shikee Mwana wa Iruva?’
43010037	Kwakooya kulaore shatana mashora a Nde-yaakwa, reny mulakusirye neeny-fo!
43010038	Indi kwakooya mmbo shaatana, na kikava mulakusirye neeny shimuni, kusiryeny na mashora yoo-te, naambo mweende mwiimanyaa na iipuye Nde mmbo asasangyi neeny, neeny nsasangi na Nde.”
43010039	Naasa vakasia mwaanya weentira, lyo we katurushuka efo maakony awo keenda.
43010040	Nalyo kawara shia kafika lyingyi kulya kwakulya ya Yordani, kulya Yohane eebatisyaa kakaa-fo.
43010041	Vandu vakansheya veengyi vakaamba lyo dede we Yohane nta nnyaletana kindo kyeeora wende-fo, kya indi kilya Yohane alerera kya nndu yeu mmbo kikee kya dede kyoose.
43010042	Nalyo vandu va kulya veengyi vakakusirya nawe.
43011001	Naasa kweefo nndu eelwee evaangwaa Lasaro wa kulya Betania, wa kimuri kilya kya Maria na Marta we mfwamaye.
43011002	Na Maria mmbwe ulya aleamba Nndumi mafura afwaamaa nisha. Na marende alya kaangata na fii ta nrweny wakwe. Na mwanamaye we Lasaro, mmbwe ulya elwee.
43011003	Naasa vamfwamaye valya vakwe vakanrummya nrumi, vakaamba; “Nndumi ulya kunkundye alwee.”
43011004	Naasa Yesu aita indo kaamba, “Ndwari yei nshi yeewaa-fo, ni ya yeengye Iruva usuri, naambo Mwana yeto wa Iruva naute-u ing'aniswa.”
43011005	Naasa, na Yesu akundani na Marta, na mfwamaye na Lasaro.
43011006	Naasa elyi amiita alwee, nalyo kulya akai kaengera isinda-fo ando a mikonu ivii.
43011007	Amiirisha-fo indo elyi numa kavia valya vakiloshyon kyakwe, “Ndifony-te luwuye na kulya Yudaya.”
43011008	Valya vakiloshyony vakammbia, “Llosha, ni kyeeri yeki kyenyi Vayuda valya verie ikukapa na mawe-te. Neewe mmbo kwiifo kuwuyaa nafo lyingi?”
43011009	Yesu kaallwa, “Saa ta nsanyiny nshi ikumi na ivii? Na kwakooya nndu arua-rua nsanyiny nnyakapaa urende-fo, kimmba alollye sa ya ulana yelu.
43011010	Indi kwakooya nndu arua-rua kio mmbo akapaa urende kimmba nalakee na sa efo nnang'ani yakwe.”
43011011	Ekyaamba indo kawuya kalungya-u kingyi kavavia, “Mbuya ilya yeeru Lasaro ammeelala, lyo nsheendaa shindemwaanta.”
43011012	Naasa valya va kiloshyony vakammbia, “Nndumi kwakooya mmbo ammeelala, asheshiaa.”
43011013	Na Yesu arera indo neelyi emmeefwa. Nawo vakakusara kulakooye mmbo aamba alele rony.
43011014	Kikee indo nalyo Yesu kavavia paa, “Lasaro amfwa.
43011015	Neeny shavefura kimaruma kyany elyi shakooya shilai-yo, naambo mukooye ikusirya-u. Indi kendifony lundefika kwakwe.”
43011016	Naasa Toma ulya avaangwa Wamaasa, kavia wooroye valya vakiloshyony, “Ndifony-da na yese lundefwa lusange nawe.”
43011017	Nalyo Yesu afika-fo kakooya ammaa mikonu iina kifuny.
43011018	Na kwauka kulya Betania kufike Yerusalemu ni ando a kilometa isaanu.
43011019	Na Vayuda veengyi vasheye na kulya kwa Marta na Maria vavaangate misoru kya mwanamaye ulya waawo.
43011020	Naasa Marta kasheengywa mbony sheelyi Yesu aifo ashaa. Kaenda imwaammbya. Na Maria karewa akee kulya kyenyy.
43011021	Naasa Marta kashevia Yesu, “Nndumi kwee ni kunu kweekai mwanama yeu wakwa nnyeefwaa-fo!
43011022	Lyo naakwaa ni ulaalu mmbo shiveishi-da efyo kusheterevaa Iruva, Iruva mmbo akuniingaa.”
43011023	Yesu kammbia, “Mwanamau asherukaa!”
43011024	Marta kammbia, “Shiishi-da, mmbo arukaa elyi kwamfika yoo marukyony a vafu nkonu yeto weefurumya.”
43011025	Yesu kammbia, “Yeny mmbwe nnduti na muya-muu. Na nndu akusirye neeny naakwa afwa mmbo ashetiraa muu.
43011026	Na wo nndu aifo na muu kakusirya neeny, nnyakikooya-se ifwa-fo, na kafika llung'anu. A yewe kwakusirya-u indo?”
43011027	Nawe kammbia, “Ee-da Nndumi. Yeny mmbo shikusirye neewe mmbo kukee Kristo Mwana wa Iruva, yeto akee mwaambe nashe na kunu ulaniny.”
43011028	Amaamba indo nalyo kakwiipoo-fo kandevaanga mfwamaye we Maria kikee kya kirika. Kaambia, “Llosha ansha eefo akuvaangaa.”
43011029	Nawe ekiita indo kakwiipoo shu uviny kafika alya Yesu akai.
43011030	Na Yesu nalandefika efo kimuriny-fo. Mmbo akee alya akwaanannya na Marta.
43011031	Naasa Vayuda valya veeiyo na Maria kulya kyeny valya vakunndye imwaangata misoru vakalollya Maria akwipoo shu uviny kasomuka. Nawo vakallatya vaishi mmbo asheendaa na efo mbangeny indekapya-fo kiiyo.
43011032	Naasa elyi Maria afika yoo Yesu akai kallollya kawa si yoo marendeny akwe, kammbia, “Nndumi kwe kweekee kunu mwanama yeu wakwa nnyeefwaa-fo.”
43011033	Naasa Yesu alollya ashiiyaa indo na Vayuda valya vasha varyani nawe vakaveiiya, nawe karovyo efo nriminy kasavaa.
43011034	Kaamba, “A kundo mulemwaara nkwi?” Vakammbia, “Osho kushelola.”
43011035	Yesu koolota misoru.
43011036	Naasa Vayuda valya vakaamba, Llen-te ndesa enkunndye.
43011037	Na vengyi vakaamba, “A nshi-we aletarammbwa miso a nndu ulya mfu miso? A mmbo alelemwa itana kindo kyeeima na nndu yeu nalafwe?”
43011038	Nalyo Yesu kawuya irovyo efo nriminy. Kafika yoo mbangeny. Nayo ni mbanga ikee shidoshe iweny na iwe lyikee yaamire-u.
43011039	Nalyo Yesu kaamba, “Ipoony-mbu iwe yelyo.” Marta ulya mfwamaye wa Lasaro kammbia, “Nndumi, ampooka iraa-te. Mmbo ammaa-fo mikonu iina.”
43011040	Yesu kammbia, “A mmbo shilandekuvia kwakooya kwakusirya-u mmbo kushelollyaa itumbe lya Iruva?”
43011041	Nalyo vakaipoo-fo iwe Ilya. Na Yesu kainuya miso na uuwe, kaamba, “Woi Nde shakwaana elyi kwanshyaarannya.
43011042	Neeny shiveeshi-da, mmbo kwava mwiishyaarannya kyeeri kyoose. Indi kyashiniinga shakyaamba-u ni nkuka yeu wa vandu varingitye-u naambo vakooye ikusirya-u vamanyi ni yewe kuleshiruma.”
43011043	Na elyi ammaa yaamba indo, koonisa unyanga kavaanga, “Lasaro somuka na kunu poo.”
43011044	Nndu ulya mfu kasha na poo, na kisangu kilya kyakwe kikee kyoososye kirami. Yesu kavavia, “Moorommwiny munre neende.” "
43011045	Naasa Vayuda valya vasheye na kulya kwa Maria vekilolya kindo kilya atana, veengyi va efo nnang'ani yaawo vakapooka ikusirya nawe.
43011046	Na valya maata vakaenda kulya kwa Vafarisayo vakavavia kilya atana.
43011047	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vakasanga na Vafarisayo vakavaanga shila shiniini ya ngyama tawo vakaamba, " “A lutaniny inda elyi nndu yeu ava mwiitana fyeeora ngyende shiingyi indo?
43011048	Kwakooya lwankureeya-u indo, vandu mmbo vasiiyaa kwakwe ikusirya nawe. Nalyo Varome vasheshaa vashelusokaa na uruka na vandu.”
43011049	Naasa nndu umwi wa efo nnang'ani yaawo umwi ni Kayafa ekee nkohani nniini wa mwaka ulya. Nawe kavavia, “Mmutiri nta nrwe-fo,
43011050	nta mulakusarye mmbo kyemuviiyaa kisha nndu umwi nafwe ando a vandu va uruka elu loose kyallya vandu va uruka loose varekaa?”
43011051	Na elyi arera indo nshi kya shila yakwe muni-fo. Ni elyi ekee nkohani nniini wa mwaaka ulya karera indo kikee ni kisuku auya kyeamba Yesu asheendaa ifiiya vandu va uruka.
43011052	Nshi kya vandu va uruka elu tupu-fo, ni kimaruma kya vana va Iruva yewo vanyanyakye naambo nakooye ivaummbya ando amwi.
43011053	Naasa kipookya nkonu ulya vakavika shila naambo vakooye immbwaa.
43011054	Naasa Yesu nalakive-se, mwiirua-rua paa efo kwa Vayuda. Indi kakwiipoo-fo kaenda uruka lwiiduvani na kulya kasa. Kafika muriny uvaangwaa ni Efraimu, kakaa-fo na vakiloshyony vakwe.
43011055	Naasa Pasaka ya Vayuda yensha kufii. Vandu veengi vakanderwa na kulya Yerusalemu vauka efo urukeny lulya, kulaore kwamfika Pasaka, vandekwiilyisa.
43011056	Naasa vakava varuuya-ruuya-ny Yesu. Vakarera wo veni na veni vasalalyi efo mmba ya Iruva, vashaambaa, “A mulla kyava inda? Ni dede nnasheshaa ishesaiya nkonu yeu nniini-fo ndesa?”
43011057	Na Vakohani valya vaniini vensanga na Vafarisayo vakauta mavavaso kyeamba, “Kwakooya nndu ammanya kundo akai neende mbony, naambo vakooye intira.”
43012001	Naasa kweeiyo mikonu irindaru kufike Pasaka. Yesu kafika kulya Betania kulya Lasaro elele ulya Yesu alennduta ammbuta kwa vafu.
43012002	Naasa vakanndesya shoonga na Marta kava mmbo afurukana-u. Na Lasaro kava ni umwi wa valya veefo rembo velyaa shoongaa.
43012003	Naasa Maria keende ratili imwi ya mafura eamba afwamaa nisha a ngata ya nardo akee mavaramu, atiri uuru uniini, kaamba marende a Yesu, Kawuya kaangata na fii ta nrweny wakwe. Na mmba ilya ikaishwa kifwaamu kya mafura alya.
43012004	Naasa Yuda Iskariote aiyo ni umwi wa valya vakiloshyon kyakwe ulya asheendaa inndiinngya, we kaamba,
43012005	“A nkyeema mafura yaa akummbwa fesa shiingi, nato tikandeniingwa vakiva.”
43012006	Na kyaaniinga kaamba indo nshi atinnywa vakiva-fo nnyelyi ekee mwiivi, nawe mmbwe arie mboloko ilya ya fesa, na filya fyavikwa-fo kava mwiipoo-fo.
43012007	Naasa Yesu kaamba, “Kunreeyeny-te nadeesye kya nkonu wakwa weerikwa.
43012008	Kya vandu vakiva mmbo mukee nawo mikonu myoose. Indi yeny mmukee neeny mikonu myoose-fo.”
43012009	Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-fo ironda iniini va efo kwa Vayuda, vakamanya Yesu mfo kundo akai, vakasha nafo, nshi kimaruma kya Yesu tupu-fo, mmbo vakunndye ilollya na Lasaro ulya alennduta ammbuta kwa vafu.
43012010	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vakafisha kyama naambo vawaa na Lasaro vansande nawe.
43012011	Nyeeli mashika akwe Vayuda veengyi valekusirya na Yesu.
43012012	Naasa elyi lya ndesi kweifo ironda iniini lya vandu lyisheye nafo kya nkonu ulya nniini. Vakaita Yesu eefo ashaa na kulya Yerusalemu.
43012013	Vakakamara maramba a myaangashi. Vakawara shia vandemwaammbya. Vakakapa kisengelele vakaamba, “Hosiana! Kundearafumwa yeto asha arumwa ni Nndumi kaveva mangyi ya Israeli.
43012014	Naasa na Yesu emmbonisa ngashe ya nshungu, kasaama mungony wa vayo. Kikaveva indo shaasa kikee kireiye kyeamba,
43012015	Yeni va Sion mulairyae-fo! Akakato mangyi yafo aifo akusheya asaammyi mungony wa ngashe ya nshungu.”
43012016	Nakyo shaasa kikai valya vakiloshyony valaitumuso mbele. Ni meendi alya Yesu aleira na efo itumbeny llyo meendi valekummbwa ni indo kyekee kireiye na itana vakaventannya indo-da.
43012017	Naasa ironda llya lya vandu valya vekee nawe nkonu ulya alevaanga Lasaro kauka efo mbangeny, kannduta ammbuta vafuny, nawo-da vakava vavikaany ukureeki.
43012018	Nakyo kikaveniinga ironda lyilya lya vandu vandemwaammbya nyelyi vamiita mmbo aletana kindo ekyo kya wende.
43012019	Nalyo Vafarisayo vakaviana nndu na uroye, “Mulollye-da, mmushiidimaa-se kindo-fo. Akakalu ulana loose lwiifo lunsoraa.”
43012020	Naasa efo nnang'ani ya vandu valya valerwa nafo vandeindya Iruva nkonu ulya nniini kukavekaa-fo na Vagriki vaangu.
43012021	Naasa vakaenngya Filipo wa kulya Betisaida ya kulya Galilaya. Vakantereva vakaamba, “Nndumi, lulanngye ilollya Yesu!”
43012022	Filipo kaenda kandevia Andrea. Andrea kasanga na Filipo vakandevia Yesu.
43012023	Na Yesu kavaallwa kaamba, “Akakyo kyeeri kyamfika, Mwana yeto wa nndu nakooye-ny iira na efo itumbeny.”
43012024	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Mbekye yeyo ya nganu kwakooya kulaore yaoloka efo uteriny ikafiiya-fo, mmbo irewaa ikakaa yo sheni. Indi kwakooya yamfiiya-fo mmbo isheendee kimu kiingyi.
43012025	Yeto ankunda muu wakwe akaa naurete. Na yeto ansua muu wakwe kunu ulaniny yelu mmbwe asheuringaa ukooye muu wa llung'anu.
43012026	Kwakooya nndu akunndye ishirunndya nashilatye-ny. Na kundo shakaa yeny, na yeto ashirunndya mfo kundo ashevekaa. Na kwakooya nndu ashirunndya, mmbwe Nde ashenng'anisaa.”
43012027	Ulaalu nrima wakwa wasavaa. Neeny shyaambeny inda? Ndesa shyaambe, “Nde kushaauwe ulaalu? Indi kimaruma nkyo ekyo shakooya saa yei.
43012028	Woi Nde enda kwiing'anisaa irina lyafo yewe!” Nalyo kukaitiwa unyanga luuka efo iruveeu lwiishaambaa, “Shammeelying'anisa na lyingyi nsheendaa ilying'anisa-da.”
43012029	Naasa ironda lilya lya vandu vasalali-fo vakaita vakaamba, “Ni iruruma lyarera.” Veengyi vakaamba, Ni nsu wa Iruva arera nawe.
43012030	Yesu kaallwa kaamba, “Unyanga yelo nshi kimaruma kyakwa lwarera-fo, ni kimaruma kyany.
43012031	Ulaalu ulana elu lwiifo lushuutywaa uvingo. Ni ulaalu nniini wa ulana yelo asheerwaa na efo poo.
43012032	Neeny kwakooya shammeeroswa na uuwe shyuutwa kunu urukeny, llyo nshewoomuyaa na kwakwa woose.”
43012033	Karera indo yoolongya kya ufu ashendaa ifwa llwa ngata-ki.
43012034	Naasa vandu valya vakuummbye-u vakanndouwa, “Yese lwiitye kya Kristo kyuuka efo uvavasony mmbo ashekaa-fo llung'anu. A kyavaany inda elyi yewe kwaamba mmbo kikee kideerye Mwana yeto wa Nndu nanderoswa na uuwe? A Mwana yeto wa nndu ni viiny?”
43012035	Naasa Yesu kavavia, “Kusaa-u kyeeri kidu mukee na sa nnang'ani yaany. Kerueny mukee sha vandu vatiri sa mulakooye imilwa ni ireema. Na yeto mweenda ireeminy nnyamanyaa nta kundo afikaa-fo.
43012036	Elyi mukee na sa kusiryeny na sa yeyo mukooye yaaluka vana va sa.”
43012037	Naasa lla ndesa aleva mwiitana findo finiini indo velollye fya iwoora ngyende, nawo nta valakunde ikusirya-u.
43012038	Mmbo kileenda indo naambo kilya nkisuku ulya Yesaya alerera kiinukye kyeamba, “Nndumi, a nndu alekusirya na kyoongoyo kyeru ni vi? A ni vi alesukuywa woko Nndumi?”
43012039	Na kimaruma valaidimi ikusirya-u ni kilya kingyi Yesaya alerera kyeamba,
43012040	Mmbo alewaa miso awo, kaallwa ngoo tawo tikava shuumu, na miso awo naambo valakooye illa nang'u kindo, na ngoo tawo valakooye iipuye nato kindo vawuye neeny shivakire.
43012041	Ni indo Yesaya alerera llya alelollya itumbe lyakwe karera kyakwe.
43012042	Lyo mmbo kweefo na vandu va nrwe veengyi-da valeva vandu vakusirye nawe, indi ni kimaruma kya Vafarisayo valakyaambe paa valakooye yaantwa efo ikwaanuny lyawo.
43012043	Kaamba wo vakunndye nnduma wa kunu vanduny kilanya ya nnduma wa efo kwa Iruva.
43012044	Naasa Yesu kaonisa unyanga kaamba, “Nndu akusirye neeny nshi yeny ashikusirye-fo, ni yeto aleshiruma.
43012045	Na yeto ashilollye yeny mmbo alollye yeto aleshiruma.
43012046	Na kwakooya nndu aita marero akwa kara nalaaringa nshi yeny nshemmbutyaa uvingo-fo. Kimmba kindo shilesheya na kunu ulaniny nshi isheutya ulana yelu uvingo-fo ni ishekira ulana yelu.
43012047	Na kwakooya nndu aita marero akwa kara nalaaringa, nshi yeny nshemmbutyaa uvingo-fo. Kimmba kindo shilesheya na kunu ulaniny nshi isheutya ulana yelu uvingo-fo, ni ishekira ulana yelu.
43012048	Yeto ashiinyika kara nalawarya marero yoo akwa mmbo akooya yeto ammbutya uvingo. Ndera yeyo yakwa shileamba nyo ishemmbutyaa uvingo nkonu yeto weefurumya.
43012049	Kimmba nshi kindo shikyuutye kwakwa shimuni shilerera-fo. Ni Nde-yaakwa yeto aleshiruma mmbwe ashiniingye ivavaso lya kindo nshaambaa na kindo nshereraa.
43012050	Neeny shiveishi ivavaso elyo lyakwe mmbo lyava lya muu wa llung'anu. Naasany kindo sharera, shaasa kisumani na ekyo Nde ashiviiye, ni indo shareraany.”
43013001	Naasa kyeeri nkonu ulya nniini wa Pasaka ulandefika Yesu amanyaa kyeeri kyakwe kyammeesha nakwiipoo kunu ulaniny yelu indefika kwa Nde. Nawe ndesa alekunda yewo vakwe meendi akee kunu ulaniny, mmbo alevakunda dede deny.
43013002	Naasa kweefo kwelyiwa shoonga ya nkwaany. Na yeto nkumbi emmaa yaanga Yuda Iskariote, ulya akee mwana wa Simon, naambo nandenndiinngya.
43013003	Nawe Yesu emmanya Nde mmbo ammeenrambikya findo fyoose maakony akwe nawe mmbo alesha auka kwa Iruva, na efo kwa Iruva mfo kundo aifo asheendaa nafo.
43013004	Naasa kakwiipoo alya kilyiiyony kya kilaayo. Kakuuta soori yakwe ya yeerya. Kaende soori ya ifurukannya shoongen kakufinga nayo yoo mwiininy.
43013005	Kawuya kaletya mura wa isamba nndeeveny. Kapooka isangya valya vakiloshyony marende nayaangata na soori ilya akufingye.
43013006	Naasa afika yoo kwa Simion Petro, we kammbia, “Nndumi a yewe mmbo kushisangyaa marende?”
43013007	Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Kindo shiifo ntanaa nkukiishi ulaalu-fo, mmbo kushekimanyaa numa.”
43013008	Petro kammbia, “Ode nta-fo nkusheeshisangyaa marende nakukafika indii-fo.” Yesu kanndouwa, “Kwakooya kulaore shakusangya marende nkukee umwi neeny-fo.”
43013009	Simion Petro kaallwa, “Woi Nndumi, nshi marende tupu-fo, naakwa ni maako na nrwe-da mbee.”
43013010	Yesu kammbia, “Yeto ansamba nnatiri kisanngyo-se-fo, kulaore ni marende meni, mmbo ameeremuka efo mwiiliny koose. Neeni mukee veeremutu-da, indi nshi moose-fo.” "
43013011	Nyeeli eeshi ulya eefo anndinngyaa, nkyo kimaruma kaamba, “Nshi mukee veeremutu moose-fo.”
43013012	Naasa elyi ammaa ivasangya marende kawuya iipoo soori ilya yakwe ya yeerya. Kakaa-fo lyingyi rembo kavavia, " “Mwamanya ekyo shamutannya shaasa kikai-ro?
43013013	Mmbo mwashivaanga llosha na Nndumi. Na elyi mwaamba indo kikava kisha-da, kimmba yeny mmbwe.
43013014	Naasany kwankooya yeny mmbo shamusangya marende shikee nndumi na llosha waany, na yeni-da mmbo kimusumanyi mukusangye marende.
43013015	Mmbo shamureeya kindo kyeelola neeni mundetana indo shaasa yeny shamutannya yeni.
43013016	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, nkwiifoo nndundi airye nndumi wakwe-fo, nta nndu nrumi airye ulya alenruma-fo.
43013017	Kwakooya mmbo mwammeekimanya, mushevaa va ngoma mukauta indo.
43013018	Nshi shaamba indo kikee kya woose-fo. Yeny shiveishi yewo shilevasauwa. Indi kilya kikee kireiye kuti kindeinukya kyeamba, ‘Yeto alyiiye nkate wakwa, mmbwe ashirosyaa tutu nashikape inanga.’ “
43013019	Mmbo shalava imuvia ulaalu kulaore kyammba indo, na elyi kivaa indo naambo mukooye ikusirya-u sheelyi yeny mmbwe.
43013020	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Yeto awaryaa nndu shanruma ni yeny ashiwarya, na yeto ashiwarya yeny mmbo awarya yeto aleshiruma.”
43013021	Na elyi Yesu amaamba indo nalyo kasavaa efo nriminy, kakureeka-u kaamba, “Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, Nndu umwi wa kunu nnang'ani yaany asheshiriinngyaa.”
43013022	Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakakulola-lola vakatirwa ntamba kya nndu arera kyakwe.
43013023	Naasa kweifo umwi wa valya vakiloshyony vakwe akaa rembo yoo uvariny lwakwe. Mmbwe ulya Yesu eitani nawe.
43013024	Nawe Simion Petro kansinnya kammbia, “Mmbese yeto arera kyakwe ni vii.”
43013025	Naasa nndu ulya nalyo yeni kakwaamira yoo uvariny lwa Yesu akweevetye kammbia, “Nndumi, ni vii?”
43013026	Yesu kamwaallwa, “Ni yeto shinkapyaa kipereshu eki yoo nndeeveny shinniinngye, yeto mmbwe.” Naasa kipereshu kilya kakikapa efo nndeeveny, kaniingya Yuda Iskariote wa Simion.
43013027	Nawe eekilya kipereshu kilya Satana kamwaanga. Naasa Yesu kammbia, “Ekyo kwiifo kutanaa kitani uviny.”
43013028	Na valya veefo velyaa shoonga nkwiifo nndu alemanya kimaruma kammbia indo-fo.
43013029	Kukakaa-fo vekusaraa kya Yuda elyi arie mboloko yeesuruma fesa kulakooye Yesu mmbo ammbia, Endeura findo efyo lwatura fya nkonu yeu nniini ao nandeniingya vakiva kindo.
43013030	Naasa elyi ammeelya kipereshu kilya nalyo kasomuka na poo na kio kyemmesha.
43013031	Naasa eekisomuka na poo Yesu kaamba, “Mwana yeto wa nndu ni ulaalu ammeng'aniswa na Iruva kaveng'aniswa kyeendwa mmbwe.
43013032	Kwakooya Iruva mmbo ammeeng'aniswa kyeendwa mmbwe, na Iruva ashenng'anisaa kikee kyakwe muni. Na ulaalu indi-da ashenng'anisaa-se.”
43013033	“Nyira fivana nsindaa neeni kyaangu-da. Mmbo musheshiruuyaa. Nakyo kivevaa indo-da shaasa shilevia Vayuda shaamba, ‘Kundo yeny nsheendaa, mmushiidimaa ifika-fo yeni-fo. Neeny shamuviany ulaalu.’
43013034	Mmbo shamuniingya ivavaso iiya lyikee indi, kaeny mukundani shaasa shilemukunda yeni, neeni mukundani indo!
43013035	Kindo vandu woose vashemumanyaa nakyo mukee vakiloshyony kyakwa ni elyi mwakundana.”
43013036	Simion Petro kammbia, “A nkwi kusheendaa Nndumi?” Yesu kaallwa, “Kundo yeny nsheendaa, yewe nkushiidimaa ishisora-fo ulaalu-fo, mmbo kusheshisoraa-fo elyi numa.”
43013037	Petro Kammbia, “Nndumi, a kimaruma nkikyi elyi shilashiidimaa ikusora-fo ulaalu? Mmbo nshelekeyaa muu wakwa kimaruma kyafo.”
43013038	Yesu kaallwa, kaamba, “Mmbo kushelekaya muu wafo kimaruma kyakwa?” Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, “Oro ya nguku nnyikapaa kulaore kwanshikana kararu-fo.”
43014001	“Nta mulasavee efo nriminy, kusiryeny na Iruva, muvekusirya neeny.
43014002	Efo mmba kwa Nde mmbo kwiifo marembo meengyi deny. Kwee kulaore ni indo kikai, mmbo shemuviaa. Nsheendaa ndemudeesya-u ando.
43014003	Kwakooya shameenda indemudeesya ando mmbo mmbuya lyingyi shishemoonndwa na efo kwakwa, neeny ando shikai neeni muvekooya ikaa-fo.
43014004	Na kundo yeny nsheendaa, shia yeyo mwammeeimanya.”
43014005	Toma kammbia, “Nndumi kundo kusheendaa llwiishi nta-fo-te a ni inda lushemanyaa shia yeyo?”
43014006	Yesu kammbia, “Yeny ni shia na dede na muu. Nta nkwiifo nndu afika kwa Nde kulaore aroswa ni yeny-fo.
43014007	Kwakooya mmbo mwanshimanya yeny, mmbo mumanyaa na Nde-da. Na ulaalu indi-da mwammanya na ilollya mwallollya.”
43014008	Filipo kammbia, “Nndumi kelwoore Nde, nakyo kilukumayaany!”
43014009	Yesu kammbia, “Fyeeri efi fifye indo shankaa neeni, neewe kulandeshimanya Filipo? Yeto ashilollye yeny, mmbwe alollye Nde. A kyavaany inda elyi yewe kwaamba, ‘Lwoore Nde!’
43014010	A mmbo kulakusirye-u sheelyi yeny mmbo nsangyi na Nde, na Nde kasanga neeny? Na marero yoo shaamba nta nshaarera auka kwakwa shimuni-fo. Ni Nde akaa asangyi neeny mmbwe ava mwirunndya-u mashora akwe.
43014011	Kusiryeny na yeny-te mumanyi yeny mmbo shisangyi na Nde na Nde kasanga neeny. Kilave kimaruma kya indo, manyiny kimaruma kya mashora yoo akwa meni amuniinga ikusirya-u.
43014012	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, nndu kakusirya neeny, mashora shatana, nawe-da ashaatanaa na maniini ngota yoo, kimmba yeny ni efo kwa Nde shiifo nkweengyaa.
43014013	Na wo kindo mwankitereva efo kwakwe kikee kya irina lyakwa mmbo akitanaa, na Nde nakooye ing'aniswa kiryani na Mwana.
43014014	Na kwakooya mwatereva kindo kikee kya irina lyakwa na yeny nshekitanaa.”
43014015	“Kwakooya mwashikunda mmbo musheringaa mavavaso yoo akwa.
43014016	Neeny nsheterevaa Nde, nawe ashemuniingaa Mweekyi ungi, nakae neeni nafike llung'anu.
43014017	Ni Mumuyo yeto asheendee mbony ta dede, yeto ulana lulashiidimaa immbwarya kimmba lulatiri miso eellollya nta lulamwiishi. Yeni mmbo mwammanya kimmba asindi neeni kamukaya efo nriminy.”
43014018	“Nta nshemuraa muve vangwera-fo, mmbo nshaa na kwany.
43014019	Kusaa-u kyeeri kidu ulana yelu lulakishilollyaa-se-fo. Neeni mmbo mushilollyaa kimmba shakaa-fo na muu, neeni mushekaa-fo na muu-da.
43014020	Na nkonu yeto mweni, mushemanyaa yeny mmbo shikee llunge na Nde, neeni mmbo mukee valunge neeny, neeny shikee llunge neeni.
43014021	Nndu antira mavavaso akwa kaaringa mmbwe nndu ashikunndye na nndu ashikunda mmbwe ashekundwaa ni Nde-yaakwa, neeny nshevenkundaa na ikoora nawe paa.”
43014022	Naasa Yuda nshi ulya Iskariote-fo, kaamba, “A kyavaany inda elyi kurie ikoora paa na yese-da, kulakoora na ulana yelu?”
43014023	Yesu kaallwa kammbia, “Nndu kashikunda ni ndera yeyo yakwa asheiringaa, na Nde-yaakwa ashevenkundaa, neese mmbo lusheshaa na kwakwe, lwaallwe-fo kuve kweru kweekaa.
43014024	Na nndu kara nalashikunda, nta marero akwa nnaaringaa-fo. Na ndera yeyo mwiitye nshi yakwa shimuni-fo, ni ya Nde, mmbwe aleshiruma.”
43014025	“Yaa nng'u marero akwa sharera neeni, kyeeri yeki nsindi neeni, shamaa-ny.
43014026	Kyaindi yeto Mweekyi, we Mumuyo Mweele, yeto Nde anshenrumaa kikee kya irina lyakwa, mmbwe ashemufundaa findo fyoose navemukumbura fyoose shilemuvia.
43014027	Ni ufoo shamureeya, ni ufoo lwakwa shamusimba. Na nsimmbye wakwa nshi ukee sha nsimmbye wa ulana-fo. Nta mulasavae efo ngoony, nta mulatirwa mmbweerei.
43014028	Mmbo mwiitye shimuviaa shiifo nkweenngyaa mmbewuyaa na kwany. Kwee mweeshikunndye mmbo mweefuraa elyi shakweenngya kwa Nde. Mashika Nde akee nniini ngota yeny.
43014029	Na ulaalu shamuvia elyi kilandeva indo, na yeni elyi kyammeeva indo naambo muute-u ikusirya-u.
43014030	Nshikireraa-se neeni marero meengi-fo, mashika yeto nniini wa ulana yelu eefo ashaa. Nawe nta nalatiri kindo kwakwa-fo.
43014031	Kyaindi ulana yelu nkuti lumanyi mmbo shikunndye Nde, na shaasa Nde aleshivavasya ni indo ntanaa. Naasa ndifony luuke ya lweende.”
43015001	“Yeny ni nsabibu wa dede na Nde-yaakwa kava mmbwe nremi.
43015002	Wo iramba lyikulunngye neeny lyikara lyilavika ndunda mmbo alyiammbwaa-fo. Na elyo lyiiyo lyoose lyivikaa ndunda kalyilyisa lyeengere ivika ndunda.
43015003	Neeni mmbo mukee vailyise kimaruma kya ndera yakwa shammeemuvia.
43015004	Kekaeny-fo mukulunngye neeny, neeny shivekaa-fo shikulunngye neeni. Kikava shaasa iramba lyilashiidimaa ivika ndunda lyikee kyaanya kya vayo kwakooya kulaore lyikulunngye na nsabibu, neeni ni kiwo-da, kwakooya kulaore mwakaa-fo mukulunngye neeny.”
43015005	“Yeny ni nsabibu neeni mukava ni maramba a vayo. Yeto akaa-fo akulungye neeny, neeny shavekaa-fo shikulunngye nawe, mmbwe avikaa ndunda shiingyi. Mashika kwakooya muraukani neeny mmushiidimaa itana kindo nta-fo.
43015006	Kwakooya kulaore nndu akaa-fo akulungye neeny mmbo asheerwaa poo sha iramba nandeuma. Nang'u akasanyiryo andeerwa murony akorwa.
43015007	Kwakooya mwakaa-fo mukulunngye neeny na marero yoo akwa kwakooya mwakaa nang'u efo nriminy, mmbo muningwaa wo kindo mwankunda ikitereva-u.
43015008	Kindo Nde-yaakwa akooya ing'aniswa nakyo ni elyi mwavika ndunda shiingi, mukashiviiya vakiloshyony vakwa.
43015009	Shaasa Nde aleshikunda yeny neeny shavemukunda yeni, kyekaeny na ukundi yelo lwakwa.
43015010	Kwakooya mwaringa mavavaso akwa llyoo-ny mushekaa na ukundi lwakwa. Shaasa na yeny shiriingye mavavaso a Nde-yaakwa shavekaa na ukundi lwakwe.
43015011	Akakakyo shammeemuvia indo naambo nsia yeto ushitiri yeny ukooye imwaanga yeni na nsia yeto wany weende ing'ana.
43015012	Ivavaso lyakwa mmbo lyikee indi, kundaniny muveni na veni shaasa shilevemukunda yeni.
43015013	Nta nkwiifoo nndu atiri ukundi uniini ngota elyi areka muu wakwe kimaruma kya mbuya takwe-fo.
43015014	Naasa yeni mmuvaa mbuya takwa, kwakooya mwatana kindo yeny shilemuvavasya.
43015015	Nta nshikimuvaangaa-se mashinga-fo, mashika nndu ishinga nnamanyaa kindo nndumi yeto wakwe ee-fo atanaa-fo, mmbo shammeemuvaanga ni mbuya, kimmba efyo shileita fyuuka kwa Nde mfyo shilemusununndya fyoose.
43015016	Nta shi yeni muleshisauwa-fo. Ni yeny shilemusauwa yeni, shamuruma mweende mundevika ndunda. Na ndunda yeto tany muvikaa tikooye ikaafo llung'anu. Na wo kindo mwankitereva Nde kikee kya irina lyakwa naambo naidimi imuniinga.
43015017	Naasa ivavaso lyakwa lyikava llyo elyo lyeamba, Kundaniny!”
43015018	“Kwakooya ulana yelu lwamusua, manyiny mmbo lulelava ishisua yeny kulaore lwammusua yeni.
43015019	Kukooye mwekee vakyuulana, ulana yelu mmbo lwemukundaa lwiishi mukee va vayo. Indi elyi mwanra mulava vakyuulana neeny shamusauwa shimuuta ulaniny, nkyo kimaruma ulana lukamusua yeni.
43015020	Kekummbweny kirero kilya shilemuvia shaamba, nkwiifo nndu kishinga airye nndumi wakwe-fo. Kwankooya mmbo valeshuumbuta yeny, neeni-da mmbo vashemuumbutaa kukooye veeringaa ndera yeyo yakwa, mmbo veeringaa na yeyo yaany.
43015021	Kya indi efyo fyoose mmbo vashemutannyaa kimaruma kya irina lyakwa kimmba valaishi yeto aleshiruma.
43015022	Kukooye kulaore shilesha neesherera nawo mmbetiri uvingo lwa ulyamari-fo. Indi ulaalu mmbatiri kindo kyeekuringa kyeekuuta ulyamari yelo lwawo-fo.
43015023	Nndu kashisua yeny, mmbo avesua na Nde-yaakwa.
43015024	Kukooye kulaore shiletana mashora alya efo nnang'ani yaawo alya nndu ungyi nalandeetani, mmbeetiri uvingo lwa ulyamari-fo. Indi ulaalu mmbo valollye-da vakaveshisua yeny na Nde-yaakwa vakavensua.
43015025	Mmbo kileenda indo naambo kirero kilya kiinukye kilya kikee kireiye efo uvavasony lwawo kyeamba, ‘Mmbo valeshisua kikee kyaa ruu parany.’ “
43015026	“Indi Mweekyi yeto shinrumaa auka kwa Nde, akee Mumuyo asheendee mbony ta dede, kwakooya ansha, mmbo asheshivikyaa ukureeki.
43015027	Na yeni ni kiwo-da mushevikaa-u ukureeki kimmba muvandami neeny uka elyo mapookyony.”
43016001	“Na kyashiniinga shamuvia indo nnaambo mulaoni nsindara. Mmbo vakaa vamwaante efo ikwaanuny lyawo.
43016002	Eeda, kushaa kyeeri wo nndu amuwaa naambe mmbo atana kindo kyeeinndya Iruva.
43016003	Na kivaniingaa vatani indo, nyelyi valaishi nta Nde, nta yeny valashiishi.
43016004	Na kimaruma shamuvia indo, kyeeri ekyo kikamfika naambo mumanyi ni yeny shimuni shilelava imuvia indo.” “Nta nshilemuvia indo uka elyo mapookyony-fo, mashika llyo shekee neeni ando amwi.
43016005	Ulaalu mmbo shiifo nkweenngyaa kwa yeto aleshiruma. Naasa nta umwi wa kunu nnang'ani yaany ee-fo ashivesaa naambe, ‘Kwi kusheendaa-fo.’
43016006	Indi elyi shamuvia indo, na yeni mukaishwa fyoova shapu efo nriminy.
43016007	Na yeny shamuvia kya dede, elyi nsheendaa, yeni mushuutaa-u iviiri. Mashika shanra shilaenda, yeto Mweekyi yeto nnyashaa kwany-fo. Indi kwakooya shameenda llyo nshenrumaa kwany.
43016008	Nawe elyi asheshaa ashesununndyaa ulana yelu kya ulyamari na kya usumanu na kya mwaandu.
43016009	Kya ulyamari nnyelyi valema ikusirya neeny.
43016010	Na kya usumanu nyeelyi shiifo nkweenngyaa kwa Nde, na yeni mulakishilollyaa-se.
43016011	Na kya mwaandu nyeelyi nniini wa ulana yelo ammaa yuutwa uvingo.”
43016012	“Mmbo shetiri-se mmbony shiingyi shekundye imuvia kya indi nyeeli mulashiidima itifita ulaalu.
43016013	Indi kyeeri we asheshaa, we Mumuyo mmbo asheendee mbony ta dede, mmbwe ashemooraa shia mumanyi findo fya dede fyoose. Nawe nta nnashereraa afyuuta kwakwe muni-fo. Ni mbony yeto amiita nto ashetyaambaa toose, na findo fikaa fishe nfyo ashemoongoyaa.
43016014	Nawe ni yeny asheshing'anisaa kimmba mbony yeto ashemoongoyaa ni kunu kwakwa ashetuutaa.
43016015	Na findo fyoose Nde atiri mfyakwa. Nkyo kimaruma shamuvia, mbony ashemoongoyaa ni kunu kwakwa ashetiutaa.”
43016016	“Kwiirishe kinnywa mmushekishilollyaa-se. Kuveirisha-se kinnywa muvewuya ishilollya.”
43016017	Naasa valya vakiloshyony maata vakaviana wo veni na veni. “A ekyo aluvia nkyoki ndesa? Kwiirishe kinnywa mmushe kishilollyaa-se-fo. Kuveirisha-se kinnywa muwuye ishilollya. Kaveamba, ‘Shiifo nkweenngyaa kwa Nde?’ “
43016018	Naasa vakaamba, A ekyo aamba kya iirisha kinnywa nkyoki ndesa? Llwiishi kindo aamba-fo.
43016019	Naasa Yesu kamanya mmbo vakunndye immbesa, kavavia, “Kindo mwiifo mushuumburanaa nyelyi shaamba, ‘Kwiirishe kinnywa mmushekishilollyaa-se-fo. Kuveirisha kinnywa muwuye ishilollya.’ “
43016020	Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, “Yeni mmbo mushefuaa na ikapa kiiyo lyo ulana yelu lo lushefuraa-dwa. Na yeni mushesokywaa mfyoova. Kusyeny-do fyoova efyo fyany fikaa fyaaluke nsia mweni.
43016021	Nndu nka kafika kyeeri kyakwe kya iira mwana mmbo ating'wa kimmba kyeeri kyamfika. Indi kamaa iira mwana nnakikummbwaa-se ngatara ilya-fo kimaruma kya nsia untiri kya nndu amiirwa aendwa kunu ulaniny.”
43016022	Na yeni ni kiwo-da, “Kyeeri kya ulaalu mwiifo musokywa mfyoova. Indi nshemulollyaa-se lyingi, na mirima yaany ifure, na nsia yeto wany nkwiifo nndu ashemusokaa-fo.
43016023	Na nkonu yeto ukamfika, mmusheshivesaa-se kindo-fo. Ni dede kya dede shamuvia, kwakooya mwatereva Nde kindo na kikava ki ashemuniingaa kikee kya irina lyakwa.
43016024	Fyeeri efi fika ulaalu mulandetereva kindo kikee kya irina lyakwa-fo. Ketereveny, nalyo musheniingwaa, na nsia wany wiishwe shapu.”
43016025	“Marero yoo shammeerera neeni mmbo ekee a fyaaso. Indi kyeeri kiifo kishaa shilakireraa-se neeni fikee fya fyaaso-fo. Llyo nshemoongoyaa mbony ta Nde paa.
43016026	Na nkonu yeto ukamfika llyo musheterevaa kikee kya irina lyakwa. Nta nshamuvia ni yeny nshemuterevyaa Nde-fo.
43016027	Mashika we Nde amukunndye muni, kimmba mwammeeshikunda yeny mukavekusirya kwakwa mwiishi mmbo shilesha shyuuka kwa Nde.
43016028	Shilesha shyuuka kwa Nde, shakusheya na kunu ulaniny. Na ulalu shiifo mmbukaa-se kunu ulaniny, shiwuye ikweenngya kwa Nde.”
43016029	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakaamba, “Ate ulaalu kwarera paa, kulakirere-se na fyaaso-fo.
43016030	Na yese lwammeekumanya ulaalu mmbo kwiishi findo fyoose nta kulatiri kivesyo ni nndu. Nkyo kimaruma lukakusirya neewe lwiishi mmbo kusheye kuuka kwa Iruva muni.”
43016031	Yesu kavaalwa, “Ulaalu mwammbaany vandu vakusirye-u indo?
43016032	Llen-te, kukaa kufike kyeeri na isha kyammeesha neeni mundenyanyatwa, wo nndu na kyeny kwakwe muni mushireeye-u shimuni. Nta nshakaa-fo shimuni-fo, mashika ni Nde wakwa akaa-fo neeny.”
43016033	Marero yoo mmbo shammaarera mukooye itira ufoo mukulunngye neeny. Mukee kunu ulaniny mmbo mukee na fimusisiraa. Kaaryeny, yeny mmbo shammbinga ulana elo.
43017001	Yesu ekimaa irera marero yoo kainuya miso na efo uuwe kaamba, “Woi Nde akakakyi kyeeri kyamfikany. Kundany ing'anisa Mwana wafo, na Mwana wafo nakooye ikung'anisa yewe.
43017002	Kiryani na elyi kunniingye ushilyi lweeshillya findo fyoose, na efyo kunniingye naambo nakooye ifilyimmya muu wa lung'anu fyoose.
43017003	Na muu wa llung'anu ukavaany ule, ni ikumanya yewe mmbo kukee Iruva dede, na yeto kulenruma we Yesu Kristo.
43017004	Yeny mmbo shilekung'anisa shikee kunu ulaniny shiinutye ishora elyo kushiniingye shilyitani.
43017005	Na ulaalu woi Nde shing'anisaany efo kwafo kwashiniinga nng'anu ulya shetiri efo kwafo kulaore ulana lwammbikwa.
43017006	Mmbo shilesukuya vandu yewo irina lyafo, yewo kuleshiniinga kunu ulaniny. Vekee vafo, neewe kwavashiniinga. Nawo mmbo vammeeringa ndera yafo.
43017007	Ulaalu vakamanya efyo fyoose kushiiniinngye mmbo fyauka kwafo.
43017008	Kimmba marero yoo kuleshianiinga nng'u shilevaniinga nawo. Nawo vakaawarya. Vakamanya dede mmbo shileuka kwafo. Vakakooya ikusirya-u ni yewe kuleshiruma.
43017009	Neeny mmbo yewo shavaterevya. Nshi ulana yelo shaluterevya-fo, ni yewo kushiniinngye kiimmba mmbo vakee vafo.
43017010	Na efyo fikee fyakwa fikaveva fyafo fyoose. Na efyo fikee fyafo fikaveva fyakwa-da. Neeny efo kwawo shava nng'u shammeeng'anisywa.”
43017011	“Neeny nshikikee-se kunu ulanin-fo. Nawo mmbo vakee kunu ulaniny. Neeny shiifo nkusheyaany kwafo. Woi Nde Mweele, varinge vakae na irina lyafo elyo kushiniinngye yeny nawo vakooye iva vamwi na yese.
43017012	Meendi sheekee nawo ni yeny shileva mwiivaringa kyikee kya irina lyafo. Shavaauwa, nta nkwiifo nndu waawo alereka-u kulaore ni mwana yeto wa ureti-fo, naambo kilya kikee kireiye kikooye indeinukya.
43017013	Indi ulaalu shiifo nkusheyaa na kwafo, na marero yoo sharera shikee kunu ulaniny naambo vakooye ikaa na nsia yeto shitiri nato weende ing'ana efo miriminy yaawo.
43017014	Yeny mmbo shivalyimmyi ndera yafo na ulana yelu lukauta-u ivasua kimmba valakee va ngata ya ulana, shaasa na yeny shilakee wa ngata ya ulana.
43017015	Nshi shavaterevya kuvaute kunu ulanin-fo. Ni ivaringa vakie yeto nkasha.
43017016	Wo nshi va ulana yelu-fo shaasa na yeny shilakee wa mushu ya ulana yelu.
43017017	Vavike veele na ekyo kyikee dede Irero lyafo llyo dede.
43017018	Na shaasa kuleshiruma shishe kunu ulaniny, ni indo neeny shilevaruma vafike ulaniny.
43017019	Na kimaruma kyawo shakuvika mweele naambo nawo-da vakooye ivikwa veele.”
43017020	“Indi lyo nshi kyawo-da shatereva-fo. Mmbo shakummbwa na yewo vashevaa vandu vakusirye neeny, kyeendwa ni kirero kyawo.
43017021	Nawo vakooye iva vamwi woose shaasa yewe Nde kusangi neeny neeny shivesangyi neewe, naambo nawo-da vave vandu vasangyi neese, na ulana yelu luute-u ikusirya-u mmbo kuleshiruma yeny.
43017022	Na usuri yelo kushilyimmyi yeny neeny mmbo shivevalyimmye wo, naambo vakooye iva vamwi,
43017023	Neeny shive mmbo nsangyi neewe neewe kusange neeny nawo-da vakooye iinutya iva vamwi, na ulana yelu luute-u imanya mmbo kuleshiruma yeny, kwavevakunda shaasa kuleshikunda yeny.
43017024	Woi Nde mmbo shakunda kya yewo kuleshivaniinga, nawo-da vakooye ikaa ando amwi neeny efo kundo shikai, naambo vakooye ilollya usuri lwakwa kushiniinngye kimmba kuleshikunda kulaore ulana yelu lwammbeiywa.
43017025	Woi Nde kukee wa usumanu na ulana yelu nta lulakwiishi, yeny mmbo shilekumanya. Na yewo-da vakavemanya yewe mmbo kuleshiruma.
43017026	Neeny shavarambuya irina lyafo, na lyingyi nsheengeraa ivarambuya na ukundi yelo kuleshikunda luvakaye efo nriminy, neeny shive mmbo nsangyi nawo.”
43018001	Naasa elyi Yesu ammaa irera indo kakwiipoo-fo aryani na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe. Kandefika kulya kwakulya ya imungo lya Kedroni kulya nndeny. Nalyo kaira nafo aryani na valya vakiloshyony vakwe.
43018002	Naasa na Yuda ulya anndiinngyaa eishi ando alya mashika mfo kundo Yesu na valya vakiloshyony kyakwe valeva vesasanngyaa-fo keengi.
43018003	Naasa Yuda kandoondwa itorito lyilya lyeefo lya vasikari na vasero va poo maata va efo kwa vakohani vaniini na Vafarisayo. Kasha nafo aryani nawo varie fimishamisha na taa na fisha.
43018004	Naasa Yesu emmanya filya fishenkooyaa fyoose. Kasomuka na efo shia kavavia, “A nndu mwiinnduuyaa ni vi?”
43018005	Vakanndouwa, “Ni Yesu wa kulya Nasareti.” Yesu kavavia, “Mmbwe yeny.” Naasa kusalalye-fo na Yuda ulya mwiinndinngya aryani nawo.
43018006	Naasa elyi avavia, “Mmbwe yen”, nawo vakawuya na numa vakawa sumbai.
43018007	Naasa kawuya kavavesa lya kavii, “A nndu mwiinnduuyaa ni viiny?” Nawo vakaamba, “Ni Yesu wa kulya Nasareti.”
43018008	Yesu kavavia, “Shammeemuvia, mmbwe yeny. Kwakooya ni yeny mushiruuyaa lekeyeny yeva-te vakweenngye!”
43018009	Kikaenda indo naambo kilya alerera kindeinukya indo kyeamba, “Valya kuvashiniinngye nshilereta-u nta umwi-fo.”
43018010	Naasa Simon Petro etiri usu, kalusommwa kakapa nalo kishinga kya nkohani nniini kammaswa kuri ka woko usha, irina lya kishinga kilya ni Maliko.
43018011	Naasa Yesu kavia Petro, “Viira usu efo kipony kya vayo. Upata yelu Nde ashiniinga mmbo kukundye shire shilaluna ndesa?”
43018012	Naasa itorito lyilya lya vasikari lyiryani na vaniini vawo na vasoro valya va poo va Vayuda vakatira Yesu vakamfinga.
43018013	Vakanrwaa kulya kwa Anasi, mashika we eekee ndeyaanka wa Kayafa ulya eekee nkohani nniini mwaaka ulya. "
43018014	Na Kayafa mmbwe ulya aleniinga Vayuda irero llya ashaambaa, mmbo kyamuviiya kisha nndu umwi nafwe ando a vandu va uruka loose.
43018015	Naasa Simion Petro eefo alaatyaa Yesu, na ungyi wa vakiloshyony nawe-da. Naasa nndu ulya wa kiloshyony aishivani na nkohani ulya nniini. Kaira na efo poo kwa nkohani ulya nniini ando amwi na Yesu.
43018016	Naasa Petro kairisha yoo ngiriny yoo kimbengeny. Nalyo ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony ulya aishivani na nkohani ulya nniini kasomuka na mbengeny. Karera na nka ulya kishinga mwiringa ngiri kaita Petro na efo kari.
43018017	Nalyo nka ulya kishinga mwiiringa ngiri kavia Petro, " “Na yewe-da nshi kukee nndu wa kiloshyony kya nndu yeto?” Nawe kaamba, “Nshiwe yeny-fo!” "
43018018	Naasa kusalalye-fo mashinga na vasoro valya va efo poo vaatye muro wa makaa mashika kwee-fo mbeo, vakaora muro.
43018019	Naasa nkohani ulya nniini kavesa Yesu kya vakiloshyon kyakwe na kya miloshye yakwe.
43018020	Yesu kamwaallwa, " “Yeny mmbo shirerye paa ulana lukaita. Yeny nkonu simu shileva mwiilosha efo mmba teeterevya na efo mmba ya Iruva efo kundo Vayuda woose vakwaanannya. Nta shilarere kindo kirika-fo.
43018021	A elyi kwashivesa yeny nkiki? Kyevesa yewo valeita kindo shilerera! Yewo mbo vaishi kindo yeny shileamba.”
43018022	Na elyi arera indo nndu umwi wa vasoro valya vapoo kakapa Yesu woi kaamba, “A niindo kwakara irouwa nkohani nniini?”
43018023	Yesu kanndouwa, “Kwakooya mmbo sharera kikasha oraany ukasha lwavayo! Indi kwakooya ni kisha, a ekyo kwashikapya nkyoki?”
43018024	Naasa Anasi kanrika akee mfinge nafitwa kulya kwa nkohani ulya nniini muni, mmbwe Kayafa.
43018025	Naasa Simon Petro karewa asalalyi-fo ashooraa muro. Nalyo vakammbia, “Na yewe-da, a nshi kukee wa kiloshyony kyakwe?” Nawe kalema-fushu, kaamba, “Nshiwe yeny-fo!”
43018026	Naasa mashinga a nkohani nniini ulya umwi waawo akee mfyari wa ulya Petro alemmaswa kuri kammbia, “A nshi shakulollya alya nndeny kuryani nawe?” "
43018027	Naasa Petro kalema-fushu lyingi. Nalyo yeni oro ya nguku ikakapa.
43018028	Nalyo vakauta Yesu kulya kwa Kayafa vakanrwaa efo mmba ya ushilyi ya Pilato. Naasa kyeeri kikava kya ngama. Nawo veni nta valaange efo mmba ya nshilyi wa Kaisari naasa valakooye itefuka naambo vaidimi ilya Pasaka.
43018029	Nalyo Pilato kasomuka na poo ando vakai kaamba, " “A nkyo kikumbo ki mweende kya nndu yeu?”
43018030	Vakaallwa vakammbia, “Kwee nndu yeu kulaore ekee mwiitana makasha nta llweshaa ishenrambikya maakony afo-fo.”
43018031	Nalyo Pilato kavavia, “Mwiipoony yeni-te munderummbwa kyakwe kisumani na mavavaso a ki-kwany.” Nalyo Vayuda vakammbia, “Llutiri muumu wewaa nndu-fo.”
43018032	Nakyo kikaenda indo naambo kirero kilya kya Yesu kindeinukya kilya aleamba kya ufu ashefwaa llwa ngata ingai?
43018033	Nalyo Pilato kawuya yaanga na efo mmba ya ushilyi. Kavaanga Yesu kammbia, “A yewe mmbo kukee mangyi ya Vayuda?”
43018034	Yesu kaallwa, “Elyi kwarera indo mmbo kwakyuuta kwafo ku muni, ao ni vandu vengyi vakuvia indo kyakwa?”
43018035	Pilato kaallwa, “A yeny mmbo shikee Myuda-ro? Ni vandu va uruka lwafo sanda na vakohani vaniini mmbo vakurambikya kunu maakony akwa. A ekyo kuletana nkyoki ndesa?”
43018036	Yesu kaallwa, “Kya umangyi lwakwa, nshi luukye kunu ulaniny-fo. Kwee ni kunu ulaniny umangyi lwakwa luukye, vasoro vakwa mmbo veshikapanyaa, shilashe irammbikywa maakony a Vayuda yewo. Indi ulaalu shaasa kyikai, umangyi lwakwa nshi lwa kunu-fo.”
43018037	Nalyo Pilato kammbia, “A kwavevaany mangi-ro?” Yesu kaallwa, “Ni yewe kwakyaamba kumuni mmbo shaveva mangyi-da. Kimaruma shawonika na kimaruma shasha na kunu ulaniny ni indevikya ekyo kyikee dede ukureeki. Na wo nndu aparikyeny efo dedeny mmbwe ashaaranyaa unyanga lwakwa.”
43018038	Pilato kammbia, “A yekyo kyikee dede nkyoki-ro?” Ekyaamba indo kawuya isomuka lyingyi na poo kundo Vayuda vakai, kavavia, “Nshakooya kindo kya uvingo lwakwe nta kyimwi-fo.”
43018039	“Neeni mmbo mwiishivie ishitereva shimuporomuye nndu umwi nkonu yeto wa Pasaka. Naasany mwakunda shimuporomuye mangyi yeyo yaany?”
43018040	Nalyo vakakapa kyoorongye lyingyi vakaamba, “Nshi yeto-fo, ni Baraba! Nawe Baraba eekee nndu mwaala shia.”
43019001	Kifika yoo nalyo Pilato kaamba Yesu nadekapwa na ngova.
