43019002	Nalyo vasikari valya vakaoka ureto lwa miinga vakammbika nrweny. Vakavemmbika na soori ya yeerya ifwani kinyanyari.
43019003	Vakasha isalala yoo usumanu nawo vakaamba, “Lwakwiidikira mangyi ya Vayuda!” Vakava vankapaa-ny ngyoyi.
43019004	Pilato kawuya kasomuka lyingyi na poo kavavia, “Akakau shamweende na kunu poo kundo mukai mukooye imanya nshaona kindo kya uvingo lwakwe-fo.”
43019005	Naasa Yesu kasomuka na efo poo aree ureto lulya lwa miinga na soori ilya ya yeerya ifwani kinyanyari. Nalyo kavavia, “Llen-te nndu yeu shaasa aamba!”
43019006	Naasa vakohani valya vaniini vasangyi na vasoro valya vawo va efo poo valollya vakakapa kyoorongye vashaambaa, “Endenkapye nsalaben! Endenkapye nsalaben!” Pilato kavavia, “Nkamareny yeni-te mundenkapya nsalabeny, mashika yeny nshilollye kindo kya uvingo kwakwe-fo.”
43019007	Vayuda vakaamba, “Yese mmbo lutiri ivavaso lya kikweru, na ivavaso yelyo kwakooya lyaindyo we kuti nafwe, kimmba akwaallwa Mwana wa Iruva we muni.”
43019008	Naasa elyi aita vaamba indo nawe kaengera iiryaa.
43019009	Kawuya yaanga lyingyi na efo mmba ya nshilyi wa Kaisari kavia Yesu, “A yewe ni nndu wakwi? Naasa Yesu nta nalanndouwe kindo.”
43019010	Pilato kammbia, “A mmbo kulaishi yeny shitiri ushilyi lwekuporomwa, shivetiri na ushilyi lwekukapya nsalabeny?”
43019011	Yesu kaallwa, “Nkutiri ushilyi neeny kwee kulaore kweeluningyo luuka efo uuwe-fo. Nkyo kyaniinga yeto ashirambikya kunu maakony afo kava mmbo awonisa ulyamari uniini nnu.”
43019012	Kipookyaany lyo Pilato karuuya mwaanya weemporomwa. Naasa Vayuda vakava vankapyaany kyoorongye veshaambaa, “Kwakooya kwamporomwa nkukee nndu akundani na Kaisari-fo. Wo nndu akwaallwa mangyi we muni mmbo alema Kaisari.”
43019013	Naasa elyi Pilato aita vaamba indo, nalyo kaamba, “Yesu narawa na efo poo.” Kashekaa rembo yoo kitiminy kya ushilyi efo kundo kuvaangwaa, “Mmbengye shaale mawe.” (Na irina lya vayo lya Kiebrania ni Gabata.)
43019014	Naasa na nkonu ulya ni nkonu weekudeesya ni kyeeri kya saa irindaru. Nalyo kavia Vayuda, “Llen-te mangyi yaany.”
43019015	Nawo vakakapa kyoorongye veshaambaa, “Muute yaa! Muute yaa! Kundenkapya nsalabeny.” Pilato kavavia, “A shitani shakapya mangyi yaany nsalabeny?” Vakohani valya vaniini vakaallwa, “Yese llutiri mangyi kulaore ni Kaisari-fo.”
43019016	Naasa kifikaa yoo nalyo kandenrambikya maakony awo nandekapyo nsalabeny. Vakaenda varie Yesu.
43019017	Nawe kaenda akurikye nsalaba wakwe muni. Kauka kulya muriny, kafika kundo kuvaangwaa ni kisharongony. Na irina lya Kiebrania ni Golgota.
43019018	Nafo vakankapya-fo nsalabeny. Vakansanda na vengi vavii, umwi taari yei na ungyi taari yei. Yesu kakaa yoo nnang'ani.
43019019	Naasa Pilato kareiya kiipoo kyeologya kakikapya yoo nsalabeu kwa uuwe. Na kikee kireiye-u indi: “YEU NI YESU WA NASARETI MANGYI YA VAYUDA.”
43019020	Naasa kipoo kilya Vayuda veengyi vakakisoma, mashika alya Yesu akapywa nsalabeu kukee kufii na kulya muriny. Na marero akee mareiye-u ni a Kiebrania na Kiroma na Kigriki.
43019021	Nalyo vakohani valya vaniini va Vayuda vakandevia Pilato, “Nta kulareiye kyeamba, Akee mangyi ya Vayuda-fo-te! Mmbo kureiyaa kyeamba, Nndu yeto aleamba, Yeny ni mangyi ya Vayuda!”
43019022	Pilato kaallwa, “Kindo shanndeiya ni ekyo shammereiya naasa.”
43019023	Naasa vasikari elyi vakapya Yesu nsalabeny vakaipoo soori takwe, vakaava fyenga fiina wo nsikari na kyenyga kyakwe, na soori ilya ya mwiiliny nnyitiri ufumu-fo mmbo ikee shooke ikarayo.
43019024	Nalyo vakaviana wo veni na veni, “Yeyo lulashe iirandwa-fo. Ndifony lwikapye kura ilolwa yeto immboyaa.” Naasa kyikaenda indo naambo-kilya kyikee kireiye kindeinukya kyeamba, “Valava soori takwa. Na masara akwa vakaakapya kura.” Naasa vasikari valya ni indo valetana.
43019025	Naasa kulya kufii na nsalaba ulya wa Yesu kusalalye-fo maye na mfwamaye wa maye na Maria ulya nka wa Kleopa na Maria wa kulya Magdala.
43019026	Nalyo Yesu alollya maye na ulya wa kiloshyony aitani nawe, kavia maye, “Nka, yeu mmbwe mwana wafo.”
43019027	Kawuya kavia ulya wa kiloshyony, “Yeu mmbwe mau!” " Nalyo kyeeri kilya kyenyi ulya wa kiloshyony kanrwaa na efo kyeny kwakwe.
43019028	Yoo numa Yesu kamanya fyoose mmbo fyammarisyo kundeinutyo filya fikee fireiye. Nalyo kaamba, " “Shaakuka.”
43019029	Naasa kukee kusimbite-u kiiya kitiri mfinyo utarang'aa. Nalyo vakaipoo kyoonga-mura vakakiishura mfinyo ulya utarang'aa, vakakivika irereny vakanrwaaya yoo kaniny.
43019030	Naasa Yesu ekina mfinyo ulya utarang'aa kaamba, “Kyamminutyo!” " Kainyika nrwe kakumba muu kafwa!
43019031	Naasa elyi nkonu wiifoo ukee wa ikudeesya Vayuda vakalollya nshi kisha miili ilya ilale kulya nsalabeu nkonu wa Sabato-fo. Na Sabato, yekee nkonu nniini deny. Vakandetereva Pilato mafua alya awo andefishwa-fishwa vavanuwa-fo. "
43019032	Nalyo vasikari valya vakasha nafo, vakafisha mafua a ulya wa mbee na ulya ungyi valya vakapyo nsalabeny ando amwi na Yesu.
43019033	Naasa vakafikya Yesu. Vakakooya ate ammefwa, nalyo valakimfishe-fishe-se mafua.
43019034	Indi vasikari valya ulya umwi kandosha yoo uvari na ifumu. Nang'u akataa mura usangyi na samu.
43019035	Na yeto akilolye kava mmbo avikau ukureekyi. Na ukureekyi lwakwe ni lwa dede. Nawe aishi ni kya dede, arera, na yeni-da naambo muvange ikusirya-u.
43019036	Mashika kyaniinga kikaenda indo ni kilya kikee kireiye naambo kindeinukya indo kyeamba, “Nashefishwaa nta ifua-fo.”
43019037	Kukavekaa-fo kindo kyikee kireiye kingyi kyeamba, Vakaa valollye yeto valenndosha na ifumu.
43019038	Naasa filya fimiira Yosefu wa kulya Arimataya kasha nawe akee wa kiloshyony kya Yesu kirika kimaruma kya iiryaa Vayuda. Kashetereva Pilato muumu wendevanwa mwiili ulya wa Yesu. Pilato kammbikya muumu. Naasa kasha nang'u kauvanwa.
43019039	Naasa Nikodemu kasha nafo ulya alensheya llya lya mbee kyeeri kya kio. Kasha arie manemane isasangyi na muya ya ngata ingyi ifwaamaa nafyo fyamaa kilo makumi araru indi.
43019040	Naasa vakaipoo mwiili ulya wa Yesu, vakauososya sooriny shaa teerika vakasanda na miri ilya ifwaamaa shaasa kikee mbuka ya Vayuda yerika vafu vawo.
43019041	Naasa na alya alekapyo nsalabeny kweifo nnda. Na efo nndeny ulya kweifo mbanga shiiya yerika ikee shidoshe iweny, nafo kulandearwa nndu-fo.
43019042	Nafo vakaara-fo Yesu mashika nkonu ulya mbwekudeesya wa Vayuda na mbanga ilya ikaveva kufii.
43020001	Naasa nkonu ulya wepooka mfungare elyi ngama nraasi na ivishi-vishi, nalyo Maria wa kulya Magdala kandefika alya mbangeny, kakooya iwe llya lyambutwa yoo mbangeny.
43020002	Nalyo kaenda sere kafika kulya kwa Simion Petro na nndu ulya wa kiloshyony Yesu eetani nawe. Kavavia, “Ate vamiipoo-fo Nndumi kulya mbangeny nta lulaishi kundo veenda imbika.”
43020003	Naasa Petro kakwipoo-fo na ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony. Vakawara shia yefika kulya mbangeny.
43020004	Vakaenda veerisha ve vavii. Nalyo ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony karisha uviny kailanya Petro, kapooka ifika alya mbangeny.
43020005	Nawe kaimaiya-fo akulemmyi kalollya soori tilya teerika tikee shivike-fo, nta nalaange nafo.
43020006	Naasa Simion Petro kafika-u ashe numa yakwe. Nalyo kaira na efo mbangeny. Kalollya soori tilya tikee shivike-fo.
43020007	Na kirami kilya ekee mfingyeny nrony, nakyo kilakee kivike ando amwi na soori tilya teerika, kikee kyososye ando engyi kikakaa kyaanya kya vayo.
43020008	Nalyo na ulya ungyi wa kiloshyony kaveiira nafo ulya alepooka ifika alya mbangeny. Kalollya kakusirya-u.
43020009	Mashika valendeitumuso kilya kikee kireiye kyeamba, “Mmbo kikee kirummbwe nanderuka auka kwa vafu.”
43020010	Naasa valya vakiloshyony vakakwiipoo-fo vakawuya na kyenyy.
43020011	Naasa Maria karewa asalali yoo usumanu na mbanga ilya yoo kipoo ashiiyaa. Naasa elyi eefo ashiiyaa kakulema kaimaiya efo mbangeny.
43020012	Kalollya vasu va Iruva vavii varee soori timikamikaa vakee-fo rembo. Ulya umwi kakaa yoo kinrony na ungi kimarendeny alya ando mwiili ulya wa Yesu wekee mwaare.
43020013	Nawo vakammbia, “A yewe nka nkikyi kwiiyaa?” Kavavia, “Mmbo vamipoo-fo Nndumi ulya wakwa. Neeny nta shilamanyi kundo vambika!”
43020014	Ekyaamba indo kainduka kalla numa kalolya Yesu asalali-u nta nalamanyi ni Yesu.
43020015	Yesu kammbia, “A nkikyi elyi kukeiya? Mmbi mai kukennduuya?” Nawe kakummbwa kulakooye ni mwiremya nnda ulya. Kammbia, “Nndumi kwakooya ni yewe kwamwipoo-fo, shiviany kundo kwaenda imbika neeny shyeende imoondwa-fo.”
43020016	Yesu kammbia, “Maria-ro!” Nawe kainduka kammbia, kwa Kiebrania, “Raboni!” Nakyo mmbo kyaamba, “Llosha wakwa!”
43020017	Yesu kammbia, “Nta kulashitire-fo. Shamashika shilanderwa na efo kwa Nde. Mmbo kushendaa kwa vanavama vakwa kundevavia, shiifo shirwaa neefo kwa Nde-yaakwa, nawe ni Nde waany, efo kwa Iruva wakwa nawe na Iruva waany.”
43020018	Maria wa kulya Magdala kaenda kanderuuya valya vakiloshyony kavavia, “Mmbo shallollya Nndumi.” " Kavewoongoya na kilya ammbia.
43020019	Naasa nkonu ulya mweni-da ukee nkonu wepooka mfungare elyi nkwaany na myaango yanrayo ya iira na alya vakiloshyony vakuumbye mashika elyi veereiye Vayuda, nalyo Yesu kasha nang'u kasalala yoo nnang'ani yaawo kavavia, " “Sindeny na Ufoo!”
43020020	Amaamba indo kawoora maako alya akwe na uvari lulya lwakwe. Nalyo valya vakiloshyony vakafura elyi valolya Nndumi.
43020021	Karera lya kavii kavavia, “Sindeny na ufoo, Shaasa Nde aleshiruma yeny, neeny ni kiwo-da shavemuruma yeni.”
43020022	Arera indo kavavia, “Waryeny Mumuyo Mweele.
43020023	Vandu mwambafwaaya ulyamari lwawo, vamaifwaayo. Na vandu mwambavikya ishingo kya ulyamari, lwawo, vammaa ivikyo ishingo.”
43020024	Naasa umwi wa vakiloshyony ni Toma, na irina lyakwe lya kavii avaangwaa Wamaasa, nawe nalaiyo ando amwi nawo kyeeri kilya Yesu alesha nang'u.
43020025	Naasa vakiloshyony valya vengyi vakandemoongoya, vakammbia, “Lwallolya Nndumi!” Nawe kavavia, “Shanra shilalolya ngoru ta misumari ilya efo maakony akwe, nepaana ngoru ta misumari na nni, nepaana uvari lwakwe na woko, yeny nshishekusiryaa-u-fo.”
43020026	Naasa kukaira-u mikonu nyanya na valya vakiloshyony vakee lyingyi efo mmba na Toma aveiyo ando amwi nawo. Yesu kasha nang'u, na myaango ikee miraye, kashesalala yoo nnang'ani kaamba, “Sindeny na ufoo.”
43020027	Kawuya kavia Toma, “Kyeende nni wafo na yaa kulole maako akwa kuveende na woko lwafo kupaani nalo uvari lwakwa naambo kulave mwira ikusirya-u! Vaany nndu mwikunda ikusirya-u.”
43020028	Toma kaallwa kammbia, “Nndumi wakwa na Iruva wakwa!”
43020029	Yesu kammbia, “Kwanshilollya nkyo kyakuniinga kwakusirya-u, ngoma vandu vakusirya-u valalollya.”
43020030	Naasa kukavekaa-fo na findo fingyi fiingyi Yesu aletana fyeyoora ngyende valya vakiloshyony valollye. Nafyo filakee fireiye fikavikwa kunu kitabuny ekyi-fo.
43020031	Indi filereiyo ni efi fyeni naambo mukooye iva vandu vavangyi ikusirya na Yesu mmbo akee Kristo we Mwana wa Iruva na efo kikusiryony ekyo mukooye-fo muu mukutire na irina lyakwe.
43021001	Naasa elyi numa ya vayo Yesu kawuya ikoora lyingyi na valya vakiloshyony vakee kulya waambeu lwa yeeve ilya ya Galilaya. Na shaasa alekoora nawo kyikee indi.
43021002	Ni Simion Petro vekee ando amwi na Toma ulya avaangwa Wamaasa na Natanaeli wa kulya Kana ya kulya Galilaya, na vana valya va Sebedayo na vengyi-se vavii va efo kiloshyony kyakwe.
43021003	Simon Petro kavavia, “Nsheendaany indereiya makunga.” Vakammbia, “Neese-da lusheendaa neewe.” Vakakwiipoo vakasaama na efo ngalaveny. Nalyo kio kilya valatire nta kindo.
43021004	Naasa kwamfika kwiikyaa, Yesu kashesalala alya waambeu, indi valya vakiloshyony valamanyi ni Yesu.
43021005	Nalyo Yesu kavavia, “Nyira fivana a mmbo mulatiri kindo kyelya?” Vakammbia, “Oode mbee!”
43021006	Kavavia, “Oloteny mireiyo yoo taari ya woko usha lwa ngalava yeyo. Mmbo mushewonisaa!” Nalyo vakoolota-fo. Nawo valakiidimi-se yoomwa vaalutye uuwe kimaruma kya makunga ammba kilula.
43021007	Nalyo ulya wa kiloshyony Yesu aitani nawe kavia Petro, “Ate ni Nndumi!” Naasa Simon Petro ekiita ni Nndumi kakufinga soori ya uuwe, mashika mmbo eree kirami tupu. Kakoolota efo yeeveny.
43021008	Naasa vakiloshyony valya vengyi vakasha variwa ni ngalava ilya mashika mmbeekee kwaasha na alya waambeu-fo. Ando aiyo ni ando sha meta iyana. Vakasha veshomwaa nreiyo ulya wishwe makunga.
43021009	Naasa vakooloka-fo vakafika alya wambeu vakalollya kwikee kuvike muro wa makaa na ikunga lyikee ideerye-u na nkate.
43021010	Yesu kavavia, “Makunga yoo mwareiya ulaalu indi enden-fo maata!”
43021011	Petro kaalukya-fo kaalutya nreiyo ulya na efo wambeu. Nato wishe makunga maniini afikye iyana na makumi araanu na araru. Nang'u Lla ndesa akee meengyi indo, nreiyo ulya ularanduke.
43021012	Yesu kavavia, “Oshony-te mushetuka!” " Naasa valya vakiloshyony nta kulakae-fo nndu akarya immbesa, “A yewe ni yewe vi?” Ni elyi vemmanya ni Nndumi.
43021013	Yesu kasha nau, kaipoo nkate ulya. Kavaniingya, na ikunga lyilya ni kiwo-da.
43021014	Nalyo lyikava lya kararu Yesu alekoora na valya vakiloshyony elyi ammeruka auka kwa vafu.
43021015	Naasa elyi vammeetuka, Yesu kavia Simon Petro, " “Simion wa Yohane kushikundye ngota yeva?” Nawe kaamba, “Ee-da Nndumi, yewe kuveishi shikukundye!” Kammbia, “Endeesa ngurana takwa.”
43021016	Kawuya kammbia lyingyi lya kavii, “Simion wa Yohane kushikundye ndesa?” Nawe kammbia, “Ee-da Nndumi. Yewe kuveishi yeny shikukundye.” Kammbia, “Endeesa moonri akwa.”
43021017	Kammbia lya kararu, “Simion wa Yohane kushikunndye?” Petro kafulukyo elyi ammbia lya kararu, kushikunndye? Nalyo Petro kammbia, “Nndumi mmbo kwiishi findo fyoose, kwavemanya-da mmbo shikukundye.” Yesu kammbia, “Endeesa moonri akwa.”
43021018	Ni dede kya dede shakuvia, Elyi kwekee nkoo mmbo kuleva mwikufinga yoo mwiininy kumuni, na kundo kwakunda kwavekweengya-da. Indi elyi kuvaa mmiku mmbo kushorwaa maako afo na ungyi nakufinge yoo mwiininy nakurwaa kundo kulakundye.
43021019	Na kyaniinga karera indo ni kya yoolongya ufu akaa nawoni nang'anise nalo Iruva mmbo lushevaa lwa ngata ingai. Nalyo elyi amaamba indo kammbia, shilatyaany.
43021020	Petro kainduka kalollya ulya wa kiloshyony ulya Yesu aitani nawe eefo ashaa yoo numa, (nawe mmbwe ulya alekaa rembo yoo uvariny lwakwe llya valelya kilaayo kilya kaamba, “Nndumi a ni vi akuringyaa?”)
43021021	Naasa elyi Petro alollya nndu yeto kavia Yesu, “Nndumi a yeu kyakwe ni inda?”
43021022	Yesu kaamba, “Kwakooya shakunda yeu nakae-fo shitani shawuya a ekyo kikuwore ki yewe? Yewe shilatya-da!”
43021023	Naasa nng'u manuuna alepookya akakwaana efo kwa vana yewo va nka kyeamba nndu yeu wa kiloshyony nnyaafwaa-fo. Na Yesu nnyalembia nnyafwa-fo mmbo alemmbia, shakunda yeu nakae-fo shitani shawuya a ekyo kikuwore ki yewe.
43021024	Naasa yeto mmbwe nndu wa kiloshyony avikye-u ukureeki kya mbony yeti kavetireiya. Neese lukamanya na nshushwa sheelyi ukureeki lwakwe mmbo lukee lwa dede.
43021025	Naasa kukavekaa-fo na findo fingyi fiingyi Yesu aletana. Nafyo kwee fyeereiyoo fyoose, shikusara ulana elu llweshiidimaa itira fitabu efyo fyereiywaa-fo.
44001001	Teofilo wakwa mmbee, kitabu kilya kya mbee shilekireiya mmbo kitiri mbony ta Yesu kya filya alepooka itana na ilosha fyoose,
44001002	kutani kwafika nkonu ulya aleipowa na uwe. Nawe ammaa ivavasya vakiloshyony vakwe kwi shia ya Mumuyo Mweele valya emmbasauwa,
44001003	valya alekoora nawo na shia shiingi, kyeeri alemaa ilyiswa ukiva, vakamanya akee na muu, kakoora nawo ando a mikonu makumi aana, neerera filya fikwaani na umangyi lwa Iruva.
44001004	Kyeeri alekwaanannya nawo mmbo alevavasa valasheuka Yerusalemu, lyo vavereye mbele kyaasa kya Nde, kilya valeita mbony ta vayo kwakwe.
44001005	Kyeyaamba sheelyi Yohane we mmura alebatisa nato; kyaindi yeni mmbo mushebatiswaa na Mumuyo Mweele numa ya mikonu yei myaangu.
44001006	Naasa kyeeri valekwaananya nawe vakammbesa veshambaa, “Ale Nndumi, kyeeri eki nkyo kusheviryaa Vaisraeli umangi?”
44001007	Nawe kavavia. “Nshi kindo kyany imanya meendi na fyeeri efyo Nde avikye efo ushilyiny lwakwe muni-fo.
44001008	Lyo mmbo mushewaryaa finya, elyi Mumuyo Mweele ashemusokyaa neeni mushevaa vakureeki vakwa kunu Yerusalemu, na Yudaya koose, na Samaria, na kufike kishingony kya ulana.”
44001009	Elyi amaa irera indo, velollye indi, Yesu kaipowa na uwe ifishi lyikammbwarya kooka misony awo.
44001010	Kyeeri vekeengera ilola efo uwe iruveeu, llyo ekeerwa na uwe, pari pari ekakava vasero vavii varee soori shaa vakasalala kufii nawo,
44001011	vakaamba, “Yeni vandu va Galilaya a niinda elyi mwasalala mwiilolaa iruveeu? Yesu yeu aroswa na iruveeu auka kwany, mmbo ashewuyaa lyingyi indo shaasa mwallollya eerwaa na iruveeu.”
44001012	Naasa vakawuya na Yerusalemu vauka alya ifumbuny lyevangwaa lya Miseituni, lyikee kufii na Yerusalemu, ando a kirambo kyaangu.
44001013	Kyeeri valefika vakasaama na kai, nawo ni Petro, Yohane, Yakobo, Andrea, Filipo na Toma, Bartolomayo, Matayo, Yakobo wa Alfayo, Simon Selote na Yuda wa Yakobo.
44001014	Yeva woose mmbo vekee ando amwi veterevaa na nrima umwi nsi, ando amwi nawo veifo vaka valya Maria maye wa Yesu na vana va maye.
44001015	Mikonu yeyo Petro kasalala yoo vakiloshyony yewo vekai (yeekena lyawo nsha iyana na makumi avii indi) kaamba,
44001016	“Nyira, kilesenya indo mareiyo neenutyo, shaasa Mumuyo Mweele alerera kasha na kana ka Davidi. Kya mbony ta Yuda, yeto aletetera yewo valetira Yesu.
44001017	Mashika elyi ekee ando amwi neese, kawonisa urundi elu.”
44001018	(“Naasa nndu yeu mmbo aleura irema na fesa ya ulembi; nawe kawa uviny kariika ndeu maala akasomuka.
44001019	Vandu woose yewo vekee Yerusalemu vakamanya; na irema lyilya lyikafishyo Akeldama ni kishomu kyawo kyeyaamba, ni irema lya samu.”)
44001020	Mashika niindo kikee kireiye efo kitabuny kya Saburi: Ando akwe na kuve nrapu nta kulave nndu ashekaa-u lyingi nndu ungyi nashesalala ando akwe.
44001021	Naasa veefo vandu yewo vekee neese kyeeri kyoose ekyo Nndumi ekee neese, eshaangaa neesomuka,
44001022	kupookya ubatiso lwa Yohane, kufike nkonu ulya aleipowa kweru karwa na uwe, kikooye umwi waawo nave nkureeki wa iruka lyakwe ando amwi neese.
44001023	Vakavika-u vandu vavii, Yosefu wa Barsaba, ao Yusto, na Matiya.
44001024	Naasa vakatereva, vakaamba, “Woi Nndumi, yewe kwiishi mirima ya vandu woose, loore ni ungau nnang'ani ya yeva vavii,
44001025	naambo nakae kunu urundiny yelu na nruminy yei natire ando a Yuda.”
44001026	Vakakapa kura; nayo ikawoya Matiya, nawe kasanga ando amwi na vakiloshyony valya ikumi na umwi.
44002001	Naasa kwikifika nkonu ulya wa Pentekoste vakiloshyony woose mmbo vekee ando amwi.
44002002	Kukaitiwa yoona iniini lya uraato lwa finya, nalo lukaishwa kulya mmba kundo vekai.
44002003	Vakasheyo ni findo fivakye fipalapala fya muro fikwaavye-avye fikakaya wo umwi wa valya veiyo.
44002004	Woose vakaishurwa Mumuyo Mweele, vakapooka irera na fishomu fyeny, shaasa Mumuyo alevasimba irera.
44002005	Neefo Yerusalemu kweefo Vayuda, vandu veereiye Iruva, nawo vaukye wo ando ulaniny.
44002006	Naasa kyeeri yoona lyilya lyileitiwa nkuka ulya wa vandu ukasavaa, vakakusanyirya, mashika llya valevaita wo umwi ereraa kishomu kyakwe muni.
44002007	Vakafulukyo nnu, vakaviana, “A nkyelola, yeva vakerera woose nshi Vagalilaya?
44002008	A mmbo kyava indaany elyi wo umwi weeru eeta kishomu kyakwe ekyo awonikye nakyo?
44002009	Vaparti na Vaamedi na Vailami, neewo vakee Mesopotamia, na Yudaya na yewo vakaa Kapadokia, Ponto na Asia,
44002010	Frigia na Pamfilia, Misri na va taari ta Libia kulya kufii na Krene, na veny yewo vaukye Rome, wo Vayuda na vandu veeshi Iruva,
44002011	na Vakrete-da na Vaarabu; yeva woose mmbo lwaita veereraa na fishomu fyeru luveni mbony ta mashora maniini a Iruva.”
44002012	Vakafulukyo deny woose neetirwa nnyinyira, vakaamba, “A nkyoki eki nyira vandu?
44002013	Kukakaa-fo na vengyi vamina, vakaamba, ‘Mmbo vannangwa mmbwari wa kyaanka.’ “
44002014	Lyo Petro kasalala ando amwi na valya ikumi na umwi, kaonisa unyanga kaamba, “Eni vandu va Yudaya, neeni moose va Yerusalemu, manyiny kindo ekyi, mwaranye marero akwa,
44002015	Nshi shaasa mukusarye-fo; vandu yeva mmbanangyo-fo, mashika ulaalu ni saa isaru ta ngama;
44002016	kyaindi kindo ekyi ni kilya kyikee kirere na kana ka nkisuku Yoeli kyeamba,
44002017	‘Mmbo kyishevaa mikonu yeyo yeefurumya, ni Iruva aamba, mmbo nshepusuyaa vandu woose Mumuyo wakwa, na vana vany va womi na va kyeny, vasheambaa fisuku, na vana vakoo vashelolyaa ngyende, na vamiku vasheoryaa moorya.
44002018	Yee, na kyeeri yekyo nshepusuyaa varundi wakwa, womi na vaka, Mumuyo wakwa, nawo vasheavuyaa fisuku.
44002019	Neeny nshoraa ngyende efo nginiiu, neefo urukeny si, samu na muro, na nrike wa nsu.
44002020	Nkyeere mmbo ushevaa ireema, na mwiiri uve samu, kulaore nkonu ulya wa Nndumi wansha, ukee nniini nato ukee kuti ushe.
44002021	Neeto moose ashesendaa irina lya Nndumi, mmbwe ashekirwaa.’ “
44002022	“Yeni vandu va Israeli, aranyeny marero yaa; Yesu wa Nasareti, nndu ulya Iruva amoora paa kyany na shia ya ngyende na findo filandelolyo lyingi, Iruva kafitana kwany na woko lwakwe, shaasa yeni muveni mwiishi.
44002023	Shaasa Iruva alekunda immbika kwany, shaasa eekundye uka elyo mbee, mukanrambikya vandu vakasha vakankapya nsalabeny, mmukambwaa.
44002024	Mmbwe Iruva alenduta, kafisha mwinga wa ufu, mashika lluleidima intira-fo.
44002025	Mashika Davidi alerera mbony takwe kaamba, ‘Shilelollya Nndumi mbee yakwe wo nkonu, mashika elyi akee taari ya woko lwakwa usha, shilashesinga-singa.
44002026	Naasany nrima wakwa ukasennyo, shakapa nndoro, neeny nshevaa nndu mwiivika nsia.
44002027	Mashika nnyasheraa nrima wakwa uretiny-fo. Nta nkusheningyaa mweele wafo nalyamarike-fo.
44002028	Mmbo kuleshoora shia ya muuny kisangu kyafo kisheshiningaa ifura.’ “
44002029	“Nyira wanavama, shisaryeny shirere nookaari yaa mbee yaany, mbony ta nde weeru nniini Davidi, kyeamba mmbo alefwa karikwa, na kifu kyakwe kiiyo fika inu.
44002030	Naasa kimmba akee nkisuku eishi sheelyi Iruva mmbo alelyiiya mboo, sheelyi umwi wa ewo veshaukaa efo ufyariny lwakwe ashekaa yoo kitiminy kyakwe kya umangyi.
44002031	Nawe muni shaasa alesongwa ilolya efyi fyoose, kasenda mbony ta iruka lya Kristo, kyeamba ufu llulentira-fo, nta mwili wakwe mmbulelyamarika-fo.
44002032	Yesu yeto Iruva mmbo alenduta neese mmbo lukee vakureeki vakwe.
44002033	Naasa we ekimaa isaamiswa fika woko usha lwa Iruva, na iwarya kwa Nde kyaasa kilya kya Mumuyo mweele, mmbo alepuswa simbo yei muilollye ulaalu na iita.
44002034	Mashika Davidi muni nnyalensaama iruveeu-fo, lyo kaamba, ‘Nndumi mmbo alevia Nndumi wakwa, salala yewe taari ya woko lwakwa usha,
44002035	kutani shaara vakiduva vafo yoo si ya marende afo.’
44002036	Naasany mmba shoose ya Israeli imanyi paa sheelyi Iruva mmbo alevika Yesu yeto mulenkapya nsalabeu nave Nndumi na Kristo.”
44002037	Kyeeri valeita indo vakaokywa mirima yaawo, vakavia Petro na Varumi valya vengyi, “A lukatana inda vanavama veru?”
44002038	Petro kavavia, kuryeny mundebatiswa wo nndu na irina lya Yesu Kristo, muwoni isaryo ngyulyamari tany, naambo muwoni simbo ya Mumuyo Mweele.
44002039	Mashika kyaasa ekyi ni kimaruma kyany, na vana vany, na kwa yewo vakee kwaasha, neewo woose vashevaangwa ni Iruva Nndumi weeru vansheye.
44002040	Kavautya ukureeki evaviaa findo fiingyi evaikyimbaa, kavavia, kwiiseny na irika elyi lya umini.
44002041	Valya valeirikya marero akwe vakabatiswa, na nkonu eto vakaengerekau vandu sha fiku firaru indi.
44002042	Vakatira ufundo lwa Varumi valya, neekaa ando amwi, neefisha nkate, neetereva.
44002043	Wo nndu katirwa mbwerei, ngyende shiingyi tikatanwa ni Varumi.
44002044	Na yewo woose valekusirya-u vekee ando amwi, vakasanda masaa awo ando amwi.
44002045	Vakakumba masaa awo na findo fyawo vetiri, na yaavya wo nndu shaasa ekee nting'i.
44002046	Wo nkonu mmbo valekaa kulya mmba ya Iruva, vekee na nrima umwi nsi vakalya shoonga mmba kwi mmba, vakalya shoonga tawo na ifura na nrima umwi nsi,
44002047	vakarumisha Iruva, vakavesennya vandu woose. Nndumi kafumbuta yeekena lya valya veeke ikirwa wo nkonu.
44003001	Nkonu umwi Petro na Yohane mmbo vekeenda mmba ya Iruva indetereva, kyeeri kya saa kyeenda.
44003002	Na nndu umwi ekee kitongororo malungo ukya iwonika eeriwa mmbandu, veembikaa yoo mwangony uvaangwaa “Nsha” wa mmba ya Iruva wo nkonu, naambo natereve ngarami kwa vandu yewo vakeanga kulya mmba.
44003003	Nndu yeu kyeeri alelollya Petro na Yohane veshangaa na mmba ya Iruva katereva vanninge kindo.
44003004	Petro na Yohane vakambikya miso swaa, vakammbia, “Lulole yese.”
44003005	Kavalola, evikye nsia mmbo awonisaa kindo kwawo.
44003006	Kyaindi Petro kammbia, “Yeny nshitiri fesa nta saabu-fo lyo ekyo shitiri nkyo nkuningaa, Na irina lya Yesu wa Nasareti, salala kweenda.”
44003007	Kantira woko usha kamwipoo, ngyayo takwe na malungo akwe akavanga.
44003008	Kakupoo shu kasalala, kapooka yeenda kaanga mmba ya Iruva eriani nawo, keenda eshongashongaa erumishaa Iruva.
44003009	Vandu woose vakalollya shaasa ekeenda erumishaa Iruva.
44003010	Vakamanya mmbwe ulya ekee alya mwangony “Nsha” eterevaa, vakasongololo neefulukyo kyeefyo filentanyikya .
44003011	Naasa kyeeri eriani na Petro na Yohane, vandu woose vakakuumbya yoo vakai yoo kari kavangwa ni “Kari ka Solmoni,” vakafulukyo deny.
44003012	Petro ekyilollya indo kavavia, “Eni Vaisraeli, Nkyiki elyi mwafulukyo nkya efi, mukaveluvikya miso yese, sheelyi ni yese na finya yeeru lweedimisya nayo nndu yeu neende, ao na usha lweru yese?
44003013	Iruva wa Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo, Iruva wa vande veru mmbo aleng'anisa nsero wakwe Yesu, neeni mukandiingya neekana mbee ya Pilato, llya emmaa irummbwa nalekeyo.
44003014	Neeni mukakana Mweele yeto, muni usumanu yeto, mukatereva muningyo mwiwaa;
44003015	mukawaa Muni muu yeto, na mmbwe Iruva alenduta auka kwa vafu, neese lukee vakureeki vakwe.
44003016	Kimaruma kyekusirya irina lyakwe, irina lyakwe llyo lyaninga nndu yeu mumwiishi, finya na kikusiryo ekyo kyenkusirya nkyo kyaninga nndu yeu muu shaasa mullolye yaa mbee yaany.
44003017	Naasany, ulaalu vanavama, shiishi mmbo muletana efi kimaruma kya ilemwa imanya-da, shaasa na vasongoru vany valetana.
44003018	Kyaindi mbony tilya Iruva uka kasha alevambisa na kana ka vakisuku vakwe woose, kyeamba Kristo wakwe ashelyiswaa ukiva, mmbo aleinutyo indo.
44003019	Kuryeeny-te, mwiinduke, naambo ngyulyamari tany tiutwa, fishe fyeeri fyeellelisyo kimaruma kya Nndumi,
44003020	narumi Kristo Yesu akee mmbike uka elyo mbee,
44003021	kyikasenya nawaryo iruveeu kutani kwasha fyeeri fiiya fya findo fyoose ivikwa wiiya, fikee firere ni Iruva na kana ka vakisuku vakwe veele uka mapookyony a ulana.
44003022	Mashika dede Mose aleamba sheeli, Nndumi waany ashemweengye nkisuku, efo ufyariny lwany, sha yeny, mwaranyiny we efyo fyoose ashemuviaa.
44003023	Na wo nndu moose yeto araa nalaaranya nkisuku yeto mmbo asherumatwaa na ilakaniswaa na vandu vakwe.
44003024	Yee, na vakisuku woose pookya Samweli na valya va numa yakwe, woose yewo, mmbo valeawuya mbony ta mikonu yei.”
44003025	Yeni mmbo mukee vana va vakisuku na va fyaasa efyo, Iruva alevika na vande yewo vany, llya alevia Abrahamu, “Efo ufyariny lwafo mfo ngyufyari toose ta ulana tishevikywaa mbora.
44003026	Iruva, llya alemaa iruta nsero wakwe Yesu, mmbo alesongwa inruma kwany, namulyimyi mbora eshiitaa maravi moose kwaasha neeni.”
44004001	Kyeeri vekee irera na vandu yewo, makohani na nsongoru wa mmba ya Iruva na Vasadukayo vakavasheya,
44004002	vakaereve nnu kimaruma kya elyi vakeelosha vandu na ivambisa mbony ta iruka lya Yesu auka kwa vafu.
44004003	Vakavatira vakavarwaa kifingyony fika elyi lya ngama; mashika kwemmeva nkwaany.
44004004	Llyo veengyi nnang'ani ya valya valeita irero elyo vakakusirya-u, na yekena lya vomi veni lyikafikya fiku firaanu.
44004005	Elyi lya ngama vasongoru na vamiku na vaarya va fitabu vakakusanyirya alya Yerusalemu,
44004006	na Anasi Nkohani nniini, na Kayafa-da na Yohane na Iskanda, na woose valya vekee va kwa Nkohani nniini.
44004007	Kyeeri valevasaleesa yoo nnang'ani, vakavavesa, Ni finya-ki na ni kwa irina lya vi mwatana nalyo yefi?
44004008	Naasa Petro, eishwe Mumuyo Mweele, kavavia, “Yeni vaniini va vandu na vamiku va Israeli,
44004009	kwakooya lwaveswa inu mbony ta kindo kisha nndu ulya mfwafwa aletanywa, na shaasa aleshiiswa,
44004010	manyiny yeni moose na vandu woose va Israeli sheelyi ni irina lya Yesu wa Nasareti, ulya yeni mulenkabya nsalabeeu, na Iruva kanduta kooka kwa vafu, na irina elyo nndu yeu mmbo aselelyi yaa mbee yaany ekee nsha indi.
44004011	We mmbwe iwe elyo lyikee iile ni veetana mmba, nalyo mmbo lyamevikwa lyive iwe lya ndumba.
44004012	Nta nkwiifo ukiro kwa ungyi nta umwi-fo, mashika nkwiifo irina lyingyi kwasi ya ngina vandu vakee vaniinge vakirwa llyo-fo.”
44004013	Naasa kyeeri valelollya ukaari lwa Petro na Yohane, neevamanya nshi vandu vasommyi nnu, valatiri urango, vakafulukywa, vakamanya mmbo vekee na Yesu.
44004014	Na vekilollya nndu aleshiiswa esalalyi ando amwi nawo mbalekiidima irera-fo.
44004015	Vakavaumbuta alya ikwaanuny lilya, numa vakarera wo veni na veni,
44004016	vakaamba, “Lukatannya inda vandu yeva? Mashika vandu woose vakee Yerusalemu mmbo valelollya ni wende uniini luletano mmbo, nta llushidimaa ilema-fo.
44004017	Llyo naambo kindo ekyi kilashekwaana vanduny, luvaimi deny neeverese valasherera lyingyi na nndu moose kwa irina elyi-fo.”
44004018	Vakavavaanga, vakavaima deny valashelosha-se na irina lya Yesu.
44004019	Petro na Yohane vakavavia, “Kwakooya ni usumanu mbee ya Iruva imwaaranya yeni ngota yaaranya Iruva, rumbweny yeni muveni;
44004020	mashika yese llushidimaa ira lulaamba mbony eto lulelollya na itiita-fo.” "
44004021	Naasa vekimaa ivaerese lyingyi vakavaporomwa valalollye kimaruma kyevakapa, nyelyi valeereya vandu mashika vandu woose mmbo vekee irumisha Iruva kya efyo fyoose filetanyika.
44004022	Mashika nndu ulya aletannywa wende elu etiri myaaka makumi aana.
44004023	Llya valemaa iporomuwa, vakaenda kwa vandu vawo, vakavavia mbony toose tilya valevio ni vaniini va makohani na vamiku.
44004024	Nawo vekiita, vakaonisya Iruva ngyunyanga tawo na nrima umwi nsi, vakaamba, " “Nndumi ni yewe Iruva, nnyewe kutannyi iruveeu na ulana na yeeve na fyoose yefyo fiifo;
44004025	kwi Mumuyo Mweele mmbo kulerera na kana ka ndeye weeru Davidi we nsero wafo kwaamba, ‘Ni inda vandu va masanga vakeyuushana. Na vandu va ngyufyari ta vandu vakakusara-sara ruu.
44004026	Vamangyi va ulana vankudeesya na vasongoru vamfisha kyama. Uwe ya Nndumi na uwe ya Kristo wakwe.’ “
44004027	“Mashika ni dede, Herode na Pontio Pilato ando amwi na vandu va masanga na vandu va Israeli mmbo valekusanyirya yaa muriny yeu kimaruma kya nsero wafo mweele Yesu, yeto kulemwaamba mafura,
44004028	naambo vatani fyoose efyo woko lwafo na wiidimi lwafo lwendeesya uka elyo mbee fitanyike.
44004029	Naasa, woi Nndumi ulaalu kulole wiitiki elo lwawo, kwidimisye mashinga afo yaamba irero lyafo na ukaari,
44004030	kuveorwa woko lwafo kushiise, ngyende na myoorye fitanyike na irina lya Mwana wafo Yesu.” "
44004031	Vekimaa itereva Iruva, ando alya vekai kukarinyiswa, woose vakaishurwa Mumuyo Mweele, vakaamba irero lya Iruva na ukaari.
44004032	Na ironda elyo lya vandu va kikusiryo vakatira nrima umwi nsi na ngoo imwi nta kulakae-fo nndu aamba kindo kyoose atiri nkyakwe muni; kyaindi findo fyoose vakaallwa fyawo woose.
44004033	Na Varumi valya vakauta ukureekyi lwa iruka lya Yesu na finya shiniini, na mbora shiingyi tikakaa nawo woose. "
44004034	Nta nkulekaafo nndu umwi waawo aleting'wa nkindo; mashika woose yewo vetiri marema ao mmba mmbo valekumba, vakeende uuru lwa vayo;
44004035	vakaniingya vakiloshony, wo nndu kaniingwa-u shaasa eekunndye.
44004036	Na Yosefu ulya Llevi vakiloshyony valemfishya Barnaba, (kyeamba, “Nmwana wa Iviirya Muu.”) kwawo ni Kipro,
44004037	etiri irema kalyikumba, keengye valya vakiloshyony fesa.
44005001	Kyaindi nndu umwi evangwaa Anania, ando amwi na nkaakwe Safira, mmbo ekumba masaa,
44005002	kasuruma kyenga kya wuuru lwa vayo, na nkaakwe nawe kamanya ekyo, keende kyenga ekyo kakyiniingya Varumi ewo.
44005003	Petro kavia Anania, “Nkyiki elyi mmbishwa akaya nrima wafo kwavia Mumuyo Mweele wongo, kwasuruma kirisi kyenga kya wuuru lwa irema?
44005004	Kyeeri kyekee maakony afo kyekee-se kyafo? Na kyeeri ekyo kyemmaa ikumbwa, fesa ta vayo tekee-se ushilyiny lwafo? Mmbo kileva inda kwakunda itana kindo kya ngata yeyo? Nshi nndu wa vandu kulellemba-fo, ni Iruva.”
44005005	Anania ekiita marero yoo kawa si kafwa. Weerei uniini lukatira vandu woose valeita mbony yei.
44005006	Vasoro vakakwiipoo vakammbika sanda, vakansomuta vakandendika.
44005007	Kyikyisia saa isaru numa nka nawe kasha, nalaishi kindo kyantanyika.
44005008	Petro kammbesa, “Nkyeshivia, Nrema ilya mmbo mulekumba kwa wuuru elo dede?” Kaamba, “Yee, nkwa wuuru yelo.”
44005009	Petro kammbia, “A mmbo kileva inda mukasanga amwi ilemba Mumuyo wa Nndumi? Lola-te, valya valerika mmi wafo vakuvereye mwaangony, nawo vakusomutaa neewe.”
44005010	Llya yeni nawe kawa si yoo marendeny akwe kafwa; vasoro valya vakaanga vakakooya ammaa ifwa, vakansomuta, vakandika ando amwi na mmi wakwe.
44005011	Weerei uniini lukatira Siri shoose na vandu woose valeita mbony yeti.
44005012	Maakony a vakiloshyony tikatanyika ngyende na findo fyeyaawuta fingyi vanduny; nawo woose vakakaa na nrima umwi nsi efo kariny ka Solomon.
44005013	Neewo veengyi woose nkwifoo nndu alekarya yeenda nawofo, kuuta ivarumisha tupu.
44005014	Naasa valya valekusirya Nndumi vakaengereka, veengyi vomi na vaka;
44005015	kutani vandu vasomuta vandu vawo valoe efo shia velele firaany, naambo Petro eshiraa, naakwa ni kirishe kyakwe kipaani umwi waawo.
44005016	Nalyo maronda a vandu va miri ilya ikee kufii na Yerusalemu vakakusanyirya, vakeende vandu valoe, na valya vetirwa mmimuyo mikasha, nawo woose vakashiiswa.
44005017	Nkohani nniini ando amwi na vandu vakwe, (yewo mmbo yewo va kyama kya Vasadukayo), vakaishwa nyashi,
44005018	vakashetira Varumi yewo vakavavika kifingyony.
44005019	Kyaindi Nsu wa Nndumi karua myaango ya kifingyony elyi kio kavasomuta-fo, kavavia,
44005020	“Endeny salaleny mmba ya Iruva muvie vandu mbony ta Muu yeu.”
44005021	Nawo vekiita indo vakaenda mmba ya Iruva nraasi, vakapooka ilosha. Nkohani Nniini ando amwi na vandu vakwe vakasanyirya vandu va ikwaanuny na vamiku va vana va Israeli vakaruma vandu kulya kifingyony naambo vavaende.
44005022	Kyeeri varundi vawo valefika-fo mbalevakooya-fo, vakawuya vavavie mbony,
44005023	vakaamba, “Kifingyo nkiraye nisha, na varingyi vesalalyi mwaangony; lyo kyeeri lwarua llwakoyafo nta ndu-fo.”
44005024	Kyasia nshilyi wa mmba ya Iruva na vaniini va makohani vekiita indo, vakatirwa nnyinyira kimaruma kyawo, kyeyaamba mmbo kivaa inda kindo ekyi.
44005025	Nndu umwi kasha kavavia sheelyi, vandu valya mulevavika kifingyony ekawo vakee kulya mmba ya Iruva, vasalali-fo veeloshaa vandu.
44005026	Lyo nshilyi ulya alekupoo ando amwi na varundi, vakaveende, lyo nshi na finya-fo, mashika valeereya vandu valashevakapa na mawe.
44005027	Vekiveende vakavavika ikwaanuny. Nkohani Nniini kavavesa,
44005028	kavavia, “Lulemwiima-se na finya deny, mulashelosha na irina elyi, lyo yeni mmbo mwammishura Yerusalemu yei ufundo lwany, neeni mmbo mukunndye samu ya nndu yeto iluvavye.”
44005029	Petro na Varumi vakarouwa vakaamba, “Mmbo kilukooye lwiindye Iruva ngota vandu.”
44005030	Iruva wa vande veru mmbo aleruta Yesu, yeto mulembwaa mumbambye nsalabeu.
44005031	Nndu yeto Iruva mmbo aleng'anisa na woko lwakwe usha, nave nniini na Mwikira naniinge Vaisraeli ikurya na ifywayo kya ulyamari.
44005032	Neese mmbo lukee vakureekyi va mbony eti, ando amwi na Mumuyo Mweele yeto Iruva aleniinga woose vakeemwindya.
44005033	Naasa vekiita indo kikavakora miriminy yaawo, vakaumburana kyevawaa.
44005034	Kyaindi nndu umwi Mfarisayo irina lyakwe evangwa Gamalieli, akee mwilosha mavavaso, nawe ni nndu eendyo mmbandu woose, kasalala alya ikwaanuny llya, kavavasya Varumi vavikwa poo kyaangu,
44005035	llyo kavaviany, “Yeni womi va Israeli, kwiiseny shaasa mutannyaa vandu yeva.
44005036	Mashika mikonu yei ya kufii Teuda mmbo alekupoo kakwaalwa nndu nniini, vandu sha mayana aana vakansora, lyo we kawaawa na valya veriani nawe vakanyanyaka vakafwa mmwasi.”
44005037	“Numa ya nndu yeto kakwiipoo Yuda Mgalilaya, mikonu ilya ya ireiyo yeekena, keenduta vandu veengyi vakansora, llyo nawe-da mmbo alereka na woose vemwirikye vakanyanyaka.
44005038	Naasany ulaalu mmbo shamuvia, kwiiseny na vandu yeva, vareny vakae, mashika mbony yei ao ishora elyi kwankooya mmbo lyuukye kwa nndu wa vandu mmbo lyishefikaa;
44005039	lyo kwankooya mmbo lyuukye kwa Iruva mmushidimaa ilyifisha-fo; kilasheeva sheelyi mmbo mukeekapana na Iruva.”
44005040	Nawo vakairikya marero akwe, naasa vekivaanga Varumi valya vakavakapa, vakavavasa valakisende irina lya Yesu; naasa lyo vakavara vakweengye.
44005041	Naasa vekyisomuka alya ikwaanuny llya, vakeenda vefuraa mashika elyi vansandwa na vandu vasumani isutwa kimaruma kya irina elyo.
44005042	Na wo nkonu, efo mmba ya Iruva na kyeny kwawo, mmbalera ilosha neevambisa Nrumi ya Nsia ya Yesu sheelyi ni Kristo-fo.
44006001	Naasa kyeeri kilya yeekena lya vakiloshyony lyekeengereka, kukakaa-fo nkunung'unu wa Vayuda va Kigriki kwa Vaebrania kyeyaamba vaka va ding'u vawo mmbo valerekyo-fo valalolwa efo urundiny lwa nkonu simu.
44006002	Valya ikumi na vavii vakavaanga vakiloshyony woose, vakavavia, Nkivaa yese lure irero lya Iruva lufurukanyi meseny-fo.
44006003	Kyasia vanavama, sauweny vandu mfungare efo nnang'ani yaany, vakureekywa kya usha, vaishwe Mumuyo Mweele, na waarya, naambo luvarambikye mbony yei.
44006004	Neese lusaa na itereva na irundya irero elyo.
44006005	Irero elyi lyikasenya shila shoose; vakasauwa Stefano, nndu atiri kikusiryo eeshwe Mumuyo Mweele, na Filipo, na Prokoro na Nikonori na Timon, na Parmena na Nikolao wa kulya Antiokia;
44006006	nawo vakavikwa mbee ya Varumi yewo, nawo vekimaa ivaterevya, vakavaekerya maako.
44006007	Irero lya Iruva lyikakwaana, na yeekena lya vakiloshyony lyikaengereka nnu kulya Yerusalemu, na ikyenga lya vakohani vakaalukya kyikusiryo ekyi.
44006008	Naasa Stefano nawe, kawona ikiiyo na wiidimi, katana ngyende na findo finiini filandelollyo efo vanduny.
44006009	Kyaindi vandu maata va kyama kyevaangwaa Sinagogi lya Valeke na lya Vakirene na lya Vaiskandaria, na lya valya va Kilikia na Asia, vakasalala na Stefano naambo vammbinge,
44006010	lyo valaidimi immbinga mashika a waarya lwakwe na finya ya Mumuyo eto enkaye.
44006011	Naasa vakafullwa vandu mirwe vakaamba, mmbo luleita nndu yeu eshaararaa Mose na Iruva.
44006012	Vakaaya vandu na vamiku na vaarya va fitabu; vakansora, vakantira vakanrwaa ikwaanuny.
44006013	Vakasaleesa vakureeki va wongo vakaamba, “Nndu yeu nnyakeera nalaarara ando yaa eele na uvavaso-fo;
44006014	mashika mmbo luleeta eshambaa Yesu yeto wa Nasareti mmbo ashelyamaraa ando yaa, na yaalasha mbuka teru tilya lulereeyo ni Mose.”
44006015	Vandu woose valya vekee alya ikwaanuny vakankatuya miso awo, vakalollya kisangu kyakwe kive sha kya nsu wa Iruva.
44007001	Nkohani nniini kaamba, “A mbony yeto niindo tikai?”
44007002	Nawe Stefano karouwa, “Vanama na vande vakwa shaaranyiny. Iruva wa itumbe mmbo alekoora na nde weeru Abrahamu kyeeri ekee Mesopotamia, nalandekae Harani,
44007003	kammbia, ‘Uka urukeny lwafo na kwa vandu vafo kweende urukeny elo nshekooraa.’
44007004	Lyoony kooka urukeny lwa Vakaldayo kakaa Harani, numa kooka-fo llya ndeye alefwa. Iruva kansamisya urukeny elu yeni mukee ulaalu.
44007005	Nta nnyalenningwa ding'u kunu, nta ando kwamaa ivika urende-fo; kavika kyaasa asheningwaa uruka, luve lwakwe deny, luve na lwa ufyari lwakwe lwa numa lla llya nalandetire mwana.
44007006	Iruva kaamba, ‘Ufyari lwakwe mmbo lushevaa veny urukeny lwa vandu vengyi, nawo vashevavika mashinga, neevataa meesi ando a myaaka mayana aana.
44007007	Na vandu yewo vashevallwa mashinga nshevataiyaa, niindo Iruva aleamba, neelyi numa vasheukaa-fo, nawo vasheshiindyaa yaa.’
44007008	Kammbikya kyaasa kya irinwa; naasa Abrahamu kaira Isaki kanrina nkonu wa nyanya. Isaki kaira Yakobo. Yakobo nawe keera valya ikumi na vavii, mmbo vandeye veru.”
44007009	Vande yewo veru vekitirya Yosefu kinying'u, vakankumba keenda Misri. Iruva kakaa nawe.
44007010	Kamuuta ngatareny takwe toose, kanniinga ilyillyo na waarya mbee ya Farao, we mangyi ya Misri nawe kammbika nawe mwishillya Misri amwi na mmba yakwe shoose.
44007011	Naasa kukasha shaa kulya Misri na Kanaani koose na fyuure fiingyi, nta vande veru mbalewonisa shoonga yavamaa-fo.
44007012	Kutani kyeeri Yakobo aleita kulya Misri kwiifo shoonga, karuma-fo vande ewo veru lya mbee.
44007013	Naasa kyaaro ekyo kya kavii llyo Yosefu alekumanyisya kwa vanavamaye, na ufyari lwa Yosefu lukamanyika paa kwa Farao.
44007014	Yosefu karuma vandu kandevaanga ndeye Yakobo na vandu vakwe woose nawo, woose ni vandu makumi mfungare na varaanu.
44007015	Naasa Yakobo kasoka na Misri; numa kawuya ifwa we na vande valya veru;
44007016	vakaipowa vakafitwa Shekemu vakanderikwa kulya mbangeny ilya, Abrahamu aleura na fesa kwa vana va Hamori kulya Shekemu.
44007017	Naasa kyeeri kya kyaasa kilya Iruva alevikya Abrahamu kyekee kufii, vandu valya vakaengereka neefumbuka nnu kulya Misri,
44007018	numa kukakwiipoo-fo mangyi kulya Misri nalaishi Yosefu.
44007019	Yeto katanya vandu veru fya kiila, katannya vande veru makasha, kaveetikya veere vakoku vao efo naambo valakae na muu.
44007020	Kyeeri ekyo llyo na Mose awonika ekee kimwana kisha nnu, kalelwa ando a miiri iraru nsi ekee mmba kwa ndeye.
44007021	Kyeeri alerwa efo, mfu wa Farao kamwiipoo nallele nave sha mwana wakwe.
44007022	Mose kaishivirwa urango loose lwa ki-Misri, kamanya kishomu na ngaa yaawo.
44007023	Nafite myaaka makumi aana karummbwa nriminy wakwe nandesaiya vana va maye wo Vaisraeli.
44007024	Kalollya-fo umwi esisyoo kamweekya itaiya, kawaa Mmisri ulya.
44007025	We kakusara vanavamaye mmbo vamanyaa sheelyi Iruva mmbo akee ivawouwa na woko lwakwe, llyo mbalemanya-fo.
44007026	Elyi lya ndesi kalollya lyingyi vengyi vekapanaa, kakunda ivaleta, kavavia, “Eni vomi vakwa, yeni ni vana va nka. Nkyiki elyi mwakapana?”
44007027	Kyaindi yeto ekeefota eto ungyi kammbira-fo emmbiaa, “Ni vi alekuvika yewe kuve uwe yeeru na mwiluleta-ro?
44007028	A mmbo kukundye ishiwaa neeny shaasa kulewaa Mmisri ulya ukwau?”
44007029	Mose karisha kimaruma kya irero elyo, karisha kandekaa sha muny urukeny lwa Midian, keerya-fo vana vavii.
44007030	Kwikyisia myaaka makumi na aana nsu wa Iruva kansheya kulya kasa ka ifumbu lya Sinai efo murony wa ngorosho ishakaa.
44007031	Mose nalole indo kaaukwa, na kyeeri alesembeya kufii nalole nisha, unyanga lwa Nndumi lukansheya, lukammbia,
44007032	“Yeny ni Iruva wa vande vafo, Iruva wa Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo.” Mose karerema, nalakarye ilola.
44007033	Nndumi kammbia, “Utafo fyaaru fyafo, mashika ando ya kuselelyi ni uruka weele.”
44007034	Mmbo shallolya paa, ukiva lwa vandu vakwa vakee Misri, ivavyo lyawo lyanshifikya, neeny mmbo shooloka naambo shivaute-fo. Naasa ulaalu mmbo nkurumaa Misri.
44007035	Mose yeto valellema veshambaa, “Ni vi yeto alekuvika nniini na mwiluleta mmbwe yeto muni alerumwa ni Iruva nave nniini na mwiwouwa na kana ka nsu ulya alensheya alya ngoroshony ilya yekee yaaka.”
44007036	Mose yeto mmbwe alevauta-fo, katana ngyende na firingisyo kulya urukeny lwa Misri, na yeeveny ya Shamu, na kulya kasa ando a myaaka makumi aana.
44007037	Mose yeto mmbwe da alevia vana va Israeli, Iruva Nndumi waany ashemuselesyaa nkisuku efo ufyariny lwany sha yeny, mwaranyiny we.
44007038	We mmbwe yeto ekee kulya kasa ando amwi na nsu ulya alerera nawe alya ifumbuny lya Sinai, na ando amwi na vande veru, mmbwe yeto alewarya marero a muu naluningye yese.
44007039	“Lyo nndu yeto vaninii veru mbalekunda imwirikya-fo, mmbo valemwisityo mbai, vakaviira mirima yaawo Misri tupu,
44007040	vakavia Aron, ‘Ndifo lusongosie maruva ashelusongoyaa; mashika Mose yeto aleluuta urukeny lwa Misri llwiishi kindo kyankooyafo.’
44007041	Vakasongosia ifanu lya ngashe vakaende na firaso kwa ifwanu elyo, vefuryaa mashora a maako awo.
44007042	Naasa Iruva kaalasha makusaro akwe kavara naambo vendye matorito a nginiiu, shaasa kikee kireiye efo fitabuny fya vakisuku kyeamba, ‘A ni yeny muleshyuutya firaso myaaka makumi aana kulya kasa, eni mmba ya Israeli?
44007043	Mmbo muleipoo yeema lya Moleki na nyinyiri ta iruva lyany Refani, mafwanu muleasongosia naambo mwiindye. Neeny mmbo nshemusamisaa mweende kwaasha mwiire Babeli.’ “
44007044	“Yeema lyilya lya ukureekyi lyekee ando amwi na vande veru kulya kasa, shaasa Mose alevavasya, naambo nalyisongosie sha ufwanu llwa aleorwa.
44007045	Llyo vande veru vetarannyaa, vakalyaata ando amwi na Yosua efo ushilyiny lwa vandu va masanga valya Iruva alevaumbuta mbee ya vande veru, kufike kyeeri kya Davidi;
44007046	ulya alewona ikiiyo efo kwa Iruva, llyo aletereva naambo nawonisye Iruva wa Yakobo kirembo kyeekaa.
44007047	Kyaindi Solomon mmbwe yeto alentanya mmba.”
44007048	“Kyaindi lyo yeto akee uwe ya fyoose nnyakaa mmba ikee shitani na maako a vandu-fo, shaasa nkisuku aleammba indi:
44007049	‘Iruveu ni kiri kyako kya itumbe na uruka ni ando a yeekerya marende akwa. Ni mmba ya ngata-ki mushitannyaa? Nndumi avesa.
44007050	Ao ni ando-ki nsheimuyaa? Nshi woko lwakwa luletana efi fyoose?’ “
44007051	“Yeni mutiri singo shuumu, mukava sha vandu va masanga mulashiitaa. Mikonu myoose mmbo mukeekapana na Mumuyo Mweele, shaasa vande vany valetana, neeni, ni indo-da.
44007052	Ni ungau nnang'ani ya vakisuku kulaore vande vany valemmbavisa? Nawo mmbo valewaa valya valeawuya fisuku kya isha lya yeu wa usumanu, yeu ulaalu muleva variingyi vakwe, mukammbwaa.
44007053	Ni nsu wa Iruva alemuvavasya muwarye uvavaso lyo mulakunde itira.”
44007054	Naasa kyeeri valeeta marero yoo, vakakorwa miriminy yaawo, vakanrafunnya mayoo.
44007055	Llyo Stefano eishwe Mumuyo Mweele, kalola iruveeu, kalollya itumbe lya Iruva, na Yesu esalalyi taari ya woko usha lwa Iruva.
44007056	Kaamba, “Lola-te, shilollye kulya iruvee-u kurauka, na Mwana yeto wa Nndu aselelyi woko usha lwa Iruva.”
44007057	Vakaongora vakafinika maarwi awo, vakanrumbukya na lyimwi woose,
44007058	vakansomuta kipoo ya muri, vakankapa na mawe. Na variingyi yewo vakavika soori takwe yoo marendeny a nsoro umwi evaangwa ni Saulo.
44007059	Vakakapa Stefano na mawe, nawe eeterevaa kaamba, “Woi Nndumi Yesu, warya nrima wakwa.”
44007060	Kafiirya ndi, kafua na unyanga waasha, kaamba, “Nndumi kulaveekennyi ulyamari elu-fo.” Amaa yaamba indo kafwa. Na Saulo mmbo elolye ninsha shaasa alewaawa.
44008001	Mikonu yeyo kukapooka ilyiso ukiva siri tikee Yerusalemu, woose vakanyanyaka efo urukeny lwa Uyuda na Samaria, kuuta Varumi yewo veni.
44008002	Vandu vesha vakarika Stefano, vakammbikya kiiyo kiniini.
44008003	Saulo kalyamara Siri eshiraa wo mmba, eruffwaa vomi na vaka neevavika kifingyony.
44008004	Na valya valenyanyaka mmbo valeenda efo neefo vevambisaa Irero elyo.
44008005	Filipo kasoka kaanga muriny wa Samaria, “Kavaongoya mbony ta Kristo.”
44008006	Maronda kwa nrwe umwi nsi vakaaranya marero alya aleambawa ni Filipo kyeeri valeeta neelollya ngyende tilya ekeetana.
44008007	Mashika mimuyo mikasha miingyi ileuka vandu veengyi yewo veetirwa nnyo, veffwaa na unyanga waasha, na vandu veengyi vekee fitongororo malungo, vakashiiswa.
44008008	Lyikava ifura iniini nnu kulya muriny ulya.
44008009	Naasa kweifo ndu umwi evangwaa Simon, elyo mbee mmbo ekee nsavi efo muriny eto, kaawuta vandu va Samaria, eshambaa we ni ndu nsuri.
44008010	Woose vakamwaranya kupookya n-du fika nniini, vakaamba, “Nndu yeu ni wiidimi lwa Iruva, ullya niini.”
44008011	Vakamwarannya nnu mashika elyi emmauta vandu na usavi lwakwe, kyeeri kiingyi.
44008012	Kyaindi kyeeri valeirikya Filipo llya alevambisa Nrumi ya umangyi lwa Iruva, na irina lya Yesu Kristo, vakabatiswa, vomi na vaka.
44008013	Na Simion yeto we muni kakusirya-u, kakutira na Filipo; kafulukyo elyi alelollya ngyende na myoorye miniini yekeetanyika.
44008014	Naasa Varumi yewo vekee Yerusalemu vekiita sheelyi Samaria yambwarya Irero lya Iruva, vakavarikya Petro na Yohane;
44008015	nawo kyeeri valesoka nafo, vakavaterevya naambo vasimbwa Mumuyo Mweele.
44008016	Mashika nnyensokya nta umwi waawo-fo, kuuta elyi da vemmbatiso na irina lya Yesu.
44008017	Llyony valevika maako awo uwe yaawo, nawo vakasokywa ni Mumuyo Mweele.
44008018	Naasa llya Simion alelollya vandu vesimbwaa Mumuyo Mweele veshekerywa maako a Varumi valya, kakunda ivaniinga fesa, kaamba,
44008019	“Shiniingeny neeny wiidimi elu, naambo neeny wo ndu nshemwekeryaa maako nawonise Mumuyo Mweele.”
44008020	Kyaindi Petro kammbia, “Fesa yafo irekye si ando amwi neewe, mashika yewe mmbo kukusarye simbo ya Iruva mmbo yawonika na fesa.
44008021	Nkutiri waavi nta kyenga yaa-fo, mashika nrima wafo mmbukunyiisye kwa Iruva-fo.
44008022	Naasany, kurye ulyamari elu lwafo, kutereve Nndumi, kulakooye ashekusaryaa uravi elu lwa nrima wafo.
44008023	Mashika shilollye mmbo kukeevava sha udwa na lyingyi mmbo kukee kifingyony kya uravi.”
44008024	Simion karouwa kaamba, “Shiterevyeny yeni kwa Nndumi, naambo efyo mwaamba fyoose kilashikooye nta kimwi.” "
44008025	Naasa vekimaa yuuta ukureekyi na ivambisa Irero lya Nndumi vakawuya Yerusalemu, lyo vakaamba mbele Nrumi ya Nsia fyuungony fiingyi fya Vasamaria.
44008026	Nsu wa Nndumi karera na Filipo, kammbia, " “Kwiipoo kweende taari ya sinde kundefika shia ilya isokaa na Gasa kuuka Yerusalemu, nafo ni kasa koomu.”
44008027	Nawe kakwiipoo, keenda, llya yeni kalollya nndu umwi Mwabashi Nndu eto ekee nshilyi kwasi ya Kandake, mangyi ya kika ya Kyabashi, eitorye masaa akwe moose; nawe mmbo eengye Yerusalemu nandeindya-fo Iruva,
44008028	kyeeri ekeewuya, kava eekee rembo yoo ikariny mmbo ekesoma kitabu kya nkisuku Isaya.
44008029	Mumuyo kavia Filipo, “Sembeya kufii neekari elyi.”
44008030	Naasa Filipo keenda sere, kamwaranya esomaa kitabu kya Nkisuku Isaya, kaamba, “A kukeemanya kindo kukeesoma?”
44008031	Kammbia, A mmbo nshidimaa inda imanya, nndu nalashitetera? Katereva Filipo nasaami nakee-u nawe rembo.
44008032	Na kyenga ekyo kya mareiyo ekeekisoma nnyekyi, “Mmbo aleteterwa yeenda kishishyony ekee sha yoonri, na shaasa ngurana ya yoonri imalalyaa sau iisemwaa mafwaa, na indo nawe nnyatarammbwa kana kakwe-fo.
44008033	Kimaruma kya ikunyiisa lyakwe uvingo lwakwe lukautwa-u, ni vi ashevia vandu va kyeeri kyakwe? Mashika muu wakwe wammbutwa urukeny.”
44008034	Nshilyi ulya kavesa Filipo, “Shakutereva, Nkisuku yeu mmbo arera marero yaa kimaruma kya vi, nyakwe a nya nndu ungyi?”
44008035	Filipo nawe katarammbwa kana kakwe, kapooka na mareiyo yoo, kammbia Nrumi ya Nsia ya Yesu.
44008036	Elyi veefo vasheendaa vakafika ando kwiyoo mura, nshilyi ulya kaamba, “Lola mura yeu, nkyokyi kikee ishiima shilabatiswa?” [
44008037	“Filipo kaamba, ‘Kwankusirya-u na nrima wafo moose kivaa.’ “ Karouwa, kaamba, “Shikusirye sheelyi Yesu Kristo ni Mwana wa Iruva.” ]
44008038	Kavavasya ikari lyilya lyisaleeswa; vakaoloka woose ve vavii neefo mureny, we Filipo na nshilyi ulya; nawe kammbatisa.
44008039	Naasa kyeeri valesaama vauka mureny, mumuyo wa Nndumi katakwa-u Filipo, nshilyi ulya nalallollye-se; naasa kakwengya efuraa.
44008040	Nalyo Filipo kashelollyo-kulya Asoto, nawe esheenda kaamba, “Nrumi ya Nsia efo miriny myoose kutani afika Kaisaria.”
44009001	Naasa Saulo keengera ilyilyisa neekusara iwaa vakiloshyony va Nndumi, keengya Nkohani Nniini.
44009002	Kakunda nanniinge barua teenda Dameski tikeeshireiye kwa mmba teeterevya ta Vayuda, naambo vakalollya-fo vandu va shia yei ya Nndumi, vomi na vaka naambo vakalollya-fo navafinge neeveende Yerusalemu.
44009003	Kikava elyi efoo ashendaa, kufii afike Dameski, pari pari karingityo koose nsa niini yuuka iruveeu,
44009004	Kawa si, kaita unyanga lummbia, “Saulo, Saulo-ro, nkikyi elyi kukeeshivavisa?”
44009005	Kaamba, “A ni yewe vi Nndumi?” Nawe kaamba, “Ni yeny Yesu yeto kukeimbavisa yewe.”
44009006	Lyo salala, kwaange muriny llyo kushevioo ekyo kyikukooye itana.
44009007	Na vandu valya veriani nawe vakasalala sau, vakaita unyanga, lyo valalollye nndu.
44009008	Saulo kakwiipoo alya si, na kyeeri aletarambwa miso, nalalollye nta kindo; vakantira woko vakamfita Dameski.
44009009	Kakaa mikonu iraru nalalollye; nalakeelya nta ina.
44009010	Naasa alya Dameski kweiyo wa kiloshyony umwi evaangwa Anania. Nndumi karera na Anania yooryeny. Kaamba, “Ekau yeny, Nndumi.”
44009011	Nndumi kammbia, “Salala kweenda kundekooya shia ivaangwaa Shisaari, kundevesa efo mmba kwa Yuda nndu avaangwaa Saulo, wa Tarso, mashika kushenkoyaa eterevaa,
44009012	nawe allolya nndu avangwaa Anania eshangaa neemwekerya maako, needimi ilollya lyingi.”
44009013	Kyaindi Anania karouwa, “Nndumi, mmbo shilemmiita mbony ta nndu yeu kwa vandu veengyi, kya makasha meengyi atannya veele vafo vakee Yerusalemu;
44009014	naako ni kunu mmbo arye ivavaso alyuutye kwa vaniini va makohani nashefinga woose vakeevaanga Irina lyafo.”
44009015	Kyaindi Nndumi kammbia, “Kweengye tupu; Mashika yeu ni kiiya kisauwe kyakwa, narwaa irina lyakwa kwa vandu va masanga, na vamangyi na vana va Israeli.
44009016	Mashika mmbo nshemoraa shaasa fikee fingyi efyo ashelyisywaa ukiva kimaruma kya Irina lyakwa.”
44009017	Anania keenda, kaanga kulya mmba ilya, kamwekerya maako kaamba, “Mwanama Saulo, Ni Nndumi ashiruma, we Yesu, yeto alekoora neewe efo shia kulesha nayo, naambo kwiidimise ilollya, kuveishurwa na Mumuyo Mweele.”
44009018	Lya yeni fikaangara findo misony akwe fivakye mavala, naasa kaidima ilollya, kasalala, kapatiswa;
44009019	kalya na shoonga, kawuiyo mmuu. Kakaa-fo ando a mikonu mive na mive ando amwi na vakiloshyony vakee Dameski.
44009020	Nalyo yeni kapooka ivambisa mbony ta Yesu efo fisomyony fya Vayuda, sheelyi we ni Mwana wa Iruva.
44009021	Na woose valeita vakafulukyo vakaamba, “A yeu nshi we yeto ekesaveesa yewo vekeesenda irina elyi kulya Yerusalemu?” Na yaa da mmbo alesha kwa kimaruma ekyo, navafinge neevarwaa kwa vaniini va makohani?
44009022	Saulo keengera iva nkaari, kasaveesa Vayuda valya va Dameski, eeringisyaa sheelyi Yesu ni Kristo.
44009023	Naasa kwikyiira mikonu miingyi Vayuda vakaumburana vambwaa,
44009024	kyaindi Saulo kamanya kyama kyawo, vakallaya efo ngiriny kio na nsanyiny naambo vammbwae.
44009025	Vakiloshyony kyakwe vakamwipoo kio vakammbika kikabuny vakamoolota na isimamba lya mmba.
44009026	Kyeeri Saulo alefika Yerusalemu kakunda isanga na vakiloshyony, lyo wo vakamweereya woose, valaidimi ikusara iirikya sheelyi nawe ni wakiloshyony.
44009027	Kyaindi Barnaba kammbwarya kanrwaa kwa Varumi, kavaongoya shaasa alekwanannya na Nndumi efo shia, na kingyi sheelyi alerera nawe, na kingyi shaasa aleamba Nrumi ya Nsia na ukaari kulya Dameski na irina lya Yesu.
44009028	Nawe kakaa nawo efo Yerusalemu eshangaa neesomuka, kaamba mbony na irina lya Nndumi nookaari, eereraa na irouwana na Vayuda va Kigriki.
44009029	Llyo nawo valeesa immbwaa.
44009030	Kyaindi wooroye vekimanya vakamwipoo vakanrwaa Kaisaria, naambo neende Tarso. "
44009031	Naasa Siri ikakaa na ifura efo Uyuda koose na Galilaya na Samaria, siri ikavangiswa ikeengera ing'ana neetirya Nndumi vio, na iviiryo muu ni Mumuyo Mweele.
44009032	Naasa kyeeri Petro ekeiringitya taari toose kashesokya kulya kwa veele vakee muriny uvaangwa Lida.
44009033	Efo kalollya-fo nndu avaangwa Ainea, nawe ellala kitareny ando a myaaka nyanya, mashika mmbo ekee muumu malungo.
44009034	Petro kammbia, " “Ainea, Yesu Kristo akushiisa, kwiipoo kwaalye kitara kyafo kumuni, " lya yeni kakwiipoo.”
44009035	Na vandu woose valya vekee Lida na Sharoni vakallollya, nawo vakaalukya Nndumi.
44009036	Na kulya Yafa kweefo wa Kiloshyony umwi irina lyakwe ni Tabita, kwaalwa ni Dorkasi (nkyo ni sarya); nka yeu mmbo ekee mwitana mesha kasanda na firaso fyakwe eshuutaa.
44009037	Naasa fyeeri filya-da kalwaa, kavefwa; nawo vekimaa insangya vakansaamisa ghorofeny.
44009038	Na kimmba Lida kwekee kufii na Yafa, na vakiloshyony vammaa iita sheelyi Petro mfo akai, vakaruma vandu vavii kwakwe vantereve neemmbia, " “Kulakyeeyo isha kweru.”
44009039	Petro kakwiipoo keenda nawo. Kyeeri alefika-fo vakansaamisa na kulya ghorofeny, vaka va ding'u woose vakasha na yoo akai veiyaa neemora kansu tilya Dorkasi eefumaa kyeeri kilya ekee nawo.
44009040	Petro kavasomuta poo woose, kafiirya ndi, katereva, naasa keendukya nnyinga ulya, kaamba, Tabita, kupoo. Nawe katarammbwa miso akwe, na ekilollya Petro, kakwiipoo, kakaa rembo.
44009041	Kantira woko kansaleesa, naasa ekimaa ivaanga vandu wa Nndumi na vaka valya vading'u kammbika yoo mbee yaawo, ekee na muu.
44009042	Kikamanyika kulya muriny wa Yafa koose; vandu veengyi vakakusirya na Nndumi.
44009043	Naasa Petro kakaa mikonu mive na mive efo Yafa, kyeny kwa nndu umwi, avaangwaa Simion, mwisisa shony.
44010001	Kyasia kweefo nndu umwi wa Kaisaria, irina lyakwe ni Kornelio, ekee nniini wa itorito lya Vasikari lyevangwaa Kiitalia
44010002	ni nndu nsongovisi, mwiindya Iruva, we na mmba yakwe shoose, nawe mmbo eningyaa vandu findo fiingyi fyeevekya, kava na mwiitereva Iruva kyeeri kyoose.
44010003	Nkonu umwi (Nndumi) kamoora paa, kwikee sha saa keenda ta nsanyiny, nsu wa Iruva kansheya kammbia, “Kornelio,
44010004	Fiterewo fyafo na firaso fyafo filefika uwe na iva kindo kyekumbuwa mbee ya Iruva.”
44010005	Naasa ulaalu rika vandu kulya Yafa, kundevaanga-fo Simion avaangwa Petro.
44010006	We mmbo akee muny wa nndu umwi avaangwaa Simion mwisisa shony, mmba yakwe ikee yoo mbai ya iruva; nawe mmbo ashekuviaa kyetana. "
44010007	Naasa nsu ulya wa Iruva arera nawe ekimaa yeenda, Kornelio kavaanga-u varundi vavii va efo kyeny kwakwe, na nsikari umwi akee nndu nsaari nnang'ani ya valya vendundyaa wo nkonu;
44010008	nawe ekimaa ivavia filya fyatanyika fyoose kavaruma veende Yafa.
44010009	Na elyi lya ndesi, veshendaa kufii vaafukye muriny, Petro kasaama ghorofeny naambo nandetereva, saa irindaru ta nsanyiny;
44010010	katirwa nshaa deny, kakunda shoonga; lyo kyeeri shoonga yekeekorwa kaorya, "
44010011	kalollya efo iruveeu kurauka na kiiya kyivakye ntaraso nniini wishoolokaa, wikee nnunute na taari ta vayo iinya kikafika si;
44010012	neefo ntarasony eto kwiifo findo fikee na muu fya wo ngata, fitiri marende aana, neefyo fikurufwaa si na ndeye ta nginiiu.
44010013	Naasa unyanga lukansheya immbia, “Kwiipoo Petro, shisha kwalya.”
44010014	Kyaindi Petro kaamba, “Oode Nndumi, shamashika nshilellye kindo kitefusu tara-fo.”
44010015	Unyanga llwa lukansheya lya kavii, lwiimmbiaa, “Yefyo Iruva amfyeeremuta, yewe kulafivaange mfitefusu-fo.”
44010016	Kindo ekyi kikatanyika kararu sele; numa ntaraso ulya ukawaryose ukawuya iruveeu.
44010017	Naasa kyeeri Petro etirwa nnyinyira nriminy mbwakwe, nalamanyi urango lwa efyo alollya, vandu valya valerumwa ni Kornelio, vekimaa ivesa ando mmba ya Simion ikai, vakasalala yoo mwaangony,
44010018	vakavaanga vakavesa kwakooya Simion avaangwa Petro mfo akai.
44010019	Kyeeri ekyi Petro mmbo ekeekusara mbony ta myoorye ilya. Mumuyo kammbia, “Kwiifo vandu vararu vakeekuruuya.
44010020	Naasa kwiipoo kweende nawo nta kulatirwa nnyinyira-fo, mashika ni yeny shavaruma.”
44010021	Petro kaolokany kakooya vandu valya, kaamba, “Ni yeny mukeeshiruuya. A nkyokyi kyamweende?”
44010022	Vakaamba, “Ni Kornelio nshilyi, akee nndu wa usumanu, mwiindya Iruva, akee nndu atiri irina isha kwa Vayuda woose, mmbo alevavasywa ni nsu mweele, narumi vandu kwafo, kweende kyeny kwakwe, naambo needimi ikwaaranya.” "
44010023	Naasa kavawarya vave veny vakwe. Naasa elyi lya ndesi, Petro kakupoo ando amwi nawo, na vandu maata va Yafa vakamwiimya.
44010024	Elyi lya ndesi vakaafukya Kaisaria. Nawe Kornelio mmbo eevavereye, emma isanyirya va mmba yakwe na vambuya vakwe.
44010025	Kyeeri Petro ekeeyaanga Kornelio kasomuka nandemwaambya, Kammboya yoo marendeny kyemwindya.
44010026	Kyaindi Petro kamwiipoo, kammba, " “Salala, naakwa ni yeny ni nndu wa vandu.”
44010027	Na ereraa indo kaanga na mmba, kalollya-fo vandu veengyi vakuumbyeu.
44010028	Kavavia, “Yeni mwiishi nshi kindo kisumani kwa nndu Myuda netani na nndu wa ufyari lungyi, nta yaanga kwakwe-fo, lyo Iruva mmbo aleshiikyimba, shilavaange nndu moose ntefusu-fo.
44010029	Nkyo kimaruma shasha elyi kwashivaanga, nta shilalemi; naasany, a shimuvese, nkyokyi mwashivaangya?”
44010030	Kornelio kaamba, “Mmikonu iraru ileira, saa yei sheni, nnyo saa kyeenda, mmbo shekee kyeny kwakwa shiterevaa, kukava nndu asalala mbee yakwa, aree soori timikaa,
44010031	kaamba, ‘Kornelio, fiterewo fyafo fyammitiwa, na firaso fyafo fyankumbuwa ni Iruva.
44010032	Naasany, ruma vandu veende Yafa, kundevaanga-fo nndu avaangwaa Petro, nawe mmbo akee mmba ya nndu umwi avaangwaa Simion akee mwisisa shony, kufii na mbai ya iruva; nawe kansha kurere nawe.’
44010033	Llyo neeny sharuma vandu kwafo, neewe kwantana kisha elyi kwasha. Naasany yese loose mmbo lukee yaa mbee ya Iruva, naambo lwaaranyi marero moose Nndumi alekuvavasya.”
44010034	Petro kaamba, “Nkya dede shammanya Iruva nnyatiri ikundya-fo.”
44010035	Kyaindi wo nndu eefo wa wo isanga kantana usumanu mmbo awonaa iwaryo mmbwe.
44010036	Irero llya alerikya vana va Israeli eshambaa Nrumi ya Nsia ya ufoo ya Yesu Kristo (yeto akee Nndumi wa woose),
44010037	kindo ekyi yeni mukiishi, kilekwaana kulya Uyuda koose, kupookya kulya Galilaya, numaya ubatiso llwa lwa Yohane;
44010038	mbony ta Yesu wa Nasareti, shaasa Iruva alemwaamba mafura na shia ya Mumuyo Mweele na finya, nawe karingitya efo neefo erundaa mashora mesha neeshiisa woose vekee vafote ni yeto nkasha; mashika Iruva ekee nawe.
44010039	Neese mmbo lukee vakureekyi va mbony toose aletana kulya urukeny lwa Vayuda na kulya Yerusalemu, mbweny valemmbwaa vembammbyaa nriny.
44010040	Yeu Iruva kannduta nkonu wa kararu, kanniinga imanyika,
44010041	nshi kwa wo nndu-fo, kuuta ni kwa vakureekyi valya vemmaa isauwa ni Iruva, mmbo yeseny, lulelya na ina nawe kyeeri kilya alemaa iruka auka kwa vafu.
44010042	Kaluvavasya luvie vandu na ikureekya sheelyi yeu mmbwe alevavasywa ni Iruva nave we mmbwe mwianduya vakee na muu na vafu.
44010043	Yeu vakisuku woose mmbo vammbikye ukureeki, sheelyi na irina lyakwe yewo vamwirikya mmbo vashewonisaa ifwaayo kya ulyamari.
44010044	Kyeeri Petro ekeerera marero yoo Mumuyo Mweele kaolokya woose valeita irero elyo.
44010045	Na valya vakee varini, vakakusiryau, vakafulukyo, kya vandu woose valya valesha na Petro, elyi vandu va masanga nawo vanletyo simbo ya Mumuyo Mweele.
44010046	Mashika mmbo valevaita veereraa na fishomu, neerumisha Iruva. Naasa Petro kaamba,
44010047	“Ni vi yeto ashiidima iima vandu yeva vare valebatiswa na mura; vandu vambwarya Mumuyo Mweele indo kimwi sha yese?
44010048	Kavavasya vabatiswa na irina lya Yesu Kristo. Llyony valentereva neengere ikaa nawo mikonu mive.”
44011001	Naasany vakiloshyony ewo na Vakristo vekee kulya Uyuda vakeeta sheelyi vandu va masanga nawo vambarya kirero kya Iruva.
44011002	Na kyeeri Petro alerwa na Yerusalemu, valya va ngata ya Kiyuda yeerina vakasalala nawe.
44011003	Vakallya nawe ulai vakaamba, “Mmbo kullenda kwa vandu valakee varini kwalya nawo!”
44011004	Petro kapooka irera nawo waarya-dwa, kaamba,
44011005	“Nkonu umwi mmbo shekee kulya Yafa, shiitereva, shooma, shoorya yooryeny, kiiya kikaoloka, sha ntaraso wa soori niini ikoolotwa yuuka iruveeu na taari tavayo iinya, ikashisheya.
44011006	Shaimaiya-fo shalollya findo fikee na muu fya ngata shiingyi, fya marende aana na fya ngoroshony efyo fikuruffwaa si na ndeye teefo nginiiu.
44011007	Sheeta na unyanga lushambaa, ‘Petro, kwiipoo, kushishe, kulye.’
44011008	Shaamba, ‘Oode Nndumi mashika nkwiifo kindo kitefusu kilemmanga kaniny kakwa tarafo.’
44011009	Unyanga luuka iruveeu lukashirouwa lya kavii, ‘Efyo Iruva anfyeremuta, yewe kulafyallwe fitefusu-fo.
44011010	Kindo eki kikatanyika kararu, numa findo efyo fikaviirwa na iruveeu.’ “
44011011	Na llya yeni ekava vandu vararu vasalali yoo mwaangony wa mmba ilya lwekai, vekee varumi kwakwa vauka Kaisaria.
44011012	Mumuyo Kashivia sheende nawo, shire itirwa nnyinyira. Vanavama eva varindaru vakaenda neeny lukandeanga mmba kwa nndu yeto;
44011013	Kaloongoya shaasa alelollya nsu wa Iruva alesalala kyeny kwakwe na immbia, “Ruma vandu veende Yafa vandevaanga nndu avaangwa Simion Petro,
44011014	nashekuvia marero ashidimaa ikukira, yewe na mmba yafo shoose.”
44011015	Naasa kyeeri llepooka irera Mumuyo Mweele kavasokya shaasa alelusokya naako ni yese mapookyony.
44011016	Neeny shakummbwa irero llya lya Nndumi, shaasa aleamba, Yohane mmbo alebatisa na mura, lyo yeni mmbo mushebatiswaa na Mumuyo Mweele.
44011017	Naasany kwakooya Iruva muni finya toose ammbaniinga wo simbo ilya sheni aleluniinga yese luleirikya Nndumi Yesu Kristo, yeny mmbo shivaa sha vi shivakyane na Iruva?
44011018	Llya valeeta marero yoo vakamalallya sau, vakarumisha Iruva, vakaamba, “Naasa-da Iruva allyilya na vandu va masanga vakakooya yaalashika lyeende muu.”
44011019	Naasany na valya valenyanyaka kimaruma kya ngatara ilya ilevasheya kya mbony tilya ta Stefano, vakaipoo kyaaro vakafika Foinike, Kipro na Antiokia, nawo mmbalevambisa irero llya kuuta kwa Vayuda veni-fo.
44011020	Llyo kyaindi veengyi vawo vekee vandu va Kipro na Krene, nawo kyeeri valefika Antiokia vakarera na Vayuda wa Kigriki, veevambisa mbony shaantu ta Nndumi Yesu.
44011021	Woko lwa Nndumi lukakaa nawo; vandu veengyi vakakusiryau, vakasora Nndumi.
44011022	Mbony ta vandu yewo tikashefikya Siri ya kulya Yerusalemu, vakaruma Barnaba neende Antiokia.
44011023	Nawe ekifika neelolya isarya lya Iruva katirwa nnu ni nsia, kavaikyima vengere yeenda na Nndumi kya nrima deny.
44011024	Mashika ekee nndu nsaari aishwe Mumuyo Mweele na kikusiryo; valya valekaa kyaalu kya Nndumi vakaengereka.
44011025	Numa kauka-u keenda Tarso nanderuuya-fo Saulo.
44011026	Eekyimaa illolya kamweende Antiokia. Naasany ando a mwaaka moose vakakaa isiriny ilya vakalosha vandu veengyi. Na vakiloshyony mmbo valevaangwa vakristo lya mapookyony kulya antiokia.
44011027	Mikonu yeyo myeni veawuya fisuku vave vakasoka vauka Yerusalemu vakandefika Antiokia.
44011028	Kyeeri lulekwaanannya umwi waawo kasalala, irina lyakwe ni Agabo, kaawuya kisuku na finya ya Mumuyo Mweele sheelyi shaa niini ishaa kufii ulaniny koose; nayo dede ileshaa kyeeri kya Kaisari Klaudio.
44011029	Na vakiloshyony valya, wo umwi kiinani na ivesyo lyakwe, vakarummbwa varike ngarami yaawo kwa vanavamaye vawo vakee Uyuda.
44011030	Vakavetana indo, vakavarikya vamiku veeteterwaa ni Barnaba na Saulo.
44012001	Kwiikee fyeeri efyo fyeni mangyi Herode kasisya vandu vave va siri.
44012002	Kawaa Yakobo mwanamaye wa Yohane na usu.
44012003	Na ekilollya mmbo kilesenya Vayuda kawuya itira na Petro nawe. Mikonu yeyo yekee mikonu ya mikate ilatiri ntarang'o.
44012004	Kyeeri alemaa intira kammbika kifingyony maakony a ngyulimali ta vasikari vaana vaana, vamwiise naambo numa ya pasaka nansomute neenrambikya vandu.
44012005	Naasa Petro kavikwa kifingyony. Nalyo siri ikatereva Iruva nnu kimaruma kyakwe.
44012006	Kikava kyeeri Herode ekundye imuuta-fo, kio ekyo kyeni Petro elele nnang'ani ya vasikari vavii, ekeemfinge na mise ivii, na varingyi yoo mwaangony veeringaa kifingyony ekyo.
44012007	Pari pari nsu wa Nndumi kashesalala yoo akai, sa ikamika kulya mmba, nsu wa Nndumi kantukuva yoo uvariny, kamwaanta kammbia, Kweete uviny. Mise ilya ikasuruka efo maakony ikawa si.
44012008	Nsu ulya wa Iruva kammbia, “Kwiinive, kurae fyaaru fyafo.” Katana indo. Kawuya immbia, “Raa soori tafo, kwashisora.”
44012009	Kasomuka kansora; nta nalaitumuso sheelyi ni dede kindo nsu yeto atana, we kakusara mmbo akee yorya tupu.
44012010	Llya valeira kiringyony kya mbee na kya kavii, vakashekooya ngiri ya minya yeaanga kulya muriny, mwaango ulya wa ngiri ukarwiika to mweni. Vakasomuka vakashekooya shia imwi, nsu ulya kanra-u.
44012011	Kyeeri Petro alemarukya-fo, kaamba, “Ulaalu shammanya na nshushwa sheelyi Nndumi mmbo anruma nsu wakwe nasheshuuta maakony a Herode ave ando ufyari loose lwa Vayuda lushevikaa nsia.”
44012012	Na kyeeri ekeekusara efyo fyoose kashekooya amfika kyeny kwa Maria, we maye wa Yohane ulya evaangwaa ni Marko; nafo kweefo vandu veengyi vesasangyi-fo veterevaa.
44012013	Nawe kyeeri alekakapa mwaango wa ngiri yeyo, kishinga kyimwi kyevaangwaa Roda kikashearanya.
44012014	Kyeeri alemanya ni unyanga lwa Petro, nnyalerua mbele ngiri-fo, kyeendwa ni ifura, lyo mmbo alerisha mbele, kaanga mmba kavavia sheelyi Petro mmbo asalalyi yoo mbee ya ngiri.
44012015	Vakammbia, “Ni ukwale lukutiri-ro!” Kyaindi we karumisha deny sheelyi niindo kikai. Vakaamba, ni nsu wakwe.
44012016	Petro keengera ikakapa; naasa kyeeri valenduya, vakallollya vakaawukwa.
44012017	Llyony alevatukya woko naambo vamalallye, kavaongoya shaasa Nndumi alemuuta kulya kifingyony. Kaamba, “Endevieny Yakobo na valya vengyi mbony eti.” Kauka-u keenda kundo kungyi.
44012018	Naasa kwikyikya vasikari vakeereve nnu, mmbo kyava inda kya Petro.
44012019	Na Herode kyeeri alennduuya nalallolye, neekyivesa-vesa varingyi valya, kavavasya vawaawa. Naasa Herode kasama kooka Uyuda kandefika Kaisaria, kakaa-fo.
44012020	Na Herode emmiswa nnu kimaruma kya vandu va Tiro na Sidoni; vakamweengya na nrwe umwi nsi, nawo vammaa iitana na Blasto, yeto mwikallya kiria kya mangyi kyeelala, vakatereva ufoo shamashika uruka lwawo llwewonisaa shoonga yuuka urukeny, lwa mangyi.
44012021	Naasa nkonu umwi ukee n-deerye, Herode karaa masara a kimangyi, kakaa rembo kitiminy kya umangyi, karera mbee yaawo.
44012022	Vandu vakakapa ngaya vakaamba, “Elu ni unyanga lwa Iruva muni, nshi unyanga lwa nndu-fo.”
44012023	Naasa nsu wa Nndumi kankapa, ni llya ara nalaniinga Iruva nnduma; kalyiwa nshoka, kakumba muu kafwa.
44012024	Irero lya Nndumi lyikaengera ikwaana.
44012025	Na kyeeri Barnaba na Saulo valemaa iinutya urundi lwawo, vakawuya vauka Yerusalemu, vakeenda veerie Yohane evangoo Marko ando amwi nawo.
44013001	Na efo siriny yeyo yekee Antiokia kweefo vakisuku na velosha, nawo ni Barnaba, na Simion evaangwaa Nigeri, na Lukio nndu wa Krene, na Manaeni, veeng'anyi ando amwi na Herode, na Saulo.
44013002	Naasa kyeeri yeva vekeevikya Nndumi miindye neetereva, Mumuyo Mweele kaamba, “Kyeshyuutyeny nng'u Barnaba na Saulo kya ishora lyillya shilevavaangya. "
44013003	Llyo vekimaa ikootoya na itereva, vakavaekerya maako, naambo vedimi ikweengya.”
44013004	Naasa vandu yewo veeriwa ni Mmumuyo Mweele vakandesokya na Seleukia, na kuuka-fo vakaira yeeveny vakandefika Kipro.
44013005	Na kyeeri vekee Salami vakaamba irero lya Iruva efo mmba teeterevya ta Vayuda, na Yohane kakaa nawo eevafurukannya. "
44013006	Naasa llya valemaa irummbwa Kipro shoose fika Pafo, vakalollya nndu umwi nsavi, nkisuku wa wongo, ni Myuda avaangoo Bar-Yesu.
44013007	Nndu yeu mmbo ekee na nshilyi wa Sergio Paulo, nndu atiri urango. We nshilyi yeto kavaanga Barnaba na Saulo kwakwe, nawe mmbo alekunda yaaranya Irero lya Iruva.
44013008	Llyo Elima, nsavi ulya (mashika llyo irina lyakwe kwa Kigriki) kawakyana nawe, kakunda iinduta nrima wa nshilyi ulya nare kikusiryo eki.
44013009	Kyaindi Saulo, mbwe Paulo ulaalu, eeshwe Mumuyo Mweele kamulla na unyaasi,
44013010	kaamba, “Ewe kwiishwe ntambo na uravi loose, mwana wa yeto Nkumbi, nkiduva wa usumanu, a ndesa nkuraa yeeveta shia ta Iruva tikee shoorotu?”
44013011	Kyasiany, woko lwa Nndumi lukukapaa, kufwe miso kulallolyaa mwi ando a mikonu. Llya yeni nruve ukansheya na ireema misony, karunguka-runguka eeruyaa nndu mwintira woko nantetere.
44013012	Naasa nshilyi ulya ekilollya efyo fyautika, kakusirya-u, efulukywaa nkya kiloshyo kya Nndumi.
44013013	Naasany Paulo na wooroye vakakwiipoo na ngalava vakafika Pafo vakeenda Perge kulya Pamfilia. Yohane kavara-fo kawuya Yerusalemu.
44013014	Wo vakauka Perge veshiiraa yoo nnang'ani ya uruka vakandefika Antiokia, nto muri wa Pisidia,sabato vakaanga mmba ya kiterevyo vakakaa rembo.
44013015	Naasa uvavaso na mbony ta veawuya fisuku tikimaa isomwa, vaniini va mmba ya iterevya vakaruma nndu kwawo navavie, nyira kwakooya mutiri kindo kisha kyevia vandu yeva, naasa muvavie.
44013016	Naasa Paulo kasalala kavatukya woko, kavavia, “Yeni vomi va Israeli mukeeindya Iruva shaaranyiny-te.
44013017	Iruva wa vandu yeva va Israeli mmbo alesauwa vande veru, kavang'anisa, kyeeri kilya vekee sha veny kulya urukeny lwa Misri, nawe kavauta-fo na woko lwakwe kavatetera.
44013018	Na ando a myaaka makumi aana kavasisirya nnu kulya kasa.
44013019	Nawe ekimaa imamita ngyufyari ta vandu mfungare kulya urukeny lwa Kanaani kavaniinga uruka elo luve ding'u yaawo ando a myaaka mayana aana na makumi araanu;
44013020	numa ya vayo kavaniinga Valeti va myaandu fika kyeeri kya nkisuku Samweli.
44013021	Kwanuma vakatereva vavikyo mangyi; Iruva kavaniinga Sauli mwana wa Kishi, nndu wa ufyari lwa Benyamini, ando a myaaka makumi aana.
44013022	Na kyeeri alemaa yuuta-fo eto, kaipoo Davidi naambo nave mangyi waawo, mmbwe alenkureekya, eshambaa, ‘Shalollya Davidi mwana wa Yese nndu asenyi nrima wakwa, nawe mmbo ashetana efyo shikundye fyoose.’
44013023	Kuuka efo ufyariny lwa nndu yeto Iruva mmbo aleengye Israeli Mwikira, mmbwe Yesu,
44013024	shaasa aledeerya kyaasa; kyeeri Yohane emmaa yoongoya vandu woose va Israeli mbony ta ubatiso lwa yaalashika, kulaore we ensha.
44013025	Yohane nawe nalandemarisya kyaaro kyakwe, kaamba, ‘Mmbo mushikusarye yeny ni vi ndesa? Yeny nshi we-fo. Kyaindi loleny, asheshaa umwi numa yakwa shilasumani nta imwelelisya fyaaru fyakwe.’ “
44013026	“Vanavama vakwa, vana va ufyari lwa Abrahamu, na yewo vengyi nnang'ani yaany veindya Iruva, Irero elyi lya ukiro mmbo lyilerikwa kweru.
44013027	Mashika valya vakee Yerusalemu na vaniini vawo, elyi kulaore valemmanya we, nta marero a vakisuku yoo asomwaa wo nkonu wa sabato, mmbo valeenutya vemutyaa uvingo.
44013028	Na kikava mmbalelollya kiteve kyemmamita, vakatereva Pilato nawaawa.
44013029	Nawe ekimaa iinutya fyoose filya ekeendeerye, vakamoolota kulya nriny ulya vakammbika mbangeny.
44013030	Lyo Iruva kanduta nooke ufuny;
44013031	kalollyo ando a mikonu miingyi mmbalya alesaama nawo auka Galilaya fika Yerusalemu, vakava ulaalu mmbo vakureekyi vakwe kunu vanduny.
44013032	Neese ulaalu mmbo lukee imoongoya nrumi shisha ya kyaasa kilya vakuu valya valeniinngywa,
44013033	kyeyaamba, Iruva mmbo aleinutya kwa vana veru kyaasa kyilya, llya aleruta Yesu; shaasa kikee kireiye kulya Saburiny ya kavii indi: ‘Yewe mmbwe Mwana wakwa inu shakwiira.’ “
44013034	“Na lyingyi sheelyi alenduta auka kwa vafu, nare nalawuiyase urumato, kaamba indi: ‘Nshemoraa yeni mbony sheele ta Davidi tikee dede.’ “
44013035	na ando engyi-da kaamba, “Nkusheraa mweele wafo nawoni irumaka-fo.”
44013036	“Mashika Davidi ekimaa irunndya mbony ta Iruva kya kyeeri kyakwe, mmbo alefwa, kaarwa ando amwi na vandeye, kapwaa.
44013037	Kyaindi yeu alerutwa ni Iruva nnyalepwaa-fo.
44013038	Naasany, vanavama, mumanyi sheelyi kyeendwa ni Yesu mmbo uruka loongoywa mbony teesaryo ulyamari;
44013039	na kyeendwa mmbwe wo nndu yeto ashemwirikyaa mmbo ashekennywaa usumanu kya findo fyoose nalashidimaa iwona usumanu efo uvavasony lwa Mose.
44013040	Ulaalu loleny kilasheeva kwany kilya kilererwa ni veawuya fisuku, kyeyaamba,
44013041	‘Loleny-te yeni vemina, mufulukyo neereka kulu. Mashika yeny sharunda mashora fyeeriny fyany, ishora muleshiidimaa ilyiirikya nta, naako mwoongoywa inda.’ “
44013042	Naasa kyeeri vekee isomuka, vakavatereva vashevavia-se marero yoo-da elyi sabato ya kavii.
44013043	Kyeeri mwindye vekee isomuka, Vayuda na valya vaalukye veengyi vakakutira na Paulo na Barnaba; vekyirera nawo, vakavavika nrima naambo vawarani neekaa na isarya lya Iruva.
44013044	Naasa elyi lya sabato ya kavii, vandu veengyi nnu, kufii muri moose vakakusanyirya naambo vashearanya Irero lya Iruva.
44013045	Kyaindi Vayuda wo kyeeri valelollya nsemu wa vandu vakaishwa kififi, vakakana deny marero alya alererwa ni Paulo, vellyaa ulai na yaarara.
44013046	Paulo na Barnaba vakarera nookaari nnu, vakaamba, Mmbo kileva, nkuti Irero lya Iruva lyaambawa kwany yeni mbele, lyo kimmba mwalyiisityo kwaasha, neekulollya sheelyi yeni mmutinnyo mmuu wa llung'anu, naasa lolely, lweendany kwa vandu va masanga.
44013047	Shamashika Nndumi aleluvia, mmbo shilekuvika kuve sa yeevaiya vandu, kuve ukiri fika fishingony fya ulana.
44013048	Llya vandu va masanga valeita indo vakafura, vakarumisha Irero lya Nndumi, na valya vekee vadeesye umangyi lwa iruveeu vakakusirya-u.
44013049	Irero lya Nndumi lyikakwaana urukeny lulya koose.
44013050	Indi Vayuda vakaaya vaka valya vatiri nnduma vakaveva vasaari amwi na vaniini va muri, na vandu naambo vaarare Paulo na Barnaba; vakavaumbuta vauke efo minyanuny yaawo.
44013051	Wo vakavakukutya kiulye kya marende awo, vakaenda Ikonio.
44013052	Vakiloshyony vakaishwa ifura na Mumuyo Mweele.
44014001	Naasa vekifika kulya Ikonio vakaanga mwiindeny wa Vayuda, na shaasa llya valerera, ironda iniini lya Vayuda na Vagriki vakakusiryau.
44014002	Kyaindi llyo Vayuda valya valandealuke vakafuluta vandu va masanga vakavaishura nrima nkasha kwa valya venkusirya.
44014003	Naasa vakakaafo kyeeri kyaasha, vereraa na ukaari vekayo ni Nndumi, yeto alekureekya irero lya isarya lyakwe, kavalyimya ngyende na findo filandelollyo fitanwa mmbo.
44014004	Lyo yewo vekaa miriny vakaraukana; maata vakakaa kyaalu kya Vayuda na yengyi kyaalu kya Varumi.
44014005	Numa Vayuda veshaakana na vandu va masanga amwi na vaniini vawo vakakusara itannya varumii makasha.
44014006	Varumi vakawonisa mbony yeto vakarishya Listra na Derbe ikee miri ya Likonia na ngyuruka ta nnyanuny,
44014007	vakakaafo, veshaambaa Nrumi ya Nsia.
44014008	Neefo Listra kweifo nndu umwi, ekee, kitongororo uka elyo awonika kwa maye, nnta nnyemwiidima irua-rua-fo.
44014009	Nndu yeto mmbo ekee iirannya Paulo eshaamba Nrumi ya Nsia. Paulo kallola kyuumu kamanya atiri kikusiryo kya inshiisa.
44014010	Nrumi kakooma na na unyanga uniini, kammbia, “Salala shumu na marende afo.” Kasalala swany, kkapooka yeenda.
44014011	Naasa nsemu ulya wikilollya filya Paulo atana vakaonisa ngyunyanga tawo vakaamba kwa Kilikaonia, Maruva allusheya vekee sha vandu.
44014012	Barnaba vakamfishya Zeu, na Paulo vakamfishya Herme mashika elyi we ekeerera.
44014013	Nkohani wa Zeu eetiri mmba yeeterevya yekee yoo mbee ya muri ulya, keende ng'umbe na ngyureto na fivaro fika yoo mwaangony, kakunda iniingya firaso ando amwi na nsemu ulya wa vandu.
44014014	Kyeeri Barnaba na Paulo valemanya, vakarandwa soori tawo, vakaangusya yaanga kulya vanduny vakakooma,
44014015	vakaamba, “Nyira vomi, nkikyi elyi mwatana indi? Yese neese ni vandu va vandu kimwi sheeni moose, mmbo lwamoongoya Nrumi ya Nsia, naambo mwinduke neera mbony yeti ta tangalu, na iindukya Iruva yeu akee na muu, yeu aleumba iruveeu na ulana na yeeve-da na fyoose fiifo;
44014016	mmbwe yeto kasha alera vandu va masanga vasore shia tawo veni.
44014017	Lyo nalare nakae nalatiri ukureeki, mashika aletana mesha, kamuniinga mmbwa yakwe yuuka iruveeu, na kyeeri kya fimu, kawuutisa miri yaany shoonga na nsia.”
44014018	Na kwa marero yoo kikava kiroo kwawo iima nsemu ulya wa vandu ivautya firaso.
44014019	Kyaindi Vayuda vakasha vauka Antiokia na Ikonio vakaaya mamwingyi ulya wa vandu kutani vakapa Paulo na mawe, vakanrufwa na si fika kipoo ya muri, veekusarye mmbo ammaa ifwa.
44014020	Llo kyeeri vakiloshony vendingitye taari toose, kasalala, kaanga na kulya muriny; na elyi lya ndesi kauka-fo, keenda ando amwi na Barnaba fika Derbe.
44014021	Naasa ekimaa yaamba Nrumi ya Nsia kulya muriny ulya, neewonisa vakiloshyony veengyi, kawuya-se na kulya Listra, Ikonio na Antiokia.
44014022	Vakavangisa mirima ya vakiloshyony, neevaikima vakae iirikyony lyilya, na ekyo sheelyi nkuti lwaange umangyiny lwa Iruva na mavina meengyi.
44014023	Naasa vekimaa ivika vamiku va siri, na itereva ando amwi nawo neekotoya, vakavavika maakony a Nndumi yeto vankusirye.
44014024	Vakaira yoo nnang'ani ya Pisidia vakafika Pamfilia.
44014025	Nawo vekimaa yaamba Nrumi ya Nsia efo Perge vakaoloka vakafika Atalia.
44014026	Naasa kuuka yoo vakeenda kyaaro kya mureny fika Antiokia. Efo mfo valeterevyo isarya lya Iruva kyeendwa ni ishora llya vemmaa ilyirunda.
44014027	Llya valefika indi vakaumbya siri, vakavaongoya findo fyoose Iruva aletana ando amwi nawo, na kyeyaamba Iruva mmbo alemmaa iruya vandu va masanga mwango wa iirikyo.
44014028	Vakairisha-fo kyeeri kyaasha kyaangu ando amwi na vakiloshyony.
44015001	Vakasoka nafo vandu valeuka Yudaya, vakashelosha vandu sheelyi, mulanrinwa shaasa lukee uvavaso lwa Mose, mmushidimaa ikirwo-fo.
