44015002	Naasa Paulo na Barnaba vekimaa ivakyana na vandu yewo nnu, neerouwana nawo kyuumu, siri karummbwa sheelyi Paulo na Barnaba na vengyi-se nnang'ani yawo varwe na Yerusalemu kwa Varumi na vamiku va siri kyeendwa ni mbony yeyo.
44015003	Naasa siri ikavarika; vakaira yoo nnang'ani ya uruka lwa Foinike na Samaria, vevambisaa mbony ta yaaluka lya vandu va masanga, vandu va kikusiryo vakafura nnu.
44015004	Kyeeri valefika Yerusalemu vakawaryo ni varumi na vamiku, vakavaongoya findo fyoose Nndumi aletana ando amwi nawo.
44015005	Kyaindi vandu vave va siri ya Mafarisayo vaalukye vakasalala vakaamba, nkuti varinwa na ivavasya vatire uvavaso lwa Mose.
44015006	Varumi na vamiku vakakusanyirya naambo vedimi ikusara kindo eki.
44015007	Naasa vammaa irera findo fiingyi Petro kasalala kavavia, “Vanavama, yeni mwiishi sheelyi uka mapookyony Iruva aleshisauwa shyuuke nnang'ani yaany naambo vandu va masanga veete irero lya Nrumi ya Nsia na kana kakwa, neelyiirikya.
44015008	Na Iruva yeto eeshi mirima ya vandu kavakureekya, evaningaa Mumuyo Mweele indo kimwi sha yese;
44015009	nta nnyalevikau kilakaniso nnang'ani yeeru yese nawo-fo; kavasangya mirima yaawo na kikusiryo.
44015010	Naasany ulaalu nkikyi elyi mukeesa Iruva mwivikaa mario singony ta vakiloshyony mario kulaore vande veru nta yese luveni lulashidimaa iipoo.
44015011	Kuuta elyi lwiirikye sheelyi mmbo lushekirwaa kyeendwa ni isarya lya Nndumi Yesu kimwi nsi nawo.”
44015012	Naasa shila shoose ikamalallya, vakaarannya Paulo na Barnaba vevaviaa mbony ta ngyende na findo filandelolyo, Iruva alefitana kimaruma kya nrumi yaawo kwa vandu va masanga.
44015013	Naasa vekimaa imalallya na Yakobo, karouwa, kaamba, “Vanavama, nkyeshaaranyiny-te!
44015014	Simion mmbo aleloongoya shaasa Iruva yoo mapookyony alevaasya vandu va masanga naambo nasauwe vandu nnang'ani yaawo vave vandu vakwe.
44015015	Na marero a veawuya fisuku akasumana na yoo, shaasa kyikee kireiye kyeyaamba,
44015016	‘Numa ya mbony yeti nshewuyaa, neeny nshetanaa se mmba ya Davidi ilya ilewunduka. Nsheitana lyingyi iwa lya vayo neeny nshisaleesaa.
44015017	Naambo vandu yewo valeturunya varuuye Nndumi, na vandu va masanga woose yewo irina lyakwa lyikeesendwa kwawo;
44015018	Nndumi aamba, yefyo uka mapookyony.’ “
44015019	“Kimmba niindo neeny sharumbwa indi; lulasaveese vandu va masanga valya valealukya Nndumi.
44015020	Lyo luvavie vakwiise na utefusu lwa maruva engyi na utuusi na nyama tikee shisasande na samu.
44015021	Mashika uka elyo kasha Mose mmbo atiri vandu vakeyaamba mbony takwe, na wo muriny na wo nkonu wa sabato tikasomwa fisomyony fya Vayuda.”
44015022	Naasa kyikasennya varumi na vamiku na siri shoose isauwa vandu nnang'ani yaawo neevaruma Antiokia ando amwi na Paulo na Barnaba; nawo mmbo yeva, Yuda evaangwaa Barsaba, na Sila, vekee vandu va nrwe nnang'ani ya siri. Vakareiya indi neevaningya vavarwaaye na maako awo,
44015023	Varumi na vanavama vamiku, kwa vanavama veru vakee Antiokia na Shamu na Kilikia, mukee va masanga: Lwamwidikira nnuu.
44015024	Mashika elyi luleeta sheelyi vandu maata valeuka kunu kweru mmbo valemwaatara na marero awo, vakaeveta mirima yaany, nawo nshi yese lulevaruma-fo;
44015025	naasa lukalollya nkisha, kimmba lwammaisanda mirwe ando amwi na nrima umwi, isauwa vandu na ivaruma kwany ando amwi na vakunde veru Barnaba na Paulo,
44015026	nawo ni vandu valemmbika muu wawo nrengeny kimaruma kya irina lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
44015027	Naasany mmbo lwamurumya Yuda na Sila, vashemuviaa wo veni na marero yoo meni vaambe na kana kawo.
44015028	Mashika mmbo kilesenya Mumuyo Mweele na yese, lulavarike mario kuuta tupu yekyo kyikee kuti,
44015029	kyeyaamba mukwiise na findo fileniingyo firaso kwa maruva a wongo, na samu na nyama tikee shisasande na samu, na utuusi. Mukankwiisa efyo, mmbo mwantana kisha. Kaeny na ufoo.
44015030	Naasa yewo vekimaa isamwa vakasokya na Antiokia; na vekimaa isanyirya siri shoose vakavarambikya barua ilya.
44015031	Nawo vekimaa iisoma vakafura nnu kimaruma kya iviiryo muu indo.
44015032	Na lyingyi Yuda na Sila, kimmba wo ni veawuya fisuku vakaikima siri na marero meengyi vakavavangisa.
44015033	Nawo vekikaa-fo ando a fyeeri da vakasamwa nsiri vaende na ufoo vawuye kwa yewo valevaruma. [
44015034	Llyo we Sila kalollya nkisha nasaefo.]
44015035	Wo Paulo na Barnaba vakakaa kulya Antiokia, veloshaa na yaamba Irero lya Nndumi, ando amwi na vandu vengyi veengyi.
44015036	Kwikyiira-u mikonu mive na mive Paulo kavia Barnaba, “Kyasia ulaalu luwuye lundelola siri ya wo muri kulya luleamba kirero kya Nndumi, lumanyi shaasa veefo.”
44015037	Barnaba kakunda iipoo Yohane ulya evaangwa Marko neende nawo.
44015038	Paulo nalasenyo imwipoo mashika llya evara kulya Pamfilia, nalaende nawo mashoreny.
44015039	Naasa kukasha-u ngany nnang'ani yaawo kutani valakana. Barnaba kaipoo Marko vakaenda Kipro.
44015040	Paulo we keepoo Sila, kakupoo, ekiterevyo ni siri nawoni isarya lya Nndumi.
44015041	Keera kulya Shamu na Kilikia evangisaa siri.
44016001	Naasa Paulo kafika Derbe na Listra, na yoo kweiyo wa kiloshyony umwi evaangwaa Timoteo, nawe mmwana wa nka umwi Myuda ekee wa siri; kyaindi ndeye we ni Mgriki.
44016002	Nndu yeu mmbo alekureekywa nisha ni siri ya Listra na Ikonio.
44016003	Paulo kakunda yeu neende nawe, kammbwarya kanrina kimaruma kya Vayuda valya vekee taari tilya; mashika woose veishi ndeye ni Mgriki.
44016004	Naasa kyeeri veke iira kulya miriny ilya, vakavaniingya mavavaso alya alevikwa ni varumi na vamiku kulya Yerusalemu, naambo nawo vaaringe.
44016005	Siri tikavanga iirikyony yelyo, yeekena lyawo lyikaengereka wo nkonu.
44016006	Vakaira urukeny lwa Frigia na Galatia, Mumuyo Mweele kaveema valasheenda Asia indeambafo irero elyo.
44016007	Vekifika kufii na Misia, vakaasa yeenda Bitinia, kyaindi Mumuyo wa Yesu mbulevaniinga mumu-fo,
44016008	vakakillya Misia vakasokya Troa.
44016009	Naasa elyi kio Paulo koorwa kindo; mmbo alelollya nndu wa Makedonia esalalyi, kantereva kammbia, “Ruuka kushelweekya kunu Makedonia.”
44016010	Naasa kyeeri alemaa ilolya indo, llya yeni lukakunda yeenda Makedonia, mashika yese mmbo lulelollya deny sheelyi Iruva mmbo aluvaanga-fo lundeamba-fo Nrumi ya Nsia.
44016011	Naasa lukauka Troa na ngalava lukafika Samotrake, na nkonu wa kavii lukafika Neapoli;
44016012	na kuukau lukafika Filipi, muri wa Makedonia nto muri nniini wa uruka lulya, ando Varome vasaamyi; lukakaa muriny yeu, mikonu mive na mive.
44016013	Kwikifika nkonu wa sabato lukasomuka kipoo ya ngiri, lukeenda mbaambaa ya mura, lwikusarye kulakooye luwonaa-u ando esha eterevya; lukakaa rembo lukarera na vaka veiyo.
44016014	Nka umwi, irina lyakwe avaangwa Lidya, ekumbaa fwana ya kinyanyari, ni nndu wa Tiatira, aindye Iruva, kalwarannya waarya, nawe nrima wakwe uleruwa ni Nndumi, navike nriminy marero a Paulo.
44016015	Na kyeeri alemaa ibatiswa, we na va mmba yakwe, kalwikima, kaamba, “Kwakooya dede mushilollye shikee mwiindya Nndumi, angeny kyeny kwakwa mukae-u. " Kalulelemba deny.”
44016016	Naasa kyeeri lwekeenda ando alya eterevya, kishinga kimwi kyetirwa mmumuyo weemanya findo, kalukooya, nawe mmbo emmbonisya vanndumi vakwe fesa shiingyi kwa ishoro elyo.
44016017	Kasora Paulo neese ekomaa, kaamba, " “Vandu yeva ni varundi va Iruva akee uwe, vakeelosha shia ya dede ya ukiro.
44016018	Katana indo ando a mikonu miingyi. Indi Paulo kasua, kainduka kavia mumuyo ulya, ‘Shakukyeemmya na irina lya Yesu Kristo, muuke.’ Kamuuka saa ilya sheni.”
44016019	Naasa vandumi vakwe vekilollya sheelyi mbusha yaawo ikeereka, vakatira Paulo na Sila, vakavarufwa na si fika singireny mbee ya vaniini va muri;
44016020	vakavarwaa kwa verumbwa mwaandu, vakaamba, Vandu yeva mmbo vakeelyamara muri weru nnu, nawo ni Vayuda;
44016021	na lyingyi mmbo vakeamba mbony ta mikaaye ilakee ya usumanu kweru iwarya nta iilatya, mashika yese lukee Varome.
44016022	Nsemu yeto wa vandu moose ukakupoo ukavasora, verummbwa mwaandu vakavauta soori tawo na finya, vakavavasya vakapwa na filemu.
44016023	Na vekimaa ivakapa ngapo niini nnu vakaveera kifingyony, vakavavasya nringyi wa kifingyony navaringe nnu.
44016024	Ekimaa iwonisa ivavaso elyi, kavaerya efo kiryeny kya efo mmba, kavafinga na minyororo.
44016025	Kyeeri kya kio nnang'ani Paulo na Sila mmbo veketereva Iruva na ikwimmbya fiimbo fyeerumisha, Iruva na vafungwa vengyi vevaaranya.
44016026	Paripari kukasha kidinasi, kutani sumbai na kifingyony kyarerema, na lyimwi nsi myaango ikarwiika, fifungo fya woose fikeeleliswa.
44016027	Nringyi ulya wa kifingyo kakupoo, nawe ekilollya myaango ya kifingyo yanrwiika, koommwa usu, kakunda ikuwaa, ekusarye vafungwa mmbo vanrisha.
44016028	Llyo Paulo alekooma na finya, kammbia, kulakuvavise-fo, mashika yese loose luiyo.
44016029	Kaamba taa teendwa, kakillya mmba, eererema na weerei, kawoya Paulo na Sila;
44016030	naasa kavasomuta poo kaamba, “Vanndumi vakwa, shatana-ki ndesa naambo shikooye ukiro?”
44016031	Vakammbia, Kusirye na Nndumi Yesu, neewe kushekiaa ando amwi na va mmba yafo.
44016032	Vakammbia Irero lya Nndumi, we na vandu woose vakeemmba kwakwe.
44016033	Kavawarya kwakwe saa ilya sheni ya kio, kavasangya fyaasha filya fyawo, kavebatiswa, we na vandu vakwe woose kyeeri ekyo kyeni.
44016034	Kaveende mmba kwakwe, kavadeesya shoonga, katirwa ni nsia nnu, we na mmba yakwe shoose, mashika elyi ammaa ikusirya na Iruva.
44016035	Elyi kulekya veanduya vandu vakaruma vaniini va asikari vakaamba, “Kureeyeny vandu valya veende.”
44016036	Nringyi ulya wa kifingyo kasheruuya Paulo mbony yeti kammbia, “Verumbuya vandu mmbo varuma mbony naambo mushelotorwa, naasa ulaalu somukeny, kweengyeny na ufoo.”
44016037	Paulo kammbia, “Mmbo valukapa mbee ya vandu woose kulare valluutya uvingo, neese mmbo lukee Varome, na lyingi vakalweera kifingyony, noolalu mmbo vakundye iluuta-fo kirisi? Oode! Nshi indo-fo, na vashe veni vasheluuta-fo.”
44016038	Vaniini va maaskari vakarwaaya verumbuya vandu mbony ta marero yaa; nawo vakeereya, kyeeri valeeta wo ni Varome.
44016039	Vakavalelemba; na elyi valemaa ivasomuta poo, vakavatereva vauke kulya muriny ulya.
44016040	Nawo vakooka kifingyony vakaanga kyeny kwa Lidya; na elyi valemaa ikwaanannya na Siri neevakaarisa, vakakweengya.
44017001	Kyeeri valemaa iira Amfipoli na Apolonia vakafika Tesalonike, na yoo kweiyo mmba ya Vayuda yeeterevya.
44017002	Na Paulo shaasa eeshivye, kaanga na kulya vakai, kavesana neerouwana nao marero a mareiyo, ando a sabato isaru.
44017003	Kavarambuya mareiyo na ivaora sheelyi mmbo kyekooye Kristo nalyiso ukiva neeruka nooke kwa vafu; na kingi-se, Yesu yeu shikee moongoya yeni mbony takwe niwe Kristo.
44017004	Veengyi nnang'ani yaawo vakakusiryau, vakakulunga na Paulo na Sila; na Vagriki veirikye Iruva, veengyi nnu na vaka vatiri nnduma vekee veengyi.
44017005	Na Vayuda vakalollya kififi, vakaipoo vandu vave vakee vandu va tangalu, valatiri nnduma nsha vanduny, nawo vakaumbya vandu vakaanta kituuru kulya muriny, vakeengya vandu va mmba ya Yason, vakakunda ivarwaa mbee ya vandu va muri;
44017006	kyeeri valevatura vakaburusa Yason na vandu vengyi fika mbee ya vaniini va muri, vekomaa, vakaamba, “Vandu yeva valemfullwa ulana vamfika kunu nafo, na
44017007	Yason kavawarya; na yeva woose mmbo vakeetana findo fikeekapana na mavavaso a Kaisari, veshambaa, ‘Kwiifo mangyi ingyi avaangwaa Yesu.’ “ "
44017008	Vakaerevise nsemu ulya wa vandu na vaniini va muri llya valeita indo.
44017009	Vekimaa ivarya ikari lyuuka Yason na valya vengyi vakavalotora vakakweengya.
44017010	Na llya yeni Siri ilya ikarwaa Paulo na Sila Beroya elyi kio. Nawo kyeeri valefikafo vakaanga kiterevyony kya Vayuda.
44017011	Vandu yeva vekee vafoo ngota valya va Tesalonike, mashika mmbo valewarya irero llya na nrima nsha, vakasununda mareiyo meele wo nkonu, naambo valole kwakooya mbony yeto ni indo tikai. "
44017012	Veengyi nnang'ani yaawo vakakusiryau, na vaka va Kigriki vatiri nnduma, na vomi vekee veengyi.
44017013	Kyaindi kyeeri Vayuda wa Tesalonike valeeta irero lya Iruva mmbo lyikeyoongowa ni Paulo kulya Beroya, vakandefika-fo nafo vakasarya vandu neevasaveesa.
44017014	Kyeeri ekyo kyeni vandu va siri ilya vakarwaa Paulo mbai ya yeve, kyaindi Sila na Timoteo vakasaa-u mbele.
44017015	Llyo valya valeimmya Paulo kulya Atene vakawuya, nao vekaende ivavaso sheelyi Sila na Timoteo walantye Paulo uvinyadwa.
44017016	Kyeeri Paulo ekeevavereya kulya Atene neelollya shaasa muri ulya wiishwe mafwanu a maruva, nrima wakwe ukavava nnu deny.
44017017	Naasa efo mmba ya kiterevyo ya Vayuda na veindya Iruva kavesana neerouwana nawo, ando amwi na valya venlolyaa wo nkonu singireny.
44017018	Na Vaepikureo maata na Vaistoiko, vatiri urango, vakakwanannya nawe. Vengyi vakaamba, “Yeu ni nrung'ani, a nki akunndye yaamba?” Vengyi-se vakaamba, “Akee sheelyi ni mwaamba mbony ta maruva meny, mmashika llya ekeyaamba mbony ta Yesu na iruka lya vafu.”
44017019	Vakantira vakanrwaa mmba ya shila, vakaamba, Ndesa lushiidima imanya kya ufundo yelu wiiya kukeererya?
44017020	Mashika mmbo kukeende mbony shiiya maarwiny eru, mmbo lukunndye imanyany urango lwa mbony eti.
44017021	Mashika Vaatene na veny veefo mmbeekundye imanya kindo kingyi-fo kuuta yaamba na iita mbony shiiya.
44017022	Paulo kasalala yoo nnang'ani kavii ya mmba ya shila kaamba, Yeni vandu va Atene, nnang'ani ya findo fyoose mmbo shilollye yeni ni vandu vekusara nnu mbony ta iindya maruva.
44017023	Mashika kyeeri shekeiira efo neefo neelollya mbony ta miindye yaany, mmbo shilelollya kitara kyerasya kyikee kireiye, KWA IRUVA NALAISHIWA. Kyasiany, yeny mmbo shimuviaa mbony ta yeto mukeemwindya kulaore mumwiishi.
44017024	Iruva yeto atanye ulana na findo fyoose fiifo, we, kimmba akee Nndumi wa iruveeu na si, nalakaa mbeny tikeeshitane na maako;
44017025	nta nalarundyoo mmaako a vandu sheelyi mmbo akee mwaanguye nkindo mmbwe yeto aniinga woose muu na mumuyo na findo fyoose.
44017026	Nawe mmbo alevikafo vandu va wo isanga vauka kwa yeto umwi nsi, vakee yaa ulaniny koose, kyeeri alemaa ivavikya fyeeri filya alefivavasya uka elyo kasha, na minyanu ya efo vakai,
44017027	naambo varuuye Iruva, na kyikava ni iwara-wara, lyo vallolye, na kikava nnyakaa kwaasha neese-fo.
44017028	Shamashika mmbo lukee na muu efo nnang'ani yakwe, lukaruarua-fo. Shaasa umwi waany, mwireiya fyaaso aleamba, Mashika yese loose mmbo lukee vana vakwe.”
44017029	Naasany kimmba yese lukee vana va Iruva, nkivaa yese lukusare Iruva ni wa ngata ya saabu ao fesa ao iwe, nafyo mfindo fikee fipashe na urango na waarya lwa nndu wa vandu-fo.
44017030	Naasa, fyeeri filya fya ireema Iruva mmbo aleva sheelyi nalalollye, indi ulaalu mmbo avavasya vandu woose va wo ando vakurye.
44017031	Shamashika mmbo avikye nkonu yeto asherumbuya ulana yelu mwaandu kya usumanu, kwa nndu ulya alensauwa; nawe mmbo alelyimya vandu nrima nkaari wa mbony yeti elyi alenduta auka kwa vafu.
44017032	Naasa vekiita mbony ta iruka lya vafu, vengyi vakamina; na vengyi vakaamba, lushekwaanyaa lyingyi kya mbony yeyo.
44017033	Paulo ekimaa irera keenda kavara-u.
44017034	Vandu maata vakakutira nawe, vakakusiryau; nnang'ani ya yewo ni Dionisio Mwareopago, na nka umwi irina lyakwe ni Damari, na vandu vengyi-da ando amwi nawo.
44018001	Numa ya findo efyo, Paulo kauka Atene kafika Korinto.
44018002	Kalollya-fo Myuda umwi avaangoo Akila, awonikye Ponto; nawe mmbo asheye auka Italia mikonu ya kufii, ando amwi na nkawakwe Priskila, ni llya Klaudio emmumbuta Vayuda woose wooke Rome, nawe kafikya kwawo,
44018003	na kimmba ishora lyawo lya waarya lyekee lyimwi, kakaa kwawo, vakarundya ando amwi, mashika verunda mashora eefuma meema.
44018004	Wo sabato karera efo mmba yeeterevya, naambo noomwi Vayuda na Vagriki.
44018005	Naasa kyeeri Sila na Timoteo valesoka vauka Makedonia, Paulo kavangisa nnu irero llya, ekureekyaa Vayuda kyeyaamba Yesu ni Kristo.
44018006	Vekillya nawe ulai na yaarara Iruva, kasisika soori takwe kavavia, “Samu yaany imusheye uwe ya mirwe yaany; yeny nshitiri mbese-fo, uka ulaalu mmbo nshendaa kwa vandu va masanga.”
44018007	Kooka-u kaanga mmba kwa nndu umwi avaangwaa Tito Yusto, mwiindya Iruva, nawe mmba yakwe mmbo yekee nnyanu na kiterevyo kya Vayuda.
44018008	Krispo, nniini wa kiterevyo ekyo, kakusirya Nndumi ando amwi na mmba yakwe shoose. Kyeeri Vakorinto veeta indo, nawo vakakusiryau, vakabatiswa.
44018009	Nndumi kavia Paulo na yoorya kio, kulairyee-fo, rera, nta kuladeerye-fo,
44018010	mashika yeny shikee neewe, nta nkwiifo nndu akupaana-fo, nyelyi yeny shitiri vandu veengyi kunu muriny yeu.
44018011	Kakaa-fo ando a mwaka umwi na miiri irindaru eelosha-fo Irero lya Iruva.
44018012	Kyeeri Galio ekee nshilyi wa Akaya, Vayuda vakaanta kituuru na Paulo, vakamweende ishenkumba,
44018013	vakaamba, “Nndu yeu mmbo akee yoomwa vandu vaindye Iruva kafisha mavavaso.”
44018014	Naasa Paulo ekundye itarambwa kana narere, Galio kavia Vayuda, “Kukooye kweiyo kindo kyantambo ao kikasha, yeni Vayuda, kyevaa usumanu yeny shiirikyani neeni;
44018015	kyaindi kwakooya ni mbony ta marero na marina na mavavaso any, Loleny efyo yeni muveni, mashika yeny nshikundye iva mwianduya findo sheefyo-fo.”
44018016	Kavafuna vakauka alya mbee ya kiri kilya kya mwirumbwa myaandu.
44018017	Nawo woose vakatira Sostene, nniini wa kiterevyo kya Vayuda, vakankapya yoo mbee ya kitima ekyo. Galio nalalollye nkindo.
44018018	Numa ya mbony eti Paulo keengera ikaafo mikonu miingyi numa kasamana na siri naambo neende Shamu na ngalava; na Priskila na Akila vakeenda nawe, kyeeri alemaa yuuta fii alya Kenkrea, mashika emmbika kyaasa
44018019	Vekifika Efeso kavatiya-fo. We muni kaanga kiterevyony kya Vayuda karera nawo.
44018020	Lya valekunda nakee-u mmwasi we kalema;
44018021	we kalakana nawo, eshaambaa, shimuwuiyaa-se kwakooya Iruva akunda. Kasaama ngalava kooka Efeso,
44018022	na kyeeri alefika Kaisaria, keedikira siri, naasa kasokany na Antiokia.
44018023	Naasa ekyikaa-fo mikonu mive na mive kakupoo, keera yoo nnang'ani ya uruka lwa Galatia na Frigia, muri kwi muri, ekarisaa vakiloshyony.
44018024	Naasa Myuda umwi irina lyakwe ni Apolo, awonikye Aleksandiria, ni nndu asomyi deny, kafika Efeso, nawe ekee ntakusu wa mareiyo.
44018025	Nndu yeto mmbo elloshwa shia ya Nndumi; na kimmba nriminy wakwe etiri nkukumo, kapooka irera na ilosha mbony ta Yesu songosiny deny; lyo we mmbo eeshi ubatiso lwa Yohane weni.
44018026	Kapooka irera nookaari kiterevyony kya Vayuda, na kyeeri Priskila na Akila walemwiita vakanrwaa kwawo, vakallosha shia ya Nndumi nisha mmwasi.
44018027	Na kyeeri ekundye iruuka yeeve neende Akaya, siri ikareiya, vareiye vakiloshyony barwa naambo vambwarye; nawe kyeeri efika-fo keekya nnu valya vemmaa ikusirya-u kwi isarya lya Iruva.
44018028	Mashika mmbo evinga Vayuda nnu kyuumu vandu woose velollye, ewooraa na mareiyo sheelyi Yesu ni Kristo.
44019001	Naasa kyeeri Apolo ekee Korinto na Paulo ekimaa iira ngyuruka eto ta taari ya ndoo, kafika Efeso, kakwaanannya-fo na vakiloshyo vaangu,
44019002	kavavesa, “A mulewarya Mumuyo Mweele kyeeri mulekusiryau?” Vakammbia, “Oode, nta iita sheelyi kukaa-fo Mumuyo Mweele llulemiita-fo.”
44019003	Kavavesa, “A mmbo mulebatisyo ubatiso lungalu?” Vakaamba, “Ni ubatiso lwa Yohane.”
44019004	Paulo kaamba, “Yohane alebatisa ubatiso lwa ikurya ulyamari, eeviaa vandu vakusirye, yeto asheshaa numa, we Yesu.”
44019005	Vekimaa iita efyo vakabatiswa na irina lya Ndumi Yesu.
44019006	Na Kyeeri Paulo alemaa iveekerya maako Mumuyo Mweele kavaolokya; vakapooka irera na fishomu fingyi verumishaa Iruva.
44019007	Woose yewo vekee vomi ikumi na vavii.
44019008	Kaanga kiterevyony kya Vayuda, Karera na ukaari ando a miiri iraru, eereryana nawo, na yoomwa vandu kya mbony ta umangyi lwa Iruva.
44019009	Vengyi vakaumisa ngoo, vakalema ikusirya-u, vakamina shia yei vandu vengyi veiitye. Naasa kauka-u kavara-u, kavika vakiloshyony mbai, kareryana na vandu wo nkonu efo mmba ya ikwaanu ya nndu umwi avaangwaa Tirano.
44019010	Mbony yeti tikaenda indo ando a myaaka ivii, kutani vandu woose va Asia, Vayuda na Vagriki vaita irero lya Nndumi.
44019011	Iruva kaora na ngyende shiingyi tiilanyi fyeeso fiingy kwa shia ya maako a Paulo,
44019012	kutani vandu valoe veengyo firami na soori tooka mwiiliny wakwe, ndwari tawo tikavauka, na mimuyo mikasha ikavauka.
44019013	Vayuda maata veraaraa na vengyi ni vaanga va mimuyo mikasha vakeesa isenda irina lya Yesu kweewo vekee valammyi ni mimuyo mikasha, veshambaa, shamulyisa mboo na irina lya Yesu, ulya akee yambawa ni Paulo.
44019014	Veefo vana mfungare va nndu umwi avangwaa Skewa, Myuda, nkohani nniini, mmbo vetana indo.
44019015	Mumuyo ulya nkasha kavavia, “Yesu shamumanya na Paulo shimwiishi a yeni ni vaki?”
44019016	Na nndu ulya etirwa mmumuyo nkasha karumbukya vavii, kaveedima kavaringa kutani vasomuka mmba ilya veerishaa valaree soori vammbikwa na fyaasha.
44019017	Mbony yei ikamanyika ni Vayuda na Vagriki woose vakee Efeso, weerei lukavatira woose, na irina lya Nndumi Yesu lyikang'aniswa.
44019018	Na veengyi va valya venkusirya-u vakakurya veshoraa paa mashora awo.
44019019	Na vandu vengyi vasavi vakaipoo fitabu fyawo vakafikora na muro mbee ya vandu woose; vakakapa yeekena lya vayo, tikafika fesa fiku makumi araanu.
44019020	Kikavaany niindo irero lya Nndumi lyileengera ivinga na finya.
44019021	Mbony yeto tikimaa itanyika, Paulo ekimaa iira nnang'ani ya Makedonia na Akaya, karummbwa shila neende Yerusalemu, eshambaa, “Shammuka-fo shivefika na Rumi nafo.”
44019022	Karuma-u vandu vavii nnang'ani ya valya vemfurukanyaa veende Makedonia, nawo ni Timoteo na Erasto, kyaindi we muni keengera ikaa mbele yoo Asia.
44019023	Kyeeri ekyo kukakaa-fo ngatara ilakee shidu kya mbony ta Shia yei ya Nndumi.
44019024	Mashika nndu umwi evaangwa Demetrio mfuru wa fesa na isongosia mafwanu a fesa a mmba teeterevya ta Artemi (iruva lya Kigriki lya kyika) eewonisyaa vaarya valya vawo fesa shiingyi.
44019025	Yewo kavasanyirya na vengyi se yewo vekee va ishora elyo yeni, kaamba, “Eni vomi, mwishi usimba lweru mmbo luukye kunu ishoreny elyi.
44019026	Na ulaalu mwiitye sheelyi nshi kunu Efeso kweni-da-fo, ni Asia koose Paulo mmbo ammeveta vandu veengyi neevainduta mirima yaawo, eshaambaa yoo akeesongosyo mmaako a vandu nshi maruva-fo.
44019027	Nkyo kyaamba ulaalu ishora elyi lyeru nshi lyikee nrengeny yeeminwa-da-fo; kyaindi na mmba ya iruva lya kika elyo lying'ani, we Artemi, mmbo lyilolyoo nshi kindo-fo, lyisokwa itumbe lya vayo, nalyo Asia shoose na ulana loose-da mmbo valyiinndye.”
44019028	Vekiita indo vakarooyo ni unyafi, vakaongora, veshaambaa, “Artemi wa Efeso ni nniini.”
44019029	Muri moose ukasavaa, vandu woose vakeenda vakandefika ando kwa fitavanu veeriani, vammaa itira Gayo na Aristariko ni vandu va Makedonia veriani na Paulo.
44019030	Paulo mmbo ekundye isanga efo vanduny yewo llyo vakiloshyony vakantira.
44019031	Vasongoru va Asia maata, valya vakee vambuya vakwe, vakaruma vandu kwakwe, vamwikimbe nalashendefika tara alya ando a fitavanu.
44019032	Naasany maata mmbo vekee irorongya indi na vengyi indo, mashika ironda lyilya mmbo lyemmalaluka nnu, na vengyi vawo nta mmbemanya nkyokyi kyatanyika kikaveende alya-fo.
44019033	Vakaipoo Iskanda vakamuuta efo irondeny elyo Vayuda vakammbika yoo mbee ya vandu. Iskanda kavatukya woko ekundye nakukureekye woose veiitye.
44019034	Kyaindi llya valemanya we ni Myuda vakarorongya woose ando amwi ando a saa sha ivii indi, veshambaa, “Artemi wa Efeso ni nniini.”
44019035	Kyeeri karani wa muri alemaa imalalyisa vandu, kavavia, “Yeni vomi va Efeso, ni vi yeto nalaishi sheelyi muri wa Efeso ni nringyi wa mmba yeerasya ya Artemi, yeto ang'ani, na wa kindo kilya kiwoye kyuuka iruveeu?”
44019036	Naasany kimmba mbony yei ilavaa imina, kyimukooye mumalalye, mulatani kindo kya kara kara-fo.
44019037	Mashika mmbo mweende vandu yeva, mmbaleiva findo fya mmba ya iruva lyeru nta yaarara iruva lyeru lya kyikaa-fo.
44019038	Kyasiany, kwakooya Demetrio na vaarya yewo (vetana fesa) vakee nawe vatiri irero na nndu, ando kwa yaanduya kwiiyo, na verumbuya vandu veefo, kyasia vanderingyanafo.
44019039	Kwakooya ni mbony ya kindo kingyi kyoose, mmbo fisongosyoo ikwaanuny lya usumanu.
44019040	Mashika lyo mmbo lukee nrengeny yeendekumbwa kimaruma kya iraanga yelyi lya inu, nalyo nta llyetiri kimaruma-fo; na shaasa kikai nshidimaa ikuuta mwaandu yeu-fo.
44019041	Elyi amaa irera indo kafinga ikwaanu llya.
44020001	Ntiri ulya kyeeri ulemanda, Paulo karuma vakiloshyony vandevaangwa, ekimaa ivavavasa, kavavia nakwafo. Naasa kakwiipoo-fo neende Makedonia.
44020002	Ekimaa iira taari yeto nevaviirya muu na marero meengyi, kaafukya Ugriki.
44020003	Ekimaa ikaafo ando a miiri iraru, Vayuda vensaryaa, eekundye yeenda Shamu eeshiraa mureny; karumbwa nawuye eshiraa Makedonia.
44020004	Vandu yeva vakeenda nawe, mmbo Sopatro Mberoya, mwana wa Piro, na Aristariko na Sekundo, vandu vaukye Tesalonike; na Gayo nndu wa Derbe, na Timoteo na Tikiko na Trofumu wo ni vandu va Asia.
44020005	Lyo vandu yewo vemmaa isongwa vakandeluvereya Troa.
44020006	Yese lukasaama ngalava lukeenda numa ya mikonu ya mikate ilatiri ntarang'o, lukauka Filipi, lukavakooya Troa, kyaaro kya mikonu iraanu lukakaa-fo mikonu mfungare.
44020007	Naasany nkonu wa mbee weepooka mfungare, lwikusanyirye lulye kilaayo, Paulo kavaongoya mbony, ekusarye elyi lya ndesi neende kyaaro, lyo keengera irera kafika kio nnang'ani.
44020008	Nafo kweefo taa shiingyi kulya ghorofeny lwekai.
44020009	Nsoro umwi evaangwa Eutiko, mmbo ekee yoo idirisheny karengeya karovyo nrwe, kawa ooka ghorofeny ya kararu kasherorowa ammaa ifwa.
44020010	Paulo kaoloka, kammboya, kankulyingilya, kaamba, “Muleereve-fo nyira, mashika muu wakwe useeri-fo nnang'ani yakwe.” "
44020011	Kawuya isaama-se na uwe, kalya shoonga keengera irera nawo fika nraasi, llyo keendany.
44020012	Vakeende nsoro ulya eifo na muu vakawuiyo mmuu kindo kilavaa yaamba.
44020013	Lyo yese lukasongwa yeenda ngalaveny, lukandefika Aso, yese lwiishi mmbo lundeipoony Paulo, ate we mmbo anrummbwa yeenda na marende.
44020014	Kyeeri alelufikya alya Aso, lukansaamisa lukandefika Mitilene. " "
44020015	Lukauka yoo na elyi lya ndesi lukashefika yoo kwiduvani na Kio; elyi lya ndesi se lukaafukya Samo, lukakaa Trogilio, suku ya kaana lukafika Mileto.
44020016	Mashika elyi Paulo ekundye ifika Efeso na ngalava, naambo nalashekeeyo nnu efo Asia, nnyeli ekeyaangusya, naambo nandesumana na nkonu wa Pentekoste kyikammidimika.
44020017	Uka yoo Mileto Paulo karuma vandu Efeso, kavaanga vamiku va siri.
44020018	Vekisha kavavia, " “Yeni muveni mwiishi uka nkonu wa mbee llya shilesha yaa Asia, shaasa shekee kwany mikonu myoose,
44020019	shiirunndyaa Nndumi shikunyiisye nnu, na misoru, na fyeeso yefyo fyoose fileshikooya kimaruma kya Vayuda.
44020020	Nshilekwiisa shara shilavaongoya irero elyo yoose lyiveekyaa-fo, lyo shava mwivalosha paa, mmba kwi mmba.
44020021	Shikureekya Vayuda na Vagriki naambo vaindukye Iruva, na iirikya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
44020022	Llyo ulaalu, loleny, yeny mmbo nkeipoo kyaaro sheende Yerusalemu, shikeemfinge kunu nriminy, shilamanyaa findo fisheshikooyaa kulya.
44020023	Llyo Mumuyo Mweele mmbo akee ishikureekya muri kwi muri eshambaa sheelyi ifingwa na ngatara tikee mbee yakwa.
44020024	Llyo nta nshikusarye sheelyi muu wakwa utiri mbusha deny kwakwafo sha imaa kyaaro kyakwa na urundi llwa shilevaangyo ni Nndumi, ikureekya Nrumi ya Nsia ya Isarya lya Iruva.”
44020025	“Ulaalu loleny, yeni moose shilemoongoya mbony ta umangyi lwa Iruva, kyeeri shileenda efo neefo, mmukishilolyaa-se kisangufo.
44020026	Naasany mmbo nkee mukureekya moose nkonu yeu wa inu, sheelyi shitiri mbese na samu ya nndu moose-fo.
44020027	Mashika nshilera shilamoongoya mbony ta ikunda lya Iruva-fo.
44020028	Kwiiseny muveni, na ironda elyo nalyo, elyo Iruva alemuvika nnang'ani ya vayo naambo muve velyisalallya, naambo mwidimi iisa siri ya Iruva, yeyo aleyuura na samu yakwe muni.
44020029	Shiishi deny sheelyi kyeeri yeny shimaa yuuka yaa, mafite a ngoroshony mmbo ashangaa-u, are alasarya ironda lyany.
44020030	Na lyingise nnang'ani yaany muweni vashekwiipoo vandu vashambaa fyelemba vashoommwa na vakiloshyony yewo vavasore wo.
44020031	Kyasiany laleny shoovi mwimanya ando a myaaka yei iraru, kio na nsanyiny nshilera shilaikyimba wo nndu na misoru-fo.”
44020032	“Naasany ulaalu shamurambikya efo kwa Iruva, na kwa isarya lya irero lyakwe, yelyo lyishidimaa imuringa nemuniinga ding'u ando amwi na woose yewo vakee vailyise.
44020033	Nshilelanga fesa nta saabu, nta masara a nndu-fo.
44020034	Neeni mwiishi mukamanya maako yaa akwa mmbo alerundya filya fishitinnyi na fya valya shekee nawo.
44020035	Yefo findony fyoose mmbo shilemoora sheelyi mukarunda mashora indi mmbo mushiidimaa yeekya vafwafwa, neekumbwa marero a Nndumi Yesu, shaasa aleamba, ‘Ni kyeni yuuta ngota iwarya.’ “
44020036	Kyeeri alemaa irera indo kafiirya ndi, katereva ando amwi nawo woose.
44020037	Vakaiya deny woose, vakakulyingillya Paulo singony, vakammiminda,
44020038	llyo verovyo nnu nriminy kimaruma kya irero llya alevavia mbakillolyaa-se kisangu-fo. Vakamwiimya vakamfita ngalaveny.
44021001	Kyeeri lulemaa ilakana nawo neesama ngalava, lukafika Kosi, neelyi lya ndesi lukafika Rodo na kuukau lukafika Patara,
44021002	lukawonisa-u ngalava yekeenda Foinike lukasaama neepoka kyaaro.
44021003	Lukalollya Kipro lyo lukaira yo woko umuso: Lukeenda lukafika Shamu yoo Tiro. Mashika yoo ng'u ngalava yeeru isheolotwaa mario iriye.
44021004	Lwikimaa ilollya vakiloshyony lukakaa-u ando a mikonu mfungare, nawo vakavia Paulo vaorwa ni Mumuyo Mweele naleende Yerusalemu.
44021005	Kyeeri lulemaa mikonu ilya lukaukau lukakwengya, na vandu woose ando amwi na vaka vawo na vana vawo, vakalwiimya fika kipoo ya muri, lukafirya ndi mbai ya yeeve lukatereva,
44021006	lwikimaa ilakana lukasaama ngalaveny, nawo vakawuya kwawo.
44021007	Lwikimaa kyaaro kyeru luuka Tiro lukafika Tolemai, lukeedikira siri neekaa kwawo nkonu umwi.
44021008	Elyi lya ndesi lukauka-fo lukandefika Kaisaria, lukaanga kyeny kwa Filipo, mwiamba Nrumi ya Nsia, umwi wa valya mfungare, lukakaa kwakwe.
44021009	Nndu yeu mmbo etiri vana va kika vaana valandemanya nndu ndumi, vekee veawuya fisuku.
44021010	Naasa kyeeri lulekaa-u mikonu miingyi, nkisuku umwi avaangwaa Agabo kasoka auka Uyuda.
44021011	Ekilukooya kaipoo nkanda wa Paulo kakufinga we muni marende na maako, kaamba, “Mumuyo Mweele aamba ule, ‘Indi niindo Vayuda va Yerusalemu vashefingaa nndu yeu muni nkanda yeu, nawo mmbo vashemmbikaa maakony a vandu va masanga.’ “
44021012	Naasa kyeeri luleita indo, yese na vandu va ando yoo lukamwiima nalasaame na Yerusalemu.
44021013	Nalyo Paulo karouwa, “Nkyokiro mukeetana, iiya na ishiwaa nrima? Mashika, yeny na mbony ta ifingwa, mmbo shikudeesye naakwa ni iwaawa efo Yerusalemu kimaruma kya irina lya Nndumi Yesu.”
44021014	Kyeeri alelema kilya lulemmbia, lukamalallya, lukaamba, “Ikunda lya Nndumi lyitanyike.” "
44021015	Numa ya mikonu yei lukaipoo fiiya fyeru lukasaama yeenda Yerusalemu.
44021016	Vakiloshyony maata va Kaisaria vakeenda veryani neese, vakaipoo na Mnason, ni nndu wa Kipro, ni nndu wa kiloshyo wa kasha na mmbwe yeto lushekaa kwakwe.
44021017	Lukifika Yerusalemu vakiloshyony vakaluwarya na nsia. "
44021018	Elyi lya ndesi Paulo kaanga kwa Yakobo eriani neese, na vamiku woose veiyo.
44021019	Lwikimaa ivaidikira, kavavia wo kindo wo kindo Iruva aletanya vandu va masanga efo urundiny lwakwe.
44021020	Kyeeri valemaiita indo vakaarafuma Iruva, vakammbia, “Mwanama weeru, kulollye shaasa Vayuda yewo valemwaluka vakee fiku fiingyi, kyaindi woose mmbo vatirwa nkififi nnu kimaruma kya uvavaso lwa Mose.
44021021	Nawo mmbo valemmaa ivio mbony tafo, sheelyi mmbo kukeelosha Vayuda woose yewo vakee efo masangeny engyi ilakana na Mose, kwiivaviaa valarini vana vawo-fo, nta valasore mirumwa ya Kiyuda-fo.
44021022	Nkyoki ekyo? Nkuti vashitaa shelyi kusheye kunu.
44021023	Naasa tanany shaasa lukuviaa. Yaa kweru kwiiyo vandu vaana vavikye kyaasa na Iruva.
44021024	Ipoo vandu yewo, kukwiilyise nawo, kuvataiye naambo vaute mirwe yaawo, naambo vandu woose vamanyi mbony toose tilya valeita kyafo nshi indo tikaifo, kyaindi yewe kumuni mmbo kukeenda ninsha neesora uvavaso.
44021025	Kya mbony ta vandu va masanga valya valealuka, lulereiya barwa ya yoora uteteri lweru wo vakwiise ilya findo fileniingyo firaso kwa maruva a wongo, na samu, na findo fikee fisasande na samu, neekwiisa utuusi.”
44021026	Naasa Paulo kaipoo vomi valya na elyi lya ndesi kakwilyisa ando amwi nawo, numa kaanga mmba ya Iruva kaamba mbony ya imaa mikonu yeekwilyisa, kutani kiraso kisheningywaa kimaruma kya wo umwi waawo.
44021027	Naasa kyeeri mikonu ilya mfungare ilefika kufii isya, Vayuda valya vaukye Asia vakallollya kulya mmba ya Iruva, vakasarya vandu woose, vakantira.
44021028	Vakaongora vakaamba, Yeni vomi va Israeli lutaraminy. Yeu mbwe nndu ulya alooshaa vandu woose wo ando vafulute vandu veru na uvavaso lweru na ando yaa. Lyingyi, mmwasi yeefyo, mmbo aleata Vagriki mmba ya Iruva, katefusa ando yaa kweele.
44021029	Mashika mmbo alelollya Trofumu, Mweefeso ando amwi nawe kulya muriny, mbwe yeto valekusara Paulo mmbo alemwaata mmba ya Iruva.
44021030	Muri moose ukasavaa, vakakusanyirya uviny, vakatira Paulo, vakamrufwa na si, vakamuuta efo mmba ya Iruva, llya yeni myaango ikaraywa.
44021031	Kyeeri vekeruuya shia ya imbwaa, mbony tikafikya nnini umwi wa vasikari kyeyamba Yerusalemu mmbo yammushana shoose.
44021032	Naasa keepoo askari na vashilyi kavasora swany. Nawo elyi valollya vasikari na nshilyi waawo vakamanda ikapa Paulo.
44021033	Naasa nshilyi yeto na vasikari kasha, kantira kavavasia nafingwa na mise ivii, kavesa, “Ni vi yeu? A nkyokyi atana?”
44021034	Vengyi va mamwiingyi yeto vakaongora yeva indi na vengyi ekyi. Naasa ekilemwa imanya kimaruma kya kyoorongye kilya, kavavasya neendwa kulya turuveny ya vasikari.
44021035	Kyeeri Paulo alefika ando kwiyoo fitere, vasikari vakaipoo Paulo mashika a finya ya mamwiingyi ulya.
44021036	Mashika ironda lyilya mmbo lyekeesora, vekapaa kyoorongye na yaamba, “Utau nndu yeu.”
44021037	Nawe kyeeri ekeendwa kulya turuveny; Paulo kavia nshilyi ulya wa vasikari, “A shitiri mumu wekuvia kindo ndesa?” Nawe kammbia, “Kwiishi Kigriki?”
44021038	A yewe nshi Mmisri ulya mikonuny yei aleriingya vandu valya fiku fiina, vakavaangwa veewaa, kavatetera fika kasa nng'alo?
44021039	Paulo kammbia, “Yeny ni nndu wa Kiyuda, nndu wa Tarso, muri wa Kilikia, nndu wa muriny ulakee n-du. Shakutereva shiniinga mumu shirere na vandu yeva.”
44021040	Naasa ekinninga mumu, Paulo kasalala alya fitereny, katukya vandu valya woko. Kyeeri valemalallya sau, karera nawo kwa Kiebrania.
44022001	Kaamba, “Yeni vomi, vanavama vakwa na vande vakwa, kye shaaranyiny shiireraa kyakwa shimuni yaa mbee yaany ulaalu.”
44022002	Vekiita mmbo akeerera nawo kwa Kiebrania vakaengera isyado, kaamba,
44022003	“Yeny ni nndu wa Kiyuda, shiwonikye Tarso, muri wa Kilikia, lyo mmbo shilelyo yaa muriny yeu, marendeny a Gamalieli shaloshwa mavavaso a vande veru nisha nnu, sha nndu wa usasari kwa Iruva shaasa yeni muvekai inu.
44022004	Shalyisa vandu va Shia yei ya Nndumi ukiva neevawaa, shavarwaa kifingyony, ee, vomi na vaka.
44022005	Shaasa na Nkohani Nniini eshidimaa ishikureekya, na vamiku va ikwaanu woose-da, yewo shilewarya barua kwawo naambo shirwaye wooroye vawo, sheenda Dameski, naambo shindeende yewo veefo vashe Yerusalemu, vekee veenive naambo vasheorotwa.”
44022006	“Naasany kyeeri sheenda, kufii shifike Dameski, kyeeri kya nsanyiny mwi usimbiki, paripari sa niini ikooka iruveeu ikashiringitya taari toose.
44022007	Shawa si, sheeta unyanga lushaambaa, ‘Saulo, Saulo nkikyi elyi kukeeshivavisa?’
44022008	Sharouwa, ‘A ni yewe vi Nndumi?’ Kashivia, ‘Yeny ni Yesu wa Nasareti, yeto yewe kukeemmbavisa.’
44022009	Valya vekee neeny valelollya sa ilya lyo mmbaleita unyanga lwa yeto alerera neeny-fo.
44022010	Naasa shaamba, ‘A shatana inda Nndumi?’ Nndumi kashivia, ‘Salala kwaange Dameski, neefo kushevioo findo fyoose fikee fivavasye kutani.’
44022011	Na kyeeri shilelemwa ilolya kimaruma kya itumbe lya sa ilya, shateterwa ni maako a valya vekee neeny shaanga Dameski.”
44022012	“Naasa nndu umwi evaangwaa Anania, nsaari wa isora mavavaso, akee nkureekye mesha ni Vayuda woose va efo,
44022013	kashisheya kasalala kufii neeny, kashivia, Mwanama Saulo, lola, ‘Shamwipoiyo miso akwa sa ilya sheni.’
44022014	Kaamba, ‘Iruva wa vande veru mmbo alekusauwa yewe kukooye imanya filya akundye, neelola yeto muni usumanu, na yaaranya unyanga lushuukaa kaniny kakwe.
44022015	Mashika mmbo kushevaa nkureeki wakwe kwa vandu woose, wa findo efyo kulelollya neefiita.
44022016	Naasa ulaalu nkyoki kukeevera? Salala kubatiswa, kusangyo ngyulyamari tafo, kwiivangaa irina lyakwe.’ “
44022017	“Naasa kyeeri shewuya Yerusalemu, shiiterevaa efo mmba ya Iruva, shava sheely shikee yuuma,
44022018	shallolya Nndumi nawe kashivia, ‘Uka yaa Yerusalemu uviny, mashika mmbasheirikyaa ukureeki lwafo kya mbony takwa-fo.’
44022019	Neeny shaamba, ‘Nndumi, wo veeshi sheelyi yeny mmbo shevikaa kifingyony valya vakekukusirya neevakapa efo mmba toose teeterevya.
44022020	Na samu ya Stefano nkureeki ulya wafo kyeeri ilepusuwa, neeny nyoo mbai shesalalyi, sheerikya, neeringa soori ta valya valemmbwaa.’
44022021	Nawe kashivia, ‘Enda, mashika yeny nshekurumaa kweende kwaasha kwa vandu va masanga.’ “
44022022	Vakamwaranya kafikya irero elyo, vakaongora, vakaamba, “Muute yaa urukeny, mashika nkivaa nakee na muu-fo.”
44022023	Kyeeri vekee irorongya na yeereera soori tawo na ifwalafwala kiluulyi uwe,
44022024	nshilyi ulya wa vasikari kavavasya Paulo neendwa kulya turuveny, kaamba naveswa mbony takwe ekapwaa na ngova, naambo namanyi na kimaruma vakankapya kyorongye indo.
44022025	Vekimaa imfinga na kyoove, Paulo kavia nshilyi ulya ekee kufii nawe, “A ni kindo kya usumanu ikapa nndu Mroma indi kulore anrumbuyo mwaandu?”
44022026	Nshilyi ulya aita indo keenda kandevia nshilyi ulya nniini, “Nkyoki kukundye itana? Mashika nndu yeu ni Mroma.”
44022027	Nshilyi nniini kasha, kammbesa, “Nkyeshivia, yewe ni Mroma?” Kaamba, “Yee.”
44022028	Nshilyi yeto nniini kammbia, “Yeny mmbo shilewonisa Uroma na shia ya fesa shiingyi.” Paulo kaamba, “Neeny mmbo shekee Nroma kwa iwonika.” "
44022029	Naasa valya vekundye immbesa vakanrau vakeenda. Na nshilyi ulya nniini nawe keereya, llya alemanya ni Mroma, mashika a llya alemfinga.
44022030	Elyi lya ndesi ekundye imanya songosiny, ni kwa kiteve-ki Vayuda vakashenkumba, kamporomwa, kavavasya vaniini va makuhani na shila yaawo shoose vavike ikwaanu. Kaolota Paulo, kammbika yoo mbee yaawo. "
44023001	Paulo kalola vandu va ikwaanu elyi karii, kaamba, “Vanavama, yeny shitiri nrima mwaa mmbo shilekaa mbee ya Iruva fika inu.”
44023002	Nkohani nniini we Anania kavavasya valya vakee kufii nawe vakape Paulo kana.
44023003	Llyo na Paulo kammbia, “Iruva akukapaa neewe, yewe kuvakye isimamba likee yaambe yeela. Yewe mmbo kwakaa rembo kushiutye uvingo kisumani na mavavaso, neewe kwawuya yaamba shakapwa kilasumani na mavavaso?”
44023004	Valya vesalalyi kufii vakaamba, “A mmbo kushaararaa nkohani nniini wa Iruva.”
44023005	Nshamanya-fo nyira, sheelyi we ni nkohani nniini-fo; mashika lyo kyikee kireiye, kularere nnini wa vandu vafo kikasha-fo.
44023006	Llyo Paulo alemanya ikyenga lyimwi ni Vasadukayo, neelyo lyingyi ni Vafarisayo, kaonisa unyanga alya ikwaanuny lyilya kaamba, “Nyira vanavama vakwa, yeny mmbo shikee Mfarisayo mwana wa Mfarisayo, yeny shikee yuutywa uvingo kyeendwa ni iirikyo lya iruka lya vafu.”
44023007	Ekimaa irera indo kukasha-u ulai nnang'ani ya Vafarisayo na Vasadukayo, ikwaanu lyikatarakana.
44023008	Mashika Vasadukayo wo mmbo vaamba nkwiifo iruka lya vafu-fo, nta vasu-fo, nta mumuyo-fo, kyaindi wo Vafarisayo mmbo veerikye efyo fyoose.
44023009	Kukasha-u kyoorongye kiniini. Vaarya va fitabu valya maata va taari ya Vafarisayo vakasalala, vakaumburana vakaamba, “Llulollye ukasha loose kwa nndu yeu-fo; kyaindi kwakooya Mumuyo ao nsu anrera nawe, ni indaany?”
44023010	Llya raa niini ileshau, nshilyi ulya wa vasikari katirwa nnyinyira, valasheenratwa, kavavasya vasikari vaoloke vanturushwe efo maakony awo, vamweende kulya turuveny.
44023011	Kio kilya Nndumi kasalala kufii nawe, kaamba, “Tira nrima nkaari; mashika, shaasa kuleshikureekya kunu Yerusalemu, kikukooye kushikureekye indo indo na kulya Rome.”
44023012	Kyeeri kulekya, Vayuda vakasanga ando amwi, vakalya mboo, “Kyeyaamba mmbalyaa nta inafo kutani vawaa Paulo.
44023013	Neewo valelyiiyana mboo indo vefikye vandu mwasi ya makumi aana.”
44023014	Naasa vakeenda kwa Vakohani vaniini na vamiku, vakaamba, “Mmbo lwankufinga na mboo, llukombaa nta kindo-fo kutani lwawaa Paulo.
44023015	Naasa yeni ando amwi na vamiku va ikwaanu vieny nniini wa vasikari namoolote alya si kwany, kive sheelyi mmbo mukundye imanya mbony takwe nisha mwasi, neese lukudeesye immbwaa nalandefika-u.”
44023016	Nndu umwi mwana wa mfwamaye wa Paulo ekiita kyama ekyo keenda kandekivia Paulo kulya turuveny ilya.
44023017	Paulo kavaanga nshilyi umwi kammbia, “Rwaa nsoro yeu kwa nshilyi wa vasikari, mashika atiri kindo kyemmbia.”
44023018	Naasa kamwiipoo kandenrwaa kwa nshilyi ulya wa vasikari, kammbia, “Mfungwa ulya avangwaa Paulo mmbo ashivaanga naambo shikweengye nsoro yeu mashika atiri kindo akundye ikuvia.”
44023019	Nshilyi ulya nnini kantira woko kanrwaa mbai, kammbesa kirika, “Nkyokyiro ekyo kukundye ishivia?”
44023020	Kaamba, “Vayuda mmbo valefisha kyama vakutereve koolote Paulo ndesi, kundemmbika alya mmba ya shila, kive sheelyi vakundye imanya mbony takwe nisha mmwasi.
44023021	Naasa yewe kulairikye-fo, mashika vandu mwasi ya makumi aana mmbo vafishye kyama ando amwi vakalya mboo vare valalya nta ina kutani vawaa Paulo. Ulaalu mmbo vankudeesya iinutya kyaasa kyawo.”
44023022	Naasa nshilyi ulya kara nsoro ulya keenda, embavasaa, “Kulavie nta nndu umwi-fo sheelyi kwanshivia mbony yeyo-fo.”
44023023	Kavaanga vashilyi vavii kavavia, “Deesyeny askari mayana avii veende Kaisaria, na askari makumi mfungare va frasi, na va mafumu mayana avii, saa isaru ta kio.
44023024	Deesyeny na frasi musaamisefo Paulo, munrwaa waarya nafike kwa Feliki nshilyi wa uruka.”
44023025	Kareiyany barwa indi,
44023026	“Ni yeny Klaudio Lisia shakureiya Mwiitori Feliki mmbee, shakwidikira.
44023027	Nndu yeu mmbo aletirwa ni Vayuda vakasia immbwaa, llyo sheenda na itorito lya vasikari shandemuuta, kyeeri shileeta sheelyi we ni Mroma.
44023028	Llya shilekunda imanya kikumbo vanriiye, shamweende mmba yeerumbuya myaandu.
44023029	Shakooya ate mmbo vakeenkumba kimaruma kya mbony ta uvavaso lwawo, nta nnyakeekumbwa kimaruma kya irero lyoose lyinkooye nawaawa-fo, nta ifingwa-fo.
44023030	Fika kyeeri shileeta sheelyi kwiifo ntambo vatiri uwe yakwe, shalollya nkuti shimweeende kwafo swany, shavia na valya venkapa vasheamba mbony tawo mbee yafo. Nakwafo mbe!”
44023031	Naasa vasikari valya vakakurika Paulo shaasa valevavasyo, vakafika kwa Antipatri kio;
44023032	elyi lya ndesi vakara veesama frasi vanrwaa, wo vakawuya kulya turuveny.
44023033	Nawo kyeeri valefika Kaisaria, neeningya Mwitori wa uruka barwa ilya, vakafita Paulo mbee yakwe.
44023034	Ekimaa iisoma kavavesa, “Nndu yeu ni wa taari ingai?” Kyeeri alevywa ni wa Kilikia,
44023035	kaamba, “Yewe mmbo shikwaaranyaa kyeeri valya vakeekukumba vashaa.” Kavavasya naringwa nakee kulya mmba ya mwitori ulya Herode.
44024001	Kwiikisia mikonu iraanu, Anania, we Nkohani nniini, kaoloka ando amwi na vamiku vave, na nreri umwi Tertulo, nawo vakavia mwitori wa uruka mbony ta Paulo.
44024002	Nawe Tertulo kyeeri alevaangwa kapooka irera indi kyenkumba, “Kimmba lukeewonisa ufoo wiingyi kwa finya yafo, Feliki mmbee, neelyi kusalallye findo fyoose naambo fyeende nisha kunu vanduny veru,
44024003	mmbo lukeewarya efyo fyoose na kyaanu wo kyeeri na wo ando.
44024004	Kyaindi shakutereva kulasue, lyo kulwaaranyi marero maangu kwi isarya lyafo.
44024005	Mashika mmbo lulollye nndu yeu ngata, alepooka uriingyi kwa Vayuda ulaniny koose, na lyingyi we ni nrwe wa siri ta Vanazorayo.
44024006	Na kingi-se mmbo alekunda itefusa mmba ya Iruva lukantira. [Lukakunda imuutya uvingo kisumani na uvavaso lweru.
44024007	Indi Lisia nshilyi nnini wa vasikari kasha, kamuuta maakony eru na finya,
44024008	kavavasya valya valenkumba vashe kwafo.] Yewe kumuni kwammbesa-vesa nkuti kumanyi mbony yeto lwankumba nato yese.”
44024009	Vayuda nawo vakankumba kya mbony yeto sheni.
44024010	Na llya Mwitori wa uruka aletukya Paulo narere, karouwa indi, Kimmba shiishi shamanya yewe mmbo kukee mwirumbuya vandu va uruka yelu kwa myaaka miingyi, mmbo shikeerera kyakwa shimuni na nrima wa ifura nnu.
44024011	Mashika kushidimaa imanya sheelyi nkwaleirau mwasi ya mikonu ikumi na ivii uka kyeeri shilerwaa na Yerusalemu indeendya Iruva.
44024012	Vandu yeva mmbaleshilollya kulya mmba ya Iruva-fo, nta shireraa na nndu moose, ao sheende mwaandu ikwaanuny nta efo kiterevyo kya Vayuda nta efo muriny-fo.
44024013	Nta wo mmbashidimaa iringisya mbony yeti vasheshikumba nato-fo.
44024014	Kuuta lyo kwiifo kindo kimwi, kyo kuti shikyiirikye, Shia yei ya Nndumi wo vakeiivanga ni ngula, niindo shikeindya Iruva yeu wa vakuu veru, shivikye nsia, mmbo firiani na uvavaso na fikee fireiye efo fitabuny fya vakisuku.
44024015	Shivikye nsia efo kwa Iruva, shaasa nawo vavikye nsia, sheelyi kushekaa-fo iruka lya vafu, kwa yewo va usumanu na valakee va usumanu.
44024016	Neeny mmbo shikekwishivira yoo ufundony yelu naambo nrima wakwa ulawonise usakiro mmbee ya Iruva na mmbee ya vandu vengyi mikonu myoose.
44024017	Numa ya myaaka miingyi mmbo shilesha naambo shuutye vandu vakwa firaso na fyeeningyoo.
44024018	Lyo wo valeshilollya mmba ya Iruva shirundya findo yefyo, shamma iilyiswa, nta nsherye ironda lya vandu nta yaatara-fo; kyaindi lyo kweifo Vayuda maata valeuka Asia,
44024019	kyikavaitikya wo veni vafike yaa mmbee yafo isheshikumba, kwakooya vatiri kirero kyoose neeny.
44024020	Ao vandu yeva wo veni vakureeke, nkyoki valellollya shirengya llya shilesalala alya mwaanduny,
44024021	kuuta tupu ni kimaruma kya unyanga elo lumwi, kyeeri shilefua shisalalyi nnang'ani yaawo, shaamba, “Kyeendwa ni ufundo lwa iruka lya vafu nkyo kyeengye shautyo uvingo yaa mmbee yaany inu.”
44024022	Feliki kaveerikisa, mashika we eishi mbony ta Shia yei ya Nndumi nisha mmwasi kaamba, “Lisia nniini wa vasikari kyeeri ashesokaa na kunu llyo nshemurumbuyaa mbony yeti tany. "
44024023	Kavavasya nshilyi ulya sheelyi Paulo naringwa; naniingwa na uleke, nta kulave nndu aima umwi wa vambuya vakwe imfurukannya.”
44024024	Kwikyisia mikonu mive, Feliki kasha ariani na nkaakwe Drusila akee Myuda, karuma Paulo nandevaangwa naambo nawe nashaaranya mbony ta kikusiryo yekyo kya Yesu Kristo.
44024025	Na Paulo elyi ekeaamba mbony eto ta usumanu, na iva na mwiyanu, na mwaandu wefurumya, Feliki kairyaa, karouwa, " “Ulaalu enda mbele neeny shallollya mwaanya shikuvangaa lyingyi.”
44024026	Na kingi-se kavika nsia kulakooye Paulo anningaa fesa; kweekyo kammbaanga lyingyi-se eerera nawe.
44024027	Myaaka ivii ikiira, Feliki kawarya Porkio Festo nashillye ando akwe. Na kimmba Feliki eekundye ikundya Vayuda kara Paulo nengere ikaa kifingyony.
44025001	Naasa kyeeri Festo alemaa yaanga mashoreny a witori lwa uruka, kukasia mikonu iraru nsi nawe kasaama Yerusalemu auka Kaisaria.
44025002	Nkohani nniini na vaniini va Vayuda vakammbia mbony ta Paulo, vakantereva,
44025003	naambo navairikye naute ivavaso Paulo neendwa Yerusalemu, naambo vammboye neemmbwaa efo shia.
44025004	Kyaindi Festo kavarouwa sheelyi Paulo mmbo akeeringyo kulya Kaisaria, nawe muni nkufii neendefo.
44025005	Kawuya kaamba, “Vasongoru vashe veende ando amwi neeny indenkumba kwakooya kwiifo kiteve uwe ya nndu yeu.”
44025006	Ekimaa ikaa kwawo mikonu irindaru ao nyanya indo nsi, kasoka na Kaisaria, elyi lya ndesi kakaa rembo kitiminy kya mwaandu kavavasya Paulo neendwa.
44025007	Kyeeri alesha, Vayuda valya valesoka vauka Yerusalemu vakasalala kufii nawe vakeende fikumbo fiingyi firoo uwe yakwe, valashiidimaa nta yaasumanisa.
44025008	Paulo ekuringaa kaamba, “Yeny nshileimbwa mavavaso a Vayuda-fo, nta mmba ya Iruva-fo, nta a Kaisari-fo.”
44025009	Kyaindi Festo we ekundye ikushiisa kwa Vayuda karouwa paulo, kaamba, “A kukundye iwuya Yerusalemu kunderumbuyofo mwaandu yeu mmbee yakwa?”
44025010	Paulo kaamba, “Yeny mmbo shisalalyi yaa mmbee ya kitima kya mwaandu kya Kaisari, ng'u ando kusumani ishaanduya, nshilelyamarya Vayuda kindo-fo, shaasa neewe kuveishi ninsha.
44025011	Naasany kwakooya shilyamarye, ao kwakooya shitannyi kindo kishisumanyi ifwa, nshilemaa ntafo, lyo kwankooya nshi kya dede ikumbwa elyi, nkwiifo nndu ashidimaa ishivika maakony awo-fo. Mwaandu wakwa weende mbee kwa Kaisari.”
44025012	Festo ekimaa irera na vandu va ikwaanu lyilya, karouwa kaamba, “Mmbo kwakunda yeenda mmbee kwa Kaisari-sho! Ra kweendeny kwa Kaisari.”
44025013	Kwikyiira mikonu mive, mangyi Agripa na Bernike vakasha Kaisaria, vakaidikira Festo.
44025014	Vekikaa-fo mikonu miingyi Festo koongoya mangyi Agripa mbony ta Paulo, kaamba, “Kwiiyo nndu umwi yaa alerewa ni Feliki kifingyony;
44025015	nawe kyeeri shekee Yerusalemu vaniini va Makohani na vamiku va Kiyuda vakashivia mbony takwe, vakakunda shinrumbuye mwaandu.
44025016	Shavavia sheelyi nshi mbuka ya Varome irummbwa mwaandu wa nndu kulore ankwaanya na valya venkumba-fo, naonise mwaanya wa ikureeka kyakwe muni.
44025017	Naasa kyeeri valekwaananya yaa nshileirisha-fo, kyaindi elyi lya ndesi shakaya kiri kya yaanduya myaandu shavavasya nndu yeto neendwa.
44025018	Na valya venkumba kyeeri valesalala mbaleende nta irero lyimwi ikasha, shaasa sheekusarye-fo.
44025019	Kuuta tupu elyi valeende marero engyi akwaani na kikusiryo kyawo veni na mbony ta nndu umwi avaangwaa Yesu, nawe alemmaa ifwa, na Paulo karingisya sheelyi eefo na muu.
44025020	Neeny shatirwa nnyinyira shaasa shiwonisa udede lwa mbony yei, shammbesa kwakooya akundye yeenda Yerusalemu nadeanduyo-fo mwaandu kya mbony yeti.”
44025021	Paulo kakunda mbony yeti tisherumbuwa ni Kaisari, shavavasya naringwaa shitani shanrwaa kwa Kaisari.
44025022	Agripa kavia Festo, “Naakwa ni yeny shilanje yaaranya nndu yeu.” Kammbia, “Ndesi kumwiitaa.”
44025023	Elyi lya ngama Agripa na Bernike vakasha na utore wiingyi, vakaanga ando earanya mbony na vashilyi vaniini va vandu na vaniini va muri, Festo koota ivavaso Paulo nandeendwa.
44025024	Festo kaamba, “Mangyi Agripa, na yeni moose mukee yaa ando amwi neese, mulolye nndu yeu, nawe ufyari loose lwa Vayuda na kulya Yerusalemu na va yaa valekunda shivaekye, vekapaa kyoorongye na yaamba nnyasumani ikaa na muu-fo.
44025025	Kyaindi lyo yeny shilelollya nnyatanyi kindo kinkooye nawaawa-fo. Nawe muni kyeeri alekunda nandeanduyo ni Kaisari, shakunda inrwaa kwakwe.”
44025026	Neeny efo mbony yeti takwe nshitiri nta irero lyimwi lyoorokye lyereiya-fo. Naasany llyo shamweende yaa mmbee yaany, na mwaasi mmbee yafo yewe Mangyi Agripa, naambo kammaa isunundwa shiwoniny irero lyeereiya.
44025027	Mashika shilollye mmbo kivaa kindo kilatiri nrwe kwakooya sharwaa mfungwa na mmbee kulaore shoora na ikumbwa akee nkumbe nalyo.
44026001	Agripa kavia Paulo, “Ulaalu kutiri muumu wa yaamba marero afo.” Naasa Paulo kaorwa woko lwakwe, kakureeka-u kyakwe indi,
44026002	“Nriminy wakwa shikwiitye shitiri ngoma, Mangyi Agripa mmbee, mashika elyi shikukureekyaa shimuni mmbee yafo inu, kya fyoose fyilya Vayuda vakeeshikumba nafyo.
44026003	Mmwasi deny mashika elyi yewe kwiishi nnu mukee na fiveso fyoose fya Vayuda; kimmba niindo shikutereve kushaaranyi na usisiryo.
44026004	Mashika Vayuda woose veeshi mbony ta muu wakwa ukya ukoo lwaka shaasa muu wakwa wekai ukya mapookyony shikee na vandu vakwa kulya Yerusalemu,
44026005	vakashimanya nnu uka mmbee, kwakooya vakundaa iirikya sheelyi shikee Mfarisayo kwa isora miloshye yeeru ilatiri ivara.
44026006	Naasany ulaalu mmbo shasalala yaa shaanduyo kimaruma kya ivika nsia kya kyaasa kilya kya vande veru valeniingwa ni Iruva,
44026007	ekyo ngyufyari teru ikumi na ivii vavikye nsia ishekiwarya, veshiindyaa Iruva na usau kio na nsanyiny. Neeny mmbo nkeeringyo ni Vayuda kimaruma kya vayo, woi Mangyi.
44026008	A dede nkikyi elyi kwany kyilollyo ni kindo kilavaa iirikya, sheelyi Iruva aruta vafu?
44026009	Dede lyo yeny shimuni shilelollya nkuti shitani findo fiingyi fikapanaa na Irina lya Yesu wa Nasareti;
44026010	shatana indo kulya Yerusalemu; shafinga veele veengyi shivavikaa kifingyony, kyeeri shileningwa ivavaso ni vakohani vaniini, na kyeeri valewaawa ni yeny shilekureekyany.
44026011	Na keengyi nnu shevakapya efo mmba ta Vayuda teeterevya, shavaitikya yaarara Iruva, shavatirya unyafi sha nndu asukwaa, shavavavisa shafika miriny ya kwaasha.”
44026012	“Naasa ishoreny elyi nkonu umwi shishendaa Dameski, shitiri wiidimi na ivavaso lya vaniini va Vakuhani;
44026013	Woi Mangyi, lyo kyeeri mwi usimbiki shikee efo shieny ya Dameski shalollya saa niini yuuka iruveeu, iilanyi sa ya mwi, ikashimikya, ando amwi na valya sheriani nawo.
44026014	Loose lukawa si, sheeta unyanga lureraa neeny na kishomu kya Kiebrania, ‘Saulo, Saulo, nkikyi elyi kukeeshivavisa? Ni kyuumu ikapa mwiisi wafo inanga.’
44026015	Neeny shaamba, ‘A ni yewe vi Nndumi.’ Nndumi kashivia, ‘Yeny ni Yesu yeu yewe kukemmbavisa.
44026016	Llo kwipoo kusalale na marende afo, mashika mmbo shakusheya kwa kimaruma eki, shikuvike kuve nkureeki wa findo efyo fyoose kulelollya, na kwa findo fyoose efyo nshekusukuyaa numa.
44026017	Shikukire na vandu vafo, na vandu va masanga, yewo nshekurumaa kwawo;
44026018	kuvatarammbwe miso, na ivaalasha vauke ireeminy na iindukya sa, vare finya ya mmbishwa nayiindukya Iruva; naambo vaonise ifwaayo ulyamari lwawo, na iwonisa ding'u ya yewo vailyise kimaruma kya kikusiryo ekyo kyakwa.’ “
44026019	“Naasany, woi mangyi Agripa, nshilekarya imina moorya yoo a iruveeu-fo.
44026020	Nkyo mbele shandeongoya valya va Dameski na Yerusalemu, na uruka loose lwa Uyuda, na vandu va masanga, sheelyi vakurye vaindukye Iruva, vatani findo fiinani na ikurya lyawo.
44026021	Kimaruma kya efyo Vayuda vakashitira shikee mmba ya Iruva vakaesa ishiwaa.
44026022	Naasa kimmba shilewonisa ngarami yuukye kwa Iruva nkyo shiselelyi-u fika inu, shikureekye woose vaniini na vadu, nta nshishambaa-u kindo-fo kuuta efyo filererwa ni vakisuku na Mose, kyeyaamba fisheshaa;
44026023	sheelyi Kristo nkuti nalyiswa ukiva nafwe mbele naruke auka kwa vafu naambe mbony ta sa kwa vandu vakwe woose na kwa vandu va masanga.”
44026024	Kyeeri ekerera indi, Festo kammbia, na unyanga uniini, “Paulo mmbo kutirwa ni ukwale? Isoma lyafo nnu mmbo lyilekufullwa nrwe.”
44026025	Kyaindi Paulo kaamba, “Nta nshitirwa nuukwale-fo Festo mmbee, mmbo shikeerera marero a dede deny na a urango tukula.
44026026	Mashika mangyi eeshi mbony yeti, neeny mmbo nshidimaa irera nawe nookaari, mashika shiishi deny sheelyi nnang'ani ya marero yaa nkwiiyo irero kulalyiishi-fo, mashika kindo eki nkiletanyikya kwaasha-fo.
44026027	Mangyi Agripa, a nkwiirikye vakisuku? Yee shiishi shamanya kuvairikye.”
44026028	Agripa kavia Paulo, “Akwa, na kyaangu indo mmbo kushallwaa Nkristo-ro?”
44026029	Paulo kammbia, “Mmbo nkeetereva Iruva, kwakooya nkwa kyaangu eki ao nkwa kyaasha, nta nshi yewe da-fo, lyo na yewo woose vakeshaarannya inu vave sheeny, kuuta minyororo yei.”
44026030	Mangyi na nshilyi ulya na Bernike na valya vekee nawo vakasalala,
44026031	llya valeukau vakaumburana veni na veni vakaamba, Nndu yeu nnyatanyi kindo kisumani ufu-fo nta ifingwa-fo.
44026032	Agripa kavia Festo, “Nndu yeto eshidimaa yeekeyo, kukooye kulaore ekundaa yeenda mbee kwa Kaisari.”
44027001	Naasa kyeeri lulevavasyo lusaami ngalava lweende Italia, vakavika Paulo ando amwi na vafungwa vengyi maakony a nshilyi umwi avaangwaa Yulio, wa itorito lya Augusto.
44027002	Lukasaama ngalaveny ya Adramitio yekudesye yeenda fika miriny ya mbai ya yeeve ya Asia, lukapooka kyaaro, Aristariko nndu wa Makedonia aukye Tesalonike keenda neese.
44027003	Elyi lya ndesi lukafika Sidoni. Yulio katannya Paulo fya isarya kanninga muumu wa yeenda kwa vambuya vakwe, naambo nafurukanyo-fo.
44027004	Lukauka-u lukaenda lukafika Kipro, naambo lukwiise uraato, mashika ngyuraato tekee ta finya.
44027005	Kyeeri lweera yeeve taari ya Kilikia na Pamfilia, lukafika Mira muri wa Likia,
44027006	Nafo nshilyi ulya kakooya-u ngalava ya Aleksandiria, iikudesye yeenda Italia, kalusaamisa-fo.
44027007	Lukeenda kyaaro eki waarya ando a mikonu miingyi lukafikya Nido kwa tamba nnu, mashika elyi uraato lwekeelusindika lukeera kwasinde ya Krete kufii na Salmoni.
44027008	Lukaira-u na ngatara deny, mbaa mbaa ya yeeve, lukashekooya ando avaangwaa, “Shashio Shisha.” Kufii na yoo kwiiyo muri uvangwaa Lasea.
44027009	Na llya kyeeri kiingyi kyemmiira, na kyaaro kikava kya yeerese nnu, mashika na mikonu yekootoya yemmaa iira, Paulo kavaikimba,
44027010	Kavavia, “Nyira vomi, shilollye sheelyi kyaaro eki kishetiraa ngapo na irekyo mfindo fiingyi, nshi ya masaa na ngalava-da-fo, kyaindi na ya muu weru-da.
44027011	Kyaindi Nshilyi ulya kaaranya nniini wa ngalava na muni wa vayo ngota filya Paulo aleamba.
44027012	Na kimmba muri ulya wa alya yeeveny kulore wekevaa ikaa kyeeri kya mbeo, veengyi vakauta makusaro vauke-u veende Foinike, kwakooya kyiivaa, vandekaa-fo kyeeri kya mbeo, nato mmuri wa Krete usumanu na taari ya sinde-nkwaany na ndoo-nkwaany.”
44027013	Na llya uraato lwa sinde lulepooka kyaangu, nawo vakakusara mmbo kivaa shaasa llya vekundye, vakakwiipoo na ngalava vakaira Krete yo kufii na mbai ya yeeve.
44027014	Numa kyaangu lukasha uraato lwa finya, sha kitita-si, nalo luvangwaa Eurakilo.
44027015	Kyeeri ngalava iletamba, ilakiidimise ikuna uraato, lukaikureeya ikakunwa ni uraato.
44027016	Kyeeri luleira uviny kufii na kiuruka kidu kivaangwaa Kauda lukaidima kwa tamba yaashwa ngalava.
44027017	Vekiidima iyaashwa, vakafinga ngalava kwa iita fiwoye efo kwasi ya vayo nawo elyi veetiri weerei valashetammbya efo kwasi-kwa Sitri, vakara naambo ngalava ikunwa ni uraato.
44027018	Kimmba lukekapwa nnu ni kivivita ekyo kya uraato, elyi lya ndesi vakapooka yeerya mario a ngalava efo mureny.
44027019	Elyi lya nkonu wa kararu vakeerya naakwa ni fiiya fya ngalava efo mureny wo veni.
44027020	Nta nkyeere nta nyinyiri mfilelolyo-fo, ando a mikonu na uraato lwa finya lukalukapa, lukauta pa ya iturunya.
44027021	Na llya venkaa kyaasha valalya shoonga, Paulo kasalala yoo nnang'ani yaawo, kavavia, “Vomi, mmbo kyesumani kukooye mmbo muleshaaranya mure mulauka Krete nkonu ulya, neeni mwewona ngatara yei na efi mwanreta-fo.
44027022	Ulaalu a shimuningeny makusaro. Kaariseny ngoo tany, mashika nkwiifo nta nndu umwi waany arekaa-fo, llyo kuuta ngalava sheni.
44027023	Shamashika kio eki kya inu, nsu wa Iruva yeu yeny shikee wakwe, nawe mmbwe nkemwiindya, mmbo alesalala kufii neeny,
44027024	kashivia, ‘Kulairyee-fo Paulo, nkuti kundesalala mmbee ya Kaisari, na lyingyi lola, Iruva mmbo ankuniinga vandu yeva woose kukee nawo kyaarony.’
44027025	Naasany, vomi, kaareny, mashika shikusirye na Iruva, sheelyi fyoose mmbo fishevaa indo shaasa shilevio.
44027026	Kyaindi lyo nkuti lufwallyo mbai ya kiuruka kimwi.”
44027027	Kyeeri nkonu wa ikumi na kaana ulefika, kyeeri lwekerawa efo neefo efo yeeveny ya Adria, kufika kio nnang'ani varundi va ngalaveny vakakusara sheelyii nkufii vakooye uruka wuumu.
44027028	Vakeera kyeeso kya yeesa mura vakaonisa fyeeso makumi avii, vakeenda mmbee vakeerase fikava firaanu.
44027029	Vakairyaa kulakooye lushefwallywa ando iwe lyikwaallye si, naasa vakavika mireiyo ya ngalava vakatereva Iruva kukye.
44027030	Kyeeri vateteri va ngalava valekunda iisitiyou ngalava varishe, kyeeri ekyo valeolota ngalava ta mundi efo mureny kive sheelyi mmbo vakeereiya ngalava-da,
44027031	Paulo kavia nshilyi na nsikari, “Yeva vakanra valamammya kunu ngalaveny mmushidimaa ikia-fo.”
44027032	Naasa vaskari vakarummbwa fiwoye filya fya ngalava ilya ya mundi ikawa kulya mureny.
44027033	Kwikee kufii kukye Paulo kavaitika valye shoonga, evavia, “Inu ni nkonu wa ikumi na kaana lwiveraa na ikootoya, mmulekomba nta kindo-fo.
44027034	Naasa shamuutereva lyeny shoonga, mashika nkyo kishemukiraa. Nta nkwiifoo nta ufii lwumwi lwa nrweny wa umwi waany lurekaafo.”
44027035	Ekimaa yaamba indo kaipoo nkate kaarafuma Iruva velollye woose kaufisha-fisha kapooka iulya.
44027036	Naasa vakakya mirima woose vakalya shoonga wo veni.
44027037	Neese lwekee ngalaveny lwefikye vandu mayana avii makumi mfungare na varinderu indi.
44027038	Vekimaa iwuura vakaangura-se mario a ngalava, vakeera nganu efo mureny.
44027039	Kyeeri kulekya mmbalemanya uruka llwa-fo, lyo mmbo valelollya yoo mbai ando kuvakye mundi, vakalollya nkyeni vasaleese-u ngalava vakamiidima.
44027040	Vakeera nanga teesaleesa ngalava kwaasha, efo mureny, vakaelelisa na fiwoye fya ngalava, na soori eto tikunwaa ni uraato vakarau imwi shidu.
44027041	Vakandefikya ando yeeve ivii tikwaananyi, vakasaleesau ngalava.
44027042	Vasikari vakakunda vafungwa vawaawa, naambo nndu nalakeleye narishe.
44027043	Lyo nshilyi umwi eekundye ikira Paulo, kavaima valashetana shaasa vekundye, kavia valya veeshi ikeleya vapooke mbele ikweera mureny, naambo vafikye uruka uumu.
44027044	Neewo valesaau maata vakasaama uwe ya mapoo na vengyi uwe ya findo efyo fyekee ngalaveny. Naasa indo vandu woose vakatana vafikya uruka wuumu kipwa.
44028001	Lwikimaa ikia, llyo lukamanya sheelyi kyuuruka kilya kidu ni Malta.
44028002	Vandu va kyuruka ekyo vakalutannya mesha elanyi kyeeso. Mashika mmbo valeata muro, vakaluwarya loose, kyeendwa ni mbua yeyo yekeekapa na kya mbeo.
44028003	Kyeeri Paulo ensanyirya ngwi, neetivika murony, ikafumafo shoka kimaruma kya muro, ikarorova efo maakony akwe.
44028004	Vandu va alya vekilollya shoka ilya iising'ang'a yoo wokony lwa Paulo, vakaamba, “Nndu yeu ni nsavi tishi; nawe nakikava ammikya ifiiya mureny lyo usumanu llunraa nakae na muu-fo.”
44028005	Kyaindi we kaisisikya efo murony, we muni nalaoni ukasha.
44028006	Lyo wo mmbo valekusara nkuti nafumbe ao nawe si neefwa tiny; vekimmbikya miso deny, neelolya nkwiifoo nta kindo kyankooya, vakaalasha, vakaamba, “We ni Iruva.”
44028007	Kufii na ando yoo kweiyo marema a mangyi wa kyuuruka ekyo, irina lyakwe ni Publio; nndu yeu kaluwarya na nrima wa ki-umbuya deny, kaluvika veny vakwe ando a mikonu iraru sele.
44028008	Naasa ndeye wa Publio elwee etirwa ni muro na yaarisha samu. Paulo kaanga kwakwe, katereva, kamwekerya maako, nenshiisa.
44028009	Efi fikimaa itanyika na vengyi veetiri vandu valoe kulya kiurukeny kilya vakaveende vakashiiswa.
44028010	Nawo vakaluniinga wiindi uniini nnu, naasa kyeeri lwekesaama ngalava lweende vakaluvikya-fo na findo efyo fyelutinnyi.
44028011	Kwikyisia miiri iraru lukeenda na ngalava ya Aleksandiria nayo yenkaa yoo kyuurukeny ekyo kyeeri kya mbeo; na kiring'isyo kya vayo ni “Vana va Maasa.”
44028012	Lukandefika Sirakusa, lukakaau mikonu iraru.
44028013	Luuka-fo lukaringitya lukandefika Regiumu; elyi lya ndesi uraato lwa sinde lukasha, neelyi lya nrondo lukandefika Puteoli.
44028014	Efo lukakooya-fo vakiloshyony vakalutereva lukae nawo ando a mikonu mfungare; llyony lukaafukya Rome.
44028015	Na kuuka yoo kyeeri vakiloshyony valeeta mbony teru, vakasha fika alya singira ya Apio ishelwaambya, ando kuvangwaa “Mmba Isaru ta Veny.” Paulo ekivalollya kaana Iruva deny, neewuiyo mmuu. "
44028016	Lwikifika Rome Paulo kaniingwa uleke lwekaa ando akwe muni lyo eeringwaa ni nsikari.
44028017	Kwikisia mikonu iraru kavaanga vaniini va Vayuda vakwanannyi. Kyeeri valekwaananya kavavia, " “Vanavama, na kikava nshiletana kindo kikasha kwa vandu, nta kindo kyefullwa mbuka ya vande veru, lyo mmbo shilevikwa maakony a Varoma shasha shikee mfinge uka kulya Yerusalemu.
44028018	Nawo kyeeri valemaa ishivesa-vesa mmbo vekundye ishilotora, mashika nkweefo nta kimaruma kimwi yeny shiwaawa-fo.
44028019	Kyaindi kyeeri Vayuda valesalala neeny shaitikyo ikunda mwaandu wakwa weende mmbee kwa Kaisari. Nta nshi sheelyi yeny mmbo sheetiri kindo kikasha na vandu vakwafo.
44028020	Naasa kikeeny indo, mmbo shamuvaanga naambo musheshilollya neerera neeny; mashika mmbo shikeemfinge na mise yei kimaruma kya kikusiryo kya Israeli.”
44028021	Valya vakammbia, “Yese llulewonisa barua titiri mbony tafo uka kulya Uyuda-fo, na nta nkwifoo wa kiloshyony alesha iluvia mbony eto-fo, ao nta irera kindo kyeesi uwe yafo-fo.
44028022	Kyaindi ulaalu lukunndye kuluvie yewe shaasa kulollye; mashika lyo kimaruma kya ikusirya elyo mmbo tikeererwa mbony shiingyi shikasha kundo koose.”
44028023	Naasa vekimaa ideryana nkonu, vakansheya yoo mmba yeyo eekai, vakasha nkuka wa vandu, kavaongoya waarya neekureekya umangyi lwa Iruva, evaikimbaa kya mbony ta Yesu eshipoo marero a uvavaso lwa Mose na vakisuku, apookya ngama kukafika nkwaany.
44028024	Maata vakakusirya na filya filererwa, na maata mmbalekusirya-u-fo.
44028025	Na kyeeri kilekoora mbakee kindo kimwi wo veni na veni, vakaenda, kyeeri Paulo alemaa irera irero elyi lyimwi nsi, shelyi “Mumuyo Mweele mmbo alerera songosiny deny llya alevia vande veru na kana ka nkisuku Isaya
44028026	kaamba, ‘Enda kwa vandu yeva kwandevavia, iita mushitaa lyo mmumanyaa-fo. Na ilola mulolaa, lyo mmushitumusoo-fo;
44028027	Shamashika mirima ya vandu yeva mmbo irung'ani na maarwi awo mmaroo iita, na miso awo vakaasingira. Naambo tupu valeshelollya na miso awo, na iita na maarwi awo. Na iitumuso na mirima yaawo na yaalasha mirima yaawo shivakire.’ “
44028028	“Kyaindi lyo kaeny mwiishi sheelyi ukiro yelu lwa Iruva mmbo lulerumwa kwa vandu va masanga. Nawo mmbo vakeiita!” " [
44028029	Nawe ekimaa irera efyo, Vayuda vakeenda, vekuvesa- vesaa findo fingyi wo veni na veni.]
44028030	Nawe Paulo kakaa Roma ando a myaaka ivii sele efo mmba ilya yakwe ekai kaitaiya. Kawarya-fo vandu woose yewo vekee insheya.
44028031	Nawe kavaongoya mbony ta umangyi lwa Iruva, neelosha mbony ta Nndumi Yesu Kristo, etiri ukaari, nalakae-fo nta nndu amwiima. "
45001001	Ni yeny Paulo shikee ishinga lya Kristo Yesu, shilevaangwa shive nrumi, neesauwau shaambe mbony shisha ta Iruva;
45001002	tilya Iruva alemmaa ivikya kyaasa na kana ka vakisuku vakwe efo Mareiyony Meele.
45001003	Nto mbony ta mwana wakwe, ekee wa ngata ya mwiili alewonika efo ufyariny lwa Davidi.
45001004	Nawe kasheorwa paa na wiidimi sheelyi we ni Mwana wa Iruva, ngata ya Mumuyo Mweele, na iruka lya vafu, mmbwe Yesu Kristo Nndumi weeru.
45001005	Na efo kwakwe lukawarya isarya na usu naambo vandu va masanga vakooye ikunyiisya efo kikusiryony kyeendwa ni irina lyakwe,
45001006	elyo kimaruma kya vayo yeni mulevikwa vasauwe va Yesu Kristo.
45001007	Kwany yeni moose mukee Rome, mukunndyo ni Iruva, mukee vavaange naambo muve veele. Isarya lyimukae na ufoo luukye kwa Iruva Nde weeru, na kwa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
45001008	Kya mbee mmbo shaana Iruva wakwa kwi Yesu Kristo kimaruma kyany, yeni moose mashika elyi kikusiryo kyany kikee ivambiswa ulaniny koose.
45001009	Shamashika Iruva yeu shikemwindya na nrima wakwa kwi Nrumi shisha ya Mwana wakwe, we ni nkureeki wakwa eeshi shaasa shilakeemanda imusenda,
45001010	mikonu myoose efo fiterewony fyakwa. Shiiterevaa naambo shishe kwany uviny, kwakoya Iruva akunda ishiidimisya kyaarony ekyi kyakwa.
45001011	Mashika mmbo shilangye nnu imulollya, naambo nkooye imwaavya simbo ta nrima, naambo mukooye itumariswa.
45001012	Llyo iviiryana muu yeny na yeni, wo nndu na kikusiryo kya yeto ungyi, kyany na kyakwa.
45001013	Vanavama vakwa nshikundye mure mulamanya sheelyi nkeengyi shelangye isha kwany lyo shalemmyo-da fika ulaalu, naambo shimuwonisye ndunda na yeni shaasa shilevewonisya neewo va masanga engyi.
45001014	Mmbo shitiri sye kwa Vagriki na kwa yewo valakee Vagriki. Shitiri sye kwa yewo va urango na kwa yewo valatiri urango.
45001015	Kimmba niindo, yeny mmbo kishikooye shaambe Nrumi ya Nsia naakwa nkwany yeni mukee Roma.
45001016	Mashika nshishiiryaa Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia sony-fo, mashika nnyo wiidimi lwa Iruva lushendee ukiro, kwa wo umwi akusirye-u, kwa Muyuda mbele na kwa Mgriki-da.
45001017	Mashika usumanu lwa Iruva lwallollyo paa nnang'ani ya vayo, kikusiryo na kikusiryo. Shaasa kikee kireiye, “Yeto wa usumanu nkikusiryo kyintiryaa-u na muu.”
45001018	Mashika unyafi lwa Iruva lwammaa ilollyo paa luuka iruveeu lushe uwe ya uravi loose lwa nndu wa vandu yeto aora uravi kweemina dede yeyo.
45001019	Mbony ta Iruva mmbo tikoorye paa neemanyika kwa woose, mashika Iruva mmbo alevasukuya.
45001020	Mashika mbony takwe tilya tilandelollyo uka yuumbwa lya ulana ulaalu tallollyo, neemanyika efo mashoreny akwe, nkyo wiidimi lwakwe na ngata yakwe ya iva Iruva, naambo numa valashelollya-u kindo kyeekuuta.
45001021	Mashika le, kyeeri kilya valemanya Iruva mmbaleng'anisa sheelyi mmbwe Iruva nta imwaana-fo. Lyo mmbo valerekya efo uretiny, na mirima yeyo yaawo ya utondo ikawoywa niirema.
45001022	Vekusaraa mmbo vakee varango, ate llyo varung'ana mmwasi.
45001023	Vakatavasha itumbe lya Iruva nalatiri ilyamarika na fwana ya nndu wa vandu akee wa ifwa, na ya ndeye na ya mafisi na ya efyo fikurufwaa si.
45001024	Kimaruma kya efyo Iruva kavara efo langony ta mirima yaawo, valatye findo fya ukirinda, kutani veengye miili yawo usutu wo veni na veni.
45001025	Ni llya valealasha dede ya Iruva na wongo, vakafiirya fyuumbe ndi neefiindya ando a Muumbi yeto akeerumishwa llung'anu. Amen.
45001026	Naasa Iruva kavara vasore lango tawo ta usutu, kutani na vaka vaalasha ngata ilya ya mbee nevika-u ngata ilakee ilya ya mbee.
45001027	Na womi nawo naakiwo, vakara ikaa na vaka shaasa kyekai, vakatusana wo veni na veni, womi vakatana findo filakwaani nawo, vakakuwonisya itaiyo wo veni kisumani na uravi lwawo.
45001028	Na kimmba valelema ikaa na Iruva efo umanyony lwawo, Iruva mmbo alevareeya valatye urango lwawo yelo lulavaa, vatani findo filavasumannyi.
45001029	Mmbo veeshwe uravi lwa wo ngata, uravi na lango na weesi, mmbo veeshwe ukasha, uwai, uriingyi, ulembi; vandu va mirima mikasha, veamba fyesuta vengyi,
45001030	vevikya ureeree, mmbo vasuuye Iruva, vatiri ulyang'a vekushopa, vekung'anisa, vesongosia fya wongo, valashiindyaa vamika vawo,
45001031	valatiri umanyo, vefisha fyaasa, valakundye vandu vawo, valalyilyaa vengyi.
45001032	Nawo vammaa imanya ngapo ya usumanu ya Iruva, kyeyaamba vetana efyo mmbo vasumanyo ni ufu, mmbo vakeetana indo, nta nshi indo-da fo, mmbo vakeeyirikyana na yewo vetana indo.
45002001	Naasany, yewe nndu mmbo kwava vi, kushuutyaa ungyi uvingo, nta nkutiri kyeekuuta-fo. Shamashika efyo kukeeyuutya nafyo vengyi uvingo, mfyo fyeni kukeekuutya nafyo uvingo kumuni kyeyaamba kukee nrekwa, mashika yewe kukeeyuutya uvingo mmbo kwatana efyo fyeni.
45002002	Lyo yese lwiishi sheelyi ni mirumbuye ya Iruva myeni ikee ya dede kwa yewo vetana efyo.
45002003	Yewe nndu wa vandu kurumbuyaa vengyi newe kumuni kwatana efyo fyeni. A ndesa mmbo kusheidimaa inda ikyia unyafi lwa Iruva?
45002004	A ndesa mmbo kukeemina wiingyi lwa isarya lyakwe na usisiryo kulamanyi sheelyi usha lwa Iruva mmbo lwakoomwa naambo kufikye ikurya?
45002005	Kyaindi kyeendwa ni uumu lwafo, na nrima wafo ulatiri ngata ya ikurya, mmbo kwakudeesya unyafi kufike nkonu ulya wa unyafi na yaanduyo lyaorwa paa yoo usumanuny lwa Iruva,
45002006	yeto ashetaa wo umwi kiinani na mitannyi yakwe;
45002007	valya veefo vesisiryaa neetana mesha veruuya itumbe na nnduma na ira kulalyamarika, wo vasheningwaa muu wa llung'anu.
45002008	Na valya veerenga, valalatyaa dede, lyo vakairikya uravi, vashewonisaa unyafi na yuumisyo ngoo.
45002009	Ukiva na ngatara nkwa wo nndu mwitana meesi, kava Myuda ao Mgriki.
45002010	Itumbe na wiindi na ufooni kwa yeto mwitana mesha, Myuda mbele na Mgriki-da.
45002011	Mashika kwa Iruva nkwiifo ikunndyo-fo.
45002012	Shamashika yewo valyamarye kulaiyo uvavaso, neewo valelyamara vetiri uvavaso, woose mmbo vasheutyoo uvingo ni mavavaso.
45002013	Lyoony nshi valya veeta mavavaso vatiri usumanu mbee ya Iruva-fo, kuuta ni valya veevallya na mavavaso mmbo vasheekenyoo usumanu.
45002014	Mashika kyeeri vandu va masanga vatana kiinani na mikae yaawo filya fikee efo mavavasony, valya valatiri mavavaso mmbo vammeva mavavaso wo veni.
45002015	Mmbo vaora mashora a mavavaso akee mareiye efo miriminy yaawo, ngoo tawo tiivakureekyaa, na makusaro awo, wo veni, eevautyaa uvingo ao evaletaa,
45002016	kufike nkonu ulya Iruva ashesukwaa fyama fya vandu fyoose vaanduyo, kiinani na Nrumi ya Nsia yei yakwa, kwi Kristo Yesu.
45002017	Lyo yewe kwakooya kukee Myuda kwavevika mavavaso nsia, na irumana na Iruva,
45002018	na imanya filya akundye, na ikunda findo fisha, neewe mmbo kurangusyo efo mavavasony,
45002019	na ikumanya kumuni sheelyi mmbo kukee nteteri wa vafu miso, na sa ya yewo vakee ireeminy,
45002020	mwilosha wa matondo na llosha wa vana vadu, atiri ngata ya urango, na wa dede efo mavavasony.
45002021	Naasany yewe kukeelosha vengyi, a mmbo kuraa kulakulosha kumuni?
45002022	Yewe kushambaa nndu nalatuuse, na yewe kumuni mmbo kutuusaa? Yewe kusuuye maruva a wongo, mmbo kutiraa mmba ta vayo?
45002023	A yewe kwarumana na mavavaso, mmbo kuturaa wiindi kwa Iruva kwiifishaa mavavaso yoo?
45002024	Mashika irina lya Iruva mmbo lyikee yaararwa efo kwa vandu va masanga kimaruma kyany, shaasa lya kikee kireiye.
45002025	Mashika irinwa mmbo lyisheekyaa tupu elyi kukee mwiindya mavavaso, kyaindi kwankooya kukee mwifisha mavavaso, irinwa lyafo mmbo lyikee sheelyi kulakee nrini tusu.
45002026	Naasany kwankooya yeto nalakee nrini antira ufundo lwa mavavaso, ra elyi nalakee nrini we nnyasheekenwa-se sheelyi mmbo akee nrini?
45002027	Na yeto nalakee nrini uka efo nkuu-kuu, kaindya mavavaso, a yeto nnyakuutya-se uvingo yewe kukee nrini lyo kwawuya ifisha mavavaso!
45002028	Kimmba we nshi Myuda akee Myuda kyipoo tupu-fo, nta urini nshi llwa lwa kyapoo tupu yoo mwiliny-fo.
45002029	Ni elyi akee Myuda akee Myuda auka efo nnang'ani na irinwa lyakwe llya efo nriminy, lya ngoony, nshi lya mareiyony-fo. Na nnduma wa vayo nshi wooka kwa vandu-fo, nkwa Iruva muni wooka.
45003001	A Myuda nki kya mmwasi atiri? A irinwa mmbo lyisheekyaa-ki?
45003002	Mmbo lyisheekyaa deny taari toose. Mbele kimmba vakee varambikye fyaasa fya Iruva,
45003003	A ni indaany, kwankooya vengyi valakusiryeu? A ira lyawo valakusiryau mmbo lyisheallwa usha lwa Iruva luve ruu?
45003004	Oode! Iruva mbwelollyo mmbwa dede na nndu ni llembi, shaasa kikee kireiye indi: “Naambo kulolyo yewe ni wa dede elyi kwarera, kweende ivinga elyi kwaanga ando afo a yaanduya.”
45003005	Kyaindi kwakooya uravi lweru mmbo lwaringisya usumanu lwa Iruva, mmbo lushaambaa-u-ki ndesa? A Iruva mmbo akee nravi elyi aora unyafi? (A shirere kinndu.)
45003006	Nta-fo. Kukooye niindo Iruva mmbo eeshidimaa inda yaanduya ulana?
45003007	Lyo kwakooya dede ya Iruva yeengera yoora paa itumbe lyakwe, kyeendwa ni wongo lwakwa, nkikyi elyi shekeengera yuutyo uvingo sheelyi nkee llyamari?
45003008	Nkyoki kishimaa lulaambe (lulefingyo wongo, na vengyi vakakaarisa sheelyi luleamba indo), Ndeny lutani makasha, naambo mesha asorye, nawo yaanduyo lyawo lyitiri usumanu.
45003009	A ni indaany? Yese Vayuda lukee kyeni ngota vengyi? Oode, nta kinnywa-fo. Mashika lwammaa yuutya Vayuda na Vagriki uvingo sheelyi mmbo vakee valammyi ni ulyamari.
45003010	Shaasa kikee kireiye, “Nkwiifo atiri usumanu nta umwi-fo.
45003011	Nkwiifo eeshi-fo, nkwiifo mwiruuya Iruva-fo.
45003012	Woose mmbo vaevekye, vakapwaa woose deny. Nkwiifo mwitana mesha-fo, oode, nta umwi-fo.
45003013	Uroo lwawo ni kifu kirwe, na ngyulumi tawo mmbo tilerera fya ntambo. Uroi lwa shoka mmbo lukee efo kaniny kawo.
45003014	Kana kawo mmbo keeshwe fidengo na kivawo.
45003015	Marende awo mmbo arishyaa indepuswa samu.
45003016	Ikasheesa na nyinyira fikakaa efo shieny tawo.
45003017	Nta shia ya usumanu mbaleimanya-fo.
45003018	Iindya Iruva llyikee efo misony awo-fo.”
45003019	Naasany lwiishi sheelyi findo fyoose firerwaa mmavavaso mmbo fyarerya kwa yewo vakee si ya mavavaso, naambo vamalalyiswa, na ulana loose lukae si ya uvingo lwa Iruva.
45003020	Shamashika nkwiifo nta nndu umwi atiri mwiili asheekenywa usumanu mmashora a mavavaso-fo. Mashika imanya ulyamari mmbo lyeendwaa mmavavaso.
45003021	Lyoony ulaalu, usumanu lwa Iruva lwankoora paa kulaiyo mavavaso, mmbo lukeekureekyo ni mavavaso na vakisuku.
45003022	Ni usumanu lwa Iruva lweendwa nkikusiryo kya Yesu Kristo kwa woose yewo vairikya. Lyo nkwiyoo kilakaniso-fo.
45003023	Shamashika woose mmbo vatannyi ulyamari, na yaanguywa ni itumbe lya Iruva.
45003024	Mmbo vashekenywaa usumanu ruu kyeendwa ni isarya lyakwe, kwa shia ya iwowowa ni Kristo Yesu.
45003025	Mmbwe Iruva alemmbika nave nsandi kyeendwa nkikusiryo efo samuny yakwe, naambo noore usumanu lwakwe, kimaruma kya ilekeya efo usisiryony lwa Iruva ngyulyamari toose tilensongwa itanwa.
45003026	Naambo noore usumanu lwakwe kyeeri eki, naveva mmbwe muni usumanu na mwiekenya usumanu yeto moose airikye Yesu.
45003027	A nkwi ikurosa lyafo lyikai? Akalyo lyanraywa poo. Ni ivavaso lya ngata-ki? Kwa ivavaso lya mitannyi? Oode, nkwa ivavaso lya kikusiryo.
45003028	Naasany mmbo lwalollya sheelyi nndu wa vandu mmbo asheekennywaa usumanu kyuuka na kikusiryo kulaiyo mashora a mavavaso.
45003029	Ao le, Iruva mmbo akee Iruva wa Vayuda veni? Nshi akee Iruva wa Vamasanga woose? Yee ni Iruva wa masanga woose.
45003030	Lyo dede kwankooya Iruva ni umwi, nawe nasheekennya yewo vakee varini usumanu, naakwa ni valya valakee varini mmbo asheveekennyaa usumanu na shia yeyo sheni.
45003031	A le ndesa, mmbo luminaa mavavaso kimaruma kya kikusiryo ekyo? Oode, ando a vayo indo mmbo lwakaarisa mavavaso.
45004001	Naasany, kya Abrahamu lukaamba-ki, nde yeto weeru wa mwiiliny?
45004002	Mashika kwakooya Abrahamu aleekennywa usumanu kimaruma kya mashora akwe, we atiri kyirumannyo. Lyoony, nshi mbee ya Iruva-fo.
45004003	Mashika mareiyo mmbo aamba inda? Abrahamu mmbo aleirikya Iruva, kyiikava nkyo kyamwekennya usumanu.
45004004	Kwa nndu mwirunda mashora, weesi lwakwe llweekenwaa sheelyi ni isarya-fo, ni siye.
45004005	Kyaindi lyo kwa nndu nalarundaa mashora, lyo kakusirya yeto ashemwekennyaa usumanu nalatannyi mesha, kikusiryo kya nndu yeto mmbo kyaekenwa ni usumanu.
45004006	Shaasa na Davidi nawe arera kya pule ya nndu yeto Iruva amwekennya iva na usumanu nalatiri mesha atannyi,
45004007	Ngoma ni yewo vakee vasarye maravi awo, na ngyulyamari tawo tikasikyo.
45004008	Ngoma ni ya nndu yeto Nndumi nalamwekennyaa ulyamari.
45004009	A le ndesa, pule yeyo ni ya yewo vakee varini-da a ni ando amwi na yewo valakee varini? Mashika mmbo lwaamba sheelyi kimaruma kya kikusiryo Abrahamu mmbo aleekennywa usumanu.
45004010	A mmbo aleekennywa inda? Nkyeeri alemaa irinwa a nkulaore anrinwa? Nshi ammaa irinwa-fo nkuvie, nkulaore enrinwa.
45004011	Nawe mmbo alewarya kyaasa ekyo kya irinwa, luve wende lwa usumanu lwa kikusiryo ekee nakyo nalanderinwa, naambo nave ndeye wa woose yewo vasheirikyaa, na kikava mbalerinwa, naambo nawo vekennywa usumanu.
45004012	Na lyingyi nave nde wa veerinwa nave nde wa alakee nrini, kwa valya woose nshi valya vakee varini-da-fo, na kwa valya vakeelatya ngyayo ta kikusiryo kya nde weeru Abrahamu ekee nakyo uka llya nalanderinwa.
45004013	Mashika kyaasa kilya kyeamba mmbo eshevaa muya ding'u wa ulana, Abrahamu mmbo alekiniingwa na vana vakwe, nshi na mavavaso-fo kyaindi kwa usumanu aleekenywa kyuuka na iirikyo.
45004014	Mashika kwakooya valya va mavavaso mmbo verwaa ding'u, iirikyo mmbo lyevaa ruu, na kyaasa kifwe mmwasi.
45004015	Mashika uvavaso llo lweendee unyafi, mashika uvavaso lulaiyo, ukasha llulolywa-fo.
45004016	Kweekyo kyaasa mmbo kilesha na iirikyo, kishe na shia yeesarya, naambo kyaasa ekyo kikooye ivanga efo vaniny va kyaasa. Nshi kwa valya va uvavaso-da-fo, lyo ni kwa valya va kikusiryo kya Abrahamu, nawe ni nde weeru loose.
45004017	(Shaasa kyikee kireiye, “Mmbo shilekuvika kuve Nde wa ngyuufyari shiingyi.”) Usanguny lwa yeto alekusirya Iruva, yeto mwiiviirya vafu muu. Yeto aidima ivaanga filya filandekaa-fo kimwi sheelyi mmbo fiifo.
45004018	Nawe mmbo aleirikya evereyaa filya filavaa ivika nsia, naambo nave nde wa ngyufyari shiingyi, shaasa kileambawa, “Niindo ufyari lwafo lushevaa.”
45004019	Yeto nalakee mfwafwa wa iirikyo, mmbo alekusara kya mwiili wakwe wemmaa ifwa, (kyeeri kilya emmaa myaaka sha iyana), na ngata yeyo ya ifwa ya nsanga wa Sara.
45004020	Llyo llya alelollya kyaasa kya Iruva, nnyaletirwa nnyinyira nare nalairikya-fo, kyaindi mmbo kikusiryo kilemmbika finya, kaarafuma Iruva;
45004021	nawe eishi deny sheelyi Iruva asheinutya fyaasa fyakwe.
45004022	Kekeennywa we sheelyi ni usumanu.
45004023	Kyaindi lyo mfilereiyo kimaruma kyakwe muni-fo sheelyi mmbo aleekennywa muni.
