45004024	Kyaindi na yese lusheekenywaa usumanu indo-da, yese lukusirye yeto aleruta Yesu Nndumi weeru nooke kwa vafu.
45004025	Nawe mmbo alerambikywa kimaruma kya uravi lweru, nawe karutwa naambo neese lweekennywa usumanu.
45005001	Kwakooya lwammaa ilyimmyo usumanu kimaruma kya iirikyo, luve vafoo sau yoo kwa Iruva, kyeendwa ni Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
45005002	Mashika mmbwe yeto aleluniinga ifikya isarya elyi na iirikyo elyi lukee nalyo neefura nalyo lwiivikye nsia yaakana itumbe lya Iruva.
45005003	Nta nshi indo-da-fo, luvefura na ngatara-da, mashika ngatara mmbo teende usisiryo.
45005004	Na ishora lya ngatara ni yeende ukaari, na ukaari mmbo lweende ivika nsia.
45005005	Na ivika nsia llyivikaa nyinyira-fo. Mashika isarya lya Iruva lyammaa iletywa miriminy yeeru ni Mumuyo Mweele yeto lulensimbwa.
45005006	Mashika llya yese lwekee vafwafwa, fyeeri fikiinana lyo Kristo aleshelufiiya yese valyamari.
45005007	Kimmba kilavaa nndu nafwe kimaruma kya nndu nsumanu, lyo kyishidimikaa nndu ikarya ifwa kimaruma kya nndu nsha.
45005008	Kyaindi Iruva mmbo aora ukundi lwakwe we muni shaasa alukundye. Mashika Kristo mmbo alefwa kimaruma kyeru llya lwekee valyamari.
45005009	Naasa mmwasi ya efyo lukammaa yekennywa usumanu efo samuny yakwe, mmbo lushekiaa unyafi elo kyeendwa mmbwe.
45005010	Shamashika kwakooya llya lwekee vakiduva mmbo lulesandwa na Iruva kyeendwa ni ufu lwa Mwana wakwe; llyo mmwasi lukammaa isandwa indo mmbo lusheekennywaa usumanu kyeendwa mmuu wakwe.
45005011	Nta nshi indo-da-fo, mmbo luvetiri ifura lwikee na Iruva kyeendwa ni Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, yeto luleona isandwa na Iruva kimaruma kyakwe.
45005012	Naasany, ulyamari mmbo luleendwa ulaniny ni nndu umwi, nalo lukaende ufu. Na ulyamari yelo lukasheya vandu woose mashika elyi woose valyamarye.
45005013	Shamashika kulaore uvavaso lwensha ulyamari mmbo lweefo ulaniny, lyo ulyamari llulollywa kulaiyo ivavaso-fo.
45005014	Kyaindi lyo ufu mmbo lulekaa-u uka Adamu kufike Mose, nalo lukashilya naakwa ni valya valatannyi ulyamari luvakye lulya lwa Adamu.Yeto akee kyaaso kya yeto asheshaa.
45005015	Lyo simbo yeyo nyileva sha urekwa elo-fo. Mashika kwakooya kimaruma kya urekwa lwa nndu umwi veengyi mmbo valefwa. Isarya lya Iruva ni mmwasi na wiidimi lwa isarya lya nndu yeto umwi Yesu Kristo mmbo luleilanya kimaruma kya vandu veengyi.
45005016	Nta kyeeso kya nndu yeto umwi nkiinani na wiidimi yelo-fo; shamashika uvingo mmbo luleendwa ni nndu umwi nalo lukaende isisywa, kyaindi simbo ya isarya mmbo ilesha kimaruma kya urekwa wiingyi, ikeende na yeekennywa usumanu.
45005017	Mashika kwakooya llya nndu umwi alelyamara ufu mmbo luleshillya kyeendo ni yeto umwi, ni mmwasiny deny kwa yewo vawaryaa wiingyi lwa isarya, na wiidimi lwa usumanu, nawo mmbo vasheshillyaa efo muuny kyeendwa ni yeto umwi we Yesu Kristo.
45005018	Naasany-da, kwakooya kimaruma kya urekwa lumwi vandu woose mmbo valerumbuywa vasisyo, niindo-da kivekai kimaruma kya usha lumwi luletanwa vandu woose mmbo valekennywa usumanu lurye muu.
45005019	Mashika kwakooya kyeendwa ni uravi lwa nndu umwi vandu veengyi mmbo valewa ulyamariny, naa indo-da, kimmba yeto umwi aleva mwiirikya, vandu veengyi mmbo valeekenywa usumanu.
45005020	Kyaindi lyo uvavaso mmbo lulesha naambo urekwa llwa lung'ani deny; na kyeeri ulyamari luleilanya, na isarya mmbo lyileengera mmwasi.
45005021	Naambo, shaasa ulyamari luleshillya na ufu, kisorye indo na kya shia yeyo ya usumanu isarya lyishillye fika muu wa llung'anu kwi Yesu Kristo Nndumi weeru.
45006001	Lukaambany inda ulaalu? Lukakusindyany ulyamariny naambo isarya lyiingifwa?
45006002	Oode, A yese lulemmaa ifiiya ulyamari mmbo lukaa inda-se ulyamariny?
45006003	A mulemmanya-se sheelyi yese lulebatiswa na irina lya Yesu Kristo mmbo lulebatiswa kya ufu lwakwe?
45006004	Mmbo lulerikwa nawe sheelyi mmbo lulefwa llya lulebatiswa, naambo shaasa Kristo aleruka kawona itumbe kwa Nde, naasa neese lukae na muu mwiiya.
45006005	Mashika kimmba lulelungwa nawe kya ufu lwakwe, niindo-da lushelungwaa nawe kya iruka lyakwe;
45006006	naasa elyi lwammanyany indo, sheelyi ngata yeeru mmbo ilekapyo nsalabeny ando amwi nawe, naambo mwiili wa ulyamari umirwa, lulakirundye ulyamari-fo;
45006007	shamashika yeto alefwa mmbo allyimyo usumanu kautwa ulyamariny.
45006008	Na kwakooya lulefwa na Kristo mmbo lushekaa na muu ando amwi nawe;
45006009	lwiimanyaa elyi Kristo ammeeruka nnyakifwaa-fo, nta ufu llukimwiidimaa-fo.
45006010	Mashika llya alefwa, mmbo alevinga ulyamari lyimwi kikamaa, lyo elyi akee na muu, nkimaruma kya Iruva.
45006011	Naasany na yeni, kya ulyamari veny sheelyi mufiiye, muveny vandu va Iruva vakee na muu kyeendwa ni Kristo Yesu.
45006012	Naasany, ulyamari lulakishillye efo miiliny yaany yeyo isheywa ni ufu kutani mwasora lango ta vayo-fo.
45006013	Nta mulakyeengere iniingya malungo yoo any ave fisha fya uravi na ulyamari-fo; kyaindi kurambikyeny muveni kwa Iruva sha vandu vemmaa ifwa vakawuya ikaa na muu, na malungo yoo any ave fisha fya usumanu kwa Iruva.
45006014	Nkivaa ulyamari lumushillye yeni-fo, mashika mmukikee vashillye mmavavaso-fo, mmbo mushillyo ni isarya.
45006015	A niindaany? Lukatanany ulyamari mashika elyi ando a ishillyo mmavavaso lukee vashillye ni isarya? Oode, ntafo!
45006016	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi yeto mwakuniingya kwakwe mukava mashinga akwe kyeindya yeto mumwiindye mmbo mwammba mashinga akwe, kwakooya ni ushinga lwa ulyamari lusheendee ufu, ao kwakooya ni ushinga lwa wiindi yelo lweende usumanu.
45006017	Lyo Iruva naanwa nnu, mashika yeni mmbo mwekee mashinga a ulyamari, kyaindi mmbo muleirikya na mirima yaany ngata ilya ya urango yeyo ilemushillya;
45006018	na kyeeri mulemaa ilekwa ulyamariny, mukavikwa mashinga erundya usumanu.
45006019	Mmbo sharera kivandu kimaruma kya ufwafwa lweru. Kimmba shaasa muleniingya miili yaany itani fya ukirinda muve filemi, nkyo ulaalu niingyeny miili yaany irunndye usumanu mukooye iilyiswa.
45006020	Shamashika kyeeri mwekee mashinga a ulyamari mmweishi kya usumanu-fo.
45006021	A mmbusha-ki mulewonisa-fo? Mashika kindo mushefurummyaa iwonisa-fo ni ufu.
45006022	Kyaindi ulaalu mukammaa ivikwa valeke mulakirunndyaa ulyamari, mwaaluwa mashinga a Iruva, nnyo mbusha yaany, llyo iilyiswa muute-u iwona muu wa llung'anu.
45006023	Mashika weesi lwa ulyamari ni ufu. Kyaindi simbo ya Iruva mmuu wa llung'anu, kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo Nndumi weeru.
45007001	Nyira vanavama vakwa, a mmbo mulaishi (yaa mmbo sharera neewo vaishi mavavaso) sheelyi mavavaso mmbo ashillyaa nndu kyeeri akee na muu?
45007002	Nsha elyi nka akee na mmi akee nshillye ni ivavaso kwa muni ulya kyeeri aiyo na muu, kyaindi mmi ulya kashefwa, we mmbo allekwa ivavasony lya mmi yeto.
45007003	Indi kyeeri mmi wakwe aiyo na muu, kwakooya atira mmi ungyi mmbo avangwaa ntuusi. Lyo mmi kamfwa mmbo ammba lleke, nnyakikee si ya ivavaso elyofo, nta nnyakyikee ntuusi naakwa oorwa ni mmi ungyi-fo.
45007004	Naakiwony-da vanavama, yeni mmbo mulefiiya mavavaso na shia ilya ya mwiili wa Kristo, naambo muve masaa a ungyi, we yeto aleruka auka kwa vafu naambo lwidimi ivikya Iruva ndunda.
45007005	Shamashika llya lwekee na ngata ya mwiili, lango ta ulyamari yeto tilelollyo kimaruma kya uvavaso, mmbo tilerunda mashora efo malungony any kutani taonisya ufu kimu,
45007006	Kyaindi ulaalu yese mmbo lwamboromuwa efo uvavasony, lwamfiiya ngata ilya yekee ilulamya naambo lwidimi irundya ngata shiiya ya nriminy, shi ilya ya kasha-fo, nnyo ilya ya mareiyo.
45007007	A lukaambany inda? Uvavaso ni ulyamari? Oode! Lyo nshemanyaa ulyamari kulaiyo uvavasofo. Mashika nsheemanyaa ilanga, kukooye kulore uvavaso lulaamba, “Kulalange-fo.”
45007008	Nkyo uvavaso mmbo luleniingya ulyamari mwaanya, lukavika kunu nnang'ani yakwa ngata shoose ya lango. Mashika ulyamari kulaiyo ivavaso mmbo lufiiye.
45007009	Neeny mmbo shekee na muu alya mapookyony kuleefo uvavaso, lyo kyeeri ivavaso lyilesha, ulyamari lukakwiipoo, neeny lyo shafwa.
45007010	Shalollyany sheelyi ivavaso llya lyishendee muu yeny mmbo lyilesheengye ufu.
45007011	Shamashika ulyamari kimmba lulewonisa mwaanya efo uvavasony, mmbo shilelembikya-u shafwa.
45007012	Naasany uvavaso mmbo lukee weele na mavavaso akava meele, akaveva a usumanu na mesha.
45007013	A kilya kyeekee kisha mmbo kileva ufu kwakwa? Oode, kyaindi ulyamari naambo lulollyo paa, mmbo lulesheengye ufu na shia yeyo shisha, naambo kimaruma kya ivavaso ulyamari luvave deny.
45007014	Mashika lwiishi kimayeny kya uvavaso ni efo nriminy, kyaindi yeny mmbo nkee wa mwiiliny, mmbo shikee nkumbe ulyamariny.
45007015	Mashika nshiishi kindo nkeetanafo, mashika kilya shikyikunndye nshikeekitana kuuta kilya shilakikunndye nkyo nkeekitana.
45007016	Lyo na shatana kilya shilakikundye, mmbo shaveirikya sheelyi mavavaso mmesha.
45007017	Naasany nshi yeny shimuni shatana indo-fo, ni ulyamari llwa lushikaaye.
45007018	Mashika shiishi kunu nnang'ani yakwa, yee kunu mwiiliny wakwa, nkwiifo mesha-fo, mashika ikunda shikunndye, lyo itana mesha nshaidima-fo.
45007019	Mashika kisha kilya shikundye ikitana nshikeekitana-fo, kuuta ni kilya kikasha shilakikundye, nkyo nkeetana.
45007020	Naasany kwankooya kilya shilakikundye nkyo shikeekitana, naasa nshi yeny shimuni shikeekitana-fo ni ulyamari llwa lushikaaye.
45007021	Naasany shalollya ngata yei, yeny shikundye itana kisha, na kikasha mmbo kiveiyoo.
45007022	Mashika lyo shikundye mavavaso a Iruva na nrima;
45007023	Lyo kunu malungony akwa shalollya-fo ngata ingyi, ikeekapana fira na ngata ilya ya umanyo lwakwa, na ishikamara mfungwa wa ulyamari kyishuukya kunu mwiiliny wakwa.
45007024	Oshiny lwakwa yeny shikee nndu nkiva. A mmbi asheshaauwaa yaa mwiiliny yeu wa ufu?
45007025	Mmbo nkeyaana nnu Iruva kimaruma kya Yesu Kristo Nndumi weeru. Nasaany, kimmba niindo, yeny shimuni na urango lwakwa mmbo sharundya mavavaso a Iruva, lyo efo mwiiliny wakwa sharundya finya ya ulyamari.
45008001	Naasany ulaalu, nkukyiifo uvingo lwa yoorotwa kwa yewo vakee nnang'ani ya Kristo Yesu-fo.
45008002	Mashika ivavaso lya Mumuyo wa muu ulya wa Kristo Yesu mmbo wanshileka, sharawa kwaasha na ivavaso lya ulyamari na ufu.
45008003	Mashika filya fileeshidimikaa ni mavavaso, mashika a ufwafwa lwa vayo lwa ngata ya mwiili, Iruva ekiruma mwana wakwe muni ekee na mwiili uvakye wa ulyamari, mmbo alevinga ulyamari mwiiliny;
45008004	naambo filya mavavaso avavasye fiinutyo ni yese, luve lulaenda lwilatyaa mbony ta mwiili lyo lulatye ta nrima.
45008005	Mashika valya vakeelatya mwili mmbo vakekusara mbony ta mwiili; kyaindi valya vakeesora mbony ta Mumuyo wo mmbo vakeekusara mbony ta Mumuyo.
45008006	Mashika kirengo kya mwiili ni ufu kyaindi kirengo kya Mumuyo ni muu na ufoo.
45008007	Kimmba kirengo kilya kya mwiili ni ukiduva na Iruva, mashika elyi kilashiindyaa mavavaso a Iruva, nta nkishiidimaa iinndya-fo.
45008008	Valya vasoraa mbony ta mwiili mmbashidimaa isenya Iruva-fo.
45008009	Lyo kwakooya Mumuyo wa Iruva ukee nnang'ani yaany, yeni mmukisoraa mwiili-fo; mmbo musoraa Mumuyo. Na nndu moose yeto nalatiri Mumuyo wa Kristo, yeto nshi wakwe-fo.
45008010	Kristo kankaa nnang'ani yaany, miili yaany mmbo ifiiye efo ulyamariny, mirima yaany ikakaa na muu kyeendwa ni usumanu.
45008011	Kyaindi kwakooya Mumuyo wa yeto aleruta Yesu auka kwa vafu akee efo nnang'ani yaany, we yeto aleruta Yesu Kristo mmbo asheviryaa miili yaany muu yeyo itiri ngata ya ifwa, na Mumuyo wakwe yeto amukaye.
45008012	Kimmba niindo, vanavama, mmbo lutiri sye, nshi sye ya mwiili lusore mwiili-fo.
45008013	Mashika kwakooya mwasora mbony ta mwiili mmbo mwaruuya ufu, lyo Mumuyo kammweekya ilammya mbony ta mwiili mmbo mukaa na muu.
45008014	Mashika valya vakee iteterwa Mmumuyo wa Iruva mmbo vakee vana va Iruva.
45008015	Shamashika mmulewarya ngata ya ushinga yeyo ya weeresi-fo, mmbo mulewarya ngata ya ivikwa vana, yalweengye lukavaanga, “Aba” nkyo kyaamba “Nde weeru.”
45008016	Mumuyo Mweele mmbo akureeka ando amwi na mirima yeeru sheelyi yese mmbo lukee vana va Iruva;
45008017	na kimmba lukee vana va Iruva, mmbo lukee veni ding'u, veni ding'u va Iruva, yewo vashekaa na Kristo, yee, lwiilyiswaa ukiva nawe ulaalu numa lusherumishwaa ando amwi nawe.
45008018	Mmbo shilollye sheelyi ngatara yeti tiifo ulaalu nshi kindo, elyi shatiinanisa na itumbe elyo lushelyimywa.
45008019	Mashika naakwa mfyuumbe fyoose mmbo fivikye nsia nnu isheorwa paa itumbe lya vana va Iruva.
45008020	Mashika fyuumbe fyoose mmbo fikee fishillye na finya ni yeto alefivika-u fikee fiivereyaa.
45008021	Mashika nafyo mmbo fisheutwaa ushingeny lwa urumato, kutani fyaanga itumbeny lya vana va Iruva.
45008022	Mashika fyuumbe fyoose mmbo fikee ngatareny fika ulaalu.
45008023	Nta nshifyo-da-fo, naakwa ni yese lukee vakaye mumuyo mmbo luvekee ngatareny, lukavika nsia wa yaauwa efo ushingeny na yaaluwa vana.
45008024	Mashika mmbo lulekirwa kwi ivereya; kyaindi kindo kikee ivereyo kwakooya kyallolyo, nkukiifo ivereya-fo. Shamashika ni vi alemmbereya kilya kyammelollyo?
45008025	Indi lukammbereya kindo lulakilollye, mmbo lukivereyaa na usau.
45008026	Ni indo na Mumuyo nawe mmbo alweekyaa ufwafwa lweru, mashika elyi lulaishi itereva shaasa kisumani; kyaindi Mumuyo muni mmbo aluterevya neerosa uuwo kindo kilavaa yaamba.
45008027	Na yeto aishi mirima ya vandu mmbo aishi ngata ya Mumuyo shaasa ikai, mashika mmbwe ava mwiterevya veele shaasa Iruva akundye.
45008028	Neese mmbo lwishi Iruva mmbo arundaa ando amwi na valya vankundye evawonisyaa mesha, mmbo valya vakee vavaange shaasa akunndye.
45008029	Mashika valya avaishi uka mbee, mmbo alevasauwa uka elyo mbee vavakaniswa na Mwana wakwe naambo we nave mwana mmbee nnang'ani ya vandu veengyi.
45008030	Na valya alevasauwa uka elyo mbee, yewo kavavaanga, na valya alevavaanga, wo kaveekennya usumanu; na valya aleveekennya usumanu wo kavang'anisa.
45008031	A kya efyo fyoose lukaambany inda? Iruva kankaa taari yeeru ni vi ashiidimaa ilukyinga?
45008032	Yeto alelotora mwana wakwe kimaruma kyeru yese loose, mmbo araa inda nalalulyimya findo fyoose ando amwi nawe?
45008033	Ni vi yeto asheringyaa vasauwe va Iruva? Ni Iruva muni aveekennya usumanu.
45008034	Ni vi ashevarumbuyaa mwaandu? Ni Kristo Yesu alefwa, yee, na mmwasi ya efyo mmbo aleruka kooka kwa vafu, nawe mmbo akee woko usha lwa Iruva; na mmbwe yeto akeeluterevya.
45008035	Ni vi ashelurauwaa na ikunda lya Kristo? A ndesa ni ukiva ao ngatara, ao ni fyuure, ao nshaa, ao ni ikuuywa, ao ni nrenga ao ni usu?
45008036	Shaasa kyikee kireiye kyeyaamba, “Mmbo lukee isisyo nkonu piti kimaruma kyafo, lukavevaka moonri eeshisha.”
45008037	Kyaindi nnang'ani ya efyo fyoose mmbo lukeevinga na mmwasi yeevinga, kyeendwa mmbwe yeto alukundye.
45008038	Mashika mmbo shammaa imanya na nshushwa sheelyi, nta ufu ao muu, ao vasu, nta yewo vatiri ushilyi, nta yefi fiiyo ao yefyo fishaa numa, nta yewo vatiri wiidimi,
45008039	nta efyo fikee uwe ao yefyo fikee si, ao nta kyuumbe kingyi kyoose nkishiidimaa ilurauwa na ikunda lya Iruva yelyo lyuukye kwa Yesu Kristo Nndumi weeru-fo.
45009001	Mmbo nkerera kya dede shikee na Kristo, nshireraa wongo-fo, nrima wakwa wiishitikaa shikaayo ni Mumuyo Mweele,
45009002	kyeyaamba mmbo shitirwa nting'wa niini neevavyo nriminy wakwa.
45009003	Mashika sheshiidimaa itereva yeny shimuni shimamitwa na irauwa na Kristo kimaruma kya vandu vakwa, vanavama kwi ngata ya mwiili.
45009004	Mmbo Vaisraeli yewo, vatiri ngata ya iva vana, na itumbe llya, na fyaasa, na iningyo uvavaso, na miindye ya Iruva, na mma yakwe,
45009005	nawo mmbo vasaawoye veru, neefo kwawo mfo Kristo aleuka kwi ngata ya mwiili. Mmbwe yeto akee uwe ya findo fyoose, Iruva, akee mwiitikiswa llung'anu, Amen.
45009006	Nshi sheelyi Irero lya Iruva mmbo lyammukau-fo, mashika woose nshi Vaisraeli yewo vakee vana va Israeli-fo.
45009007	Nta woose yewo vakee vana va Abrahamu nshi vana-fo, kyaindi, kyeendwa ni Isaki vana vakavaangwa;
45009008	nkyo kyaamba, nshi vana kwi ngata ya mwiili vakee vana va Iruva-fo, ni vana valya va kyaasa vakeekenwa mmbo vana.
45009009	Mashika irero lya kyaasa llyo elyi, “Kyeeri sha eki shiwuyaa, na Sara ashewonisaa mwana.”
45009010	Nta nshi indo-da-fo, Rebeka nawe ekimaa ikufinga kyeendwa ni mmi wakwe, we Isaki nde weeru,
45009011	mashika vana yewo valandewonika, ao nta valandemanya itana mesha ao makasha, naambo shaasa Iruva ensauwa we muni kive, nshi kwa isora mashora-fo, indi nshaasa we muni yeto mwivaanga akundye.
45009012	Mmbo evio indi, yeto nniini mmbo asherundya yeto n-du.
45009013	Shaasa kikee kireiye kyeyaamba, “Mmbo shakunda Yakobo, lyo we Esau shansua.”
45009014	A lwaambe-ki? Iruva atiri ukasha? Oode!
45009015	Mashika mmbo eviiye Mose, “Mmbo nshelyillyaa yeto shikunndye illyillya, neesarya yeto shikundye insarya.
45009016	Naasany kwankooya ni indo, nkyiriani na wiidimi lwa ulya akundye-fo, nta lwa ulya mwikutakura-fo; kyaindi kwi wiidimi lwa ulya mwillyillya, mmbwe Iruva.”
45009017	Mashika areiye indi kya Farao, “Kimaruma shilekusaleesa-u ni ekyi, naambo shikoore yewe finya yakwa, na irina lyakwa lyivambiswa urukeny koose.”
45009018	Kyasiany, kwakooya niindo, yeto akundye illyillya mmbo allyillya, neeto akundye imuumisya ngoo, kamuumisya.
45009019	Naasany, kulakooye kushivia, A nkikyi elyi ekeeyuutya vengyi uvingo-da? Mashika lyo mmbi ashidimaa iwakyana na ekyo akundye?
45009020	Oode, nkivaa-fo nndu wakwa. Mmbi yewe-ro kwiidimi irouwa Iruva? A kindo kyuumbe kiidimi ivia yeto alekiumba, “Nkyiki elyi kuleshiumba indi?”
45009021	A yeto mwiumba findo fya uteri atiri-se finya na uteeri na imbumba lyimwi lya uteeri nasongosye nalyo kiiya kitiri nnduma na kyingyikilatiri nnduma?
45009022	A niindaany, kwakooya Iruva elyi atirwa ni unyafi, na yoora wiidimi lwakwe, na usisiryo uniini, mmbo aleva mwiisisirya fiiya filya fyeora unyafi fikee fivike fyesisya vandu.
45009023	Na lyingyi naambo naore paa uniini lwa itumbe lyakwe efo fiiyeny filya fyelyillya, alefivika-fo uka elyo mbee naambo fiwoni itumbe.
45009024	Mmbo yese aluvaangye, nta nshi Vayuda-da-fo, kyaindi na vandu va masanga woose.
45009025	Nshaasa alerera kulya kwa Hosea kyeamba, “Mmbo nshevaangaa vandu valya kulaore vekee vandu vakwa, ‘Na nkunde wakwa yeto kulore ekee nkunde wakwa.’
45009026	Na mmbo kishevaa ando alya valevio, ‘Yeni mmukee vandu vakwa-fo. Ng'u vashevaangywaa vana va Iruva yeto muni muu.’ “
45009027	Isaya nawe kaonisa unyanga lwakwe kya Israeli, kaamba, “Yeekena lya vana va Israeli, na kikava nsha nsanga wa yeeveny, ni nsaaro wawo mweni vashekirwaa.
45009028	Mashika Nndumi mmbo asheinutyaa irero lyakwe kunu urukeny, namaa neerummbwa.”
45009029	Nshaasa llya Isaya alesongwa yaamba, “Kukooye kulaore Nndumi wa matorito alelureeya ufyari, mmbo lwevaa sha Sodoma, luvevakaniswa na Gomora.”
45009030	A lukaambany inda ulaalu? Nsheelyi vandu va masanga, valaishi usumanu, lyo vakaonisa usumanu; lyo ni usumanu llwa lumye iirikyony.
45009031	Lyo Vaisraeli veni uramba llwa lwa usumanu mbaleidima ikooya usumanu-fo.
45009032	A nkikyi ndesa? Mmashika elyi kulaore valesara efyo kwa shia ya iirikyo, lyo vakasora na ngata ya mitannyi. Vakawona nsindara yoo iweny lya nsindara,
45009033	shaasa kilereiyo kyeyaamba, “Lola-te, nkeevika iwe lyepaaya alya Sion, na iwe lyeetuula. Neeto moose ashemwiirikya nnyashesutwaa-fo.”
45010001	Vanavama vakwa, kindo shilangye nnu deny nriminy wakwa, na kiterewo kyakwa shiterevaa Iruva kimaruma kyawo, naambo vakooye ikirwa.
45010002	Mashika lyo shiishi sheelyi vatiri usau kimaruma kya Iruva, lyo nshi kya urango-fo.
45010003	Mashika lyo vekee indo valaishi usumanu lwa Iruva, lyo vekundye yoora usumanu lwawo veni, mbalekunyisya efo usumanuny lwa Iruva-fo.
45010004	Mashika Kristo mmbwe aleinutya uvavaso, naambo wo nndu akusirya-u nakooye yeekennywa usumanu.
45010005	Na Mose nawe kareiya kya usumanu yelo lweendwa mavavaso, kaamba, Yeto mwiinutya efyo mmbo ashekaa na muu kimaruma kya vayo.
45010006	Kyaindi usumanu lulya lwaendwa ni iirikyo, mmbo lwaamba indi, Lola kulasheamba nriminy wafo, Ni vi yeto ashesamaa iruveeu? (nkyo ni yoolota Kristo si),
45010007	ao, Ni vi yeto ashoolokaa nafike kwa vafu? (Nkyo ni isaamisa Kristo uwe, nooke kwa vafu).
45010008	Lyo mmbo aamba inda? Irero llya mmbo lyikee kufii neewe, yoo kaniny kafo, neefo nriminy wafo; llyo irero llya lya iirikyo lukeelyivambisa.
45010009	Mashika kwairikya Yesu na kana kafo sheelyi ni Nndumi, neekusiryau efo nriminy wafo sheelyi Iruva alennruta kooka kwa vafu mmbo kushekoyaa ikirwa.
45010010	Mashika nndu mmbo erikya na nrima kutani awonisa usumanu, na iirikya eereraa na kana kakwe muni kutani awonisa ukiro.
45010011	Mashika mareiyo aamba, “Yeto moose ashenkusiryaa nnyashesutwaa-fo.”
45010012	Mashika nkwiyo kilakaniso nnang'ani ya Myuda na Mgriki-fo. Mashika we ni Nndumi wa woose, araiye simbo kwa woose yewo vemmbaanga.
45010013	Mashika, wo nndu yeto ashevangaa Nndumi mmbo ashekirwaa.
45010014	A mmbo vashevangaa inda yeto valamwirikye? Na lyingyi, mmbo vashiriikyaa inda yeto valandemwiite? A mmbo vamwiitaa inda valatiri mwiwoongoya?
45010015	Na lyingyi mmbo vavambisaa inda irero, valanderumwa? Nshaasa da kikee kireiye, Apaa shaasa marende awo asenyi yewo veevambisa Nrumi Shisha!
45010016	Kyaindi nshi woose valewarya Nrumi ilya ya Nsia-fo. Nshaasa Isaya aamba, A Nndumi, ni vi alewarya nrumi yeeru?
45010017	Kyasiany, kikusiryo kimayeny kya vayo ni iita, na iita mmbo lyishee na irero lya Kristo.
45010018	Indi mmbo shaamba, A wo mmbo kulaore valeita? Yee, valeita. Unyanga lwawo mmbo lulekwaana ulaniny koose, na marero awo fika fishingony fya ulana
45010019	Kyaindi mmbo shavesa, Vaisraeli wo valemanya-se? Mbele Mose mmbo aamba, “Mmbo vashelolyaa kififi kyeendwa ni vandu valakee vakwa, kimaruma kya vandu valaishi shivaengye itafukwa.
45010020	Na Isaya atiri ukaari uniini, nawe aamba indi, Mmbo shilelollyo ni yewo valekeeshiruuya shamanyika paa ni yewo valakeevesa mbony takwa.”
45010021	Lyo kwa Israeli kaamba, “Nkonu moose mmbo shileoroya vandu valashiirikyaa vakee filemi maako akwa.”
45011001	Naasa, mmbo shikeevesa, Iruva mmbo alevivya vandu vakwe mbai? Oode! Mashika naakwa ni yeny ni Mwisraeli, umwi wa vana va Abrahamu, nndu wa ufyari lwa Benyamini.
45011002	Iruva nnyalevivya vandu vakwe alevamanya uka elyo mbee mbai-fo. Ao ndesa mmbo mulaishi filya fikee firere efo mareiyony kya Elia? Shaasa alekumba Vaisraeli efo kwa Iruva,
45011003	kaamba, “Nndumi mmbo valewaa vakisuku vafo, vakasammbwa na fitara fyafo fyeerasya, neeny mmbo shansaau shimuni, nawo mmbo vakeruuya ishiwaa.”
45011004	A kirouwo kya Iruva mmbo kileamba inda? “Mmbo shikusaarisye-fo vandu fiku mfungare valakeefirya Baali ndi.”
45011005	Naasany ni indo-da kyeeri ekyi, kweiifo nsaaro ukeensauwe kwa isarya lya Iruva.
45011006	Kimmba nkya isarya, nkikivaa ni kya mashora a nndu-fo, mashika kukooye niindo isarya llyekivaa isaryafo.
45011007	A mmbo kyava inda? Kindo kilya Israeli ekeekiruuya nnyalekiwonisa-fo; kuuta valya valesauwa wo vakakiwonisa, na vengyi wo vakaumisywa.
45011008	Nshaasa kyikeekireiye kyeyaamba, “Iruva mmbo alevaniinga ngoo tirengeyaa, miso nare nalalollya, maarwi are nalaita kufike nkonu sha yeu wa inu.”
45011009	Na Davidi nawe aamba, “Ando awo kwelyiya shoonga ave a nsindara na nreiyo na kindo kya ivakyinga, llo weesi lwawo.
45011010	Miso awo avikwa ireema vare valalollya, na mungo wawo ukwiinyike mikonu myoose.”
45011011	Kyasia shavesaany, A mmbo valerendeya vawe ppu? Oode nta-fo! Lyo kyeendwa ni urekwa lwawo ukiro mmbo lulefikya vandu va masanga, naambo wo vatirwa nkififi.
45011012	Naasany kwakooya urekwa lwawo mmbo luleengye ulana pule indo, na unana lwawo lukaveva pule ya masanga, a nshi kishevaa indo mmwasi ndesa Vaisraeli vasheakaniswaa ukiro?
45011013	Lyo mmbo shikeerera neeni mukee vandu va masanga. Naasany, kiinani na shaasa shikee llori wa vandu va masanga, mmbo sharumisha urundi lwakwa shimuni?
45011014	Kulakooye nsheengye kififi yewo vakee va samu imwi neeny shikire-u kyenga kyawo.
45011015	Mashika kwakooya ivivyo mbai kyawo mmbo lyileende usandi lwa ulana, a iirikyo lyawo mmbo lyishendee ki kulaore ni muu numa ya ifwa?
45011016	Na lyingyi kwakooya fimu fyeele, niindo-da na imbumba lyoose; na isinde lyikammba yeele, na maramba nang'u nkiwo-da.
45011017	Kyaindi kwankooya maramba engyi ammanywa, neewe nri wa ngoroshony kwalungyau, kwava umwi wa maramba yoo a nri yeto nsha na uredi lwa vayo,
45011018	lola kulashekurumisha mbee ya maramba yoo; awooye kwakooya kushekurumishaa, nshi yewe kurye isinde elyo-fo, ni isinde elyo lyikurye yewe.
45011019	Naasa mmbo kushaambaa, Maramba alya mmbo alemanywa naambo yeny shilungywa-u.
45011020	Kyasia-da, lyo mmbo alemanywa kimaruma kya ira nalakusirya-u, neewe mmbo kwasalala-u kyeendwa ni kikusiryo kyafo. Naasany, kulakushope-fo, iryaa.
45011021	Mashika kwankooya kulaore Iruva alesarya maramba alya a mbee nta yewe nnyashekusaryaa-fo.
45011022	Nkyelolany, usha na unyaasi lwa Iruva kwa valya veewa ni unyafi, indi kwafo yewe ni usha lwa Iruva, lyo kwankaa usheny yelo; lyo kyilammba, neewe-da mmbo kushemanywaa-u.
45011023	Neewo-da, vakara valasinda efo kikusiryony kifu, mmbo vashelungwaa-u, nnyeli Iruva ashidimaa ivalungyau-se.
45011024	Mashika yewe kwakooya kulemanywa yoo nriny yeto ukee wa ngoroshony uka mbee, numa kwalungya-u, kileekee indo uka mbee; nshi mmwasiny deny kwa valya vekee va elyo mbee isheviirwa ando alya awo a mbee ando valemanywa?
45011025	Shamashika vanavama vakwa, nshikundye mure mulamanya kyama ekyi-fo, naambo mulashekusara mmbo mutiri urango sheelyi Vaisraeli vakee woomu, kutani vandu va masanga vasheumbywa.
45011026	Nkyoony Israeli shoose ishekirwaa. Nshaasa kikee kireiye, Mwikira asheshaa ooka Sion. Nasherauwa Yakobo na uravi lwakwe.
45011027	Neekyi nkyo kyaasa kyakwa nawo, elyi nshevaangataa marekyo awo.
45011028	Naasany kyeendwa ni Nrumi ya Nsia mmbo valeva vakiduva vany; kyaindi kyeendwa ni isauwa vakava vakunde kimaruma kya vande veru.
45011029	Mashika simbo ta Iruva ntitiri yaamba shilamanya ilasongwaa-fo, na uvaango lwakwe niindo da.
45011030	Mashika yeni shaasa mulemina Iruva llya kasha, yeni ulaalu mukawona ilyillyo kyeendwa ni imina lyawo;
45011031	niindo-da nawo ulaalu mmbo vakeemina Iruva, naambo shaasa neeni mulewona ilyillyo nawo vavewona ilyillyo.
45011032	Mashika kwa Iruva woose nkimwi vemminaa vakooye ilyillyo woose.
45011033	Apaa utonga lwa Iruva shaasa lung'ani na waarya lwakwe na urango lwakwe. Shila takwe tilavaa isavaiya, nta shia takwe tilavaa ikutwa.
45011034	Mashika ni vi alemanya makusaro a Nndumi? Ao ni vi alemfisha kyama nawe?
45011035	Ao ni vi alensongwa inninga kindo nashekitawa-se?
45011036	Mashika findo fyoose nkwakwe fyuukye, mmbo fiiyoo na wiidimi lwakwe, na mmbo fishewuyaa neefo kwakwe. Nnduma ni wakwe llung'anu. Amen.
45012001	Naasany vanavama vakwa, mmbo shamutereva kikee kya isarya lya Iruva niingyeny miili yaany ive kiraso kyeele kitiri muu, kive nkyo mwiindye wa dede.
45012002	Nta mulasore mikaaye ya ulana yelu-fo, mmbo mushaalashikaa mikaaye yaany, mwiimanyaa nkyoki Iruva akunndye kwany naambo munsenyi neeva vasongovisi.
45012003	Kimaruma kyeelyimyo isarya lya Iruva mmbo shaidima imuvia yeni moose, kulave nndu alanga ikurosa mwasi ngota elyi akai. Veny vandu va mwiina, shaasa Iruva aavye wo nndu mwiina wakwe wa kikusiryo.
45012004	Mashika shaasa mwiili utiri filungo fiingyi nafyo filarundaa ishora lyimwi nsi.
45012005	Niindo neese mmbo lukee filungo fya mwiili wa Kristo wo nndu kalungwa neeto ungyi.
45012006	Naasany kimmba lukee valyimye simbo tikwaavye-avye, kiinani na isarya lya Iruva, kwakooya ni ukisuku, lurere kikee kya iirikyo.
45012007	Kwakooya ni yaambya veny lurunde nisha, neeto mwiilosha, naverunda nisha.
45012008	Neeto ashiikimbaa vengi, navaikimbe kyikee kya usha. Neeto mwiiwarya veny navawarye na nrima nkesi. Na mwiisalallya vengyi navasalallye nalashaaraa. Na mwiilyillya vengyi navalyillye na ifura.
45012009	Ukundi lwany lulatire ukunang'ari-fo. Taniny findo fisha mulakani neefyo fikasha.
45012010	Kundaniny muveni sha vana va nka, kikee kya wiindi na ilekeiya vengyi mwaanya.
45012011	Veny vandu vasasari mulasheelelekaa, muve vakaari miriminy yaany irundya Iruva (Nndumi)
45012012	mwiivikaa nsia na ifura, mutire usisiryo kyeeri kya ngatara, mukutire efo kiterewony.
45012013	Muvetira maako irundya vandu va Iruva, muveambya veny na usau.
45012014	Vemutannya makasha vakunndyeny mbora nta mulavadenge-fo.
45012015	Fureny neewo vafuraa, muveiya neewo vaiyaa.
45012016	Veny va nrwe umwi nsi moose, nta mulave vandu vakurosaa. Indi irikyeny yaatarwa naakwa mfindo fifwafwa. Nta mulave vandu vekushopa na urango mutiri.
45012017	Mulataiye ukasha na ukasha-fo. Latyeny yefyo fisennyaa vandu woose.
45012018	Llyo mushekaa na ufoo na vandu woose.
45012019	Vakunde vakwa, loleny mulataiyane fiduva naambo mulasheesheyo ni unyafi lwa Iruva, kimmba kikee kireiye indi, “Itaiya kiduva llyakwa yeny Nndumi.”
45012020	Lyo nkiduva wafo eetirwa nshaa nniinge shoonga. Eetirwa nnyura nrite. Kwantana indo llyo ashewonaa ngapo imfye.
45012021	Ukasha lulakuvinge-fo, mmbo kutanaa mesha kuvinge ukasha.
45013001	Wo nndu nainndye ushilyi yelo uniini, mashika nkwiifo ushilyi lulaukye kwa Iruva-fo. Ushilyi lwiiyo loose mmbo lukee uvavasye ni Iruva.
45013002	Neewo vekukikisa na ushilyi lwiiyo mmbo vashekuwonisyaa uvingo.
45013003	Shamashika yewo veshillya mmbaeresee vandu mashika elyi vatana mesha-fo, kuuta ni elyi vatana maravi. A mmbo kulakunndye iiryaa yeto atiri ushilyi? Kyasia, tana efyo fikwaani naambo kuwoni-u irerwa kisha.
45013004	Mashika we mmbo avikywa ni Iruva nasalallye kutannywa fya usha. Naasa, kwatana firavi iryaa, mashika yeto mwiishillya nnyatira nsengye wa ushilyi ruu-fo, ni elyi akee mmbike ni Iruva, nataiye yewo veetana makasha kivavavise.
45013005	Nkyoony, nkuti iirikya ushilyi, nshi iryaa unyafi-da-fo, lyo ni kimaruma kya usakiro nriminy.
45013006	Nkyo na kimaruma-da kwataa kodi mmashika elyi veshilya vakeerundya Iruva elyi vakee ishoreny elyo lyawo.
45013007	Niingyeny vandu woose usumanu lwawo, wa kodi naniingywa kodi, na wa usanu naniingywa usanu, yeto asumani yeerewa neerewa, neeto wa wiindi naniingwa wiindi.
45013008	Mulatire sye ya nndu kuuta ukundi-fo. Mashika yeto mwiikunda ungyi mmbo ainutya uvavaso.
45013009	Mashika elyi lwavio kulatuuse, kulawae, kulaive, kulalange, na mavavaso yoo engyi-da, fyoose efyo kwasanda, mmbo kyaamba. Kunda nndu ungyi shaasa kukukundye kumuni.
45013010	Ukundi llutannyaa nndu ungyi kindo kikasha-fo. Naasany, ukundi llo lwiinutyaa mavavaso moose.
45013011	Kimmba niindo, ulaalu lumanyi sheelyi kyeeri kya yuuka rony mmbo kyamfika. Mashika ulaalu ukiro lweru mmbo lwanserikya kufii mmwasi ngota llya lulebatiswa lukakusirya-u.
45013012	Kio mmbo kyammikwa, nkufii kukye. Naasany luute-fo mitannyi ya ireema, luipoo fisha fya sa.
45013013	Mashora a nsanyiny ni itira winndi, nta lulasheeva veelya nnu na inangwa, nta itana fya uravi na fya utuusi, nta isyana myaandu, kififi.
45013014	Mmbo musheraa Nndumi Yesu muuny wany, nta mulalolaa mwiili na yaanta lango ta vayo.
45014001	Yeto akee mfwafwa wa kikusiryo mmbwaryeny kwany, lyo mulamuutye uvingo-fo.
45014002	Nndu wa kikusiryo mmbo akulyiiya shoonga toose, lyo yeto mfwafwa kikusiryony mmbo alya nyany sheni.
45014003	Mwiilya shoonga toose nalamini yeto ara nalalya-fo, mashika woose mmba Iruva.
45014004	A yewe ni vi ndesa kutani kwautya ungyi uvingo? Ni nndumi yeto wakwe muni amwiirikyaa ao nallemi. Ni yoo kwa nndumi yeto wakwe kweni asalalaa ao nawe.
45014005	Nndu ungyi mmbo alollya mikonu myoose nshi kimwi-fo, na ungyi kalollya mikonu myoose nkimwi nsi. Nshaasa wo nndu alollya we muni.
45014006	Yeto alollya nkonu mmbee ntorya mmwasi, ni Nndumi amwiidimisya indo, neeto mwiilya shoonga ni Nndumi da ansimba indo. Na lyingyi-se yeto ara nalalya kindo kive, ni efo kwa Nndumi avekai, kavemwaana.
45014007	Mashika nkwiifo nta nndu umwi aidima ikaau na muu we muni-fo, nta yeto mwiifwa nnyafwa kyuuka nawe muni-fo.
45014008	Mashika kwakooya lwiiyo na muu mmbo lweekyo ni Nndumi, na lukafwa mmbo lwafwa lukee na Nndumi. Kyasiany lukakaa na muu ao lukafwa mmbo lukee va Nndumi.
45014009	Ekyo nkyo kileengye Kristo kafwa numa kawuya iruka naambo nashillye yewo vakee na muu kiwo neewo vafiiye.
45014010	A nkyiki elyi kwautya mwanamau uvingo? Ao kwammina? Lyo lumanyi sheelyi yese loose mmbo lushesalalaa mbee ya kitima kya ushilyi kya Iruva.
45014011	Kimmba kikee kireiye indi, Yeny Nndumi shiiyo, woose mmbo vasheshifiiryaa ndi. Na vandu woose vasheshaambaa paa.
45014012	Niindo kikai, wo umwi weeru mmbo asheutaa yeekena lyakwe muni yoo mbee ya Iruva.
45014013	Naasany lulakiengere ikurera kikasha-fo, kyeendi ng'waana lurummbwe indi, kulave nndu avika kindo kyeengye mwanamaye nsindara ao kyentuula.
45014014	Shiishi deny nesununndywa nnu na irina lya Nndumi Yesu, sheelyi nkwiifo kindo kikee kitefusu uka efo kiparikye-fo. Kyaindi yeto muni alollya kindo nkitefusu, kwakwe we muni mmbo kivaa kitefusu.
45014015	Na nndu wafo kwakooya asherovywaa nriminy kyeendwa nshoonga, yewe mmbo kwamaangwa efo ikundeny lyafo. Kyeendwa nshoonga yafo kulasherovya nndu ulya Kristo alefwa kimaruma kyakwe.
45014016	Naasany, mikaaye yaany misha ilashesendwa na ukasha-fo.
45014017	Mashika umangyi lwa Iruva nshi ilya na ina-fo, ni usumanu, ufoo na ifura nnang'ani ya Mumuyo Mweele.
45014018	Mashika yeto arundya Kristo nisha efo findony efyo mmbo asennya Iruva, naakwa ni vandu vakamwirikya.
45014019	Naasa kwakooya niindo, lusore ngata ya ufoo na yeyo yekaarisana.
45014020	Lola kulashelyamara ishora lya Iruva kweengywa nshoonga. Yee, fyoose mfisha; kyaindi nkikasha kwakooya nndu alya shoonga keengye vengyi nsindara.
45014021	Nkyeni deny shire shilalya nyama ao ina wari ao itana kindo kingyi kyoose kwakooya nndu ungyi asheutaa-u nsindara.
45014022	Kikusiryo kilya kukee nakyo kitire kwikee na Iruva. Ngoma nndu yeto nalalollyaa nyinyira we muni kya findo filya we muni afiirikye.
45014023	Lyo mwiilya na nyinyira, mmbo ambutywa uvingo kyeamba anrenga, mashika elyi alya nalatiri iirikyo. Na wo kindo nndu atana kilaryani na kikusiryo ni ulyamari.
45015001	Kimmba niindo mmbo kilukooye yese lutiri finya lwiipoo ufwafwa lwa valya valatiri finya, nta lulave vandu vekukunda luveni.
45015002	Wo nndu nnang'ani yeeru nalole shaasa ashesennyaa yeto ungyi, nasennywa neetumariswa.
45015003	Mashika naakwa ni Kristo nnyalekusennya we munifo; kuuta nshaasa kikee kireiye. Filya filererwa-u kikasha kyafo ni yeny fileshikooya.
45015004	Shamashika efyo fikee fireiye mmbo filereiyo naambo yese kyeendwa ni usisiryo na iviiryo muu lwawonisa efo Mareiyony yoo Meele lwiidimi ivika nsia.
45015005	Iruva mmbwe mwiluniinga usisiryo na iviiryo muu, nawe namulyimyi ukaari na ikutira efo kwa Yesu Kristo.
45015006	Naambo neeni moose mwikee na nrwe umwi nsi mwiidimi iitikisa Iruva Nde na Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
45015007	Kyasia waryaniny kyeny kwany muveni na veni shaasa Kristo alemuwarya yeni naambo itumbe lya Iruva lyikooye ilollyo.
45015008	Manyiny-te naakwa ni Kristo mmbo alerundya Vayuda naambo naore paa shaasa Iruva akee nsha, na fyaasa filya Iruva alevikya vakuu veru fikooye iinukya.
45015009	Naambo na vandu va masanga engyi vaute-u irumisha Iruva kyeendwa ni ilyillya lyakwe. Mareiyo yoo Meele niindo aamba: “Kimmba niindo mmbo nshekurumishaa efo vanduny va masanga moose. Shiimbe nnduma wa irina lyafo.”
45015010	Nang'u mareiyo akaamba lyingi, “Kyefureny yeni vandu va masanga fureny musange na vandu vengyi woose.”
45015011	Na lyingyi, “Eni vandu va masanga moose ng'aniseny Nndumi eni vandu woose nnganiseny.”
45015012	Nawe Isaya kaamba, “Asheshaa nndu auka efo ufyariny lwa Yese, nawe asheshillyaa vandu va masanga nawo vashembikaa nsia.”
45015013	Naasany, Iruva yeto amwiidimisya ivika nsia namweengye ifura lyoose na ufoo lyuukye efo kikusiryony kyany, naambo na ivika nsia lyany lyeengereke kyeendwa ni finya ya Mumuyo Mweele.
45015014	Vanavama, mmbo shikee nsunundye deny kyany kyeyaamba naakwa nnyeni mutiri mesha meengyi, muraiye urango, mukaidima na iikimbana.
45015015	Lyo mmbo shiifo shimureiyaa findo efi nookaari yaa kyengeny eki kya barwa yei, kive sheelyi shamukumbura-da, kimaruma kya isarya llya shilelyimmyo ni Iruva.
45015016	Naambo shive mwifurukannya Kristo Yesu efo nnang'ani ya vandu va masanga, shirundye Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia ishora lya ukohani, naambo vandu va masanga vave kiraso kisenyi, kikammaa iilyiso ni Mumuyo Mweele.
45015017	Naasany, yeny mmbo shilollye kimaruma kya ifura nnu na Kristo Yesu mbee ya Iruva.
45015018	Mashika nshishidimaa isenda nta irero lyimwi ishoreny lyakwa Kristo alyisuuye-fo, naambo vandu va masanga vaindye-u, na irero ao na kindo kyeetana.
45015019	Kwi finya ya ngyende na findo filandelollywa na wiidimi lwa Mumuyo Mweele; naasa kipookya Yerusalemu neefo minyanuny ya vayo kufike Iluriko mmbo shilevambisa Nrumi shisha ya Kristo na ifura.
45015020	Lingyi shakutakura shilaambe Nrumi ya Nsia alya kweni irina lya Kristo lyilemmaa isendwa, naambo tupu shilatanyi mmba uvasheny lwa nndu ungi.
45015021	Kive shaasa kikee kireiye indi, “Valya valandeongoywa mbony takwe vashelollyaa. Na valya valandeite vashemmanyaa.”
45015022	Nkyo kimaruma wo kyeeri shilelemwa isha kwany.
45015023	Kyaindi ulaalu, kimmba shilatiri mwaanya kunu, na lyingyi uka myaaka miingyi sheelangye isha kwany;
45015024	nkonu moose eto nshipoo kyaaro yeenda Hispania mmbo nshaa kwany. Mashika mmbo shilangye imulollya yeni kyaarony ekyo kyakwa. Mushivikye kilyilyika kyaarony ekyo, nrima wakwa uwuutiso nnyeni.
45015025	Lyo ulaalu nkuti sheende mbele Yerusalemu, shindefurukannya veele va Nndumi.
45015026	Mashika mmbo kilesenya vandu va Makedonia na Akaya isanyirya firaso kimaruma kya veele yewo va Yerusalemu vakee vakiva.
45015027	Yee, mmbo kilevasennya indo, nawo mmbo vatiri sye kwawo. Mashika kwakooya vandu va masanga vantarannya nawo mbony ta miriminy, mmbo valesenyo nawo ivafurukannya kya efyo fya mwiili.
45015028	Naasany kwakooya shainutya ishora elyo, na iringisya ndunda eto, mmbo nshiiraa kwany sheende Hispania.
45015029	Neeny shiishi shamanya shansha kwany mmbo nshaa na mbora ya Kristo iishwe shapu.
45015030	Vanavama, mmbo shamutereva kwi Yesu Kristo, na kwi ukundi lwa Mumuyo kutakureny ando amwi neeny efo fiterewony fyany mbee ya Iruva kimaruma kyakwa.
45015031	Shikirwa maakony a valya valairikye kulya Uyuda, na lyingyi naambo urundi elu lwakwa kulya Yerusalemu lukooye iirikywa mbee ya veele.
45015032	Naambo shiidimi isha kwany shiitiri ifura, shaasa Iruva akundye, nsheimuya ando amwi neeni.
45015033	Iruva wa ufoo nakae ando amwi neeni moose. Amen.
45016001	Mmbo shikeerambikya Fibi mwanamaye weeru kwany. We ni mwifurukannya siri ya Kenkrea.
45016002	Shamutereva mbwaryeny kimaruma kya Nndumi; shaasa kikooye veele, mushemweekya kindo kyoose yekyo kishenting'aa, mashika naako niwe mmbo aleva mwiekya vandu veengyi, kavesheekya naako ni yeny.
45016003	Shiidikiryeny Priska na Akila. Yeva ni varundi va Kristo Yesu kimwi sha yeny.
45016004	Nawo mmbo vekudeesye naako ni irumbuwa nrwe kimaruma kyakwa; nawo mmbo nkevaana, nta nshi yeny shimuni-da-fo, kyaindi ando amwi na Siri ta vandu va masanga moose. Shiidikiryeny na siri yeyo ya mmba kwawo.
45016005	Shiidikiryeny Epaineto, nkunde wakwa yeto alepooka tishi iirikya Kristo kulya Asia.
45016006	Shiidikiryeny na Miryamu yeto alekuvinisa nnu-dwa kimaruma kyany.
45016007	Shiidikiryeny na Androniko na Yunia, wo ni vandu vakwa, valefingwa ando amwi neeny, vakavetira nnduma efo nnang'ani ya varumi; nawo mmbo valeshisongoya imanya Nndumi.
45016008	Shiidikiryeny na Ampliato, nkunde wakwa kimaruma kya Nndumi.
45016009	Shiidikiryeny na Urbano, nndundi wa Kristo ando amwi neeny, na Stakisi, nkunde wakwa.
45016010	Shiidikiryeny na Apele, nawe akee mwirikye ni Kristo. Shiidikiryeny na vandu va mmba ya Aristabulo.
45016011	Shiidikiryeny Herodiani, nndu wakwa. Shiidikiryeny na vandu va mmba ya Narkiso, nawo vakee na Nndumi.
45016012	Shiidikiryeny na Trifaina na Trifosa, vasasari nnu efo kwa Nndumi. Shiidikiryeny na Persisi, nkunde alekutakura nnu kimaruma kya Nndumi.
45016013	Shiidikiryeny na Rufo, nsauwe wa Nndumi, na maaye, kaveva na ma-da.
45016014	Shiidikiryeny na Asinkrito, Flegoni, Herme, Patroba, Herma, na vanavama yewo vakee nawo.
45016015	Shiidikiryeny Filologo na Yulia, Nerea na mfwamaye, na Olimpa, na veele woose yewo vakee ando amwi nawo.
45016016	Idikiraniny mwikumimindaa na ngata sheele. Siri toose ta Kristo nato tamwiidikira.
45016017	Vanavama vakwa, shamwiikima, kwiiseny nnu na valya vatiri uriingyi na filya fyeende misindara nafyo fivikyani kiduva na ufundo lwany.
45016018	Mashika yewo vakee indo mmbakeerunndya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo-fo, nndeu tawo veni. Nawo mmbo vareraa marero mafoo vekukundisaa, ate mmbo vakeelemba mirima ya vandu vatele.
45016019	Mashika wiindi lwany mmbo lulemanyika ni vandu woose, nkyo kimaruma shafura neeni. Lyo mmbo shikundye muve vaarya nnu mwitanaa findo fisha, muveva vatondo findony fikasha.
45016020	Nawe Iruva mmbo ashekakashaa mmbishwa efo si ya marende any uviny.
45016021	Timoteo, ulya akee nndundi ando amwi neeny amwiidikira, na Lukio na Yason, na Sosipatro, vanavama.
45016022	Neeny Tertio, shareiya barwa yei shamwiidikira shikee na Nndumi.
45016023	Gayo yeto aleshiwarya na Siri shoose-da amwiidikira na irina lya Nndumi. Erasto, mwisalallya muri, nawe amwiidikira, na Kwarto, we mwanamaye weeru. [
45016024	Isarya lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo lyikae neeni moose Amen.]
45016025	Ulaaluny narumishwa yeto ashidimaa imutumarisa kiinani na ndera yakwa na kya elyi Yesu Kristo akee yongoywa kiinani na masukuyony a kyama kilya kyekee kisikye uka kasha.
45016026	Kikashesukuwa kyeeri ekyi efo mareiyony a vakisuku, kikashemanyika ni vandu va masanga moose, shaasa Iruva wa llung'anu alevavasya. Naambo vaindye Kikusiryo ekyo.
45016027	Ni we Iruva muni araiye urango. Nnduma mmbwakwe kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo, llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
46001001	Ni yeny Paulo, shilevaangwa iva nrumi wa Yesu Kristo kwi ikunda lya Iruva, na Sostene mwanamayeru. "
46001002	Yeni va siri ya Iruva ikee Korinto, valya vakee vailyise kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo, vakavaangwa naambo vave veele, ando amwi na woose valya vakeesenda irina lya Yesu Kristo wo ando, Nndumi waawo na weeru.
46001003	Isarya lyikae neeni na ufoo, yelo luukye efo kwa Iruva Nde weeru, na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
46001004	Mmbo shava mwaana Iruva mikonu myoose kimaruma kyany, kimaruma kya isarya lya Iruva mulelyimywa kwi Kristo Yesu. "
46001005	Mashika mmbo mulelyimywa mbora shiingyi kyeendwa mmbwe, efo mireryeny yaany na waarya loose;
46001006	shaasa ukureeki lwa Kristo lulekoora paa kwany.
46001007	Nta mmulaanguyo nsimbo nta imwifo, mukavekaa-fo mwiivikaa nsia kya ishekoora paa lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
46001008	Mmbwe yeto ashemuvangisaa fika mafurumyony, naambo mulashekapwa mong'wa nkonu ulya wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
46001009	Iruva yeto alemuvaanga ni nsaari, nambo mukooye isandwa na Mwana wakwe Yesu Kristo Nndumi weeru.
46001010	Naasany vanavama, shamutereva na irina lya, Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, murere kimwi; nta mulatarakani, kyaindi mufikye iva va nrwe umwi na makusaro amwi nsi.
46001011	Mashika-le vanavama, valya va mmba ya Kloe mmbo valeshifitya mbony tany kyeyaamba kwiifo uriingyi kwany.
46001012	Naasany, kirye yaamba indi, wo umwi waany mmbo akee yaamba indi, yeny mmbo shikee wa Paulo, na ungyi kaamba ni wa Apolo, na ungyi ni wa Kefa, na yeny ni wa Kristo.
46001013	A Kristo mmbo akwaavye ndesa? A Paulo yeto mmbo alekapyo nsalabeny kimaruma kyany? Ale ndesa, mmbo mulebatisyo irina lya Paulo?
46001014	Mmbo nkeyaana nnu Iruva mashika efo kwany nshilebatisafo nndu-fo, kuuta Krispo na Gayo;
46001015	naambo kulasheva-fo nndu aamba mmbo alebatiswa na irina lyakwa.
46001016	Na lyingyise shilebatisa vandu va mmba ya Stefana, na mmwasi ya yewo nshiishi kwakooya shilebatisa nndu ungyi nta umwi-fo.
46001017	Shamashika Kristo nnyaleshiruma naambo shindebatisa-fo, kuuta ni ivambisa Nrumi Shisha, na nta nshi na urango lwa marero-fo, naambo nsalaba wa Kristo ulasheeva ruu.
46001018	Mashika irero lya nsalaba kwa yewo vakeereka ni kindo kyeeseta, indi kweru yese lukeekirwa ni finya ya Iruva.
46001019	Mashika kikee kireiye kyeyaamba, “Nshelyamaraa urango lwa yewo vatiri urango, na imanya lya yewo vaamba veeshi, nshelyilema.”
46001020	Yeto atiri urango nkwi akai? Mwilosha mavavaso akee kwi? A yeto mwisuma mbony wa inu akee kwi? A Iruva nnyalealwa urango lwa ulana yelu luve urung'ani?
46001021	Mashika efo waaryeny lwa Iruva kukooyaa kulaore ulana lwamannya-u Iruva na urango lwa vayo, Iruva mmbo alekunda ikira valya vakusiryeu na ufwafwa lwa irero llya lyikeyaambawa.
46001022	Mashika wo Vayuda vakeeruya ngyende, na Vagriki ni urango;
46001023	lyo yese mmbo lukeevambisa Kristo ulya alekapyo nsalebeny, na kwa Vayuda ni nsindara na kwa Vagriki ni kindo kyeseta.
46001024	Kyaindi kwawo vakee vavaange, kwa Vayuda ao Vagriki, ni Kristo, finya ya Iruva, na waarya lwa Iruva.
46001025	Mashika urung'ani lwa Iruva mmbo lutiri urango ngota vandu, na ufwafwa lwa Iruva lukatira finya ngota vandu.
46001026	Mashika-le vandu vakwa, loleny kya uvaango lwany, sheelyi nshi veengyi vatiri urango lwa kivandu, nta nshi veengyi vatiri finya, nshi veengyi vatiri uniini vakee vavaange-fo.
46001027	Mashika Iruva mmbo alesauwa findo firung'ani fya ulana yelu naambo nasute valya vakee varango. Lyingyi Iruva mmbo alesauwa findo fifwafwa fya ulana elu naambo nasute filya fitiri finya.
46001028	Na lyingyi-se Iruva mmbo alesauwa findo finana fya ulana na fikee fiile, yee, filya filaiyo.
46001029	Yeto atiri mwiili moose nalasheekurosa mmbee ya Iruva-fo.
46001030	Mashika nkimaruma kyakwe mukakusirya na Kristo Yesu yeto alealuwa waarya lwa Iruva kweru, na usumanu, na weele, na ukiro;
46001031	naambo shaasa kikee kireiye, yeto mwikushopa nakushope na Nndumi.
46002001	Kyasiany vanavama, kyeeri shilesha kwany nshilesha shishemoongoya kyama kya Iruva na moososo wa marero nta na urango-fo.
46002002	Mashika mmbo shilefisha shila nriminy wakwa shilamanyi kindo kyoose efo kwany kuuta Yesu Kristo ulya alekapyo nsalabeny.
46002003	Neeny mmbo shekee na ufwafwa efo kwany na weerei na irerema nnu.
46002004	Na irero lyakwa na yaamba Nrumi ya Nsia nkyekee kya marero a urango-fo, atiri yoomwa vandu-fo, ni kwa finya na ngata ya Mumuyo.
46002005	Naambo kikusiryo kyany kilave nkya ngata ya urango lwa nndu, indi kive kya finya ya Iruva.
46002006	Kyaindi kwiifo urango lwa vandu yewo vasalalyi nisha, nta nshi waarya lwa ulana elu-fo. Nta lwa yewo veshillya, ulana elu vakava ruu-fo.
46002007	Mmbo lwarerya mbony ta waarya lwa kyama kya Iruva. Llo waarya lukee usurumi, llo Iruva aleluvika-fo uka elyo mbee kimaruma kya itumbe lyeru.
46002008	Nalo yewo veshillya ulana elu mmbalwiishi nta umwi-fo. Mashika kukooye velyishi, mmbekapyaa Nndumi wa itumbe nsalebeny-fo.
46002009	Lyo shaasa kikee kireiye. Findo filya kulaore iriso lyilefilollya nta kuri ifiita, (Nta mfileanga nriminy wa nndu-fo,) mfyo Iruva aledeesya valya venkunda.
46002010	Lyo Iruva mmbo alelusukuya yese na Mumuyo Mweele. Mashika Mumuyo we mmbo aishi fyoose, naakwa ni fyama fya Iruva.
46002011	Mashika efo vanduny mmbi aishi mbony ta vandu kulaore ni ngoo ya nndu yeyo ikee efo nnang'ani yakwe? Ni indo-da na mbony ta Iruva nkwiifo mwitimanya-fo kuuta Mumuyo wa Iruva.
46002012	Kyaindi yese llulewarya mumuyo wa ulana elu fo, ni Mumuyo wuukye kwa Iruva, naambo lwiidimi imanya filya lukee valyimyi ni Iruva.
46002013	Neefyo lukafivera, nshi na marero akeeloshwa ni urango lwa kinndu-fo ni marero akeeloshwa ni Mumuyo, lwitambashwaa findo fya nriminy na marero a nriminy.
46002014	Naasany nndu yeto akee wa mbuka ya llya kipooka nnyashiidimaa iwarya mbony ta Mumuyo wa Iruva-fo; mashika kwa yeto ni kindo kyeseta, nta nnyashidimaa itimanya-fo, mashika mmbo tishidimaa imanyika kwa ngata ya nriminy sheni.
46002015	Kyaindi nndu wa ngata ya nriminy mmbo amanyaa fyoose, naakwa kulaore vengyi vamanya.
46002016	Mashika, Ni vi alemmanya makusaro a Nndumi, nanniinge makusaro? Kyaindi yese lutiri makusaro a Kristo.
46003001	Lyo, vanavama, yeny nshileidima irera neeni sha vandu vatiri ngata ya mumuyo-fo, indi mmbo shilerera neeni sha vandu wa ngata ya mwiiliny, sha fivana fidu kwi Kristo.
46003002	Mmbo shilemuniinga malela, nshilemuninga shoonga shuumu-fo; mashika mmwemiidima iilya-fo. Yee, fika ulaalu mmwaleidima-fo.
46003003	Mashika fika ulaalu yeni mmbo mukee vandu va ngata ya mwiiliny. Mashika kwany kwiifo kififi na uriingyi. Yeni nshi vandu va ngata ya mwiiliny, na lyingyi mukeenda na ngata ya kivandu?
46003004	Mashika yoo nndu umwi ashiidimaa yaamba, yeny shikee wa Paulo, na ungyi, yeny ni wa Apolo, a yeni mmukee vandu?
46003005	Kyasia Apolo mmbi? Na Paulo mmbi? Ni varundi, yeni mulekusirya kimaruma kyawo, na shaasa wo umwi Nndumi alemwidimisya.
46003006	Yeny mmbo shilevaaya Apolo siri; lyo yeto mwirosa ni Iruva.
46003007	Kwa ekyo, mwivaaya nshi kindo-fo nta yeto anisaafo, kuuta yeto arosaa, mmbwe Iruva.
46003008	Naasany yeto akeevaaya na yeto akeenisa mmbo vakee vamwi, na wo nndu mmbo ashewonisaa weesi lwakwe muni kiinani na ngatara yakwe muni.
46003009	Mashika lyo yese mmbo lukee varundi ando amwi na Iruva; yeni mmbo mukee irema lya Iruva, mukaveva mmba ya Iruva.
46003010	Kiinani na isarya lya Iruva shilelyimmyo, yeny, shivakye mwitana mmba atiri urango, mmbo shileveiya uvasha, na nndu ungyi mmbo akeetanyau mmba. Kyaindi wo umwi kuti nalole shaasa atannyaa yoo uwasheny elo.
46003011	Mashika nkwiifo nndu ashiidimaa ivika uvasha lungyi-fo, kuuta yelo lulemmaa ivikwa, llo Yesu Kristo.
46003012	Llyo yoo uvasheny yelo nndu katannya-u, saabu ao fesa ao mawe a wuuru, ao firi ao mamburu ao nyasi, ishora llya wo umwi lyishekooraa paa.
46003013	Mashika nkonu yeto ishesukua, mashika mmbo isheetwaa murony, na muro yeto nto usheesaa ishora lya wo umwi woore ni ngata ki.
46003014	Ishora lya nndu yelyo atannyi-u lyikansalala, ashewonisaa itumbe.
46003015	Ishora lya nndu lyikanrumaka, afwaa mmwasi nndu yeto; kyaindi ikirwa lyake lyishevaa sha nndu aturunya murony.
46003016	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi yeni ni mmba ya Iruva, na lyingyi sheelyi Mumuyo wa Iruva mmbo akaa nnang'ani yaany?
46003017	Kwakooya nndu alyamara mmba ya Iruva, na Iruva mmbo ashelyamaraa nndu yeto. Mashika mmba ya Iruva nsheele nnyo yeni.
46003018	Nndu nalashekulemba we muni; kwakooya nndu akulollye we muni mmbo atiri urango yaa ulaniny elu, ra nave ntondo naambo nave nnrango.
46003019	Mashika urango lwa ulana yelu ni urung'ani mbee ya Iruva. Mashika kikee kireiye kyeaamba. We mmbwe yeto areiya varango na mireiyo yaawo.
46003020	Na lyingyi, Nndumi eeshi makusaro a yewo vatiri urango sheelyi ni ruu.
46003021	Naasany, nndu nalakurose kimaruma kya vandufo. Mashika fyoose mfyany;
46003022	kwakooya ni Paulo, ao Apolo, ao Kefa; ao ulana; ao muu, ao filya fiiyoo ulaalu ao filyaa fishaa, fyoose mfyany;
46003023	neeni mmbo mukee va Kristo, na Kristo mmbwa Iruva.
46004001	Nndu nalulole indi, sheelyi mmbo lukee varundi va Kristo, na vangari vekallya fyama fya Iruva.
46004002	Kikeeny indo kindo, kikunndwa efo kwa vangari ni nndu ilollyo mmbo akee wa dede.
46004003	Kyaindi yeny nshilollye nkindo kwakooya mwashuutya uvingo-fo, nta na uvingo lwa kivandu-fo, na nta nshikuutyaa uvingo yeny shimuni-fo.
46004004	Mashika nshitiri kimaruma kyetana indo-fo. Lyo nshikyo kyasheekennya usumanu-fo; mashika mwishuutya uvingo ni Nndumi muni.
46004005	Naasa yeni mulaute uvingo lwa kindo kyoose kyeeri kilandefika-fo, kutani elyi Nndumi ashaa; mmbwe yeto ashemikyaa yefyo fikee fisurumi ireeminy, neesukwa fyama fyoose fya ngoony ta vandu, llyony, wo nndu ashewonisaa nnduma wakwe efo kwa Iruva.
46004006	Naasany vanavama, mbony yeto mmbo shatirera na fyaaso kimaruma kyakwa yeny na Apolo kimaruma kyany, na kwa kyaaso kyeru yeni mwiidimi ikulosha mure mularekywa filya fikee fireiye. Naambo nta umwi waany nalakushope kimaruma kya ng'anya kikee kilakaniso na yeto ungyi.
46004007	Mashika lyo ni vi yeto alollya yewe nkukee sha yeto ungyi? A yewe nkyokyi kulandekiwarya? Indi kwakooya kulewarya, mmbo kukung'anisaa inda elyi kulandewarya?
46004008	Mmbo mwammaa iwuura, mwamaa iwarya usimba, mwammaa ishilya lulaiyoo. Yee kyeshiaa, naambo neese lushillye neeni!
46004009	Mashika shikusara Iruva mmbo aleluvika yese varumi yoo mafurumyony, luvake vandu vautye uvingo vandewaawa; luve kindo kyeelola kwa ulana loose, kwa vamalaika na kwa vandu.
46004010	Yese mmbo lukee varung'ani kimaruma kya Kristo, neeni lyo mukava varango kimaruma kya Kristo, yese mmbo lukee vafwafwa, neeni mukatira finya, yeni mmbo mutiri nnduma lyo yese llukeewonisa nta wiindi-fo.
46004011	Na fika ulaalu, mmbo lutirwa nshaa na nyura, lukee ruu, lukeekapwa na ng'unde, nta llutiri ando ekaafo;
46004012	na lyingyi mmbo lukeyaatarika nnu lwirundaa mashora na maako eru luveni. Lukaararwa mmbo lwaavikya mbora, lukavaviswa nriminy lukasisirya;
46004013	lukavikyo ureeree mmbo lwalelemba; mmbo lukee yaaluwa sha kirinda kya ulana na kyoo kya findo fyoose fika ulaalu.
46004014	Nshikeemureiya findo efi naambo shimwiing'ashe-fo; indi naambo shimwikimbe sha vana vakunde.
46004015	Mashika na kikava mutiri veelosha vafye sha fiku ikumi kwi Kristo, lyo mmutiri vande veengyi-fo. Mashika ni yeny shilemwiira kwi Kristo Yesu kyeendwa ni Nrumi ya Nsia.
46004016	Kyasiany shamwiikima mushisore yeny.
46004017	Nkyo kiteve sharuma Timoteo kwany, we mwana wakwa nkunde na nsaari kwa Nndumi, we mmbwe ashemukumburaa shia shileisora kwi Kristo, shaasa shivekeelosha wo ando efo siriny.
46004018	Naasa kukaa-fo vengyi vakeekushopa veshaamba nshikekisha kwany-fo.
46004019	Lyo nkeesha kwany uviny, shammidimisyo, neeny nshemanya, nshi vakeekushopya marero tupu-fo, kyaindi na finya-da.
46004020	Mashika umangyi lwa Iruva llwiiyoo na marero-fo, kyaindi nna wiidimi.
46004021	A nkingakyi musauwaa-u? Shasha kwany na mbiiri, a shasha na ikunda na nrima wa ufoo?
46005001	Ni dede mmbo kikee irerwa efo kwany mbony tikakwaana riti, sheelyi kwiifo utuusi lulakee nta kwa vandu va masanga, sheelyi nndu nakae na nka wa ndeye.
46005002	Neeni mukarumana, nta mmusukaa-fo, kwakooya ashuuka kwany nndu mwitana kindo kya ngata efyo.
46005003	Mashika lyo dede, kwakooya shilaiyoo na mwiili, lyo shakaa-u kinrima, yeny shimuni mmbo shammayuutya yeto aletana kindo ekyo uvingo, kimwi sheelyi sheiyo.
46005004	Kyeeri mukusanyirye na irina lya Nndumi weeru Yesu, neeny shikee neeni kwi mumuyo ando amwi na wiidimi lwa Nndumi weeru Yesu.
46005005	Shirambikye mmbishwa nndu yeto, naambo mwiili ukapwa, indi to nrima ukirwa nkonu yeto wa Nndumi Yesu.
46005006	Irumana lyany nshi isha-fo. Mmbo mulaishi sheelyi ntarang'o munnywa mmbo ushashwa mbumba moose?
46005007	Kyasia, kwiilyiseny, mundeutaa-fo ntarang'o eto wa kasha, muwake mbumba muiya, mukae-fo mulatiri ntarang'o. Mashika Pasaka yeeru ilemmaa yuuto ive kiraso, mmbwe Kristo;
46005008	naasany luvike nkonu nnini, nshi wa ntarang'o ulya wa kasha-fo, ao nta nshi na ntarang'o wa uravi na ukasha-fo, kyaindi nkya filya filataran'gaa, llo waa lwa nrima na dede.
46005009	Mmbo shilemureiya kulya barueny ilya yakwa, kyeyaamba mulasasange na vatuusi-fo.
46005010	Nnshi shikeamba mulasange deny na vatuusi va ulana elu-fo, ao na velanga, ao na vasoki, ao na veindya maruva a wongo-fo; mashika mmbo kyevaa kuti mukee kunu ulaniny yelu.
46005011	Kyaindi shaasa kikai, mmbo shilemureiya mulatarannyi na nndu moose akee umwi weeru, akee ntuusi ao mwilanga ao mwiindya maruva a wongo ao mwiyarara, ao nnangwa ao nsoki-fo. Vandu va ngata yeto mulakunde nta ilya nawo-fo.
46005012	A nkikyi elyi yeny nshuutyaa valya vakee poo uvingo? Yeni mmbo mulakeyuutya uvingo yewo vakee neese?
46005013	Yewo vakee poo ni Iruva ashevautyaa uvingo. Yeto akee nravi muuteny efo nnang'ani yaany.
46006001	A kwakooya umwi wany akeeyava ungyi sye, akaryaa inrwaa mbee ya vandu va masanga, nare-fo vandu veele?
46006002	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi veele mmbo vasheutyaa ulana uvingo? Na kwankooya ulana mmbo lusheutywaa uvingo ni yeni, mmbo mulasumani ulaalu irumbwa myaandu midu?
46006003	Mmbo mulaishi sheelyi mmbo lusheutyaa vasu uvingo, na nshi mmwasi deny kya mbony ta muu yeu!
46006004	Naasany, kwakooya mutiri ando musheanduyaa mbony ta muu yeu mmbo mwavika veerummbwa yewo vakee ruu kunu siriny?
46006005	Mmbo sharera indo kikee kyeemuteenda. A mmbokyaamba kwany nkwiifo nta nndu umwi atiri urango, ashiidimaa irummbwa mbony ta vandu vakwe?
46006006	Kyaindi mmbo mwakukumba muweni na veni nndu na uroye kwa vandu va masanga.
46006007	Naasany mmbo mukeevaanguye deny mukankuriingya muveni na veni. A nshi ng'waana kwaanguywa, ao isokwa findo fyany?
46006008	Indi kilasha neefyo yeni mmbo mwalammya vengi neevasoka masaa awo; yee, naakwa ni vandu vany veni.
46006009	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi varavi va ngata yeyo mmbawonaa umangyi lwa Iruva-fo? Mulasheelembika, vatuusi mmbashewonaa umangyi lwa Iruva-fo, nta veindya maruva a wongo-fo, nta vaatuusi, na varavi va ngata eto,
46006010	manyinyi, nta velanga, nta vanangwa-fo, nta veyaarara, nta vasoki-fo.
46006011	Na vengyi vany mmbo mwekee va ngata yeyo; lyo mukailyiswa, mukaekennywa usumanu na irina lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo, na lya Mumuyo wa Iruva weeru.
46006012	Kwakwa yeny findo fyoose mfisha. Lyo nshi fyoose fivaa-fo. Kwakwa yeny findo fyoose mfisha. Lyo yeny nshisheshilywa nta nkindo kimwi-fo.
46006013	Shoonga nnya ndeu, na ndeu nya shoonga. Lyo Iruva mmbo asheutaa-u fyoose, ndeu na shoonga. Indi mwiili nshi wa utuusi-fo, ni wa Nndumi, na Nndumi ni wa mwiili.
46006014	Na Iruva mmbo aleruta Nndumi weeru na lyingyi we mmbo ashelurutaa neese na wiidimi lwakwe.
46006015	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi miili yaany ni malungo a Kristo? A mmbo nshuutaa fyuungo fya Kristo shifyaallwe five fya ntuusi? Oode!
46006016	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi yeto akee llunge na ntuusi mmbo akee mwiili umwi nawe? Mashika aamba, mmbo yewo vavii vashevaa mwiili umwi.
46006017	Lyo yeto akellunge na Nndumi ni nrima umwi nawe.
46006018	Risheny utuusi. Wo ulyamari nndu alutana mmbo lukee kipoo ya mwiili wakwe. Kyaindi mwituusa mmbo atannya mwiili wakwe muni ulyamari.
46006019	Ao ndesa mmbo mulaishi sheelyi mwiili wany ni mmba ya Mumuyo Mweele yeto akee nnang'ani yaany mukee vaniinge ni Iruva? Nta yeni mmukee vany muveni-fo.
46006020	Mashika mmbo mukee woore na uuru. Kikeeny indo naasa itikiseny Iruva efo miiliny yaany-te.
46007001	Kyasia kya mbony tilya muleshireiya, nkyeni nndu nndumi nare nalapaana nndu nka.
46007002	Lyo kyeekwiisa utuusi wo nndu nave na nka wakwe muni, na wo nka nave na mmi wakwe muni.
46007003	Mmi naniinge nka wakwe usumanu lwakwe.
46007004	Nka nnyatiri finya na mwiili wakwe-fo, ni mmi wakwe; na indo-da nndumi nnyatiri finya na mwiili wakwe-fo, kuuta nka wakwe.
46007005	Kulaore mmbo mwanrumbwa indo mulakwiimi-fo, naambo mwiidimi iwona mwaanya weetereva, muwuyani lyingyi, mmbishwa nalashewona mwaanya kwany elyi mwara muleva na mwiina.
46007006	Lyo mmbo shamuvia indo, shaasa shilollye yeny, lyo nshi ivavaso-fo.
46007007	Kuuta lyo kindo shikunndye ni vandu woose vave shaasa yeny shikai. Lyo wo nndu mmbo akee nsimbe simbo yakwe yuuka kwa Iruva, yeu indi, na yeto indo.
46007008	Lyo mmbo nkeevia valya valandeora, na vaka va ding'u, nkyeni vakae shaasa yeny shikai.
46007009	Kyaindi vakallemwa isisirya, vaore. Mashika nngw'aana yoora ngota irovyo llango.
46007010	Lyo valya valemmaa ikoora shavavia; na nta nshi yeny-fo, ni Nndumi. Nka nalalakani na mmi-fo.
46007011	Lyo, kwakooya valakana, nalakyoorwa-se-fo, kulakooye vawuyana-se na mmi wakwe, na nndumi nalare nka wakwe-fo.
46007012	Indi vandu vengyi mmbo shavavia yeny, lyo nshi Nndumi-fo; sheelyi kwakooya umwi weeru atiri nka nalairikye, na nka yeto kairikya ikaa nawe, nalanre-fo.
46007013	Na nka, kwakooya atiri nndumi nalairikye, na nndumi yeto alangye ikaa nawe, naasa nalare mmi wakwe-fo.
46007014	Mashika nndumi yeto nalairikye mmbo asheilyiswaa ni nka wakwe. Na nka yeto nalairikye mmbo asheilyiswaa ni mmi wakwe. Kukooye kulaore ni indo vana vany mbevaa vasumanu-fo. Kyaindi ulaalu mmbo vakee vesha.
46007015	Lyo ulya nalairikye kankunda yeenda, nakweengye. Lyo yeto airikye kava nndumi ao nka nnyakee mfinge-fo. Lyo Iruva mmbo aluvaangye ufoo.
46007016	A kwamannya kwi, yewe nka, kwakooya kushekiraa mmi wafo? Ao kwamannya-kwi, yewe nndumi, kwakooya kushekiraa nka wafo?
46007017	Lyo shaasa Nndumi aavye wo nndu, shaasa Iruva avaangye wo nndu, nakae indo. Niindo shikeemuvavasya siriny toose.
46007018	A ndesa kwiifo nndu alevaangwa ammaa irinwa? Nalesheva sheelyi nalakee nrini. A nndu ungyi alevaangwa nalakee nrini? Naasany nalarinwa-fo.
46007019	Irinwa nshi kindo-fo, na ira irinwa nshi kindo-fo. Kindo kisha ni iringa mavavaso a Iruva.
46007020	Wo nndu nakae ngata ilya sheni ekai llya alevaangwa.
46007021	A kulevaangwa kwikee ishinga? Naasa kulasue-fo. Lyo kwakooya kushiidimaa yuuka-fo, nkisha, tana indo.
46007022	Mashika yeto alevaangwa ni Nndumi ekee ishinga, mmbo akee lleke wa Nndumi. Ni indo-da yeto alevaangwa ekee lleke, mmbo akee ishinga lya Kristo.
46007023	Mmbo mukewoore na uuru. Mulasheeva mashinga a vandu-fo.
46007024	Vanavama, wo nndu nakee mbee ya Iruva na ngata ilya alevaangwa nayo.
46007025	Kya vana va kyika nshitiri ivavaso lyuuka kwa Nndumi-fo. Lyo a shuute makusaro akwa, yeny shikee nsarye ni Nndumi iva wa toki.
46007026	Naasany, shilollye ekyi nkisha, kyeendwa ni ngatara tiiyo, sheelyi nkisha nndu nakae shaasa akai.
46007027	A kukee mfinge kwa nka? Kularuuye yaauwa-fo. Kukee mwaauwe? Kularuuye nka-fo.
46007028	Lyo kwakooya koora, nkwalerenga-fo. Nta mwana wa kyeny koorwa nnyalerenga-fo. Lyo vandu va ngata yeyo vatiri ngatara mwiliny; neeny mmbo shikunndye ivaaua efyo.
46007029	Lyo shaamba indi vanavama fyeeri fiiyo nshi fyaasha-fo. Naasany kipookya ulaalu valya varye vaka vave sheelyi valarye vaka.
46007030	Na valya vaiyaa sheelyi valakeiya. Na yewo veefura sheelyi valakeefura. Na valya vakeeyuura sheelyi valatiri kindo.
46007031	Na valya vakeerunda na ulana yelu vave sheelyi valakeerunda nalo nnu. Shamashika findo fya ulana yelu mmbo fishiraa.
46007032	Kyaindi mmbo shikunndye mulawonise waataro. Yeto nalarye nka mmbo akuvinisaa na mbony ta Nndumi shaasa akooyaa insenya.
46007033	Indi yeto arye nka mmbo akwaataraa na findo fya ulana, shaasa ashesenyaa nka wakwe.
46007034	Na lyingyi kwiiyo kilakaniso ekyi kwa nka na mwana wa kyeny. Yeto nalakee moore mmbo akuvinisaa na mbony ta Nndumi, nave nsongovisi mwiili na nrima. Kyaindi yeto akee moore mmbo akwaataraa na findo fya ulana elu, shaasa ashesennyaa mmi wakwe.
46007035	Mmbo shaamba indo shimuviiye mbusha; nshi shimuviiye nsoori-fo, nkimaruma kya filya fisennyi, naambo mwidimi ifurukannya Nndumi mulashoomuwaa mfindo fingyi.
46007036	Lyo kwakooya nndu moose alollye nnyaketannya mwana wakwe wa kyika kisumani, nawe kwakooya ammaa itima naasa ekyo akunndye itana natani. Nnyatana ulyamari-fo; nanniinge mumu noorwa.
46007037	Kyaindi yeto asalalyi nisha na ukaari lwa nrima wakwe, nnyashitikywaa-fo, nawe akeeidima ishillya lango yakwe, nawe mmbo akunndye nriminy wakwe iringa mwana wakwe wa kika, atana nisha.
46007038	Ni indo-da, naakwa ni yeto aorisa mwana wakwe wa kyika atana nisha, neeto nalamoorisaa mmbo atanaa nisha mmwasi.
46007039	Nka mmbo akee mfinge elyi mmi wakwe aiyo na muu. Lyo kwankooya mmi amminutwa, mmbo akee lleke noorwa ni nndu moose yeto ankundaa, kwi Nndumi, naasa.
46007040	Lyo nkyeni mwasi nakae shaasa akai. Nshaasa yeny shilollye; neeny shilollye sheelyi naakwa ni yeny shitiri Mumuyo wa Iruva.
46008001	Yese loose lwiishi mbony ta findo fikee finiingye kiraso kwa maruva a mafwanu, Imanya mmbo lyendee ikushopa, kyaindi ukundi lo lukarosa.
46008002	Nndu kankusara mmbo eeshi, eto nnyeeshi nta kindo shaasa kinsumanyi imanya-fo.
46008003	Lyo kwakooya nndu akunda Iruva, nawe mmbo ammanyaa.
46008004	Naasany kya mbony teelya findo fikee fyuute kiraso kwa mafwanu, lwiishi lukamanya ifwanu nshi kindo kya dede yaa ulaniny-fo, na kingyi sheelyi nkwiifo Iruva kuuta umwi nsi-fo.
46008005	Mashika lla elyi kwiifo avaangwa maruva, kulya iruveeu ao yaa ulaniny, shasany-da kuveefo maruva meengyi na vandumi veengyi,
46008006	kweru yese Iruva ni umwi nsi, we Nde, yeto findo fyoose fimmyi kwakwe, neese nkwakwe lukutiri na muu. Eefo na Nndumi umwi Yesu Kristo, nawe kwakwe findo fyoose mmbo filekaa-fo, neese-da ni yefo kakwe luukye.
46008007	Kyaindi lyo imanya yelyi llyikee kwa vandu woose-fo, lyo vengyi kimaruma kya iishivya mafwanu yoo fika ulaalu mmbo valyee kindo kileutwa kiraso kwa ifwanu, na kyeendwa ni elyi kikusiryo kyawo kilaiyo vakatefuswa mfyo.
46008008	Lyo shoonga nshiyo ilurwaa kwa Iruva-fo, mashika naakwa lwara lulalya llushaanguywaa nkindo-fo, ao lukalya nshi elyi lwammengeryo-u kindo-fo.
46008009	Indi loleny uleke lwany lulashewonisya nsindara valya vakee vafwafwa.
46008010	Shamashika le, yewe kutiri urango nndu kakulollya kwilyaa shoonga mmba ya maruva ao mafwanu, nrima wa nndu yeto akee mfwafwa wa iirikyo, a ndesa nawe nnyalollyaa nkisha ilya findo fikee fyuute kiraso kwa mafwanu?
46008011	Na nndu yeto mfwafwa mmbo alyamarwa kimaruma kya urango lwafo, nawe ate ni nndu Kristo alevefwa kimaruma kyakwe.
46008012	Kikeeny indo, kwakooya mwalyamarya vanavamaye vany na ivavisa mirima yaawo ikee mifwafwa, indo ni Kristo muni mwantannya ulyamari.
46008013	Kimmba niindo, kwakooya shoonga ishengyee mwanama nsindara, naakwa yava nyama nshiilyaa-fo na kukafika indii, naambo tupu shilasheviiya mwanama nsindara.
46009001	A ndesa yeny shikee lleke-se? Shivekee nrumi se? A yeny shilelollya Yesu Nndumi weeru se? A yeni nshi mashora akwa kwi irina lya Nndumi se?
46009002	Mashika kwakooya kwa vengyi shilakee nrumi, lyo kwany yeni shikee nrumi, mashika nyeni mukee kiringisyo kya usu lwakwa efo kwa Nndumi.
46009003	Ekyo nkyo kirouwo kyakwa kwa valya valeshivesa.
46009004	A mmbo lulatiri wiidimi lwa ilya na ina?
46009005	A mmbo lulatiri wiidimi lwa ipoo nka airikye Nndumi shaasa na varumi yewo vengyi valetana, wo vanavamaye va Nndumi, na Kefa-da?
46009006	Aa niinda! Ni yeny shimuni na Barnaba lulatiri wiidimi lwa ira irunda.
46009007	Ni nsikari ungau kyeeri kyoose alemmenda fireny kwa urundi lwakwe we muni? Ni vi yeto avaayaa misabibu nare nalalya ndunda ta vayo? Ao ni vi ashiisaa ironda lyakwe lya findo, nare nalana malela a vayo?
46009008	A mmbo sharera efyo kivandu? A uvavaso nalo nshi efyo fyeni lwarera?
46009009	Shamashika efo uvavasony lwa Mose kikee kireiye kyeyaamba. Kulasheefinga ng'umbe kana kyeeri ikeesa nganu. A ndesa yoo Iruva mmbo akeelola mbony ta ng'umbe sheni?
46009010	A nshi dede ni mbony teru arera? Yee, mmbo tikee shireiye kimaruma kyeru. Shamashika yeto akeerema fimu mmbo akee irema evikye nsia, neeto asaa mmbo avikye nsia wa iwonisau waavi lwakwe.
46009011	Kwakooya yese lulemuvaaya mbeu ta nriminy, a nkindo kilavaa kwakooya lwailula-u findo fya mwiiliny?
46009012	Na kwakooya vengyi vakeewarya-u wiidimi elu yoo kwany yeni, a yese nshi mmwasi, kyaindi yese llulewarya wiidimi elo-fo. Indi mmbo lwasisirya fyoose naambo lulafofise Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo.
46009013	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi valya varundaa mmba ya Iruva mmbo valyee findo fya vayo, na valya varundyaa yoo kitareny kyerasya mmbo vawonisa-u waavi lwawo?
46009014	Na Nndumi nawe ni indo avavasye, valya veamba Nrumi ya Nsia vawonise imutu lyawo lyuuka efo Nruminy ya Nsia.
46009015	Lyo yeny nshiletana indo-fo. Nta nshikeereiya indo naambo kive indo kwakwa-fo. Mashika ni kyeni yeny shifwe ngota elyi nndu moose afofisaa nnduma wakwa.
46009016	Mashika lla elyi shikeyaamba Nrumi ya Nsia, nshitiri kyeekurumisha-fo, mashika shikeembikye ivavaso, neeny oshiny lwakwa shanra shilaamba Nrumi ya Nsia!
46009017	Mashika shiwonisaa ikiiyo kwakooya sharunda ishora elyi na nrima, lyo shanra shilarunda na nrima, lyo shikee nrambikye ungari.
46009018	Kyasiany, ikiiyo lyakwa llyo lyingalyi? Llyo elyi, kyeeri shikeamba Nrumi ya Nsia na nrima moose.
46009019	Mashika, lla elyi shileva lleke kwa vandu woose, mmbo shileva ishinga kwa woose, naambo shiwonise vandu veengyi mmwasi.
46009020	Kwa Vayuda mmbo shileva sha Myuda, naambo shiwonise Vayuda. Na kwa valya vekee si ya mavavaso, shava sheelyi shikee si ya mavavaso (Lla elyi yeny shimuni shilakee si ya mavavaso), naambo shiwonise valya vakee si ya mavavaso.
46009021	Kwa valya valatiri uvavaso shava neeny sheelyi shilatiri uvavaso (nshi sheelyi shilatiri uvavaso mbee ya Iruva-fo, kyaindi mbee ya Kristo shitiri uvavaso), naambo tupu shiwonise yewo valatiri uvavaso.
46009022	Shaveva sha mfwafwa kwa yewo vakee vafwafwa, naambo tupu shiwonise vafwafwa. Mmbo shileva ngata toose kwa vandu woose, naambo na shia yeto toose shikooye ikira vandu.
46009023	Neeny mmbo shatana findo fyoose kimaruma kya Nrumi ya Nsia naambo shiyaavye na vengyi.
46009024	A mmbo mulaishi sheelyi valya vavakyanaa irisha, woose mmbo varisha kyaindi mwiwarya uvingyi ni umwi nsi? Naasa risheny indo-da naambo muwonise.
46009025	Na wo nndu mwivakyana efo fitavanuny mmbo akwiima findo fyoose. Yewo mmbo vatanaa indo naambo vawarye ureto yelo lulyamarikaa. Lyo, lyo yese mmbo luwaryaa ureto lulalyamarikaa.
46009026	Neeny mmbo shiifo shirishaa indo, nshi sha mwikapa ing'ana-fo, mmbo shikeekapana ng'unde, nshi sha nndu akapaa uraato-fo.
46009027	Mmbo shikeesisya mwiili wakwa na iuvinisa naambo kilasheeva elyi shammaa yoongoya vengyi mbony, ate yeny shimuni nsheva nndu wa ilemika.
46010001	Shamashika le vanavama vakwa, yeny nshikundye mure mulamanya sheelyi vande valya veru mmbo valeira woose kwasi ya ifishi, woose vakaira kulya yeeveny,
46010002	woose vakabatiswa naambo vave va Mose kulya ifishiny, na yeeveny ilya.
46010003	Woose vakalya shoonga ilya sheni ya nrima.
46010004	Woose vakana kyeena kilya kyeni kya nrima, mashika mmbo valeniya yoo iweny elyo lyikavakaniswa na Kristo.
46010005	Kyaindi veengyi vawo Iruva nnyalesennywa mmbo-fo, nkyo vakamamityo kulya kasa.
46010006	Naasa mbony yeto tikava nta fyaaso kweru, naambo yese lulasheeva vandu velanga maravi, shaasa na valya valelanga.
46010007	Nta mulave veindya maruva a wongo, shaasa vengyi vawo valetana; shaasa kikee kireiye. Vandu ewo mmbo valekaa rembo naambo valye neena, numa vakakwiipoo vafini mbasa.
46010008	Nta lulatani fya utuusi, shaasa vengyi valevetana, vakafwa vandu fiku makumi avii na varaanu nkonu umwi.
46010009	Nta lulaese Nndumi shaasa valya vengyi valetana vakalyamarwa ni shoka.
46010010	Nta mulakunung'uni, shaasa valya valekunung'una vakaretwa ni nreti ulya.
46010011	Naasa findo efyo mmbo filevakooya wo fikee fyaaso fikareiyo fyelwikimba yese va fyeeri efi.
46010012	Kimmba niindo yeto akulollye sheelyi mmbo aselelyi nalole nalasheewa.
46010013	Nkwiifo kyeeso kilemusheya yeni kuuta ekyo kiinani na nndu wa vandu-fo. Kyaindi Iruva ni nsha, nalaraa mweeswa kiilanyi wiidimi lwany, na lyingyi ando amwi na kyeeso ekyo kavika-u na mwaango weesomuka-u, naambo mwiidimi isisirya.
46010014	Kimaruma kya efyo, vakunde vakwa, kwiiseny iindya maruva a wongo.
46010015	Mmbo shikeerera na vandu vatiri urango nkyekusareny nisha eki nkemuvia.
46010016	A upata lulya lwa mbora luvikyaa mbora, nshi utarannyo lwa mwiili umwi, mashika yese loose mmbo lwawarya kipereshu kya nkate yeto umwi.
46010017	Mashika nkate ni umwi neese lukee vengyi ni mwiili umwi, mashika yese loose mmbo lwawarya kipereshu kya nkate yeto umwi.
46010018	Kummbweny Vaisraeli yewo shaasa vekai kya mwiili, valya velyaa firaso, mmbo valatiri ukulungo na kitara kyerasya?
46010019	A shaambany ki? Shaambany sheelyi kilya kileutwa firaso kwa mafwanu nkindo kya dede? Ao ifwanu nalyo nkindo?
46010020	Nta kinnywa-fo mashika findo filya vafyuuta sha firaso mmbo vafiniingya varumu, nta nshi vaniingya Iruva-fo. Neeny nshikundye yeni mwaakaniswa a varumu-fo.
46010021	Mmushidimaa iniiya upateny lwa Nndumi musande na iniiya upateny lwa varumu-fo. Nta mmushidimaa ilyiiya yoo meseny a Nndumi muvenda ilyiiya meseny a varumu-fo.
46010022	Mmbo lweengye Nndumi kififi ndesa? A mmbo lutiri finya ngota we?
46010023	Findo fyoose mfisha, lyo nshi fyoose fivaa-fo. Findo fyoose mfisha, llyo nshi fyoose fivangisaa-fo.
46010024	Kulave nndu aruuya mbusha yakwe muni-fo, naruuye mbele ya vengi.
46010025	Wo kindo kyakumbwa singireny kulyiiyeny mulavesa-vesaa mwitirwa nnyinyira.
46010026	Shamashika ulana loose mmasaa a Nndumi amwi na fyoose fiishwe-fo.
46010027	Naakwa nndu nalakusirye-u amwaambya kwakwe, neeni mukalanga ikaa kwakwe, kulyiiyeny wo kindo kisheendwaa mbee yaany, mulavesa-vesa nta itirwa nnyinyira.
46010028	Lyo kwakooya nndu amuvia kindo eki mmbo kileutwa kiraso mulakilye-fo, nkimaruma kya yeto aleniingya na nyinyira iveu.
46010029	Mmbo shaamba nnyinyira, nshi yafo yewe-fo, ni ya yeto ungyi. Mashika nkiki-lyo elyi uleke lwakwa lushillywa nnyinyira ya nndu ungyi?
46010030	Kwakooya yeny shawarya filya shaavyo shiitiri kyaanu kwa Iruva, mmbo kivaa inda shaararwa neeny shammaa yaana?
46010031	Naasany, mukalya, ao mukana, ao mukatana kindo kyoose, taniny fyoose mwing'anisaa Iruva.
46010032	Loleny mulasheteva Vayuda ao Vagriki nta siri ya Iruva,
46010033	shaasa yeny nkesennya vandu woose findony fyoose, shilasiaa mbusha yakwa shimuni, kuuta mbusha ya yewo veengyi naambo vakooye ikirwa.
46011001	Shilatyeny yeny shaasa na yeny shikeelatya Kristo.
46011002	Naasany nkemwitikisa, mashika elyi mukeshikummbwa kya findo fyoose, neeni mukatira mikaaye ilya ya mbee shaasa shilemuningya.
46011003	Kyaindi shikundye mumanyi sheelyi nrwe wa wo nndumi ni Kristo, na nrwe wa nka ni mmi wakwe, na nrwe wa Kristo ni Iruva.
46011004	Wo nndu nndumi kyeeri akeetereva, ao eereryaa vandu, kwakooya asikye nrwe, mmbo akeesuta nrwe wakwe.
46011005	Kyaindi nndu nka we eeterevaa, ao eereryaa vandu, kara nalasikya nrwe wakwe, mmbo akusuta we muni, mashika mmbo avaa sha ulya akee nkure nrwe.
46011006	Mashika nka nalasikyaa nrwe nkuti nautwa fii. Ao kwankooya nsony yuutwa nrwe, naasany, asikye,
46011007	Mashika lyo nkisumani nndumi nasikywe nrwe-fo, we ni kyaaso na itumbe lya Iruva. Kyaindi nka we ni itumbe lya nndu nndumi.
46011008	Mashika nndumi nnyaleuka kwa nka-fo, ni nka aleuka kwa nndumi.
46011009	Nta nndumi nnyaleumbwa kimaruma kya nka-fo, ni nka kimaruma kya nndumi.
46011010	Kikeeny indo nkuti nka noore ngata ya ishillyo ooka nrweny kimaruma kya vasu.
46011011	Nta nka nshi kindo kulaiyo nndumi-fo, nta nndumi nshi kindo kulaiyo nka-fo, kimaruma kya Nndumi.
46011012	Shamashika kwakooya nka aleutwa kwa nndumi, na nndumi nawe mmbo eerwaa ni nka. Na findo fyoose kimayeny kya vayo nkwa Iruva. Rummbweny yeni muveni efo miriminy yaany.
46011013	A kivaany nka natereve Iruva nalasikye nrwe?
46011014	A myuumbye yeyo myeni yoorye-se sheelyi nndumi katira fii shaasha ni usutu kwakwe?
46011015	Kyaindi nka we katira fii shaasha ni itumbe kwakwe. Mashika mmbo akee nninge fii yeto nakusikye nato ando a soori.
46011016	Lyo nndu moose kakunda yeende uriingyi, yese llutiri mikaaye ya ngata yeyo-fo, nta siri ta Iruva ntitiri-fo.
46011017	Lyo kyeeri nkeemuvia indi nshikemurumisha-fo, mashika elyi mukesanga amwi nshi kya mbusha-fo, nkya ukasha.
46011018	Mashika mmbo shiitye kyeeri mwakwanannya efo mmba ya Iruva mmbo muraukani, neeny nta nshilemaa-fo.
46011019	Mashika lyo kwany nkuti kukae-fo urere, naambo valya vesha vamanyike paa kwany.
46011020	Naasa kyeeri mukekwaanannya nkivaa mulye shoonga ya Nndumi-fo.
46011021	Mashika wo umwi mmbo arangya iwarya, yeu mmbo atirwa nshaa neeto ungyi mmbo annangwa.
46011022	A mmbo mulatiri mmba tany teelyiya na teeniya? A mmbo mukeemina mmba ya Iruva, na isaveesa yewo valatiri kindo? Shamuviany, shamurumisha? Oode, kya efyo nshimurumishaa-fo.
46011023	Mashika yeny filya shilewarya kwa Nndumi mfyo shilemoora, kyeyaamba, Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo kio kilya aleriingyo mmbo aleipoo nkate,
46011024	nawe ekimaa yaana Iruva kaufisha-fisha, kaamba, “Eu nto mwiili wakwa ukee kimaruma kyany, veny vetana indi kya ishikumbwa.”
46011025	Naaindo vekimaa ilya kaipoo upata (lwa ina) kaamba, “Upata elu ni mma shiiya ya samu yakwa, taniny indi wo kyeeri mwiina, kive kya ishikumbwa.”
46011026	Mashika wo kyeeri mulyaa neeniya upata elo mmbo mukeevambisa ufu lwa Nndumi kutani elyi ashewuyaa-se.
46011027	Naasany nndu yeto ashelyaa nkate yeto ao iniiya upata elo lwa Nndumi kilasumani mmbo ankuwonisya nsindara kya mwiili wa Nndumi na samu yakwe.
46011028	Naasa nndu nakusununde we muni, llyo nalyeny nkate neeniya upata elo.
46011029	Mashika yeto alya na ina, mmbo alya na ina kya uvingo lwakwe muni, elyi ara nalaitumuso kya mwiili yeto.
46011030	Kimmba niindo efo kwany veefo veengyi valoe na vafwafwa, na vengyi valellala.
46011031	Kyaindi kukooye lukumannyaa luveni shaasa lukai, llweshutyoo uvingo-fo.
46011032	Lyo lwishutyoo uvingo ni Nndumi akeelukapa, naambo numa lulasheutyo uvingo ando amwi na ulana.
46011033	Naasany vanavama vakwa, kyeeri mukekwaanannya vereny vengyi.
46011034	Kwakooya nndu atirwa nshaa, nalye mbele kyeny; naambo mulashekwaanannya kive kya uvingo. Efyo fyasaa-fo nshesongosiaa elyi nshaa kwany.
46012001	Nyira vanavama vakwa, nshikundye mure mulamannya kya simbo yeto ta Mumuyo-fo.
46012002	Mmbo muveishi muveni llya mwekee vandu va masanga, shaasa muleva veraawa efo kwa mafwanu yoo nalashidimaa irera.
46012003	Nkyo shamuviany, nkwiifo nndu ashidimaa irera ekaywa ni Mumuyo wa Iruva naambe, Yesu ni nndenge, nta nndu nnyashiidimaa yaamba, Yesu ni Nndumi, kuloore akaywa ni Mumuyo Mweele-fo.
46012004	Naasany simbo titiri kilasha; kyaindi Mumuyo ni we muni.
46012005	Lyingyi ifurukana lyitiri kilasha, na Nndumi lyo ni yeto muni.
46012006	Kukavekaa-fo na kilasha kya mirundye mashora, kyaindi Iruva niwe yeto muni arunda mashora nnang'ani ya woose.
46012007	Lyo wo umwi mmbo akee nninge urambuyo lwa Mumuyo kya yeekyana.
46012008	Mashika kyeendwa Mmumuyo nndu umwi mmbo aniingwa irero lya waarya, na ungyi ni irero lya urango shaasa Mumuyo yeto akukundya muni.
46012009	Ungyi kasimbwa kikusiryo ni Mumuyo yeto mweni; na simbo yeeshisa aniingwa ni Mumuyo yeto mweni.
46012010	Na ungyi ni mashora a ngyende; na ungyi ni yaawuya fisuku, na ungyi ni yaavanisa mimuyo, ungyi kasimbwa ngata ta fishomu; na ungyi ni itambashwa fishomu.
46012011	Kyaindi mashora yaa moose ni Mumuyo yeto umwi nsi, eshaviaa o nndu umwi umwi shaasa akukundya.
46012012	Shamashika kimwi na shaasa mwiili ukee umwi ukavetira filungo fiingyi, na filungo fyavayo fikaveva fiingyi, ni mwiili umwi lyo, niindo na Kristo akai.
46012013	Mashika yese loose mmbo lulebatisyo Mumuyo umwi lukava mwiili umwi, kwakooya lukee Vayuda ao Vagriki, kwakooya lukee mashinga ao valeke; yese loose mmbo luleritwa Mumuyo yeto umwi.
46012014	Shamashika mwiili nshi ilungo lyimwi-fo, mmengyi.
46012015	Kwakooya urende lwaamba, kimmba shilakee woko yeny nshi wa mwiili-fo, a mmbo luraa luleva lwa mwiili na kimaruma ekyo?
46012016	Na kuri kaambe, kimmba shilakee iriso, yeny nshi wa mwiili-fo, mmbo kuri karaa kaleva ka mwiili kimmba kya ekyo?
46012017	Kukooye mwiili moose wevaa iriso, mmbo lweshitaa inda? Ao kukooye moose wevaa kuri, mmbo lweefwamyaa inda?
46012018	Nkyo kimaruma Iruva evika-fo fyuungo fyoose wo kimwi mwiiliny shaasa alekunda.
46012019	Mashika lyo kukooye fyoose fyekee kyuungo kimwi nsi, mwiili mmbo wevaa inda?
46012020	Lyo ulaalu fyuungo mfiingyi na mwiili ukava umwi.
46012021	Nkyo iriso llyishidimaa ivia woko, nshikutinnyo yewe-fo, nta nrwe mmbushidimaa ivia marende, nshimutinnyo yeni-fo.
46012022	Na mmwasiny deny fyuungo filya fya mwiili filya filollyo mfifwafwa mmwasi mfyo fitiri mashora kilanya.
46012023	Na fyuungo filya filatiri nnu nnduma, fyo mmbo lwafininga wiindi mmwasi, na filya fikee sheelyi mfitiri usha, mfyo fitiri usha deny lukairya.
46012024	Mashika fyuungo fyeru filya fitiri usha mfitiri nnu mashora-fo, kyaindi Iruva mmbo alungye mwiili ando amwi, kyuungo kilya kikee kyaanguye kakiniinga wiindi mmwasi;
46012025	naambo kulakae-fo urauko mwiiliny, naambo fyuungo fyeekyani wo kimwi na urooye.
46012026	Kyuungo kimwi kwakooya kyavavio, na fingyi fyoose mmbo fivavioo nakyo. Na kilya kyarumishwa, efyo fingyi fyoose mmbo fifuraa ando amwi nakyo.
46012027	Naasany yeni mmbo mukee mwiili wa Kristo, na filungo wo kimwi ando a vayo.
46012028	Na Iruva mmbo avikye varundi kunu siriny, va mbee ni varumi, vakavii ni veawuya fisuku, va kararu ni veelosha, vengyi ni ngyende, vengyi ni simbo teeshiisa vandu, vengyi va yeekyana, na uteteri na ngata ta fishomu.
46012029	A woose ni varumi? Woose mbeawuya fisuku? Woose ni veelosha?
46012030	Woose mberera fishomu fyeny? Woose mmbetambashwa fishomu?
46012031	Langeny nnu simbo yeto shisongoru. Naakwa niindo mmbo shamoora shia shisha.
46013001	Na kwakooya sharera na fishomu fya vandu na fya varumi va iruveeu, shanra shilatira ukundi mmbo shava sha ipengele lyishoonaa.
