46013002	Lyingyi shawona yaawuya fisuku, neemanya fyoose na urango loose, na shitire kikusiryo kivangyi kutani shaidima isamisa mafumbu, shilatiri ukundi efyo nshikindo kwakwafo.
46013003	Lyingyi shuute mwiili wakwa ukorwa na muro, shilatiri ukundi, nkyashuukyau kindo-fo.
46013004	Ikunda mmbo lyisisirya, lyikalyillya; ukundi llutiri ukasha-fo; nta llutiraa kififi-fo llukurosaa-fo;
46013005	lluturaa wiindi-fo; lluruyaa findo fyavayo weni-fo, nta lluvavioo-fo, llwekenaa makasha-fo,
46013006	mmbo lwiirikyaa fyoose, mmbo luvikaa nsia kya fyoose,
46013007	mmbo lusisiryaa fyoose.
46013008	Ukundi llwangwa-u kindo nta kyeeri kimwi-fo. Yaawuya fisuku lyikaa lyimande, na fishomu fishemandaa, na ngyurango tishevaa ruu.
46013009	Shamashika mmbo lwamanya na kyeeso, na yaawuya fisuku na kyeeso-da.
46013010	Lyo kyeeri ekyo kimaye, kilya kya kyeeso mmbo kishevaa ruu.
46013011	Kyeeri shekee mwana ndu mmbo shereraa sha mwana nndu, shawemannya sha mwana ndu, shevekusaraa sha mwana ndu, kipookya yoo shileva ndu nniini, mmbo shanra mbony ta kimwana.
46013012	Mashika kyeeri eki kya ulalu mmbo lulollye sha kiyoony kikava sha kyaaso. Kyeeri ekyo mmbo lushelollya kisangu na kisangu. Kyeeri eki kya ulaalu mmbo shamanya kyenga, kyeeri ekyo mmbo nshemanyaa deny shaasa neeny shiishiwa nnu.
46013013	Naasany ulaalu mmbo kwasaa-u kikusiryo, ivika nsia, ukundi, efi firaru. Na nnang'ani ya efyo kiilanyi fyoose ni ukundi.
46014001	Soreny ukundi na ilanga nnu simbo ta Mumuyo, lyo kisha mmwasi tereveny mwidimi itambashwa mbony.
46014002	Mashika yeto mwirera na kishomu kyeny, nshi arera na vandu-fo, mmbo arera na Iruva nyelyi kulaifo nndu amanya, lyo mmbo arera findo fya kyama efo nriminy wakwe muni.
46014003	Kyaindi yeto arera eeloshaa, mmbo arera na vandu findo fyeveekya, neevaviirya muu, neevakaarisa.
46014004	Yeto arera na kishomu kyeny mmbo akukaarisa we muni. Kyaindi yeto akee itambashwa mmbo akeekaarisa siri.
46014005	Neeny lyo shikundye yeni moose murere na fishomu fyeny, lyo mmwasi mmbo shikundye mutambashwe. Mashika yeto alosha mmbo ailannyi yeto arera na kishomu kyeny, kuuta lyo kwakooya atambashwa, naambo siri ikooye ikaariswa.
46014006	Lyo ulaalu vanavama, kwakooya shasha kwany neerera na kishomu kyeny, mmbusha-kyi kwany, kuuta elyi sharera neeni na irammbwa, ao na shia ya urango, ao ilosha, ao na shia ya ufundo?
46014007	Naakwa ni findo filatiri muu kyeeri fyuutaa unyanga, sha kivale ao kingi, lyo fyava filoota unyanga lwaalashikye, mmbo kimanyikyaa kwi nkiimbo kya ngata-ki kikee ikapwa nkivale ao ekyo kingi?
46014008	Mashika iranda lyikakapwa lyikauta unyanga lulaishiwa mmbi akudeesyaa kya fira?
46014009	Neeni ni kiwo. Ulumi lwany lukanra luloota kindo kimanyikye, irero lyikeererwa mmbo lyimanyikaa inda? Kilasheeva mmbo mukeererya efo uraatony kweni.
46014010	Lyo dede kwiifo ngyunyanga shiingyi ulaniny, na nkwiifo lumwi lulamanyikye-fo.
46014011	Naasa shanra shilamanya urango lwa unyanga elo mmbo shivaa sha nrung'ani kwa yeto akeerera, nawe yeto mwirera naveva nrung'ani kwakwa.
46014012	Naakiwo neeni, mashika elyi mulangye nnu iwona simbo ta Mumuyo, langeny nnu deny itiwonisa naambo muvangise siri.
46014013	Kimmba niindo yeto mwirera na kishomu kyeny natereve naidimi itambashwa.
46014014	Mashika shatereva na kishomu kyeny, nrima mmbo watereva, lyo urango lwakwa llutiri ndunda-fo.
46014015	A mmbo kyavany inda? Mmbo shitereva na mumuyo, shivetereva na urango-da, mmbo nshiimbaa na ngata ya mumuyo lyo shiveimba na urango-da.
46014016	Mashika kwatereva Iruva efo nriminy, yeto aiyo kava sha itondo mmbo ashidimaa inda yaamba Amen, kyeeri kumaa itereva, elyi nalaishi ekyo kwaamba?
46014017	Mashika lyo n-dede yewe mmbo kwatereva nisha, lyo yeto ungyi nyavikyo mbora-fo.
46014018	Mmbo shaana nnu Iruva mashika yeny mmbo shiishi fishomu shamwilannya yeni moose.
46014019	Lyo kunu siriny mmbo shikunndye irera marero araanu nsi a urango, shiloshe nang'u vengyi, ngota elyi shereraa marero fiku ikumi.
46014020	Vanavama, mulasheva sha vana vadu, lyo efo uraviny veny sha fikoku deny, lyo efo mirweny yaany veny vandu vaniini.
46014021	Mmbo kikee kireiye efo uvavasony, mmbo shireraa na vandu yeva na kishomu kya vandu vengyi, na kana ka vandu veny, lyo nta mmbashitaa-fo. Niindo Nndumi aamba.
46014022	Naasany, fishomu efi ni ngyende, nshi kwa yewo veerikye-fo, lyo kwa yewo valairikye. Lyo ilosha nshi kwa yewo valairikye-fo lyo nkwa yewo vairikye.
46014023	Kyasiany, kwakooya siri shoose mmbo ikusanyirye ando amwi, na woose varere na fishomu fyeny, na yoo kweni vaangeu vandu valaishi kyeni na valakee vakristo, mulla ndesa mmbashambaa mmbo mutirwa ni ukwale?
46014024	Lyo woose vakarera kyeelosha, numa naange-u nndu nalakee nkristo ao nalaishi kyeni, mmbo amanyisywa mmboose na asongosywaa mmboose.
46014025	Filya akusarye efo nriminy mmbo fimanyikaa paa, nawe mmbo ashidimaa isanga neeni iindya Iruva, nafirye ndi deny, na iirikya sheelyi Iruva akee neeni kulaifo nyinyira.
46014026	Kyasiany vanavama, mwalollya inda, Kyeeri mwakwanannya, yeto umwi atiri kiimbo neeto ungyi ufundo, ungyi kindo kyerambuya, ungyi ni kishomu na ungyi ni itambashwa fishomu. Findo fyoose fitanyike kikee kya ivangisa siri.
46014027	Kwakooya nndu ashereraa na kishomu kyeny, lyo varere vavii ao vararu nsi, valailanyi-fo, na lyingyi kwa makamba, na umwi waany natambashwe.
46014028	Kyaindi kwankooya kulaiyo nndu mwitambashwa naasa namalallye efo mmba ya Iruva narere na nrima wakwe muni na Iruva.
46014029	Vakisuku nawo-da varere vavii ao vararu na umwi natambashwe.
46014030	Kwakooya umwi wa valya vakee rembo arambuyo kindo ulya wa mbee namalallye mbele.
46014031	Mashika yeni mmbo mushidimaa irera umwi umwi nsi, naambo vengyi vakooye ikuloshau, na woose vaviiryo muu.
46014032	Na mimuyo ya vakisuku mmbo iirikye vakisuku.
46014033	Shamashika Iruva nshi Iruva wa fulu-fulu-fo, mmbo akee wa ufoo; indo shaasa kikee siriny toose ta vandu va Iruva.
46014034	Vaka wo vamalallye efo mmba ya Iruva, mashika elyi valatiri mumu weerera. Vaindye shaasa uvavaso lwaambaye kyawo.
46014035	Nawo vakankunda imanya kindo kyoose vavese womi vawo waarya efo kyeny kwawo. Mashika nsony nndu nka irera efo mmba ya Iruva.
46014036	A ndesa kirero kya Iruva nkwany kyuukye? Ao mmbo kilemusheya yeni muveni?
46014037	Nndu kakulollya mmbo akee nkisuku ao wa ngata ya mumuyo, navemenya efi shamuvia yaa, sheelyi ni Nndumi afivavasya.
46014038	Lyo yeto akunda iva nrung'ani nave nrung'ani.
46014039	Kimaruma kya efyo, vanavama, langeny nnu ilosha, lyo nta mulaimi kya irera na fishomu-fo.
46014040	Lyo findo fyoose fitanyike kwiiyo umamiri na waarya.
46015001	Naasany vanavama mmbo shikundye imuvia mbony ta Nrumi ya Nsia ilya shilemwoongoya. Nnyo yeyo muleiwarya na mfo muselelyi.
46015002	Mmbo mukeekirwa kyeendwa nnyo; kwankooya muletira nisha marero alya shilemoongoya, na kwankooya kulaore mulekusiryau ruu.
46015003	Mashika yeny llya kiipooka mmbo shilemufitya filya yeny shimuni shilewarya, kyeyaamba Kristo mmbo alefwa kimaruma kya ulyamari lweru, kikwaani na mbony shireiye.
46015004	Na lyingyi karikwa; na lyingyi sheelyi mmbo aleruka nkonu wa kararu kikwaani na mbony shireiye.
46015005	Na sheelyi mmbo alekoora na Kefa na valya ikumi na vavii.
46015006	Numa kakoora na vakristo mmwasi ya mayana araanu vekee ando amwi, nnang'ani yaawo vaiyo fika inu na maata valellala.
46015007	Numa kakoora na Yakobo; numa na vakiloshony woose.
46015008	Na numa ya vandu woose, kakoora neeny, shikee sha nndu alewonika kyeeri kilakee kyakwe.
46015009	Mmashika elyi yeny shikee n-du shanyiyya vakiloshyony woose, shilesumani nta ivaangwa nrumi, mashika llya shilesaveesa siri ya Iruva.
46015010	Lyo kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva mmbo shikee shaasa shikai inu; na isarya lyakwe yelyo lyileshisheya llyileva ruu-fo, mashika elyi shilekutakura nnu irunda shavailannya woose. Lyo nta nshi yeny-fo, kyaindi ni isarya lya Iruva lyishikaaye.
46015011	Naasany kwakooya ni yeny ao valya, niindo lukeevambisa irero. Na niindo mulekusirya-u.
46015012	Naasa kwakooya Kristo akeevambiswa sheelyi aleruka auka kwa vafu, a niindaany elyi maata va efo kwany vashambaa nkwiifo iruka lya vafu?
46015013	Lyo kwankooya kulaifo iruka lya vafu na Kristo nawe nnyalerukaa-fo.
46015014	Na lyingyi kwankooya Kristo kuloore aleruka naasa, ivambisa lyeru ni ruu na kikusiryo kyeru nruu.
46015015	Yee, neese mmbo lufwanani na vakureeki va Iruva va wongo, mashika mmbo lulekureekya Iruva wongo sheelyi mmbo aleruta Kristo, nawe nnyalenduta-fo, kwankooya vafu valarutwaa.
46015016	Mashika kwankooya vafu valarutwaa, na Kristo nawe nnyalerukafo.
46015017	Na kwankooya kuloore Kristo aleruka, kikusryo kyany nruu, mmbo muvesindye efo ulyamariny fika ulaalu.
46015018	Na yewo valellala vekusirye Kristo mmbo valereka.
46015019	Mashika kwakooya mmbo lwakusirya Kristo yaa ulaniny kweni naasa, yese mmbo lukee vakiva lukairya vandu woose.
46015020	Kyaindi ulaalu Kristo annduka auka kwa vafu, kava wa mbee wa valya valemfwa.
46015021	Mashika shaasa ufu luleendwa ni nndu, niindo-da na iruka lya vafu mmbo lyileendwa ni nndu.
46015022	Mashika kwakooya woose mmbo vakeefwa kyeendwa ni Adamu, niindo-da woose vakooya muu kyeendwa ni Kristo.
46015023	Lyo wo umwi ando akwe. Mwiivirya muu ni Kristo; numa valya vakee va Kristo elyi ashaa.
46015024	Yoo nng'u mafurummyony, kyeeri Iruva Nde ashenrambikyaa umangyi lwakwe, kyeeri asheallwaa ngyumangyi toose na ushilyi loose luve ruu.
46015025	Mashika nkuti nashillye fyoose, natani avika vakiduva vakwe woose yoo si ya marende akwe.
46015026	Nkiduva wa ifurummya imamitwaa ni ufu.
46015027	Mashika, mmbo alevika findo fyoose yoo si ya marende akwe. Kyaindi kyeeri asheambaa, fyoose fyammaa yaarwa si, yeto, alemmbikya fyoose yoo si lyo nnyakiyo-fo.
46015028	Naasa, findo fyoose fikammaa ivikwa yoo si yakwe, llyony na Mwana muni ashevaa si ya yeto alenrammbikya findo fyoose, naambo Iruva nave mmbwe fyoose nnang'ani ya fyoose.
46015029	A ndesa yewo vabatise kimaruma kya vafu mmbo vashetanaa inda? Kwakooya vafu valarutwaa tusu, kyamaa kyi ibatiswa kimaruma kyawo?
46015030	Neese nkyikyi elyi lukee nrengeny kyeeri kyoose.
46015031	Yee, vanavama, nnduma yeu wakwa kimaruma kyany kwi Kristo Yesu, Nndumi weeru, mmbo nkeefwa wo nkonu.
46015032	Kwankooya shikee na mwiili mmbo shilekapana na mafisi a vandu kulya Efeso, mmbusha-kyi shiwonisaa-u? Vafu vakanra valarutwaa, naasa lulyeny neena, mashika ndesi mmbo lweenda ifwa.
46015033	Mulalembike, usaare ukasha mmbo lulyamaraa ngaa shisha.
46015034	Rundeny na urango shaasa kisumani, mulatanaa ulyamari, mashika vengyi mmbeshi Iruva-fo. Mmbo sharera indo naambo shimusute.
46015035	Kulakooye nndu avesaa, A niinda vafu varutwaa? Na mmbo varukaa na mwiili wa ngata-kyi?
46015036	Ewe itondo! Yekyo kwavaaya nkirukaa kulaore kyafwa mbele-fo.
46015037	Na yekyo kwavaaya, nkwavaaya kilya kisheshaa-fo mmbeu sheni, ikava ya nganu ao ingyi.
46015038	Kyaindi Iruva mmbo aitunndwa shaasa akundye muni, na wo mbeu ngata ya vayo.
46015039	Nyama toose nshi nyama imwi-fo, ingyi ni-nndu, ingyi ni ya ifisi, ingyi nnya ndeye, neengyi nnya ikunga.
46015040	Na lyingyi kwiifo fyuumbe fya iruveeu, kukavekaa-fo fyuumbe fya ulaniny, kyaindi itumbe lya fya iruveeu ni ngata ingyi deny, kweenanisa na yei ya ulana.
46015041	Kwiifo itumbe lya nkyeere na itumbe lya mwiiri, na itumbe lyingyise llya nyinyiri. Mashika kuveefo kilakaniso kya itumbe lya nyinyiri na nyinyiri.
46015042	Niindo-da na iruka lya vafu lyikai. Mmbo urikwaa mwiili na ulyamarikaa, ukarutwaa ulalyamarika-se.
46015043	Mmbo urikwaa na sony, ukarutwaa na itumbe. Mmbo urikwaa ufwafwa, ukarutwa na finya.
46015044	Mmbo urikwaa mwiili wa ngata ilya ya mbee ukarutwa ukee mwili wa ngata ya Mumuyo. Kwankooya wiifo mwiili wa ngata ya mbee naako ni wa ngata ya mumuyo mmbo wiifo-da.
46015045	Niindi kikee kireiye, Nndu wa mmbee we Adamu aleva nndu atiri muu. Adamu weefurumya ni mumuyo mwiruta.
46015046	Kyaindi mbushesongoyaa ulya wa mumuyo-fo, ni ulya wa ngata ilya ya mbee, numa ukasha ulya wa mumuyo.
46015047	Nndu wa mbee ni wa ulaniny, mmbwa uteeri. Nndu wa kavii mmbo ookye iruveeu.
46015048	Shaasa yeto wa uteeri akai niindo yewo va uteeri vakai.
46015049	Na shaasa yese luleipoo fwana ya yeto wa uteeri, niindo-da neese mmbo lusheipoo fwana ya yeto wa iruveeu.
46015050	Vanavama kindo nkeamba n ekyi, sheelyi mwiili na samu mfishidimaa iwona umangyi lwa Iruva-fo. Ao kilya kilyamarikaa nkishiidimaa iwona kilya kilalyamarikaa-fo.
46015051	Loleny-te mmbo nkunndye imuvia kyama kimwi. Llulalaa loose-fo, lyo loose mmbo lushealashikaa.
46015052	Sha lyimwi nsi, sha ikafya miso, kyeeri kya iranda lyefurummya; mashika lyo iranda lyishereraa, llyo vafu varutwa, valakilyamarikaa. Neese mmbo lushealashikaa.
46015053	Mashika nkuti yeu wa ilyamarika urae ira ulalyamarika, na yeu wa ifwa uraa ira ulafwa.
46015054	Naasany elyi yeu weelyamarika usheraa ira ulalyamarika, na yeu weefwa usheraa ira ulafwa, llyo irero llya lyikeeireiye lyisheinukyaa. Ufu lwammirwa ni uvingyi.
46015055	A ivinga lyafo yewe ufu nkwi lyikai? A ivava lyafo yewe ufu nkwi lyikai?
46015056	Ivava lya ufu ni ulyamari, na finya ya ulyamari ni uvavaso.
46015057	Lyo luniinge nnu Iruva kyaanu yeto aluniinga ivinga kyeendwa ni Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
46015058	Naasany vanavama vakwa vakunde, vangeny iirikyony, nta mulasingesinge-fo, mwengere nnu irunda ishora lya Nndumi mikonu myooose, mashika mwiishi sheelyi ngatara yaany kwi Nndumi nshi ruu-fo.
46016001	Kya mbony teesang'irya findo kimaruma kya veele, shaasa llya shilevavasya siri ta Galatia, neeni kevetaniny indo.
46016002	Wo nkonu wa mbee wa mfungare wo nndu nadeesye kindo kyakwe, kiinani na ivesyo lyakwe; naambo isanyirya lyilasheeva nkonu yeto nshaa.
46016003	Neeny kyeeri nshaa mmbo nshevarikaa na barwa yewo muvasauwaa, veepoo isarya lyany fika Yerusalemu.
46016004	Kwakooya kivaa neeny sheende.
46016005	Kyaindi nshaa kwany shammaa iira Makedonia; mashika lyo nshiraa Makedonia mbele.
46016006	Kweenda nshesindaa kwany, yee, kweenda kyeeri kyoose kya mbeo; mushirwaa koose efo nsheendaa.
46016007	Mashika nshikunndye ikwaanya neeni ulaalu-fo, nshiraa-da, mashika mmbo shivikye nsia wekaa neeni kyaangu, kwakooya Nndumi ashiidimisya.
46016008	Lyo mmbo nkaa Efeso fika Pentekoste.
46016009	Mashika kulya mmbo shileruyo mwaango nniini nsha nnu, nafo veefo veengyi vakeshikapa fira.
46016010	Kyaindi, Timoteo kansha, loleny nakae kwany nofoo, elyi akeerunda ishora lya Nndumi kimwi sheeny shimuni.
46016011	Naasa kulave nndu moose amwiila, lyo nrikeny na ufoo, naambo nashe kwakwa, mashika mmbo shimbereye amwi na vanavamaye veru.
46016012	Kyaindi kya mbony ta mwanamaye weeru Apolo, mmbo shilemwikima nnu nashe kwany ando amwi na vanavamaye veru, lyo we nnyekundye isha ulaalu-fo; lyo mmbo ashaa elyi awonisaa mwaanya.
46016013	Laleny shoovi. Salaleny shumu efo kikusiryony. Rundeny kyuumi muve vatakusu.
46016014	Findo fyany fyoose fitanyike na ikunda.
46016015	Na lyingyi vanavama shamutereva; mwiishi vandu va kyeny kwa Stefana, sheelyi wo mfimu fya mbee fya Akaya, nawo mmbo valekwaata ishoreny lya ifurukanya veele.
46016016	Vandu sha yeva veendyeny na wo nndu narunde ando amwi nawo neekuvinisa nnu.
46016017	Neeny mmbo shilefura nnu kyaisha lya Stefana na Fortunata na Akaiko; mashika yeva mmbo valeshilyilya nnu kya filya fyenshaanguya yoo kwany.
46016018	Mashika mmbo valeviirya nrima wakwa muu nnu, na mirima yaany-da. Naasa manyiny nnu vandu sha yewo.
46016019	Siri ta Asia tamwiidikira. Akila na Priska vamwiidikira nnu na irina lya Nndumi, ando amwi na siri yeyo ikee efo mmba kwawo.
46016020	Vakristo woose vamwiidikira. Kwiidikireny na kimimindo kyeele.
46016021	Ekyi nkyo kiidikiro kyakwa shakireiya na woko lwakwa shimuni.
46016022	Nndu moose yeto nalakundye Nndumi, nave n-denge. Maranatha (Nndumi weeru nkufii nashe).
46016023	Isarya lya Nndumi Yesu lyikae neeni.
46016024	Ukundi lwakwa lumukaye yeni moose mukee na Kristo Yesu.
47001001	Paulo, nrumi wa Kristo Yesu kwi isarya lya Iruva, na Timoteo mwanamaye weeru, kwa siri ya Iruva ikee Korinto ando amwi na veele woose yewo vakee urukeny loose lwa Akaya.
47001002	Isarya na ufoo elo lwauka kwa Iruva Nde weeru na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo lyimukaye.
47001003	Iruva narumishwa we Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, Nde wa isarya, Iruva wa ilyilya lyoose;
47001004	yeto aluviirya muu ngatareny teru toose, naambo neese lwiidimi iviirya muu valya vakee ngataareny toose, kya iviiryo muu yelyo lukeeviiryo muu ni Iruva.
47001005	Mashika lyo shaasa ilyiso ukiva lya Kristo lyikeengera ing'ana kweru, ni indo-da na iviiryo muu lyeru lyisheengerekaa kwi Kristo.
47001006	Lyo kwankooya yese lukee ngatareny, nkimaruma kya iviiryo muu yelyo na ukiro lwany; ao kwakooya lwaviiryo muu, ni shia ya iviirya muu lyany, elyo lyikeerunda mashora a vayo kya usisiryo lwa makiva alya neese lukeelyiswa.
47001007	Na ivika nsia lyeru kimaruma kyany mmbo lyivangi, lwiishi sheelyi shaasa yese veakana makiva yoo, ni indo mmbo mukee veakana iviiryo muu elyo.
47001008	Mashika le vanavama, llukundye mure mulamanya mbony ta makiva alya alelukooya kulya Asia, mashika mmbo lulerovyo nnu, kiilaanyi finya yeeru isiika, kutani loota pa yekaa na muu.
47001009	Ee, yese mmbo lwekee vautye uvingo lwee waawa, naambo lure lulakuvikya nsia luveni, kyaindi luvike Iruva nsia, yeto aruta vafu,
47001010	yeto alelukira efo ufuny yelo lung'ani indo, na lyingyi ashelukiraa, na mmbwe lulemmbika nsia sheelyi ashelukiraa;
47001011	neeni kwakooya mwaakana neese itereva kimaruma kya simbo ilya luningwaa nngarami ya vandu vengyi, naambo vandu veengyi vaniingye kyaanu kimaruma kyeru.
47001012	Mashika nnduma weru nto yeu, ukureekyi lwa mirima yeeru kyeendwa ni weele na waa lwa nrima luukye kwa Iruva, nshi kya waarya lwa mwiili-fo, nkwii isarya lya Iruva, mmbo lulekaa yaa ulaniny, na mmwasi kyany yeni.
47001013	Mashika nkwiifo kindo kiiya lukeemureiya kuuta filya mukeesoma-fo, ao ifiirikya, neeny mmbo shivikye nsia sheelyi mmbo musheirikya efo fika masiiyony;
47001014	na lyingyi shaasa mulelwiirikya kyenga, sheelyi yese mmbo lukee kimaruma kya ikurumisha lyany, shaasa yeni mukee kweru, kufike nkonu ulya wa Nndumi weeru Yesu.
47001015	Neeny shivikye nsia indo mmbo shekundye mbele isha kwany, naambo muwewonisa simbo ya kavii;
47001016	na iira kwany na yeenda fika Makedonia; na yuuka Makedonia newuya kwany ne erikwa nnyeni yeenda Uyuda.
47001017	Naasa, kyeeri shekundye itana indo, a mmbo shilereveka-reveka? Ao efyo shikundye itana, mmbo nkundye itana kinndu sheelyi kive indo kwakwa, yaamba yee ni yee, na oode ni oode.
47001018	Na shaasa Iruva akee wa dede, yese lukee va yaamba yee na oode-da-fo.
47001019	Shamashika Mwana wa Iruva, Kristo Yesu, yeto lulevambisa mbony takwe kwany, mmbwe yeny, Silwano na Timoteo, nnyaleva yee na oode-fo; kyaindi kwakwe we ni Yee.
47001020	Mashika fyaasa efyo fya Iruva fyoose ni yee, na kimaruma kya vayo na kwakwe fyoose ni Amen; naambo Iruva nakooye ing'aniswa kyeendwa ni yese.
47001021	Naasany yeto mwiluvangisa ando amwi neeni kyeendwa ni Kristo, na ilwamba mafura, ni Iruva.
47001022	Nawe mmbwe aleluvika wende neeluringisya mirima yeeru na Mumuyo.
47001023	Lyo mmbo shikeevanga Iruva nave nkureeki wa nrima wakwa kimmba kimaruma kyemulyillya nshilefike Korinto-fo.
47001024	Nshi lukeeshillya kikusiryo kyany-fo, mmbo lukee veekyi vaa ifura lyany; mashika mmbo musellelyi kyeendwa nkikusiryo kyany.
47002001	Kyaindi nriminy wakwa mmbo shekundye indi, shilashe kwany na ting'wa.
47002002	Mashika kwakooya shamuniinga ting'wa ni vi yeto ashiningaa ifura yeny kuuta yeto akeeningwa ting'wa nnyeny?
47002003	Neeny mmbo shemureiya irero elyo yeni, naambo elyi nshaa shilashesua na valya kishisumanyi ifura nawo, shimuvikye nsia yeni moose sheelyi ifura lyakwa yeny llyo na lyany yeni.
47002004	Mashika kunu ukiveny lwakwa na ngatareny ta nrima wakwa mmbo shilemureiya na misoru miingyi, nshi naambo mukooye isua-fo, kyaindi naambo mukoye imanya ikunda elyo lyakwa kwany shaasa lying'ani.
47002005	Kyaindi kwakooya nndu anyarika nshi ashinyarisa yeny da-fo lyo kyenga (naambo shilasherovya nndu) mmbo amunyarisa neeni moose.
47002006	Mmbo kyemaa nndu wa ngata yeyo nawoni ngapo yeyo aniingwa nnyewo vengyi;
47002007	na kilasha kya efyo, kyeni munsarye neembirya muu, naambo nndu sheeto nalashemirwa ni unyaario lwiirye kyeeso.
47002008	Nkyo mmbo shamutereva mumoore ikunda lyany.
47002009	Mashika nkyo kimaruma shilereiya naambo nkooye imanya kwany kwakooya muleva veindya kya findo fyoose.
47002010	Kwakooya mwafwaaya nndu kya kindo kyoose neeny mmbo mmufwayaa, mashika naakwa ni yeny kwakooya shafwaaya nndu kindo kyoose, mmbo shamfwaaya kimaruma kyany mbee ya Kristo.
47002011	Loleny, mmbishwa nalasheluvinga, mashika lwiishi ngata takwe.
47002012	Naasa lwikifika Troa kimaruma kya Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo, sharuywa mwaango kyeendwa ni Nndumi,
47002013	nriminy shilasenywa mashika nshilelollya mwana-ma Tito-fo, nkyo shavasama sheenda Makedonia.
47002014	Llyo Iruva naarafuma akee iluniinga ifura wo kyeeri lukee na Kristo neekaarisa nrungo eto wemmanya we ando koose kunu ishoreny lyeru.
47002015	Mashika yese mmbo lukee kifwaamu kya Kristo mbee ya Iruva, na kwa yewo vakeekirwa, na kwa yewo vakeereka;
47002016	kwa yewo vakeereka ni kyuuna kya ufu, lyo kwa valya vakekirwa nkifwaamu kishendee muu. A ni vi yeto amaaye kya findo efyo?
47002017	Shamashika yese llukee sha yewo vengyi vakekapya irero lya Iruva mbusha-fo kyaindi mmbo lukee vaa pyai miriminy sha vana vaukye kwa Iruva, niindo lwaamba lukee na Kristo.
47003001	A nyiraa mmbo lwampooka lyingyi ikurumisha luveni? A mmbo lukunndye kimwi sha vengyi barwa teemurumisha timusheye ao tuuke kwany?
47003002	Barwa yeeru nnyo yeni, ikeeshireiye miriminy yaany iishiwa na ikeesomwa ni vandu woose;
47003003	mmbo mumanyikye paa sheelyi mmbo mukee barwa ya Kristo ikeeshirumbani ni yese, ilakee shireiye na winu, kuuta Mumuyo wa Iruva akee na muu, nta nshi maboony a mawe-fo, kuuta ni maboo akee ni mirima ya vandu.
47003004	Na ivika nsia elyo lulyitiri mbee ya Iruva kyeendwa ni Kristo.
47003005	Nshi sheelyi mmbo lumaye ikusara kindo kyoose sheelyi nkyeru luveni-fo kyaindi wiidimisyo lweru mmbo luukye kwa Iruva.
47003006	Nawe mmbwe yeto akeelwiidimisya iva veekeya Nrumi ya Nsia; nshi wa mareiyo-fo, lyo mmbwa mumuyo, mashika mareiyo mmbo awaa, lyo Mumuyo to mmbo urutaa.
47003007	Naasany kwakooya urundi lwa ufu lukeeureiye neetitwa efo maweny lulesha na itumbe nta Vaisraeli valaidimi ivikya kisangu kya Mose miso, kyeendwa ni itumbe lya kisangu kyakwe, nalyo lyeekeny itumbe llya lyilyamarikaa.
47003008	A le ndesa, urundi yelo lwa mumuyo llusheilanyaa ikaa itumbeny?
47003009	Mashika kwakooya urundi lwa ngapwa lutiri itumbe, a urundi yelo lwa usumanu nshi lushetiraa itumbe mmwasi?
47003010	Mashika naakwa ni lulya lulerumishwa lwetiri itumbe indifo kyeendwa ni itumbe elyo lyiilanyi mmwasi.
47003011	Shamashika kwakooya urundi lulya lulyamarikaa lwetiri itumbe, yelo lwesinda-u mmbo lushetiraa itumbe mmwasi.
47003012	Naasany, kimmba lutiri ivereya lyifye indo, mmbo lwakaarya nnu.
47003013	Neese nshi kimwi na Mose llya alesikya kisangu kyakwe na kirami-fo, naambo Vaisraeli valalole nnu itumbe elyo lyilalyamarikaa.
47003014	Kyaindi makusaro akarovyo, mashika kufike inu, kyeeri Kyaasa Kikuu kikee isomwa kirami kilya kyeesikya kisangu mmbo kyiiyo, nkyo kyaamba mmbalesukuyo kyeamba mmbo kyautwa-u ni Kristo-fo.
47003015	Lyo fika inu, kyeeri uvavaso lwa Mose lukeesomwa, kirami kilya kyesikya kisangu mmbo kikaaye mirima yaawo.
47003016	Kyaindi kwakooya vaindukya Nndumi, kirami kilya mmbo kishutwaa-u.
47003017	Kyasiany, “Nndumi” mmbwe Mumuyo, na ando Mumuyo wa Nndumi akai, yoo nng'u na uleke lukai.
47003018	Lyo yese loose, mmbo lukeeviira-u itumbe lya Nndumi lukee na kisangu kilatiri kirami, sha nndu alolaa kiloleny, mmbo lwaalashwa luve va kyaaso ekyo kyeni, itumbe lyisorye itumbe, sha itumbe elyo lyauka kwa Nndumi, we Mumuyo.
47004001	Naasany, kimmba lutiri urundi elu, shaasa lulelyimywa isaryo, llusheelelekaa-fo.
47004002	Mashika findo efyo fya sony fya kirika mmbo lulefilema, nta llukaa na ntambo-fo, nta isasanda irero lya Iruva na wongo-fo. Mashika lukammora ekyo kikee kya dede paa, mmbo loora shaasa lukee va usumanu, mirima ya vandu iiluvikyaa ukureeki mbee ya Iruva.
47004003	Lyo kwankooya Nrumi ya Nsia yei yeeru yansurumwa, mmbo yasurumwa kwa yewo vakeereka;
47004004	yewo iruva lya ulana yelu lyilesingira makusaro awo, kimmba valairikye, na sa ya nrumi ya nsia ya Kristo yeto akee kyaaso kya Iruva ikara ilavafumya.
47004005	Mashika yese llukeekuvambisya luveni-fo, kuuta ni Kristo Yesu sheelyi ni Nndumi, neese sheelyi mmbo lukee varundi vany kimaruma kya Yesu.
47004006	Mashika kimmba Iruva aleamba, “Sa imike ireeminy” mmbwe yeto alemika kunu miriminy yeeru, naambo naluniinge sa ya urango lwemanya Iruva lwiilolaa Yesu Kristo.
47004007	Lyo mmbo lutiri umasi yelu fiiyeny fya uteeri naambo usuri yelo uniini luve lwa Iruva, lulaukye kweru.
47004008	Mmbo luringityo nngatara, lyo lulafotwa, lukatirwa nnyinyira, lyo lulaute pa.
47004009	Lukasutwa lyo llukeerewa-fo, lukafwalywa si, llyo llukeemamitwa-fo.
47004010	Wo nkonu mmbo lurye iwaawa lya Kristo kunu miiliny yeeru, na muu wa Yesu ushelolyo paa miiliny yeeru.
47004011	Mashika yese lukee na muu wo nkonu mmbo lukeerawa lundefwa kimaruma kya Yesu, naambo na muu wa Yesu ulolyo paa miiliny yei yeeru iraiye ufu.
47004012	Naasany yoo nng'u ufu lwakoora nnang'ani yeru, na muu nnang'ani yaany.
47004013	Kyaindi kimmba lutiri mumuyo ulya mweni wa kikusiryo, shaasa kikee kireiye, “Mmbo shilekusirya-u, nkyo kimaruma shilerera, yese mmbo lukusirye-u, na kyeendwa nkyo lukarera.
47004014	Lwiishi sheelyi yeto aleruta Nndumi Yesu, mmbo ashelurutaa neese ando amwi na Yesu, na ilusanda ando amwi neeni.
47004015	Shamashika findo fyoose nkimaruma kyany, naambo elyi isarya elyo lyisheengerwaa nnu kwa yewo veengyi kyaanu king'ani na Iruva nawoni iitikiswa.”
47004016	Kweekyoony llusheelelekaa-fo, na kikava unndu lweru lwa kyipoo lukeekwa. Lyo unndu lweru yelo lwa efo nnang'ani mmbo lukevikwa wiiya nkonu simu.
47004017	Mashika ngatara yeeru nshaang'u ikaveva ya kirambo kyaangu da, nayo mmbo yalweengye itumbe llya lya llung'anu lyiilannyi nnu.
47004018	Naambo lure lulalole nnu yefi filollyo ulaalu, llulle efyo filalollyo. Mashika efi filollyo ulaalu nfya kirambo-da, lyo yefyo filalollyo nfya llung'anu.
47005001	Mashika lwiishi elyi mmba yei lukee ulaalu, nnyo miili yeeru, elyi ishelyamarwaa, mmbo lutiri mmba ingyi kwa Iruva, ilakee shitani mmaako a nndu, ikee yaa llung'anu iruveeu.
47005002	Mashika kunu mmbeny yei mmbo lukee ilyilyika, lwilangaa nnu iwona kirembo ekyo kya iruveeu,
47005003	lukamaa iwona ekyo llukilolyoo lukee mbereto-fo.
47005004	Mashika yese lukee mbeny yei mmbo lukee ishilyilyika, lwiirovyoo, nshi lukunndye luutwa soori-fo, mmbo lukundye luvikwa, naambo kilya kifwaa kimirwa efo muuny.
47005005	Naasany yeto aleluvika-u kimaruma kya irero elyo yeni ni Iruva, na mbwe aleluniinga kiringisyo kya Mumuyo.
47005006	Nkyoony lukatira nrima nkaari nkonu simu, neemanya sheelyi kyeeri lukee na mwiili yeu mmbo lukee kwaasha na Nndumi.
47005007	(Mashika mmbo lwakaa na kikusiryo, nshi kwa ilola na miso-fo).
47005008	Naasa mmbo lutiri nrima nkaari neese mmbo lulollye nkyeni lure lulakaa na mwiili yeu lundekaa na Nndumi.
47005009	Na kyingi-se kwakooya lukee yaa, ao kwakooya lulaiyo mmbo lwavina insennya we.
47005010	Mashika yese loose mmbo kilukooye ishesaleeswa yoo mbee ya kitima kya mwaandu kya Kristo, naambo wo umwi naonise weesi lwakwe kya efyo aletana ekee na mwiili, shaasa aletana, kwakooya fyekee fikasha ao fisha.
47005011	Naasany lukantira weerei lwa iiryaa Nndumi mmbo lloomwa vandu neemanyika paa mbee ya Iruva. Neeny shivikye nsia mmbo lumanyikye deny efo miriminy yaany.
47005012	Shamashika llukikurumishaa luveni mbee yaany-fo, lyo mmbo lwamoora kimaruma kyeekurumisha kimaruma kyany, naambo muwoni nnduma yeto kwa yeto vekurumisha kya findo fya kyipoo, filakee fya efo nriminy.
47005013	Mashika kwakooya lukee sha vasukwa, nkimaruma kya Iruva; ao kwakooya mirwe yeeru mmisha nkimaruma kyany.
47005014	Mashika ikunda lya Kristo mmbo lyikeelwiitika, mashika mmbo lukeyuutyo uvingo, elyi umwi alefwa kimaruma kya woose, naasa woose mmbo valefwa.
47005015	Na lyingyi mmbo alefwa kimaruma kya woose, naambo yewo vakee na muu valakikae na muu kimaruma kyawo veni kyaindi ni kimaruma kya yeto alefwa karuka kimaruma kyawo.
47005016	Nkyoony, uka ulaalu yese lwiishi nta nndu umwi kikee kya mwiili-fo. Na kikava yese mmbo lulemanya Kristo lukee na mwiili yeu, kyaindi ulaalu nshi indo-fo.
47005017	Naasany nndu kankaa nnang'ani ya Kristo mmbo ammaaluka kyuumbe kiiya, mbony ta kasha mmbo tammiira, ekato tammba shiiyaa.
47005018	Kyaindi findo fyoose nkwa Iruva fyuukye, yeto alelusanda nawe kyeendwa ni Kristo, nawe mmbo aleluniinga urundi lwa usandi.
47005019	Nkyo kyaamba Iruva mmbo ekee nnang'ani ya Kristo, ekusandaa we muni na ulana, nalaveekennyi uravi lwawo, nawe kavika nnang'ani yeeru irero elyo lya usandi.
47005020	Naasany mmbo lukee varumi va Kristo, kive sheelyi Iruva mmbo akee iitika na kana keru; mmbo lwamwikima yeni kimaruma kya Kristo musandwa na Iruva.
47005021	Yeto nalaishi ulyamari mmbo aleva llyamari kimaruma kyeru, naambo yese lukooye iva usumanu lwa Iruva kyeendwa mmbwe.
47006001	Neese kimmba lukeerunda mashora ando amwi nawe lulawarye isarya lya Iruva kikee kya ruu.
47006002	(Mashika aamba, “Kyeeri ekyo kyikee kisauwe llyo shilekwiirannya. nkonu wa ukiro llyo shilekweekya;” naasany kyeeri kyikee kisauwe llyo ulaalu, na nkonu wa ukiro lyo ulaalu.)
47006003	Loleny lulasheeva nsindara wa ngata shoose, naambo usu lweru lulasheererwa ukasha.
47006004	Kyaindi lukuwonisye nnduma kya wo kindo, sha varundi va Iruva; na usisiryo wiingyi, na ngatareny, na ifiiyo, na fyuure.
47006005	Neekapwa, na ifingwa, na iriingywa, na ukiva, neelala rembo, na ikootoya.
47006006	Na iva vesha na urango, na usisiryo, na unndu usha, lukee na Mumuyo Mweele, lukee na ukundi lulatiri ukunang'ari.
47006007	Lukee na irero lya dede, lukee na finya ya Iruva, lwiitiri fisha fya usumanu fya woko usha na woko umuso.
47006008	Na lukaniingwa nnduma nkasha, kya irera kikasha neererwa kisha, sheelyi lukee valembi ate ni vandu va dede.
47006009	Sha valaishiwa, ate mmbo lwiishiwa deny; sheelyi lukewawa ate lukee na muu, sheelyi lukeyoorotwa, lyo lulawaawa.
47006010	Sha vandu vatirwa nting'wa, ate mmbo lutiri ifura mikonu myoose, lukee sha vakiva, ate ni veallwa vengyi masimba, sha valatiri kindo ate mmbo lukee veni findo fyoose.
47006011	Mmbo lulangye irera na yeni, Vakorinto, lwikee na mirima myaa.
47006012	Mmukee vasisire-fo, lyo mmbo mukee vasisire efo miriminy yaany.
47006013	Kyasiany, taeny filya mulewarya (mmbo nkeerera neeni sheelyi nreraa na vana vakwa) naambo neeni mutarambuwa mirima.
47006014	Loleny mulashefingywa kindo ando amwi na vandu valairikye kilasumani, kimmba kulaiyo wiitanu nnang'ani ya usumanu na uravi. A mmbo kwiiyo wiitanu kyi nnang'ani ya sa na ireema?
47006015	A mmbo kushiinanisa inda Kristo na uravi? A yeto akusirye-u mmbo atiri waavi-kyi ando amwi na yewo valukusirye-u?
47006016	A mmbo kwiiyo wiitanu kyi kwa mmba ya Iruva na maruva a wongo? Mashika yese mmbo lukee mmba ya Iruva muni muu, shaaasa Iruva aleamba, sheelyi, “Mmbo nkaa nnang'ani yaawo, shirwe-rwe nnang'ani yaawo, neeny nshevaa Iruva waawo nawo vave vandu vakwa.”
47006017	Naasany, Lakaniny nawo, mukee kwaasha nawo, Nndumi aamba indo, mulapaani kindo kitefusu-fo, mmbo nshevawaryaa kwakwa,
47006018	Mmbo shivaa nde waany, neeni muve vana kwakwa, va kyuumi na va kyika, niindo Nndumi muni matorito aamba.
47007001	Naasany vakunde vakwa, kimmba lutiri fyaasa yefyo, lukwiilyise luveni lulakani na kirinda kyoose kya mwiili na nrima, lwishinutyaa weele lweru lushindyaa Iruva.
47007002	Lluniingeny mwaanya miriminy yaany. Llulensoka nndu kindo-fo, nta ikasheesa nndu-fo, nta itafura nndu kindo-fo.
47007003	Nta nshi shaamba indo naambo shoore yeni mmbo mukee varekwa-fo mashika shilesongwa yaamba sheelyi yeni mmbo mukee miriminy yeeru fika ifwa ando amwi, ao ikaa ando amwi.
47007004	Mmbo shitiri ukaari uniini mbee yaany, mmbo shitirwa ni nsia deny kimaruma kyany. Mmbo shiishwe nsia, kunu ngatareny teru mmbo shitiri ifura lyiilanyi kyeeso.
47007005	Mashika llya lulemaa ifika Makedonia miili yeru nnyilesennywa-fo, mmbo luleatarika taari toose, kipoo kukakaa-fo fira, na kimmba weerei.
47007006	Kyaindi Iruva yeto mwiiviirya vafwafwa muu, mmbo aleluvirya muu kyeeri lulesheywa ni Tito.
47007007	Nta nshi elyi alesha-da-fo kyaindi ni ando amwi na iviiryo muu lyakwe efo kwany, kaluvia mbony ta nsia wany, na fiiyo fyany, na usaari lwany kimaruma kyakwa kutani shaengerywa ifura.
47007008	Shamashika, na kikava mmbo shilemuvavisa na barwa ilya nshitinnywa-fo, naakwa shasara, mmbo shilollye barwa ilya mmbo ilemuvavisa lyo kwa kirambo kyaangu da.
47007009	Lyo ulaalu shitiri ifura nshi mashika elyi mulevavywa-fo, kyaindi mmashika elyi mulevavyo kutani mwakurya. Mashika mmbo mulevavyo sha vandu va Iruva, naambo mulashetura pule na shia shoose.
47007010	Mashika ivavyo lyikee lya ngata ya Iruva mmbo lyeendee ikurya yelyo lyishendee ukiro lulaifo iting'wa, kyaindi ivaviywa lya kiulana mmbo lyeende ufu.
47007011	Mashika-le ivaviswa elyo yeni kimaruma kya Iruva mmbo kuleende usasari nnang'ani yaany, yee neekutatarye, neesua, na usau, yee neelanga, yee neekuuta, yee neetaiya kiduva! Mmbo muleora sheelyi mmbo mukee vesha na ngata shoose kya mbony yei.
47007012	Naasany na kikava shilemureiya barwa ilya, nshileireiya kyeendwa ni yeto aletana kikasha-fo, nta kya yeto aletannywa kikasha-fo, kyaindi nnaambo ikuuta lyany kimaruma kyeru lyikooye ilollywa paa mbee ya Iruva.
47007013	Nkyo mmbo luleviirywa muu. Na lyingyi elyi luleviirywa muu mmbo lulefura kiilanyi kyeeso kimaruma kya ifura lyetiri Tito, mashika nrima wakwe mmbo ulemuriswa ni yeni woose.
47007014	Mashika kwakooya shilekurumisha mbee yakwe kya kindo kyoose kimaruma kyany, nshilesuka-fo, mashika kimmba lulemuvia findo fyoose shaasa fikai, niindo-da neerumisha lyeru kimaruma kya Tito ni lya dede.
47007015	Na ikunda lyakwe kwany mmbo lyileng'ana nnu kyeeri akumbwaa wiindi lwany yeni woose, shaasa mulembwarya na usau na wiindi uniini.
47007016	Mmbo shitirwa ni nsia nnu mashika kya findo fyoose mmbo shimuvikye nsia.
47008001	Na lyingyi vanavama, mmbo lukunndye imuvia kya simbo ya Iruva ilya siri ta Makedonia tilesimbwa.
47008002	Kyeeri vekee fyeesony fya ngatara shiingyi, wiingyi lwa ifura lyawo sanda na itura lyawo mmbo filevaengerya usimba lwa ikunda yeekya vengyi.
47008003	Mashika nkeevakureekya sheelyi, kimaruma kya wiidimi lwawo na mmwasi ya wiidimi lwawo, shaasa valekunda wo veni efo nriminy, mmbo valleuta findo fyawo.
47008004	Vakalutereva nnu sanda na ilwiikima kyeendo ni simbo yei, na ilungwaa elyi lyetarama veele.
47008005	Nawo mmbo valetana indo nshi shaasa lwevikye nsia-da-fo, kyaindi mmbo valekurambikya mbele wo veni kwa Nndumi, na kweru-da, na ikunda lya Iruva.
47008006	Kutani lwavavasya Tito neenutye simbo yei kwany shaasa we muni empooka itana.
47008007	Kyaindi shaasa mutiri simbo shiingyi, kikusiryo, mirerye, urango, usasari, ukundi lwany kweru yese, ni endo indo, neeni woniseny wiingyi lwa isarya elyo-da.
47008008	Nsharera indo naambo shimwiitikye-fo, kyaindi kyeendwa ni ikuuta nnu lya vandu vengyi sheese umamiri lwa ikunda lyany.
47008009	Mashika mwammanya simbo ya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, shaasa aleva nkiva kimaruma kyany, lla elyi we ekee isimba, naambo yeni mwaluwa masimba kyiimuukye efo ukiveny lwakwe.
47008010	Kimaruma kya efyo ra shuute ikusaro lyakwa, mashika kindo ekyi nikisha kwany yeni musongoye, ni mwaaka vammira, kya ikunda neetana-da.
47008011	Lyo ulaalu inutyeny itana, naambo shaasa muleirikya itana, ulaalu mwinutye kiinani na filya mutiri.
47008012	Mashika nrima wiilangye, nndu mmbo ashiirikyoo kiinani na filya nndu atiri, nshi kya filya nalatiri-fo.
47008013	Nshi shikeyaamba indo naambo vengyi vasenyo neeni murovyo-fo;
47008014	nnaambo mbony teende nisha, kyeeri ekyi kya ulaalu vengyi vaoni mbusha kya usimba lwany, na usimba lwany, na usimba lwawo lumweekye yeni elyi musheanguyoo, naambo findo fiinani indo.
47008015	Shaasa kikee kireiye, “Yeto alesanyirya fiingyi, nnyaleilanya-fo nta yeto alesanyirya fyaangu nnyaleanguywa-fo.”
47008016	Lyo Iruva narumishwa yeto avika usasari yelo weni nriminy wa Tito kimaruma kyany.
47008017	Mashika dede lyo mmbo alewarya wiikimbi elo, eshengera ikaa na nrima, kakupoo nashe kwany akunda we muni.
47008018	Ando amwi nawe lukaruma mwanama yeto nnduma wakwe wa Nrumi ya Nsia mmbo ukwaani siriny toose.
47008019	Nta nshi indo-da-fo, lyo mmbo alesauwa ni siri naambo neende ando amwi neese eerye simbo yei lukeeirundya, naambo nrima weru umanyike, na Nndumi nauteu ing'aniswa.
47008020	Lukakuvika mbai kimaruma kya mbony yei kulave nndu alukapa mong'wa kimaruma kya simbo yei lukeeirundya.
47008021	Kyeeri lukekusara mesha, nshi mbee ya Nndumi-da-fo, na mbee ya vandu-da.
47008022	Neese ando amwi nawo mmbo luleruma mwanamaye weeru yeto lulellolya keengyi sheelyi atiri nrima, naako ni ulaalu mmbo atiri nrima kimaruma kya elyi amuvikye nsia yeni.
47008023	Naasany kwakooya nndu akunda imanya mbony ta Tito, we ni mweeki wakwa, na mwifurukana ando amwi neeny kimaruma kyany, na nndu kakunda imanya mbony ta vanavamaye veru, wo ni varumi va siri, na va itumbe lya Kristo.
47008024	Naasa oreny siri toose dede ya ikunda lyany, na kya irumisha lyeru kimaruma kyany.
47009001	Kya mbony teefurukannya veele nshitiri kimaruma kya imuvia-fo.
47009002	Mashika shiishi shaasa mutiri maako, nkyo nkeemurumisha nakyo kwa vandu va Makedonia, kyeyaamba Akaya mmbo yenkudeesya ando a mwaaka moose, na nrima wany ukaitika vengyi vawo.
47009003	Kyaindi mmbo shileruma vanavama yewo, naambo irumisha lyeru kimaruma kyany lyilave ruu kya mbony yei, mukee mwivereyaa shaasa shileamba.
47009004	Naambo elyi Vamakedonia vashaa neeny neekoya mmwalekudeesya, lulashesuka, (lulaambe nnyeni-fo), lwivikye-u nsia.
47009005	Naasa mmbo shilelollya nkuti shiitike vanavama yeva vasongwe ifika kwany, mupooke ideesya yekyo mulevikya kyaasa uka mbee, kikooye kiiyo, kive sha kiraso, nta kilasheeva kindo kyaniingywa na kififi.
47009006	Kyaindi lyo manyiny irero elyi, nndu mwivaaya fya unyuku mmbo ashuululaa fya unyuku, na ulya avaakya fya mbora mmbo ashuulula fya mbora.
47009007	Wo nndu natani shaasa anrumbwa efo nriminy wakwe nshi iswa-fo, ao sheelyi aitikywa-fo. Mashika Iruva mmbo awarya yeto aniingya na nrima nkyesi.
47009008	Na Iruva mmbo ashiidimaa imwishura simbo ta wo ngata, naambo neeni kwakooya mutiri imutu lya wo ngata mikonu simu, naambo mwengere deny itana mesha,
47009009	shaasa kikee kireiye, “Mmbo alenyanyata, kasimba vakiva, usumanu lwakwe lwakaa llung'anu.”
47009010	Na ulya mwaava mbeu kwa yeto mwivaaya, na nkate uve shoonga yakwe, mmbo ashemuniingaa mbeu teevaya neetifumbuta, nawe mmbo asheengeraa fimu fya usumanu lwany;
47009011	mwiivikwaa masimba a findo fyoose muve vandu vatiri maako, kya yeengye Iruva kyaanu kya mashora any.
47009012	Mashika urundi lwa ishora elyi nshi lukeewonisya veele imutu-da, kya filya fivaangye-fo, kyaindi mmbo fikeeva fya pule nnu kimaruma kya fyaanu efyo fyautwa kwa Iruva;
47009013	mashika elyi mukeeswa kya urundi elu, mmbo vakeerumisha Iruva kimaruma kya wiindi lwany kyeendwa ni iirikya Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo, na kimaruma kya yaavya yewo findo ando amwi na vandu vengyi.
47009014	Nawo veni, vakatereva Iruva kimaruma kyany, vakamukummbwa neefura kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva lyilefumbuka nnu nnang'ani yeeru.
47009015	Iruva naitikiswa, kimaruma kya simbo takwe, lulashidimaa nta irumisha shaasa kikwaani.
47010001	Kyasia, yeny Paulo shimuni shamutereva na ufoo na waarya lwa Kristo; yeny shikunyiisye indo shikee neeni, kyaindi shilaiyo mmbo shitiri ukaari uniini;
47010002	yee, mmbo shikundye kwakooya shiiyo, shilave na ukaari kwa yewo valulollye sheelyi yese mmbo lukeesora findo fya mwiili.
47010003	Mashika na kikava lukee na mwiili, lyo fira yeeru nshi ya mwiili-fo.
47010004	Shamashika fisha fya fira yeeru nshi fya mwiili-fo, mmbo fitiri wiidimi lwa Iruva kutani fyaidima iwundwa turuve.
47010005	Lukavika makusaro si na wo kindo kikurosye, kikurosaa uwe ya urango lwa Iruva; neese lukammiidima iwara wo ikusaro naambo lyiindye Kristo.
47010006	Neese lukankunda isisya maravi moose, wiindi lwany lushaawukyaa.
47010007	Loleny efyo fikee yoo mbee ya miso any. Nndu kankuvika nsia we muni sheelyi mmbo akee nndu wa Kristo, navekusara indi we muni, sheelyi shaasa we akee wa Kristo, neese-da ni kiwo.
47010008	Mashika naakwa shakurumisha shimuni mmwasi kinnywa, kimaruma kya wiidimi shikeeniinge ni Nndumi, naambo shiidimi imuvangisa, nta nshi imutuula-fo, naakwa ni indo nshikuryaa-fo.
47010009	Kilasheeva sheelyi mmbo shikundye imumatwa na barwa takwa.
47010010	Mashika mmbo mukee yaamba, barwa takwe nshiroo, nshikaari, llyo eiyo we muni ni mfwafwa, na marero akwe nshi kindo-fo.
47010011	Nndu sha yeto nakusare indi, shaasa lulollywa efo barweny lulaiyoo, niindo da luvekai efo mitanyiny yeeru kyeeri lwiiyo.
47010012	Mashika llukaryaa isanga ando amwi neewo vekurosa wo veni-fo, nta ikwiinanisa nawo-fo, kyaindi wo veni vakankulolalola shaasa vakai, neekwiinanisa wo veni na veni, naasa mmbo vakooya mmbatiri urango-fo.
47010013	Lyo yese llukurumishaa kiilanyi mwiina weru-fo lukeveesye ni Iruva-fo, nkyo kyeeso kyeefika kwany.
47010014	Mashika nta llushidimaa ikurosa luveni ngota elyi lukai-fo, kive sheelyi lulafye sheeni-fo, mashika lulesongwa ifikaa kwany na Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo.
47010015	Nta llukurumishaa kiilanyi mwiina weru-fo, yee, efo ngatareny ta vandu vengyi, kyaindi lwivikye nsia sheelyi elyi kikusiryo kyany king'anaa, mmbo lung'aniswaa efo kwany shaasa kilusumanyi, na yeengerya-u;
47010016	kutani lushaambaa Nrumi ya Nsia fika ngyurukeny yeto tiirye efo kwany, lulasheekurumisha na kyeeso kya nndu ungyi kya findo filya fisongosie.
47010017	Lyo mwikurumisha nakurumishe ekee na Nndumi.
47010018	Mashika lyo nndu mwiriikyo nshi yeto akurumisha-fo, kuuta ni yeto arumishwa ni Nndumi muni.
47011001	Kyevaa kisha kukooye mweshisisiryaa kinnywa kya utondo lwakwa! Yee-te mushisisirye.
47011002	Mashika mmbo shimulollye kififi, kififi kisha; kimmba shilemuruiya mmi umwi naambo shiwonisye Kristo mwalyi nsha.
47011003	Kyaindi mmbo sheereiye, shaasa shoka ilya ilelemba Eva na ntambo, mulasheilyamarika makusaro any, mure umamiri na usha lwany kwa Kristo.
47011004	Mashika yeto avambisaa Yesu ungyi kuuta yeto lulemuvia mbony takwe, ao mukawarya mumuyo ungyi kuuta yeto muleuwarya, ao Nrumi ingyi ya Nsia mmbo mwatana nisha isisiryana nawe!
47011005	Mashika shikusara nshaanguywa ni kindo kyoose ngota ekyo varumi yewo vaniini vatiri-fo.
47011006	Mashika na kikava yeny ni nndu nalaishi irera, nshi ngata yakwa ya urango-fo, lyo kya wo kindo mmbo mulwiishi.
47011007	A mmbo shiletana ulyamari elyi shilekunyiisa naambo yeni mung'aniswa, mashika elyi shileamba Nrumi ya Nsia ruu?
47011008	Mmbo shilesoka siri tingyi masaa awo naambo shiwonise imutu lyakwa shiidimi imurundya yeni.
47011009	Na llya shekee neeni na yaanguywa mfindo nshilerovya nta nndu-fo. Mashika vanavama yewo valeuka Makedonia mmbo valeshiniinga filya fyeshitinnyi, shakwiima nnu kya findo fyoose shilasherovya nndu nta kinnywa; na mmbo nshengeraa ikwiisa.
47011010	Shaasa dede ilya ya Kristo ikee nnang'ani yakwa, nkwiifo nndu ashidimaa ishifindikira kana shire shilarumana kulya Akaya-fo.
47011011	Nkyiki? Ndesa mmashika shilamukundye yeni? Ni Iruva eeshi.
47011012	Lyo mmbo ntanaa ekyo nkeetana, naambo shiwaani neewo vakeeruya mwaanya naambo vauture, naambo kya irero elyo vakeekurosa nalyo valollywa mmbo vakee kimwi neese-da.
47011013	Mashika vandu sha yewo mmbo vakee varumi va wongo, varundaa na ntambo, vakakuvakanisa na varumi va Kristo.
47011014	Nta nshi kindo kyeny-fo. Mashika naakwa ni mmbishwa mmbo akwaalashaa naambo nave sha nsu wa Iruva.
47011015	Naasany nta nshi kindo kiniini kwakooya na varundi vakwe vakwaalasha vave sha varundi va usumanu-fo, yewo mafurumyony awo vashevaa kimwi na mashora yoo awo.
47011016	Mmbo sharera lyingyi, nndu naleshekusara yeny mmbo shikee nrung'ani kyaindi naakwa mwashikusarya indo, shiwaryeny sha nrung'ani waany, naambo neeny shiidimi irumana-u kinnywa.
47011017	Ekyi nkeamba nshi ivavaso lya Nndumi-fo lyo kikee sha urung'ani, kunu ukaariny elu lwa ikurumisha.
47011018	Mashika veengyi vakee na mwiili mmbo vakeekurumisha, neny-da mmbo shikurumishaa.
47011019	Yeni kimmba mutiri urango, mmbo mukeesisiryana na vandu varung'ani na ifura.
47011020	Mashika mmbo mwasisiryana na ndu naakwa amuvika ushingeny, naakwa amumira, kamutira mfungwa kakurosa, kamukapa kisangu.
47011021	Mmbo sharera indo kyeekunyiisa sheelyi mmbo lukee vafwafwa. Lyo kwakooya nndu atiri ukaari lwa kindo kyoose, (mmbo sharera kitondo), naakwa ni yeny shitiri ukaari.
47011022	A wo ni Vaebrania? Na yeny da. A wo ni Vaisraeli? Na yeny da. A wo ni ngyeeri ya Abrahamu? Na yeny da.
47011023	A wo ni vefurukannya Kristo? (A shirere sha nsukwa), yeny ni mmwasi; efo ngatareny shavairya deny, na ifingwa shailannya deny, neekapwa shailanya kyeeso; nrengeny ya ufu keengyi.
47011024	Kwa Vayuda ni karaanu shilekapwa ngapo makumi aana utau imwi.
47011025	Kararu shakapwa na kilemu; shakapwa na mawe lyimwi; ni kararu ngalava ileshilyamarikya, kukaila kukakya lwikee mureny nnang'ani.
47011026	Shikee fyaarony keengyi nrengeny ta muro, nrenga ta vasoki, nrenga kwa vandu vakwa, nrenga kwa vandu vengyi, nrenga ta kasa koomu, nrenga ta yeeveny, nrenga kimaruma kya vanavama va wongo.
47011027	Shikee ngatareny na waatarony, na ilala shoovi keengyi, ngatara ya shaa na nyura, na ikootoya keengyi, na iwonisa mbeo na ikaa mbereto,
47011028	Kwara-fo efyo fya kipoo, fiifo fingyi fishisheyaa wo nkonu, ni isalalya siri toose.
47011029	Ni vi yeto akee mfwafwa neeny shire shilava mfwafwa? Ni vi yeto alemwengye nsindara neeny shire shilaswa?
47011030	Kwakooya kyava kuti shikurumishe, mmbo shikurumishaa kya filya fya ufwafwa lwakwa.
47011031	Iruva, we Nnde wa Nndumi Yesu, muni nnduma fika llung'anu, mmbo eeshi sheelyi nshaamba wongo-fo.
47011032	Kulya Dameski nshilyi umwi wa mangyi Areta mmbo ekeeringa muri wa Vadameski, naambo nashireiye.
47011033	Neeny shoolotwa kikapuny sheetwa idirisheny shoolotwa-fo llyo shaturushuka maakony akwe.
47012001	Kyishikooye shikurumishe, indi elyi kilasenyi, Kyaindi nshefikyaa fyama fya Nndumi fikee fisurumi.
47012002	Mmbo shiishi nndu umwi kwi Kristo, uka myaaka ikumi na iina, (kwakooya ekee na mwiili nshiishi-fo ao kwakooya nalekee na mwiili nshiishi-fo, ni Iruva amanyaa). Nndu yeto mmbo etafurwa-u tafuru kakooya ngina ya kararu.
47012003	Neeny shiishi nndu yeto, (kwakooya ekee na mwiili nshiishi-fo, kwakooya nalekee na mwiili nshishi-fo; ni Iruva amanyaa).
47012004	Mmbo etafurwa-u tafuru kafitwa iruveeu, keeta marero alavaa yaamba, marero alava nndu wa vandu aarere.
47012005	Kimaruma kya nndu yeto nsherumanaa, lyo nshi kimaruma kyakwa-fo kuuta lyo kimaruma kya ufwafwa lwakwa.
47012006	Mashika kukooye shekundaa irumana nshevaa nrung'ani-fo, mashika mmbo nshambaa dede. Llyo mmbo nshakwiima, naambo kulave nndu asheekennya mmwasi ya efyo alollye ao iita kwakwa.
47012007	Naambo shilarumani mmwasi, kimaruma kyesukuywa efyo, mmbo shilevikwa mwiinga mwiiliny wakwa, nrumi wa Satana naambo nashikape, naambo shilasheerumana mmwasi.
47012008	Kimaruma kya kindo ekyo mmbo shilefuuya Nndumi kararu sele naambo kishuuke.
47012009	Lyo we kashivia, “Isarya lyakwa lyikufye.” Mashika wiidimi lwakwa mmbo lwalyimba yoo kukee kufwafwa. Nasaany mmbo shirumana kimaruma kya ufwafwa lwakwa shikee na ifura iniini, naambo wiidimi lwa Kristo lushikaye.
47012010	Kimmba niindo mmbo shisennyo ni ufwafwa, na iilwa, na ifiiywa, na fyuure, na ngatara, kimaruma kya Kristo. Mashika alya shikee mfwafwa ng'u shitiri finya.
47012011	Nnyeni mwashiitikya shive nrung'ani. Mashika mmbo shesumani shirumishwa ni yeni, mashika nshike n-du shanyiiya varumi yewo vaniini woose nta kinnywa-fo, naakwa shava sheelyi shilakee kindo.
47012012	Ni kindo kya dede ngyende ta nrumi tiletanyinkya kwany na usisiryo deny, kya ngyende na findo filandelollyo lyingyi.
47012013	Mashika nkyokyi kilemwanguya ngota siri tingyi, kulare ni elyi shilera shilamuroovya? Shifwaayeny kya uravi elu.
47012014	Llen-te, elyi llya kararu shikudeesya isha kwany, nta nshimurovyaa-fo. Mashika nshikeeruuya findo fisha-fo, nnyeni nkeemuruuya, mashika nshi ishora lya vana ivikya vamiku vawo kiraambo-fo, lyo vamiku vavikyaa vana.
47012015	Shikee na ifura deny mmbo nshenyanyataa, na yeny sheerwa efo na efo kimaruma kyany. A ndesa shaasa nkeengera imukunda nnu, yeny mmbo nkeyaangwa ikundwa?
47012016	Kikuviiyeny indo, yeny nshilemurovya-fo; elyi shileva na urango mmbo shilemuwonisa na ntambo.
47012017	A ndesa nndu moose yeto shilenruma kwany alewarya kindo kwany na finya?
47012018	Mmbo shileikimba Tito, sharuma mwanama ulya ando amwi nawe. A Tito alemusoka kindo ndesa? A lluleteterwa ni Mumuyo yeto mweni-da lwiilatyaa ngyayo tilya sheni?
47012019	Yeni fika ulaalu mmbo mukusarye mmbo lukeekuuta usutu. Mmbo lukerera mbee ya Iruva lwikee na Kristo. Na yefyo fyoose, vakunde ni kimaruma kyemuvangisa yeni.
47012020	Mashika mmbo sheereiye, shilasheesha shimukooye mukee ngata ingyi ngota yeyo shikusarye, na yeny nshelollywa ngata ingyi ngota yeyo mukundye iilollya; shilashekooya-fo uriingyi, kififi, kisuuya, na myaandu.
47012021	Na yeny elyi nsheshaa lyingyi, Iruva wakwa nalasheshiviira si mbee yaany, nshetinnywa valya varengye uka elyo, vakara valakurya uravi lwawo, na utuusi, na ukasha yelo valelutana.
47013001	Elyi lya kararu nkeesha kwany. Kya kana ka vakureekyi vavii ao vararu wo irero lyishemanyikaa paa.
47013002	Mmbo shilesongwa imuvia; na shaasa llya shekee kwany lya kavii, ni indo naakwa ni ulaalu shilaiyo, valya valetana ulyamari uka elyo mbee mmbo shavavia paa, na yewo vengyi woose, sheelyi, elyi nshaa nkwiifo kyesarya-fo.
47013003	Mashika mmbo mukeeruuya ngata ya Kristo yeyo ishikaaye nalakee mfwafwa kwany, avetiri wiidimi nnang'ani yaany.
47013004	Mashika we mmbo alekapywa nsalabeny akee na ufwafwa, kyaindi ulaalu mmbo akee na muu akee na finya ya Iruva. Neese kiwo mmbo lukee vafwafwa efo kwakwe, lyo mmbo lushekaa na muu nawe lukee na wiidimi lwa Iruva lukee kwany.
47013005	Kweeseny muveni mulole kwakooya muselelyi iirikyony, kuvangiseny muveni. Ao ndesa mmbo mulakwiishi sheelyi Kristo akee nnang'ani yaany? Kulakooye llyo mulellemika.
47013006	Shivikye nsia lyo mwiishi sheelyi llulemikye-fo.
47013007	Neese mmbo lukeetereva Iruva naambo mulatani nta kindo kiravi, nshi naambo lulolywa mmbo lwiirikyo-fo lyo naambo yeni mukooye itana ekyo kyisha, na kikava yese luvakye yewo valeminkye.
47013008	Mashika llushidimaa itana kindo kyoose kikapanaa na dede-fo. Mmbo lutanaa fyoose kimaruma kya dede.
47013009	Mmbo lufurye kyeeri lukee vafwafwa, lyo yeni mmbo mukee vakaari. Na yekyi nkyo lwatereva kiinutywa kwany.
47013010	Kikeeny indo, mmbo shareiya efi llaiyo yoo mukai, naambo kyeeri shiiyo, shire shilanyaasya kiilanyi wiidimi elo Nndumi ashiniingye, kya irosa kilakee kya isammbwa.
47013011	Na kya ifurummya, vanavama vakwa, nakwany, woniny ivanga na ivirywa muu, mukee na nrwe umwi, mukae iirikyony. Na Iruva yeto muni ukundi ashekaa ando amwi na yeni.
47013012	Kwiidikireny na kimimindo kyeele.
47013013	Veele woose vamwiidikira.
47013014	Isarya lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo, na ikunda lya Iruva, na yaakaniswa Mmumuyo Mweele lyimukaye yeni moose.
48001001	Ni yeny nrumi Paulo, (indi nshi nrumi wa vandu-fo, nta nshi alerumwa ni nndu-fo, ni Yesu Kristo na Iruva Nde yeto alennruta kooka kwa vafu).
48001002	Na vanavama yeva vakee na yeny, shamureiya yeni siri ta Galatia.
48001003	Isarya lyikae na yeni, na ufoo, lyuukye kwa Iruva Nde, na kwa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo;
48001004	yeto alekurambikya-u we muni kimaruma kya ngyulyamari teru, naambo nalukire ulaniny elu uravi lwiiyo ulaalu, shaasa Iruva Nde weeru alekunda we muni.
48001005	Nnduma ni wakwe llung'anu na llung'anu, Amen.
48001006	Mmbo shifulukywa nnu mashika elyi mwara yeto alemuvaangya isarya lya Kristo uviny indo, na iindukya nrumi ya ngata ingyi.
48001007	Nta nshi ingyi-da-fo, kyaindi kwiifo vandu vakeemwerevise vakunndye ifullwa nrumi ya nsia ya Kristo.
48001008	Lyo naakwa lwava yese ao nsu wa iruveeu kwakooya ashemoongoyaa nrumi ingyi kuuta yeyo lulemmaa imwoongoya, nave n-denge.
48001009	Shaasa lulemmaa imuvia, na ulaalu shawuiya-se yaamba, kwakooya nndu ashemoongoyaa nrumi ingyi kuuta yeyo muleiwarya, nave n-denge.
48001010	Mashika-le ndesa, ni vandu nkeevalelemba, a ni Iruva? Ao ndesa mmbo shikunndye isenya vandu? Kukooye fika ulaalu mmbo shikeesenya vandu, nta nshevaa ishinga lya Kristo-fo.
48001011	Mashika vanavama vakwa, nrumi yeyo shilemoongoya mmbo shamuvia deny, nshi ya mbuka ya kivandu-fo.
48001012	Mashika nshileyuuta kwa nndu-fo, nta nshileloshwa ni nndu-fo, ni Yesu Kristo muni aleshirambuya.
48001013	Mashika mulemmiita muveni mbony ta ngaa yakwa llya shekee na ufundo lwa Kiyuda. Mashika mmbo shesisya siri ya Iruva kikailanya kyeeso, shakunda iilyamara deny.
48001014	Neeny shatumaa efo ufundony lwa Kiyuda ngota veengyi yewo vekee va irika lyakwa na efo vanduny vakwa, shakutakura nnu itira ngyufundo ta kasha ta vande vakwa.
48001015	Kyaindi lyo Iruva yeto aleshisauwa uka shilandewonika kwa ma, kashivaangya isarya lyakwe,
48001016	shaasa kilensenya ishisunundya mbony ta mwana wakwe, naambo neeny shiidimi yoongoya vandu va masanga mbony yeto takwe, neeny nta nshilevesa mbele nta nndu-fo.
48001017	Nta nshilerwa na kulya Yerusalemu indekwaananya na yewo valeshisongoya iva varumi-fo, mmbo shileenda kulya kasa ka Vaarabu, shooka-fo shawuya na Dameski.
48001018	Numa ya vayo kwiikisia myaaka iraru, sharwa na Yerusalemu naambo shindekwaananya na Kefa, shakaa kwakwe ando a mikonu ikumi na iraanu.
48001019	Lyo nta nshilelollya-fo nrumi ungyi-fo, kuuta Yakobo muni, we mwanamaye wa Nndumi weeru.
48001020	Neefyo shikeemureiya, loleny nnu, shikee mbee ya Iruva nta nshireraa wongo-fo.
48001021	Numa ya vayo sheenda taari ta Siria na Kilikia.
48001022	Lyo siri ta Kristo ta kulya Uyuda ntileshilollya tishimanyi-fo.
48001023	Kuuta elyi valeeta-da, sheelyi yeto ekeelusaveesa elyo mbee, ulaalu mmbo akeevambisa kikusiryo ekyo llya kasha ekeekimamita.
48001024	Vakaitikisa Iruva kimaruma kyakwa.
48002001	Numa ya vayo kwiikisia myaaka ikumi na iina, sharwa lyingyi na kulya Yerusalemu shiryani na Barnaba, shaveipoo na Tito sheenda nawe.
48002002	Na yeny mmbo shileenda nafo mashika elyi Nndumi aleshoora, shavaongoya kya nrumi yeyo shikeongoya vandu va masanga, lyo lwikee luveni na yewo vatiri nnduma, kulashekooya mmbo nkeetambalya ruu, ao mmbo nkeetambalya irisha ruu.
48002003	Kyaindi Tito yeu sheriani nawe, nawe akee Ngriki, nnyaleitikywa irinwa-fo.
48002004	Lyo kimaruma kya vakristo va wongo yewo valeatwa siriny kirisi, valeatwafo kirisi naambo valumanyi shaasa lukai kunu kwa Yesu Kristo, naambo valurwaa ushingeny;
48002005	neese nta llulekunda ivaaranya-fo, naambo dede yeyo ya Nrumi ya Nsia ikooye ikaa na yeni.
48002006	Kyaindi valya vatiri nnduma; (na vakava inda kwakwa yeny nkimwi nsi, Iruva lyo nnalolaa fisangu fya vandu-fo), mmbo nkeyaamba valya vatiri nnduma vandu mbalesheengerya-u nta kindo-fo.
48002007	Kyaindi mbai na efyo, kyeeri valelollya shishoongoyaa valya valakee varini Nrumi ya Nsia, shaasa Petro ekeeyoongoya valya vakee varini;
48002008	(mashika yeto aleidimisya Petro iva nrumi wa yewo varini mmbwe yeto-da aleshiidimisya yeenda kwa vandu va masanga).
48002009	Na llya valemeemanya kya isarya elyo shilesimbwa; varumi Yakobo na Kefa na Yohane yewo vaishiwa ni ngo ta siri, mmbo valeshiwara yeny na Barnaba ng'asa ya woko usha kya wiitanu, naambo yese lweende kwa vandu valakee Vayuda nawo veende kwa Vayuda.
48002010	Nawo vakalukundya kindo kimwi nsi, lukummbwe vakiva; na yeny shakutakura nnu iinutya irero elyi.
48002011	Kyaindi kyeeri Kefa alesha Antiokia mmbo shilewakyana nawe kisangu kwa kisangu, mashika mmbo asumannyi uvingo.
48002012	Mashika kulaore vensha vauka kwa Yakobo mmbo ekeelya na vandu va masanga. Kyaindi kyeeri valesha we mmbo alekaa kwaasha nawo keereya Vayuda yewo vakee varini.
48002013	Na Vayuda yewo vengyi vakainduka ando amwi nawe, kutani na Barnaba nawe eewa ni ukunang'ari lwawo.
48002014	Kyaindi kyeeri shilelollya sheelyi ngata yeyo nnyisumani na Nrumi ya Nsia, mmbo shevia Kefa mbee yaawo woose, “Kwakooya yewe kukee Myuda kwasora mbuka ya vandu va masanga, ilakee ya Vayuda, a nkikyi elyi kukeitikya vandu va masanga isora mbuka ya Kiyuda?”
48002015	Yese lukee Vayuda tukula, lulake varekwa va masanga.
48002016	Neese lwiishi sheelyi nndu wa vandu nnyashekennywaa usumanu kyeendwa ni mashora akwe-fo, nkyeendwa ni ikusirya Kristo Yesu naasa, yese mmbo luleirikya Kristo Yesu naambo lweekennywa usumanu kimaruma kya Kristo, nta nshi kimaruma kya mashora-fo, mashika kyeendwa ni mashora a nndu kwiifo nta umwi asheekennywaa usumanu-fo.
48002017	Nkyoony kwakooya yese luveni lweekennywa usumanu elyi lwairikya Kristo lukalollywa mmbo lukee valyamari-da. A Kristo mmbo akee mwirundya ulyamari? Nta-fo!
48002018	Mashika kwakooya shawuya irosa filya shilefisammbwa, mmbo shakoora yeny shimuni sheelyi mmbo shikee nrekwa.
48002019	Mashika yeny mmbo shilefiiya uvavaso kyeendwa ni uvavaso naambo shikee na muu kwa Iruva.
48002020	Mmbo shilekapywa nsalabeny ando amwi na Kristo; lyo ulaalu shikee na muu, nta nshi yeny-se-fo, ni Kristo akee nnang'ani yakwa, na muu yeu nkee nato wa mwiili yeu, mmbo nkee nato kikusiryony kya Mwana wa Iruva, yeto alelukunda kakuuta we muni kimaruma kyakwa.
48002021	Nshiminaa isarya lya Iruva na ilyaallwa ruu-fo, mashika kwakooya usumanu mmbo luwonikaa kyuukana na mashora a nndu, naasany na Kristo mmbo alefwa ruu.
48003001	Yeni Vagalatia mulatiri urango, a mmbi alemulyamara mirwe. Yeni muleongoywa paa mbony ta Yesu Kristo sheelyi mmbo alekapywa nsalabeny?
48003002	Ni kindo kimwi nsi shikundye ikimanya kwany. A ndesa mmbo mulewarya Mumuyo kyuuka na mashora a nndu, ao nkimaruma kya iita yelyo lyileende kikusiryo?
48003003	A ni indii mulerung'ana indi? Mwammaa ipooka na Mumuyo, ulaalu mmbo mukundye ifurummya na findo fya mwiili?
48003004	A mmbo muleera fyuureny efyo fyoose kisheva kya ruu? A mmbo kishevaa kya ruu dede?
48003005	Naasany yeto mwimuniinga Mumuyo na irunda mashora maniini nnang'ani yaany mmbo atana indo kyuuka na mashora a mwiili, ao nshi kimaruma kya iita elyo lyishendee kikusiryo?
48003006	Nkimwi sha llya Abrahamu aleirikya Iruva kaeekennywa usumanu.
48003007	Kyasia manyiny sheelyi valya va kikusiryo mmbo vana va Abrahamu.
48003008	Mareiyo nang'u shaasa aambaye uka elyo sheelyi Iruva mmbo asheekenyaa vandu va masanga usumanu kivaukya efo kikusiryony, mareiyo mmbo alevia Abrahamu Nrumi ya Nsia elyo kasha, kyeyaamba, “Vandu va masanga woose mmbo vashevikywaa mbora yoo kwafo.”
48003009	Naasa yewo va kikusiryo mmbo vavikywa mbora ando amwi na Abrahamu yeto etiri kikusiryo.
48003010	Shamashika valya woose vakeetana fya uvavaso, mmbo valamywa si nkidengo, mashika nkireiye indi, “Yeto moose nalawarani na efyo fyoose fikee efo uvavasony nafiinutye mmbo akee n-denge.”
48003011	Nkyo kyaambany nkwiifo nndu asheekenywaa usumanu mbee ya Iruva kyuuka na uvavaso-fo, mashika yeto wa usumanu mmbo ashekaa na muu kimaruma kya kikusiryo.
48003012	Na uvavaso lluleendwa nkikusiryo-fo, kyaindi mwitana indo mmbo ashekaa na muu kimaruma kya vayo.
48003013	Kristo mmbo aleluwouwa luuke kidengony kya uvavaso, mashika mmbo alealuwa kidengo kimaruma kyeru, mashika nkireiye kikaambawa, “Yeto moose avanikwa nri-u mmbo akee n-denge.”
48003014	Naambo mbora ya Abrahamu ikooye ifikya vandu va masanga kwi Yesu Kristo, naambo luwarye kyaasa kya Mumuyo lwikee na kikusiryo.
48003015	Vanavama vakwa, mmbo nkeerera sha nndu wa vandu. Na kyikava ni kyaasa kya nndu, lyo kyikammaa ivangiswa nkwiifo nndu akiminaa-fo ao nta yeengerya-u kindo-fo.
48003016	Fyaasa efyo mmbo fileniingwa Abrahamu na mwana wakwe. Nkyaambawa nkwa vana sheelyi mmbo vakee veengyi-fo; kyaindi nkwa umwi, kwa mwana wafo, nawe ni Kristo.
48003017	Ekyo shiifo nshambaa nkyo ekyi, kyaasa ekyo mmbo kilevangiswa mbele ni Iruva, uvavaso yelo lulesha ando a myaaka 430 lluleidima yaalasha-u kindo-fo ao ikiuta-u-fo.
48003018	Mashika kwakooya ding'u mmbo yasha na uvavaso, nnyikivaa ya kyaasa-fo, kyaindi we Iruva mmbo alesimba Abrahamu efyo emmbikya kyaasa.
48003019	A uvavaso nkyokyiny ndesa? Mmbo luleendwa kimaruma kya ukasha lwa vandu kutani asha yeto awonikye kawarya kyaasa ekyo, kikee kyeende ni nsu wa Iruva akee nrumi nasheamba.
48003020	Na yeto akee nrumi nshi asanda kimaruma kya nndu umwi nsi-fo, lyo yeto akee umwi ni Iruva.
48003021	A ndesa uvavaso mmbo lulariani na fyaasa fya Iruva? Oode, mashika kukooye lweeningywaa uvavaso lushendee muu, naasa usumanu mmbo lwewonikaa lweendwa ni uvavaso.
48003022	Kyaindi mareiyo mmbo alesandya fyoose na ifivika finyiny ya ulyamari, naambo yewo vakusirye vaniingwa kyaasa ekyo vekutiri efo iirikyony lya Yesu Kristo.
48003023	Lyo kulaore kikusiryo ekyo kyensha mmbo lwekee si ya uvavaso, lukalamywa si kutani iirikyo elyo lyilesukuwa paa.
48003024	Kikeeny indo uvavaso mmbo luleva sha nteteri wa ilurwaa kwa Kristo, naambo lusheekennywa usumanu kyuuka na kikusiryo.
48003025	Lyo kwankooya kikusiryo kyansha, llukikee-se maakony a nteteri-fo.
48003026	Mashika yeni moose mmbo mukee vana va Iruva kyeendwa nkikusiryo kwi Yesu Kristo.
48003027	Mashika yeni moose mulebatisyo irina lya Kristo mmbo muree Kristo.
48003028	Na yoo nkwiiyo Myuda nta Ngriki-fo. Nta nndu lleke na nndu ishinga-fo. Nta nkwiiyo nndu nndumi na nndu nka-fo. Nnyelyi yeni moose mwammba ngata imwi mukee va Yesu Kristo.
48003029	Na kimmba mukee va Kristo, naasany mmbo mwammba ufyari lwa Abrahamu, na veni ding'u shaasa kyaasa kilya kyikai.
48004001	Lyo mmbo shikeerera mbony ta iva muni ding'u. Kyeeri muni ding'u akee mwana, nnyatiri kilakaniso na ishinga-fo, na kava mmbwe muni wa fyoose.
48004002	Mashika mmbo akee nrambikye vangari na vellela, kufike kyeeri ekyo kikee kideerye ni ndeye.
48004003	Kiwo neese kyeeri lwekee vana vadu, mmbo lweekee vakaye ni miishivye ilya ya mbee ya ulana elu.
48004004	Na kutani llya fyeeri fileinana, llyo Iruva alelurumya mwanaakwe akee mwiire ni nka si ya uvavaso.
48004005	Naambo needimi iwouwa yewo vakee si ya uvavaso, naambo neese lwiidimi iwarya ngata yeyo yeevikwa vana va Iruva.
48004006	Na kimmba yeni mwammba vana, Iruva mmbo aleruma Mumuyo wa Mwana wakwe miriminy yeeru yeto avangaa “Aba” nkyo kyaamba “Woi Nde.”
48004007	Kimmba ni indo yewe nkukikee-se kishinga-fo, mmbo kukee mwana, na kwankooya kukee mwana naasany, mmbo kukee muni ding'u efo kwa Iruva.
48004008	Lyo fyeeri filya fya mbee llya kulaore mwemmanya Iruva, mmbo muleva veerundya maruva alakee iruva dede.
48004009	Kyaindi elyi mwammaa imanya Iruva, na mmwasi imanyika kwa Iruva, nkyi kisheengyee muwuiyese filoshyo filya fya mbee fyekee fifwafwa, fyekee fyaanguye, neeni mukakunda iwuyafo-se ulaalu?
48004010	Mmbo mweekena mikonu, na miiri, na fyeeri na myaaka.
48004011	Shammaawukwa deny nkyany, kulakooye mmbo shikeyaatarika ruu kimaruma kyany.
48004012	Vanavama vakwa, shamutereva nnu muve sha yeny, mashika na yeny mmbo shikee sheeni. Mulenshisoka nta kindo-fo.
48004013	Lyo mwiishi llya shilepooka imoongoya Nrumi ya Nsia mmbo shekee mfwafwa mwiiliny.
48004014	Na kyeeso ekyo mulekiwonisa kimaruma kyakwa mmulekimina, nta ikilema-fo, mmbo muleshiwarya sha nsu wa Iruva, sheelyi mweewaryaa Yesu Kristo muni.
48004015	A nshidimaa inda yaamba shitiri ngoma? Mashika mmbo shamukureekya, kukooye kyevaa, mmbo mweeshillwaa miso any mushivike yeny,
48004016	A ndesa mmbo shivaa nkiduva waany elyi shamuvia kya dede?
48004017	Yewo mmbo valangye imulollya, lyo nshi veetiri kimaruma kisha-fo, lyo mmbo vakundye imuraya poo, naambo yeni mulange ivalollya.
48004018	Nalyo nkindo kisha nnu ilanga ilollyo kimaruma kikee kisha, nta nshi kyeeri shikee ando amwi neeni-da-fo.
48004019	Fivana fyakwa fidu, shikeemuiya nnu mashoya kutani Kristo amuwonikya;
48004020	a nkyema sheshiidimaa ikaa neeni ulaalu, na itundwa unyanga lwakwa! Mashika mmbo shitirwa nnyinyira deny kimaruma kyany.
48004021	Nkyeshivieny, yeni mukundye iitoryo mmavavaso, ao mmbo mulaereye mavavaso?
48004022	Mashika kikee kireiye sheelyi, Abrahamu mmbo etiri vana vavii, umwi kwa nka kishinga na ungyi kwa nka muni kyeny.
48004023	Kyaindi ulya wa nka kishinga mmbo alewonika kyikee kya mwiili-da, lyo ulya wa nka muni kyeny kawonika akee wa kyaasa kya Iruva.
48004024	Findo efi mmbo fikeererwa fikee fya kyaaso; mashika vaka yeva mmbo vavakye fyaasa fivii, kimwi kyuukye ifumbuny lya Sinai, nkyo kya Hajiri aleira vana vakee ushingeny.
48004025	Mashika Hajiri mmbo avakye ifumbu lya Sinai lyikee urukeny lwa Vaarabu, lyikavaka Yerusalemu yei ya ulaalu, mashika elyi akee ushingeny ando amwi na vana vakwe.
48004026	Kyaindi Yerusalemu ya uwe ni muni kyeny, nawe ni maye weeru yese.
48004027	Mashika kikee kireiye indi, Fura yewe nka kyuumba, kulandeire mwana, rosa unyanga, kufwe, yewe kulandetire mavina a mwana, mashika vana va nka akee muni ni veengyi, ngota va yeto akee na mmi.
48004028	Kyasiany, vanavama yese mmbo lukee vana va kyaasa sha Isaki.
48004029	Lyo shaasa ulya alewonika kyuuka na mwiili alesisya ulya wa Mumuyo, ni indo-da kivekai ulaalu.
48004030	Kyaindi mareiyo mmbo aamba inda? “Umbuta nka kishinga na mwana wakwe, mashika mwana wa kishinga nnyawonaa ding'u ando amwi na yeto wa nka muni kyeny-fo.”
48004031	Kikeeny indo vanavama vakwa, yese llukee vana va nka kishinga-fo, mmbo lukee vana va nka muni kyeny.
48005001	Kristo mmbo aleluvika valeke, kwa ekyo salaleny, nta mulasheereiywa muvikwa ushingeny-fo.
48005002	Lolen-te, yeny Paulo mmbo shamuvia, kwakooya mwarinwa Kristo nnyatiri mbusha neeni-fo.
48005003	Na lyingyi mmbo shikeevia wo nndu akee nrini, mmbo kinkooye iinutya uvavaso loose.
48005004	Mmbo mukee varauwe na Kristo yeni moose mukunndye yeekennywa usumanu ni uvavaso, mmbo muwoye mukauka efo isaryeny lya Iruva.
48005005	Mashika yese lwiikayo Mmumuyo mmbo luvereye ivika nsia elyo lya usumanu lweendwa nkikusiryo.
48005006	Mashika kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo irinwa llyisheekyaa-u kindo-fo, ao nta nndu ira nalarinwa-fo, kitiri-u mashora ni kikusiryo ekyo kikaaywa ni ikunda.
48005007	Mmbo mwekeetammballya nisha, a mmbi alemwiima mulalatye efyo fya dede?
48005008	Yaalashika elyo llyuukye kwa yeto amuvaangye yeni-fo.
48005009	Ntarang'o munnywa mmbo woomwa imbumba lyoose lya nswa.
48005010	Mmbo shimuvikye nsia nnu shikee na Nndumi, sheelyi mmushetiraa nrima wa ngata ingyi-fo. Kyaindi lyo yeto akeemusaveesa mmbo ashewona uvingo lwakwe, na kava vi.
48005011	Na yeny, lyo vanavama vakwa, kwakooya shavambisa mbony ta irinwa, a nkikyi elyi shiifo shitendwaa? Yoo nsindara wa nsalaba mmbo wammba ruu.
48005012	Kyevaa kyeni kukooye yewo vakeemwishura nyinyira veendekuvanikaa!
48005013	Mashika le nyira, vanavama, mmbo mulevaangwa naambo muve valeke, lyo uleke lwany nshi yelo lweelatya mbony ta mwiili-fo, llweetaramana kya ikunda.
48005014	Mashika uvavaso loose mmbo lwainutywa yaa irerony elyi lyimwi nsi, lyeyaamba, “Kunda nndu ungyi shaasa kukukundye kumuni.”
48005015	Lyo kwakooya mwava sha mafisi mukulye muveni, loleny mulasheekumaa.
48005016	Naasany mmbo shaamba, endeny mweendo wany mwiiteterwaa Mmumuyo, nta mulashiinutyaa lango eto ta mwiili.
48005017	Mashika to mwiili mmbo utiri lango wikapanaa na Mumuyo, na Mumuyo ukakapana na mwiili; mashika efi fivii mmbo fivikyani kiduva kutani mwalemwa imanya kyeetana.
48005018	Kyaindi kwakooya mwateterwa Mmumuyo, mmukikee-se vashillye mmavavaso-fo.
48005019	Kyasiany mashora a mwiili nng'u yaa nang'u mmbo amanyikye paa, ni fya urui, ukirinda, uravi.
48005020	Iindya maruva a wongo, usavi, ukiduva, myaandu, itira iriso, irooyo nngoo, uriingyi, iraukana, kyama kikasha.
48005021	Isuvana, unangwa, italauwa ndeu, na findo fivakye efyo. Kya findo fya ngata yeyo mmbo shasongwa imuvia, shaasa llya shilemmaa imuvia, sheelyi vandu veetana findo fya ngata yeyo mbashewonaa ding'u ya umangyi lwa Iruva-fo.
48005022	Kyaindi ndunda ta Mumuyo ni ukundi, ifura, urilalyi, usisiryo, unndu usha, ilyillya, usaari,
48005023	ufoo, mwiiyanu, na veetana efyo uvavaso llutiri kyeetana-fo.
48005024	Na yewo va Kristo Yesu mmbo valemmaa ikapya miili yaawo nsalabeny veisandye-u na makusaro awo maravi na lango yeto sheesi toose.
48005025	Kwakooya lukee na Mumuyo, lweende lwiiteterwaa Mmumuyo,
48005026	Nta lulave vekuninga nnduma luveni, lwitanaa fya kitatarwa neetiryana finying'u luveni na veni.
48006001	Vanavama wakwa, kwakooya nndu arendeya karenga, yeni mukee va ngata ya Mumuyo viireny nndu yeto mukee na nrima wa ufoo, na ikulola yeni muveni mulasheanga fyeesony.
48006002	Taraniny mario any mukooye iinutya ivavaso lya Kristo.
48006003	Mashika kwakooya nndu alollya akee ng'waana ya vengyi, nawe nalakee indo, mmbo akulemba we muni.
48006004	Kyaindi wo nndu nakulole we muni eshesaa mashora akwe, lyo ashemanyaa kwakooya kivaa nakurumishe we muni, nalyo llyo ashewonaa kimaruma kyeefura efo nriminy wakwe we muni, lyo nshi kwa vandu vengyi-fo.
48006005	Kimmba wo nndu mmbo akamaraa irio lyakwe muni.
48006006	Mwiiloshwa naakani na mwiillosha wakwe kya mesha moose.
48006007	Mulasheelembika, Iruva nnyavaa ilemba-fo, mashika wo kindo nndu ammbaaya nkyo asheilulaa.
48006008	Mashika yeto avaaya fya mwiili wakwe mmbo asheilulaa urumato kya mashora yoo; kyaindi yeto avaaya fya ngata ya Mumuyo, kiinani na Mumuyo mmbo asheilulaa-u muu wa llung'anu.
48006009	Nta lulasheyaaraa itana mesha-fo, mashika mmbo lusheilulaa elyi kyeeri kya vayo kifikaa, lukanra lulafwa nrima.
48006010	Nkyo wo kyeeri luwonaa mwaanya lutannyi vandu woose mesha, mmwasi yewo vakusirye-u.
48006011	Loleny shaasa shamureiya na fireiyo finiini na woko lwaka yeny shimuni!
48006012	Yewo valangye ikushiisa kya findo fya mwiili, mmbo yewo vakee imwiitikya irinwa, naambo valasheesuka kimaruma kya nsalaba wa Kristo, naasa da.
48006013	Shamashika naakwa ni yewo vakee varini mmbakeeinutya uvavaso-fo; lyo mmbo vakundye yeni murinwa-da, naambo vakufurye kimaruma kya vayo-da.
48006014	Lyo yeny, nshikundye ifura na kindo kingyi nta kinnywa-fo, kuuta nsalaba wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, na kimaruma kya vayo ulana loose mmbo lulekapyo nsalabeny yaa kwakwa, na yeny kimaruma kya ulana.
48006015	Mashika irinwa ao ira kularinwa nshi kindo-fo, iva kyuumbe kiiya nkyo kikundywa.
48006016	Na yewo woose vasoraa irero elyi ufoo na isarya fivakayaa, yee, kwa Israeli ya Iruva.
48006017	Kupookya ulaalu, kulakive-se nndu ashaatara-fo mashika mmbo shirye wende lwa Yesu mwiiliny wakwa.
48006018	Vanavama wakwa, isarya lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo lyikee ando amwi na mirima yaany. Amen.
49001001	Ni yeny Paulo, nrumi wa Kristo Yesu, shaasa kilesennya Iruva, shamureiya yeni veele va Efeso mukusirye na Kristo Yesu,
49001002	Isarya lyimukaye na ufoo luukye kwa Iruva Nde weeru na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
49001003	Iruva nang'aniswa, we Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, yeto aleluvikya mbora takwe ta nriminy, ulaniny elu lwa kimumuyo lukee lwa Kristo.
49001004	Shaasa alelusauwa lukee va Yesu uka llya kulaore ulana lwemmbeiywa, naambo lukooye iva veele, luveva vandu valatiri mbese mbee yakwe lukae na ikunda.
49001005	Mashika mmbo alesongwa ilusauwa, naambo luvikwa vana vakwe kwi Yesu Kristo, shaasa alekunda we muni.
49001006	Itumbe lya isarya lyakwe lyiniingwa nnduma, elyo alelulyimmya kyuuka na Mwana wakwe.
49001007	Kyeendwa mmbwe na kimaruma kya samu yakwe yese lukawonisa iwowowa lyeru, na ifwaaywa kya ulyamari kiinani na usimba lwa isarya lyakwe.
49001008	Nawe mmbo alelupusuya yefyo kya usaari na urango lwakwe.
49001009	Llya alemaa iloora kyama kya ikunda lyakwe shaasa alekunda we muni.
49001010	Kyeendwa ni Kristo kavika findo fyoose ushilyiny lungyi, yefyo fya iruveeu na fya ulaniny kiwo, ee, kyeendwa mmbwe.
49001011	Yese lukavikwa veni ding'u, mashika shaasa eekundye uka elyo mbee mmbo eelusauye, shaasa akukundya itana fyoose shaasa akundye we muni.
49001012	Neese lukee nnang'ani yakwe luve nnduma wa itumbe lyakwe, yese lulesongwa yoora ivika nsia weru efo kwa Kristo.
49001013	Na yeni ni kiwo-da kyeendwa mmbwe mmbo mulemmaa iita irero lya dede, lyo Nrumi ya Nsia ya ukiro lwany, mukammaa imwiirikya, na ivikwa wende lwa kiringisyo ni Mumuyo ulya ekee nteerye akee Mweele.
49001014	We mmbwe akee kiringisyo kya ding'u yeeru, naambo nalulyimyi ukiro efo umangyiny lwakwe luve nnduma wa itumbe lyakwe.
49001015	Kimmba ni indo na yeny, uka llya shileeta mbony ta kikusiryo kyany kwa Nndumi Yesu, na kya ikunda lyany kwa veele woose,
49001016	nshikeemanda yaana Iruva kimaruma kyany-fo, shiimukummbwaa efo fiterewony fyakwa.
49001017	Iruva Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo we Nde wa itumbe, namuniinge yeni nrima wa urango na imurambuya immanya we.
49001018	Miso any na mirima yaany yeengere imikywa nsa, naambo mumanyi ivika nsia kya uvaango lwany shaasa lukai, na usimba lwa itumbe lwa ding'u yakwe kwa veele shaasa lyikai.
49001019	Na utore lwa uniini lwa wiidimi lwakwe lukee nnang'ani yeeru yese lukusirye shaasa lukai, kiinani na urundi lwa finya yakwe.
49001020	Llo elo alelwiinutya kwa Kristo llya alennduta kauka kwa vafu, kammbika yoo woko lwakwe usha efo ulaniny yelo lwa mumuyo.
49001021	Kanrosa uwe nnu ngota ngyumangyi toose, na wiidimi na finya na ushilyi, kailanya wo irina lyivaa isenda, nta nshi yaa ulaniny-da-fo, naakwa ni yefo ulaniny elo lwiishaa.
49001022	Iruva kavika findo fyoose yoo si ya marende akwe. Kaniinga ulyimbi lweesalallya findo fyoose kimaruma kya siri.
49001023	Ikee nnyo mwiili wakwe, mmbwe yeto amaye fyoose na iinutya fyoose yoo kwakwe.
49002001	Neeni mmbo mwekee vafu kimaruma kya maravi na ngyulyamari tany.
49002002	Tilya muleva veetana mwiisoraa mikaaye ya ulana. Mwisoraa mangyi yeyo ya nginiiu-te, mmbwe mumuyo yeto akeerunda mashora a yaallwa vandu filemi.
49002003	Yewo naakwa ni yese lweekee nnang'ani yaawo elyo mbee, efo langony ta miili yeeru, llya luleinutya lango ta nrima na mwiili, ngaa teru tikava tefuluta unyafi shaasa yewo vengyi vekai.
49002004	Kyaindi we Iruva kimmba akee nnu mwiilyillya, alelukunda ikunda iniini nnu.
49002005	Kyeeri kilya yese lwekee vafu kyeendwa ni maravi, mmbo aleluruta ando amwi na Kristo, nkyo kyaamba mmbo mulekirwa kya isarya yeni.
49002006	Kaluruta ando amwi nawe-sho, kaluvika ando amwi nawe efo ulaniny llwa lwa kimumuyo lukee na Kristo Yesu.
49002007	Naambo fyeeri efi fishaa naore isarya lyakwe paa yelyo lyiilanyi kyeeso kya usha lwakwe kweru yese kwi Kristo Yesu.
49002008	Mashika mmbo mukee vakire kwi isarya kyeendwa ni kikusiryo, nakyo nkilemmya kwany yeni-fo, ni simbo ya Iruva muni.
49002009	Nta nnyileendwa mmashora mesha-fo, nta kulasheeva-fo nndu akurosa.
49002010	Mashika yese mmbo lukee mashora a maako akwe, mmbo luleumbwa kyuuka na Kristo Yesu naambo lurunde mashora mesha yoo Iruva aleludeesya uka elyo mbee naambo luarunde.
49002011	Kimmba ni indo kummbweny sheelyi yeni mwekee vandu va masanga elyo kasha, yeni mukeevaangwa mmukee varini na valya vakee varini, urini yelo lwa mwiiliny.
49002012	Kasha ekyo mmwetiri Kristo-fo, mmbo mweraukani na vandu va Iruva, mukava sha veny valakwaani na kyaasa kilya. Mmweetiri kindo muvikye nsia-fo, mmweetiri Iruva yaa ulaniny-fo.
49002013	Kyaindi ulaalu kimmba mutiri Kristo, yeni elyo mbee mwekee kwaasha ulaalu mmbo mwammendwa kufii nsamu ya Kristo.
49002014	Mashika we mbwe urilalyi lweru, yese lwekee maronda avii lukava vamwi, kasammbwa isimamba lya lyelwaavye kavii.
49002015	Na llya alemaa yuuta-u ukiduva yelo na mwiili wakwe, kafisha finya ya uvavaso na mavavasyo naambo nalunge vandu woose vave ufyari wiiya lwakwe, kavasimba urilalyi.
49002016	Kasanda woose na Iruva, kyuuka na mwiili umwi alya nsalabeny, kamaa ukiduva loose na ishora elyo lya nsalaba.
49002017	Kashemongoya yeni mbony ta urilalyi yeni mwekee kwaasha, kiwo na yewo vekee kufii.
49002018	Mashika kyeendwa mmbwe yese loose mmbo lulewona mwaanya wa iserikya Iruva Nde kwi Mumuyo yeto umwi.
49002019	Kyasiany, kimmba ni indo, mmukikee veny nta vandu vakee iira-fo, mmbo mwammba veni kyeny ando amwi na veele, vandu va kyeny kwa Iruva.
49002020	Mmbo mukee vavike yoo uvasheny lwa varumi na vakisuku na Yesu Kristo we muni ni iwe lya ndumba.
49002021	Yoo kwakwe nng'u mmba shoose yalungwa nisha kutani yava mmba sheele ya Iruva kyeendwa ni Nndumi muni.
49002022	Yoo kwakwe yeni mmbo mukee valunge ando amwi muve mmba ya Iruva ya ngata ya Mumuyo.
49003001	Nkyo kimaruma yeny Paulo shikee mfinge kimaruma kya Kristo Yesu kimaruma kyany yeni vandu va masanga.
49003002	Kwakooya mulemmiita mbony ta ungari lwa isarya lya Iruva shileningwa kimaruma kyany
49003003	sheelyi mmbo shileorwa kyama ekyo, shaasa shilesongwa imuvia kyaangu.
49003004	Naasany, elyi musomaa mmbo mushidimaa ilollya imanya lyakwa lwa kyama ekyo kya Kristo shaasa kyikai.
49003005	Nkwiifo vandu va fyeeri fingyi valeorwa kyama ekyo-fo, kive shaasa varumi va Yesu veele na vakisuku va kyeeri ekyi kwi Mumuyo,
49003006	sheelyi vandu va masanga ando amwi neese ni veni ding'u va ngata imwi nsi, va mwiili umwi, na veakana ando amwi neese kyaasa kilya kya Kristo Yesu kya Nrumi ya Nsia.
49003007	Nrumi yeyo ya Nsia shileivaangywa shiifurukannyi, kiinani na simbo ya isarya lya Iruva shilenningwa kiinani na wiidimi lwakwe.
49003008	Yeny Paulo, shinyiiye yeto akee n-du wa veele woose, mmbo shilesimbwa isarya elyi naambo shoongoye vandu va masanga mbony ta usimba lwa Kristo lulavaa yeesa.
49003009	Na imikya vandu woose naambo vamanyi mbony ta wiidimi lwa kyama ekyo, kyikee efo kwa Iruva yeto aleumba findo fyoose.
49003010	Naambo ulaalu kimaruma kya siri, waarya lwa Iruva lukee lwa ngata shiingyi lumanyike ni ngyumangyi na vaitori va ulana lwa ngata ya mumuyo,
49003011	kimaruma ekyo kya llunga'nu kyikee kideesye kyuuka na Kristo Yesu Nndumi weeru.
49003012	Kyeendwa mmbwe mmbo lutiri ukaari na wiidimi lwa iserikya kyuuka na ivika nsia kyeendwa ni inkusirya.
49003013	Naasa mmbo shamutereva mulaute pa kimaruma kya fyuure efi fyakwa fishitiri kimaruma kyany-fo, nato ni nnduma wany.
49003014	Naasany we Nde mmbo shamfirya ndi.
49003015	Yeto u-nde lwakwe lukeesendwa yaa ulaniny na efo iruveeu.
49003016	Nawe namulyimyi iwona finya neevangiswa kiinani na usimba lwa itumbe lyakwe, kyiriyani na mashora a Mumuyo wakwe alukayaa efo nnang'ani.
49003017	Kristo nakae efo miriminy yaany na kikusiryony mwiikutiri tapu uvasheny lwa ukundi.
49003018	Naambo mwiidimi na imanya ando amwi na veele woose shaasa waasha na ivari, na yeenda uwe na yeenda si,
49003019	neemanya ikunda lya Kristo shaasa lying'ani lyikailanya urango lweru shaasa lung'ani, naambo mwiidimi ivangisywa efo wiidiminy lwa Iruva.
49003020	Naasany naitikiswa yeto aidima itana findo finiini nnu ngota efyo lwatereva na ikusara, kiinani na finya yeyo yakwe irunda mashora efo nnang'ani yeeru,
49003021	yee, naitikiswa kunu siriny ando amwi na Kristo Yesu marika moose a llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
49004001	Naasany mmbo shamutereva, yeny shikee mfinge kimaruma kya Nndumi, endeny mweendo wany kiinani na uvaango lwany shaasa mulevaangywa.
49004002	Mwikunyiisye nnu na ufoo, mwitiri usisiryo, mwisheekyanaa kyuuka na ikunda.
49004003	Mwiivekutakuraa nnu iringa umwi wa Mmumuyo, lweendwa ni wiitanu lwa urilayi.
49004004	Mwiili umwi na Mumuyo umwi shaasa mulevaangywa ivika nsia lya ngata imwi lya uvaango lwany.
49004005	Na Nndumi ni umwi, kikusiryo nkimwi, na ubatiso llumwi.
49004006	Na Iruva kaveva nawe ni Nde wa woose, akee uwe ya findo fyoose na nnang'ani ya fyoose.
49004007	Lyo wo umwi weeru mmbo alesimbwa isarya kiinani na mwiina wa simbo ya Kristo.
49004008	Nkyo kikaambawa, “Llya alerwa na uwe mmbo aletira mifungwa, kalyimmya vandu simbo.”
49004009	Naasa irero elyo “Alerwa na uwe”, mmbo lyaamba kyi kulaore ni yaamba we mmbo aleoloka si kafika si deny?
49004010	Na yeto aleoloka si deny mmbwe yeto alerwa na uwe kailanya ngina toose, naambo namulemule findo fyoose.
49004011	Nawe mmbo alevika vengyi vave varumi; na vengyi ni vakisuku, na vengyi ni vatarami va siri na vengyi ni veesi na veelosha.
49004012	Katana indo naambo veele vakooye ikwaaniswa, na mashora a utarami akooye iinutywa, na mwiili wa Kristo uvangiswa.
49004013	Neese loose kyeeri lushefikyaa ukulungo lwa iirikyo lyeru neemanya nnu, Mwana wa Iruva, kutani lwavangiswa, neekooya uniini lwa usongovisi lwa Kristo;
