49004014	naambo lure lulakiva sha vakoku, lwiisingiswaa efo na efo, na iipowa ni wo uraato lwa miloshye ya vandu, na mitambo ya vandu, lwiilatyaa shia ta ulembi.
49004015	Naasa lutire dede yeyo lwikee na ukundi naambo lutumae neemfikya we kya findo fyoose, lumfikye we yeto akee nrwe, we Kristo.
49004016	Yoo kwakwe we mwiili moose mmbo ukee llunge filungo fyoose fikainiwa nisha na wo kimwi kirunde ishora lya vayo naambo mwiili wiidimi itumarisywa efo ukundiny.
49004017	Kyasiany mmbo shaamba indi, shavekureeka shikee na Nndumi, kupookya ulaalu mulashekaa sha vandu va masanga na ngaa shiravi ta mirima yaawo-fo.
49004018	Mashika yewo mmbo vavikye ireema miriminy yaawo, vakasuvaniswa na muu wa ki-Iruva, kyeendwa ni urung'ani yelo lukee nnang'ani yaawo, kimaruma kya uumu lwa mirima yaawo.
49004019	Nawo vakammaa ifwa ngashari mmbo vakwaataa findony fya uravi naambo vatani findo fya ukirinda fya wo ngata veetiri lango sheesi.
49004020	Lyo yeni, nshiindo mulekulosha kwa Kristo-fo.
49004021	Kwakooya muleita mukaloshwa mbony takwe, shaasa dede ya Yesu ikai,
49004022	kuute-u deny ngata ilya ya mbee na unndu lwa kasha yelo lulyamarikaa kyeendwa ni ilatya lango yeto tilembaa.
49004023	Mwaaluwa vaiya efo makusarony na miriminy.
49004024	Muveraa unndu wiiya lukee wuumbe lwa ki-Iruva kyikee kya usumanu na weele lwa dede.
49004025	Naasa kuuteny wongo, murere dede sheni wo nndu na ungyi, mashika yese loose mmbo luvakye filungo fya mwiili umwi nsi.
49004026	Kwakooya mwarooyo ni unyafi, lyo loleny mulashelyamara,mwi ulasheoloka neeni mwiivavyoo miriminy.
49004027	Nta mulasheniinga yeto nkumbi mwaanya.
49004028	Nndu mwiiva, nalakiive-fo; kyaindi nakutakure irunda na nrike we muni, naambo nawoni na kindo kyeniinga nndu aanguywa.
49004029	Irero iravi lya ngata shoose lyilasheuka kaniny kany-fo, lyo kuuke-fo marero mesha ashidimaa yeekya nndu akee nting'i, na valya vashitaa vakooye ivikywa mbora.
49004030	Loleny deny naambo mulashevavisa Mumuyo Mweele wa Iruva, yeto yeni mulevikwa wende mmbwe mufikye nkonu yeto wa iwowowa.
49004031	Nrima uvavaa na unyafi na irooywa nngoo na marero na firumu fyuuke kwany deny, ando amwi na uravi lwa wo ngata,
49004032	na lyingyi veny velyilyana muveni na veni, muvesaryana shaasa Iruva nawe alemusarya kyeendwa ni Kristo.
49005001	Naasany, latyeny Iruva, muve sha vana vakunde;
49005002	mukae na ukundi shaasa na Kristo alevelukunda yese, kutani akuvika-u kimaruma kyany, kava kiraso kwa Iruva, kive nrungo nsha ufwamaa.
49005003	Lyingyi utuusi lulasheesendwa nta kinnywa kwany-fo, nta uravi lwa ngata shoose-fo, nta lango sheesi, muve vandu veele;
49005004	nta findo fya sony na urung'ani na itira ngashile, mashika efyo mfisenyi-fo, lyo mukummbwe yaana Iruva.
49005005	Mashika lyo irero elyi mulyiishi nisha nnu, sheelyi nkwiifo ntuusi ao nkirinda nta mwilanga na mwiindya maruva a wongo, ashewonaa ding'u efo umanginy lwa Kristo na Iruva Nde-fo.
49005006	Kulave nndu amulemba na marero a ing'ana; mashika unyafi lwa Iruva mmbo lwasheya vana yewo va uravi.
49005007	Kyasiany, mulaakani nawo-fo.
49005008	Mashika elyo mbee mmbo mwekee ireeminy, kyaindi ulaalu mmbo mukee seny mukee na Nndumi, naasa endeny sha vana va sa.
49005009	Kimmba ndunda ta sa ni usha lwa wo ngata na usumanu na dede;
49005010	mwimanyaa na nshushwa nkyokyi kisenyi Nndumi.
49005011	Nta mulaakani ngaa shikasha titiri ndunda ta ireema-fo, kyeemminy findo fya ngata yeyo;
49005012	mashika efyo vakeetana kirika ni sony ifisenda.
49005013	Kyaindi lyo efyo fikekyeemmywa mmbo filollyo paa yoo seny, mashika ekyo kyalollyo paa mmbo kyamikywa nsa.
49005014	Nkyo kikaambawa, “Marukya yewe kukeerengeya, kuruke kuuke ufuny, naambo Kristo nakumikye.”
49005015	Kyasia loleny nnu shaasa mushendaa; nshi sha vandu valatiri urango-fo, kyaindi muve vandu vatiri urango;
49005016	muvekira fyeeri mashika fyeeri efi mfya uravi nnu.
49005017	Kimmba ni indo mulasheeva varung'ani-fo, mumanyi nkyokyi kisenyi Nndumi.
49005018	Nta mulave veenangwa mmbwari nato utiri nnu ufullwe, lyo lalakyeny iishurwa Mumuyo.
49005019	Muumburani na fiimbo fya zaburi na fiimbo fisongosye fya nriminy, mwiishimbaa na ikapya Iruva ukoru efo miriminy yaany,
49005020	muveana Iruva Nde mikonu myoose kya findo fyoose, kwi irina lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
49005021	Neeni muveni na veni mwiikunyisaa mwiireiye Kristo.
49005022	Yeni vaka, indyeny womi vany kimwi sha iindya Nndumi weeru.
49005023	Shamashika nndumi mmbo akee nrwe wa nka, shaasa na Kristo akee nrwe wa siri, nawe mmbo akee mwiikira wa mwiili.
49005024	Na shaasa siri yaindya Kristo, kiwo indo na vaka vendye womi vawo findony fyoose.
49005025	Yeni womi, kundeny vaka vany, shaasa na Kristo nawe alevekunda siri, kakuuta we muni kimaruma kya vayo.
49005026	Naambo nayiilyise neeisangya na mura uriyani na irero lyakwe;
49005027	Naambo nakuwonisye siri itiri itumbe ilatiri ivara nta mbese nta uravi sha elo; naambo ive sheele ilatiri ivara.
49005028	Naasa ni indo kisumani womi vakunde vaka vawo shaasa vakundye miili yaawo veni. Nndu akunda nka wakwe mmbo akukunda we muni.
49005029	Mashika nkukaa-fo nndu asuaa mwiili wakwe muni-fo, kyaindi mmbo auwuutisa na iuvavara, shaasa na Kristo nawe avetanya siri.
49005030	Mashika mmbo lukee fyilungo fya mwiili wakwe.
49005031	Kimmba ni indo nndu mmbo asheraa ndeye na maye, nandekutira na nka wakwe na yewo vavii vashevaa mwiili umwi.
49005032	Kyama ekyi nkiniini nnu, lyo yeny mmbo nkeerera kya Kristo na siri.
49005033	Lyo wo nndu nakunde nka wakwe shaasa akukundye we muni, nta nka nalare nalaindya mmi wakwe-fo.
49006001	Yeni vana, indyeny vamiku vany kimaruma kya Nndumi, mashika elu llo usumanu.
49006002	Indya nde wafo na mae wafo, ivavaso elyi llyo lya mbee lyitiri kyaasa.
49006003	Kuwoni ngoma, kuwoni suku shifumbutu yaa ulaniny.
49006004	Na yeni vande va vana, mulatavise vana vany, kyaindi valeleny vang'ani veetiri vio vaveringa mavavaso a Nndumi.
49006005	Na yeni varundi va vandu, indyeny vanndumi vany yewo va yaa ulaniny mwiireiye neereremya-u, mwiikunyiisye nriminy, kimwi sha iindya Kristo muni.
49006006	Nshi sha wiindi lulollyo na miso lwa vandu vakeekukundisa kwa vandu-fo, kyaindi muve sha mashinga a Kristo, mutani findo fisenyi Iruva na nrima umwi nsi;
49006007	mwikee na nrima nsha sheelyi mukeerundya Iruva na kilave sheelyi nkya vandu-da-fo.
49006008	Mwiimanyaa sheelyi wo kindo kisha nndu atana mmbo ashekitawaa ni Nndumi evirywaa ekyo kyeni, kwava ishinga ao nndu lleke.
49006009	Na yeni vanndumi va vandu, kevetanyiny varundi vany efyo fyeni, nta mulavatavise ao ivamatwa, mwiimanyaa sheelyi Nndumi yeto waawo na waany ni yeto umwi wa iruveeu, nawe nnyatiri ikundya-fo.
49006010	Na kingi-se, engereny iva vakaari mukee na Nndumi na wiidimi lwa finya yakwe.
49006011	Raeny fisha fyoose fya Iruva, mwiidimi ivinga mitambo ya Satana.
49006012	Mashika fira lutiri yekapana nshi ya samu na mwiili-fo, ni fira yekapa ngyumangyi na finya, na vaniini veshillya efo ireeminy, na ya matorito a mimuyo mikasha ulaniny lwa mumuyo.
49006013	Kimmba ni indo ipoony fisha fyoose fya Iruva, naambo mwiidimi ikapana na uravi, na mukammaa iinutya fyoose musalaleny.
49006014	Kyasia kwiipony shu, muveraa dede, neeraa kisha kiringaa mbafu kya usumanu.
49006015	Na marende any nakudeesye yeenda sere indeamba Nrumi ya Nsia yeyo ishendee urilalyi.
49006016	Mmwasi ya fyoose mwiipoo ngao yaany nnyo kikusiryo, nayo nnyo imwekyaa irummya mife yeyo ya muro ya yeto nravi.
49006017	Na lyingyi muvewarya wende lwa ukiro na usu lwa Mumuyo llo irero lya Iruva;
49006018	na fiterewo na fyeerero fyoose mwiiterevaa wo kyeeri mukee na Mumuyo, muvelala shoovi kya efyo mwiiterevyaa veele woose.
49006019	Kiwo neeny da muveshiterevya, naambo shiidimi irera nisha, na yaamba kyama ekyo kya Nrumi ya Nsia shikee na ukaari.
49006020	Mashika nkimaruma kya efyo shilevaangwa shive nrumi kutani shafingwa, kutani shawona ukaari lweerera shaasa kishikooye irera.
49006021	Naasa neeni mukooye imanya mbony takwa, shaasa shiifo, Tikiko mwanama nkunde, nndundi nsaari wa Nndumi, yeto mmbo ashemuviaa mbony toose.
49006022	Nawe mmbo shikeenruma kwany kimaruma kya vayo namuvie mbony teru, navemuviirya muu.
49006023	Siri ikae na urilalyi na ukundi, ando amwi na kikusiryo, kyiluukya kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
49006024	Isarya lyikae woose yewo vakunndye Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo kyikee kya dede.
50001001	Ni yeny Paulo na Timoteo, lukee mashinga a Kristo Yesu, lwamureiya yeni veele va Kristo Yesu mukee Filipi ando amwi na vesalallya siri na vatarami va vayo.
50001002	Isarya lyimukaye na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
50001003	Wo kyeeri shamukumbwa yeni mmbo nkeyaana Iruva.
50001004	Wo nkonu shavemuterevya yeni shiiterevaa na ifura,
50001005	kimaruma kya wiitanu lwany ivambisa Nrumi ya Nsia, uka nkonu ulya wa mbee na kufike inu.
50001006	Na kindo shivikye nsia ni ekyi, sheelyi yeto alepooka ishora elyo isha indo efo miriminy yaany nkuti nashelyiinutya kufike nkonu yeto wa Kristo Yesu.
50001007	Na shaasa kivekee kuti yakwa shimukusarye kya efyo fyoose, mashika yeni mmbo mukee kunu nriminy wakwa, kimmba kyeeri kya ikaa lyakwa kifingyony neefo ishoreny elyo lya ikureekya Nrumi ya Nsia na iivangisa, yeni moose mmbo muleakana neeny isarya elyi.
50001008	Mashika na Iruva ni nkureekyi wakwa shaasa shitirwa ni nsia kimaruma kyany yeni moose shikee na nrima wa Yesu Kristo.
50001009	Na kiterewo kyakwa nkyo ekyi, ikunda lyany lyeengere ing'ana nnu mwikee na waarya na umanyo loose;
50001010	muwarye yefyo fikee fisha, naambo mutire mirima myaa, ilatiri ivara, kufike nkonu yeto wa Kristo.
50001011	Indo muvekaa-fo mwiishwe ndunda ta usumanu kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo, kya itumbe na nnduma wa Iruva.
50001012	Lyo vana vama vakwa, mmbo shikundye mumanyi sheelyi filya fyoose fileshikooya mmbo fileenda indo mmwasi kyeendwa ni ikwaanisa Nrumi ya Nsia.
50001013	Naakwa ni ifingwa lyakwa mmbo lyilekoora paa kwi Kristo, vasikari vakalollya, na vandu vengyi-da.
50001014	Na veengyi va yewo vakusirye Nndumi, kyeeri vakeekaariswa kyeendwa ni ifingwa lyakwa, vakeengera ikaarya yaamba irero lya Iruva kulaiyoo weerei.
50001015	Mashika kwiifo vengyi vakeevambisa mbony ta Kristo kimaruma kya uriingyi na ukasha; na vengyi lyo kikee kya usha.
50001016	Wo mmbo vakeyaamba Kristo na ukundi, veishi sheelyi yeny mmbo shikee nsauwe naambo shikureekye Nrumi ya Nsia;
50001017	kyaindi kwiifo yewo vakeamba Kristo na uriingyi kilakee kya nrima mwaa, naambo vafumbute ngatara ta ifingwa lyakwa.
50001018	A kyamaany-kyi? Lyo na kyikava inda, kwakooya nkwa ntambo, ao kwakooya ni kya dede, lyo Kristo akee yaambawa tupu, nkyo neeny shitirwa ni nsia, na sheengere ifura.
50001019	Mashika shiishi shamanya efyo mmbo fisheshiwuiyaa five ukiro kwakwa, kyeendwa ni fiterewo fyany neesimbwa Mumuyo wa Yesu Kristo;
50001020	shaasa sheevikye nsia deny, na ilanga, sheelyi nshiwonaa isuka-fo, indi shiishi na nshushwa wo nkonu, na ulaalu-da Kristo nkuti nawoni iitikiswa mwiiliny wakwa, kwakoya shikee na muu ao kwakooya shifiiye.
50001021	Mashika kyakwa yeny ikaa na muu ni Kristo na ifwa ni mbusha.
50001022	Lyo kwakooya ikaa na muu shikee indi na mwiili ni ndunda ta mashora akwa, naasa ekyo nsauwaa nshikiishi-fo.
50001023	Mmbo shikee nsisirye yoo nnang'ani ya findo fivii, mmbo shilangye yeenda shindekaa na Kristo, mashika mmbo kyevaa kyisha mmwasi.
50001024	Neekaa na mwiili mmbo lyikee kisha mmwasi lyo kimaruma kyany.
50001025	Neeny shambikya efyo nsia, shiishi sheelyi mmbo nkaa-u na yaakana neeni, naambo mukooye yeengera ifura efo kikusiryony;
50001026	naambo mweengere ifura mukee na Kristo Yesu kimaruma kyakwa kyeendwa ni ishekaa neeni lyingyi.
50001027	Llyo mikaaye yaany ive shaasa kiisumanyi Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo. Naambo kwakooya shasha neemulollya, yeni, ao kwakooya shilaiyo, shikooye iita mbony tany, sheelyi mmbo muselelyi shumu mwikee na nrima umwi nsi, mwiikapanyaa iirikyo lya Nrumi ya Nsia.
50001028	Mure mulairyaa vakiduva vany kya kindo kyoose, kwa yewo ni wende lulollyo paa lweereka, lyo kwany yeni ni ukiro yelo luukye kwa Iruva.
50001029	Mashika mmbo muleniingyo kimaruma kya Kristo, nshi naambo mumwiirikye-da-fo, ni ando amwi neelyiswa ukyiva kimaruma kyakwe;
50001030	mwiikee na fira ilya sheni muleilollya kwakwa, na iita sheelyi shikeekapana fika ulaalu.
50002001	Kyasia kwakooya kyiiyo iviryo muu kwi Kristo ao ikaariswa lya ngata shoose lya ikunda, na kwakooya kwiiyo yaakaniswa Mmumuyo na kwakooya kwiiyo isaryo na ilyillyo,
50002002	ishuryeny ifura lyakwa, naambo muve va nrwe umwi nsi, na ikunda lyimwi, na nrima umwi, mwikusaraa kimwi.
50002003	Mulasheetana kindo kyoose mwiiwakyanaa nta mwikung'anisaa-fo, kyaindi taniny fyoose mwikunyiisye, wo nndu nalollye yeto ungyi sheelyi mmbo akee ng'waana ngota we muni.
50002004	Kulave nndu ava mwiisara mbony takwe muni, kyaindi wo umwi waany nave mwiikusara kya yeekya vengyi.
50002005	Veny na nrima wa ngata yeyo sheni shasa yekee nnang'ani ya Kristo Yesu,
50002006	mashika we muni lllya kipooka mmbo ekee na ngata ya Iruva, lyo we nnyalelollya iva wa ngata ya Iruva nkindo kyeekutira nakyo-fo;
50002007	llyo we muni mmbo aleva sheelyi nalatiri itumbe, kava sha ishinga, karaa ngata ya nndu wa vandu;
50002008	lyingyi-se llya alelollyo mmbo atiri fwana ya nndu wa vandu, mmbo alekunyiisa we muni katira wiindi kutani akooya ufu, yee, ufu lwa alya nsalabeny.
50002009	Naasa Iruva kanng'anisa nnu, kansimba irina lyiilanyi marina moose;
50002010	naambo wo nndu nashefiirya irina lya Yesu ndi, va iruvee-u na va ya ulaniny, na va efo si ya ulana.
50002011	Na wo ulumi lwaambe paa sheelyi YESU KRISTO NI NNDUMI, naambo Iruva Nde naute-u ing'aniswa.
50002012	Kyasiany vakunde vakwa, shaasa muletira wiindi mikonu myoose, nta nshi kyeeri kilya shekee neeni-da-fo, kyaindi kive indo mmwasi elyi shilaiyo, moore ukiro lwany yeni muveni mwiitirwa ni usau na irerema.
50002013	Mashika ni Iruva akeerunda mashora nnang'ani yaany, ikunda lyany na irunda lyany, mushiinutyaa mesha yoo akundye.
50002014	Rundeny findo fyoose kulaifo nkunung'unu ao iwakyana,
50002015	naambo mukooye iva vana vesha va Iruva valatiri mbese, nta ulembi, mulatiri nta ntambo yaa irikeny elyi lyikee ilyang'a lyikeenda mwiiri, neeni elyi mukee nnang'ani yaawo mmbo mulollyo sha sa niini ya ulaniny yelu,
50002016	muvetira irero lya muu; naambo shiidimi iwona nrima wa ifura elyi nkonu wa Kristo ufikaa, kyoore sheelyi nshilekutakura ruu-fo, nta nshilekwaarisa ruu-fo.
50002017	Ee, naakwa shaaluwa kiraso kyeepusuwa kimaruma kya kikusiryo kyany, mmbo shitirwa ni nsia; neeny shitirwa ni nsia ando amwi neeni moose.
50002018	Neeni kevefureny indo, muvefura ando amwi neeny.
50002019	Kyaindi shivikye nsia Nndumi Yesu ashiidimisyaa shirumi Timoteo nashe kwany fyeeri fya kufii, naambo neeny shiviiryo muu, elyi shimanyaa mbony tany.
50002020	Kimmba shilatiri nndu ungyi akee kindo kyimwi neeny, ashiidimaa imanya deny mbony tany shaasa tikai.
50002021	Mashika vandu vengyi mmbo vakeeruuya mbony tawo veni, na nshi mbony ta Kristo Yesu-fo.
50002022	Lyo mwiishi nnduma wa Timoteo sheelyi mmbo alerundya Nrumi ya Nsia ando amwi neeny, kava sha mwana neeny sha ndeye.
50002023	Naasany mmbo nshenrumaa uviny, shammeemanya efyo fikaa fishikooye.
50002024	Neeny shikusirye sheelyi Nndumi ashiidimisyaa naakwa nnyeny isha uviny.
50002025	Lyo shavelollya kuti iruma Epafradito kwany, akee mwanama wakwa, avekee mwaakana mashora ando amwi neeny, nsikari uroyaakwa, nawe ni nrumi waany na mwifurukanya filya fishitinyi.
50002026	Mashika mmbo eelangye imulollya yeni moose, karovyo deny, mashika elyi muleeta sheelyi mmbo elwee.
50002027	Mashika mmbo elwee nnu deny, kufii nafwe, lyo Iruva kallyillya, nta nshi we muni-da-fo, neeny da, nta nshikundye iting'wa nnu shifuluye-fo.
50002028	Naasany mmbo shikee ikutakura nnu inruma, naambo elyi mushellolla lyingyi mufure, neeny ting'wa yakwa yaangwe.
50002029	Mmbwaryeny na ifura kimaruma kya Nndumi, nndu sha yeu mulollye ni nndu asumani iindyo.
50002030	Mmbo alefikya kufii ifwa kimaruma kya ishora lya Kristo, naambo tupu nainutye filya fyeyaanguye efo utaraminy lwany kwakwa.
50003001	Numa ya efyo vanavama, fureny mukee na Nndumi. Imureiya mbony tilya sheni nkishirovyaa yeny-fo, mashika kyivaa mbusha kwany.
50003002	Kwiiseny na vandu vavakye fite, kwiiseny na veetana maravi kevekwiiseny na vekurumbwa mwiili.
50003003	Mashika vandu vakee varini kya dede ni yese, lukaveva veinndya Iruva kyikee kya ngata ya Mumuyo neewona ifura nnu elyi lutiri Kristo Yesu, nta lluvikye findo fya mwiili yeu nsia-fo.
50003004	Kulakooye yeny sheshiidima ivikya findo fya mwiili nsia. Kwakooya nndu moose alollya kuti yeevikya findo fya mwiili nsia, yeny ni mmwasi.
50003005	Mashika mmbo sherinwa shiitiri mikonu nyanya, nndu wa ufyari lwa Israeli, va mmba ya Benyamini, Mwisraeli va Vaisraeli, efo kweeringa uvavaso shava Mfarisayo,
50003006	efo kwa utakusu, shava mwiisisya siri, kya usumanu luwonikaa kimaruma kya iringa uvavaso, nsheetiri mbese-fo.
50003007	Kyaindi lyo findo filya sheefilollye mmbusha kwakwa, mmbo shilefilollya nruu kimaruma kya Kristo.
50003008	Ee, kyailanya yefyo, kwakwa yeny mmbo shilelollya findo fyoose ni ruu kwainanisa na usha yelo lwiilanyi kyeeso lweemanya Kristo Yesu, Nndumi wakwa, yeto kimaruma kyakwe shilelollya findo fyoose ni ruu neefyaallwa sha mando naambo tupu shiwoni Kristo.
50003009	Na lyingyi shilollyo shikee nawe, naambo shilasheetira usumanu lwakwa shimuni yelo lushuka uvavasony, kyaindi shiwoni usumanu yelo lushaa na kikusiryo kwa Kristo, llo usumanu luukye kwa Iruva, kyeendwa nkikusiryo.
50003010	Naambo shimmanyi we na wiidimi lwa iruka lyakwe na kya iitana nawe kya makyiva akwe, naambo shivakaniswa na ifwa lyakwe.
50003011	Naambo na kyikakyi shiidimi ifikya iruka lya vafu.
50003012	Lyoony nshi sheelyi shammaa ifika-fo, ao shammaa isongovika-fo, oode, mmbo shikeengera iwaana naambo shikooye iwara kilya Kristo Yesu ashikunndya llya aleshivaanga.
50003013	Vanavama, nshikusarye sheelyi mmbo shammaa itira-fo; lyo shitiri irero lyimwi nsi, fingyi fyoose shafiviira numa, shatamballya yefyo fikee mbee yakwa;
50003014	mmbo nkeyaangusya, nambo nshewonisa ureto lwa simbo yeyo ya uvaango lwa kiiruveu lwa Iruva luukye kwa Kristo Yesu.
50003015	Kyasiany, yese lukee vasongovisi lusoongye yefyo; naakwa mwakusara ngata ingyi kya kindo kyoose, Iruva mmbo ashemusukuyaa neekyo.
50003016	Lyo yaa lufikye ulaalu lweende lwikee indo.
50003017	Vanavama vakwa, shilatyeny yeny, muvelola na valya vakeesora kyaaso kilya lulemoora.
50003018	Mashika lyo kwiifo vengyi shaasa shilemmaa imuvia mbony tawo na ulaalu shimuvye lyingyi na misoru, sheelyi mmbo vakee vakyiduva va nsalaba wa Kristo.
50003019	Yewo mmbo vashefurumyaa na urumato, mashika iruva lyawo nndeu, na itumbe lyawo ni usutu elo lwaawo, valangye findo fya ulana.
50003020	Lyo yese kweru kwekaa ni iruveeu, na yoo nng'u luvikye nsia ilollya Mwikira, we Nndumi Yesu Kristo;
50003021	mmbwe yeto ashealashaa miili yei yeeru ifwaa, ivake mwiili yeto wakwe wa itumbe, na wiidimi yelo lwakwe lushevikaa findo fyoose yoo si ya marende akwe.
50004001	Naasany vanavama vakwa, mukee vakunde vakwa, shimulangye nnu, mukaveva ifura lyakwa na ureto lwakwa, salaleny indo shumu mwiikutiri na Nndumi, ee-te vakunde vakwa.
50004002	Mmbo nkeetereva Euodia, shooka-fo shatereva Sintike, vave na nrwe umi nsi vekee na Nndumi.
50004003	Ee-da, shikundye na yewe, ishinga uroye wakwa wa dede, kweekye vaka yewo, mashika mmbo valekapannya Nrumi ya Nsia ando amwi neeny, ando amwi na Klementi, ando amwi na yewo vengyi valeakana neeny nawo marina awo akee efo kitabuny kya muu.
50004004	Fureny na Nndumi mikonu myoose, shaamba-se, fureny.
50004005	Ufoo lwany lulollyo ni vandu woose, mashika Nndumi nkufii nashe.
50004006	Mulakwaatare na kindo nta kimwi-fo, lyo wo kindo kimuting'aa mmbo muterevaa Iruva, ando amwi neemwaana, Iruva nakooye imanya yefyo fyamwaanguya.
50004007	Na urilalyi lwa Iruva lwiilanyi urango lweru, lo lumweekye iringa mirima yaany na makusaro any kyeendwa ni Kristo Yesu.
50004008	Na kya ifurumya vanavama vakwa, kwakooya kwiiyo mbony shoose ya dede, fyoose fikee fya waarya, fyoose fya usumanu, fyoose fikee fya usha na fisenyi, neefyo fyoose fikee fya nnduma nsha, kwakooya kwiiyo usha loose, kwakooya kwiiyo nnduma nsha, langeny nnu mikaye ya ngata yeyo.
50004009	Findo filya mulewarya kwakwa neekulosha, na iita na ifilollya kwakwa, fitaniny, na Iruva yeto wa isarya nakae neeni.
50004010	Nndumi mmbo aleshiniinga ifura nnu, mashika elyi ulaalu mwammaa ivangisa mirima yaany kimaruma kyakwa, shaasa llya mwekeekusara kyakwa, lyo mulawonise mwaanya.
50004011	Nshi nkeerera indo mashika elyi shaanguywa nkindo-fo, mashika shilemmaa iishivya na iirikya ikaa na mwiina yeto wakwa.
50004012	Shiishivye yaanguywa, shavemanya na iwonisyo, ngata shoose na kya findo fyoose, mmbo shiishi iwuura na itirwa nshaa, itira fiingyi na yaanguywa.
50004013	Neefyo fyoose mmbo shaidima kyeendwa ni yeto mwiishisimba finya.
50004014	Lyo mmbo muletana kyisha nnu elyi muleakana neeny efo ngatareny takwa.
50004015	Na yeni-da, yeni Vafilipi mwiishi muveni, sheelyi kyeeri shileuka Makedonia llya mapookyony a ivambisa Nrumi ya Nsia, nkwiifo nta siri ingyi ileakana neeny kunu urundiny yelu lwa iningya neewarya kuuta yeni muveni-fo.
50004016	Mashika fika kulya Tesalonike mmbo muleshirikya ngarami naambo shilaanguyo, na nta nshi lyimwi da-fo.
50004017	Nta nshi shilangye mweengere ishitannya indo-fo, lyo mmbo shifurye kimaruma kya simbo yeto tany tikeengera ifumbuka efo kwany.
50004018	Lyo yeny mmbo shitiri findo fyoose na mmwasi, shaishwa shapu; findo filya fileuka kwany mmbo shilefityo ni Epafradito fikava nrungo nsha, kikaveva kiraso kyikee kiirikye kikasennya Iruva.
50004019	Nawe Iruva yeto wakwa mmbo ashemeengeryaa wo kindo ekyo kyamwaanguya kiinani na usimba lwakwe na efo itumbeny lyakwe kwi Kristo Yesu.
50004020	Ulaalu Nndumi we Nde weeru nang'aniswa, akee wa llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen!
50004021	Idikireny veele woose na irina lya Kristo Yesu. Wooroye wany yeva vakee neeny vamwiidikira nnu.
50004022	Veele woose vamwiidikira, mmwasi yewo vakee va mmba ya Kaisari.
50004023	Isarya lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo lyimukaye efo miriminy yaany.
51001001	Ni yeny Paulo shikee nrumi wa Kristo Yesu kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva shikee na Timoteo mwanamaye weeru.
51001002	Shamureiya yeni vanavama mukee veele, vasaari va Kristo mukee muriny wa Kolosai. Isarya lyimukaye na urilalyi yelo luukye kwa Iruva Nde weeru.
51001003	Mmbo lukeyaana Iruva, Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo wo nkonu lwiimuterevyaa.
51001004	Kipookya kyeeri luleita mbony ta kikusiryo kyany kwa Kristo Yesu, na kya ikunda elyo lyany kwa vandu va Iruva woose.
51001005	Kyeendwa ni ivika nsia eto mulesurummyo iruveeu, eto mbony ta vayo muleita llya mbee efo dedeny ya irero lya Nrumi ya Nsia.
51001006	Nnyo yeyo ilemufikya shaasa ivekee ulaniny koose, ikavevika ndunda tilollyo, shaasa ikeeng'ana efo kwany uka llya muleiita na imanya nnu isarya elyo lya Iruva kya dede.
51001007	Shaasa Epafra akee ishinga urooye wany na nkunde waany alemulosha. Kaveva mwifurukannya Kristo akee nsaari kimaruma kyany.
51001008	Mmbwe yeto aleluvia kya ikunda lyany lyikee lya ngata ya Mumuyo.
51001009	Kimmba ni indo naakwa ni yese, uka nkonu ulya lulepooka iita llukeederya itereva kimaruma kyany-fo, naambo mukooye iishurwa urango lwa ikunda lyakwe na waarya na imanya lya efo nriminy.
51001010	Naambo mukee shaasa kimusumannyi mbee ya Nndumi mukooye insenya deny, muvevika ndunda shisha efo mashoreny mesha moose, na yeengera urango lweemanya Iruva.
51001011	Mwishidimisywaa deny, kiinani na finya ya itumbe lyakwe, muvewona usisiryo lwa wo ngata muvereyaa mukee na ifura;
51001012	mwishanaa Nde yeto alemuniinga iwarya waavi lwa ding'u ya veele efo seny yeyo.
51001013	Nawe mmbo aleluuta efo finyiny ta ireema, kalusamisa-fo kalwaata efo umangyiny lwa Mwana yeto muni ikunda lyakwe.
51001014	Na efo kwakwe mfo lutiri iwowowa na llyo ifwaayo ngyulyamari.
51001015	Nawe mmbo avakye Iruva yeto nalavaa ilollya na miso, kasongoya fyuumbe fyoose ikaafo.
51001016	Mashika fyuumbe fyoose mmbo fileumbwa mmbwe, yefyo fikee iruveeu na efyo fikee uwe ya uruka efyo filollyo na miso na filalollyo, fikava fitima fya itumbe, ao umangyi, ao wiidimi, findo fyoose mmbo fileumbwa kyeendwa mmbwe, na kimaruma kyakwe.
51001017	Nawe mmbo asongoye findo fyoose ikaafo, na fyoose ni efo kwakwe fikutiri.
51001018	Nawe mmbwe nrwe wa mwiili, nnyo siri, nawe ni mapookyony, na wa mbee yuuka kwa vafu, naambo nave nsongoru wa findo fyoose.
51001019	Mashika mmbo alekunda findo fyoose nafyo mmbo fishefurumyaa yoo kwakwe.
51001020	Nawe nashesanda findo fyoose nafyeende yoo kwakwe, elyi alemaa yeende urilalyi na samu yakwe alya nsalabeny, yoo kwakwe ni indo, kwakoya ni kya findo fya yaa ulaniny ao fya iruveeu.
51001021	Na yeni elyo mbee mwekee vatarakanise mukavikyana fiduva, mukatana filasumani, ulaalu mmbo ammaa imusanda;
51001022	kyeendwa mwiili wakwe llya alefwa, naambo namoomwi na yoo akai, muve veele, mulatiri kiteve nta mbese;
51001023	mukaarye efo kikusiryony ekyo mwiikee uvasheny, muvangiswa, nta mulashiindutwaa mure ivika nsia lya Nrumi ya Nsia ilya muleeta mbony ta vayo, ilya ileongoyo fyuumbe fyoose fikee kwasi ya ngina, nnyo yeyo yeny Paulo shileva mwiifurukannya.
51001024	Ulaalu mmbo shikeefura nnu kya makyiva yaa ashitiri kimaruma kyany, neeny shaveinutya-u filya filewiika-u fya makiva a Kristo efo mwiiliny wakwe, nnyo siri yakwe.
51001025	Nayo mmbo shilevikwa shive mwiifurukannya kiinani na ungari lwa Iruva shilerambikywa kive mbusha kwany, naambo shiinutye irero lya Iruva.
51001026	Kyama ekyo mmbo kyekee kirike uka mbee ya marika moose, kyaindi ulaalu mmbo kilesukuyo veele vakwe.
51001027	Nawe Iruva kakunda iwoora shaasa usimba na itumbe lya kyama ekyi efo vanduny va masanga, nawo ni Kristo akee nnang'ani yaawo, ivika nsia kya itumbe elyo.
51001028	Nawe mmbwe yeto lukee ivambisa mbony takwe, lwishiikimbaa wo nndu, neelosha wo nndu lukee na waarya loose, naambo lweende nndu asongovikye kwa Kristo.
51001029	Neeny mmbo shikeekuvinisa nnu kimaruma kya irero elyo yeni, shavekutakura kiinani na iidimisywa ni yeto mwiirunda na finya nnang'ani yakwa.
51002001	Mashika mmbo shikundye mumanyi ikutakura lyakwa shaasa lying'ani kimaruma kyany, na kya valya va Laodikia na kya valya valashilollye na miso yaa,
51002002	naambo vaviiryo muu miriminy yaawo, velungwaa ukundiny, naambo vawonise usimba loose lweemanya songosiny, vaute-u imanya nisha deny fyama efyo fya Iruva, mmbwe Kristo;
51002003	mmbwe yeto kwakwe usimba loose lwa urango lukusurumyi
51002004	Mmbo shaamba irero elyi, naambo tupu kulasheeva nndu amulembaa na marero emuleleveya.
51002005	Mashika ra elyi shilaiyo shimuni, kyaindi efo nriminy mmbo shikee neeni, shilangaa na ivereya uramba lwany na ukaari lwa kikusiryo kyany efo kwa Kristo.
51002006	Naasany shaasa mulewarya Kristo Yesu, we Nndumi weeru, endeny indo indo mwikee nawe;
51002007	mwiikulungye neekutira nawe, muveva vakaari efo iirikyony, shaasa muleloshwa; muveengera iva va kyaanu.
51002008	Loleny mukwiise kulasheeva nndu amukamara mifungwa na urango lwa ing'ana neemulemba, shaasa miishivye ya kivandu ikai, na filoshyo fya uraatony efyo fya kiulana filya fya mbee, filakee fya ngata ya Kristo.
51002009	Mashika yoo kwakwe nng'u usongovisi loose lwa Iruva lukai, efo mwiiliny.
51002010	Na yeni mukasongoviswa yoo kwakwe we akee nrwe wa itumbe na wiidimi loose.
51002011	Yoo kwakwe mmbo mukee sha vandu varini lyo urini lulakee lwa mwiili, sheelyi kwara mwiili wa kinndu, llo urini lwa Kristo.
51002012	Mmbo mulerikwa ando amwi nawe llya mulebatiswa; na yoo ubatisony mukarutwa ando amwi nawe, kyeendwa ni iirikya wiidimi lwa Iruva yeto alennduta auka kwa vafu.
51002013	Na yeni llya mweefiiye kimaruma kya makasha any na ira mularinwa, kamuviirya muu ando amwi nawe, ekyimaa imfwaaya makasha moose,
51002014	kamaa na yaangata barwa ilya yeemutya uvingo ikavika kiduva kweru, kayuuta-u deny neikapya nsalabeny;
51002015	kavinga ngyumangyi na wiidimi, kataallwa ruu ekee na ukaari, katirwaa alya nsalabeny.
51002016	Naasany kulave nndu amuutya uvingo kimaruma kya fyeelya ao fyeena-fo, ao kimaruma kya mikonu miniini ao ilollyo lya mwiiri-fo, ao nta kya sabato-fo;
51002017	yefyo fyoose m-firishe fya findo efyo fishaa; lyo mwiili ni wa Kristo.
51002018	Kulave nndu amusoka simbo yaany, kya ikunyiisya efyo akundye we muni, na iindya vasu, ekuvikaa efo mooryeny neekung'anisa we muni kya ruu, na urango lwa kivandu;
51002019	nta nalasoraa Nrwe yeto ukee ntire na ilungyo ando amwi na miraarii nato ukalungika indo kyuuka na Iruva.
51002020	Naasany kwakooya mmbo mulefwa ando amwi na Kristo na ira filoshyo filya fya mbee fya kiulana, nkikyi elyi mukaa si ya mavavaso, sha vandu va kiulana,
51002021	mulapaani, mulakombe, mulatire;
51002022	(findo efyo fyoose mmbo filyamarikaa elyi fyarunda), mwiisoraa ngyufundo na filoshyo fya kivandu?
51002023	Findo efyo mmbo fivakye sheelyi mmbo fikee fisha, efo urambeny lwa miindye yeyo mulekusongosya muveni, mukaiindya, na ishillya mwiili na unyaasi; lyo filashiidimaa iima lango ta mwiili.
51003001	Naasa kyimmba mukee varute ando amwi na Kristo, ruuyeny efyo fikee uwe efo Kristo akai, akee rembo woko usha lwa Iruva.
51003002	Kusareny efyo fikee uwe, nshi yefyo fikee kunu si-fo.
51003003	Mashika mmbo mulefwa, na muu wany mmbo ukee nsurumi amwi na Kristo kwa Iruva.
51003004	Kyeeri Kristo asheorwaa paa, yeto akee muu weru, llyo neeni musheorwaa paa ando amwi nawe efo itumbeny.
51003005	Kyasia, lakaniny na lango sheesi ta ya ulaniny, utuusi na uravi, na ilanga, llyo iindya maruva a wongo;
51003006	kyeendwa mfindo yefyo unyafi lwa Iruva mmbo lumusheyaa.
51003007	Findony efyo mfo mwekai elyo mbee llya mweifo.
51003008	Lyo ulaalu reny deny efyo, mfyo unyafi, irooyo nngoo, uravi, firumu, na iing'asha filooke kaniny kany-fo.
51003009	Mulaviani wongo-fo, mashika elyi mwankwaatwa deny unndu lulya lwa mbee ando amwi na mashora a vayo;
51003010	muraa unndu wiiya, yelo lulealuwa wiiya luve lwa ngata ya yeto aleluumba.
51003011	Yoo nkwiiyo Mgriki nta Myuda-fo, irinwa ao ira irinwa-fo, nndu nnrango ao itondo, ishinga ao nndu lleke-fo, mashika Kristo mmbo akee fyoose nnang'ani a fyoose.
51003012	Naasany, kimmba mukee vasauwe va Iruva, veele mukakundwa nnu raeny nrima wa ilyillya, unndu usha, ikunyiisa, ufoo, usisiryo,
51003013	muvesisiryana neesaryana, na kwakooya nndu asuuye na ungi, shaasa Nndumi alemusarya yeni, neeni kiwo.
51003014	Mmwasi ya fyoose tireny ukundi mashika llo kyeeso kya usongovisi.
51003015	Na urilalyi lwa Kristo lumusalallye miriminy yaany, nkyo mulevaangyo, muveva vandu va kyaanu.
51003016	Irero lya Kristo lyiwalyi-walyi miriminy yaany na waarya loose, muvekulosha na iikimbana na zaburi na fiimbo, na mbony shisongosye yeto tipanaa nrima, kimmba mwansaryo indo muveimbya Iruva miriminy yaany.
51003017	Na wo kindo mutanaa, na kikava kyeerera ao kyerunda, taniny fyoose na irina lya Nndumi Yesu, muveana Iruva Nde kyeendwa mmbwe.
51003018	Yeni vaka, indyeny vomi vany shaasa kisennyi Nndumi.
51003019	Na yeni vomi kundeny vaka vany nta mulakee na nrima muu nawo-fo.
51003020	Na yeni vana, indyeny vamiku vany kya findo fyoose; mashika ekyi nkyo kisennyi Nndumi.
51003021	Na yeni vande va vana nta mulatavise vana vany, naambo valasheuta pa yoo kwany.
51003022	Na yeni mashinga, irikyen vanndumi yewo vany va yaa ulaniny kya findo fyoose, nta nshi naambo kive kindo kyeelola kya ikukundisa vanduny-fo, kyaindi kive kya nrima muni, mwiireiye Iruva.
51003023	Wo kindo mutanaa kitaniny na nrima deny, sheelyi mwatannya Nndumi muni nta nshi vandu-fo,
51003024	mwiimanyaa sheelyi mmbo mushewaryaa weesi lwany luve ding'u yaany. Mmbo mukerundya Nndumi ake Kristo.
51003025	Mashika yeto mwiitannya vengi fya ukasha mmbo ashetaiywaa kya ukasha lwakwe, nta nnyashesaryoo kya ruu-fo.
51004001	Na yeni vanndumi va vandu, tanyiny mashinga any fya usumanu na fya wiindi, mwiimanyaa sheelyi naakwa ni yeni mutiri Nndumi waany akee wa efo iruveeu.
51004002	Laleny shoovi nnu mwiiterevaa, ando amwi na yaana Iruva,
51004003	muveluterevya neese kiwo, naambo Iruva naluruye mwaango wa irero lyakwe, luvambise kyama ekyo kya Kristo na nkyo ekyo kyileengye shafingwa.
51004004	Naambo shikyoore paa shaasa kishisumanyi irera.
51004005	Kaeny na urango kwa yewo valakee vakristo, mularetaa nta fyeeri.
51004006	Marero any ave a mbora kyeeri kyoose, arolaa, muvemanya shaasa kisumani irouwa wo nndu.
51004007	Tikiko we mwanamaye weeru nkunde akee nsaari na mwiakana neeny mashoreny a Nndumi, mmbo ashemoongoyaa mbony takwa toose.
51004008	Nawe mmbo shanruma kwany kimaruma kya vayo, naambo mumanyi mbony teru, namuviirye nato muu.
51004009	Mmbo ashaa na Onesimo mwanamaye weeru ungyi akee nkunde na nsaari, nawe mmbwa efo kwany. Yewo mmbo vashemuviaa mbony toose ta yaa kweru.
51004010	Na Aristariko ulya alefingwa ando amwi neeny amwiidikira, ando amwi na Marko mwanamaye wa maye wa Barnaba, ulya mulevavaso mmbwe, naasany kansha mwaambyeny.
51004011	Na Yesu yeto avaangwaa Yusto; yewo ni vandu va Kiyuda. Yewo wo veni ni vandu veakana neeny mashoreny yoo a umangyi lwa Iruva; nawo mmbo valeshiviirya nnu muu.
51004012	Epafra ulya wa kwany, nawe akee ishinga lya Yesu Kristo, amwiidikira, nawe mmbo akeevina nnu kimaruma kyany imuterevya, naambo mukooye isalala na ivanga nisha shaasa Iruva akundye.
51004013	Mashika mmbo nkenkureekya deny sheelyi mmbo akee ikuvinisa nnu kimaruma kyany na kya valya vakee Laodikia, na kya valya vakee Hierapoli,
51004014	Na Luka ulya akee mwaanga nkunde, na Dema vamwiidikira nnu.
51004015	Na yeni idikireny nnu siri ya Laodikia, na Nimfa, na siri yeyo ya mmba yakwe.
51004016	Mukammaa isoma barwa yei, niingyeny indesomwa se kulya siriny ya Laodikia, na barwa ilya ya Laodikia nayo isomwa ni yeni.
51004017	Vieny Arkipo indi, “Salallya nnu urundi yelu Nndumi alekurambikya naambo kulwiinutye.”
51004018	Yefi mfyo fiidikiro fyakwa yeny Paulo shareiya na woko lwakwa shimuni. Mukummbwe nnu ifingwa lyakwa. Isarya lya Iruva lyimukaye yeni.
52001001	Ni yese, Paulo, Silvanu na Timoteo lwareiya kwa siri ya Vatesalonike ikee siri ya Iruva Nde na Nndumi Yesu Kristo. Isarya na urilalyi fikae neeni.
52001002	Mmbo lukeana Iruva kyeeri kyoose kimaruma kyany yeni moose, lwimukumbwaa efo fiterewony fyeru.
52001003	Nta llurekywaa ishora lyany iirikyo na ngatara yaany imusheye kimaruma kya ikunda-fo, ando amwi na usisiryo lwany luriani na ivika nsia efo kwa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, na mbee ya Iruva Nde weeru."
52001004	Mashika-le vanavama mukunndyo ni Iruva, lwiishi sheelyi mmbo mukee vasauwe.
52001005	Mashika nrumi yeeru ya nsia nnyilemusheya ikee marero a ruu-fo, mmbo ilesha iitiri finya ya Mumuyo Mweele na ukaariso luvangyi, shaasa mulevelollya mikaaye yeeru efo kwany.
52001006	Neeni mmbo mulelusora yese na Nndumi, llya mulewarya irero mwikee ngatareny shiroo, lyo Mumuyo Mweele kamulyimya ifura.
52001007	Kutani mwava kyaaso kyisha kwa valya vairikye va kulya Makedonia na Akaya.
52001008	Mashika irero lya Iruva mmbo lyilerumwa lyuuka kwany, na nshi lyilefika Makedonia na Akaya-fo, ni wo ando kikusiryo kyany kwa Iruva kilefika, nta yese llutiri-u kya mmwasi kyeyaamba-fo.
52001009	Ni elyi wo veni vakeevambisa mbony teru, shaasa lulesha kwany, na shaasa mulera maruva a wongo mukalatya Iruva, naambo murundye Iruva yeu muni muu akee wa dede;
52001010	muvevereya Mwana wakwe nooke iruveeu, mmbwe yeto alennduta kooka kwa vafu, we Yesu, yeto ashelukiraa unyafi yelo lusheshaa.
52002001	Mashika-le vanavama, yeni muveni mwiishi shaasa lulesha kwany, sheelyi nkileva kya ruu-fo;
52002002	kyaindi lwikimaa ilyiswa ukyiva na itannywa fya kiila, efo Filipi, mwiishi, mmbo lulekaarya yaamba Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia kwany, lukaiwaanya nnu.
52002003	Ni elyi wiikimbi lweru kwany lulakee lwa ruu, nta ukasha nta llutiri ntambo-fo
52002004	Llyo shaasa Iruva alekunda lurambikyo Nrumi ya Nsia neese niindo luyaambaa, nshi sheelyi lukesennya vandu-fo, kyaindi lwikee vandu vasenyaa Iruva yeto aishi mirima yeeru.
52002005	Mashika yese lluleamba marero ekukundisa luveni-fo, neeni mwiishi indo, nta llulerera marero esikya unyuku-fo, nawe Iruva eeshi ekyo.
52002006	Nta lluleruuya nnduma kwa vandu-fo, nta kwany-fo, nta kwa vandu vengyi-fo, elyi lukee varumi va Kristo kive mmbo lwamurovya-fo,
52002007	mmbo luleva vafoo sau efo kwany, lukavaka nde mwiilela vana vakwe muni.
52002008	Neese kiwo lukammuvika nsia indo, lukakunda imuniinga fyoose, Nrumi ya Nsia sanda na mirima yeeru, mashika elyi mukee vakunde veru.
52002009	Mashika-le vanavamaye veru, mmbo mukumbuye kya waataro na ngatara teru, mashika yese mmbo lulerunda mashora kio na nsanyiny naambo lulasheerovya nta nndu na kava vi, kyeeri ekyo lwekee imoongoya Nrumi ya Iruva ya Nsia.
52002010	Yeni muveni mmbo mukee vakureekyi, na Iruva kiwo, shaasa lulekaa kwany yeni mwiirikye, lukee vaarya, va usumanu, lulatiri kyeekumbwa.
52002011	Lyingyi-se shaasa muvekumbuye, shaasa luleikimba wo umwi waany shaasa nde wa vana aikimba vana vakwe muni, lukamutumarisa, lwiimukureekyaa neemwitika;
52002012	naambo yeni mukooye ikaa shaasa kimusumanyi mbee ya Iruva, yeu amuvaangye naambo mwaange umanginy lwakwe lwa itumbe.
52002013	Kikeeny indo yese mmbo lukee yaana Iruva kulaifo ideerya mashika uka kyeeri mulewonisa irero elyo lya Nrumi shisha lya Iruva lyuuka kweru, nshi mulelyiwarya lyiikee ni irero lya vandu-fo, mmbo mulemanya ni irero lya Iruva, na niindo lyikai dede deny, lyikarunda mashora nnang'ani yaany yeni mukusirye-u.
52002014	Shamashika yeni vanavama veru mmbo mulelatya siri ta Iruva ta Uyuda, kwi Kristo Yesu, mashika naakwa ni yeni mmbo mulewonisa makyiva yoo meni kyuuka kwa vandu vany, na Vayuda yewo kiwo;
52002015	na mmbo yewo veni valewaa Nndumi Yesu, na vakisuku, vakalusisya neese-da, valatani kyeesenya Iruva nta vandu vengyi,
52002016	vakavelwiima lularere na vandu va masanga naambo vakirwa, vakatana indo kya yaawutya uravi lwawo nkonu simu, lyo unyafi lwa Iruva mmbo luvakaaye fika mafurumyony.
52002017	Lyo ulaalu, vanavama, elyi luraukani neeni ando a kirambo kidu, lyo mmashika elyi lulamulollye, lluraukani nriminy-fo mmbo lulangye nnu imulollya.
52002018	Kyasia mmbo lweekundye isha kwany, ee, yeny Paulo, shilenkunda isha lyimwi na lya kavii, lyo mmbishwa kakukikyisa-u.
52002019	Mashika ivika nsia lyeru, na ifura lyeru, na ureto lwa nsia weru nkyoki? Ndesa nshi yeni mbee ya Nndumi Yesu kufike elyi asheshaa?
52002020	Mashika yeni mmbo mukee itumbe lyeru na ifura lyeru.
52003001	Naasa kyikeeny indo, lwiikyilemwa isisirya mmwasi, lukalollya nkyeni lurewa Atene yese luveni.
52003002	Lukaruma mwanamaye weeru Timoteo akee nndundi wa Iruva mwiirundya Nrumi ya Nsia ya Kristo, naambo namuvangise neemuviiryaa muu kikusiryony kyany;
52003003	kulave nndu asavaa kimaruma kya ngatara eti, mashika lyo yeni muveni mwiishi sheelyi mmbo tiluvereye.
52003004	Mashika kyeeri lweekee kwany mmbo lwesongwa imuvia sheelyi ngatara tisheshaa, nakyo kikaveva indo, mukamanya.
52003005	Nkyo kimaruma kyeeri shilelemwa isisirya mmwasi, shileruma nndu nashemusaiya nalole kikusiryo kyany, kulakooye nkumbi ashemweesa, yeni na usisiryo lwany luve ruu.
52003006	Kyaindi kyeeri Timoteo alesha auka kwany, mmbo alelweengye mbony shisha ta kikusiryo kyany, na ta ukundi lwany, kaveluvia shaasa mukee ilukumbwa nisha nkonu simu, na ilanga nnu ilulollya shaasa neese lulangye imulollya.
52003007	Kyimmba ni indo vanavama, kya mbony yeto tany mmbo lulewuiyo nnu mmuu, lla elyi lweetirwa nngatara shiroo, kikusiryo kyany kyikafweera fyoose.
52003008	Yese mmbo lukee na muu kwankooya neeni muselelyi kwa Nndumi.
52003009	A ndesa nkyoki lushidimaa itaa Iruva kive kyaanu kimaruma kya kikusiryo kyany mashika a ifura lyilutiri mbee ya Iruva weeru?
52003010	Kio na nsanyiny mmbo lukeetereva Iruva naambo lwiidimi imulollya, na iishurya-u fyilya fyaanguye-u efo iirikyony lyany.
52003011	Naasany we Iruva Nde weeru muni, na Nndumi weeru Yesu namusongoye shia naambo lushe kwany.
52003012	Nndumi namuvangise na imwengerya ikunda muveni na veni na kwa vengyi woose, shaasa neese lumukundye;
52003013	naambo navangise mirima yaany ikae ikee mivaramise ilatiri kyiteve mbee ya Iruva, Nde weeru, ivereye isha lya Nndumi weeru Yesu ando amwi na veele vakwe woose.
52004001	Kyasaa-u ulaalu vanavama mmbo lwamwiikyimba na imutereva: musore Nndumi Yesu, shaasa lulemoora yese shaasa kisumani musenyi Iruva, shaasa yeni mukai, mweengere itana indo.
52004002	Mashika mwiishi ni mavavaso-kyi lulemuniinga musore Nndumi.
52004003	Mashika ni indo Iruva akundye, mukooye iilyiswa, mulakani na utuusi.
52004004	Wo umwi waany namanyi shaasa akaa na nka wakwe muni nakae akee mweele naveva na wiindi,
52004005	nta nalasoraa lango sheesi, sha vandu va masanga valaishi Iruva-fo.
52004006	Kulave nndu alemba ungyi kindo nta illyamarya kya efi-fo, mashika Nndumi mmbwe yeto ataiyaa findo fyoose shaasa lulemuvia uka mapookyony lwimukureekyaa nnu.
52004007	Shamashika Iruva nnyaleluvaangya ngata ya ukyirinda-fo, mmbo akundye lukooye iilyiswa.
52004008	Kyasiany, yeto alema yefi nshi alemmya nndu wa vandu-fo mmbo alemmya Iruva yeto amulyimmya yeni Mumuyo wakwe Mweele.
52004009	Kya mbony ta ikundana nta nshitiri kimaruma kya imureiya-fo, mashika yeni muveni mmbo mukeevaloshe ikundana ni Iruva muni.
52004010	Mashika mmbo mukeyoora ekyo kwa vakristo woose va Makedonia koose. Naasa lukamuterevany mweengere deny itana indo.
52004011	Na kingyi-se, kutakureny irunda mashora any, murunde mashora na maako any muveni shaasa lulemuvia;
52004012	naambo moore wiindi kwa yewo valakee Vakristo na nta mulatafukwaa nkindo.
52004013	Lyo vanavama, llukundye mure mulamanya kya valya valellala-fo; naambo elyi numa mulasheesokyo mfyoova sha vandu valatiri kindo vavikye nsia.
52004014	Mashika kwakooya lwiirikye sheelyi Yesu mmbo alefwa karuka, naakiwo neewo valellala vekee na Yesu, Iruva mmbo ashevaviiraa-se ando amwi nawe.
52004015	Ekyi mmbo lwamuvia na irero lya Nndumi, sheelyi yese lukee na muu ulaalu lushesaa-u fika nkonu yeto Nndumi ashewuyaa nato, dede lyo llushesongoyaa yewo valellava ilala kya ufu-fo.
52004016	Mashika Nndumi we muni mmbo asheolokaa auka iruveeu na unyanga luvangaa, lwa nsu ulya nniini na iranda lya Iruva, na valya valefwa vekee na Kristo mmbo vashesongwaa irutwa mbele.
52004017	Numa llyo yese lukee na muu, lusee-u, lusherakuwaa-u lusandwa nawo efo mafishiny lundeambya Nndumi efo uwe; naasa lushekaa na Nndumi llung'anu.
52004018	Naasany, viiryaniny muu na marero yoo.
52005001	Lyo vanavama, Kya mbony ta mikonu na fyeeri nshitiri kimaruma kya imureiyafo.
52005002	Kimmba yeni muveni mmbo mwiishi ninsha sheelyi nkonu yeto wa Nndumi weewuya mmbo usheshaa sha inyinyi kyeeri kya kio.
52005003	Kyeeri ekyo vandu vakusaraa mmbo kukee kusha kukatira urilalyi, llyo urumato lusheshaa tiny, shaasa usu lwasheya nka llemwa, nalyo mmbashekirwaa-fo.
52005004	Kyaindi lyo yeni vanavama, mmukee ireeminy kutani nkonu yeto ushemusheyaa tiny-fo.
52005005	Mashika yeni mmbo mukee vana va sa, mmbo va nsanyiny; ee, yese llukee va ireema nta va kio-fo.
52005006	Kyasiany, lulalale sheewo vengyi-fo, lukae na mwiiyanu lusinde luvereyaa Nndumi.
52005007	Mashika yewo velala mmbo valala kio, neewo veenangwa mmbo vanangwa kio.
52005008	Kyaindi yese lukee va nsanyiny luve vandu va mwiina, luveraa kikusiryo na ikunda five sha fisha ando amwi na ivikya ukiro nsia.
52005009	Mashika Iruva nnyaleluvika yaa ulaniny luvereye unyafi lwakwe-fo, kyaindi naambo luwoni ukiro efo kwa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo;
52005010	yeto alefwa kimaruma kyeru naambo lusinde nawe lukee na muu ulaalu kwakooya lwafwa.
52005011	Naasany, kuviiryeny muu neekukaarisa wo nndu na ungyi shaasa mwiifo mutanaa.
52005012	Na kingyi-se vanavama, lukunndye mumanyi valya vakekwaatara kimaruma kyany, valya valemusalallya na irina lya Nndumi vemwikimbaa;
52005013	naambo muveendye nnu mukee na ikunda kimaruma kya ishora elyo lyawo. Muveva vandu va urilalyi yeni muveni na veni.
52005014	Vanavama, mmbo lwamutereva mwikimbe yewo valakee vasaari, muvekaarisa yewo vakee vafwafwa, neevikya kilyilyika yewo vafiiye nrima, muvesisirya vandu woose.
52005015	Kevekwiiseny naambo kulakae-fo nndu ataiya makasha na makasha, mmbo muvaa vandu vetana mesha kyeeri kyoose, muveni na veni na kwa vandu woose.
52005016	Veny vefura wo nkonu;
52005017	tereveny kulaifo iderya.
52005018	Veny veana Iruva kya wo kindo, mashika efyo mfyo Iruva akundye kwany kimmba mukee va Kristo Yesu.
52005019	Mulaimi Mumuyo mwaanya.
52005020	Nta mulasheemina ukisuku;
52005021	eseny findo fyoose, musauwe-u ekyo kikee kyisha;
52005022	muvekwiisa na uravi lwa wo ngata.
52005023	Naasany Iruva yeto wa urilalyi namwiilyise nakamwi, naambo ngoo tany na mirima yaany na miili yaany mukooye iringwa nisha, mukae-fo mulatiri kiteve, kufike nkonu yeto Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo asheshaa nato.
52005024	We Nndumi yeto amuvaangye mmbo akee nsaari nawe mmbo asheinutyaa fyaasa fyakwe.
52005025	Vanavama, keveluterevyeny,
52005026	Idikireny vanavama na kimimindo kyeele.
52005027	Mmbo shamuvavasya shikee na Nndumi, vakristo woose vasomywa barwa yei.
52005028	Isarya lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo lyimukaye yeni moose.
53001001	Yeny Paulo na Silvanu na Timoteo, mmbo lwamureiya yeni va siri ya Tesalonike, siri ya Iruva Nde weeru na Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
53001002	Isarya lyimukaye ando amwi na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
53001003	Vanavama, mmbo kilukooye lwaani Iruva kyeeri kyoose kimaruma kyany, shaasa kilusumannyi, mashika elyi iirikyo lyeru lyikee inga'na nnu, na ikunda lya wo umwi waany lyikang'ana nnu.
53001004	Neese luveni mmbo lutirwa ni nsia nniini kimaruma kyany yeni va siri ta Iruva kyeendwa ni usisiryo lwany, na kya usisiryo lwany kya ngatara na waataro lukee kwany.
53001005	Elo llo ukureekyi loora uvingo luukye usumanuny lwa Iruva, naambo kyoore shaasa musumanyi yaanga umanginy lwa Iruva yelo yeni mukeelyiswa ukyiva kimaruma kya vayo.
53001006	Mashika ni kindo kisumani mbee ya Iruva valya vakeemulyisa ukyiva nawo valyiswa ukyiva.
53001007	Neeni mukeelyiswa ukyiva mutawa nsia ando amwi neese kyeeri ekyo Nndumi Yesu asheorwaa paa akee na finya eriyani na vasu va efo iruveeu.
53001008	Ekee na kipalapala kya muro, etaiyaa yewo valaishi Iruva neewo valairikye Nrumi ya Nsia ya Nndumi weeru Yesu;
53001009	vasheorotwaa ni urumato lwa llunganu, irauwa deny vauke kisanguny kya Nndumi na itumbe lya wiidimi lwakwe.
53001010	Kyeeri we asheshaa narumishwa ni veele vakwe, na yaambyo ni valya vamwiirikye nkonu yeto, (mashika ukureekyi lweru mmbo luleirikyo efo kwany).
53001011	Nkyo kimaruma lukamuterevya mikonu myoose, naambo Iruva weeru nairikye uvaango lwany, naveinutya na wo kindo kimutinnyi na wo ishora lyuukye kikusiryony na finya yakwe.
53001012	Irina lya Nndumi weeru Yesu lying'aniswa nnang'ani yaany, neeni nnang'ani ya vayo, kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva weeru na lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
53002001	Kyasiany vanavama, lwamooshora, kya isha lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, na kya ishekuumbya yoo mbee yakwe,
53002002	mulaatarike nnu mure kilya mukee ivinya-fo, nta mulaawukwa efo nriminy-fo ao nta na marero-fo, ao na barwa mukusare nkweru yauka-fo, kyeyaamba sheelyi nkonu yeto wa Nndumi mmbo ulemmaa isha-fo.
53002003	Kulave nta nndu umwi amulemba-fo, mashika nkonu yeto mmbusheshaa kulaore mbele umini llwa lwansha-fo, na nndu yeto kilemi noorwa paa yeto akee mwana wa ureti;
53002004	yeto akee kilemi, yeto mwiikurosa muni mbee ya Iruva yeto mwiindyo, nawe muni kakutemira yoo mmba ya Iruva kakwaalwa mmbwe Iruva.
53002005	A ndesa mmbo mulakumbuye sheelyi kyeeri shekee neeni shilemuvia mbony yeti?
53002006	Neekyo kikee iima nravi yeto nalamanyike ulaalu mukiishi kutani kyeeri kya vayo kyasha.
53002007	Mashika kyama kya urekwa elo kikee ikoora ulaalu lyo kwiiyo umwi akee iima finya ya vayo, na kutani kyautwa-u deny.
53002008	Lyo yeto akee kilemi asheorwaa paa, nawe Nndumi Yesu ashemwiviaa mumuyo wakwe ummbwaa, na inrumata deny elyi aiyo.
53002009	Isha lya kilemi ekyo mmbo lyivakye elyo lya mmbishwa, na wiidimi lwakwe ekooraa na wongo uniini;
53002010	neefo ulembiny lwa yewo vakee ireka, mashika elyi kulaore valekunda dede yeyo naambo vakirwa.
53002011	Nkyo kimaruma kavaora finya ya ureti shaasa ikai, vengere ikutira na wongo;
53002012	naambo yewo woose valelema iirikya dede yeyo vautyo uvingo, mashika elyi valefurya uravi.
53002013	Kyaindi yese kilukooye yaana Iruva wo nkonu kimaruma kyany, yeni vanavama mukundyo indo ni Nndumi, mashika elyi alemusauwa yeni uka elyo mbee naambo muwoni ukiro, mushillyiswaa Mmumuyo na iirikya dede;
53002014	yefyo Iruva alemuvaangya na Nrumi ya Nsia yei yeru, naambo muwoni itumbe lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo.
53002015	Kyasiany, vanavama, salaleny kyuumi, muwarani na mikaye ilya muleloshwa, kyikee kya marero ao kya barwa yei yeeru.
53002016	Na Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo we muni, na Iruva Nde weeru, yeu alelukunda kalusimba iviirywa muu yelyo lyishendee ivika nsia lya llung'anu kyeendwa ni isarya lyakwe,
53002017	namuviirye muu efo miriminy yaany, na imuvangisya efo irerony na ishoreny isha.
53003001	Na kya ifurumya, vanavama, luterevyeny, naambo irero lya Nndumi lyeende na mbee, nerumishwa kiwo shaasa kyikee efo kwany;
53003002	naambo lwauwa maakony a vandu valakee va usumanu, varavi, mashika vandu woose mmbatiri kikusiryo-fo.
53003003	Kyaindi we Nndumi ni nsaari mmbwe yeto ashemukaarisaa nemuringa mulaevetwa ni nravi yeto.
53003004	Neese mmbo lulevika Nndumi nsia kimaruma kyany, elyi muletana kilya lulemulosha, na mweengere itana indo.
53003005	Nndumi namutetere efo miriminy yaany naambo muwoni ikunda lya Iruva na usisiryo lwa Kristo.
53003006	Vanavama, mmbo lwamwiikimba na irina lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo, kwiiseny na wo nndu nkristo akee nroko, nta nalasoraa mikaaye ilya lulemulosha.
53003007	Yeni mwiishi shaasa kimusumannyi ilulatya mashika naakwa ni yese llulekaa kwany lulatiri waarya-fo;
53003008	nta llulelya shoonga ya nndu ruu-fo, mmbo lulelya shoonga lwannyivinnya nnu, lwirundaa kio na nsanyiny, naambo lulasheeva irio kwa nndu wa kwany na kava vi.
53003009	Nshi mashika elyi kulore lweetiri mumu-fo, kyaindi naambo lumureeye kyaaso kyeelola, mulusore yese.
53003010	Mashika naakwa nkyeeri kilya lweekee kwany mmbo lulemuvia mbony yei, sheelyi, kwakooya nndu nalakundye irunda, naasa, na shoonga nalailye-fo,
53003011	mashika lwiitye efo kwany kwiifo vandu valatiri uramba, valatiri ishora vakeerunda, kyaindi vakakwaataa-ata findony fya vengyi.
53003012	Kyasia yewo lwavaikimbany na ivavia na irina lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo, varunde mashora na usaari neelya shoonga vaivinnya wo veni.
53003013	Lyo yeni vanavama, mulafwe nrima kya itana mesha-fo.
53003014	Na kwakooya nndu moose ara nalawarya kirero kya barua yei yeeru na kava vi, kwiiseny nawe, nta mularere nawe-fo, naambo nasuke deny;
53003015	lyo mulamwaallwe nkiduva-fo, mmbo mumwiikimbaa sha umwi waany.
53003016	Kyasiany, Nndumi muni urilalyi we muni namulyimmyi urilalyi wo kyeeri shieny toose. Nndumi nakae neeni moose.
53003017	Yefi mfiidikiro fyakwa yeny Paulo, shareiya na woko lwakwa shimuni. Ekyi nkyo kiringyisyo barueny takwa toose, llo woko lwakwa.
53003018	Isarya lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo lyimukaye yeni moose.
54001001	Yeny Paulo, nrumi wa Kristo, kwi ivavaso lya Iruva akee Mwiikira weeru na Kristo Yesu akee ekyo luvikye nsia,
54001002	shakureiya yewe Timoteo, mwana-kwa efo kikusiryony. Isarya lya Iruva lyikee neewe, na ilyillyo, na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Kristo Yesu Nndumi weeru.
54001003	Shaasa shilekutereva kukae Efeso, kyeeri kilya shekeenda Makedonia, naambo kwiikimbe vengyi valashelosha ngyufundo tingyi;
54001004	nta valeshearanya ngyuraawe na nganunganu tilatiri umando, tishendee makusaro meengyi nta tilaryani na uvavaso lwa Iruva lwa iirikyo, naasa vaikimbe indo.
54001005	Na kyeefinga ivavaso elyo ni ukundi luukye nriminy nsha na makusaro mesha, na iirikyo lyilatiri ukunang'ari.
54001006	Vandu vengyi vakanra valalatya efi mmbo vankaa marerony a ing'ana.
54001007	Vakalanga iva veelosha va mavavaso, lla elyi valaishi songosiny efyo vakeerera.
54001008	Lyo lwiishi sheelyi uvavaso ni usha kwakooya nndu arunda nalo kya usumanu.
54001009	Navemanya irero elyi, sheelyi uvavaso llutiri mwaandu na nndu nsumanu-fo, kuuta yewo veerenga veni, neewo valakee vaarya, valaishi Iruva, valyamari, na vatefusu, neewo valashinndyaa Iruva, na veekapa vandeye vawo, na veekapa vamaye vawo, na vewaa.
54001010	Na vatuusi, vasodomi na veiiva vandu, vaongo, veelya mboo kya wongo; na kwakooya kwiiyo kindo kingyi kilaryani na ufundo lutiri muu.
54001011	Shaasa kikee kirere efo Nruminy ya Nsia ya itumbe lya Iruva yeto akee iitikiswa, yeyo shilerambikywa.
54001012	Neeny mmbo shaana Kristo Yesu akee Nndumi weeru, yeto aleshisimba finya mashika aleshilollya shikee mwaarya kashivika efo urundiny lwakwe.
54001013	Na kikava elyo mbee shekee nndu mwaarara, shafuluta vandu vengyi, shava nndu llyang'a, lyo shawonisa ilyillyo, mashika elyi shetana indo kikee kya urung'ani neelyi kulaore shetiri kikusiryo.
54001014	Na isarya lya Nndumi weeru mmbo lyileng'ana nnu kweru ando amwi na kikusiryo na ikunda yelyo lyuukye kwa Kristo Yesu.
54001015	Ni irero lyisumani iirikywa nalyo mmbo lyisumani ikusiryo deny, nalyo llyo elyi, Kristo Yesu mmbo alesha ulaniny nashekira valyamari, na wa mbee waawo ni yeny.
54001016	Lyo kimaruma kya vayo mmbo shilewona ilyillyo, naambo shikee yeny ni yeto wa mbee, Yesu Kristo noore-u usisiryo lwakwe loose, shiveva na kyaaso kyeelola kwa yewo vashenkusiryaa numa, naambo vawonise muu wa llung'anu.
54001017	Naasany ulaalu Mangyi yeto wa llung'anu, nalashidimaa ifwa, nta nalalolyoo mmiso, akee Iruva we muni, nawoni iindyo na nnduma mmbwakwe llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
54001018	Mwana-kwa Timoteo, mmbo shakurambikya ivavaso elyi kulyiringe kimaruma kya irero lya ukisuku llwa lulenkusongoya, naambo kimaruma kya vayo kukooye ikapana fira yeyo sheele;
54001019	kuraa kikusiryo na nrima nsha, efyo vandu vengyi valafisarye nawo vakarumaka elyi vauwa kikusiryo.
54001020	Nnang'ani ya yewo ni Himenayo na Iskanda, neewo mmbo shilevaniinga mmbishwa naambo navaloshe valasheyaarara-se Iruva.
54002001	Naasany kindo kya mbee kive ni fyeerero na fiterewo neeterevya vengyi Iruva ando amwi na fyaanu, efyo mufitani kimaruma kya vandu woose.
54002002	Kimaruma kya vamangyi neewo woose vatiri ushilyi, naambo luwoni suku shisha na ta urilalyi, lukee na waarya na utele.
54002003	Ekyi ni kindo kisha kikakundika neefo kwa Iruva akee Mwikira weeru.
54002004	Nawe mmbo akundye vandu woose vakirwa neekooya imanya ekyo kikee kya dede.
54002005	Kimmba Iruva ni umwi, na nsandi wa Iruva na vandu ni umwi, mmbwe Mwana yeto wa Nndu we Kristo Yesu;
54002006	mmbwe yeto alekurambikya-u we muni nave ukiro kwa woose, na ukiro elo mmbo lushevikyoo ukureekyi elyi kyeeri kya vayo kifikaa.
54002007	Na kimaruma kya vayo mmbo shilevikwa shive mwiivambisa na nrumi (mmbo sharera dede nta nshi wongo-fo), shive llori wa vandu va masanga efo kikusiryony kya dede.
54002008	Kimmba ni indo, mmbo shikundye vomi vaate miindye wo ando, veshiipoo maako awo vavikye vandu mbora kulaiyo ulai nta unyafi.
54002009	Na kiwo vaka, nawo vakushope na masara esikya mwiili ando amwi na wiindi usha, na nrima wa mwiiyanu, utore lwawo lulave lwa yooka fii, nta lweekwaamba mafura a wuuru ao lwa soori ta wuuru uniini.
54002010	Lyo luve lwa mashora mesha, shaasa kisumanyi vaka valya vatirye Iruva vyo.
54002011	Nndu nka nave mwaaranya sau needimi ikulosha findo, nave mfoo kyeeri kyoose,
54002012	Nndu nka nalaniingwa mwaanya wa ilosha-fo, nta ishillya nndumi-fo, namalallye sau.
54002013	Shamashika Adamu mmbwe alepooka yuumbwa na Eva kasorya.
54002014	Nta nshi Adamu alelembwa-fo, lyo nka mmbo alelembwa deny kaanga urekweny.
54002015	Lyo mmbo ashekirwa kimuukya efo vaniny vakwe, kwakooya vasinda iirikyony na ukundiny na ikwiilyisa, ando amwi na nrima wa mwiiyanu.
54003001	Nkindo kya dede, kwakooya nndu alanga iva askofu mmbo alanga ishora isha.
54003002	Kyasiany kindo kikooye askofu ni iva nndu nalarerwa kikasha, nndumi wa nka umwi, nave wa mwiiyanu na araiye urango, naveva nndu mwaarya, mwiambya vandu naveva nndu eeshi ilosha;
54003003	nta nalave nndu wa wari ao mwiikapana; lyo nave nndu mfoo; nta nalave nndu mwiillya ulai na vandu, nta nalave nndu mwiikunda fesa-fo;
54003004	naveva mwiisalallya kyeny kwakwe nisha neelosha vana vakwe vatire vyo;
54003005	(mashika lyo le, nndu nalashidimaa isalallya mmba yakwe muni, mmbo ashidimaa inda ivavara siri ya Iruva?)
54003006	Nta nalave nndu aangye siriny mikonu ya kufii, nalasheekurosa nawe uvingony lwa yeto nkumbi.
54003007	Lyingyi mmbo kisumani nave nndu akureekyo mesha mmbandu vengyi; naambo nalasheewa uvingony na nreiyony wa yeto nkumbi.
54003008	Kiwo na mashemasi nawo vave vandu vavaa iindyo; valatiri ulumi lwa ntambo, nta valave veena nnu mfinyo-fo, nta valalangaa fesa ya ntambo.
54003009	Vatire ngata ya iirikyo vekee na nrima nsaari.
54003010	Yeva nkuti valolwa mbele, llyo varundeny mashora a ushemasi, elyi vammaa imanyika mmbatiri kyiteve.
54003011	Na vaka vawo naawo, vave vasaari, nta valave vevikya vengyi ureeree, vave va mwiiyanu, vave vaarya findony fyoose.
54003012	Mashemasi nkuti vave vomi va nka umwi, vesalallya vana vawo nisha, na poo kwawo.
54003013	Mashika yewo veerunda mashora a ushemasi nisha mmbo vashewonisaa nnduma nsha, neewona ukaari usongovisi lwa iirikyo valuuta efo kwa Kristo Yesu.
54003014	Efi mmbo shafikureiya lyo shiivikye nsia wesha kwafo mikonu ya kufii.
54003015	Lyo kwallollya shakyeeyo, lyo manya-da shaasa kisumanyi vandu ikaa efo mmba ya Iruva, ikee nnyo siri ya Iruva muni muu, kaveva mmbwe ngo na uvasha lwa dede.
54003016	Na kyama yekyo kya weele nkiniini. Iruva mmbo aleorwa paa kwi ngata ya mwiili na ngata yeyo ya mumuyo ikammanya mmbo akee nsumanu. Kalollyo mmbasu kavambiswa masangeny, kavikwa nsia kunu masangeny. Kavikwa uwe efo itumbeny.
54004001	Naasany Mumuyo mmbo arera paa deny kyeyaamba sheelyi fyeeri fya ifurumya vandu vengyi mmbo vashelakanaa na iirikyo, vakutire na mimuyo yeyo ilembaa, na ngyufundo ta varumu;
54004002	veeriwa ni ukunang'ari lwa vandu va wongo, mirima yaawo ikorwaa mmuro;
54004003	veshimaa vandu valaore vaka, neevavikya ishingo lya shoonga eto Iruva aletivika-fo naambo lutiwarye lumwaani neewo vatiri kikusiryo vengere imanya dede yeyo.
54004004	Shamashika lyo wo kyuumbe kya Iruva mmbo kyikee kisha, nta nkwiifo kivaa ilema-fo kuuta ni ifiwarya lwishaanaa.
54004005	Mashika mmbo kikee kiilyise ni irero lya Iruva na fiterewo.
54004006	Kumbura Vakristo mbony yeto, neewe llyo kushevaa nndundi nsha wa Kristo Yesu, kuvemanya nisha ufundo lwa iirikyo ando amwi na ufundo lwa dede llwa kuleloshwa.
54004007	Lyo ngyuraawe ta kimiku tilakee ta siri, nkuti kutilemi, kuvekwiishivira iva nsaari.
54004008	Shamashika ikwiishivira iwona finya ya mwiili nkisha-da kyaindi usaari mmbo lukee usha kyeeri kyoose, mmbo lukee uvikye kyaasa kya muu wa ulaalu na ulya ushaa numa.
54004009	Ni irero lyeevikyo nsia, nalyo lyisumani iirikyo deny;
54004010	mashika mmbo lukee ikuvinisa nekwaatara kimaruma kya efi, mashika elyi lukusirye Iruva yeu muni muu, yeu avekee Mwiikira wa vandu woose, mmwasi yewo vakusirye.
54004011	Vavasya mbony yeti neetilosha.
54004012	Lola nndu moose nalasheemina ukoo lwafo-fo, mashika nkuti kuve kyaaso kwa yewo vakusirye, kwiireraa na kwiitanaa, na yoora ikunda na kikusiryo kisha.
54004013	Kutani elyi nshaa, kutakure isoma na iikimba neelosha.
54004014	Kulare kularunda na simbo yeyo kulesimbwa, nkimaruma kya ukisuku neelyi kuleekeryo maako a vamiku.
54004015	Swaangya nnu efyo, kukutire nafyo; naambo ivesyo lyafo lyikooye ilollyo mmbandu woose.
54004016	Kuringe kumuni kutire ufundo lwafo. Kusinde ufundony yelo mashika kwatana indo mmbo kusheashuka yewe kumuni ando amwi na yewo vekwaaranya.
54005001	Kulakyeemyi nndu mmiku-fo mmbo kumwiikimbaa sha ndoo, na vakoo sha vanavamau,
54005002	vaka vakuu kuvaikimbe sha mau, na vana va kyika sha vamfwamau, kutani indo na waarya nnu.
54005003	Indya nnu vaka va ding'u yewo vatiri wiindi.
54005004	Kyaindi kwankooya nka wa ding'u atiri vana ao vashuku, yeva vakuloshe itana efyo fivasumanyi efo kyeny kwawo veni, varundye vamiku vawo. Mashika ekyi nkyo kyisenyi kwa Iruva.
54005005	Na yeto akee nka wa dingu deny karewa muni, yeto we mmbo avikye Iruva nsia, kavesinda etereva na yeererya Iruva kio na nsanyiny.
54005006	Kyaindi yeto nalakuvavaraa muni mmbo afiiye na kikava akee na muu.
54005007	Naakwa ni efi fivavasye, naambo valawoni kiteve.
54005008	Lyo nndu yeto nalalolaa vandu vakwe, mmbo yewo va kyeny kwakwe muni, yeto mmbo amina iirikyo, kooka-fo kava nkasha ngota nndu nalakee nkristo.
54005009	Nka wa ding'u nalafitye myaaka 60 nalavaangwa nka wa ding'u-fo nawe nave ekee nka wa mmi umwi-nsi.
54005010	Nawe nkuti nakooye akureekyo mesha, kwakooya alerosa vana, neyaambya veny neesangya veele marende, na yeekya velyiswa ukyiva, neetana findo fisha etiri usau.
54005011	Lyo vaka va ding'u vakee vakoo kulavawarye-fo, mashika elyi vatirwa llango valalatya Kristo mmbo vashelangaa yoorwa.
54005012	Nawo mmbo vakaa uvingony mashika elyi vara kikusiryo kyawo kya mbee.
54005013	Na kya mmwasi mmbo vakulosha iva varoko, vakaringitya efo neefo mmba ku mmba, nta nshi vakee varoko-da-fo mmbo vavikya vengyi ureeree needola mbony ta vandu, vakooka-fo vakarera urere.
54005014	Kyasiany mmbo shaamba vaka yewo va ding'u valandenkwa, vaorwa vaire vana, vaidimi ikallya kyeny kwawo, naambo valasheelekeiya nkiduva yeto mwaanya wa ivautya kiteve.
54005015	Mashika kwiifo vengyi valemmaa iinduka vakasora mmbishwa.
54005016	Nka nkristo, kwakooya atiri vaka va ding'u, naveekye we muni, naambo Siri ilasheerovyo; naambo yo siri yeekye yewo vakee vaka va ding'u deny.
54005017	Vamiku yewo vakallya findo nisha vendyo nnu kavii kararu, mmwasi yewo vekwaatara ivambisa mbony neelosha.
54005018	Mashika mareiyo mmbo aamba, “Ng'umbe ikapaa nganu nnyivaa ifinga kana-fo.” Na kingyi-se, “Mwiirunda mmbo asumani weesi lwakwe.”
54005019	Kulawarye mwaandu wa nndu akeesalala na mmiku-fo, nkuti mbele kukee-u vakureekyi vavii vararu indi.
54005020	Valya vakeengera itana ulyamari vakyeemyi yoo mbee ya woose, naambo vengyi vaute-u iiryaa.
54005021	Mmbo shakuvavasya mbee ya Iruva, na mbee ya Kristo Yesu, na mbee ya vasu vakwe veele, salallya findo efyo nta kulaute uvingo uviny, nta kulatani kindo kweekundya-fo.
54005022	Kulaekyerye nndu maako kuladeesye nisha-fo, nta kulaange ulyamariny lwa vandu vengyi-fo. Kuringe kumuni kuve mwaarya deny.
54005023	Kipookya ulaalu kulani mura mweni-fo sanda-u mfinyo mwaangu kimaruma kyeevavyo nndeu, ando amwi na ndwari yeto takwaatara llya na llya.
54005024	Ngyulyamari ta vandu vengyi mmbo timanyikye paa, tikoora shaasa tikeerwaa vandu uvingony, vengyi ngyulyamari tawo tikavasora.
54005025	Kiwo indo na mashora mesha mmbo amanyikye paa, nta filya filalollyo paa mfishiidimaa ikusuruma-fo.
54006001	Valya woose vakee vafinge vakava mashinga, vairikye vanndumi vawo na ivaniinga wiindi loose, naambo irina lya Iruva lyilaararwa ando amwi na kiloshyo kyeru.
54006002	Na valya vanndumi vawo vakee Vakristo valavamini-fo; nkyeni vengere ivarundya, mashika yewo vakeefura kya urundi lwawo mmbo vatiri iirikyo lyeru vakaveekundwa. Losha findo efi na iikimba deny.
54006003	Kwakooya nndu moose alosha ufundo lungyi neera nalairikya irero elyo lya muu lya Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo na ufundo yelo lusheendee weele,
54006004	yeto mmbo ankurosa; nalaishi nta kindo, mmbo alyamarikye nrwe vakakusara mbony ta ivesa-vesa, na ulai lwa marero, neefo mfo kuukaa usuvanu, myaandu, na fyaararo, na nyinyira shikasha;
54006005	na ulai lwa vandu mirwe yaawo ilasongovye vakatura fya dede vakakusara sheelyi usaari ni shia ya iwonisa mbusha.
54006006	Kyaindi usaari na ira ifwaiya mmbusha niini.
54006007	Shamashika llulesha na kindo yaa ulaniny-fo, nta llushukaa-u na kindo-fo;
54006008	lyo kwakooya lutiri shoonga na soori teeraa mmbo lufuraa nafyo,
54006009	Indi yewo valangaa itira masaa mmbo vawee nreiyony na fyeesony, na langony shiingyi tilatiri nrwe, tivavisaa, yeto tirwaa vandu uretiny na urumatony.
54006010	Mashika kimayeny kyimwi kya uravi lwa wo ngata ni ikunda fesa, nayo elyi vengyi vanyiilanga nnu vakalakana na iirikyo, neekwaatara na mavavyo meengyi.
54006011	Lyo yewe, kukee nndu wa Iruva, kutirishe findo efyo; kusore usumanu, usaari, iirikyo, ukundi, usisiryo, ufoo.
54006012	Kapana fira yeyo sheele ya iirikyo, tira muu eto wa llung'anu kukee mmbaangye, kutani kulekureeka ukureekyi llwa usha mbee ya vakureekyi veengyi.
54006013	Mmbo shakuvavasa na irina lya Iruva, yeto aniinga fyuumbe fyoose muu, na lya Kristo Yesu, ulya alekureeka ukureekyi llwa usha mbee ya Pontio Pilato.
54006014	Ringa ivavaso elyi nisha, kulaiyo kiteve, kutani nkonu yeto Nndumi Yesu Kristo asheorwaa paa.
54006015	Nawe elyi kyeeri kyakwe kifikaa eshekooraa paa, niwe yeto akee iindyo, kava mmbwe muni wiidimi, kaveva Mangyi ya vamangyi, na Nndumi wa woose;
54006016	mmbwe muni nalasheywaa ni ufu, mmbo akee itumbeny lyilavaa ifikya, nta kulaifo nndu alemmulollya na miso yaa, nta nalashidimaa illolya. Wiindi na wiidimi llwakwe fika llunganu. Amen.
54006017	Yewo vakee masimba yaa ulaniny yelu vavie valakushope-fo, nta valakusirye usimba elo lulakee lwa dede-fo, kyaindi vavike Iruva nsia yeto aluniinga findo fyoose shapu naambo lurunde nafyo neefura.
54006018	Vavie vatani mesha, vave masimba kyeetana mesha, vavetira maako iniingya masaa awo, vasange na vandu vengyi veetiri nrima mwaa.
54006019	Ni indo vasurumi umasi usha efo lukeenda nafo, vashewonisaa muu yeto ukee wa dede deny.
54006020	Ewe Timoteo, ringa nnu isaa elyo; kukwiise na marero alakee a ki-Iruva, alatiri urango, na fiwakyanu fya urango lulakee urango dede,
54006021	na vengyi elyi vakeisora vakara kikusiryo kya dede. Isarya lya Iruva lyimukaye.
55001001	Ni yeny Paulo, nrumi wa Kristo Yesu, shaasa Iruva akundye; kimaruma kya kyaasa kya muu yeto wa Kristo Yesu.
55001002	Shakureiya yewe Timoteo mwana-kwa nkunde. Isarya lyikae neewe, na ilyillyo, na urilalyi luukye efo kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Kristo Yesu we Nndumi weeru.
55001003	Mmbo nkeyaana Iruva, yeto nkemwiindya na nrima mwaa uka elyo kyeeri kya vakuu vakwa, shaasa shikeekukumbwa yewe kyeeri kyoose shiiterevaa kio na nsanyiny.
55001004	Shavelanga nnu ikulollya, shaishwa ifura nnu elyi nkumbwaa kya misoru yafo.
55001005	Na kikusiryo kyafo kilatiri ukunang'ari, shaasa kikusiryo kya kyekuwo Loisi kyeekai na mau we Eonike, neeny shiishi neewe kutiri kikusiryo sheekyo.
55001006	Kyikeeny indo, mmbo nkeekukumbura kunangise nnu simbo yeyo ya Iruva kulesimbwa llya kuleekeryo maako akwa.
55001007	Mashika Iruva nnyaleluniinga nrima wa weerei-fo, mmbo aleluniinga nrima wa ukaari na wa ikunda ukaveva wa mwiiyanu.
55001008	Naasany kulairyee sony ukureekyi lwa Nndumi weeru-fo, nta kulashiirye sony yeny shikee mfingwa wakwe-fo, lyo sisirya makasha yoo ando amwi neeny kimaruma kya Nrumi ya Nsia, kiinani na wiidimi lwa Iruva;
55001009	mmbwe alelukira kalweengye uvaango weele, nshi kimaruma kya mashora eru-fo, kyaindi nkya isarya lyakwe shaasa alekunda we muni. Isarya yelyo mmbo lulesimbwa kyuuka na Kristo Yesu uka llung'anu,
55001010	kyeeri ekyi kikaorwa paa llya Kristo Yesu Nkira weeru alefumirwa paa kweru, yeto alevinga ufu na iloora muu na uvingyi kyeendwa ni Nrumi ya Nsia
55001011	na kimaruma kya vayo llyo shilealuwa mwiivambisa na nrumi na mwiilosha.
55001012	Na kimaruma kya vayo shawona ngatara yeti, nta nshitirwa nnyinyira-fo, mashika shiishi yeto shinkusirye, neemanya deny sheelyi ashiidimaa isheekya iringa ekyo shilerambikywa kufike nkonu yeto ushaa.
55001013	Tira kyaaso kya marero yoo atiri muu kuleeta kwakwa efo kikusiryony na ukundiny lwa Kristo Yesu.
55001014	Ringa nnu ekyo kulerambikywa ni Mumuyo Mweele yeto akee nnang'ani yeeru.
55001015	Shikusara kwiishi sheelyi valya va Asia mmbo valelakana na yeny, nnang'ani yaawo ni Figelo na Hermogene.
55001016	Mmbo shatereva Iruva navikye mbora valya va mmba ya Onesiforo; mashika mmbo aleshiviiryaa muu keengyi nnu, nta nnyaleshiirya sony mashika elyi shikee mfinge-fo.
55001017	Lyo kyeeri ekee kunu Roma mmbo aleshiruuya na sina katana ashikooya.
55001018	Nndumi nanniinge iwona ilyillyo misony akwe elyi nkonu weefurumya. Na shaasa aleshifurukannya nnu kulya Efeso yewe kwiishi nnu.
55002001	Kyasiany, yewe mwana-kwa wona ikaariswa ni isarya lya Kristo Yesu.
55002002	Na mbony tilya kuletiita kwakwa kwiiyo vakureekyi veengyi, tirambikye vandu yewo vasaari yewo vashidimaa ilosha na vengyi.
55002003	Sisirya ngatara ando amwi neeny, kuve sha nsikari nsha wa Kristo Yesu.
55002004	Nkwiifo mwiikapana fira akwaata ngusaniny ta ulana elu needimi isenya yeto mwimmbika-fo.
55002005	Na nndu mwiiwakyana efo fitavanuny nnyawonaa ureto kanra nalawakyana kisumani-fo.
55002006	Mmbo kikooye nremi ankwaatara na mashora akwe nasonngwe we iwona-u waavi lwakwe.
55002007	Soongya nnu yeki nkeekuvia, mashika ni Nndumi ashekurangusaa kya findo fyoose.
55002008	Nkye kummbwa Yesu Kristo ulya aleruka auka kwa vafu, akee wa ufyari lwa Davidi shaasa Nrumi ya Nsia yaamba.
55002009	Neeny mmbo shilelyiswa ukiva kimaruma kya vayo kutani shifingwaa sha nndu mwiitana maravi; lyoony, irero lya Iruva llyivaa ifinga-fo.
55002010	Kyeendwa llyo mmbo nkeesisirya fyoose, kimaruma kyeewo vasauwe, naambo nawo vakooye ukiro elo lweendwa ni Kristo Yesu, ando amwi na itumbe lya llung'anu.
55002011	Ni irero lyisumani iirikyo deny. Shamashika kwakooya lwafwa nawe, mmbo luverutwaa ando amwi nawe.
55002012	Kwakooya lwasisirya, mmbo lusheshillyaa ando amwi nawe. Kwakooya lwankana we naakwa niwe mmbo ashelukanaa yese;
55002013	Kwakooya yese lulakusirye-u we mmbo eengera iva nsaari. Mashika we nnyashiidimaa ikukana we muni-fo.
55002014	Nkye vakumbure mbony yeto kuvevaikimba na irina lya Iruva, naambo valashellya ulai lulatiri mbusha, yelo lulyamaraa yewo vearanya.
55002015	Kaarya nnu yoora sheelyi ni Iruva akusauye, kwaveva nndundi nalatiri nyinyira, kwavesalallya irero lya dede.
55002016	Kwiise nnu na marero a ing'ana alakee a ki-Iruva, mashika yewo mmbo vasheengeraa nnu na uravi,
55002017	na marero awo mmbo ashekwaanaa ree sha itiinga ikasha. Vandu va ngata yeyo nsha Himenayo na Fileto,
55002018	nawo mmbo valenreta ekyo kya dede, vakaveamba mwaandu wa ifurummya ulemmaa iira indo kikava nkyo kyeeveta iirikyo lya veengyi.
55002019	Kyaindi lyo irero lya Iruva lyivangyi, lyikavikywa na kiringisyo ekyi, kyeyaamba, Nndumi eeshi yewo vakee vakwe, na kingyi-se, yeto moose mwiisenda Irina lya Nndumi nare uravi lakwe.
55002020	Kyasiany efo mmba ya Nndumi nshi kwiifo fiiya fya saabu na fya fesa-da-fo, kuveefo na fya firi na fya uteeri, fingyi fitiri nnduma deny, na fingyi mfitiri-fo.
55002021	Naasany kwakooya nndu akusongosye elyi akwiisa na vandu yewo, mmbo ashevakaa kiiya kilya kitiri nnduma, kyisennyi Nndumi, kyikee kideesye kirunde mashora mesha.
55002022	Naasany kukwiise lango yeto ta ukoony, kusore usumanu na iirikyo, ukundi, urilalyi kwikee na valya vakeevaanga Nndumi vekee na nrima wa dede.
55002023	Lyo marero a utondo evesa-vesa alemi mashika nshi a urango-fo, nang'u mmbo ashendee myaandu tupu.
55002024	Na nkivaa nndundi wa Nndumi nave nndu wa myaandu-fo. Mmbo akundyo nave nndu mmamiri kwa vandu woose, eeshi ilosha, atiri usisiryo.
55002025	Na vandu yewo vawakyanaa nawe navaikimbe na ufoo, naambo kwakooya kiivaa naambo Iruva naveekye vakurye neemanya dede yeyo.
55002026	Naambo urango luvawuiye, vauke efo nreiyony wa yeto nkumbi alevareiya, vakatana efyo finsennyi.
55003001	Lyo manya mbony yei, sheelyi kyeeri kya ifurummya mmbo kusheshaa mikonu yeeresye.
55003002	Mashika vandu mmbo vashekukundaa wo veni, valange nnu fesa, vave vekurumisha veni, veekung'anisa, vearara, valashinndyaa vamiku vawo, nta valakee vandu va kyaanu, valakee va miriminy,
55003003	valakundye va kyeny kwawo, nta valakundye isaryana na vengyi, vakava vevikya ureeree, valasiraa ngoo vakava vanyaasi, nta valalangye ngata shoose ya usha na umamiri.
55003004	Mmbo vakee veeriingya vengyi, vakatira utiilyi, neekung'anisa, vakakunda lango ta mwiili ngota ikunda Iruva.
55003005	Vakava sheelyi ni vandu vesha ate lyo mmbo valemmyi ekyo deny. Yewo woose kukwiise nawo.
55003006	Nnang'ani yaawo mmbo kwiifony na valya vakwaataa efo mmbeny ta vandu, vakakamara-fo mifungwa vaka yewo varavi varye maryo a ulyamari, na ilamyo ni lango ta ngata shiingyi;
55003007	vakakwiishivirya-fo indo wo nkonu naambo valasheefikya dede yeyo irye urango.
55003008	Na kivaka llya Yane na Yambre valesalala na Mose kyellema, ni indo neeva mmbo vakelemana na dede yeyo; yewo ni vandu vallyamarikyo mmirwe, vakakaa kwaasha na mbony ta iirikyo.
55003009	Lyo nshi vafikaa kwaasha nta-fo, mashika urung'ani elu lwawo lwammelollyo mmbandu woose, shaasa na urung'ani lwa yewo lulelollyo paa.
55003010	Lyo yewe mmbo kulelatya ufundo lwakwa, na ngaa yakwa, na kilya shikundye itana, na iirikyo, na usisiryo,
55003011	na ukundi, na ivereya, na ngatara eti takwa na makyiva yaa, na filya fileshikooya kulya Antiokia, na Ikonio na Listra, ngata toose ta ngatara yeto shiletisisirya; nawe Nndumi kashaauwa efo koose.
55003012	Ee deny, neewo woose valangye muu mweele mmbo vasheminwaa.
55003013	Lyo vandu vakasha na velemba vasheengeraa ikaafo, na yeengera iraveeka, velembaa neelembwa.
55003014	Kyaindi yewe kutire na filya kuleloshwa neesununndyo, mashika kwiishi ni kwa vaki kulekulosha kwawo;
55003015	neewe lyo uka udu lwafo mmbo kuleloshwa mareiyo meele kwaamanya, nang'u ng'u akurangusaa kuwoni ukiro lukuukya efo kikusiryony kwa Yesu Kristo.
55003016	Mareiyo moose atiri Mumuyo wa Iruva mmbo avaa kwa ilosha, na kwa iikimba vandu makasha awo na kwa ivatetera, neevavika ngeeny ya songosiny ikee ya usumanu.
55003017	Naambo nndu moose akee wa Iruva nasongovike neekaariswa naambo needimi itana findo fyoose nisha.
55004001	Mmbo sheengera ikuvavasa-se na irina lya Iruva, na lya Kristo Yesu yeto asheutyaa vakee na muu na vafu uvingo, elyi ashelolywa paa we na umangyi lwakwe;
55004002	vambisa irero lya Iruva, kyeeri kyisenyi na kyeeri kyilasennyi, sakira na ikyeemya, na iikimba kwikee na usisiryo loose kwiloshaa.
55004003	Mashika kwiikaa kushe fyeeri vashelemaa kiloshyo ekyo kirye muu, lyo kimaruma kyeesora makusaro awo veni mmbo vashekuwonisyaa veelosha nkuka maronda na maronda, ni elyi vatiri maarwi enunnwa.
55004004	Nawo mmbo vashekwiisaa naambo valeete efyo fikee fya dede, vendukye ngyuraawe ta wongo.
55004005	Kyaindi yewe, va na mwiiyanu findony fyafo fyoose, sisirya makasha, runda ishora lya mwiivambisa Nrumi ya Nsia, kwiinutye urundi lwafo.
55004006	Mashika yeny ulaalu nkimwi sheelyi nkeepusuwa sha mura, nkyo kyeeri kya ifwa lyakwa mmbo kyamfika.
55004007	Mmbo shikapanaa fira shisha shyaawutye kyaaro kyakwa, shiringe iirikyo.
55004008	Mafurumyony a vayo mmbo shikee n-deesye ureto lwa usumanu, elo Nndumi yeu mwirummbwa usumanu asheshiniingaa nkonu yeto, nta nshi yeny shimuni-fo, ni ando amwi na vandu woose yewo valelanga ilollya ifumirwa lyakwe.
55004009	Kutakure isha kwakwa uviny.
55004010	Mashika Dema mmbo alelakana neeny, kalanga ulana elu, kakwiipoo keenda Tesalonike, na Kreske mmbo aleenda Galatia; na Tito Dalmatia,
55004011	ni Luka muni akee yaa ando amwi neeny. Ipoo Marko kushe nawe, mashika ashisennyi nnu urundiny lwakwe.
55004012	Kyaindi we Tikiko mmbo shilenruma Efeso.
55004013	Osho na ikoti lya shilelyira kwa Karpo efo Troa, ando amwi na fitabu filya, mmwasi filya fya shony.
55004014	Mfuru ulya wa minya ya arera we Iskanda mmbo aleshitannya findo firavi nnu; nawe Nndumi mmbo ashentaa kiinani na mitannyi yakwe.
55004015	Neewe kwiise nawe, mashika mmbo alemina nnu ufundo lweru.
55004016	Kindo kya mbee shilelollya, nkwiifo nndu alesalala taari yakwa-fo. Woose mmbo valeshira. Neeny mmbo shatereva Iruva nalasheevautya uvingo kimaruma kya vayo.
55004017	Lyo Nndumi mmbo aleshisalallya kashiniinga finya, naambo, kyeendwa ni urundi lwakwa naambo nrumi yeyo yaambawa kisumani, naambo vandu va masanga moose veete; neeny lyo shaauwa efo kaniny ka miiso.
55004018	Nawe Nndumi mmbo asheshaauwaa efo nrengeny toose, neeshiringa kutani shafikya umangyi lwakwe lwa iruvee-u. Nnduma mmbwakwe we fika llun'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
55004019	Shiidikirya Priska na Akila, na valya va kyeny kwa Onesiforo.
55004020	Erasto mmbo alekaa Korinto. Trofimu mmbo shilenra Mileto elwee.
55004021	Kutakure isha kulaore kyeeri kya mbeo kyansha. Eubulo akwiidikira, na Pude na Lino, na Klaudio na vakristo woose da.
55004022	Naasa Nndumi nakae na nrima wafo. Isarya lyimukae.
56001001	Yeny Paulo, shikee ishinga lya Iruva, na nrumi wa Yesu Kristo, kimaruma kya kikusiryo kya vasauwe va Iruva, na wiidimi lweemanya dede ilya ishendee muu nsha.
56001002	Na ivika nsia kya muu wa llung'anu, yeto Iruva yeu nalashambaa wongo aleluvikya nsia uka elyo mbee.
56001003	Kavasukuya irero lyakwe elyi kyeeri kyakwe kyileinana kya nrumi ilya shilerambikywa kwi ivavasyo lya Nkira weeru we Iruva.
56001004	Yewe Tito, mwana-kwa kunu iirikyony elyi lukee ilyivambisa. Isarya lyikae neewe na urilalyi luukye kwa Iruva Nde na kwa Kristo Yesu Mwiikira weeru.
56001005	Nkyo kimaruma shilekura Krete, naambo kutumbani filya fyeanguye, neevika vamiku va siri wo muri shaasa llya shilekuvavasya;
56001006	kwakooya nndu nalatiri kiteve nawe ni nndu wa nka umwi, na vana vakwe vatiri iirikyo, nta valarerwaa kya ukasha nta valakee valyang'a.
56001007	Mashika mmbo kisumani askofu nave nndu nalatiri kiteve, mashika mmbo akee nngari wa Iruva; nta nalave nndu akukundye we muni-fo, nalave mwaangu irosa unyafi-fo ao mwinangwa mmbwari na mwikunda myaandu-fo, nta nalave mwikuwonisya kindo kilasumani-fo.
56001008	Lyo nave nndu alangye yaambya vandu, alangye mesha, wa mwiiyanu, wa usumanu, mweele, ashiidimaa isira ngata yakwe muni.
56001009	Mwikallya irero elyo lya kikusiryo shaasa llya aleloshwa, indo llyo ashiidimaa ilosha vandu evaikimbaa na ufundo elo lwa muu naveidima ivinga yewo vesalala ao vekukyikyisaa nawe.
56001010	Mashika veefo veengyi valakeekiita kindo vavioo, vatiri marero alatiri urango, valembaa vengyi, mmwasi ni yewo veerinwa, na yewo lyo nkuti vafindikirwa kana.
56001011	Yewo mmbo vakee ireta vandu va mmba shoose, vevaloshaa findo filavasumannyi kimaruma kya ikuwonisya findo fya sony.
56001012	Kwiifo nndu umwi wa kwawo ekee nkisuku karera indi kyawo, “Vakrete ni vandu va wongo kyeeri kyoose, mmbo vavakye mafisi maravi, veetalauwa ndeu vakaveva varoko.”
56001013	Ukureekyi yelo ni lwa dede. Kikeeny indo vakyeemyi na finya, naambo vakooye itumaa iirikyony;
56001014	valashearanya nganu nganu ta Kiyuda, nta ilatya mavavasyo a vandu vareeye filya fikee fya dede.
56001015	Findo fyoose mmbo fikee fyeeremutu kwa yewo va usumanu; lyo nkwiifo kyikee kyeeremutu kwa yewo vakyirinda, na kwa yewo valairikye-fo, mashika makusaro awo mmbo akee matefusu na mirima yawo kiwo.
56001016	Vakaamba mmbo vaishi Iruva, lyo na ngaa tawo mmbo vakee inkana; mmbo vatanaa fya yeende unyafi, vakava filemi, valavaa nta kwa kindo kisha.
56002001	Kyaindi yewe rera findo efyo fikwaani na ufundo elo lutiri muu,
56002002	kyeyaamba vamiku vave na mwiiyanu, vakae na wiindi, na waarya vantumaa kikusiryony na ukundiny neeva na usisiryo.
56002003	Kiwo na vamiku va kyika vakae na mikaaye myeeele; valave vevikya vengyi ureeree, valave veena nnu wari, lyo valoshe vengyi findo fya usumanu;
56002004	naambo varanguse vaka vakoo naambo vakunde womi vawo na vana vawo nisha.
56002005	Vave na mwiiyanu, na waa lwa nrima, varundye kyeny kwawo, vave vasaari, vendye womi vawo; naambo Irero lya Iruva lyilawoni yaararwa.
56002006	Ni indo na vana vakoo va kyuumi kuvaikyimbe vave na mwiiyanu;
56002007	yewe kumuni kuve kyaaso kyisha kyeelolwa kwikee na mweendo usennyi findony fyafo fyoose, neefo ufundony lwafo koore woorotu na usaari.
56002008	Kuvetira na marero atiri muu nalavaa yuutyo uvingo, naambo yewo velema efyo vakooye isuka kyeeri vakooyaa valatiri kikasha kyeerera uwe yeeru.
56002009	Yewo vakee mashinga vaindye vanndumi vawo, vavasenyi findony fyoose; valatire ng'anyi.
56002010	Valave veevi; lyo vaore usha lwawo woose, naambo vashope ufundo lwa Mwikira we Iruva weeru findony fyoose.
56002011	Mashika isarya lya Iruva yelyo lyikiraa vandu woose lyammaa yoorwa paa;
56002012	nalyo mmbo lyalulosha ilema uravi na lango ta kiulana; naambo lukooye ikaa na mwiiyanu, usumanu, usongovisi, yaa ulaniny yelu lwa inu,
56002013	lwiivereyaa na nsia ekyo kyeende mbora na yoorwa itumbe lya Kristo Yesu, Iruva mmbwe akee Mwiikira weeru;
