56002014	yeto alekuuta we muni kimaruma kyeru, naambo naluute efo maraviny moose, nelyise vandu yewo va ushilyi lwakwe muni, vatiri umale lweetana mashora mesha.
56002015	Ongoya vandu mbony yeti, ikimba na isakyira nookaari loose, nta kulave nndu akumina.
56003001	Kumbura vandu yewo ikunyiisya yewo vatiri wiidimi na ushilyi, vavaindye, neekunda itana mashora mesha;
56003002	valave vearara vandu, valave veruuya myaandu, vave vasaari, vaore urilalyi lwawo kwa vandu woose.
56003003	Mashika elyo mbee naakwa ni yese llweetiri urango-fo, mmbo lwekee varavi, lukalembika, lwiirundyaa lango sheesi ta wo ngata, lwiisindaa uraviny na ukasha neesuvana na vengyi.
56003004	Kyaindi kimaruma kya usha lwa Iruva yeu akee Mwikira weeru, na ukundi lwakwe kwa vandu yelo luleorwa paa kalukira;
56003005	nshi kimaruma kya mashora mesha luletana yese-fo, nkimaruma kya ilyillya lyakwe, luleona llya luleirwa lya kavii na ivikwa wiiya kyuuka na Mumuyo Mweele.
56003006	Yeto luleirityo shapu kyeendwa ni Yesu Kristo Mwikira weeru;
56003007	naambo elyi lukee ekenywa usumanu kyeendwa ni isarya lyakwe, lukooye ivikwa veni ding'u ya muu wa llung'anu, shaasa iirikyo lyeru lyikai.
56003008	Ni irero lya iirikyo dede; na mbony yeto mmbo shikundye kutaambe na ukaari, naambo valya valeirikya Iruva vakummbwe ikaa na mweendo nsha. Efyo mfisha nafyo fitiri mbusha kwa vandu.
56003009	Kyaindi lyo marero a ulai kukwiise nang'u na nganunganu, na myaandu, na ulai lwa mbony toorokye. Mashika efyo mfitiri mbusha-fo nta urango-fo.
56003010	Nndu wa urere, kwammwiikimba lyimwi, kavii, llemi.
56003011	Kwammemanya nndu sheeto mmbo eevekye katana ulyamari neekuutya uvingo we muni.
56003012	Elyi shirumaa Artema ao Tikiko kwafo kutakure isha kwakwa kunu Nikapoli; mashika mmbo shikundye ikaa kunu kyeeri kya mbeo.
56003013	Ruma Zena ulya mwivavara mbony, na Apolo kwa ifura deny, valaanguyo nta nkindo-fo.
56003014	Vandu veru vakuloshe itira maako neetana findo fisha naambo valave sha vandu valavikaa ndunda.
56003015	Yeva woose shikee nawo vakwiidikira. Lwiidikirye valya valukundye efo iirikyony. Isarya lyimukaye yeni moose.
57001001	Ni yeny Paulo, mfingwa wa Kristo Yesu, na Timoteo mwanamaye weeru shakureiya yewe Filemoni nkunde weeru, mwaakana mashora yaa neese,
57001002	na kwa Afia, mwanamaye weeru, na Arkipo nsikari uroyeeru, na kwa siri yeyo ikee efo mmba kwafo.
57001003	Isarya lyimukaye na urilalyi lyuukye kwa Iruva Nde weeru na kwa Nndumi Yesu Kristo.
57001004	Mmbo nkeyaana Iruva wakwa nkonu simu, shiikukumbwaa efo fiterewony fyakwa.
57001005	Elyi nkeeiita mbony ta ikunda lyafo na kikusiryo kyafo kwa Nndumi Yesu na kwa veele woose.
57001006	Naambo ukulungo lwa iirikyo lyafo lurunde mashora mesha a urango kwi Kristo.
57001007	Mashika mmbo shiletirwa ni ifura iniini na iviiryo muu kimaruma kya ikunda lyafo, mashika mirima ya vandu veele mmbo ilevangiswa nnu mwanamaye weeru.
57001008	Naasany, lla elyi shitiri ukaari uniini efo kwa Kristo kyeeri nkekuvavasya efyo fikwani na yewe,
57001009	nkyo kimaruma kya ikunda lyeru mmbo shakutereva, shaasa shifye, yeny Paulo yaa ukuuny lwakwa, shivekee mfinge, kimaruma kya Kristo Yesu.
57001010	Mmbo shikee ikutereva kimaruma kya mwana yeto wakwa Onesimo yeto shilemwiira shikee mfinge.
57001011	Yeto mapookyony kulaore etiri mbusha kwafo lyo ulaalu mmbo akweekyaa deny, yewe na yeny-da.
57001012	Na yeny shanruma kwafo, kasha we muni, ekee na nrima wa ngata yakwa deny.
57001013	Na yeny lyo mmbo shelanngye nakae mbele kunu kwakwa naambo nashirundye ando afo elyi nkee kifingyony ekyi kya Nrumi ya Nsia.
57001014	Lyo nta nshilekunda itana kindo kulore shakuvesa mbele-fo, naambo usha lwafo lulasheeva sha kindo kwaitikywa, kyaindi kive kya ikunda.
57001015	Mashika kulakooye nkyo kimaruma ekaa kwaasha neewe ando a kirambo, naambo nashekaany kwafo deny.
57001016	Uka ulaalu nshi akyikee-se ishinga-fo, lyo ni mmwasi ya ishinga, mwanamaye-akwa nkunde, kwakwa yeny na kwafo yewe ni mmwasi lukee na mwiili.
57001017	Naasany kwakooya kulollye yeny shikee umwi neewe, warya yeu shaasa kweeshiwaryaa yeny.
57001018	Na kwakooya alenkulemba kindo, ao kwakooya atiri sye yafo, findo efyo reiya shitaa yeny.
57001019	Ni yeny Paulo shareiya na woko lwakwa shimuni, yeny mmbo nshekutaa. Nta nshikeekuvia mmbo kukee wa sye kwakwa-fo.
57001020	Naasany mwanamaye wakwa, na shiwoni mbusha kwafo kimaruma kya Nndumi, shiviirya muu kimaruma kya Kristo.
57001021	Kimmba shikwiirikye kya wiindi lwafo nkyo kimaruma neeny shakureiya barwa yei, shiivikye nsia sheelyi mmbo kutanaa nisha mmwasi ngota efi nkeekuvia.
57001022	Ando amwi neefyo mmbo shakutereva kushideesye ando ekaa, mashika mmbo shivikye nsia sheelyi kyeendwa ni fiterewo fyany, mulyimyoo ishiwonisa.
57001023	Epafra yeu akee mfinge ando amwi neeny akwiidikira.
57001024	Na Marko na Aristariko, na Dema na Luka, vakee veerunda ando amwi neeny.
57001025	Isarya lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo lyimukaye miriminy yaany.
58001001	Iruva mmbo alerera neese kasha kalya ka vande veru wo vakisuku, karera na shia shiingyi na kundo kwiingyi.
58001002	Matika yaa a ulaalu mmbo arera neese na shia ya Mwana wakwe, yeto alemmbika nave muya ding'u wa fyoose, na kyeendwa mmbwe kaumba ulana loose.
58001003	Kimmba we akee ngyesa ya usuri lwakwe na wende lwakwe, eshipoo fyoose na ivavaso lya wiidimi lwakwe, ekimaa ivika wiilyiso lwa ulyamari, mmbo alekaa rembo woko usha lwa Uniini lwakwe efo iruveeu;
58001004	mmbo alevikwa nailanyi vasu woose, shaasa irina elyo lyikee ding'u yakwe lyileng'annya lyawo.
58001005	Mashika lyo mmbo alemmivia nsu ungau nta lyimwi, Nnyewe mwana-kwa, “Inu mmbo shakwiira.” Na lyingyi, “Neeny mmbo nshevaa Nde kwakwe nawe kwakwa nave mwana.”
58001006	Na lyingyi-se, elyi aende mwana wakwe mmbee ulaniny kaamba, “Vasu woose va Iruva vamfiirye ndi.”
58001007	Na kya vasu kaamba, “Yeto avika vasu vakwe vave va ngata ya mumuyo, na varundi vakwe vave fipalapala fya muro.”
58001008	Kyaindi kya mbony ta mwana mmbo aamba, “Kitima kyafo kya itumbe, woi Iruva nkya llung'anu na llung'anu; na rungu ya umangyi lwafo ni ya usumanu.
58001009	Mmbo kwalanga usumanu, kwasua uravi. Naasany Iruva, we Iruva wafo, ankwaamba mafura, mafura a nsia ngota a wooroo.”
58001010	Na lyingyi, yewe, Nndumi, llya kipooka mmbo kulevika uvasha lwa ulana, “Na iruveeu mmashora a maako afo.
58001011	Yefyo fyoose fishelyamarikaa, lyo yewe kushesalala-u, nato shoose tisheekaa sha soori.
58001012	Kushetilemaa sha masara, nato taalashike. Kyaindi yewe mmbwe ulya da, na fyeeri fyafo mfishemandaa-fo.”
58001013	A ndesa kwiifo nsu alemmuvia nta lyimwi, “Kaa yewe yoo woko lwakwa usha, kutani shavika vakiduva vafo yoo si ya ngyayo tafo?”
58001014	A yeyo myoose nshi mimuyo mifurukani, yeerumwa indefurukannya valya vashevaa veni ding'u ya ukiro?
58002001	Kyasiany mmbo kilukooye ilola nnu efyo fileitiwa naambo lulasheefitura.
58002002	Mashika kwankooya irero llya lyilererwa ni nsu lyekee iniini, na wo urekwa na uravi lukawonisa weesi lwa usumanu,
58002003	a yese mmbo lusheturunyaa inda, lukanra lulasara ukiro elu uniini indi? Nalo Nndumi alerera kya vayo mapookyony, numa lukakoora kweru paa kyuuka kwa valya valeita.
58002004	Iruva nawe evikaa ukureekyi ando amwi nawo na ngyende na findo filandelollyo na finya ta ngata shiingyi, na yaavyo Mumuyo Mweele, shaasa alekukundya we muni.
58002005	Mashika ulana llwa lukeesha lukeerera mbony ta vayo nnyaleluvika si ya vasu-fo, mashika kwiifo nndu umwi alekureeka kya vayo kaamba,
58002006	A nndu wa vandu nkyokyi kutani kwankumbwa, ao mwana wa nndu, kutani kwallola?
58002007	Mmbo kulemuumba nave n-du deny ngota nsu kwambika ureto lwa itumbe na wiindi kwambika uwe ya mashora a maako afo.
58002008	Mmbo kuvikye findo fyoose yoo si ya uvayo lwakwe. Mashika elyi kulevika findo fyoose si yakwe nnyalera-fo kindo nta kimwi kilakee si yakwe-fo. Kyaindi lyo llwalelollya findo fyoose fivikwa si yakwe-fo,
58002009	lyo yeto aletanwa n-du deny ngota vasu lullollye, mmbwe Yesu, mashika a ivavyo fika ufu, kavikwa ureto lwa itumbe na nnduma, naambo kyeendwa ni isarya lya Iruva na shoshe ufu kimaruma kya vandu woose.
58002010	Mashika yeto kyeendwa mmbwe na kwa kimaruma kyakwe findo fyoose fiiyo, mmbo kyilenkooya nawoni vana veengyi vafikye itumbe, na yaawutya yeto nniini mweende ukiro na shia ya makiva.
58002011	Mashika yeto mwiilyisa na yewo veilyiswa, woose nkwa umwi vammyi. Kimmba kya ekyo nnyalollye sony ivavaanga vanavamaye-fo;
58002012	llya aamba, Mmbo nshevambisaa irina lyafo kwa vanavama. Efo mmba ya Iruva nshekwimbyaa kyerumisha,
58002013	Na lyingyi, Mmbwe yeto nshemmbikaa nsia. Na lyingyise, Lola, yeny shikee yaa na vana yewo Iruva aleshivaniinga.
58002014	Naasany, kyimmba vana valeakaniswa samu na mwiili, nawe ni indo-da aleveakana efyo fyeni, naambo kyeendwa ni shia yeyo ya ufu narumate yeto atiri finya ta ufu, we Nkumbi,
58002015	naambo naleke yewo woose muu wao wekee ushingeny kimaruma kya weerei lwa ufu.
58002016	Shamashika lyo n-dede, nnyatiri ngata ya vasu-fo, mmbo aleipoo ngata ya ngyeeri ya Abrahamu.
58002017	Nkyo kavakaniswa na vanavamaye kya findo fyoose, naambo nave nkohani nniini araiye ilyillya, akutiri na ngata ya Iruva, naambo naleke vandu vakwe kya ngyulyamari tawo.
58002018	Na kimmba we muni alelyiswa ukiva esheeswaa, mmbo ashidimaa yeekya yewo vakeeyeeswa.
58003001	Naasany, vanavama veele, mukee vaakanise uvaango lwa iruveeu, kusareny nnu kya Nrumi na Nkohani Nniini wa kikusiryo kyeru, we Yesu.
58003002	Yeto aleindya yeto mwinruma, shaasa na Mose ekai, kulya mmba koose kwa Iruva.
58003003	Mashika we mmbo akee nninge itumbe mmwasi ngota Mose, kimwi sha nndu mwisongosya mmba awona nnduma ngota mmba yeyo.
58003004	Mashika wo mmba mmbo ikeeshisongosye ni nndu; kyaindi yeto mwisongosya findo fyoose ni Iruva muni.
58003005	Na Mose dede lyo mmbo aleindya fyoose kulya mmba ya Iruva, ekee mwifurukannya-u; nave nkureekyi wa findo fyoose fishererwaa numa;
58003006	lyo we Kristo, akee mwana, mwikallya mmba ya Iruva, yeto mmba yakwe ikee nnyo yese, lyo kwakooya luwaranaa nnu na ukaari lweru na itumbe lya ivereya lyeru fika mafurumyony.
58003007	Naasany shaasa Mumuyo Mweele arera, “Inu yeni kwakooya mwaita unyanga lwakwe.
58003008	Mulasheumisa mirima yaany, sha kyeeri kya yeende unyafi sha nkonu wa kyeeso kulya kasa.
58003009	Llya vande valya vany valesheesa, vakashiisa, vakalollya mitannyi yakwa ando a myaaka 40.
58003010	Nkyo sharooyo ni unyafi kimaruma kya irika elyi, shaamba, ‘Kyeeri kyoose mirima ya vandu yeva mmbo yeevekye, mmbalemanya shia takwa-fo.’
58003011	Kimaruma kya unyafi lwakwa shalya mboo, ‘Mmbashangaa ifureny lyakwa-fo.’ “
58003012	Kyasia, loleny vanavama vakwa, nnang'ani yaany kulashekaa-fo nrima muumu ulatiri kikusiryo; kimaruma kya ikurauwa na Iruva yeu akee na muu.
58003013	Naasa ikimbaniny nkonu simu, naambo kulave-fo nta umwi waany ava muumu elembwaa nnulyamari.
58003014	Mashika mmbo lwammba veakana ando amwi na Kristo, kwankooya lwavandama na ukaari lweru lwa finya uka mbee fika mafurumyony;
58003015	shaasa kyaambawa, Inu yeni kwakooya mwaita unyanga lwakwe mulasheumisa mirima yaany sha kyeeri kya yeende unyafi.
58003016	Mashika ni vakyi valeende unyafi kyeeri valeita? Nshi woose-se valya valeuka Misri veeteterwaa ni Mose?
58003017	A ndesa ni vakyi alerooywa ni unyafi kimaruma kyawo ando a myaaka 40? Nshi valya valelyamara, minying'a yaawo ikawa kulya kasa?
58003018	A ndesa ni vakyi alevalyiiya mboo sheelyi mbashangaa ifureny lyakwe, kulaore ni valya valelyang'aa?
58003019	Naasany mmbo lwakooya sheelyi mbaleidima yaanga ifureny-fo, kimaruma ira valakusirya-u.
58004001	Naasany, kwakooya kyaasa ekyo kyeyaanga ifureny kyisalalyi-u, lweereye, nta kulave umwi waany asheturaa ifura elyo.
58004002	Mashika naakwa ni yese mmbo luleongoyo Nrumi ya Nsia kimwi sha wo. Lyo irero elyi lyileitiwa llyilevasenyafo, mashika elyi lyiletura-u kikusiryo kyeelyiwarya.
58004003	Mashika yese lulekusirya-u mmbo lushangaa ifureny elyo shaasa aleamba, Shaasa shilelya mboo kya unyafi lwakwa, mmbashangaa ifureny lyakwa-fo; na kikava ishora elyo lyilemarisyo uka elyo uvasha lwa ulana lulevikwa.
58004004	Mashika kwiiyo ando alesenda nkonu wa mfungare kaamba, “Iruva mmbo aleimuya nkonu wa mfungare, karau mashora moose.”
58004005	Na yoo nang'u, “Mmbashangaa ifureny lyakwa-fo.”
58004006	Kyasiany, kimmba irero elyi lyiiyo-da kyeyaamba veefo vasheangaa-fo, na valya valeongoywa mbony yeto kasha vakalemwa yaanga-fo kimaruma kya ulyang'a lwawo,
58004007	kavika nkonu ungyi, kaamba na kana ka Davidi numa ya fyeeri fyaasha, “Inu”shaasa kyilererwa uka kasha, Inu yeni, kwakooya musheita unyanga lwakwe, mulasheumisa mirima yaany.
58004008	Mashika kukooye Yosua evaniinga ifura, nnyesendaa nkonu ungyi wa numa-fo.
58004009	Naasany mmbo kusaye-u ifura lya nkonu wa iimuya kwa vandu va Iruva.
58004010	Shamashika yeto aleanga ifureny lyakwe mmbo akeekyesa we muni kya mashora akwe, shaasa na Iruva nave alefura kya mashora akwe.
58004011	Kyasiany neese lukutakure yaanga ifureny elyo, naambo kulashekaa-fo nta nndu afwa kimaruma kya ngata yeyo yelyang'aa.
58004012	Shamashika Irero lya Iruva mmbo lyitiri muu, lyikatira finya, lyikaveva lyoovi ngota usu lukee unnwe kunu na kunu, lyikaidima ikora na yaavanisa miili na mirima, na filungo na mafura a vayo. Na lyingyi kwa vayo nkyaangu imanya makusaro na fyama fya mirima.
58004013	Nta nkwiiyo kyuumbe kilalollyo paa mbee ya vayo-fo, na findo fyoose mmbo fikee mbereto yoo misony a yeto arye mbony teru toose.
58004014	Kyasiany, kimmba lutiri Nkohani yeto aleanga na iruveeu, we Yesu, Mwana wa Iruva, lukutire deny na iirikyo lyeru.
58004015	Mashika Nkohani yeu weeru Nniini nnyalelemwa itamballya neese kunu ufwafweny lweru-fo, mashika we mmbo aleeswa kimwi sheese-da kya findo fyoose, lyo nalatani ulyamari.
58004016	Kyikeeny indo, luserikye kitima ekyo kya isarya lukee nookaari, naambo luwoni ilyillyo, na iwona isarya yelyo lyishelutaramaa kyeeri kya yaanguywa.
58005001	Mashika wo Nkohani Nniini akee imwiipoo efo vanduny mmbo akeembike kimaruma kya vandu navafurukannyi mbee ya Iruva, naniingye firaso na fyaanu kimaruma kya ulyamari.
58005002	Yeto ashidimaa ivallya nawo waarya yewo varung'ani na vakeereka, kimmba naakwa ni we avekee na ngata ya ufwafwa.
58005003	Na kimmba ni indo mmbo kyinkooye naute firaso kimaruma kyakwe we muni na kya vandu vengyi kya isangywa ulyamari.
58005004	Nta nkwiiyo nndu ashidimaa itafurau nnduma yeufo, kuuta yeto Iruva ammuvaanga, shaasa alevaanga Aron.
58005005	Na kiwo-da naakwa ni Kristo nnyalekurosa we muni kava Nkohani Nniini-fo, mmbo kwiifo yeto alemmbia, Ni yewe Mwana wakwa. Inu mmbo shakwiira.
58005006	Na ando engyi kaamba, Nnyewe Nkohani llung'anu kuvakye Melekizedeki.
58005007	We kyeeri ekyo ekee na mwiili, yeto ashidimaa imwauwa ufuny mmbo alensheya, kimaruma kya fiterewo na fyeerero na misoru miingyi, kaaranywa kimmba aleirikya Iruva.
58005008	Na lla elyi akee Mwana, mmbo alesisirya makyiva yoo alenkooya;
58005009	Na kyeeri alemaa iinutya, kava mmbwe mweende ukiro lwa llung'anu kwa yewo vemwirikya.
58005010	Na Iruva kaamba mmbo akee Nkohani Nniini kimwi sha Melekizedeki.
58005011	Kimaruma kya yeto mmbo lutiri findo fiingyi fyeyaamba, lyo kikava kyuumu mashika elyi mukee varoo iita.
58005012	Mashika alya kyemukooye muve yeni mmbo velosha (mashika kwamiira-u fyeeri fyaasha), lyo fika ulaalu mmbo mukee veloshwa ufundo lwa mbee deny lwa mbony yeti ta Iruva, mukava sha vana vanaa malela vakalemwa shoonga shuumu.
58005013	Shamashika yeto moose mwiina malela nnyamanyaa deny marero a usumanu-fo, mashika ni mwana nndu.
58005014	Kyaindi shoonga shuumu nnya vandu vaniini, yewo kimaruma kyekwishivira urango lwawo lwammidima itambashwa kyisha na kyikasha.
58006001	Kimmba ni indo, lukara lulasenda ufundo lwa mbee lwa Kristo, lwangusye yeenda lwaawutye, lulasheva-se vekaa uvasheny lwa mashora alakee a muu, neera kikusiryo kwa Iruva,
58006002	na ufundo lwa ubatiso, na yeekeryo maako, neeruka lya vafu na mwaandu wa llung'anu.
58006003	Na efyo mmbo lutanaa kwakooya Iruva alwiidimisya.
58006004	Mashika yewo valemmainingwa sa, na ishosha simbo yeyo ya iruveeu na iwona yaakaniswa na Mumuyo Mweele,
58006005	na ishosha irero yelyo lyirolaa lya Iruva, na wiidimi lwa fyeeri efyo fishaa,
58006006	vakawuya iwa-da numa ya efyo, nkikiidimikaa-se ivaviira wiiya kutani vakurya-fo, mashika mmbo vakeekapya Mwana wa Iruva nsalabeny lya kavii, na insuta wo veni.
58006007	Mashika naakwa ni sumbai yeyo yana mura wa mmbwa yeyo ikapaau wo kyeeri na ivikya yewo varema ndunda shisha, wo mmbo vawaryaa mbora tishukaa kwa Iruva;
58006008	lyo kwakooya sumbai yeyo yauta miinga tupu na mooro, mmbo ivaa sheelyi yadengwa nyishirikyoo-fo, nayo mmbo ishelyamarwaa.
58006009	Kyaindi vakunde vakwa, lla elyi lwaamba indo, mmbo lwiishi mbony tany, tikee shisha mmwasi, tikee ta ukiro.
58006010	Mashika Iruva nshi nrekwa kutani arekyo mashora any-fo, na ukundi lulya muleora kimaruma kya irina lyakwe, llya mulefurukannya veele, na fika ulaalu ni indo-da mukeetana.
58006011	Neese mmbo lukee mwikima nnu naambo mutire usasari yelo weni na yaawutya ekyo luvereye fika mafurumyony;
58006012	naambo mulasherokwa, naambo musheva vamwi neewo va fyaasa efyo vekee na kikusiryo sanda na usisiryo.
58006013	Mashika kyeeri Iruva alevika kyaasa na Abrahamu, mashika elyi kulaore eiyo ungyi nniini ngota we wellyisa mboo, mmbo alelya mboo we muni,
58006014	kaamba, ni dede ivikya mbora nshekuvikyaa, na ikufumbuta nshekufumbuta.
58006015	Na kyeendwa ni ivika nsia kashefityo kyaasa ekyo.
58006016	Mashika nndu mmbo alyee mboo na yeto amwilannyi, na yekyo kyailanya marero moose ni ilya mboo, evikaa kyiringyisyo.
58006017	Kyikeeny indo Iruva ekundye yoora valya vashewaryaa kyaasa kilya, shaasa fyaasa fyakwe filashaalashikaa, kavika-u kyaasa.
58006018	Naambo kimaruma kya findo fivii filashaalashikaa, nang'u Iruva nalashambaa wongo, lukaariswa lwivirywaa muu, yese lukeetamballya efyo luvikye nsia fikee mbee yeeru,
58006019	nakyo mmbo kivakye kya nrima, kyeluuta nrengeny, itiri finya, yeelwaata efo nnang'ani ya ando eele,
58006020	yefo Yesu aleanga nafo kimaruma kyeru, nsongoru weeru, kava Nkohani Nniini fika llung'anu avakye Melekizedeki.
58007001	Mashika mangyi yeto wa Salemu we Melekizedeki ekee nkohani wa Iruva akee uwe, yeto alekwaananya na Abrahamu llya ekewuya ooka ikapa vamangyi valya, kammbikya mbora.
58007002	Mmbwe ulya Abrahamu alenninga kyenga kya ikumi kya findo fyakwe fyoose; (udongo lwa irina lyakwe ni “Mangyi wa usumanu”, na lyingyi “Mangyi wa Salemu”, nkyo kyaamba ni mangyi wa urilalyi.
58007003	Nnyatiri ndeye nta maye-fo, nnyatiri kyeeri apookye-fo, nta mafurumyony a muu wakwe-fo, lyo mmbo alevakaniswa na Mwana wa Iruva); yeto mmbo akaa llung'anu.
58007004	Naasa, loleny shaasa nndu yeto ekee nsuri, yeto Abrahamu nkuu weeru, alenninga kyenga kya ikumi kya masaa akwe.
58007005	Neefo kwa vana va Levi valya vetira ukuhani, mmbo vatiri ivavaso ipoo kyenga kya ikumi kive kya vandu vawo, mmbo va ufyari lwawo, ni ivavaso, lla elyi vaukye kwa Abrahamu.
58007006	Lyo we, ufyari lwakwe lulaukye kwawo, mmbo alewarya kyenga kya ikumi kwa Abrahamu, yeto atiri kyaasa ekyo kammbikya mbora.
58007007	Mmbo kimanyikye deny, yeto mwivikya mbora mmbo ailannyi yeto avikyo mbora.
58007008	Na Vakohani yewo vawaryaa kyenga ekyo kya ikumi vakee vandu vashefwaa, lyo nkwa yeto akureekyo sheelyi eefo na muu.
58007009	Na lyo ivaa yaamba kyeendwa ni Abrahamu, naakwa Llevi mwiwarya kyenga kya ikumi mmbo aleniingya kyenga kya ikumi;
58007010	mashika mmbo aukye kwa ndeye, yoo Melekizedeki alekwaananya nawe.
58007011	Naasa kukooye kweiyo usongovisi efo ukuhaniny lwa Levi, (mashika vandu yewo mfo valewonisa uvavaso); nkuti ki se yeiyo yewonisa nkohani ungyi avakye Melekizedeki, nta nare nalavakaniswa na Aron?
58007012	Mashika ukuhani lulya lukammaalashika, na ivavaso nalyo mmbo lyishalashikaa.
58007013	Mashika yeto mbony takwe tilererwa mmbo aleakaniswa na ufyari lungyi, neefo nkweifo nndu ungyi mwirundya kitara kyeerasya-fo.
58007014	Mashika nkindo kya paa Nndumi weeru mmbo ookye efo ufyariny lwa Yuda, na Mose nnyalererau kya ufyari yelo kikee kya ukuhani-fo.
58007015	Yefyo lukerera yese mmbo fimanyikye mmwasi, kyimmba alewonika nkohani ungyi avakye Melekizedeki;
58007016	nalakee nkohani kyeendwa ni ivavaso lya uvavaso llwa lwa ngata ya mwiili, akee wa wiidimi lwa muu ulamandaa.
58007017	Mmbwe alekureekywa kyeyaamba, Nnyewe Nkohani llung'anu kuvakye Melekizedeki.
58007018	Mashika kwiiyo yuuta-u ivavaso llya lya mbee, kimaruma kya ufwafwa lwa vayo, neelyi kulore lyilemaa;
58007019	(mashika ivavaso llya lya mbee lyileinutya kindo-fo); na ando amwi na efyo mmbo kulesha-u ivereya iiya isha mmwasi lyelusembera kufii na Iruva.
58007020	Na kimmba kulaore kweiyo ilyiswa mboo,
58007021	(mashika valya mmbo valevikwa vave makuhani kulaiyo ilya mboo, kyaindi we, ando amwi neelyiswa mboo kwa yeto alemmbia, Nndumi mmbo alelya mboo nta nnyashalashaa-fo, yewe mmbo kukee nkohani llung'anu);
58007022	naasany kiinani na efi Yesu mmbo aleva mwisalallya kyaasa ekyo kyikee kyisha mmwasi.
58007023	Na valya valevikwa makuhani veengyi, mashika elyi valeimwa ni ufu valakee-u.
58007024	Kyaindi we, kimmba aiyo llung'anu mmbo atiri ukohani lwakwe lulamandaa.
58007025	Kimmba ni indo we mmbo ashidimaa ikira deny yewo vasheyaa Iruva na irina lyakwe, mashika we akee na muu mikonu myoose evaterevyaa.
58007026	Mashika mmbo kilelukooya lutire Nkohani nniini wa ngata yei akee mweele, nalatiri uravi, nalatiri nta ivara, akee nrauwe na varavi, kavekaa uwe kairya iruveeu;
58007027	nalatiri kimaruma kya yuuta mbele kiraso kimaruma kyeekwilyisa ulyamari lwakwe muni shaasa makuhani valya vengyi vaniini valetana, numa nooteny kiraso kimaruma kya ulyamari lwa vandu yewo, mashika we mmbo aletana indo lyimwi nsi llya alekuuta we muni.
58007028	Mashika uvavaso mmbo lwavika vandu vakee vafwafwa vave makohani vaniini, kyaindi irero elyo mboo yeyo ilesha numa ya uvavaso mbo lyilevika-u Mwana, yeto amaa fyoose fika llung'anu.
58008001	Naasa, nnang'ani ya efyo lukeeamba, irero isongoru llyo elyi, mmbo lutiri Nkohani Nniini indi, akee rembo woko usha lwa kitima kya itumbe kya uniini iruveeu,
58008002	mfurukani wa ando eele, na wa yeema llya dede lyilevikwa ni Nndumi muni nta nshi nndu-fo.
58008003	Mashika Nkohani Nniini moose mmbo avikwaa naambo naniingye simbo na firaso, kweekyo yeu nawe nkuti natire findo fyeeyuuta.
58008004	Kukooye ekee uwe ya uruka, nnyevaa nkohani-fo; mashika veefo yewo vaniingyaa firaso kimaruma kya ivavaso,
58008005	verundya-u sha ando a kirishe kya iruveeu, shaasa Mose alevavasyo ni Iruva, llya emma ivavasyo nadeesye yeema llya, mashika mmbo aamba, Lola kusongosye findo fyoose shaasa kuleorwa kulya ifumbu-u.
58008006	Lyo ulaalu mmbo ambonisa urundi usha mmwasi, kiinani na shaasa nrumi wa kyaasa kiniini mmwasi, kyikee kivavasye nkyaasa ekyo kisha mmwasi,
58008007	Mashika kukooye kyaasa ekyo kya mbee kulaore kyeetiri unana, mmbwekaa-u mwaanya wa iruuya ekyo kya kavii-fo.
58008008	Mashika evasakiraa mmbo aamba, Lola, mikonu iifo ishaa, ni Nndumi arera, neeny nsheinutyaa kyaasa Kiiya kwa mmba ya Israeli na mmba ya Yuda.
58008009	Nakyo nkishevaa sha kyaasa kilya shilevikya vandeyaawo-fo, nkonu ulya shilevatira woko shavauta urukeny lwa Misri. Mashika mbalewarana na kyaasa kyakwa-fo neeny nshilevasara-fo, ni indo Nndumi aamba.
58008010	Mashika ekyi nkyo kyaasa nshevikaa na mmba ya Israeli, numa ya mikonu ilya ni indo Nndumi aamba, Nshevavikya uvavaso lwakwa makusarony awo, nshereiya efo miriminy yaawo neeny nshevaa Iruva waawo, nawo vave vandu vakwa.
58008011	Nawo mbasheloshanaa wo nndu na uroye-fo, na wo nndu na mwanamaye, veshambaa, irikya Nndumi-fo, mashika woose vasheshiirikyaa. Uka yeto akee n-du waawo fika yeto akee nniini waawo.
58008012	Mashika mmbo nshevafwayaa maravi awo na ngyulyamari tawo nshishetikumbwaa-sefo.
58008013	Llya aleamba, ni Kyaasa Kiiya, mmbo aleallwa kilya kya mbee kive kikuu. Na lyo kindo kikampooka iva kikuu mmbo kyamfika kufii na imanda.
58009001	Naasany naakwa nkyaasa kilya kya mbee mmbo kyevikye uramba lwa miindye, na ando a vayo eele a yaa ulaniny.
58009002	Mashika yeema mmbo lyilesongosyo, llya lya kipooka, lyikavikyo ekyerya taa, na mesa, na mikate ya Myoorye, ng'ng'u alevaangwa Eele.
58009003	Na yoo numa ya isullya elyo lya kavii, yeema llya lyivaangwa Eele kwa Kweele,
58009004	lyitiri kirembo kya saabu, na isanduku lya kyaasa lyikee isengetye nsaabu riti, mfo kweiyo na ikopo lya saabu lyetiri mana, na nsengye ulya wa Aron ileshau, na mapoo alya a kyaasa.
58009005	Na uwe ya vayo kukaa-u makerubi na itumbe, akavikya kitima ekyo kyesarya nruve; naasa nta llutiri mwaanya wa yaamba mbony ta findo efyo fyoose kimwi kimwi-fo.
58009006	Naasa findo efyo fikimaa isongosyo indo, wo kyeeri makohani mmbo veshangaa efo yeeminy elyo lya kipooka, vakainutya mirumwa ya miindye.
58009007	Kyaindi efo yeeminy yelyo lya kavii nkohani nnini mmbo eshangaa-fo we muni, na lyimwi nsi wo mwaaka, na samu yeyo yeningyaa kimaruma kyakwe muni na kya ngyulyamari ta itura imanya lya vandu yewo.
58009008	Mumuyo Mweele eshoraa mbony yei, sheelyi shia ya yaanga ando eele nnyensukuwa paa-fo, yoo yeema llya lya kipooka lyeiyo.
58009009	Elyo llyo kyaaso kya kyeeri ekyi kya ulaalu, kyeeri ekyo fyaanu na firaso fyekora na muro, nayo filashidimaa isongovisa nndu yeto akee iindya,
58009010	kyimmba ni uvavaso lwa ngata ya mwiili-da, fyeelya na fyeena neesamba yefyo fyekee fivavasye fika kyeeri kya usongosyo wiiya.
58009011	Kyaindi elyi Kristo ammaa isha, akee nkohani nniini wa findo efyo fishaa, atiri yeema iniini na lyawutye fyoose, lyilakee lyisongosye mmaako, nkyo kyaamba lyilakee lya yaa ulaniny elu.
58009012	Nta kilakee kya samu ya mburu na ngashe, kyaindi kya samu yakwe muni, mmbo aleanga lyimwi nsi ando yoo Eele, ekimaa itira iwouwa lya llung'anu.
58009013	Shamashika kwakooya samu ya mburu na ya shau na ifu lya ngashe ya ng'umbe yeyo valefwallyo yewo vetirwa nkyirinda kya mwiili nawo vakasambika,
58009014	a samu ya Kristo nshi mmwasi, yeto kyeendwa ni Mumuyo wa llung'anu mmbo alekuuta we muni kwa Iruva kava kiraso kya ulyamari, mmbo ishemusangyaa makusaro any na mashora any mafu.
58009015	Kimmba ni indo mmbo akee Nrumi wa Kyaasa Kiiya, naambo, ufu lukammekaa-u kimaruma kya yuuta filya fikasha filetanwa kyeeri kilya kya kyaasa kilya kya mbee, yewo vakee vavaange vawarye kyaasa kya ding'u ya llung'anu.
58009016	Mashika alya kyaasa kya ding'u kikai, nkuti ufu lwa yeto alekivika lukee-u.
58009017	Mashika kyaasa kya ding'u yeyo mmbo kitiri finya alya ufu lwa nndu (we Kristo) lulesheya; mashika kilya kilatiri finya, elyi ulya alekivika akee na muu.
58009018	Naako nkyaasa kilya kya kipooka nkilevikwa kulaiyoo samu-fo.
58009019	Mashika wo ivavaso shaasa lyilererwa ni Mose kwa vandu yewo woose, shaasa uvavaso luleamba, mmbo alewarya samu ya ngashe na ya mburu ando amwi na mafwaa a yaari adodorye na hisopo, kananatya kitabu ekyo kyeni, na vandu yewo woose,
58009020	kaamba, “Yei nnyo samu ya kyaasa ilevavasyo ni Iruva.” "
58009021	Na yeema elyo nalyo na fiiya fyoose fya miindye kafinanatya samu kiwo,
58009022	neefo uvavasony kufii findo fyoose mmbo fyasangyo nsamu, na kulaiyo samu yapusuka nkwiiyo ifwaaywa-fo.
58009023	Naasa kikava nkuti mareiyo a mbony tikee iruveeu tifitwa-fo, kyaindi mbony ta iruveeu tiilyiso mfiraso fisha ngota to. "
58009024	Mashika Kristo nnyaleanga ando kweele kukee kusongosie mmaako-fo, nkyo kyaaso kya ando eele a dede, we mmbo aleanga iruveeu kweni, nalollyo yoo mbee ya kisangu kya Iruva kimaruma kyeru yese.
58009025	Nta nshi akuutaa lyingyi na lyingyi-fo, shaasa llya nkohani nniini aleanga ando eele wo mwaaka na samu ilakee yakwe;
58009026	kukooye ni indo, mmbo elyisoo ukyiva keengyi uka elyo ulana luumbwa; kyaindi ulaalu lyimwi nsi elyi kyeeri kyileinana, kaorwa paa, namaa ulyamari na kiraso kya muu wakwe.
58009027	Na shaasa vandu vakee vavikye ufu lyimwi nsi, na numa yeefwa ni yaanduywa;
58009028	na Kristo nawe, mmbo aleutwa kiraso lyimwi naambo neepoo ngyulyamari ta vandu veengyi, nawe mmbo asheshaa lya kavii, kulaiyo ulyamari, kwa yewo vembereya vaoni ukiro.
58010001	Naasa kyimmba uvavaso ni kyirishe kya mesha yoo asheshaa, lulakee fwana sheni ya findo efyo, kya firaso filya fya iniingywaa wo kyeeri mwaaka moose, nkimaa nta kinnywa isangya deny yewo vashaa-u-fo.
58010002	Kwankooya ni indony, a kukooye firaso fyemandaa, mashika yewo veindya vakammaa iilyiswa lyimwi, mmbekilollyaa-se vatiri ulyamari?
58010003	Lyo ando amwi na firaso efyo mmbo kwiiyo ikummbwa kya ulyamari wo mwaaka.
58010004	Mashika samu ya shau na mburu nnyimaa yuuta ulyamari-fo.
58010005	Nkyo elyi asha ulaniny mmbo aamba, Firaso fyekora na muro na fyaanu nkukundye-fo, lyo mwiili ukashideesya.
58010006	Firaso fyekora na muro na firaso fya ulyamari nkulesennyo mfyo-fo.
58010007	Llyo shileamba, Lola, shansha (mmbo shilereiyo efo kitabuny) shitani filya kukundye, woi Iruva wakwa.
58010008	Yoo uwe aamba, Firaso fyekora na fyaanu fya yuuta ukulefikunda-fo (filya fikee fivavasye ni uvavaso),
58010009	llyo aleamba, “Lola te, mmbo shasha nshetana efyo kukundye. Mmbo auta-u kilya kya mbee kavika-u kilya kya kavii.”
58010010	Yoo efyo akundye fikai ng'u lulewonisya iilyiswa, yoo mwiili wa Yesu Kristo ulerambikywa-u lyimwi nsi.
58010011	Na wo nkohani mmbo asalalaa wo nkonu navike miindye, neeningya firaso efyo fyeni keengyi, nafyo filashidimaa nta yuuta ulyamari.
58010012	Kyaindi yeu, kyeeri alemaa kiraso kimwi kimaa yuuta ulyamari llung'anu, mmbo alekaa rembo woko usha lwa Iruva;
58010013	ukau navereye kutani vakiduva vakwe vavikwa yoo si ya marende akwe.
58010014	Mashika kwa yuuta lyimwi nsi mmbo alesongovisa deny yewo vasheilyiswaa fika llunganu.
58010015	Na Mumuyo Mweele mmbo alukureekya, mashika ekyaamba,
58010016	Ekyi nkyo kyaasa nshevikaa nawo numa ya mikonu ilya. Nshevika mavavaso akwa miriminy yaawo. Na efo makusarony awo nsheareiya-fo.
58010017	Lyo kaamba, Ngyulyamari tawo na ulyang'a lwawo nshishelukumbwaa-se-fo, "
58010018	Naasany, kwankooya yefyo fisheutwaa-u, nkukyiifo-se kiraso kimaruma kya ulyamari-fo.
58010019	Kyasiany, vanavama, kyimmba lutiri ukaari lwa yaanga ando eele kyeendo nsamu ya Yesu,
58010020	shia ilya aleloora shiiya, itiri muu, ishiraa isulyeny, nto mwiili wakwe;
58010021	na iwona Nkohani nniini wa mmba ya Iruva,
58010022	luserikyeny ng'u na nrima wa dede, na kikusiryo kivangyi, lukee vasangye mirima yeeru lure makusaro makasha, lukee vasangye miili yeeru na mura mweele."
58010023	Lutire nnu ikusirya lya filya luvikye nsia, lyilashaalashikaa, mashika lya aleluvikya kyaasa ni wa dede.
58010024	Lukukaarise luveni na veni neekwitika itana mashora mesha a ikunda.
58010025	Nta lulare ikwaanannya ando amwi-fo, shaasa vengyi vaishivye, lyo lwiikimbani; na yeengera itana indo, shaasa mulollye nkonu yeto ukee kufii.
58010026	Mashika kwakooya lwatana ulyamari naambo lukammaa imanya ekyo kya dede, nkukisaa-u kiraso kimaruma kya ulyamari-fo;
58010027	lyo isheshaa ngapo yeeresye, na waami lwa muro yeto ushelyaa yewo valyang'a.
58010028	Nndu amina uvavaso lwa Mose mmbo ashefwaa kulaiyo usari, na irero lya vakureekyi vavii ao vararu.
58010029	Mwalollya inda? Ndesa nndu yeto ashewaryaa Mwana wa Iruva nnyashewaryaase ngapo niini mwasi, neemina samu yeyo ya iilyisa sheelyi nshi kindo-fo, neemina Mumuyo mwiisarya?
58010030	Mashika lwiishi yeto aleamba, Itaiya kiduva ni ishora lyakwa, yeny nshetaiyaa. Na lyingyi, Nndumi mmbo asheanduyaa vandu vakwe.
58010031	Ni kindo kyeeresye iwoya maakony a Iruva muni Muu.
58010032	Lyo kumbweny mikonu ilya ya mbee, llya kyeeri mulewona sa, mmbo mulesisirya isisirya lying'ani lya mavavyo.
58010033	Kyeeri mulelamyo ivikywa ureeree na fyuure, na kyeeri muleakaniswa na vetanywa efyo.
58010034	Mashika valya vekee fifingyony mmbo mulevaiya mashoya, mukairikya na nsia yuuta masaa any, mwiishi sheelyi efo nnang'ani yaany mmbo mutiri masaa ailannyi yoo, alamandaa.
58010035	Kyasia mulashereta ukaari lwany, mashika lutiri simbo niini.
58010036	Mashika mukundye usisiryo, naambo mukammaa itana filya Iruva akundye muwonise kyaasa kilya.
58010037	Mashika nkyeeri kyaangu deny kiiyo. Yeto avereyo asheshaa, nta nalakeywa.
58010038	Lyo yeto wakwa wa usumanu mmbo ashewonaa muu na iirikyo, kwakooya atirwa nnyinyira, nrima wakwa mmbutiri ifura nawe-fo.
58010039	Kyaindi lyo yese llusangyi na yewo vatirwa nnyinyira na vakeereka-fo, mmbo lukee na yewo vakikusiryo ekyo kikiraa mirima yeeru.
58011001	Naasany ikusirya ni ivika nsia deny kya efyo fikaa fishe, kulaore fyallollyo.
58011002	Na vamiku veru mmbo valekureekywa kya ekyo.
58011003	Kyeendwa ni irero lya Iruva ulana mmbo luleumbwa, ni indo lukusirye, naakwa mfindo efi filollyo mfileumbwa mfindo fingyi-se.
58011004	Eetiri kikusiryo, Abeli mmbo aleutya Iruva kiraso kyisha ngota Kaini, kakureekyo sheelyi mmbo akee wa usumanu; Iruva kakureekya firaso fyakwe, kimmba ni indo, na kikava alemmaa ifwa, mmbo eefo areraa.
58011005	Kyeendwa nkikusiryo Enoki mmbo aleipowa-u, nalalollye ufu, nta nnyalelollyo-fo mashika Iruva alemwiipo-u: Mashika elyo kulore emmipowa-u mmbo ekureekye sheelyi mmbo alesennya Iruva.
58011006	Lyo kulaiyo kikusiryo nkushiidimaa insenya-fo; mashika nndu asheengyaa Iruva nkuti mbele neerikye sheelyi eefo, na sheelyi we mmbo alyimyaa mbora yewo vensheya.
58011007	Ekee na kikusiryo, Noe llya alemaa iikimbwa ni Iruva kya findo efyo fikaa fishe numa filandelollyo, shaasa aleirikya Iruva, mmbo aletana mmba ilya ya isanduku, naambo nakire va mmba yakwe. Nkyo kautya ulana uvingo neeva muya ding'u wa usumanu yelo lwawonika kimmya efo kikusiryony.
58011008	Kyeendwa nkikusiryo Abrahamu mmbo aleirika llya alevaangwa, nakupoo neende iwonisa ando alya kushevaa ding'u yakwe, kakwiipoo naleeshi kundo akeenda.
58011009	Na kikusiryo kakaa kulya urukeny llwa weny lwa kyaasa, urukeny lulakee lwakwe, kakaa yeeminy we na Isaki na Yakobo, veni ding'u ando amwi nawe va kyaasa kilya kyeni.
58011010	Mashika mmbo evikye nsia ilollya muri utiri uvasha, ukee n-deesye neetanwa ni Iruva muni.
58011011	Kyeendwa nkikusiryo Sara muni mmbo alewona wiidimi lwa ikufinga lla llya emiilanya kyeeri kyakwe, mashika llya alevika nsia yeto mwiimbikya kyaasa ni wa dede.
58011012	Kyeendwa ni efyo vakairwa ni nndu umwi nawe kava sheelyi amfwa, vakawonika vandu veengyi sha nyinyiri ta efo nginiiu-te, sha nsanga wa mbai ya nruva ulavaa yekyena.
58011013	Yewo woose vakafwa na kikusiryo, valandewarya fyaasa filya, lyo vakafilollya vekee kwaasha na iirikya, neiirikya sheelyi wo ni veny na va kyaaro kunu urukeny.
58011014	Mashika yewo veamba findo sha yefyo mmbo woora paa sheelyi mmbo vakeeruuya uruka lwawo veni.
58011015	Na kukooye veekumbwaa uruka lulya kundo valeuka, mmbo veshidimaa iwuya nafo.
58011016	Kyaindi lyo ulaalu mmbo valangye uruka usha mmwasi, llo elo lwa iruveeu. Kweekyo Iruva nnyasuaa ivaangwa Iruva waawo-fo; kimmba mmbwe yeto alevatannya muri.
58011017	Kwi kikusiryo Abrahamu llya aleeswa mmbo aleuta Isaki nave kiraso, neeto alewarya fyaasa efyo mmbo ekeniingya mwana wakwe wa ngitany.
58011018	Ee-da, mmbo emmivyo, Yoo kwa Isaki ng'u ufyari lwafo lushepookyaa,
58011019	kikallollyo sheelyi Iruva mmbo ashidimaa innduta ooke kwa vafu, nammbonise lyingyi.
58011020	Ekee na kikusiryo Isaki mmbo alevikya Yakobo na Esau mbora, naakwa nkya findo efyo fisheshaa numa.
58011021	Ekee na kikusiryo llya Yakobo emfikya ifwa, mmbo alevikya vana va Yosefu mbora, keendya Iruva ekwinyikye yoo runguny ya nsengye wakwe.
58011022	Ekee na kikusiryo llya Yosefu alefikya yoo mafurumyony akwe, mmbo alesenda mbony ta vana va Israeli yuuka Misri kavavasya kya mafua akwe.
58011023	Na kikusiryo llya Mose alewonika kasurumwa mmbamiku vakwe ando a miiri iraru, llya valellollya nkinkoku kyisha, nta valairyae ivavaso lya mangyi.
58011024	Ekee na kikusiryo ekiva nndu nniini kalema ivaangwa mwana wa mfu wa Farao;
58011025	kalollya nkyeni ilyiswa ukyiva ando amwi na vandu va Iruva ngota ifurya ulyamari ando a kirambo kidu;
58011026	kalolya Kristo iteendwa ni usimba uniini ngota umasi loose lwa Misri, mashika nfyo evereye natawa.
58011027	Na kikusiryo kooka Misri nalairyee unyafi lwa mangyi, kasisirya evikye nsia yeto nalalollyo.
58011028	Na kikusiryo kavika Pasaka, na yaamba samu ilya, naambo ulya asherumataa fyuumbe fivee fyoose wo nalavapaani.
58011029	Na kikusiryo vakaira kulya yeeveny lya Shamu sha ando oomu; Vamisri vakunda nawo itana indo vakamirwa mmura.
58011030	Kyeendwa nkikusiryo isimamba lya Yeriko ukawunduka, llya muri uleringityo ando a mikonu mfungare.
58011031	Ekee na kikusiryo Rahabu ulya ntuusi nnyalerumatwa ando amwi na valyang'a valya-fo; mashika llya alewarya vandu valya va sa na ufoo.
58011032	A yeny shaambe-se kyi? Mashika mwaanya mmbushimaa shaambe mbony ta Gidion na Baraka na Samson na Yefta na Davidi na Samweli na ta vakisuku,
58011033	yewo kyeendwa ni iirikyo valevinga ngyumangyi ta vamangyi, vakatana usumanu, vakatira fyaasa, vakafinga kana ka miiso,
58011034	vakavinga muro, vakakya iwaawa na usu. Vakaniingwa finya llya vekee vafwafwa, vakakaarya fireny, vakoombuta vamisa woose.
58011035	Vaka nawo vakawaarya vafu yewo valerutwa. Lyo vengyi vakawondorwa fika ifwa, valairikye iwouwa, naambo vaoni irutwa.
58011036	Vengyi vakeetwa fyeesony fyeteendwa neekapwa, yee neefingwa, neevikwa kifingyony;
58011037	vakakapwa na mawe, vakaparwa na misumenu, vakavikwa fyeesony, vakawaawa noosu, vakaringitya-ringitya veree masara a moonri na mburu; vakaanguyo mfindo, vakalyiswa ukyiva, vakatannyo uravi;
58011038	(vandu yewo kulore vesumani ikaa yaa ulaniny), mmbo valeraa-raa kulya kasa na kulya mafumbu-u neefo mbangeny na midesheny.
58011039	Na vandu yewo woose mmbo valekureekywa kyeendo nkikusiryo kyawo, lyo valawarye kyaasa.
58011040	Kimmba Iruva elludeesya yese ekyo kikee kyisha mmwasi, naambo wo valashesongwa iwaryo ngota yese.
58012001	Kiwo neeseny-da, kimmba lukee varingitye ni vakureekyi veengyi indo, lukurwe mario yoo maroo, na ulyamari, lutamballye yeenda mbee lwikee na usisiryo efo kivakyanuny kya muu yeu.
58012002	Lwiilolaa Yesu, yeto mwipooka na mwiinutya kikusiryo kyeru; kimaruma kya ifura elyo aleniingwa we mmbo alesisirya nsalaba neemina sony, nawe mmbo akee rembo woko usha lwa kitima kya itumbe kya Iruva.
58012003	Nkye kusareny nnu kya yeto alesisirya iteendwa iniini indo lya vetana ulyamari, mulasheyaaraa-fo, nta ifwa nrima-fo.
58012004	Mulekapana fira mukafikya nta ipuswa samu, mwiwanaa na ulyamari-fo;
58012005	lyingyi mmbo mwanrekyo wiikimbi lulya, lukeerera neeni yeni mukee vana, Mwana-kwa kulaile umbiri lwa Nndumi, nta kulafwe nrima kyeeri akeekukyeemya,
58012006	Mashika yeto Nndumi ankundye mmbo ankapa, na mwana yeto mumwirikya mmbo ankapa.
58012007	Mmbo musumani ikapwa, Iruva mmbo ammutanya sha vana; mashika lyo ni mwana-kyi yeto nalakapwaa n-ndeye?
58012008	Naasa kwankooya mulakapwa shaasa kikee kwa woose, mmbo mwava vana valakee veni kyeny, nshi vana va dede-fo.
58012009	Ando amwi na efyo mmbo lutiri vande veru va ngata ya mwiili nawo vakalukapa, neese lukairikya, a nshi kyeni deny luwarani na Nde yeto wa mirima yeeru lukie muu?
58012010	Mashika lyo dede yewo ando a mikonu myaangu mmbo valelukapa shaasa valelollya wo veni kivaa, nawe kya pule yeeru, naambo lwaakaniswa weele lwakwe.
58012011	Wo ngapo kyeeri kilya nnyilelollyo nkindo kya ifura-fo, nkyeevavisa, kyaindi kwa yewo vakee veeshivire indo numa vakawonisa ndunda ta usumanu titiri ufoo.
58012012	Kyasia orweny maako yoo akee mafwafwa na ndi yeto shipooru,
58012013	sumanisyeny marende any shia, naambo ekyo kikee nketekete kilareke shia, naambo kikirwa.
58012014	Kundeny na nrima moose ikaa na urilalyi na vandu woose, nalo weele yelo kulaifo nndu ashidimaa ilollya Nndumi kwakooya alutura.
58012015	Mulole nnu deny kulasheva nndu amina isarya lya Iruva, kwiiseny nnu naambo nri yeto uvavaa ulasheemya kwany ushemwaatara na veengyi vaone itefuswa.
58012016	Kulakae-fo nndu ntuusi nta nndu naleshiindya Iruva-fo, sha Esau llya alekumba ding'u yakwe ya mwana mmbee kimaruma kya shoonga ikee imutu lyimwi nsi.
58012017	Mashika mwiishi llya numa alekunda iwona mbora, nkilekiva-fo, (mashika nnyalewona mwaanya wa ikurya-fo), lla shaasa aleiruuya na misoru deny.
58012018	Mashika mmulefikya ifumbu lyivaa ipaana-fo, lyileaka muro, nta ifishi yuu, na ireema, na uraato lwa finya,
58012019	na unyanga lwa iranda na unyanga lwa marero, yelo valya valelwiita valetereva valakivyo kindo kingyi-fo,
58012020	mashika mbaleidima isisirya marero alya valevavasyo-fo. Naakwa ni ifisi lyikapaana ifumbu elyo mmbo lyikapwaa na mawe.
58012021	Na efyo filelollyo shaasa fyeeresye, kutani Mose aamba, “Shantirwa mmbwerei neererema.”
58012022	Kyaindi yeni mmbo mwasheya ifumbu lya Sion, na muri wa Iruva akee na muu, Yerusalemu ya iruveeu, na maronda meengyi a vasu fiku fiingyi,
58012023	na ikwaanu iniini na siri ya vana vavee vakee vareiye iruveeu, na Iruva mwileta vandu woose, na mirima ya vandu va usumanu vasongovikye,
58012024	na Yesu nrumi wa kyaasa kiiya, na samu ya inanatywa, yeyo ireraa mesha ngota ilya ya Abeli.
58012025	Loleny mulashelema yeto akeerera. Mashika kwakooya kulaore valekirwa valya valelema yeto alevaikimba yaa ulaniny, ni mmwasiny deny llushekirwaa kwakooya lwaindukya mbai neeto aleuka iruveeu elwikimbaa;
58012026	yeto unyanga lwakwe lulereremisa uruka kyeeri ekyo, lyo ulaalu mmbo avika kyaasa kyeyaamba, ulaalu mmbo shireremisaa lyingyi lyimwi nshi uruka-da-fo na iruveeu-da.
58012027	Kyaindi irero elyi, “Lyingyi lyimwi”, mmbo lyoora paa filya fisheutwaa-u elyi fireremiswaa, mfyo filya fikee fyuumbe, naambo filya filavaa ireremiswa fyo fisalale-u.
58012028	Naasany kimmba lukeewarya umangyi yelo lulavaa ireremiswa, lukaeny na isarya, na kyeendwa llyo luvikye Iruva miindye insenyi, ando amwi neekunyiisa na vio;
58012029	mashika Iruva weeru nsha muro.
58013001	Ukundi sha lwa vana va nka lukee-u.
58013002	Mulare mulawarya veny-fo; mashika indo kwiifo vengyi valembwarya vasu va Iruva valaishi.
58013003	Kummbweny yewo vakee vafinge kimwi sheelyi mukee vafinge nawo; neewo vakeesisyo da muveekye, kimmba neeni mukee vandu.
58013004	Usando lwa nndu na nka luindyo ni vandu woose, na ando elala ashie; mashika vatuusi na vakirinda Iruva mmbo ashevautyaa uvingo.
58013005	Mulatire ngaa yekunda fesa-fo; fureny neefyo mutiri; mashika we muni mmbo aleamba, “Nshishekwaanguyaa nta-fo, nta nshishekuraa-fo.”
58013006	Kutani lwaidima yaamba, Nndumi mmbwe mwishitarama, nshishiryaa-fo; nndu wa vandu nkyoki asheshitannyaa?
58013007	Kummbweny vasongoru vany, valya valemoongoya irero lya Iruva. Na lyingyi, mwiilolaa nnu masiiyony a ngaa tawo, musore kikusiryo kyawo.
58013008	Yesu Kristo ni we yeto muni da aiyoo, ukwau na inu na fika llung'anu.
58013009	Mulashekurikwa ni ngyufundo tingyi shive na shive, na ta veny, mashika nkyisha nrima utumariswa ni isarya nta nshi shoonga-fo, mashika valya valeenda indo mbalewona-u pule-fo.
58013010	Lutiri kitara kyerasya ekyo valya vakee ifurukanyau yoo yeeminy elyo valatiri mumu wa ilya findo fya vayo.
58013011	Mashika findo filya samu ya vayo yeendwaa ando yoo eele ni nkohani nniini kimaruma kya ulyamari, firimbiti fya vayo mmbo fyakoryo efo kipoo ya ulale.
58013012	Kwa kimaruma ekyi Yesu nawe naambo nailyise vandu na samu yakwe muni, mmbo alelyiswa ukyiva kipoo ya muri.
58013013	Naasa lweende lunsheye kipoo ya ulaleny lwakwe, lwiirye uvingo lwakwe.
58013014	Mashika yaa llutiri-u muri ukaa-fo, mmbo lukeeruuya ulya ushaa.
58013015	Naasany, kyeendwa mmbwe, luniinge Iruva kiraso kya nnduma kyeeri kyoose, nkyo kyaamba, eto nto ndunda ta kana eko kakeindya irina lyakwe.
58013016	Lyo mularekywa itana fya usha na yaakana amwi-fo; mashika firaso sha efi mfyo fisenyi Iruva.
58013017	Indyeny vasongoru vany neevatirya vio, mashika wo mmbo vakeelala rembo kimaruma kya mirima yaany, sha vandu vasheveswaa kyany, naambo vatani indo vemusongoyaa na ifura nta valarosaa uuwo, mashika nkishemukyau kyisha-fo.
58013018	Luterevyeny; mashika lwiishi mmbo lutiri nrima nkesi, lukakunda itira ngaa shisha findony fyeru fyoose.
58013019	Neeny mmbo shamutereva nnu mutani indo naambo shiviirwa kwany uviny.
58013020	Naasany, Iruva wa urilalyi yeto aleviira Mwisi Nniini wa ironda lyakwe auka kwa vafu, na samu ya kyaasa kya llung'anu, we Nndumi weeru Yesu,
58013021	namusongovise yeni mutani wo kindo kyisha, mwitanaa shaasa akundye; nawe natani efyo finsennyi nnang'ani yeeru, kwi Yesu Kristo, Nnduma mmbwakwe llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
58013022	Lyo shamutereva vanavama, musisiryani na irero elyi lyirye wiikimbi; mashika mmbo shamureiya na marero maangu.
58013023	Manyiny sheelyi mwanamaye weeru Timoteo alemmaa iporomuwa, nawe kansha uviny, mmbo nshekwanannyaa na yeni ando amwi nawe.
58013024	Idikireny vasongoru vany woose, na veele woose; yewo va Italia nawo vamwiidikira.
58013025	Isarya lyikae na yeni moose.
59001001	Ni yeny Yakobo, ishinga lya Iruva na Nndumi Yesu Kristo, shamureiya na imwidikira nnu yeni ngyufyari ikumi na ivii ta Israeli tinyanyankye.
59001002	Vanavamaye vakwa, lollyeny sheelyi ni ifura yeni kyeeri mwavikwa fyeesony five na five.
59001003	Mwiimanyaa sheelyi kikusiryo kyany kikambikwa kyeesony mmbo muwonaa ivika nsia.
59001004	Ivika nsia lyoore usongovisi lwa vayo, naambo mukooye iva vasongovisi na vasaari mulakee vaanguye nkindo.
59001005	Lyo nndu wa kwany kaanguywa ni urango, atereve iruva yeto aniinga woose kwa vingyi, nta nnyakyeemmya-fo, nawe mmbo aniingwaa.
59001006	Lyo natereve etiri kikusiryo deny, nalatirwa nnyinyira nta shinnywa-fo; mashika yeto atirwa nnyinyira mmbo avakye matundulu a mura avivitwaa ni uraato, evivitwaa efo na efo.
59001007	Nndu wa ngata yeyo nalasheekusara awonisaa kindo efo kwa Nndumi-fo.
59001008	Nndu akee ilasa kuvii mmbo atirwa nnyinyira shieny takwe toose.
59001009	Kyaindi nndu nalatiri nnduma we nafure mashika we ammaa ing'aniswa;
59001010	kyaindi kimmba isimba lyansisirwa mmbo lyivakaa kivaro kya mbuveny ekyo kisherumakaa.
59001011	Mashika elyi mwi wavaa mmbo ukoraa mare, kivaro kya vayo kikaangara, na usha lwa vayo lukareka, isimba ni indo kishendaa.
59001012	Ngoma ni ya yeto asisirya fyeeso; mashika elyi ammaa iirikywa ni Nndumi mmbo ashewonaa ureto lwa muu, yelo Nndumi adeesye yewo vankunndye.
59001013	Kyeeri nndu akee yeeswa nalasheamba, “Ni Iruva akee isheesa.” Mashika Iruva nnyeswaa ni uravi-fo, nta we muni nnyesaa nndu-fo.
59001014	Mashika wo nndu mmbo eswaa llango takwe muni timoommwaa na illemba.
59001015	Lango ilya ikammaa ivanga ikeende ulyamari, na ulyamari llwa lukankuvamba lukaende ufu.
59001016	Vanavama vakwa vakunde, loleny mulalembike.
59001017	Wo ngata ya iniingya yeyo ikee shisha, na wo kindo kyaniingywa kikava kisongovisi, mmbo kyauka kwa Iruva, yeto muni sa, yeto kwakwe kulaifo yalashika, nta iveruka-veruka.
59001018	Llya alekunda we muni mmbo alelwiira kyeendwa ni irero lyakwe lya dede, lukava vasongoru va fyuumbe fyoose.
59001019	Efyo mufiishi ninsha, vanavama vakunde, kyasiany wo nndu nave mwaangu yaaranya, lyo nalave mwaangu irera ao iswa-fo,
59001020	mashika unyafi lwa nndu wa vandu llutanaa fya usumanu shaasa Iruva akundye-fo.
59001021	Kyasia kwiiseny deny na uravi na ukasha lwa wo ngata, mukooye iwarya irero llya lyilesongwa kwany mukee vafoo sau, nalyo llyo lyisheidimaa ikira mirima yaany,
59001022	Lyo veny vandu vatanaa kindo nta nshi vearanya-da-fo, mwilembikaa muveni.
59001023	Mashika, kwakooya nndu ava mwiiranya-da nalatanaa, nndu wa ngata yeyo mmbo avaa sha nndu akulolaa yoo kiloleny.
59001024	Mashika nndu mmbo akulolaa kawuya kakweengya, karekyo shaasa akai.
59001025	Kyaindi nndu yeto ammaa iringa ivavaso elyo lyishyallwa nndu nave lleke na ilyitira, nalavaa mwiiranya arekywa, kyaindi kava mwiitana, yeto mmbo ashevaa wa ngoma efo mirundyeny yakwe.
59001026	Kwakooya nndu moose akusara mmbo eshi Iruva, lyo nalasiraa ulumi lwakwe, kava indo mwikulemba we muni, ngata ya nndu yeto nshi yemanya Iruva-fo.
59001027	Imanya Iruva lya dede lyilatiri kiteve mbee ya Iruva Nde llyo elyi, “Ni indesaiya vana va ngwera na vaka va ding'u efo ngatareny tawo, na ikuringa kumuni kulawoni-fo fiteve.”
59002001	Nyira vanavama, mulashetira iirikyo elyi lya Nndumi Yesu Kristo akee Nndumi wa itumbe kikee kya ikundya vandu maata-fo.
59002002	Mashika mmbo lulolyaa kwakooya aanga nndu efo mwiindyeny aree pete ya saabu na soori shisha; elyi yeni naange nafo nndu nkiva, aree soori shikuu.
59002003	Na yeni mukaniinga ulya aree soori shisha wiindi, na immbia, “Yewe kaa rembo yaa kusha.” Na ivia nndu yeto nkiva, “Yewe salala alya, ao kaa ya si marendeny akwa.”
59002004	A ndesa mmwatana kindo kitiri teve miriminy yaany, mukavetira makusaro matefusu a yaava vandu?
59002005	Vanavama vakunde, aranyiny-te, mwiishi sheelyi Iruva mmbo alesauwa vakiva va ulana yelu vave masimba a iirikyo na veni ding'u ya umangyi yelo adeerye kyaasa yewo venkunda?
59002006	Kyaindi yeni mukamina vandu vakiva. A vandu masimba nshiwo yewo vakee imufota na imurwaa mundeutyo uvingo?
59002007	A ndesa nshi vakee yaarara uvaango lwany?
59002008	Kyaindi lyo kwakooya mwainutya ivavaso elyo lyisenyi llya lyikee ireiye indi, “Kunda nndu ungyi shaasa kukukunndye kumuni,” mmbo mutanaa nisha.
59002009	Lyo kwankooya mmbo murauwaa vandu mwivakundyaa, mmbo mwatana kya ulyamari na yeni mmbo musheutywaa uvingo mwikee verenga.
59002010	Shamashika wo nndu asheringaa mavavaso moose, lyo kafisha-u lyimwi nsi-da, mmbo amfisha moose.
59002011	Kimmba yeto aleamba, “Kulatuuse”, mmbwe yeto-da aleveamba, “Kulawae.” Kyasiany kwakooya kulaore kwatuusa, lyo kwawaa, mmbo kwamfisha mavavaso.
59002012	Rereny na itana sha vandu yewo valeke mmavavaso.
59002013	Mashika uvingo llutiri usari kwa yeto nalasaryaa-fo. Isarya vengyi mmbo lyitiri itumbe ngota yuutya uvingo.
59002014	Nyira vanavama, mmbo kwiiyo mbusha kyi kwakooya nndu aamba atiri iirikyo, lyo nalatanaa nta kindo? A ndesa iirikyo yeni lyishidimaa inkira?
59002015	Kwakooya nndu weeru wa kyuumi ao wa kyika nalatiri kyeraa ao anguywa nkya ilya,
59002016	na nndu wa kwany navavie, “Kweengyeny na ufoo, mundeora muro na iwuura, lyo nare nalavanniinga filya fiwaanguye, mmbo kyeekya-u-kyi?
59002017	Na kiwo-da na kikusiryo, kwakooya kilatiri mitannyi misha mmbo kifiiye.”
59002018	Lyo nndu ashidimaa yaamba, “Yewe kutiri kikusiryo, na yeny shatira mitannyi misha. Shoorany kikusiryo kyafo kilatiri mitannyi, na iny shikoore kikusiryo kyakwa na shia ya mitannyi yakwa.
59002019	Nkisha deny elyi kwiirikye sheelyi Iruva ni umwi. Naakwa ni mmbishwa na vasu vakwe veerikye indo na ireremya-u.
59002020	Kyaindi langa imanya yewe nndu wa vandu kulamayi nta kindo, sheelyi kikusiryo kilaryani na mitannyi nkitiri ndunda?
59002021	A nde weeru Abrahamu nshi aleekenywa usumanu kyuukana na mitannyi misha, llya aleniingya mwana ulya wakwe Isaki kava kiraso?
59002022	Yoo mmbo lwalollya kikusiryo mmbo kilerunda mashora ando amwi na mitannyi yakwe, na kikusiryo kilya kikavangiswa ni mitannyi ilya yakwe.
59002023	Mareiyo alya akainutywa alya eambaye, Abrahamu mmbo aleirikya Iruva, kikava nkyo kyamweekenya usumanu, kavevaangwa Mbuya ya Iruva.
59002024	Mmbo mwallollyany sheelyi nndu mmbo asheekenywa usumanu kimuukya efo mitannyiny yakwe, nshi kyuuka na kikusiryo kyeni-da-fo.
59002025	Naakwa Rahabu nawe, we nka ulya ntuusi a mmbo kulore aleekenywa usumanu kya mitannyi yakwe, llya alewarya varumi valya nisha, na ivakira evasomutaa na shia ingyi?
59002026	Kyasiany, shaasa mwiili wamfwa elyi mumuyo ulaiyo, ni indo-da na kyikusiryo mmbo kifiiye kwakooya kulaiyo mitannyi misha.”
59003001	Vanavama, mulakuvike velosha muveni, mashika mmbo musheutywaa uvingo uniini nnu.
59003002	Mashika mmbo lwawona misindara yese loose keengyi nnu. Nndu nalawonaa nsindara efo mireryeny yakwe, yeto ni nndu nsongovisi, yeto ashiidimaa ilammya mwiili wakwe moose.
59003003	Mwiishi mmbo frasi tivikwaa ukova kaniny naambo tisore kilya lukunndye, na itiinduta teende efo lukunndye.
59003004	Lyingyi loleny shaasa ngalava ing'ani, na irawa ni ngyuraato niini, mmbo tiindutwa ni usukani unnywa nsele ikeenda kundo koose efo nsongoru akunndye.
59003005	Naakiwo na ulumi niindo lukee kilungo kidu, lyo mmbo lweendee ikurosa iniini nnu. Loleny shaasa muro munnywa ukoraa nsito nniini nnu.
59003006	Ulumi nalo mmuro, ni uravi lukwaani koose, ulumi mmbo lukee kilungo kyeru, kyaindi llo lutefusaa mwiili moose, nalo mmbo lwaataa muro ularumikaa uvakye wa gehena.
59003007	Mashika wo ngata ya ifisi, na ya ndeye, na ya fyuumbe firufukaa si, na yefyo fikee yeeveny, fyoose efyo fivaa ilammya fivikyo, nafyo filemmaa yaavikwa ni vandu.
59003008	Lyo ulumi lluvee yaavika-fo, ni uravi lulamalalyaa, mmbo lwiishwe uroi lweende ufu.
59003009	Mmbo lwidimaa iindya nalo Iruva Nde weeru, lukavewuya idenga nalo vandu valya alevaumba kwa fwana yakwe.
59003010	Kaniny eko keni mfo kushuukaa mbora na kidengo. Vanavama, nkivaa kive indo-fo.
59003011	A ndesa usoka lumwi lwidimaa yuuta mura nsha na mura wa mmbala?
59003012	Vanavama, ao ndesa nri wa nkuu ushidimaa ivika ndunda ta mafura, ao nsabibu uvike ndunda ta nkuu? Kiwo indo-da usoka llushidimaa yuuta mura wa mmbala na mura nsha-fo.
59003013	Mmbi kwany araiye urango na umanyo? Naasa yeto noore mashora akwe a ngaa shisha, ekee na ufoo na urango.
59003014	Lyo mukantira kififi na irovyo miriminy mwiruyaa myaandu, naasa mulakuroseeny-fo, nta mulasande wongo na dede-fo.
59003015	Urango lwa ngata yeyo lluukye uwe-fo, llwa kiulana, lwa ngata ya kivandu na lwa kimmbishwa.
59003016	Mashika ando kukee kififi na myaandu, nng'u kuiyo mirauko na wo ngata ya uravi.
59003017	Kyaindi urango luukye kwa Iruva mmbo lukee usha, lwa urilalyi na ufoo, lwa waarya, lulangye yaranya vandu vengyi, lukaishwa ilyillya na itira ndunda shisha, lulatiri uriingi, nta lulatiri ukunang'ari.
59003018	Ndunda ya usumanu mmbo yavakywa ni urilalyi kwa yewo veende urilalyi.
59004001	A fira nkwi tikeyuuka ando amwi na ngapanu eto tikee kwany? A nshi kunu kwany kweni efo langony eto tikapanaa na malungo any?
59004002	Mmbo mukee ilanga, lyo mulatiri kindo, mukawaa na ilollya kinying'u, nta mulawonisaa kindo. Mmbo mwakapana lyo mmuwonaa kindo-fo mashika elyi mulaterevaa!
59004003	Naakwa mwatereva, mmuwonisaa-fo mashika elyi muterevaa kikasha, naambo murundye nafyo lango eto tany.
59004004	Yeni vetuusa, a mmbo mulaishi itira mbuya na ulana ni iva nkiduva wa Iruva? Nkyo wo nndu akunda iva mbuya ya ulana mmbo akwallwa nkiduva wa Iruva.
59004005	A ndesa mareiyo mmbo arera kya ruu? Mumuyo yeto akee nnang'ani yeeru mmbo alulangye kindo kyamaa yeende kififi?
59004006	Kyaindi mmbo alusimba yese isarya elyo lyiilannyi kyeeso; nkyo kaamba, Iruva mmbo akingya yewo vekung'anisa veni, kaniinga yewo vakunyiisye isarya lyakwe.
59004007	Kikeeny indo indyeny Iruva. Umbuteny mmbishwa, nawe mmbo ashemurishaa.
59004008	Serikyeny kufii na Iruva nawe mmbo ashekaa kufii na yeni. Maako any nalatani makasha-fo, kimmba mulakee va nrwe umwi.
59004009	Muverovyo nting'wa na ikapa kiiyo. Ikyesa lyany lyaaluke kiiyo, na ifura lyany lyive yaanguywa.
59004010	Kunyiiseny mbee ya Iruva Nndumi naambo nawe namurose.
59004011	Nyira vanavama, mulavikyani ureeree-fo, yeto mwivikya ungyi ureeree ao imuutya uvingo mmbo avikya usumanu ureeree na iluutya uvingo. Nkyoony kwammuutya usumanu uvingo nkwatana kya usumanu-fo, mmbo kwankwallwa mwirumbwa myaandu.
59004012	Mwiniingya usumanu akee na mwirumbuya vandu mwaanduny ni umwi nsi, mmbwe yeto ashidimaa ikira ao irumata. A ni yewe vi kwaidima yuutya ungyi uvingo?
59004013	Kyasiany-te yeni mwambaa, “Inu ao ndesi mmbo lushendaa muriny mmbe na ikaa-fo ando a mwaaka sele, lukapye-fo mbusha na iwona masaa”;
59004014	lyo nta mmwiishi mbony ta ndesi-fo. A muu wany mmbo ukee inda? Mashika yeni mmbo muvakye murwe wa mura ulollyo ulaalu-da numa mmbukiyo-fo.
59004015	Yeni ando a yaamba, “Kwakooya Nndumi akunda, mmbo lukaa-u lwitanaa kive na kive”,
59004016	lyo ulaalu mmbo mwakurosa mwirumanaa, ikurosa lyoose lya ngata yei mmbo lyikee ikasha.
59004017	Kyasiany yeto eeshi kyisha kyeetana nawe kara nalakitana, kwakwe yeto ni ulyamari.
59005001	Naasany-te yeni masimba iyeny, moongore kimaruma kya nyinyira yeyo imusheyaa.
59005002	Masaa any mmbo akee mapooru, na soori tany mmbo tikee shilye nkurukuru.
59005003	Saabu yaany na fesa yaany mmbo yantirwa nkurere, na kurere ya vayo mmbo ishemusutaa, ishelya miili yaany sha muro. Mmbo mwankuvikya kiraambu kya nkonu wa ifurumya.
59005004	Loleny-te, weesi lwa varemi yewo valeilula marema any mukalurwaa na ntambo, weesi yelo mmbo lukeevaanga, na fiiyo fya yewo valeilula mmbo fileanga marwiny a Nndumi muni matorito.
59005005	Mmbo mukeekureka ulaniny, na ikushangala efo langony ta mwiili, mukawuutisa mirima yaany indo.
59005006	Mmbo mukeyuutya yeto wa usumanu uvingo mukammbwaa, nta nalashidimaa isalala na yeni.
59005007	Kimmba ni indo nyira, sisiryeny kufike nkonu eto Nndumi ashaa. Mwiishi, nremi mmbo avereyaa na nsia fimu fya uruka fikee fya wuuru, kavereya kimaruma kya vayo kutani fimu fyawonisa mbua ya mbee na ya ifurumya.
59005008	Na yeni kevesisiryeny-te mukaarise mirima yaany, mashika isha lya Nndumi mmbo lyikee kufii.
59005009	Nyira, mulakunung'uni-fo, naambo mulasheutywa uvingo. Loleny-te, mwileta mwaandu nyoo mwaangony akai.
59005010	Nyira, soreny vakisuku valya valerera na irina lya Nndumi, vave kyaaso kya yewo vasumani iwona makasha, vavesisirya.
59005011	Loleny-te yewo veevereya mmbo lwavio vatiri ngoma. Mmbo muleeta mbony ta usisiryo lwa Yobu, mukavelollya shaasa Nndumi atana yoo mafurumyony, sheelyi Nndumi mmuni ulyilyi na muni isarya.
59005012	Kyaindi mmwasi ya efyo fyoose, vanavama, mulalye mboo-fo, nta na iruveeu nta na ulana-fo, nta na ngata ingyi-fo, kyaindi yee yany ive yee na oode iveva oode, naambo mulasheanga uvingony.
59005013	Kwakooya nndu waany awa rengeny, natereve Iruva. Kwakooya akyesye nriminy, eembe fiimbo fya yaarafuma.
59005014	Na kwakooya nndu wa kwany alwee navaange vamiku va siri; nawo vashenterevya na imwaamba mafura meele na irina lya Nndumi.
59005015	Na itereva kwa kyikusiryo mmbo lyishekiraa nndu yeto alwee na Nndumi namwipoo, na kwakooya elyamarye nakooye isaryo.
59005016	Kuryeny ngyulyamari tany muweni na veni na iterevyana, naambo mukooye ishiiswa. Itereva lya nndu wa usumanu mmbo lyikee isha nnu, kwakooya atereva na sina.
59005017	Nkisuku Elia mmbo ekee nndu wa ngata yeeru yese, katereva na sina mbua ikamanda; mmbwa ikara ilakapa ando a myaaka iraru na kyenga.
59005018	Kooka-fo katereva-se, kulya iruveeu kukarwiika mmbwa ikakapa, na uruka lukaende ndunda ta vayo.
59005019	Vanavama, kwakooya nndu waany ameenda mbai neekywa kikee kya dede, na ungyi kansongosia,
59005020	manyiny sheelyi yeto asongosyaa nndu allyamara kutani ooka efo shieny yakwe ya ureti, mmbo akira nrima ukie ufu, na isikya ulyamari wiingyi.
60001001	Yeny Petro, Nrumi wa Yesu Kristo, shamureiya yeni Vakristo munyanyakye mukakaa kundo kweny efo Ponto na Galatia, Kapadokia na Asia na Bitinia.
60001002	Shaasa Iruva Nde alesongwa imumanya llya alemwiilyisa na Mumuyo, mukatana mwakunyiisa mukaletywa samu ya Yesu Kristo. Nndumi namweengerye urilalyi na isarya.
60001003	Iruva naitikiswa, we Nde wa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo, yeto alelwiira lya kavii kyuuka na isarya lyakwe naambo luwoni ivika nsia elyo lyeende muu kimaruma kya iruka lya Yesu Kristo auka kwa vafu;
60001004	Naambo luwoni ding'u yeyo ilalyamarikaa, ilatiri ivara, ilashuumaa, ikeeshisurumi iruveeu kimaruma kyany.
60001005	Na yeni mmbo mukeeringwa ni finya ya Iruva kimuukya kikusiryony kutani mwawona ukiro yelo lushelolywa paa kyeeri kya ifurummya.
60001006	Mmbo mufuraa nnu kyeeri ekyo, na kikava ulaalu kyeeri ekyi kifii mmbo kimukooye irovyo ni fyeeso fya ngata shive na shive.
60001007	Naambo elyi kikusiryo kyany kisheeswaa, nakyo mmbo kiilanyi saabu shoose yeyo yeeswa na muro, kushe nnduma na itumbe na wiindi, elyi Nndumi Yesu Kristo ashelolywa paa.
60001008	Nawe mmbo munkundye, lla elyi mulandellollye na miso, na kikava mmullollye ulaalu, lyo mumwiirikye, na ifura nawe nnu deny ifura lyilavaa imina nta, ifura lyitiri itumbe,
60001009	kya iwarya ekyo mushefurumya nakyo kya iirikyo lyany, llo ukiro lwa mirima yaany.
60001010	Kya mbony ta ukiro elo vakisuku mmbo valeruuyaruuya, nesununda-sununda, vakaawuya kisuku kya isarya elyo lyishekaa lyimusheye yeni.
60001011	Vakaruuya ni indii na ni kyeeri kyi kileorwa ni Mumuyo wa Kristo yeto ekee nnang'ani yaawo, yeto alepooka ikureekya makiva yoo ashekoyaa Kristo, na itumbe elyo lyisheshaa numa ya vayo.
60001012	Vakaorwa sheelyi nshi kimaruma kyawo veni-fo, kyaindi kimaruma kyany nkyo vakafurukannya efyo, na mfyo muleongoywa ni valya valemoongoya Nrumi ya Nsia vekaywa ni Mumuyo Mweele yeto alerumwa auka iruveeu. Mbony eti naakwa ni vasu mmbo valangye itilola.
60001013	Kyasia, kaaryeny efo miriminy yaany, muve na mwiina findony fyany muvikye isarya elyo nsia deny eto muleorwa paa lya Yesu Kristo alesha.
60001014	Veny sha vana vatiri wiindi mure mulasora lango tilya ta mbee teeriyani na utondo.
60001015	Muvevaka yeto alemuvaanga akee mweele, neeni muveva veele efo mikaayeny yaany;
60001016	kimmba kikee kireiye indi, mmbo mushevaa veele shaasa neeny shikee mweele.
60001017	Na kimmba mwambaanga Nde, nawe mmbwe yeto ashaanduyaa wo nndu kulaifo ikundya shaasa akunda we muni, naasa kaeny na usau kyeeri ekyi mukee yaa ulaniny mukee veny.
60001018	Muvemanya sheelyi nshi mulewowowa na findo filyamarikaa-fo, sha fesa ao saabu, naambo muuke efo ngaany ya ureti mulewarya kwa vande vany-fo.
60001019	Kyaindi mmbo mulewowowa na samu ya wuuru, shaa ya ngurana ilatiri ivara nta mfere, nnyo ya Kristo.
60001020	Nawe mmbo aishiwa deny uka elyo mbee kulaore ulana elu lwemmbeiywa, nawe kaorwa paa fyeeri efi kimaruma kyany.
60001021	Yeni muleirikya Iruva kyeendwa mmbwe, nawe mmbo alennruta auka ufuny kaniinga itumbe, naambo muwoni kikusiryo neevika nsia efo kwa Iruva.
60001022	Mukammaa ikwiilyisa mirima yaany na iirikya dede yeyo, muvefikya ikunda lya Kikristo lyilatiri ukunang'ari, mukundani na nrima.
60001023	Mashika mmbo muleirwa lya kavii, nshi kyuuka ufyariny yelo lukeesia-fo, nkwa yelo lulasiaa, na irero lya Iruva lyitiri muu, elyo lyakaa llung'anu.
60001024	Mashika, Mwiili wa nndu mmbo uvakye mare, na itumbe lya vayo lyoose nkimwi sha kivaro kya mare, mare mmbo ashumaa na kivaro kyaangare.
60001025	Kyaindi irero lya Iruva mmbo lyakaa-u llung'anu. Na irero elyo ni irero llya isha lyileongowa kwany.
60002001	Naasany, rweeny kwaasha uravi loose na ntambo moose, na ukunang'ari na ukasha na ivikyana ureeree loose.
60002002	Mukee sha vakoku vaonika ulaalu indi, langeny urango luvakye malela alakee malonge-longe, naambo mwiidimi itumaa efo ukirony.
60002003	Kimmba mwammaa ishosha ulyilyi lwa Nndumi.
60002004	Endeny kwa yeto akee iwe lyitiri muu, yelyo vandu valelyilema, kyaindi kwa Iruva mmbo lyikee isauwe, lyikavetira nnduma.
60002005	Neeni mukee sha mawe atiri muu, mmbo mukee vatani muve mmba ya Mumuyo, ukohani weele mukooye yuuta firaso fya mirima, efyo fishiirikywa ni Iruva, kwi Yesu Kristo.
60002006	Mashika mmbo kikee kireiye efo mareiyony indi, Lola-te yoo Sion mmbo shavika-u iwe iniini lya ndumba, lyikee isauwe lyitiri nnduma na yeto mumwiirikya nnyashefiyaa sony-fo.
60002007	Naasany nnduma yeu ni wany yeni mukusirye-u. Kyaindi kwa yewo valakusirye-u, Iwe elyo veetana mmba valelyilema, mmbo lyilealuwa iwe iniini lya ndumba.
60002008	Na lyingyi-se, lyikava iwe lyekapa urende, na lyitulaa. Mashika irero elyo mmbo lyileva nsindara kwawo, valalyiirikye, nawo mmbo vekee vadeesye efyo.
60002009	Kyaindi yeni mmbo mukee ufyari usauwe, lukee ukohani lwa kimangyi, ufyari lwa vandu veele, vandu va ushilyi lwa Iruva, naambo mwiidimi ivambisa isarya lyakwe yeto alemuvaanga naambo muuke ireeminy na yaanga seny yakwe iilanyi;
60002010	yeni kulaore mbee mwekee ufyari elyo, kyaindi ulaalu ni ufyari lwa Iruva, mwekee vandu valaishi isarya lya Iruva, kyaindi ulaalu mmbo mwammaa iwarya isarya.
60002011	Vakunde vakwa, mmbo shamwiikima mwikee sha vandu va kyaaro valaiyo kyaasha, kwiiseny na lango ta mwiili yeto tikapanaa na mumuyo.
60002012	Kaeny na ngaa shisha efo kwa vandu va masanga, naambo kwakooya vamweekerya fya wongo sheelyi mukee veetana makasha, elyi valolaa mikaaye yaany misha, vang'anise Iruva elyi nkonu ufikaa.
60002013	Indyeny wo ivavasyo mwaniingwa, mwishiryaa Iruva, kwakooya mmbo kyauka kwa mangyi, yee mmbo atiri ushilyi uniini.
60002014	Kwakooya ni vaniini, yee, mmbo varumwa mbwe naambo vaorote yewo veetana makasha na irumisha yewo vetana mesha.
60002015	Mashika ni indo Iruva akunndye, naambo kyeendwa ni itana mesha mufindikire kana ka vandu yewo varung'ani;
60002016	muve sha vandu valeke, lyo mure mularunda na uleke lwany kyikee kya isikya makasha, kyaindi mukae sha vana va Iruva.
60002017	Indyeny vandu woose. Kundeny Vakristo vengyi. Ishikeny Iruva. Niingyeny mangyi wiindi.
60002018	Yeni varundi, indyeny vanndumi vany na usau nnu, nta nshi yewo vakee vesha na vafoo-da-fo, naakwa ni yewo vanyaasi.
60002019	Mashika usha lwa dede ni elyi nndu asisirya eireiye Iruva kyeeri akeelyiswa ukiva kilakee kya usumanu.
60002020	Shamashika ni usha-ki nndu ashewonisaa-u elyi asisirya ekapwaa ngyoi elyi atannyi ulyamari? Kyaindi isisirya mwikapwaa elyi mutannyi mesha, elu llo usha lwa dede mbee ya Iruva.
60002021	Mashika ekyo nkyo mulevaangywa; mashika naakwa ni Kristo mmbo alelyiswa ukiva kimaruma kyany, kamoora shia ya ilatya, mukooye insora.
60002022	We nnyaletana ulyamari-fo, nta kindo kya ntambo-fo.
60002023	Kyeeri aleararwa nnyaleviira firumu-fo; llya alelyiswa ukiva nnyalekutatarye-fo, lyo mmbo alekurambikya kwa yeto mwirumbwa fya usumanu.
60002024	We mmbo aleipoo ngyulyamari teru mwiiliny wakwe alya nsalabeny, naambo lukava vafu kya ulyamari, lukae na muu kya mbony ta usumanu, na llya alekapwa nkyo kilemukira.
60002025	Mashika lyo mmbo mwekeereka sha mburu; kyaindi ulaalu mmbo mwambuiya Mwiisi waany na Mwiisalallya mirima yaany.
60003001	Naasany na yeni vaka indyeny womi wany; naambo kwakooya veefo valairikye Irero lya Iruva, vaalashwa ni ngaa ta vaka vawo kulore nta vaita irero elyo,
60003002	kyeeri valolaa ngaa yaany shisha itiri vyo.
60003003	Utore lwany lulave utore lwa kipoo, sha yooka fii, na ikwaamba findo fisha na ikwaambika soori-fo;
60003004	kyaindi luve unndu usha lwa efo nriminy lulalolywa ni miso lukee llo utore lulalyamarikaa, nto nrima wa urilalyi na umamiri lukee lwa wuuru uniini mbee ya Iruva.
60003005	Mashika indo ni indo vaka valya veele va kasha valekutokopa vakaora usha lwawo kwa Iruva veshiindyaa womi vawo.
60003006	Mukumbuye shaasa Sara aleindya Abrahamu katana ammbaanga nndumi. Na yeni nkiwo mukee sha vana vakwe, mutani mesha, nta nshi kimaruma kya iryaa ikapwa-fo.
60003007	Neeni womi kiwo, kaeny na vaka vany na urango, muveniinga nka wiindi, mashika avakye kiiya kilatiri finya, kimmba nawo vakee veni ding'u ya isarya lya muu, naambo fiterewo fyany filafwe mmwasi.
60003008	Na kirero kya ifurumya ni ekyi, veny na nrwe umwi, muve velyillyana, muvekundana sha vana va nka, veiyana mashoya mwiikunyiisye.
60003009	Muveva vandu valataa ukasha na ukasha, ao ikapa mong'wa; lyo muve vevikya mbora. Shamashika, efyo mfyo mulevaangywa naambo muwoni mbora ive ding'u yaany.
60003010	Shamashika, yeto akundye muu wakwe, nawoni suku shisha. Naimi ulumi lwakwe irera makasha, na kana kakwe kalarere fya ntambo.
60003011	Nare makasha natani mesha, nalange urilalyi, na ilulalakya deny
60003012	Mashika miso a Nndumi mmbo alola yewo va usumanu na maarwi akwe akaaranya fiterewo fyawo. Kyaindi kisangu kya Nndumi mmbo kyafummbya yewo veetana makasha.
60003013	A ni vi yeto ashemuvavisaa, mukankutakura itana mesha?
60003014	Lyo kwakooya mwalyiswa ukiva kimaruma kya usumanu ngoma ni yaany. Mulaereye elyi vamweerese, nta mulaereve, lyo itikiseny Kristo Nndumi weeru efo miriminy yaany.
60003015	Wo nkonu kudeesyeny irouwa wo nndu yeto ashemuvesaa mbony ta ivika nsia elyi lyany, lyo murouwe na urilalyi na wiindi.
60003016	Neeni kaeny na nrima nsha ulatiri usakiro, naambo kwakooya mwavikywa ureeree, yewo vetendaa mweendo wany nsha efo kwa Kristo vakooye isutwa.
60003017	Mashika mmbo kikee ngoma ilyiswa ukiva kimaruma kya elyi lwatana mesha, kwakooya Iruva ankunda kive indo, ngota elyi lwelyiswaa ukiva lwiitanyi makasha.
60003018	Mashika naakwa ni Kristo alelyiswa ukiva lyimwi kimaruma kya ngyulyamari, we kava muni usumanu ando a yewo valatiri usumanu, naambo nalurwaa kwa Iruva. Mwiili wakwe mmbo ulewaawa, lyo nrima wakwe ukakaa na muu,
60003019	na nto aleengya nato yewo vekee vafinge, kavaongoya nrumi shisha,
60003020	nawo vekee vandu vemina elyo mbee, kyeeri Iruva evavereye na usisiryo uniini, sha kyeeri kilya kya Noe, llya mmba ilya ya maboo yekee songosyo, nafo ni vandu vaangu valeanga-fo vandu nyanya nsi, vakakya iwaawa ni mura.
60003021	Ubatiso mmbo luvakye findo efyo, mashika ubatiso mmbo lukeemukira yeni mikonuny yei, (nshi kya ira uravi lwa mwiili-da-fo, kyaindi kya nrima ulatiri usakiro mbee ya Iruva), kyeendwa ni iruka lya Yesu Kristo.
60003022	Nawe akee rembo woko usha lwa Iruva kakweengya na iruveu, vasu na, itumbe na finya fikyimaa ivikwa si yakwe.
60004001	Naasany kimmba Kristo alelyiswa ukiva ekee na mwiili, na yeeni raeny fisha fya kirengo ekyo kyeni. Mashika yeto alelyiswa ukiva ekee na mwiili mmbo amfuna ulyamari.
60004002	Kipookya ulaalu mulakyeengere ikaa efo langony ta kivandu-fo, kuuta ni ikaa efo Iruva akunndye fyeeri efi fyany fyamusaaya fyekaa yaa ulaniny.
60004003	Mashika fyeeri fyeru efyo fyammira fivekufiye itana fya lango ta kiulana, nto yeenda efo uraviny, na lango, na unangwa, na mirumwa ya italauwa ndeu, na ngyari, na miindye ya maruva a wongo ilasumani;
60004004	efo findony efyo wo mmbo vatinnywa nkyany deny elyi mulakeesanga nawo efo uraviny elu lulatiri nta kyeeso, nawo vakava vamutendaany.
60004005	Nawo mmbo vasheveswaa kimwi kimwi ni yeto akudeesye isherumbuya yewo vakee na muu na valya vafiiye.
60004006	Mashika elyi kikee indo naakwa ni valya vafiiye valeongoywa nrumi yeyo ya nsia naambo vautywa uvingo vekee na mwiili kiinani na ngata ya kivandu. Lyo vashekaa na muu wa kimumuyo indo shaasa Iruva akee na muu.
60004007	Lyo masiyony a findo fyoose ansha kufii, naasany, wareny urango muvelala shoovi mwiterevaa.
60004008	Mmwasi ya findo fyoose veny na usasari nnu lwa ikundana, mashika ukundi mmbo lulamyaa ulyamari na lukang'ana inda.
60004009	Waryaniny muveni efo kyeny kwany kulaifo ikunung'una,
60004010	wo umwi kiinani na shaasa akee nsimbe kive kyerundyana muveva sha vangari vesha vekallya fyama fya Iruva fya wo ngata. "
60004011	Kwakooya nndu arerya vandu navarerye shaasa irero lya Iruva lyikai, kwakooya arunda narunde na wiidimi elo Iruva anningye naambo Iruva naute-u ing'aniswa kya findo fyoose kwi Yesu Kristo. Nnduma na wiidimi mfyakwe we llung'anu na llung'anu. Amen.
60004012	Nyira vakunde, loleny mulasheyaawutwa ni ngatara yeto tikee nnang'ani yaany timusheyaa sha muro naambo timweese, eto tilave sha kindo kyeny kyamusheya-fo.
60004013	Lyo shaasa muleakana makiva a Kristo, fureny, naambo na kyeeri ekyo kya itumbe lyisheorwa paa mushefura na ikapa ukoru. "
60004014	Mukee va ngoma kwakooya mwakapwa mong'wa, kimaruma kya irina lya Kristo mashika Mumuyo yeto wa itumbe wa Iruva mmbwe yeto amukaaye.
60004015	Nkivaa nndu wa kwany noorotwa kya iwaa-fo, ao kya unyinyi, ao kya maravi, ao sha nndu mwikulambika findony fya vandu vengyi-fo.
60004016	Kyaindi kwankooya orotwa elyi akee Nkristo nalafiiyo ni nrwe-fo, lyo neengere irumisha Iruva na irina elyo.
60004017	Mashika fyeeri fyammaa iinana yuutywa uvingo kyipooka na efo mmba ya Iruva; na elyi kishepookaa neese, a kyefurumya kya yewo valatirye Nrumi yeyo ya Iruva wo mmbo kishevaa inda?
60004018	Na kwakooya yeto wa usumanu kishemmbiyaa tamba ikya, a yeto nalakee mwiindya Iruva kaveva llyamari ashelollywaa dede?
60004019	Naasany yewo veorotwa shaasa Iruva akunndye vasurumi mirima yaawo efo kwakwe, vavekaa-fo vetanaa fya usha, kive ni Muumbi yeto weeru nsha vantannya.
60005001	Kya vamiku yewo vakee efo kwany, yeny shikee mmiku uroyeawo, na nkureekyi wa makiva a Kristo na mwiakana itumbe llya lyishesukuwaa paa elyi numa; mmbo shamoolokya,
60005002	mwiise na isalallya nisha ironda elyo lya Iruva lyikee kwany, nta mulavaa sheelyi mwaitikywa, kyaindi mutani indo kikee kya ikunda shaasa Iruva akundye; nta nshi kya fesa ya ntambo-fo, lyo kive kya nrima.
60005003	Nta mulasheeva sha vekwaallwa vanndumi efo fyuungony fyawo-fo, mashika mmbo mukundywa muve kyaaso kisha efo irondeny lyany.
60005004	Na elyi Mwiisi yeto nniini ashelollywaa paa, mmbo mushewaryaa ureto lwa itumbe llwa lulanaa.
60005005	Kiwo-da na yeni mukee vakoo, irikyeny vamiku. Yee, yeni moose raeny ngata ya ikunyiisa, llyo mushidimaa irundyana nisha, shamashika Iruva mmbo alema yewo vekung'anisa, lyo yewo vekunyiisa kavasimba isarya lyakwe.
60005006	Kyasia kunyiisyen yoo wokony lwa Iruva lukee ulyimbi, naambo namwipoo elyi kyeeri kifikaa.
60005007	Mukeny indo muvenrika we mario any moose, ni elyi we akee ikuvinisa nnu kyany yeni.
60005008	Veny na mwiiyanu muvelala shoovi; mashika nkumbi yeto waany we mmbishwa, mmbo avakye miiso idinaa, itivaa-tivaa efo na efo iiruyaa nndu inratwe-ratwe.
60005009	Lyo yeni kaaryeny, munlemi na kikusiryo, manyiny ukiva elo lyo weni lukee ilollyo kwa vanavamaye vany yaa ulaniny.
60005010	Na Iruva yeto muni isarya lyoose, yeto alemuvaanga naambo mwaange itumbeny lyakwe lya llung'anu kwi Kristo, mwammaa ilyiso ukiva kyaangu, we muni mmbo ashemuselevendee, na imuvika kiringisyo, na imusimba finya.
60005011	Wiidimi llwakwe llung'anu kufike llung'anu. Amen.
60005012	Barwa yei mmbo shamureiya na woko lwa Silvanu, mwanamaye weeru akee nsaari, nng'u marero yoo maangu, naambo shiikyimbe na ikureeka-u sheelyi yelyi llyo isarya lya dede lya Iruva. Na yeni salaleny mukusirye-u.
60005013	Siri shisauwe ni Iruva ya kunu Babeli yamwiidikira, na nsero wakwa, we Marko kiwo.
60005014	Kwiidikireny na kimimindo kya ukundi. Unapwe lukae kwany yeni moose mukee nnang'ani ya Kristo. Amen.
61001001	Yeny Simion Petro shikee ishinga na nrumi wa Yesu Kristo, shareiya kwany yeni mulewonisa kikusiryo kimwi neese, kitiri wuuru efo usumanuny lwa Iruva weeru na Nkira weeru Yesu Kristo.
61001002	Isarya lyimukae na urilalyi lwengerywa-u kwi immanya Iruva na Yesu Nndumi weeru.
61001003	Kimmba wiidimi lwa Ki-iruva lwallusimba findo fyoose fikwaani na muu na utele kya immanya yeto aleluvaanga na itumbe lyakwe na usha lwakwe muni.
61001004	Kyeendwa ni efyo kalusimba kyaasa kiniini nnu, kya wuuru. Naambo kimaruma kya vayo muve veakana ngata ya Ki-iruva, mwikirwaa efo uraviny lukee ya ulaniny kyeendwa ni lango.
61001005	Ee, kimaruma kikee ekyo kyeni mukwiitike nnu kwa taari yaany efo kikusiryony muvesanda na mesha, na efo mesheny yoo musande-fo urango,
61001006	na efo urangony mwengeryen mwiina, neefo nnang'ani ya mwiina muvike-u ivereya, na ivereya elyo lyisange na utele,
61001007	Efo uteleny kushe-u nkundanu wa vakristo, naefo nkundanuny wa vakristo lyisange-u ikunda.
61001008	Naasa kwakooya findo fya ngata yeyo fyawalawala efo kwany, mmbo fishemwekyaa mulave varoko ao valavikaa ndunda na yeni mmbo mwiishi Nndumi weeru Yesu.
61001009	Mashika yeto nalatiri efyo mmbo akee mfu miso, nnyashiidimaa ilollya findo fikee kwaasha-fo, mmbo anrekywa mbony ta iilyiswa ngyulyamari takwe ta kasha.
61001010	Naasany vanavama, kutakureny nnu ivangisa uvaango lwany na isauwa lyany, mashika mukantana indo mmushewonaa nta nsindara umwi-fo.
61001011	Mashika mmbo mukee vaniinge mwaanya ruu wa yaanga umanginy lwa llung'anu lwa Nndumi na Mwikira weeru Yesu Kristo.
61001012	Kwa ekyo mmbo shikudeesye imukumbura efyo mikonu myoose, na kikava mufiishi na ivangisywa efo dedeny yeyo.
61001013	Na yeny mmbo shilollye ni usumanu, kyeeri ekyi shikee yaa ulaniny, shimwaante shiimukumburaa efyo.
61001014	Kimmba shammanya sheelyi yaa shikai nkufii shuuke-u, shaasa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo ammeshoora.
61001015	Lyo mmbo shikutakuraa naambo wo kyeeri elyi shammaa ifwa mwiidimi ikumbwa efyo fyoose.
61001016	Mashika llulelatya mbony tikee shisongosie na urango lwa kivandu, llya lulemuvia yeni mbony ta wiidimi lwa Nndumi weeru Yesu Kristo na isha lyakwe-fo. Lyo mmbo lwelollya luveni itumbe lyakwe.
61001017	Mashika mmbo aleniingwa wiindi na itumbe ni Iruva, kyeeri aleengywa unyanga luleuka itumbeny iniini lwishambaa,“Yeu ni Mwana wakwa Nkunde wakwa, ashisennyi.”
61001018	Na unyanga yelo mmbo lulelwiita luuka iruveeu kyeeri lwekee nawe kulya ifumbuny llya yeele.
61001019	Neese mmbo lutiri irero elyo lya ukisuku lyitiri finya mmwasi, na yeni mukammaa ilyilola, sha taa imikaa ando a ireema, mwatana nisha, kutani kwakya na nyinyiri ya ngama ipooke ivaa miriminy yaany.
61001020	Mashika nkwiifo nta kyeeri kimwi ao ando koose ukisuku lulemmendwa ni ikunda lya nndu wa vandu-fo.
61001021	Lyo vandu mmbo valerera filya fileuka kwa Iruva, lyo veteterwaa ni Mumuyo Mweele.
61002001	Kyaindi kulya vanduny valya mmbo kulekwiipoo-fo vakisuku va wongo, shaasa na efo kwany kushekaa-fo velosha va wongo, nawo mmbo vasheloshaa vandu mbony ta urere tiretaa, vavelema naakwa ni Nndumi yeto alevawouwa, vakwengye urumato wo veni uviny.
61002002	Vandu veengyi mmbo vashesoraa uravi elo lwawo, na shia yeyo ya dede mmbo isheminwaa kyeendwa mmbo.
61002003	Na efo langony tawo mmbo vashewonaa-fo mbusha efo kwany kimaruma kya marero awo a ulembi na ngapo yaawo shaasa kyekee uka elyo mbee nnyikyeeywa-fo, na yeto mwivarumata ni afii akai nta nnalala-fo.
61002004	Mashika kwakooya kulaore Iruva aleauwa vasu valya valelyamara indi kaveera irininy evavikaa kifingyony kya ireema, varingyo-u kutani yaanduywa lyasha.
61002005	Nta ulana lulya lwa kasha kyeeri kya Noe nalalure indi-fo, lyo kasuruma muya usumanu ulya we Noe ando amwi na vandu vengyi mfungare.
61002006	Lyo aleengye urumato miri ilya ya Sodoma na Gomora, ikaya ikatana yaaluka ifu yeni, naambo ive kindo kya ikumbura yewo vasheraa iindya Iruva elyi numa.
61002007	Iruva kakira-u Loti ekee nndu wa usumanu alesukywa nnu mfilya fyeketanwa ni valya na weendo lwawo lwa uravi lwawo.
61002008	Mashika nndu yeu wa usumanu kwakooya akaa nnang'ani yaawo, nalollye na iita, mmbo alevavyo nriminy yeu wakwe wa usumanu, wo nkonu indo, kyeendwa ni mashora awo nalakee a usumanu.
61002009	Kyikeeny indo, Iruva mmbo eeshi shaasa asheauwaa vasauwe vakwe efo fyeesony sha efyo, na irwaa yewo valakee va usumanu ando a yoorotwa kufike nkonu yeto wa mwaandu.
61002010	Mmwasi valya valatyaa ngaa ya mwiili ya ukirinda, na imina ushilyi lwiiyo.
61002011	Vandu yeva mmbo vakee vakaari, vakakurosa, nta valareremaa elyi vakeyaarara findo fyeele, naakwa vava ni vasu nawo vailanyi vaafinya vakawara wiidimi na finya mmwasi, nta mmbavakumbaa mbee ya Nndumi-fo.
61002012	Lyo vandu yewo mmbo vavakye mafisi nalatiri urango, vawonikye sha mafisi da etirwa na yuutwa-u. Mashika vaararaa Iruva kya findo nta valafiishi, nawo mmbo vasherumatwaa.
61002013	Vakasumana na firetaa, fikee ni weesi lwa uravi lwawo, vakakusara unangwa kyeeri kya nsanyiny ni kindo kya ifura, vakava varavi na sony vesoraa lango tilatiri nnyanu vevikaa mirumwa ya ikunda, elyi vavikaa mirumwa yaawo ando amwi na yeni.
61002014	Mmbo vatiri miso eshwe utuusi, vakava vandu valamandaa itana fya ulyamari vakavelemba valya kulore vantumaa iirikyony vakavetira mirima ishivye ilanga tupu, indo vakava vadenge;
61002015	vakara shia ya usumanu, vakareka, vesoraa shia ya Balaamu we mwana wa Beori, ulya alekunda weesi lwetana uravi.
61002016	Lyo mmbo alekeemyo kimaruma kya uravi lwakwe muni, llya nshungu ukee kindo kileeshi irera, ukarera sha nndu, kafisha uravi lwa nkisuku ulya wa wongo.
61002017	Vandu yeva mmbo vavakye firori filatiri mura na mafishi avivitwa ni uraato uniini, na efo mbee yaawo ni ireema iniini lyivavereye.
61002018	Mashika kyeeri vapuswaa marero maniini nnu ekurosa nnu, na uravi na lango ta mwiili velembaa vandu valemmaa irisha valya vakeengera ikaa efo ngaeny ya ulembi.
61002019	Wo mmbo vakee ivavika nsia wa iva valeke, ate wo veni mmbo vakee mashinga a uravi, mashika elyi avingwa ni nndu ungyi mmbo avaa ishinga lyakwe.
61002020	Mashika valya valemmaa irisha maravi a ulana yelu kimaruma kya imanya Nndumi na Mwikira Yesu Kristo, kwakooya atirwa lyingi na iwa, ngata yakwe ya ifurumya mmbo ishevaa shikasha ngota ilya ya mbee.
61002021	Mashika kyevaa ng'waana kukooye kulore veishi shia ya usumanu, numa vakara ivavaso elyo yeele vekee vaniingye.
61002022	Mmbo kileenda indo kyawo kyiinani na kyaaso kilya kileamba, “Akyo kite kyambuiya uraako lwa vayo, na nguve ilya ilesangywa ikawuya ikwaalala ipwashiny.”
